Title: hai priit jahaan kii riit sadaa
Lyrics: jab ziiro diyaa mere bhaarat ne  bhaarat ne mere bhaarat ne  duniyaa ko tab ginatii aayii  taaron kii bhaashhaa bhaarat ne  duniyaa ko pahale sikhalaayii   detaa na dashamalav bhaarat to  yuun chaand pe jaanaa mushkil thaa dharatii aur chaand kii duurii kaa andaaz lagaanaa mushkil thaa  sabhyataa jahaan pahale aayii pahale janamii hai jahaan pe kalaa  apanaa bhaarat jo bhaarat hai  jisake piichhe sansaar chalaa sansaar chalaa aur aage badhaa jyuun aage badhaa badhata hii gayaa  bhagavaan kare ye aur badhe  badhataa hii rahe aur phuulephale   madanapuri chup kyon ho gaye aur sunaao  hai priit jahaan kii riit sadaa  main giit vahaan ke gaataa huun bhaarat kaa rahane vaalaa huun  bhaarat kii baat sunaataa huun   kaalegore ka bhed nahiin  har dil se hamaaraa naataa hai  kuchh aur na aataa ho hamako  hamen pyaar nibhaanaa aataa hai  jise maan chukii saarii duniyaa  main baat vohii doharaataa huun  bhaarat kaa rahane vaalaa huun  bhaarat kii baat sunaataa huun   jiite ho kisiine desh to kyaa hamane to dilon ko jiitaa hai  jahaan raam abhii tak hai nar men  naarii men abhii tak siitaa hai  itane paavan hain log jahaan  main nitnit shiish jhukaataa huun  bhaarat kaa rahane vaalaa huun  bhaarat kii baat sunaataa huun   itanii mamataa nadiyon ko bhii  jahaan maataa kahake bulaate hai  itanaa aadar insaan to kyaa patthar bhii puuje jaaten hai  is dharatii pe mainne janam liyaa  ye soch ke main itaraataa huun  bhaarat kaa rahane vaalaa huun  bhaarat kii baat sunaataa huun

Lyrics: raat piyaa ke sang jaagii rii sakhii raat piyaa ke sang jaagii rii sakhii chain padaa jo ang laagii rii sakhii raat piyaa ke sang threedots  sainyaanjii ne jaaduu pheraa sainyaanjii ne jaaduu pheraa baahon kaa daalaa gheraa karake zaraa andheraa ancharaa jo khainchaa meraa god piyaa kii tang laagii rii sakhii god piyaa kii tang laagii rii sakhii chain padaa jo ang laagii rii sakhii raat piyaa ke sang threedots  sainyaanjii ne daakaa daalaa sainyaanjii ne daakaa daalaa ulajhaa laton men baalaa bikharii gale kii maalaa ah bhadakii badan kii jwaalaa devadhanush rang laagii rii sakhii devadhanush rang laagii rii sakhii chain padaa jo ang laagii rii sakhii raat piyaa ke sang threedots  gajaraa suhaanaa tuutaa gajaraa suhaanaa tuutaa kajaraa nayan kaa chhuutaa sab tan bhayaa re jhuutaa jitanaa sataayaa luutaa aur bhii baanke ang laagii rii sakhii aur bhii baanke ang laagii rii sakhii tan kii chhupii tarang jaagii rii sakhii tan kii chhupii tarang jaagii rii sakhii chain padaa jo ang laagii rii sakhii raat piyaa ke sang threedots

Title: alabelaa re alabelaa re ruk jaanaa
Lyrics: alabelaa re alabelaa re ruk jaanaa dil todake tuu kahaan jaataa hai   2  alabelii huun main bhii terii diiwaanii zaalim tuune merii qadar naa jaanii o re gaanv ke chhailaa tujhe qasam hai hathuaa jode tohe morii jawaanii ru ru ru ruu ruu ruu ru ru ru ru ruu ru ru ru haay haay kyon tadapaataa hai alabelaa re alabelaa re ruk jaanaa dil todake tuu kahaan jaataa hai  kahataa thaa jaanuun jii pe khel jaanaa re sau pe bhaarii huun main aaye zamaanaa re matawaalaa ban aayaa thaa pyaar karane mauqaa jab aayaa dar gayaa diiwaanaa la la la laa laa laa la la la la laa la la la haay kaisaa ghabaraataa hai alabelaa re alabelaa re ruk jaanaa dil todake tuu kahaan jaataa hai  aaya chorii karane labon kii laalii laalii kaisii kud ne nazar churaa lii buddhuu buzadil jhuuthe nahiin rukegaa ruk jaa waranaa duungii hazaar gaalii ru ru ru ruu ruu ruu ru ru ru ru ruu ru ru ru haay phir bhii chalaa jaataa hai alabelaa re alabelaa re ruk jaanaa dil todake tuu kahaan jaataa hai  alabelaa re alabelaa re ruk jaanaa dil todake tuu kahaan jaataa hai

Title: main mandir pahunchaa haan jii saj rahii galii merii maan
Lyrics: chunarii gote men rupahalii gote men saj rahii galii merii maan chunarii gote men saj rahii galii merii ammaa chunarii gote men chunarii gote men rupahalii gote men threedots  ammaa tere munne kii gajab hai baat oy chandaa jaisaa mukhadaa kiran jaise haath saj rahii galii merii maan threedots  tuu maan kaa bachchaa   haan jii naa baap na jachchaa   haan jii bin khet kaa bandaa   haan jii bin muragii andaa   haan jii bin pahiye gaadii   haan jii bin aurat saadii   haan jii bin aam ki guthalii   haan jii hai aam se hamako matalab guthalii se kyaa lenaa mil jaae maal apanaa  se kyaa lenaa saj rahii galii merii maan threedots  main mandir pahunchaa  haan jii ek bachchaa dekhaa  haan jii naa koii aage  haan jii naa koii piichhe  haan jii main chauk men aa ke   haan jii le chalaa uthaa ke  haan jii ki maan ko de duun   haan jii mandir men rakh duun   haan jii bande ne dekhaa   haan jii vo zaalim samajhaa   haan jii ye paap hai meraa   haan jii bas mujhako gheraa   haan jii phir poliis aaii   haan jii kii laakh duhaaii   haan jii vo ek na maanaa   haan jii pad gayaa le jaanaa    haan jii sochaa le jaakar   haan jii use rakh duun baahar   haan jii badaa jatan lagaayaa   haan jii koi kaam na aayaa   haan jii sadakon par dekhaa    haan jii gaadii men phenkaa   haan jii ban gayaa ye bandaa    haan jii is gale kaa phandaa    haan jii main phir bhii     haan jii kachare men daalaa   haan jii phir baarish aaii   haan jii andhiyaarii chhaaii   haan jii bijalii jab kadakii   haan jii merii chhaatii dhadakii   haan jii ek tiir saa laagaa    haan jii main vaapas bhaagaa   haan jii phir bachche ko uthaayaa gale se yuun lagaayaa aage kyaa boluun yaaraa main paapii dil pe haaraa  betaa tere kisse pe dil meraa roe jiye teraa munnaa    hoe  saj rahii galii merii maan chunarii gote men threedots

Lyrics: mere diivaanepan kii bhii davaa nahiin 2 maine jaane kyaa sun liyaa tuune to kuchh kahaa nahiin mere diivaanepan kii threedots  main ye samajhaa mere dil kii koii hasarat nikal gaii 2 tuune dekhaa mujhe aise ke tabiyat machal gaii varanaa tere sar kii qasam aadamii main buraa nahiin mere diivaanepan kii threedots  beadab huun main diivaanaa kis kadar tuu kafaa huii 2 chhuu liyaa kyon badan teraa taubaa kaisii kataa huii saarii duniyaa men koii mere laayak sazaa nahiin mere diivaanepan kii threedots  chaandanii raat men jaise rukegul pe kiran padii 2 besabab ruuth kar tere maathe pe yuun shikan padii mere mahabuub ye terii berukii hai adaa nahiin mere diivaanepan kii threedots

Title: shuruu hotaa hai phir baaton kaa mausam
Singer: kishore manna de bhupinder anand bakshi chorus
Lyrics: shuruu hotaa hai phir baaton kaa mausam suhaanii chaandanii raaton kaa mausam bujhaaen kis tarah dil kii lagii ko lagaaen aag ham is chaandanii ko ki chaand saa koii chaharaa na pahaluu men ho  arz kiyaa hai threedots haay ki chaand saa koii chaharaa na pahaluu men ho to chaandanii kaa mazaa nahiin aataa are jaam piikar sharaabii na gir jaae to 2 mayakashii kaa mazaaa nahiin aataa ki chaand saa koii chaharaa threedots  zindagii hai mukammal adhuurii nahiin chaand saa koii chaharaa zaruurii nahiin husn saiyyaad hai ishq fariyaad hai ye jo do naam hain donon badanaam hain tum to naadaan ho gam ke mehamaan ho dil zaraa thaam lo aql se kaam lo agarach roshanii hotii hai saahab sab chiraagon se zaraa saa farq hotaa hai dilon men aur dimaagon men ai mere doston aql se kaam lo baat dil kii karo kyonkithreedots sher dil ko na tadapaake rakh de agar to shaayarii kaa mazaa nahiin aataa ki chaand saa koii chaharaa threedots  sharbatii aankh ke dushmanon se bacho reshmii zulf kii ulajhanon se bacho vo galii chhod do ye bharam tod do yuun na aahen bharo in se taubaa karo ye jo diladaar hain sab sitamagar hain dil jo dete hain ye to jaan lete hain ye vafaa ke naam ko aashiq kabhii rusvaa nahiin karate kataa dete hain vo sar ko kabhii shikavaa nahiin karate dil machal jaane do tiir chal jaane do dam nikal jaane do aur maut se aadamii ko agar dar lage to zindagii kaa mazaa aataa nahiin ki chaand saa koii chaharaa threedots  ishq men yaad kuchh aur hotaa nahiin aashiqii kuub kii dil se mahabuub kii yaad jaatii nahiin niind aatii nahiin dard khilataa nahiin chain milataa nahiin yaa kudaa kyaa karen ham davaa kyaa karen davaa dardejigar kii puuchhate ho tum diivaane se ye dil kii aag bujhegii faqat aansuu bahaane se yah sitam kis lie gam ho kam kis lie roen ham kis lie kyonkithreedots aag par koii paanii agar daal de to dillagii kaa mazaa aataa nahiin chaand sa koii chaharaa threedots

Lyrics: meraa jiivan  2 kuchh kaam naa aayaa jaise suukhe ped kii chhaayaa 2  o apanon ke hote hue man men basii tanhaaii ho aansuu banaa ke kushii aankhon se maine barasaaii ho kushiyon ko roterote duniyaa men ab to meraa jii ghabaraayaa meraa jiivan threedots  o baras gae re saavan dariyaa bhii josh men aae ho phuul bhii khilane lage kaliyon ke man muskaae suunii rahii ek daalii usape to koii ab tak phuul naa aayaa meraa jiivan threedots  o jiine ko jii naa chaahe maanguun to maut naa aae ho saanson ke chalane ko to jiivan kahaa nahiin jaae ho dard basaa ke dil men meraa nasiib mujhako kahaan pe laayaa meraa jiivan threedots

Title: satyam shivam sundaram
Lyrics: ishvar satya hai satya hii shiv hai shiv hii sundar hai jaago uth kar dekho jiivan jyot ujaagar hai  satyam shivam sundaram  2 ishvar satya hai satya hii shiv hai shiv hii sundar hai satyam shivam sundaram  2  raam avadh men kaashii men shiv kaanhaa vrindavan men dayaa karo prabhuu dekhuun in ko  2 har ghar ke aangan men raadhaa mohan sharanam satyam shivam sundaram  2  ek suuryaa hai ek gagan hai ek hii dharatii maataa dayaa karo prabhuu ek banen sab sab kaa ek se naataa raadhaa mohan sharanam satyam shivam sundaram  2

Title: naa puuchho koii hamen zahar kyuun pii liyaa
Lyrics: naa puuchho koii hamen zahar kyuun pii liyaa zahar ye pii liyaa to thodaa saa jii liyaa  pii ke naa bhuukh lage naa rahe dard koii gariibon kaa to nahiin aisaa hamadard koii kab tak ham aahen bharate naa piite to kyaa karate pii gaii aag hamen das gae naag hamen sunaa hai zahar se hii zahar maraa karataa hai naa puuchho koii hamen threedots  mittii ke pyaale jaisaa sabhii mujhe tod gae khaalii botal kii tarah raste men chhod gae jhuuthe to puuje jaaen sazaa ye sachche paaen zulm nirdosh rahaa nyaay kaamosh rahaa tuu bhii bhagavaan kyaa insaaf kiyaa karataa hai naa puuchho koii hamen threedots

Title: maut tuu ek kaviitaa hai
Lyrics: maut tuu ek kaviitaa hai  mujhase ek kaviitaa kaa vaadaa hai milegii mujhako   duubatii nabzon men jab dard ko niind aane lage zard saa cheharaa lie chaand ufak tak pahunche din abhii paanii men ho raat kinaare ke kariib na abhii andheraa ho na ujaalaa ho na raat na din jism jab khatm ho aur ruuh ko saans aae   mujhase ek kaviitaa kaa vaadaa hai milegii mujhako

Title: tumhaarii berukii se pareshaan hain nazaare
Lyrics: tumhaarii berukii se pareshaan hain nazaare zaraa saa muskaraa ke tum inhen de do sahaare tumhaarii berukii se threedots  pareshaan kisalie hotii ho tum apanii javaanii se kushii aur man kaa rishtaa to rahegaa zindagaanii se hai gam kaisaa kaho hamase o dil men hai tumhaare tumhaarii berukii se threedots  kisii pyaase kii aankhon ke chhalakate jaam piine do kisii bhanvare kii zulfon ke hamen saae men jiine do samaa tham jaae jo ik baar tum kar do ishaare tumhaarii berukii se threedots  jalegaa dil bahaaron kaa jo tum aansuu bahaaoge milegaa chain kaliyon ko agar tum muskaraaogii usii kii zindagaanii hai jo ise hans kar guzaare tumhaarii berukii se threedots

Title: meraa man teraa pyaasaa meraa man teraa
Lyrics: meraa man teraa pyaasaa meraa man teraa puurii kab hogii aashaa meraa man teraa  jab se maine dekhaa tujhe meraa man nahiin rahaa meraa de de apanaa haath mere haathon men kyaa jaae teraa ab to na todo aashaa meraa man threedots  zindagii hai merii ik daanv tuu hai haarjiit maarii aise vaise kaise bhii tuu khel hamase jaise marzii taarii kitanii hai bholii aashaa meraa man threedots  pataa nahiin kaun huun main kyaa huun aur kahaan mujhe jaanaa apanii vo kahaanii jo anjaanii ho ke ban gaii fasaanaa jiivan kyaa hai tamaashaa meraa man threedots

Title: man ke kazaane men maayaa hii maayaa
Film: teen chor maalik tere bande ham  jail hamaaraa desh
Lyrics: man ke kazaane men maayaa hii maayaa jab bhii tuu chaahe ise luut le  dikhaaii na de andhere men taalaa tuu jyoti lagan kii jalaa le agar haath kaanpe to hari naam le kar tuu puujaa kii chaabii lagaa le daraatii hai kyon mujhako apanii chhaayaa teraa hii dhan hai ye nahiin hai paraayaa jab bhii tuu chaahe threedots  kabhii haar daataa kii hotii nahiin na jaataa khaalii kabhii lene vaalaa bharegii terii na ye trishnaa kii jholii thakegaa na vo dene vaalaa usii ne banaaii hai terii ye kaayaa kaayaa men bhakti kaa dhan hai chhupaayaa jab bhii tuu chaahe threedots

Lyrics: mere mahabuub shaayad aaj kuchh naaraaz hain mujhase main kitane paas huun phir bhii    2 vo kitane duur hain mujhase mere mahabuub threedots  mujhe dar hai kii unakii berukhii kahiin jaan naa le le    2 karun kyaa gam judaaii kaa sahaa jaataa nahiin mujhase mere mahabuub threedots  vo mahafil men to aae hain magar chupachaap baithe hain    2 jo aashiq the mere kal tak na karate baat hain mujhase mere mahabuub threedots  kabhii mahasuus hotaa hai khushii ke din bhii aaenge    2 havelii jagamagaaegii mere dilavar ke aane se mere mahabuub threedots

Title: main to har mod par tujhako duungaa sadaa
Lyrics: main to har mod par tujhako duungaa sadaa merii aavaaz ko dard ke saaz ko tuu sune naa sune main to har mod threedots  mujhe dekhakar kah rahe hain sabhii mohabbat kaa haasil hai diivaanagii 2 pyaar kii raah men phuul bhii the magar maine kaante chune main to har mod threedots  jahaan dil jhukaa thaa vahiin sar jhukaa mujhe koii sajadon se rokegaa kyaa 2 kaash tuuten naa vo aarazuu ne merii kvaab jo hain bune main to har mod threedots  merii zindagii men yahii gam rahaa teraa saath bhii to bahut kam rahaa 2 dil ne saathii mere terii chaahat men the kvaab kyaakyaa bune main to har mod threedots  tere gesuon kaa vo saayaa kahaan vo baanhon kaa terii sahaaraa kahaan ab vo aanchal kahaan merii palakon se jo bhiige motii chune main to har mod threedots

Title: main raajaa tuu raanii
Lyrics: main raajaa tuu raanii tuu raajaa main raanii main premanagar kaa raajaa tuu ruupanagar kii raanii rahe na duniyaa rahegii teriimerii kahaanii main raajaa tuu threedots  kab se dharatii ambar jhuum rahaa hai jaane raahii nae hain raaste sadiyon puraane ye hii hai merii priit jo priitam sabase puraanii main raajaa tuu threedots  khilane kaa jinako aramaan hotaa hai har us kalii pe ye gumaan hotaa hai teremere pyaar kii hai ye koii nishaanii main raajaa tuu threedots  kaun se chaandsitaare ham jaane kaun hain kis nadiyaa ke dhaare ham jaane kaun hain jo bhii hain ik jaan hain donon ek zindagaanii main raajaa tuu threedots

Title: daaruu kii botal men  phir naa kahanaa michal daaruu
Lyrics: daaruu kii botal men saaheb paanii bharataa hai phir naa kahanaa michal daaruu pii kar dangaa karataa hai  shii shiish e kaisaa karataa aisaa kaahe ko hotaa dekh le jis din michal ko raat ko seth nahiin sotaa kud chorii karataa hai lekin chor se darataa hai phir naa kahanaa threedots  jangal men hain mor bade shahar men hain chor bade apane bhii ustaad yahaan pade hue aur bade phir naa kahanaa threedots  saalmahiine ke lie khaanepiine ke lie kitanaa paisaa chaahie aakir jiine ke lie log diivaane hain jo is paise pe marataa hai phir naa kahanaa threedots

Title: ab ke naa saawan barase
Lyrics: abake naa saawan barase abake naa saawan barase ho abake baras to barasengii ankhiyaan abake naa saawan barase ho abake baras to barasengii ankhiyaan abake naa saawan barase  jaane kaise abake ye mausam beete aa aa aa aa jaane kaise abake ye mausam beete beetegii jo tere bin wo kam beete tere binaa saawan suune tere binaa ab to ye man tarase  jaane kab aaye din din dhal jaaye din dhal jaaye jaane kab aaye din din dhal jaaye tere bin ankhiyon se raat naa jaaye tere binaa raat naa jaaye tere binaa ab to ye din tarase

Title: husn haazir hai muhabbat kii sazaa paane ko
Lyrics: husn haazir hai muhabbat kii sazaa paane ko koii patthar se na maare mere diivaane ko  mere diivaane ko itanaa na sataao logon ye to vahashii hai tumhiin hosh men aao logon bahut ranjuur hai ye gamon se chuur hai ye kudaa kaa kauf uthaao bahut majabuur hai ye kyon chale aaye ho bebas pe sitam dhaane ko koii patthar se na maare threedots  mere jalavon kii kataa hai jo ye diivaanaa huaa main huun mujarim ye agar hosh se begaanaa huaa mujhe suulii chadhaa do yaa sholon pe jalaa do koii shiqavaa nahiin hai jo jii chaahe sazaa do baksh do is ko main taiyaar huun mit jaane ko koii patthar se na maare threedots  pattharon ko bhii vafaa phuul banaa sakatii hai ye tamaashaa bhii sareaam dikhaa sakatii hai lo ab patthar uthaao zamaane ke kudaaon main tum ko aazamaauun mujhe tum aazamaao ab duaa arsh pe jaatii hai asar laane ko koii patthar se na maare threedots

Title: pyaas thii phir bhii taqaazaa na kiyaa
Lyrics: pyaas thii phir bhii taqaazaa na kiyaa jaane kyaa sochake aisaa na kiyaa  badhake haathon pe uthaa lenaa thaa tujhako siine se lagaa lenaa thaa tere honthon se tere gaalon se mujhako har rang churaa lenaa thaa jaane kyaa sochake aisaa na kiyaa  haath aanchal se jo takaraa jaataa ek rangiin nashaa saa chhaa jaataa tere siine pe khulii zulfon ko chuum letaa to qaraar aa jaataa jaane kyaa sochakar aisaa na kiyaa

Title: akhiyon ko rehane do akhiyon ke aas paas
Lyrics: tuutake dil ke tukade tukade ho gae mere siine men aa gale lagake mar jaaen kyaa rakhaa hai jiine men  ankhiyon ko rahane de ankhiyon ke aas paas duur se dil kii bujhatii rahe pyaas  dard zamaane men kam nahiin milate sab ko mohabbat se gam nahiin milate tuutane vaale dil hote hain kuchh khaas duur se dil kii bujhatii rahe pyaas  rah gaii duniyaa men naam kii khushiyaan tere mere kis kaam kii khushiyaan saarii umr hamako rahana hai yuun udaas duur se dil kii bujhatii rahe pyaas

Title: ek akelaa is shahar men raat men aur dopahar men
Lyrics: ek akelaa is shahar men raat men aur dopahar men aabodaanaa dhuundhataa hai aashiyaanaa dhuundhataa hai  din khaalii khaalii bartan hai aur raat hai jaise andhaa kunvaa in suunii andherii aankhon men aansu kii jagah aataa hain dhunaa jiine kii vajah to koii nahiin marane kaa bahaanaa dhuundhataa hai ek akelaa is shehar men  in umr se lambii sadakon ko manzil pe pahunchate dekhaa nahiin bas daudatii phiratii rahatii hain ham ne to thaharate dekhaa nahiin is ajanabii se shehar men jaanaa pahachaanaa dhuundhataa hai ek akelaa is shehar men

Title: kahiin aisaa na ho tum ajanabii raahon men
Lyrics: kahiin aisaa na ho tum ajanabii raahon men kho jaao mere saathii merii aavaaz ke piichhe  chale aao  2  pareshaan zindagii ko aas kaa saahil nazar aae mujhe phir pyaar kii khoii huii manzil nazar aae havaaon men zaraa tum reshamii aanchal ko laharaao mere saathii merii threedots  na jaane kitanii baar aayaa gayaa mausam bahaaron kaa magar ab tak nahiin badalaa muqaddar beqaraaron kaa sabhii gam duur ho jaaen jo tum ik baar mil jaao mere saathii merii threedots

Lyrics: ab jo mile hain to baahon ko baahon men rahane de saajanaa sachche ke jhoothe hain honthon ko honthon se kahane de saajanaa naa naa 2  haay re haay re haay re saajana  yuun hii nashaa chadhataa rahe 2 ke teraa pyaar badhataa rahe ye jhoomataa saayaa teraa tan pe mere padataa rahe tuu aa gayaa jo hosh men kyaa hogaa phir ye bhool jaa 2  tuu hai havaa sholaa huun main 2 mil ke bhii jo mil naa sake bujh naa sake tere binaa tere binaa jal na sake majaboor huun terii qasam jhoothii nahiin merii vafaa 2  ab jo mile hain to mujhako nigaahon men rahane de saajanaa sachche ke jhoothe hain nainon ko nainon se kahane de saajanaa naa naa  ab jo mile hain to mujhako nigaahon men rahane de saajanaa sachche ke jhoothe hain nainon ko nainon se kahane de saajanaa threedots

Title: kyaa hai meraa naam  ye duniyaa ek nambarii
Lyrics: kyaa hai meraa naam na puuchho gir jaaenge jaam na puuchho kaun huun main ye jaan ke sabako lag jaaegii tharatharii ye duniyaa ek nambarii to main das nambarii  is mahafil men kis par kyaa rang chadhaa sab jaanuun kaun chhupaa kis bhesh men pyaare main sabako pahachaanuun kyaa hai meraa naam threedots  luut ke jisakaa ghar baithe ho mahal sajaae apanaa usakaa lahuu pukaar rahaa hai yaar bachoge kitanaa zulm hain jitane raat aur din ke luungaa badale sab gingin are badebadon kii kar dii tabiiyat harii ye duniyaa ek nambarii threedots kahat kabiir suno bhaii saadho baat kahuun main kharii ye duniyaa ek nambarii to main das nambarii 2  ek nanbar kaa haath dikhaayaa jab kah ke jay kaalii kitane hii sethon kii bhaarii jeben ho gaiin khaalii do nambar hai aur niraalaa dekhuun aur khul jaae taalaa ud ke jeb men aa jaae hare not kii parii ye duniyaa ek nambarii threedots  nambar tiin kaa chamatkaar dekho jab phenkuun pattaa sabakii tabiiyat karuun saaf dillii ho yaa kalakattaa chauthe ne raah gazab kaa jhaansaa aap kiyaa duuje ko phaansaa kabhiikabhii to pulis ko ulte dikhalaauun hathakadii ye duniyaa ek nambarii threedots  paanchavaa nambar zulm kaa dushman main dukhiyon kaa saathii chhathaa desh ke gaddaaron se chhiin luun ghar kii baatii nambar saath kare jo dangaa ek haath men kar duun changaa langadiitangadii chhuriikataarii sab rah jaaen dharii ye duniyaa ek nambarii threedots  kalaa aathaviin ye hai ki main pyaar se milataa sabase pyaar kii kaatir insaan kyaa hai lad jaauun main rab se navaan jo mile mujhe hasiinaa nau din tak na ruke pasiinaa aur nambar das das  likhaa hai ye to har thaane men sifat hai kyaakyaa diivaane men jitanii uungaliyaan in haathon men utanii jaadugarii ye duniyaa ek nambarii threedots

Title: tamannaaepareshaandil ne phir tumako
Lyrics: mu 	tamannaaepareshaandil ne phir tumako pukaaraa hai 	zaraa aakar to dekho haaledil ye dil tumhaaraa hai aa 	bhalaa aauun to kaise jiite jii duniyaa ne maaraa hai 	jahaan vaalon ke aage kyaa karuun dil besahaaraa hai do 	tamannaaepareshaan threedots  mu 	sitaare merii haalat dekh ke chupachaap rote hain 	yahii raaton kaa aalam aur yahii din kaa nazaaraa hai 	tamannaaepareshaan threedots  aa 	mujhe tum bhuul jaao kvaab to tuutaa hii karate hain 	sivaa mere jahaan men aaj bhii sab kuchh tumhaaraa hai 	tamannaaepareshaan threedots  do 	raho chaahe jahaan bhii dil se tum jaane na paaoge 	bhalaa ho is jahaan kaa har koii dushman hamaaraa hai 	bhalaa ho is jahaan kaa mu 	har koii dushman hamaaraa hai

Title: zindagii men jab tumhaare gam nahiin the
Lyrics: anuradha zindagii men jab tumhaare gam nahiin the itane tanahaa the ki ham bhii ham nahiin the  anuradha waqt par jo log kaam aae hain aksar ajanabii the vo mere hamadam nahiin the  bhupindar besabab thaa teraa milanaa rahaguzar men haadase har mod par kuchh kam nahiin the anuradha hamane kvaabon men kudaa banakar bhii dekhaa aap the baahon men do aalam nahiin the  bhupindar saamane diiwaar thii kuddaariyon kii varanaa raste pyaar ke purakam nahiin the

Title: ai mere nanhe gulafaam merii niind tere naam
Lyrics: ai mere nanhe gulafaam merii niind tere naam teraa bachapan paak rahe mujh par to hai sii ilzaam kis kaa padaa tujh par saayaa kis ne ye raastaa dikhalaayaa kaun tujhe is ghar laayaa ye ghar rusavaa badanaam in galiyon kii qismat hai tuute gajare jhuuthe jaam ai mere threedots  zakmii saazon kii jhanakaar ghaayal giiton kii gunjaar dukhate tan kii chiikh pukaar aiyaashon ke khel kaa naam in kuuchon men hotaa hai aramaanon kaa katleaam ai mere threedots  is bastii men zahar ghule har botii rotii men tule in galiyon kii aankh khule jab dharatii par chhaae shaam so na gayaa to dekhegii maan bahanon ke lagate daam ai mere threedots

Title: jaa re jaa main tose naa boluun
Lyrics: o o o  jaa re jaa main tose naa boluun 2 samajhaa hai kyaa tuune mujhe daulat se main dil ko naa toluun jaa re jaa    merii nazar men hai teri nazar kii mastii merii judaa tujhase koii nahiin hai hastii  2 jo tuu wo main huun aur kuchh nahiin huun main warnaa sang tere kyuun doluun jaa re jaa    maanaa jaruurii hai paisaa nahiin par aisaa paisaa bahut dekhaa dekhaa nahiin tum jaisaa  2 le aaye tuu hii re to bhii naa maanu do miithe baaton se khush ho luun jaa re jaa    kaisii suhaanii hai saawan kii lambii raaten aajaa muhabbat kii chheden wahii phir baaten  2 tuu merii baiyaa ko thaam aa re saiyaa sharamaauun main ghunghat naa kholuun jaa re jaa

Title: koii maane yaa naa maane  kyon bhaii chaachaa
Lyrics: koii maane yaa naa maane sach kah gae hain log puraane bure kaam kaa buraa natiijaa kyon bhaii chaachaa haan bhatiije  tote se bolii mainaa bujurgon kaa hai kahanaa pyaare sach hai naa bol jisane ek rishtaa todaa vo sau rishte bhii todegaa tuune kisii ko chhodaa hai tujhe bhii koii chhodegaa 2 jo apanon ko thukaraae aur gairon se pyaar kare apane haathon se apanii vo qabr taiyaar kare isiilie to kahaa hai ki us badanaam kaa bure kaam kaa threedots  tote se bolii mainaa threedots ham is ghar ke naukar hain maalik kaa maal bachaaenge jo bhii jahaan se aayaa hai use vahiin pahunchaaenge par kitane roz chalegaa dhokhe se jo bhii kaam banaa puuchho to is dauluu se ye kaise daulataraam banaa to daulataraam kaa bure kaam kaa threedots

Title: iishvar allaah tere naam sabako sanmati de bhagavaan
Lyrics: iishvar allaah tere naam sabako sanmati de bhagavaan saaraa jag terii santaan sabako sanmati de bhagavaan  is dharatii par basane vaale sab hain terii god ke paale 2 koii niich naa koii mahaan sabako sanmati de bhagavaan  jaaton naslon ke batavaare chhuut kahaan sab tere dvaare tere lie sab ek samaan sabako sanmati de bhagavaan  janam kaa koii mol nahiin hai janam manushy kaa tol nahiin hai 2 karam se hai sabakii pahachaan sabako sanmati de bhagavaan iishvar allaah tere naam threedots

Title: tuu hii saagar hai tuu hii kinaaraa
Singer: sulakshana pandit vinod sharma  sulakshana pandit
Lyrics: tuu hii saagar tuu hii saagar hai tuu hii kinaaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa  usakaa saayaa hai tuu usakaa darpan tere siine men hai usakii dhadakan terii aankhon men usakaa ishaaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa  karmanyevaadhikaaraste maa phaleshu kadaachana maa karmaphalaheturbhuuh maa te sangoastvakarmani  paap kyaa pun hai kyaa ye bhulaa de karm kar phal kii chintaa mitaa de ye pariikshaa na hogii dubaaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa  tuu hii saagar tuu hii saagar hai tuu hii kinaaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa     tuu hii saagar tuu hii saagar hai tuu hii kinaaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa  man men ulajhaa kabhii tan men ulajhaa tuu sadaa apane daaman men ulajhaa sabase jiitaa aur apane se haaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa  vishh nikaale ki amrit nikaale duubake thaah apanii lagaa le tuu hii shiv tuu hii shiv kaa dulaaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa  tuu hii saagar tuu hii saagar hai tuu hii kinaaraa dhuundhataa hai tuu kisakaa sahaaraa

Title: twinkle twinkle little star how i wonder what you are
Lyrics: you fool everybody is a fool baby everybody is a fool baby sabhii se jawaanii men hotii pyaar kii bhuul bebii samajhe maidam o siidhaa kar duungaa but baby  ki yuu hai mem pashchim kii to main puurab kaa jatt bebii i will teach you something else sikhaao jii to fetch a pale of water  gaao aao main nahiin tuu hai iidiyat bebii naarii hoke piye whiskii aur piye sigaret bebii

Title: jab bhii jii chaahe naii duniyaa basaa lete hain log
Lyrics: jab bhii jii chaahe naii duniyaa basaa lete hain log ek chehare pe kaii chehare lagaa lete hain log   yaad rahataa hai kise guzare zamaane kaa chalan yaad rahataa hai kise sard pad jaatii hai chaahat haar jaatii hai lagan ab mohabbat bhii hai kyaa ik tijaarat ke sivaa ham hii naadaan the jo odhaa biitii yaadon kaa qafan varanaa jiine ke lie sab kuchh bhulaa dete hain log  jaane vo kyaa log the jinako vafaa kaa paas thaa jaane vo kyaa log the duusare ke dil pe kyaa guzaregii ye ehasaas thaa ab hain patthar ke sanam jinako ehasaas naa ho vo zamaanaa ab kahaan jo ahaledil ko raas thaa ab to matalab ke lie naamevafaa lete hain log

Title: meraa raajaa betaa buujhe ek pahelii
Lyrics: meraa raajaa betaa bujhe ek pahelii  pyaari pyaari ankhiyon kii kaun sahelii  nindiyaa meraa raajaa betaa bujhe ek pahelii  soe sab jaage saarii raat akelii  maan  1 ban than ke aae nindiyaa lagaae  chaand ke maathe pe bindiyaa lagaae  mukhade pe chamake chandr kiran  meraa raajaa betaa bujhe ek pahelii  kaun vo dulhan naar navelii  raat  2 khoyaa andhere men melaa jahaan kaa  nain jharokhon se sapanon ne jhaankaa  dhiire dhiire chale rii pagal pavan  meraa raajaa betaa bujhe ek pahelii  champaa ke baalon men mahake chamelii  gajaraa

Title: apane aap raaton men
Lyrics: apane aap raaton men chilamanen sarakatii hain chaunkate hain daravaaze siidhiiyaan dhadakatii hain apane aap apane aap   ek ajanabii aahat aa rahii hai kamkam sii jaise dil ke paradon par gir rahii ho shabanam sii bin kisiikii yaad aaye dil ke taar hilate hain bin kisiike khanakaaye chuudiyaan khanakatii hain apane aap apane aap  koii pahale din jaise ghar kisiike jaataa ho jaise khud musaafir ko raasataa bulaataa ho paanv jaane kis jaanib beuthaaye uthate hain aur chhamchhamaachhamchham paayalen jhanakatii hain apane aap   apane aap raaton men chilamanen sarakatii hain chaunkate hain daravaaze siidhiiyaan bhadakatii hain apane aap apane aap

Title: ye dostii ham nahiin todenge todenge dam magar
Lyrics: ye dostii ham nahiin todenge todenge dam magar teraa saatha naa chhodenge  ai merii jiit terii jiit terii haar merii haar sun ai mere yaar teraa gam meraa gam terii jaan merii jaan aisaa apanaa pyaar khaanaa piinaa saath hai maranaa jiinaa saath hai 2 saarii zindagii ye dostii threedots  logon ko aate hain do nazar ham magar aisaa to nahiin hon judaa yaa kafaa ai khudaa de duaa aisaa ho nahiin zaan par bhii khelenge tere liye le lenge 2 sabase dushmanii  ye dostii ham nahiin todenge todenge dam magar teraa saatha naa chhodenge

Title: ye jo chilaman hai dushaman hai hamaarii
Lyrics: ye jo chilaman hai dushman hai hamaarii  2 badii sharmiilii badii sharmiilii dulhan hai hamaarii  duusaraa aur koi yahaan kyuun rahe  2 husn aur ishq ke daramiyaan kyuun rahe daramiyaan kyuun rahe ye yahaan kyuun rahe haan jii haan kyuun rahe ye jo aanchal hai shikavaa hai hamaaraa kyuun chhupataa hai cheharaa ye tumhaaraa ye jo threedots  kaise diidaareaashiq tumhaaraa kare ruukhe roshan kaa kaise nazaaraa kare haan nazaaraa kare ho ishaaraa kare haan pukaaraa kare ye jo gesu hain baadal hain qasam se kaise bikhare hai gaalon pe sanam ke ye jo threedots  rukh se paradaa zaraa jo sarakane lagaa uf ye kambakht dil kyun machalane lagaa kyun machalane lagaa  2 haan tadapane lagaa threedots  threedots

Title: o maanjhii re jaae kahaan
Lyrics: o maanjhii 4 re jaae kahaan 2 kahaan nainon men mere ghataa ghanaghor saanson men uthe pavan kaa shor aane vaalaa hai re koii tuufaan o maanjhii threedots  pyaar o maanjhii teraa jhuuthaa hai miit banake tuune luutaa hai bharii duniyaa men akelii huun jaan ghaayal dil tuutaa hai suujhe nahiin aar paar laayaa kahaan teraa pyaar o maanjhii threedots  tuu meraa hai mainne sochaa thaa yahii sapanaa thaa nigaahon men tuu khiwaiyaa hogaa re jiivan kaa paar utaruungii terii baahon men ek tuu hii thaa meraa aur tuu bhii chal diyaa o maanjhii threedots

Title: kaaravaan guzaraa kiyaa ham rahaguzar dekhaa kiye
Lyrics: kaaravaan guzaraa kiyaa ham rahaguzar dekhaa kiye har qadam par naqshepaaeraahabar dekhaa kiye  yaas jab chhaaii ummiden haath mal kar rah gaiin dil kii nabzen chhut gaiin aur chaaraagar dekhaa kiye  ruk merii jaanib nigaahelutf dushman kii taraf yuun udhar dekhaa kiye goyaa idhar dekhaa kiye  dardamandaanewafaa kii haay re majabuuriyaan dardedil dekhaa naa jaataa thaa magar dekhaa kiye  tuu kahaan thii ai ajal ai naamuraadon kii muraad marane waale raah terii umr bhar dekhaa kiye

Title: o dilajaanii bol merii raanii
Lyrics: o dilajaanii bol merii raanii main terii kyaa huun tuu hai meraa dil kitanii hasiin hai duniyaa sab kuchh hai kyaa suhaanaa kho jaaen aaj hamtum dekhaa kare zamaanaa  mausam aae mausam jaae hamako rahanaa tere saae gulashan bulaae yaa pukaaren kaliyaan hamako to pyaarii terii dil kii galiyaan o dil men aa mujhamen samaa jaa mere sivaa o jaanetamannaa meraa kahiin nahiin thikaanaa o dilajaanii threedots  gir jaauun na dekho sajanaa yuunhii mujhako thaame rakhanaa niicheuunche hai raaste darataa hai jiyaa teraa diivaanaa teraa mastaanaa teraa saathii hai o jaanejaanaan phir manzil se kyaa ghabaraanaa o dilajaanii threedots

Title: ye pal chanchal kho naa denaa
Lyrics: he ye pal chanchal kho na denaa kahiin o diiwaane he roz roz aate nahiin aise mauqe dil ko lubhaane saaqii bhii hai jaam bhii hai rangon bharii shaam bhii hai dekh mauqaa jaaye na nikal  he e he e ye pal chanchal kho na denaa kahiin o diiwaane  ang ang pe chhalake kapuurii aankh milaakar pii le aankh milaakar pii le aaj husn par marane ka mausam mujhape marakar jii le mujh pe marakar jii le mastii huun main jawaanii huun main tere liye diiwaanii huun main aa merii baanhon men machal  ho ho ho hii hii haa haa haa  he dekh zaraa jaanejaanaan aayaa teraa aslii diiwaanaa tere mere pyaar kaa tamaashaa ab dekhegaa zamaanaa naachegii tuu nachaauungaa main tadapegii tuu tadapaauungaa main dekh zaraa mujhase sanbhal  laa laa la laa laa laa la laa laa laa la laa laa laa laa laa he he laa laa la laa he he laa laa la laa laa laa laa laa laa  main huun shamaa meraa kaam jalaanaa aag kii dhaar pe chalanaa aag kii dhaar pe chalanaa piichhe jalegaa ye parawaanaa pahale hai tujhako jalanaa pahale hai tujhako jalanaa tuune mujhe abhii jaanaa nahiin are tuune mujhe abhii jaanaa nahiin tuune bhii to pahachaanaa nahiin pahachaanaa nahiin are jaana nahiin mahafil na jaaye terii jal jal jal jal

Title: merii jaan merii jaan kahanaa maano
Lyrics: merii jaan merii jaan kahanaa maano 2 ho dushman hai jahaan rut pahachaano kategii na ye dagar binaa ek hamasafar phir kyon bande ko apanaa hii jaano merii jaan threedots  koii bhii gaadii duniyaa men ek pahiye se nahiin chalatii chale nahiin zindagii bin saathii ke dekho tumhaarii paayal bhii ek ghungharuu se nahiin bajatii bajatii hain taaliyaan do haathon se mere sang aa jaao buraa mat maano ho merii jaan threedots  main bhii nahiin kuchh tumase kam tum jo nahiin rukane vaale dhang mere haath men hain aur bhii tumako hansaa ke chhoduungaa tod ke honthon ke taale samajh lo main huun sanam dil kaa chor bhii apane jaisaa mujhe bhii jaano ho merii jaan threedots

Title: jab tak hai jaan jaanejahaan
Lyrics: jab tak hai jaan jaanejahaan  main naachuungii   pyaar kabhii bhii marataa nahiin  maut se bhii ye darataa nahiin  lut jaaenge mit jaaenge mar jaaenge ham  zindaa rahegii hamaarii daastaan  o haan jab tak hai jaan threedots  tuut jaae paayal to kyaa  paanv ho jaaen ghaayal to kyaa  dil diyaa hai dil liyaa hai pyaar kiyaa hai to  denaa padegaa muhabbat kaa imtahaan  o haan jab tak hai jaan threedots  ye nazar jhuk sakatii nahiin  ye zubaan ruk sakatii nahiin  main kahuungii gam sahuungii chup rahuungii kyaa bebas huun lekin nahiin main bezubaan  o haan jab tak hai jaan threedots

Title: haay kaahe ko bulaayaa mujhe baalamaa
Lyrics: la 	haay haay kaahe ko bulaayaa mujhe baalamaa 	pyaar ke naam se 2 	kaahe ko bulaayaa threedots ra 	raadhaa ne yahii puuchhaa thaa ek din 	ruuth kar shaam se 2  la 	jaa tose boluun naa ghuunghataa kholuun naa doluun naa main sang tere 2 ra 	roz jo tum ruuthogii aise guzarenge din mere kaise 	jiine nahiin degaa mujhe chaar din  pyaar aaraam se  2 la 	kaahe ko bulaayaa threedots  ra 	kaalii ghataaon men thandii havaaon men aao kahen haal dil kaa 2 la 	o pyaar men din to dhal jaataa hai raat kaa jaaduu chal jaataa hai 	jiyaa lagataa hai dhadakane piyaa  aajakal shaam se  2 ra 	raadhaa ne yahii threedots  la 	taubaa main kyaa karuun 2 	badanaamii se daruun mohe badii laaj aae ra 	hamane koii kii hai chorii pyaar kiyaa hai hamane gorii 	logon se jo ham aise darane lage  to gae kaam se  2 la 	kaahe ko bulaayaa threedots ra 	raadhaa ne yahii threedots

Title: gangaa men duubaa na jamanaa men duubaa
Lyrics: gangaa men duubaa na jamanaa men duubaa duub gayaa re meraa man sajan terii do ankhiyan men raahon men khoyaa na baagon men khoyaa khoyaa meraa baalaapan sajan terii do ankhiyan men  taaron kaa gahanaa na tan pe sajaauun aanchal men bhar luun piyaa pyaar teraa aise sajuun saj ke tujhako rijhaauun laharon men dekhuun na darpan men dekhuun dekhuun mukhadaa sajan terii do ankhiyan men gangaa men duubaa threedots

Title: ruutheruuthe piyaa manaauun kaise
Lyrics: ruutheruuthe piyaa manaauun kaise 2 aaj na jaane baat huii kyaa kyon ruuthe mujhase jab tak vo na bolen mujhase main samajhuun kaise ruutheruuthe piyaa threedots  vo baithe hain kuchh aise shaadii men dulhan jaise kyaa ban ke dulhaa main jaauun aur unakii maang sajaauun lambii dulhan thiganaa duulhaa 2 jodii jamen kaise ruutheruuthe piyaa threedots  kyaa mujhase hasiin hain qitaaben piyaa jinako pyaar se thaame main nain milaanaa chaahuun par nain milaa naa paauun sautan chashmaa biich men aae 2 nain milen kaise ruutheruuthe piyaa threedots

Title: kizaan ke daur men aise bhii kuch maqaam aae
Lyrics: kizaan ke daur men aise bhii kuchh maqaam aae gulon pe waqt padaa hai to kaar kaam aae  kisii ne qadr na kii mere diidaaetar kii zamiin pe ashq gire aasamaan ke kaam aae  main unakii bazm se ghabaraa ke uthane waalaa thaa phir unakii miithii nazar ke kahiin salaam aae  wo shammaa kyaa jo kisii ek anjuman men jale ek aisii shammaa jalaao jo sabake kaam aae

Title: bachapan har gam se begaanaa hotaa hai
Lyrics: bachapan har gam se begaanaa  hotaa hai  2 bachapan har gam threedots  koii fiqr na chintaa mastii kaa aalam jiivan khel saa lagataa hai sukh milate hain raahon men phir ke ghar to jel saa lagataa hai ho isii umar men kushiyon kaa kazaanaa hotaa hai bachapan har gam threedots  ham dhuundhate hain jiivan bhar vo kushiyaan bachapan men jo paate hain vo hansate hue din gaatii vo raaten laut kar phir nahiin aate hain ho yaadon ke saae men vaqt bitaanaa hotaa hai bachapan har gam threedots

Title: suniye kahiye kahate sunate baatonbaaton men pyaar
Lyrics: ki suniye aa kahiye kahiye ki suniye suniye aa kahiye kahiye na ki suniye kahate sunate baaton baaton men pyaar ho jaaegaa  ki ye pahalii nazar kaa uf kyaa asar hai     tumhaarii kasam dagamagaae se ham hain aa la ra la la la ra la la ra la la la ra la ki nahiin jisape kaabuu ye hai kaisaa jaaduu     mere lie to sach bhii bharam hai  ki suniye aa kahiye kahiye ki suniye suniye aa kahiye kahiye na ki suniye kahate sunate baaton baaton men pyaar ho jaaegaa  ki ghataa chaand bijalii barakhaa pavan men     chhamii ho tum merii har kalpanaa men aa taariif merii itanii karo na     udane laguun main kahiin aasmaan men  ki suniye aa kahiye kahiye ki suniye suniye aa kahiye kahiye na ki suniye kahate sunate baaton baaton men pyaar ho jaaegaa  ki tumhaarii adaa hai vo sabase judaa hai     chaahaa hai tumako isii vaaste aa ham bekadar hain tum bekadar ho     uthate hain dekho nae raaste  ki suniye aa kahiye kahiye ki suniye suniye aa kahiye kahiye na ki suniye kahate sunate baaton baaton men pyaar ho jaaegaa

Title: anahonii ko honii kar den  amar akabar enthonii
Lyrics: anahonii ko honii kar den honii ko anahonii 2 ek jagah jab jamaa hon tiinon amar akabar enthonii anahonii ko honii threedots  ek ek se bhale do do se bhale tiiin duulhaa dulhan saath nahiin baajaa hai baaraat nahiin are kuchh darane kii baat nahiin ye milan kii rainaa hai koii gam kii raat nahiin yaaron hanso banaa rakhii hai kyuun ye suurat ronii 2 ek jagah jab jamaa threedots  ek ek se bhale do do se bhale tiiin shammaa ke paravaanon ko is ghar ke mehamaanon ko 2 pahachaano anjaanon ko kaise baat matalab kii samajhaauun diivaanon ko sapan salone le ke aaii hai ye raat salonii 2 ek jagah jab jamaa threedots

Title: suhaanii chaandanii raaten hamen sone nahiin detiin
Lyrics: suhaanii chaandanii raaten hamen sone nahiin detiin tumhaare pyaar kii baaten hamen sone nahiin detiin suhaanii chaandanii raaten hamen sone nahiin detiin  tumhaare reshamii julfon men dil ke phuul khilate the inhiin phuulon ke mausam men ham tum bhii milate the puraanii vo mulaakaaten hamen sone nahii detiin tumhaare pyaar kii baaten hamen sone nahiin detiin suhaanii chaandanii raaten threedots  kahiin aisaa n ho laga jaaye aag dil men paanii se badal le raastaa apanaa ghataaen meharabaanii se ki yaadon kii ye barasaaten hamen sone nahiin detiin tumhaare pyaar kii baaten hamen sone nahiin detiin suhaanii chaandanii raaten threedots

Title: aa jaa mere pyaar aa jaa
Lyrics: aa jaa mere pyaar aa jaa dekh aise naa sataa ab to rahaa nahiin jaay aa jaa aa jaa aa mere gale se lag jaa  hai suunii tere bin jiivan kii dagar thaam le merii baanhen mere hamasafar aa jaa mere pyaar aa jaa threedots  aankhon kii tamannaa ye hai jaanejaan dekh luun tujhako pahale phir saaraa jahaan aa jaa mere pyaar aa jaa threedots

Title: jiijaajii merii jiijii hai anaadii
Lyrics: jiijaajii  2 merii jiijii hai anaadii ise pyaar se sikhalaiyo o o  saalii jii  2 jab main pyaar sikhalaauun tum duurduur rahiyo o o  bholiibhaalii merii jiijii pyaarvyaar na jaane apane aapako kuchh na samajhe tumako svaamii maane  svaamii jii  2  ye to badii natakhat hai  jiijaajii  2 merii threedots  tuu to baayaa ang hai meraa tuu diipak main baatii teraameraa dharm kaa naataa phir kaahe sharamaatii  sajanii jii  2 jo huaa so huaa ab aur na tarasaiyo  jiijaajii  2 merii threedots  chhotii saalii kaa ye haq hai rang men bhang milaae chup rii apane jiijaa jii se laaj tujhe na aae  devii jii  2 ab isake bhii haath kahiin piile karavaaiyo  jiijaajii  2 merii threedots

Title: tamannaaon kii duniyaa  mere dost tujhe teraa miit mubaarak
Lyrics: tamannaaon kii duniyaa yuun to har ek insaan basaataa hai magar paataa vahii hai jo yahaan taqadiir leke aataa hai  mere dost tujhe teraa miit mubaarak ye saaj nayaa nayaa giit mubaarak mere dost tujhe threedots  khilii hai bahaaron men ye phuulon kii kalii kvaabon kii dulhan bade naazon men palii 2 palakon pe bithaanaa aise sukh denaa yaad kare ye kabhii naa baabul kii galii apane baabul kii galii gaae kushii ke taraane aisii priit mubaarak ye saaj nayaa threedots  chamake kyuun naa taaraa usakii qismat kaa jisako milaa ho ye hasiin tohafaa badaa hii nasiibavaalaa hai vo jag men haath men ho jisake aisii pyaarii rekhaa aisii nyaarii rekhaa aaj haar bhii kahe tujhe jiit mubaarak ye saaj nayaa threedots

Title: jhuumataa saavan dekho aayaa
Lyrics: jhuumataa saavan dekho aayaa barakhaa ne pyaar barasaayaa maine jo tujhako chhuaa dil beiimaan huaa saanson kaa taar jhanajhanaayaa barakhaa ne pyaar threedots  baanhon men chorii se tujhako uthaa luungaa honthon se thodii sii laalii churaa luungaa hamako bulaate bhii ho aankhen churaate bhii ho aakir diivaanaa kyuun banaayaa barakhaa ne pyaar threedots  bandhan teremere ab tak kunvaare hain ban jaa dulhan dil ke sapane sanvaare hain dil ko bahalaanaa hogaa badalaa chukaanaa hogaa kyuun hamen raaton ko jagaayaa barakhaa ne pyaar threedots

Title: nazaraanaa bhejaa kisii ne pyaar kaa
Lyrics: nazaraanaa bhejaa kisii ne pyaar kaa hai diivaanaa jo bas tere diidaar kaa  rahenge jo ruutheruuthe 2 jhuuthemuuthe karake nakhare to ham bolenge nahiin yuun aapase o dekho ab na toko na hansii ko jo aane vaalii hai honthon pe chupachaap se muskaraa naa aayaa hai tohafaa diladaar kaa nazaraanaa bhejaa kisii threedots  kabhiikabhii duurii bhii zaruurii hai premiyon men pyaar badhaane ke vaaste are hote hii hain uuncheniiche tedhemede jaaneanajaane dekho pyaar ke raaste na ghabaraanaa tal gayaa samaan intazaar kaa nazaraanaa bhejaa kisii threedots

Title: chhalchhal bahatii  maajhii naiyaa dhuundhe kinaaraa
Lyrics: ko 	chhalchhal bahatii jiivan dhaaraa 2  maajhii naiyaa dhuundhe kinaaraa o maajhii naiyaa dhuundhe kinaaraa kisii na kisii kii khoj men hai ye jag saaraa maajhii naiyaa threedots kabhii na kabhii to samajhoge tum ye ishaaraa maajhii naiyaa threedots  aisii koii mauj nahiin jisako koii khoj nahiin koii na koii to har kisii ko lagataa hai pyaaraa maajhii naiyaa threedots  jiivan path par chalate hue ik din thak kar chalate hue kahiin na kahiin to thaam luungaa aanchal tumhaaraa maajhii naiyaa threedots  jaise siitaaraam mile jaise raadhaashyaam mile kabhii na kabhii to milan hogaa tumase hamaaraa maajhii naiyaa threedots

Title: jaane kyaa sochakar nahiin gujaraa
Lyrics: jaane kyaa sochakar nahiin guzaraa ik pal raat bhar nahiin guzaraa   2  apanii tanahaai kaa auron se naa shikavaa karanaa  2 tum akele hi nahiin ho sabhii akele hain ye akelaa safar nahiin guzaraa jaane kyaa sochakar nahiin guzaraa ik pal raat bhar nahiin guzaraa  do ghadii jiine kii mohalat to milii hai sabako  2 tum bhii mil jaao ghadii bhar to ye gam hotaa hai is ghadii ka safar nahiin guzaraa jaane kyaa sochakar nahiin guzaraa ik pal raat bhar nahiin guzaraa

Lyrics: ra0 o merii jaan mainne kahaa o merii jaan tuune sunaa 2 dil ne dil se kyaa kahaa  asha o merii jaan mainne kahaa o merii jaan tuune sunaa 2 dil ne dil se kyaa kahaa  asha baaton baaton men karatii huun main kamaal bas jaatii huun main dil men ban ke kayaal aankhon aankhon men detii huun main jawaab aankhon aankhon men karatii huun main sawaal  ra0 o merii jaan mainne kahaa o merii jaan tuune sunaa asha o merii jaan mainne kahaa o merii jaan tuune sunaa dil ne dil se kyaa kahaa  asha main bhii thodii sii rahatii huun beqaraar tuu bhii thodaa saa lagataa hai beqaraar terii merii to haalat hai ek sii kyon naa aapas men ham donon kar len pyaar  ra0 o merii jaan mainne kahaa o merii jaan tuune sunaa asha o merii jaan mainne kahaa o merii jaan tuune sunaa dil ne dil se kyaa kahaa  asha dilakash baaten hasiin mahafil dil jawaan aisii raaten jawaanii men phir kahaan mere honthon pe afasaanaa pyaar kaa tere lab pe muhabbat kii daastaan  ra0 o merii jaan mainne kahaa o merii jaan tuune sunaa 2 are dil ne dil se kyaa kahaa asha o merii jaan tuune kahaa o merii jaan mainne sunaa

Title: chalo bhuul jaayen jahaan ko
Lyrics: chalo bhuul jaayen jahaan ko yahaan do ghadii biite hue pal nahiin lautate phir kabhii aa haathon pe likh de meraa naam honthon se tuu wahiin merii manzil jahaan le chale aaj tuu chalo bhuul jaayen jahaan ko yahaan do ghadii biite hue pal nahiin lautate phir kabhii haathon pe likh de meraa naam honthon se tuu wahiin merii manzil jahaan le chale aaj tuu  tujhe maang len ham iraaden karen puure sabhii aaj waade karen dil ko yaqiin mere aataa nahiin  bharam mere dil se ye jaataa nahiin  2 chalo bhuul jaayen jahaan ko yahaan do ghadii biite hue pal nahiin lautate phir kabhii aa haathon pe likh de meraa naam honthon se tuu wahiin merii manzil jahaan le chale aaj tuu  laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa ho o o o o o o o o o  koii bhuul ho maaf karanaa sanam kabhii na dhaaoge ham pe sitam jahaan kii dagar pe hameshaa chalen  kushii ho yaa gam saath har dam rahen  2 chalo bhuul jaayen jahaan ko yahaan do ghadii biite hue pal nahiin lautate phir kabhii haathon pe likh de meraa naam honthon se tuu wahiin merii manzil jahaan le chale aaj tuu  chalo duur kohare men kho jaayen ham alag is zamaane se ho jaayen ham kal ham jahaan men rahenge nahiin  nishaan ye hamaare rahenge yahiin  2 chalo bhuul jaayen jahaan ko yahaan do ghadii biite hue pal nahiin lautate phir kabhii aa haathon pe likh de meraa naam honthon se tuu wahiin merii manzil jahaan le chale aaj tuu   laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa  4

Title: ha ha ha  rang le aaenge ruup le aaenge
Lyrics: ha ha ha rang le aaenge ruup le aaenge 2 kaagaz ke phuul phuul are phuul kushbuu kahaan se laaenge  main kyaa zamaanaa kahataa hai saaraa patthar nahiin ban sakataa sitaaraa baithe hain kaise maasuum banake jinakii taraf hai apanaa ishaaraa bhed ko chhupaaenge kaagaz ke phuul threedots  dil kitanaa kush hai aapase mil ke aankhen jhukii jaatii hain sharam se sunate hain koii jalataa hai hamase kitanaa mazaa aaegaa qasam se jhuumenge gaaenge logon ko jalaaenge kaagaz ke phuul threedots  dekhe nazar ne kuchh log aise nikale jo kaagaz ke phuulon ke jaise sapane kabhii tuut jaate hain jaise unako bhulaa denaa dil se tum aise vo bhuul jaaenge yaad nahiin aaenge kaagaz ke phuul threedots

Title: gorii gorii gaanv kii gorii re
Lyrics: kishor gorii gorii gaanv kii gorii re         kis liye bun rahii dorii re lataa  o piyaa dorii se baandh le gorii re         bhaage jo karike tuu chorii re         ai jiyaa kishor gorii gorii gaanv kii gorii re          kachche hain tere ye resham ke dhaage         tuut jaaye jo koii todake bhaage lataa  jab se saiyyaa tose nehaa laage         piichhe piichhe main huun tuu aage aage         khinche chale aaoge jaaoge jahaan         jaake dekho to barajorii re         o piyaa kishor gorii gorii gaanv kii gorii re          main to ud jaauungaa ik panchhii jaise         mujhe tuu bandii banaa legii kaise lataa  tujhe main bandii banaa luungii kaise         saiyyan bainyaa men bainyaa daal ke aise         tore honthon se lag jaauungii main         banake baansuriyaa torii re         o piyaa kishor gorii gorii gaanv kii gorii re          main huun paradesii         main huun paradesii sunale phir naa kahanaa         chalaa jaanaa hai yahaan nahiin rahanaa lataa  teraa rastaa dekhenge mere nainaa         yuun hii din biitegaa biitegii rainaa         chahe chhup jaa tuu ghataaon men chandaa         dhuundh legii ye chakorii re         o piyaa kishor gorii gorii gaanv kii gorii re         kis liye bun rahii dorii re lataa  o piyaa dorii se baandh le gorii re         bhaage jo karike tuu chorii re         ai jiyaa

Title: dil se dil milane kaa koii kaaran hogaa
Lyrics: dil se dil milane kaa koii kaaran hogaa binaa kaaran koii baat nahiin hotii dil se dil milane kaa koii kaaran hogaa binaa kaaran koii baat nahiin hotii  waise to ham donon ek duuje se hain abhii anajaane koii agar dekhe to kahe barason ke hain miit puraane kuchh hai tum men ham men waranaa is mausam men phuulon kii aisii baaraat nahiin hotii  dil se dil milane kaa koii kaaran hogaa binaa kaaran koii baat nahiin hotii  jaane kahaan se aae ho tum ham aae kahaan se jaane tumako kabar naa hamako pataa dil kaise mile diiwaane shaayad ham donon kaa haan ek hii rastaa hogaa waranaa hamaarii mulaaqaat nahiin hotii  dil se dil milane kaa koii kaaran hogaa binaa kaaran koii baat nahiin hotii dil se dil milane kaa koii kaaran hogaa binaa kaaran koii baat nahiin hotii

Title: tumhaaraa pyaar chaahiye mujhe jiine ke liye
Lyrics: pyaar chaahiye mujhe jiine ke liye mujh ko har ghadii diidaar chaahiye tumhaaraa pyaar chaahiye mujhe jiine ke liye  mere sivaa tum aur kisii ko dil men na aane dogii phuulon kii to baat hii kyaa hai kaanton ke saath chalogii tumhaaraa pyaar chaahiye mujhe jiine ke liye din raat vafaa kaa iqaraar chaahiye tumhaaraa pyaar chaahiye mujhe jiine ke liye  ruup rang pe marataa aayaa sadiyon se yah zamaanaa main man kii sundarataa dekhuun pyaar kaa main diivaanaa tumhaaraa pyaar chaahiye mujhe jiine ke liye tuufaan men baahon kii patavaar chaahiye tumhaaraa pyaar chaahiye mujhe jiine ke liye

Title: baahon men chale aao hamase sanam kyaa paradaa
Lyrics: baahon men chale aao ho hamase sanam kyaa paradaa 2 sh sh sh sh sh sh baahon men chale aaothreedots  chale hii jaanaa hai nazar churaake yuun  phir thaamii thii saajan tumane merii kalaaii kyon 2 kisii ko apanaa banaa ke chhod de aisaa koii nahiin karataa sh sh sh sh sh sh baahon men chale aaothreedots  kabhii kabhii kuchh to kaho piyaa hamase  e kamsekam aaj to khulake milo zaraa hamase 2 hai raat apanii jo tum ho apane kisii kaa phir hamen dar kyaa sh sh sh sh sh sh baahon men chale aaothreedots

Title: chandaa maamaa bole  tuu so jaa re
Lyrics: chandaa maamaa bole taare bhii bole nazaare bhii bole tuu so jaa re  3  nahiin soye re kaahe roye re o munnaa chandaa maamaa bole taare bhii bole ham saare bole tuu so jaa re tuu so jaa re  are dekhe kaahe julmii choriichorii tere liye gaatii huun main lorii haay phans gaii merii jaan kahaan ye aake pad gaii kaisii haay gale men dorii dil ghabaraaye kaahe tadapaaye o munnaa  chandaa maamaa bole taare bhii bole nazaare bhii bole tuu so jaa re haan tuu so jaa re  main to jaagii huun diwaanii ho ke kyuun phir sabakii niind udhaaye ro ke din bhar to chupachaap rahaa tuu pyaare kuub nikaale ab rone ke mauke merii taubaa re kyaa hogaa re o munnaa  chandaa maamaa bole taare bhii bole nazaare bhii bole tuu so jaa re chandaa maamaa bole taare bhii bole ham saare bole tuu so jaa re haan tuu so jaa re 2

Title: ye raakhii bandhan hai aisaa
Lyrics: ye raakhii bandhan hai aisaa 3  jaise chandaa aur kiran kaa  jaisaa badarii aur pavan kaa  jaise dharatii aur gagan kaa 	2 ye raakhii bandhan hai aisaa 3  duniyaa kii jitanii bahanen hain un sabakii shraddhaa hai isamen hai dharam karam bhaiyaa kaa ye bahanaa kii rakshaa isamen hai jaise subhadraa aur kishan kaa jaise badarii aur pavan kaa jaise dharatii aur gagan kaa ye raakhii bandhan threedots  m aaj khushii ke din bhaaii ke    bharbhar aae nainaa 2    kadar bahan kii unase puuchho    jinakii nahiin hai bahanaa    mol nahiin koii is bandhan kaa    jaise badarii aur pavan kaa    jaise dharatii aur gagan kaa  ye raakhii bandhan hai aisaa 3

Title: dhiire se jaanaa khatiyan men o khatamal
Lyrics: dhiire se jaanaa khatiyan men o khatamal  dhiire se jaanaa khatiyan men  soii hai raajakumaarii dekh rahi miithe sapane  jaa jaa chhup jaa takiyan men o khatamal  dhiire se jaanaa khatiyan men   haai haai re kismat threedots   mile mushkil se ye mehamaan  ho bhi jaate shaayad meharabaan  mile mushkil se ye mehamaan  ho bhi jaate shaayad meharabaan  aag lagaa dii hai sukhan men o khatamal  dhiire se jaanaa khatiyan men   komal hai inakaa badan  kante si teri chubhan  komal komal hai inakaa badan  kante si teri chubhan  badhaa daale nindiyan men o khatamal  dhiire se jaanaa khatiyan men   khabar khabaradaar hum threedots chhuup chhup ke   kyon pyaar kare tu  badaa chhuupaa hua rustam hai tu  kyon chhup chhup ke pyaar kare tu  badaa chhupaa hua rustam hai tu  le le hamako bhi sharan men o khatamal  dhiire se jaanaa khatiyan men   dhiire se jaanaa  dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men o bhanvaraa  dhiire se jaanaa bagiyan men

Title: tum mujh se ruuthe ho chalo maanaa
Lyrics: tum mujh se ruuthe ho chalo maanaa bas yuun hii ek baar ho sake to mudake dekho naa  thii jo kabhii apane saajan kii alabelii kaise bharii duniyaa men khadii hai wo akelii yuun hii aate jaate kabhii tum bhii zaraa puuchho naa  aage kabhii aisii na thiin bekal merii aankhen jab se tumhen dekhaa huiin paagal merii aankhen dekhe gaye tum ko tum bhii dekho naa

Title: naach merii bulabul ki paisaa milegaa
Lyrics: naach merii bulabul ki paisaa milegaa kahaan kadaradaan hamen aisaa milegaa naach merii bulabul threedots ghungharuu banaa ke pairon men baandh le phir meharabaan hamen aisaa milegaa naach merii bulabul threedots  kitanaa pyaasaa hai ye paise vaalaa isako pilaa de tuu mastii kaa pyaalaa kahaan anajaan hamen  aisaa milegaa  3 naach merii bulabul threedots  apanii tamannaa hai kitanii chhotii do haath kapadaa do vaqt rotii kahaan pe makaan hamen  aisaa milegaa  3 naach merii bulabul threedots

Title: tere sau diivaane jhuuthe paravaane
Lyrics: tere sau diivaane jhuuthe paravaane 2 ho ik teraa sachchaa aashiq huun main maane yaa tuu naa maane  tere sau diivaane threedots  chhod jaaenge dil tod jaaenge ye beqadar yaar mushkil men 2 itanaa kar yaqiin kho na jaaen kahiin raste hain anjaane maane yaa tuu naa maane  tere sau diivaane threedots  aaj hai yahaan kal aur kahiin haan inakii kuchh aisii hii aadat hai 2 dil masal denge ye pii ke chal denge ye aankhon ke paimaane maane yaa tuu naa maane  tere sau diivaane threedots

Title: achchhii nahiin sanam dillagii dilebeqaraar se
Lyrics: ki achchhii nahiin sanam dillagii dilebeqaraar se aa kyon ro rahe ho chhedaa thaa hamane tumako to pyaar se ki khel hii khel men jaaegii ek jaan aa kyon ro rahe ho chhedaa thaa hamane tumako to pyaar se ki achchhii nahiin sanam dillagii dilebeqaraar se aa pyaar ke khel men kaisaa dil kyaa jaan ki achchhii nahiin sanam dillagii dilebeqaraar se  ki kahate ho tum to yuun hii sahii ki ai mere hasiin aa aa haahaahaathreedots ki saarii kataa javaanii kii hai qusuur aapakaa nahiin     kar jaate ho sharaarat jab milate ho pyaar se aa kyon ro rahe ho chhedaa thaa hamane tumako to pyaar se ki achchhii nahiin sanam dillagii dilebeqaraar se   aa chheduun agar to shikavaa karo na chheduun to gilaa     lagataa hai yuun ki tum aaj se diivaane hue piiyaa     hone lage zaraa men jo beiktiyaar se ki achchhii nahiin sanam dillagii dilebeqaraar se aa kyon ro rahe ho chhedaa thaa hamane tumako to pyaar se

Title: chhotii sii ek kalii khilii thii
Lyrics: chhotii sii ek kalii khilii thii ek din baag men jyot jalii thii chiraag men phir kyaa huaa koii jaane naa jaane naa  use maalii ne bade pyaar se paalaa masta pavan ke jhuule men daalaa 2 aage kahuun kaha na sakuun chup rahuun raha na sakuun phir kyaa huaa koii jaane naa jaane naa  aayaa baag men ek phuul waalaa jaane usane kyaa jaaduu daalaa 2 phuul waale kii jholii men tuut ke gir padii kalii phir kyaa huaa koii jaane naa jaane naa  baag chhod ke kahataa thaa koii maalii kii yaad men kalii badaa roii kachchaa dhaagaa tuut gayaa phuul waalaa ruuth gayaa phir kyaa huaa koii jaane naa koii jaane naa

Lyrics: ye jab se huii jiyaa kii chorii patang saa ude ye man jo hai tere haathon men dorii2 ye jab se huii  padii jo mere tan pe ye suune jiivan pe salone terii dhuup nikhar gaii main to sanvar gayaa dekho ye meraa ruup2 kahe mose darapan ho gaii tuu naii ye jab se huii jiyaa kii chorii patang saa ude ye man jo hai tere haathon men dorii  kyaa jaaduu kiyaa tainne baandha jo tujhe mainne ye aanchal se jhuume re man meraa likhaa hai naam teraa jo kaajal se2 jidhar ab main dekhuun bas dikhe tuuhii tuuhii ye jab se huii jiyaa kii chorii patang saa ude ye man jo hai tere haathon men dorii ye jab se huii jiyaa kii chorii

Lyrics: jab se sarakaar ne nashaabandii tod dii maano yaa naa maano hamane piinii chhod dii  chhupchhup ke piine kaa mazaa kuchh aur thaa vo bhii kyaa din the black men mangaate the maikaane khul gae saare maze dhul gae rok bhii tod dii botal bhii phod dii jab se sarakaar threedots   siitii bhii bajaatii thii gaanaa bhii sunaatii thii   munne kii maataa jii ek paigaam laatii hain saamane vo baap ke sausau dukhade sunaatii hain jiinaa haraam huaa piinaa haraam huaa chadhate nashe kii taang biivii ne tod dii maano yaa naa maano threedots

Title: kisii se dostii kar lo
Lyrics: kishor he he huun huun huun huun he he kisii se dostii kar lo karoge pyaar tum ham se kisii se dillagii kar lo karoge pyaar tum ham se  aashaa kaun mahafil men aavaaraa aa gayaa doston men dushman hamaaraa aa gayaa  kishor ab kyaa karen ham apanii taariif thode se badamaash hain ham thode se shariif  aashaa haan is liye  kishor kis liye  aashaa is liye  kishor kis liye kafaa kafaa kyon lagate ho sarakaar tum ham se  aashaa aaaa na ham se dushmanii kar lo bacho sarakaar tum ham se  kishor kisii se dostii kar lo karoge pyaar tum ham se  aashaa aap kaa hii kyaa diiwaanaa naam hai are mujhako nahiin pasand ye puraanaa naam hai  kishor bhaii naam na dekho tum dekho kaam ko furasat ho to kal akele milanaa shaam ko  aashaa ha ha  kyaa kahaa  kishor kyaa huaa  aashaa kyaa kahaa  kishor kyaa huaa  aashaa ulajh gaye ho kyon aakir bekaar tum ham se  kishor huun kisii se dostii kar lo karoge pyaar tum ham se  aashaa aaaa na ham se dushmanii kar lo bacho sarakaar tum ham se  kishor karoge pyaar tum ham se  aashaa bacho sarakaar tum ham se  kishor karoge pyaar tum ham se

Title: baagon men kaise ye phuul khilate hain

Title: sun bhaii baaraatii  are duulhaadulhan ko akelaa
Lyrics: sun bhaii baaraatii 2 are duulhaadulhan ko akelaa zaraa chhodo pyaar bharii baaten karen jiivansaathii sun bhaii baaraatii threedots  haan badii mushkil se dil milate hain aramaanon ke gul khilate hain jiivan men bas ek baar saajansajanii ko akelaa zaraa chhodo mil ke gale laharaaen diipakbaatii sun bhaii baaraatii threedots  haan uupar se ham rangiile hain andar se ham sharmiile hain dekho na hamen is tarah  ko akelaa zaraa chhodo raat milan kii hai ek baar aatii sun bhaii baaraatii threedots

Title: sabhii sukh duur se guzaren guzarate hii chale jaaen
Lyrics: sabhii sukh duur se guzaren guzarate hii chale jaaen magar piidaa umar bhar saath chalane ko utaaruu hai sabhii dukh duur se guzare threedots  hamaaraa dhuup men ghar chhaanv kii kyaa baat jaanen ham abhii tak to akele hii chale kyaa saath jaanen ham bataa den kyaa ghutan kii ghaatiyaan kaisii lagiin hamako sadaa nangaa rahaa aakaash kyaa barasaat jaanen ham bahaaren duur se guzaren guzaratii hii chalii jaaen magar patajhad umar bhar saath chalane ko utaaruu hai sabhii dukh duur se guzare threedots  ataarii ko dharaa se kis tarah aavaaz de den ham menhadiyaa paanv ko kyon duur kaa andaaz de den ham chale shamashaan kii deharii vahii hai saath kii sangyaa baraf ke ek but ko aasthaa kii aanch kyon den ham hamen apane sabhii bisaren bisarate hii chale jaaen magar sudhiyaan umar bhar saath chalane ko utaaruu hai sabhii dukh duur se guzare threedots  sukhon kii aankh se to baanchanaa aataa nahiin hamako sukhon kii saakh se to aankanaa aataa nahiin hamako chalen chalate rahen umar bhar ham piir kii raahen sukhon kii laaj se dhaanpanaa aataa nahiin hamako nihore duur se guzaren guzarate hii chale jaaen magar anaban umar bhar saath chalane ko utaaruu hai sabhii dukh duur se guzare threedots

Lyrics: siimaa siimaa siimaa sahane kii bhii hai koii siimaa siimaa pe sipaahii baithaa hai zaraa bol dhiimaa dhiimaa  1 kuchh log yahaan par lete hain kaanon kaa nazar se kaam naadaan tuu diivaanon kii tarah kyun letaa hai meraa naam siimaa o siimaa o siimaa dhiiraj kii bhii hai koi siimaa behatar hai ki ham tum karavaa len ab chal kar apanaa biimaa siimaa threedots  2 tum sar se lekar paanv talak lagatii ho mujhe  raat  anjaan pe bhii zaraa rakhanaa nazar phir karanaa koi aaghaat siimaa siimaa siimaa chup rahane kii hai koi siimaa koi bhed agar khul jaae kahiin to ban jaaegaa kiimaa siimaa threedots

Title: merii chaahat rahegii hameshaa javaan
Lyrics: merii chaahat rahegii hameshaa javaan jism dhalane se jazbaat dhalate nahiin maut aane se bhii pyaar marataa nahiin dam nikalane se aramaan nikalate nahiin merii chaahat rahegii threedots   laakh tuufaan hon ham naa ghabaraaenge tuu na aaegii milane to ham aaenge  2  jaan par khelane se jhijhakate hain jo vo muhabbat kii raahon pe chalate nahiin  2 merii chaahat rahegii threedots  tuu mile naa mile par salaamat rahe duur hii kii sahii tujhase nisbat rahe zindagii bhar terii mujhako hasarat rahe hasaraton ke binaa kvaab palate nahiin merii chaahat rahegii threedots

Title: jhuk gaiin aankhen terii raahon pe
Lyrics: jhuk gaiin aankhen terii raahon pe ruk gaiin saansen tere honthon pe phir bhii naa jaanaa piyaa anjaanaa mere dil kii baaten ho o jhuk gaiin aankhen terii raahon pe ruk gaiin saansen tere honthon pe   thodaa saa bholaa bhaalaa honaa achchhaa hotaa hai aisaa kyaa jaage hue bhii tuu jaise sotaa hai   2 din tere beete aise jaise raaten ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu jhuk gaiin aankhen terii raahon pe ruk gaiin saansen tere honthon pe   mushkil se din men mujhe do pal detaa hai jab bhii dil aataa hai piyaa tuu chal detaa hai   2 ye kitanii thodii hain mulaaqaaten ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu jhuk gaiin aankhen terii raahon pe ruk gaiin saansen tere honthon pe   aisaa to diiwaanaa main nahiin jaisaa lagataa huun samajho to baaten matalab kii main samajhataa huun  2 rahane do jaane do ye ghaaten ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu jhuk gaiin aankhen terii raahon pe ruk gaiin saansen tere honthon pe phir bhii jaanii prem diiwaanii mere dil kii baaten  ho o jhuk gaiin aankhen terii raahon pe ruk gaiin saansen tere honthon pe

Lyrics: naa koii dil men samaayaa naa koii pahaluu men aayaa jaa ke bhii paas rahiin tum hii aur jaanejaan jaaneman jaanatii ho naa koii dil men threedots  kyon tumane daaman churaayaa tum jaanon main kyaa bataauun mujhamen hii kuchh aib hogaa kyon tum pe tohamat lagaauun main to yahiin kahuungaa puuchhogii jab bhii jaa ke bhii paas threedots  tum jo mujhe de gaii ho ik kuubasuurat nishaanii lipataa ke siine se usako kat jaaegii zindagaanii main to yahiin kahuungaa puuchhogii jab bhii jaa ke bhii paas threedots

Lyrics: aa 	ik tum paas na aanaa duurduur hii rahanaa 	mohe dar laage jaage nainaa saarii rainaa mu 	ik tum duur na jaanaa paas hii rahanaa 	tore sang laage mere nainaa naahiin chainaa  aa 	piyaa mat chhedo prem kii batiyaan 	laaj se jhuk jaaengii merii ankhiyaan mu 	din hain suhaane dil hain diivaane chhodo bahaane 	torii ankhiyon men to haan hai honthon pe hai naa aa 	ik tum paas na threedots  mu 	kuchh to kaho kaahe khoiikhoii ho 	jaagii ho ki soii huii ho aa 	dil kii ye dhadakan kahatii hai saajan main tore kaaran 	aise tadapuun re jaise pinjare men mainaa mu 	ik tum duur na threedots  aa 	kho gae tum kahiin aur hii jaise 	dekh rahe ho kaahe tum mujhe aise mu 	ye matavaalii chaal tihaarii kitanii hai pyaarii 	siikhaa nadiyon kii maujon ne tumase hii bahanaa aa 	ik tum paas na threedots mu 	ik tum duur na threedots aa 	mohe dar laage threedots mu 	tore sang laage threedots

Lyrics: ye silasilaa pyaar se chalaa 2 o chalate chalate meraa teraa sangam huaa un un  ye silasilaa threedots  ye main naa jaanuun hai pasand tujhe kitanaa siine men terii dil rakh diyaa apanaa  2 terii nazar se bandhaa hai meraa sapanaa aa jaa mere pyaar aajaa re aajaa re  aajaa aajaa aajaa un un  ye silasilaa threedots   aa terii baanhon pe giraa duun main ye zulfen aa tere siine pe jhukaa duun lambii palaken  2 dil donon ras ke katorii jaise chhalaken aa jaa mere pyaar aajaa re aajaa re  aajaa aajaa aajaa un un ye silasilaa threedots

Lyrics: bas yahii aparaadh main har baar karataa huun aadamii huun aadamii se pyaar karataa huun  ek khilaunaa ban gayaa duniyaa ke mele men koii khele bhiid men koii akele men muskuraa kar bhent har sviikaar karataa huun aadamii huun aadamii se pyaar karataa huun   threedots  main basaanaa chaahataa huun svarg dharatii par aadamii jis men rahe bas aadamii banakar us nagar kii har galii taiyyaar karataa huun aadamii huun aadamii se pyaar karataa huun   threedots  huun bahut naadaan karataa huun ye naadaanii bech kar khushiyaan khariiduun aankh kaa paanii haath khaalii hain magar vyaapaar karataa huun aadamii huun aadamii se pyaar karataa huun   threedots

Title: o merii mahabuubaa  tujhe jaanaa hai to jaa
Lyrics: o merii  mahabuubaa  3 tujhe jaanaa hai to jaa terii marzii meraa kyaa par dekh tuu jo ruuth kar chalii jaaegii tere saath hii mere marane kii kabar aaegii  2  jo bhii ho merii is premkahaanii kaa 2 par kyaa hogaa terii mast javaanii kaa aashiq huun main tere dil men rahataa huun apanii nahiin main tere dil kii kahataa huun taubaataubaa phir kyaa hogaa ki baad men tuu ik roz pachhataaegii ye rut pyaar kii judaaii men hii guzar jaaegii o merii mahabuubaa threedots  terii chaahat meraa chain churaaegii 2 lekin tujhako bhii to niind naa aaegii main to mar jaauungaa lekar naam teraa naam magar kar jaauungaa badanaam teraa taubaataubaa phir kyaa hogaa ki yaad merii dil teraa tadapaaegii mere jaate hii tere aane kii kabar aaegii o merii mahabuubaa threedots  diivaanaa mastaanaa mausam aayaa hai 2 aise men tuune dil ko tarasaayaa hai maanaa apanii jagah pe tuu bhii qaatil hai par yaaron se teraa bachanaa mushkil hai taubaataubaa phir kyaa hogaa phir pyaar men nazar jab takaraaegii tadapatii huii merii jaan tuu nazar aaegii o merii mahabuubaa threedots

Title: champaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar
Lyrics: milan ritu aaii sajaniyaa  chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar milan ritu aaii sajaniyaa  2 ho ho o o chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar milan ritu aaii sajaniyaa bagiyan men koyaliyaa puuchhe hamase kab aihen tohare dil kii jamiyaa chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar milan ritu aaii sajaniyaa ho ho o o chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar  na jaane kaun din aayegii tuu na jaane kab hamaar biitenge din intazaar ke jab jaaye mere aage se koii gorii kiye singaar rah jaauun main to nihaarake ankhiyon men chamak jaaye bindiyaa torii dhadakan men baaje re paijaniyaa chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar milan ritu aaii sajaniyaa ho ho o o chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar  jis dam chale basantii hawaa to ho jaauun beqaraar lekar main bainyaan khulii khulii phulawaa kii daar aisii lage ki dulhan banii hamaar o dole tuu jaise merii galii aajaa re kahaan tak sapanaa dekhuun biitii jaaye apanii to jawaniyaa chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar milan ritu aaii sajaniyaa bagiyan men koyaliyaa puuchhe hamase kab aihen tohare dil kii jamiyaa chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar milan ritu aaii sajaniyaa ho ho o o chanpaa khilii daar palak jhule pyaar

Title: priye praanesh
Lyrics: priye praaneshvarii hridayeshvari yadi aap hamen aadesh karen to  prem ka ham shrii ganesh karen   ye chakshu tere chanchal chanchal  ye kuntal bhi shyaamal shyaamal  ye adhar dhare jivan jvaalaa  ye ruup chandr shiital shiital o kaaminii o kaaminii prem visheshh karen yadi threedots  ho sanchit punyon kii aashaa sun vyathit hriday kii mridu bhaashaa sarvasv samarpan kar den ham karo puurn hamaarii abhiilaashaa gaj gaaminii  gaj gaaminii duur klesh karen yadi threedots  ham bhramar nahiin is yauvan ke  ham yaachak hain man upavan ke ham bhaav pushhp karate arpan  saakaar karo sapane man ke  man mohinii man mohinii man men pravesh karen yadi threedots

Title: kahiin duur jab din dhal jaaye
Lyrics: kahiin duur jab din dhal jaae  saanjh kii dulhan badan churaae  chupake se aae mere kayaalon ke aangan men  koii sapanon ke diip jalaae diip jalaae kahiin duur threedots  kabhii yuunhiin jab huiin bojhal saansen  bhar aaii baithe baithe jab yuun hii aankhen  tabhii machal ke pyaar se chal ke chhue koii mujhe par nazar na aae nazar na aae kahiin duur threedots  kahiin to ye dil kabhii mil nahiin paate kahiin se nikal aae janamon ke naate ghanii thii ulajhan bairii apanaa man apanaa hii hoke sahe dard paraaye dard paraaye kahiin duur threedots  dil jaane mere saare bhed ye gahare kho gae kaise mere sapane sunahare ye mere sapane yahii to hain apane mujhase judaa na honge inake ye saaye inake ye saaye kahiin duur threedots

Title: tum itane din baad mile
Lyrics: ho o o o  tum itane din baad mile tum itane din kahaan rahe jaanake jo anajaan bane koii husn kyaa kahe tumane jaanaa nahiin hamen pahachaanaa nahiin laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa 2  bade afasos kii hai baat tumane to milaayaa bhii nahiin haath  bade afasos kii hai baat tumane to milaayaa nahiin haath  2 baithe ho aankh churaake dekho to aankh milaake hamako hai kyaa shikaayat ho puuchho to paas bulaake puuchh bhii lo naa are tumane jaanaa nahiin hamen pahachaanaa nahiin laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa  tum itane din baad mile tum itane din kahaan rahe jaanake jo anjaan bane koii husn kyaa kahe are tumane hai jaanaa nahiin hamen pahachaanaa nahiin laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa  koii nahiin thaa wo tum hii the koii nahiin thaa wo ham hii the he he koii nahiin thaa wo tum the koii nahiin thaa wo ham the ham tum men dostii thii siine men aag uthii thii jaane wo dillagii thii yaa dil kii lagii thii tumane hai jaanaa nahiin hamen pahachaanaa nahiin laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa  tum itane din baad mile tum itane din kahaan rahe jaanake jo anjaan bane koii husn kyaa kahe are tumane jaanaa nahiin hamen pahachaanaa nahiin laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa

Title: acharaa men phulavaa laii ke
Film: dulhan wahi jo piya man bhaye
Lyrics: acharaa men phulavaa laii ke aaye re ham tohare dvaar are ho hamarii arajii na sun le arajii pe kar le naa bichaar hamase ruuth le bidhaataa hamaar kaahe ruuth le bidhaataa hamaar  bade hii jatan se ham ne puujaa kaa thaal sajaayaa priit kii baatii jodii manavaa kaa diyaraa jalaayaa hamare man mohan ko par nahiin bhaayaa are ho rah gaii puujaa adhuurii mandir se diyaa re nikaal hamase ruuth le bidhaataa hamaar threedots  sone kii kalam se hamarii qisamat likhii jo hotii mol lagaa ke lete ham bhii man chaahaa motii ek prem diivaanii haay aise to na rotii are ho itanaa duhkh to na hotaa paanii men jo dete hamen daar hamase ruuth le bidhaataa hamaar threedots

Title: tum mahakatii javaan chaandanii ho
Lyrics: tum mahakatii javaan chaandanii ho chalatii phiratii koii roshanii ho rang bhii ruup bhii raaginii bhii jo bhii sochuun tumhen tum vahii ho tum mahakatii javaan threedots  narm aanchal se chhanatii ye kushbuu mere har kvaab par chhaa gaii hai jab bhii tum par nigaahen padii hain dil men ek pyaas laharaa gaii hai tum to sachamuch chhalakatii nadii ho chalatii phiratii koii threedots  jab se dekhaa hai chaahaa hai tumako ye fasaanaa chalaa hai vahiin se kab talaq dil bhatakataa rahegaa maang luun aaj tumako tumhiin se ki tum to khud pyaar ho zindagii ho chalatii phiratii koii threedots

Title: haay re haay niind nahiin aae chain nahiin aae
Lyrics: la 	haay re haay niind nahiin aae chain nahiin aae dil men tuu samaae 	aayaa pyaar bharaa mausam diivaanaa diivaanaa 	haay re haay threedots  	koii dekh le agar ra 	tuu gam na kar la 	mujhe to lag rahaa hai dar ra 	tuu gam na kar 	ritu sunaa rahii hai priit kii kahaaniyaan 	haay re haay mast ghataa chhaae pyaas naa bujhaae aag sii lagaae 	aayaa pyaar bharaa threedots  	dil ne dil se kyaa kahaa la 	kyaa pataa ra 	zaraa saa mere paas aa la 	kyon bhalaa ra 	aa tujhe main de duun prem kii nishaaniyaan la 	haay re haay jaan ghabaraae aankh jhukii jaae saans rukii jaae 	aayaa pyaar bharaa threedots  la 	chhedatii hai ye havaa ra 	kyaa huaa la 	jagaa hai dil men dard saa ra 	kyon bhalaa la 	rang laa rahii hain pyaar kii javaaniyaan ra 	zulf kii chhaanv haay hosh udaa jaae paanv dagamagaae 	ho aayaa pyaar bharaa threedots

Title: ek kabar aaii suno
Lyrics: ek kabar aaii suno ek kabar aaii hone vaalii hai gangaaraam kii sagaaii ek kabar aaii threedots  mukh goraagoraa ankhiyaan gulaabii kaisii hogii aisii hogii bhaiyaa merii bhaabhii naachuungii main aise gaauungii main aise naachuungii main gaauungii aur baajegii shahanaaii ek kabar aaii threedots  ho na jaanaa aisii biivii kaa diivaanaa nae naate na tuute naataa yah puraanaa hamen na bhulaanaa yuunhii aanaajaanaa de na jaanaa hamen kahiin lambii judaaii ek kabar aaii threedots  jaldii se sunaao shaadii kaa natiijaa mere suune ghar men khele meraa bhatiijaa gussaa badaa aaegaa munnaa jaag jaaegaa roegaa na soegaa vo maangegaa mithaaii ek kabar aaii threedots

Title: na ruutho merii jaan  main ruuthuungii tumase
Lyrics: ra 	na ruutho na ruutho na ruutho merii jaan 	isii bahaane aaj teriimerii ho gaii pahachaan aa 	main ruuthuungii tumase ruuthuungii main ruuthuungii tumase 	meraa dil chhiinakar bhii banate ho jaise koii anajaan ra 	na ruutho threedots aa 	main ruuthuungii threedots  ra 	tumhaare ruuthane se zindagaanii ruuth jaaegii 	na phir aisaa samaan hogaa na qismat jagamagaaegii 	zaraa sii baat kaa aakir banaatii ho kyon afasaanaa 	ye dil kaa raaz hai dil men rakho mere dilabar jaanaan 2 	na ruutho threedots aa 	main ruuthuungii threedots  	chhupaayaa raazedil mujhase mujhe tumase shiqaayat hai 	tumhen usakii kabar kyaa hai ki jo kuchh dil kii haalat hai 	tumhaarii berukii ne haay mujhako maar daalaa hai 	badii mushqil se maine ye dilenaadaan sambhaalaa hai 2 ra 	na ruutho threedots aa 	main ruuthuungii threedots  ra 	chalo achchhaa huaa ulajhan dilon kii rang le aaii 	kushii aankhon men chamakii hai hansii honthon pe laharaaii aa 	ladaaii aisii achchhii hai ki jisamen pyaar ho jaae 	umar bhar saath rahane kaa abhii ikaraar ho jaae 2 ra 	na ruutho threedots aa 	main ruuthuungii threedots

Title: haay re na maaro
Lyrics: haay re na maaro haay re na maaro bebas huun main bebas kii laaj se haay khelanaa achchhaa nahiin zaalimaa haay re na maaro maaro na re maaro na re   threedots  thaam rahaa hai merii kalaaii par ye mujhako bataa re haan haan merii jagah terii koii bahan hotii kyaa terii paapii yahii lagan hotii       naach  haay re na maaro   threedots  qaabuu tere aauungii nahiin chaahe maar bhii daale haan haan mere piichhe andhaa kis qadar hai tuu aadamii nahiin re jaanavar hai tuu       gaa  haay re na maaro   threedots

Title: muhabbat kii kahaaniyaan
Lyrics: ta muhabbat kii kahaaniyaan sunaane lagii hain javaaniyaan 2 hamaare tumhaare pyaar pe kudaa kii rahen maharabaaniyaan la muhabbat kii kahaaniyaan sunaane lagii hain javaaniyaan hamaare tumhaare pyaar pe kudaa kii rahen maharabaaniyaan donon muhabbat kii kahaaniyaan threedots  ta ye qisse nigaaheyaar ke ye dhadakan dilebeqaraar ki 2 ye subahen tumhaarii yaad kii ye shaamen suhaanii bahaar kii tumhaarii muhabbat men sanam milii hain hamen ye nishaaniyaan la hamaare tumhaare pyaar pe kudaa kii rahen maharabaaniyaan donon muhabbat kii kahaaniyaanthreedots  ta zamaanaa na hamase chhiin le ye daulat tumhaare naam kii2 la nigaahon se dekhen ham kabhii na suurat judaaii kii shaam kii donon rahen yuun hameshaa saath ham rahen na rahen zindagaaniyaan  ta muhabbat kii kahaaniyaan la sunaane lagii hain javaaniyaan donon hamaare tumhaare pyaar pe kudaa kii rahen maharabaaniyaan

Title: pal bhar ke liye koii hamen pyaar kar le jhuuthaa hii sahii
Lyrics: pal bhar ke liye koi hamen pyaar kar le jhuuthaa hii sahii do din ke liye koi iqaraar kar le jhuuthaa hii sahii pal bhar threedots  hamane bahut tujhako chhup chhupake dekhaa     2 dil pe khiinchii hai tere kaajal kii rekhaa kaajal ki rekhaa banii lachhaman kii rekhaa ho ho ho ho kaajal kii rekhaa threedots raam men kyuun tuune raavan ko dekhaa     2 khade khidakii pe  e e e e e e khade khidakii pe jogii sviikaar kar le jhuuthaa hii sahii pal bhar threedots  hemaa  laa laa laa threedots pyaar kar le kishor jhuuthaa hii sahii dhiire se jade tere nain bade jis din se lade tere dar pe pade    2 sun sunakar terii nahiin nahiin jaan threedots apanii nikal jaaye naa kahiin zaraa haan kah de merii jaan kah de merii jaan kah de zaraa haan kah de jab rain pade nahiin chain pade nahiin chain pade jab rain pade  maanaa tuu saare hasiinon se hansiin hai     2 apanii bhii suurat burii to nahiin hai     2 kabhii tuu bhii o kabhii tuu bhii hamaaraa diidaar kar le jhuuthaa hii sahii
