Title: jahaan prem kaa paavan diyaraa jale
Film: dulhan wahi jo piya man bhaye
Lyrics: jahaan prem kaa paavan diyaraa jale jahaan bole bachan tab niir bhare usii anganaa men usii dvaare pe biite hamaraa bhii jiivan raam kare jahaan prem kaa threedots  kaun nadii kii ham hain lahar kaho aake milaa re kinaaraa jog likhe bin ham  naahii aisaa milan hamaaraa kin charanon men naa ghar na pare jahaan prem kaa threedots  jis kaa naahii apanaa koii jo kah de use apanaa le us kii karunaa us kii dayaa kaa utare na karaj utaare jiyaa jahaan hai vahii jii  mare jahaan prem kaa threedots

Title: goyaa ke chunaanche
Lyrics: ko goyaa ke chunaanche goyaa ke chunaanche 2  la ho naachen gaaen jhuumake aa goyaa ke chunaanche 2 ki kitanaa pyaaraa giit hai ye goyaa ke chunaanche 2 ko goyaa ke chunaanche threedots  la kiyaa main ne pyaar yuun to kaii baar dil kaa saudaa tujhase pahalii baar kiyaa 2 andheraa kho gayaa saveraa ho gayaa main terii ho gaii tuu meraa ho gayaa ban gaii merii zindagii bas goyaa ke chunaanche ko goyaa ke chunaanche threedots  ki lab pe teraa naam dil men terii yaad aankhon men terii tasaviir basii 2 ye dil kyuun ho gayaa diivaanaa kyaa kahuun diivaane dil kaa main fasaanaa kyaa kahuun mujhako apanaa hosh nahiin bas goyaa ke chunaanche ko goyaa ke chunaanche threedots  ma aashiq usakaa naam haath jo le thaam duniyaa chhode yaar yaarii naa tode 2 kushii ke din hon yaa gamon kii shaam ho usii kii yaad ho usii kaa naam ho sau baaton kii ek baat ye goyaa ke chunaanche  naachen gaaen jhuumake aa goyaa ke chunaanche

Title: chadhatii jawaanii merii chaal mastaanii
Lyrics: la huii   chadhatii jawaanii merii chaal mastaanii tuune kadar na jaanii raamaa  2 hoy chadhatii jawaanii merii chaal mastaanii tuune kadar na jaanii raamaa haay raamaa haay raamaa haay raamaa  ra ulajhe kaahe re main huun suurat men tujhase badhake kahiin he rii tuu hai jawaan to main bhii sajiilaa kuchh kam nahiin ho o ho ulajhe kaahe re main huun suurat men tujhase badhake kahiin he rii tuu hai jawaan to main bhii sajiilaa kuchh kam nahiin  la haay duniyaa huii re mere pyaar kii diiwaanii laakhon kii main dilajaanii raamaa  chadhatii jawaanii merii chaal mastaanii tuune kadar na jaanii raamaa  wo kaun aisii hai jisakaa hai ruup aisaa jaaduu bharaa laa re main bhii to dekhuun tuu jisakii dhun men hai baawaraa ho o ho wo kaun aisii hai jisakaa hai ruup aisaa jaaduu bharaa laa re main bhii too dekhuun tuu jisakii dhun men hai baawaraa  ra hoy usake kadam chuume terii jawaanii wo hai shahar kii raanii raamaa  la chadhatii jawaanii merii chaal mastaanii tuune kadar na jaanii raamaa haay raamaa hoy raamaa haay raamaa  ab to tohe bataanaa hogaa re kaisii chhab hai merii uff o mainne kahaa kab dikhane men tuu hai aisii burii  la ho o ho ab to tohe bataanaa hogaa re kaisii chhab hai merii  ra uff o mainne kahaa kab dikhane men tuu hai aisii burii  la dekhe jo mujhe tere pyaar kii wo raanii ho jaaye sharam se paanii raamaa  chadhatii jawaanii merii chaal mastaanii tuune kadar na jaanii raamaa ho raamaa ho raamaa ho raamaa

Title: pyaar ko chaahie kyaa ek nazar
Lyrics: pyaar ko chaahie kyaa ek nazar ek nazar 3  der se tuu mere aramaanon ke aaiine men 2 band palaken lie baithii hai mere siine men 2 ai merii jaanehayaa dekh idhar dekh idhar dekh idhar pyaar ko chaahie kyaa ek nazar ek nazar 2 beqaraaron kii davaa ek nazar ek nazar 2  chain dekar bhii jo bechain banaa detii ho 2  ho to shabanam sii magar  2 aag lagaa detii ho jab mile shor uthe haay re dil haay jigar haay jigar pyaar ko chaahie kyaa ek nazar ek nazar 2 beqaraaron kii davaa ek nazar ek nazar 2 dardamandon kii sadaa ek nazar ek nazar 2  shiqavaa baaqii na rahe duur gilaa ho jaae 2 is tarah dekh diivaane kaa bhalaa ho jaae chaahane vaalon men aa der na kar der na kar der na kar dardamandon kii sadaa ek nazar ek nazar 2 ishq maange hai duaa ek nazar ek nazar 2  kuunedil se badhe rukasaar kii laalii terii 2 merii aahon se palak aur ho kaalii terii merii haalat pe na jaa aur sanvar aur sanvar aur sanvar ishq maange hai duaa ek nazar ek nazar 2 pyaar ko chaahie threedots

Title: panthii huun main us path kaa ant nahiin jisakaa
Lyrics: panthii huun main us path kaa ant nahiin jisakaa aas merii hai jisakii dishaa  aadhaar mere man kaa  sangii saathii mere andhiyaare ujiyaare mujhako raah dikhaayen palachhin ke kuladhaare pathik mere path ke sab taare aur niilaa aakaash panthii threedots  is path par dekhe kitane sukh dukh ke mele phuul chune kabhii khushiyon ke kabhii kaaton se khele jaane kab tak chalanaa hai mujhe is jiivan ke saath panthii threedots

Title: pukaaratii hai mohabbat qariib aa jaao
Lyrics: ra 	pukaaratii hai mohabbat qariib aa jaao su 	tumhiin to ho merii jannat qariib aa jaao  ra 	jidhar nigaah uthe hans rahii ho phuulon men 	tumhiin to jhuul rahii ho kiran ke jhuulon men su 	nazar ko hosh nahiin dilanashiin nazaaron kaa 	alag vazuud nahiin tumase chaandtaaron kaa ra 	barasate husn kii qasam qariib aa jaao 	pukaaratii hai mohabbat threedots  su 	ye pyaar jisape farishton ko rashq aataa hai 	kudaa bhii hamape mohabbat se muskaraataa hai ra 	dilon kaa mel ibaadat hai kaun jaanegaa 	yahii to asl haqiiqat hai kaun maanegaa su 	hamaaraa ishq salaamat qariib aa jaao 	tumhiin to ho threedots

Title: mohabbat men ajii kyaa aap
Lyrics: mohabbat men ajii kyaa apanaa imtihaan denge nahiin ham apanii jaan denge hamen kaise yaqiin aaye wafaa men aap jaan denge chalo ham imtihaan denge  dil men jo aapake thodaa pyaar hai lekin chhupaa chhupaa kyaa aitabaar hai waadaa sanam le lo tumako qasam le lo qasam koii agar tuutii to kyaa denge bolo chup kyon ho gae ajii ham apanii jaan denge  kahanaa aasaan hai karanaa mushkil hai jiinaa aasaan hai maranaa mushkil hai karake dikhaa denge marake dikhaa denge achchha to goyaa aap duniyaa ko naii ik daastaan denge nahiin ham apanii jaan denge  chhodo sawaal ye ab tum jawaab do apane bhii pyaar ka thodaa hisaab do ho pyaar karate hain ham tum pe marate hain jahaan ke saamane kyaa apanaa ye bayaan denge nahiin ham apanii jaan denge  mohabbat men ajii kyaa apanaa imtihaan denge nahiin ham apanii jaan denge hamen kaise yaqiin aaye wafaa men aap jaan denge chalo ham imtihaan denge

Title: bahanaa o bahanaa terii dolii main sajaauungaa
Lyrics: bahanaa o bahanaa terii dolii main sajaauungaa terii jaaegii baaraat hogii aankhon se barasaat hanshans ke main dukhadaa bidaaii kaa chhupaauungaa bahanaa o bahanaa threedots  merii gudiyaa jaisii bahanaa tuu to hai is ghar kaa gahanaa jaa ke tuu sasuraal men apanii siitaa jaisii ban ke rahanaa bahanaa o bahanaa threedots  jiivan men tuu sab kushii paana sadaa sukhii sasuraal men rahanaa sukh ke us jiivan men hamako bhuul na jaanaa pyaarii bahanaa bahanaa o bahanaa threedots

Title: chalo re dolii uthaao kahaar
Lyrics: chalo re dolii uthaao kahaar piiyaa milan kii rut aaii pii kii nagarii le jaao kahaar piiyaa milan kii rut aaii  jin nainon kii tuu hai jyotii un nainon se barase motii daavaa nahiin hai koii zor nahiin hai betii sadaa hii paraaii hotii jaldii naihar se le jaao kahaar piiyaa milan kii rut aaii  chhaaii hai dekho hariyaalii aaii hai rut khushiyon vaalii har aashaa parvaan  chadhii din hai dasaharaa raat diivaalii gale daal baahon kaa haar kahaar piiyaa milan kii rut aaii  tan maike man terii nagariyaa ud jaauun main banake badariyaa chaand nagar ko chalii chakorii pyaasii huun milan kii saanvariyaa mere sapane sajaao kahaar piiyaa milan kii rut aaii  suunii padii bhaiyaa kii havelii vyaakul bahanaa rah gaii akelii jin sang naachii jin sang khelii chhuut gaii vo sakhii sahelii ab na derii lagaao kahaar piiyaa milan kii rut aaii

Title: aayaa aayaa atariyaa pe koii chor
Lyrics: aayaa aayaa atariyaa pe koii chor  3 o bhabhii aana zaraa diipak jalaanaa  2 dekho balam hain ya koii aur dar gai main ke mar gai main ke aayaa aayaa atariyaa pe koii chor  2  man uupar niiche khidakii ke piichhe ankhiyon ke niichhe baithii main sochuun saanvarii phir kaa karuun main baavarii bairii balam ho to chup rahuun main 2 duujaa koii ho machaa duun main shor aayaa aayaa threedots  dhokhaa khaayaa hai jii ghabaraayaa hai koii aayaa hai nainon men naina jab gae aangan men kangan baj gae main naachii aise kathaputalii jaise naa jaane khenchi hai kisane dor aayaa aayaa threedots  sau matadaarii kaarii kajaraarii sainyaa main haarii detaa dikhaaii kuchh nahiin chhup naa gayaa ho vo kahiin ghar men chhipaa to jaaegaa pakadaa  2 man men chhipaa to phir kyaa hai zor aayaa aayaa threedots

Title: mere dil men terii tasaviir sadaa rahatii hai
Lyrics: mere dil men terii tasaviir sadaa rahatii hai merii taqadiir men tuu hai yaa nahiin kyaa jaanuun  tere haathon kii haraarat hai mere haathon men  kvaab banakar tuu bas gayaa hai merii raaton men main tasavvur men tere huun yaa nahiin kyaa jaanuun  pyaar ke phuul nigaahon men khilaa karate the kabhii ham tum yahiin har roz milaa karate the phir tere man men milenge yaa nahiin kyaa jaanuun  phir yuun hii chaand ke mukhade pe javaanii hogii phir yuun hii jhuumatii nadiyon men rawaanii hogii tuu mere saamane hogaa yaa nahiin kyaa jaanuun

Title: hari din to biitaa shaam huii raat paar karaa de
Lyrics: hari din to biitaa shaam huii raat paar karaa de biitaa meraa kaal to biitaa kuul paar karaa de  mainne saath liyaa naa koii doshaalaa naa loii apane chhuute sapane chhuute aashaa aur chhudaa de  daataa tere dvaar khadii huun maanguun mukti daan bandhu chhuute bandhan chhuute chhor paar karaa de

Title: parmeshvar rakhavaalaa teraa
Lyrics: parmeshvar rakhavaalaa teraa 2 vo hii maataa vo hii pitaa hai mainne to bas paalaa  sukh sapane saakaar hue 2 jab mainne tujhako paayaa tiin lok kaa saaii tere sar par rakhe saayaa tuu meraa nanhaa man mohan tuu meraa nandalaalaa parmeshvar rakhavaalaa teraa threedots  jis daataa kii den hai tuu 2 us par mamataa balihaarii nis din mahakelahake tere jiivan kii phulavaarii hansataa basataa dekahke tujhako 2 jhuume man matavaalaa parmeshvar rakhavaalaa teraa threedots

Title: baahon men terii mastii ke ghere saanson men terii
Lyrics: baahon men terii mastii ke ghere saanson men terii khushabuu ke dere mastii ke gheron men khushabuu ke dere men ham khoe jaate hain  barason se takatii thii tuu vahii hai lau jaag sakatii thii tuu vahii hai dil khilate jaate hain  lab gungunaate hain baahon men terii threedots  milane do saayaa tapate badan ko samajhaa hai mere jaanaaz tan ko jismon ke jismon se  sadiyon ke naate hain baahon men terii threedots

Title: ai jaanewafaa aisaa bhii kyaa
Lyrics: ai jaanewafaa aisaa bhii kyaa tum to kafaa hamase ho gae ai jaanewafaa aisaa bhii kyaa tum to kafaa hamase ho gae  ye tumane kahaa thaa ki ham hain tumhaare to ham bhii ye samajhe ki tum ho hamaare phir hamen kis baat kii sazaa de rahe ho  ai jaanewafaa aisaa bhii kyaa tum to kafaa hamase ho gae  jahaan pyaar hogaa sharaarat bhii hogii jahaann hogii antpan mobabbat bhii hogii jhukii jhukii aankhon se ye pataa de rahe ho  ai jaanewafaa aisaa bhii kyaa tum to kafaa hamase ho gae  idhar rah gaii yaa udhar rah gaii hai kahiin kuchh kamii sii magar rah gaii hai merii wafaa ka ye kyaa silaa de rahe ho  ai jaanewafaa aisaa bhii kyaa tum to kafaa hamase ho gae ai jaanewafaa aisaa bhii kyaa tum to kafaa hamase ho gae

Title: bol siyaavar  gangaaghaat kaa paanii piyaa hai
Lyrics: bol siyaavar raamachandr kii jay pavanasut hanumaan kii jay har har mahaadev kii jay paarvatii ke pati bhagavatii paande kii jay  gangaaghaat kaa paanii piyaa hai ab sabako main paanii pilaa duungaa mujhako bhalaa samajhate ho kyaa tumhen haridvaar pahunchaa duungaa gangaaghaat kaa paanii threedots  pyaar kii baanii bolane vaalaa ban jaae ek tamaashaa is duniyaa men to chalatii hai bas laathii kii bhaashaa kaun hai tolaa kaun hai maashaa ye bhed abhii samajhaa duungaa gangaaghaat kaa paanii threedots  do shabdon men kah detaa huun is duniyaa kii kahaanii bholaa huun main nirbal nahiin din men bhii taare dikhaa duungaa gangaaghaat kaa paanii threedots  tumako sab kuchh nayaa mubaaraq hamako vahii puraanaa dekho gorii hai baalii umariyaa soch ke paanv badhaanaa vah to miit ek raat ke main to sangsang umar bitaa duungaa gangaaghaat kaa paanii threedots

Title: ye samajho aur samajhaao  daalrotii khaao
Lyrics: ki 	ye samajho aur samajhaao thodii men mauj manaao 	daalrotii khaao prabhu ke gun gaao 2 la 	ajii laalach men naa aao naa dil kaa chain ganvaao 	daalrotii khaao threedots  ki 	tan pe langotii pet men rotii  sone ko ek khatiyaa  2 la 	matalab to hai niind se chaahe  badhiyaa ho yaa ghatiyaa  2 do 	raadheshyaam siitaaraam 2 ki 	nafarat ko duur hataao aur sabako gale lagaao 	daalrotii khaao threedots  la 	chaandii kii thaalii vaale ko kyaa  bhuukh lage hai zyaadaa  2 ki 	kyon naa khaa le phir aapas men  baant ke aadhaaaadhaa  2 do 	raadheshyaam siitaaraam 2 la 	sabase sastii chiiz hai kyaa 	bolo bolo ki 	chorii daakaa aur beiimaanii la 	to phir mahangii kyaa hogii 	sochosocho 2 ki 	kisii kii kaatir qurbaanii do 	chhote ko paas bithaao bhuule ko raah dikhaao 	daalrotii khaao threedots 	raadheshyaam siitaaraam 2

Title: diivaane hain diivaanon ko na ghar chaahie
Lyrics: ra 	diivaane hain diivaanon ko na ghar chaahie naa dar chaahie 	muhabbat bharii ik  nazar chaahie  2 la 	javaanii men javaanii ke sahaare ho javaan mere meharabaan 	mujhe tuu hii tuu  hamasafar chaahie  2 ra 	diivaane hain threedots  	hai sar pe hamaare  khulaa aasamaan  2 	hamaare lie hai  yahii aashiyaan  2 la 	binaa pyaar ke zindagii kuchh nahiin 	jahaan pyaar hai har kushii hai vahiin 	ho phuulon bharii chaahe  kaanton bharii  2 	chale jisape tuu vo dagar chaahie do 	diivaane hain threedots  ra 	nigaahon men aise  ishaare hue  2 	ke dil ne kahaa ham  tumhaare hue  2 la 	nazar ban gaii hai zubaan pyaar men 	mazaa aa gayaa jiit kaa haar men 	milegaa vahii jo bhii maangoge diladaar se magar pyaar se 	duaaon men apanii  asar chaahie  2 do 	diivaane hain threedots

Title: terii jhiilsii gaharii aankhon men
Lyrics: ni terii jhiilsii gaharii aankhon men     kuchh dekhaa hamane vaa kyaa dekhaa ni tum bataao vaa main samajh gaii re diiwaane     tuune raat koii sapanaa dekhaa ni terii jhiilsii gaharii   ni saanson men chhipii dhadakan ke sang     jab pyaar ne lii thii angadaaii     ek swargparii chhamchham karatii     baanhon men merii aa musakaaii     madamast jawaanii kaa palakon ke     aanchal men chhipanaa dekhaa vaa main samajh gaii re diiwaane     tuune raat koii sapanaa dekhaa ni terii jhiilsii gaharii aankhon men  ni amrit ke saagar kii shruti     mandir ke diipak kii jyoti     alhad kamalon par pade hue     hiire niilam maanik motii     terii uthatiijhukatii palakon men  2     suuraj dekhaa chandaa dekhaa vaa main samajh gaii re diiwaane     tuune raat koii sapanaa dekhaa ni terii jhiilsii gaharii aankhon men

Title: yaarii ho gaii yaar se
Lyrics: yaarii ho gaii  2 yaarii ho gaii yaar se lak tunu tunu pyaar ko kaam kyaa jhuuthe sansaar se yaarii ho gaii threedots  os men bhiige bhiige aakaash ke tale jaane ham jal jaanaa lagakar yaar ke siine se ho chuur thakan se hoke jab saans naa chale hamako jiivan mil jaataa hai jahar ke piine se jiite hai pyaar se marate hai pyaar se haan yaarii ho gaii threedots  dharam sadaa apanaa to hansanaa bolanaa lukanaa chhupanaa kyaa jaane ham hod men aanchal kii ho karam sadaa apanaa to khulake dolanaa laharaatii bainyaan hain aur ye taal hai paayal kii guunjatii har galii prem jhankaar se haan yaarii ho gaii threedots

Title: lallaa lallaa lorii duudh kii katorii
Lyrics: lallaa lallaa lorii duudh kii katorii duudh men bataashaa munnii kare tamaashaa  chhotiichhotii pyaarii sundar pariyon jaisii hai kisii kii nazar naa lage merii munnii aisii hai shahad se bhii miithii duudh se bhii gorii chupakechupake choriichorii chorii lallaa lallaa lorii threedots  kaarii rainaa ke maathe pe chamake chaand sii bindiyaa munnii ke chhotechhote nainon men khele nindiyaa sapanon kaa palanaa aashaaon kii dorii chupakechupake choriichorii chorii lallaa lallaa lorii threedots lallaa lallaa lorii duudh kii katorii duudh men bataashaa jiivan khel tamaashaa

Title: zamaane men kahaan  shiradii vaale saaiin baabaa
Lyrics: zamaane men kahaan tuutii huii tasviir banatii hai tere darabaar men bigadii huii taqadiir banatii hai  taariif terii nikalii hai dil se aaii hai lab pe ban ke qavvaalii shiradii vaale saaiin baabaa aayaa hai tere dar pe savaalii lab pe duaaen aankhon men aansuu dil men ummiiden par jholii khaalii shiradii vaale threedots  o mere saaiin devaa tere sab naam levaa judaa insaan saare sabhii tujhako hain pyaare tumhiin fariyaad sabakii tujhe hai yaad sabakii badaa yaa koii chhotaa nahiin maayuus lautaa amiiron kaa sahaaraa gariibon kaa guzaaraa terii rahamat kaa qissaa bayaan akabar kare kyaa do din kii duniyaa duniyaa hai gulashan sab phuul baante tuu sabakaa maalii shiradii vaale threedots  kudaa kii shaan tujhamen dikhe bhagavaan tujhamen tujhe sab maanate hain teraa ghar jaanate hain chale aate hain daude jo kushqismat thode yahii har raahii kii manzil yah har kashtii kaa saahil jise sabane nikaalaa use tuune sambhaalaa tuu bichhadon ko milaae bujhe diipak jalaae ye gam kii raaten raaten ye kaalii inako banaa de iid aur diivaalii shiradii vaale threedots

Title: sunayanaa sunayanaa aaj in nazaaron ko tum dekho
Lyrics: sunayanaa sunayanaa sunayanaa sunayanaa  aaj in nazaaron ko tum dekho  aur main tumhen dekhate hue dekhuun  main bas tumhen dekhate hue dekhuun   pyaarii hain phuulon kii pakhudiyaan  par teri palakon se pyaarii kahaan phuulon kii khushabuu se kii dostii  kii inake rangon se yaarii kahaan sunayanaa aaj khile phuulon ko tum dekho  aur main tumhen threedots   uunche mahal ke jharokhon se tum  ambar kii shobhaa nihaaro zaraa  rangon se rangon kaa ye mel tum  aankhon se man men utaaro zaraa  sunayanaa dur aasamaanon ko tum dekho  aur main tumhen threedots   lo din dhalaa raat hone lagii  taaron kii duniyaa men kho jaao tum  main jaag kar tumako dekhaa karuun  so jaao tum thodaa so jaao tum  sunayanaa aaj miithe sapanon ko tum dekho  aur main tumhen threedots

Title: phuul aahistaa phenko phuul bade naazuk hote hain
Lyrics: phuul aahistaa phenko phuul bade naazuk hote hain vaise bhii to ye badhqisamat nok pe kaanton kii sote hain phuul aahistaa   threedots  badii khuubsuurat shiqaayat hai ye magar sochiye kyaa sharaafat hai ye jo auron kaa dil todate rahate hain lagii chot unako to ye kahate hain ki phuul aahistaa phenko phuul bade naazuk hote hain jo rulaate hain logon ko ek din khud bhii rote hain phuul aahistaa   threedots  kisii shok ko baag kii sair men jo lag jaaye kaantaa koii pair men kafaa husn vaalon se ho kis liye ye maasuum hai bahakataa is liye ki phuul aahistaa phenko phuul bade naazuk hote hain ye karenge kaise ghaayal ye to khud ghaayal hote hain phuul aahistaa   threedots  gulon ke bade aap hamadard hain bhalaa kyon na ho aap bhii mard hain hazaaron savaalon kaa hai ik javaab farebenazar ye na ho ai janaab ki phuul aahistaa phenko phuul bade naazuk hote hain sab jise kahate hain shabanam phuul ke aansuu hote hain phuul aahistaa   threedots

Title: merii muhabbat terii javaanii
Lyrics: merii muhabbat terii javaanii chaar dinon kii hai zindagaanii to aa merii raanii le jaa chhallaa nishaanii main huun diivaanaa tuu hai diivaanii ye saarii duniyaa hai aaniijaanii to aa merii raanii le jaa chhallaa nishaanii   threedots  aaj nahiin to kal tuu mere pyaar ko maanegii agar merii tuu jaanegii ho priitam ko pahachaanegii barasegaa chhamchham aankhon se paanii ye saarii duniyaa hai aaniijaanii to aa merii raanii le jaa chhallaa nishaanii   threedots  pyaar men aksar premii pahale jhagadaa karate hain magar phir aahen bharate hain ik duuje pe marate hain terii merii bhii yahii kahaanii ye saarii duniyaa hai aaniijaanii to aa merii raanii le jaa chhallaa nishaanii   threedots  maar na aise thokar teraa pair phisal jaaye hai kitanii naazuk tuu haay sanbhal oye moch naa aa jaaye gussaa buraa hai samajhii diivaanii ye saarii duniyaa hai aaniijaanii to aa merii chhallo le jaa chhallaa nishaanii aa merii raanii le jaa chhallaa nishaanii  merii muhabbat terii javaanii chaar dinon kii hai zindagaanii to aa merii raanii le jaa chhallaa nishaanii   threedots

Title: main to chalaa jidhar chale rastaa
Lyrics: main to chalaa jidhar chale rastaa 2 tujhe kyaa kabar hai kahaan merii manzil hogaa koii meraa bhii saathii 2 hogii kahiin to merii bhii mahafil main to chalaa threedots  ye husnoishq kaa jahaan ye shokiyaan ye mastiyaan ye parvaton ke qaafile ye baadalon kii toliyaan puuchhatii hain mujhase tuu chalaa hai  kidhar  3 main to chalaa threedots  mujhako ishq bahaaron se in rangiin nazaaron se maine chalanaa siikhaa hai dariyaa ke bahate dhaaron se ye gunagunaatii vaadiyaan ye phuulon bharii daaliyaan taaj pahane barf kaa ye jagamagaatii chotiyaan puuchhatii hain mujhase tuu chalaa hai  kidhar  3 main to chalaa threedots

Title: nahiin nahiin abhii nahiin abhii karo intazaar
Lyrics: ki e aao naa dil hai beqaraar aa naa naa naa naa ki e he aa naa naa  aa nahiin nahiin abhii nahiin abhii karo intazaar chhodo naa ki anhan aa nahiin nahiin abhii nahiin abhii karo intazaar ki nahiin nahiin kabhii nahiin main huun beqaraar  aa naa naa naa naa unhuununhuun naa naa naa naa baabaa ki main bhii javaan tuu bhii javaan kamii hai kis baat kii     he main bhii javaan tuu bhii javaan kamii hai kis baat kii     yahaan aao na ghabaraao rut hai mulaaqaat kii aa haan nahiin nahiin haan abhii nahiin phir kabhii diladaar ki nahiin nahiin kabhii nahiin main huun beqaraar  ki laa laa laa laa  aa bade vo ho tum piyaa zid kyon nahiin chhodate     ho bade vo ho tum piyaa zid kyon nahiin chhodate     haan kaliyon ko khilane se pahale nahiin todate ki naa nahiin nahiin kabhii nahiin chalii jaaegii bahaar aa nahiin nahiin haa abhii nahiin thodaa intazaar  ki e he he aa naa naa ki aa aa aa aa naa naa  aa nahiin nahiin abhii nahiin abhii karo intazaar ki nahiin nahiin kabhii nahiin main huun beqaraar  aa naa naa naa naa unhuununhuun naa naa naa naa baabaa ki  jaanejahaan phir kahaan aisii tanahaaiyaan aa  ho jaane bhii do chhodo mujhe hongii rusavaaiyaan ki  naa nahiin nahiin kabhii nahiin mat karo inakaar aa  nahiin nahiin abhii nahiin thodaa intazaar      thodaa intazaar thodaa intazaar

Title: uupar jaa ke yaad aaiin niiche kii baaten
Lyrics: jiinaa to hai par ai dil kahaan 2 are baithuun to nahiin milatii hai zamiin ho main udanaa chaahuun to hai duur aasamaan   naaraaz koii na koii meharabaan na kahiin koii bijalii na koii aashiyaan  2 are baithuun to threedots  jalataa hai badan kahiin saayaa nahiin kisii aanchal ke badale hai sulagataa dhuaan are baithuun to threedots

Title: jab dard nahiin thaa siine men
Lyrics: na hansanaa mere gam pe insaaf karanaa jo main ro paduun to mujhe maaf karanaa  jab dadr nahiin thaa siine men kyaa kaak mazaa thaa jiine men ab ke shaayad ham bhii royen saavan ke mahiine men jab dadr nahiin thaa    threedots  yaaro kaa gam kyaa hotaa hai maaluum na thaa anjaanon ko saahil pe khade hokar aqsar  dekhaa hamane tuufaanon ko ab ke shaayad dil bhii duube maujon ke safiine men jab dadr nahiin thaa   threedots  aise to thes na lagatii thii jab apane ruuthaa karate the aise to dard na hotaa thaa jab sapane tuutaa karate the ab ke shaayad dil bhii tuute  ab ke shaayad ham bhii royen saavan ke mahiine men jab dadr nahiin thaa    threedots  is qadar pyaar to koii karataa nahiin marane vaalon ke saath koii marataa nahiin aap ke saamane main na phir aauungaa giit hii jab na honge to kyaa gaauungaa merii aavaaz pyaarii hai to doston yaar bach jaaye meraa duaa sab karo duaa sab karo

Title: o taaraa teraameraa nahiin guzaaraa
Lyrics: ki 	o taaraa teraameraa nahiin guzaaraa 2 	tuu thaharii gharavaalii main thaharaa banjaaraa la 	pyaaraa teraa pyaar hai mujhako pyaaraa 	tere lie gharabaar to kyaa main chhod duun ye jag saaraa  ki 	melaa duniyaa do roz kaa melaa 	o aataajaataa yauvan jaise paanii kaa ik relaa la 	melaa duniyaa do roz kaa melaa 	thaam le bainyaa mele men are kaahe phire akelaa  	dhokhaa mere saath huaa ve ye dhokhaa 2 	meraa ghuunghat khol gayaa beiimaan pavan kaa jhonkaa ki 	jhonkaa main hotaa kaash vo jhonkaa 	mere haath se nikal gayaa hai ek sunaharaa mauqaa  	baadal terii aankh kaa jaise kaajal 2 	dhakdhak man ko leke chhamchham baaje terii paayal la 	aanchal hat chhod de meraa aanchal 	sach kahate hain premii hote hain thode se paagal  	chotii merii do gaj lambii chotii 2 	baabul ko samajhaao koii ab merii umar nahiin chhotii ki 	motii mat barasaa aankh se motii 	ye sabako maaluum hai main huun diipak tuu hai jyoti  	raanii sun apanii prem kahaanii 2 	hamako samajhaane ko aaii ye duniyaa diivaanii la 	jaanii ye duniyaa nahiin jaanii 	dil kii aag bujhaa na paae saare jag kaa paanii  	nyaaraa main karatii tujhe ishaaraa 	saamane merii khidakii ke jo hotaa teraa chaubaaraa ki 	o taaraa kyaa khidakii kyaa chaubaaraa 	tod ke sab diivaaren ik din hogaa milan hamaaraa

Title: ruk jaanaa nahiin tuu kahiin haar ke
Lyrics: ruk jaanaa nahiin tuu kahiin haar ke kaanton pe chalake milenge saaye bahaar ke o raahii o raahiithreedots  suuraj dekh ruk gayaa hai tere aage jhuk gayaa hai jab kabhii aise koii mastaanaa nikale hai apanii dhun men diivaanaa shaam suhaanii ban jaate hain din intazaar ke o raahii o raahiithreedots  saathii na kaaravaan hai ye teraa imtihaan hai yuun hii chalaa chal dil ke sahaare karatii hai manzil tujhako ishaare dekh kahiin koii rok nahiin le tujhako pukaar ke o raahii o raahiithreedots  nain aansuu jo liye hain ye raahon ke diye hain logon ko unakaa sab kuchh deke tuu to chalaa thaa sapane hii leke koii nahiin to tere apane hain sapane ye pyaar ke o raahii o raahiithreedots

Title: sansaar hai ik nadiyaa sukhdukh do kinaare hain
Lyrics: sansaar hai ik nadiyaa duhkhsukh do kinaare hain na jaane kahaan jaaen ham bahate dhaare hain  chalate hue jiivan kii raftaar men ik lay hai ik raag men ik sur men sansaar kii har shay hai sansaar kii har shay hai threedots ik taar pe gardish men ye chaand sitaare hain  dharatii pe ambar kii aankhon se barasatii hai ik roz yahii buunden phir baadal banatii hain 2 is banane bigadane ke dastuur men saare hain  koii bhii kisii ke lie apanaa na paraayaa hai risshte ke ujaale men har aadamii saayaa hai 2 kudarata ke bhii dekho to ye khel puraane hain  hai kaun vo duniyaa men na paap kiyaa jisane bin ulajhe kaanton se hain phuul chune kisane hain phuul chune kisane threedots bedaag nahiin koii yahaan paapii saare hain

Title: ye meraa dil yaar kaa diivaanaa
Lyrics: laa laa laa  ye meraa dil yaar kaa diivaanaa diivaanaa  2 pyaar kaa paravaanaa aataa hai mujhako pyaar men jal jaanaa mushkil hai pyaare teraa bach ke jaanaa ye meraa dil yaar kaa diivaanaa  2  dil vo chaahe jise chaahe jise use paaye pyaar vo yaar ke jo naam pe hii mit jaaye  2 jaan ke badale men jaan luun nazaraanaa ye meraa dil yaar kaa diivaanaa  2  pal pal ik halchal dil men ik tuufaan hai aane ko hai vo manzil jisakaa mujhe aramaan hai bhuulegaa naa tujhe dil kaa ye takaraanaa ye meraa dil yaar kaa diivaanaa  2

Title: ham tum gumasum raat milan kii
Lyrics: ko jhuumanaa jhuumanaa aa laa laa laa ki ham tum gumasum raat milan kii aajaa gorii sun le baat sajan kii 2 aa o chhodo mujhe niind aayii hai jaao tum koras jhuumanaa jhuumanaa ki ham tum gumasum raat milan kii aajaa gorii sun le baat sajan kii aa o chhodo mujhe niind aayii hai jaao tum koras jhuumanaa jhuumanaa  aa jhonke pawan ke  khidakii se jhaanke chhedo na tum baalamaa  sun le na koii zaalimaa zaalimaa re jhonke pawan ke  khidakii se jhaanke chhedo na tum baalamaa  sun le na koii zaalimaa bajane lage hain mere kanganaa chhuum chhuum ko jhuumanaa jhuumanaa ki ham tum gumasum raat milan kii aajaa gorii sun le baat sajan kii aa o chhodo mujhe niind aayii hai jaao tum koras jhuumanaa jhuumanaa  ko jhuumanaa jhuumanaa ki main na sunuungaa koii bahaanaa main to diiwaanaa ho gayaa teraa mastaanaa ho gayaa 2 ho mastii me naache re jhuume jiyaa jhuum jhuum aa jhuumanaa jhuumanaa ki ham tum gumasum raat milan kii aajaa gorii sun le baat sajan kii aa o chhodo mujhe niind aayii hai jaao tum koras jhuumanaa jhuumanaa

Title: vaadaa karo nahiin chhodogii tum meraa saath

Title: apanii nazaron se bahut duur  naa apanaa thaa jo kal
Lyrics: apanii nazaron se bahut duur chhupaa duun khud ko jii men aataa hai ki kahiin rakh ke bhulaa duun khud ko  naa apanaa thaa jo kal guzaraa jo ab hai vo hai gairon kaa nahiin ummiid ab koii kal hamaaraa bhii kyaa hogaa 2  badii raanaaiyaan hongii jahaan men ham nahiin honge hamaare ek na hone se fasaane kam nahiin honge hamaaraa aaj charchaa hai to kal auron kaa phir hogaa naa apanaa thaa threedots  ujadane ko hai phir mahafil naii aabaad kar lenaa naii buniyaad jab rakho hamen bhii yaad kar lenaa dukhaanaa dil ko na haragiz dukhaakar dil ko kyaa hogaa naa apanaa thaa threedots

Title: ye dil divaanaa hai dil to divaanaa hai
Lyrics: ye dil diivaanaa hai dil to diivaanaa hai diivaanaa dil hai ye dil diivaanaa  kaisaa bedardii hai isakii to marzii hai jab tak javaanii hai ye rut suhaanii hai nazaren judaa naa hon aramaan khafaa naa hon dilakash bahaaron men chhupake chanaaron men yun hii sadaa ham tum baithe rahen gumasum vo bevafaa jo kahe hamako jaanaa hai ye dil  ye dil divaanaa hai threedots  bechain rahataa hai chupake se kahataa hai mujhako dhadakane do sholaa bhadakane do kaanton men kaliyon men saajan kii galiyon men feraa lagaane do chhodo bhii jaane do kho to na jaaungaa main laut aaungaa dekhaa sune samajhe achchhaa bahaanaa hai ye dil  ye dil divaanaa hai threedots  saavan ke aate hii baadal ke chhaate hii phulon ke mausam men phulon ke mausam men chalate hii puravaaii milate hi tanhaaii ulajhaake baaton men kahataa hai raaton men yaadon men kho jaaun jaldii se so jaaun kyonke saanvariyaa ko sapanon men aanaa hai ye dil  ye dil divaanaa hai threedots

Title: tere liye main ne sab ko chhodaa
Lyrics: category  tere liye main ne sab ko chhodaa tuu hii chhod ke chal dii janam maran ke saath kaa vaadaa kaise tod ke chal dii  kitane sapane dekhe hamane isii ped ke niiche aise tuufaan aaye ke ujade khvaabon ke bagiiche kyaa khabar thii lut jaayegii  merii duniyaa itani jaldii janam maran ke saath kaa vaadaa kaise tod ke chal dii  chhiin liyaa kyuun haathon se mere vaqt ne daaman teraa jiivanmen jab tuu hii nahiin kis kaam kaa jiivan meraa miit bichhadate nahiin raahon men kyuun tuune riit badal dii janam maran ke saath kaa vaadaa kaise tod ke chal dii

Title: chal chal chal mere saathii o mere haathii
Lyrics: chal chal chal mere saathii o mere haathii chal le chal khataaraa khiinch ke  chal yaar dhakkaa maar  band hai motar kaar  chal yaar dhakkaa maar  chal chal chal threedots  phuulon si naazuk hai vo motar men baithii hai jo  aahistaa aahistaa chal usako na takaliif ho  haay haay khaa na jaye  haay haay khaa na jaye usakii naazuk kamariyaa bal chal  chal chal chal threedots  hai hai oho ho threedots  khidamat teri kaam de shaayad vo inaam de  kar us hasiin ko salaam aankhon se paigaam de  paas aja o sun raajaa  paas aja o sun raajaa  aisa mauka na jaye nikal chal  chal chal chal threedots  tu yaaron ka yaar hai kitanaa vafaadaar hai  jhuuthaa hai saaraa jahaan sachchaa tera pyaar hai tu pagalaa na badalaa  tu pagalaa na badalaa  sari duniya gayii hai badal chal  chal chal chal threedots

Title: ai baabuu ye public hai  sab jaanatii hai
Lyrics: ai baabuu ye public hai public ye jo public hai sab jaanatii hai ye jo public hai ajii andar kyaa hai baahar kyaa hai ye sab kuchh pahachaanatii hai ye jo public threedots  ye chaahe to sar pe bithaa le chaahe phenk de niiche pahale ye piichhe bhaage phir bhaago isake piichhe are dil tuute to are ye ruuthe to taubaa kahaan phir maanatii hai ye jo public threedots  kyaa netaa kyaa abhinetaa de janataa ko jo dhokhaa pal men shoharat ud jaae jyon ek pavan kaa jhonkaa are zor na karanaa are shor na karanaa zor na karanaa shor na karanaa apane shahar men shaanti hai ye jo public threedots  hiiremotii tumane chhupaae kuchh ham log na bole ab aataachaaval bhii chhupaa to bhuukhon ne munh khole are bhiikh na maange karz na maange ye apanaa haq maangatii hai ye jo public threedots

Title: hamiin karen koii surat unhen bulaane kii
Lyrics: hamiin karen koii surat unhen bulaane kii sunaa hai un ko to aadaat hai bhuul jaane kii hamiin karen koii surat  2 hamiin karen koii surat unhen bulaane kii sunaa hai un ko to aadaat hai bhuul jaane kii  jafaa ke zikr pe tum kyuun sambhal ke baith gaye  2 tumhaarii baat nahiin tumhaarii baat nahiin baat hai zamaane kii hamiin karen koii surat unhen bulaane kii sunaa hai un ko to aadaat hai bhuul jaane kii  jo ham sataayen to katraa ke is tarah se na jaa nigaahenaaz ye baaten nigaahenaaz ye baaten hain dil dukhaane kii hamiin karen koii surat unhen bulaane kii sunaa hai un ko to aadaat hai bhuul jaane kii

Title: pyaar zindagii hai pyaar bandagii hai bandagii hai
Lyrics: pyaar zindagii hai pyaar bandagii hai bandagii hai  yahallaa yahallaa uu yaa allaah  pyaar se pyaar karo ye umr pyaar kii hai  pyaar binaa kyaa jiinaa ye bhii koi zindagii hai pyaarthreedots  1 pyaar karam pyaar duaa pyaar sitam pyaar vafaa  pyaar se judaa to yahaan koi nahiin koi nahiin  pyaar khushii pyaar nashaa kyaa vo najar kyaa vo adaa  ho kisii ke pyaar men jo koii nahiin koii nahiin  dil ko lagaa ke dekho pyaar men kyaa khushii hai  pyaar binaa kyaa jiinaa ye bhii koi zindagii hai pyaarthreedots  2 dur rahe paas rahe dil men tere pyaas rahe  tere liye main huun tuu hai mere liye mere liye  pyaar sanam pyaar khudaa yaar kabhii ho naa judaa  yaar binaa koi yahaan kaise jiye kaise jiye  baahon men yaar ke hii duniyaa bahaar kii hai pyaarthreedots  3 dekh hamen koi jale koi jale haath male  tuu jo mere saath chale logon se kyaa daranaa yahaan  pyaar yahaan jo naa kare kaak jiye kak mare  yaar mere tere liye jiinaa yahaan maranaa yahaan  marake bhii naa mite jo ye vo divaanagii hai pyaarthreedots

Title: pahale sau baar idhar aur udhar dekhaa hai
Lyrics: pahale sau baar idhar aur udhar dekhaa hai tab kahiin dar ke tumhen ek nazar dekhaa hai  ham pe hansatii hai jo duniyaan use dekhaa hii nahiin ham ne us shokh ko ae diidaaetar dekhaa hai  aaj is ek nazar par mujhe mar jaane do  us ne logon badii mushkil se idhar dekhaa hai  kyaa galat hai jo main diivaanaa huaa sach kahanaa mere mahabuub ko tum ne bhii agar dekhaa hai

Title: jaise raadhaa ne maalaa japii shyaam kii
Lyrics: jaise raadhaa ne maalaa japii shyaam kii  2 main ne odhii chunariyaa tere naam kii tere naam kii ho piyaa tere hii naam kii raadhaa ne threedots  priit kyaa judii priit kyaa judii dor kyaa bandhii binaa jatan binaa yatan ho gaii main nayii binaa mol kii main bikii binaa daam kii raadhaa ne threedots  kyaa tarang hai kyaa tarang hai kyaa umang hai more ang ang rachaa pii kaa rang hai sharm aaii kaise kahuun baat shyaam kii raadhaa ne threedots  paa liyaa tujhe paa liyaa paa liyaa tujhe paaii har khushii chaahuun baar baar chadhuun terii paalakii subah shaam kii ye pyaas bade kaam kii raadhaa ne threedots

Title: nafarat se jinhen tum  zamaane kii aankhon ne
Lyrics: nafarat se jinhen tum dekhate ho tum maarate ho jinhen thokar kyaa un pe guzaratii hai dekho ek baar kabhii ghaayal ho kar  zamaane kii aankhon ne dekhaa hai yaaron sadaa apanii duniyaa men aisaa nazaaraa kabhii unako phuulon se puujaa hai sabane kabhii jinako logon ne patthar se maaraa zamaane kii aankhon threedots  pise na jahaan tak patthar pe menhadii kisii bhii tarah rang laatii nahiin hai hazaaron jagah thokaren khaa na le jab tak koii zindagii muskaraatii nahiin hai binaa khud mare kisako jannat milii hai binaa dukh sahe kisane jiivan sanvaaraa zamaane kii aankhon threedots  bhanvar se jo ghabaraa ke piichhe hate hain dubo dii hai maujon ne unakii hii naiyaa jo tuufaan se takaraa ke aage badhe hain binaa koii maanjhii binaa hii khivaiiyaa kabhii na kabhii to kahiin na kahiin par hameshaa hii unako milaa hai kinaaraa zamaane kii aankhon threedots  yahaan aadamii ko sabak dostii kaa sikhaate hue jo lahuu men nahaayaa masiihaa banaa aur gaandhii banaa vo hazaaron dilon men yahaan ghar banaayaa unhiin kii banii hain yahaan yaadagaaren 2 unhiin kaa zamaane men chamakaa sitaaraa zamaane kii aankhon threedots

Title: daurekizaan thaa
Lyrics: daurekizaan thaa dil ke chaman men koii aaj banake bahaar aa gayaa hai tanhaaiyaan thiin viiraaniyaan thiin  koii aaj leke qaraar aa gayaa hai  koii dilakashii thii naa koii kushii thii badii kashmakash men ye zindagii thii tum aa gae jo sareshaam dil ko aaj un kayaalon pe pyaar aa gayaa hai  ye kahate rahe dil men shabegam ke saaye chiraagetamannaa koii to jalaaye yuun chaand chamakaa nayaa nuur lekar umangon pe jaise nikhaar aa gayaa hai  daurekizaan thaa dil ke chaman men

Title: he ham tum jiit gae dushman haar gae
Lyrics: he ham tum jiit gae dushman haar gae khule maidaan men ham baazii maar gae o ghungharuu naach uthe baaj uthe jhuumate ham  chha na na na na  4 ham tum jiit gae threedots  daulat nahiin kaam aaii chaahat ne jiitii ladaaii dhadakanon se duur rahe ham bade majabuur rahe apanaa sir na jhukaa hamane sahe laakh sitam is kushii ke bahaane tuu chhed mujhako diivaane pyaar men takaraar na kar ahaa aaj tuu o inkaar na kar 2 o ho aanchal chhod meraa dekhate hain logbaag chha na na na na threedots  chalatii hai tuu le ke thumake haayhaay hoyhoy thumake ke gaaen gazal tere jhumake o kaisaa beiimaan hai tuu phir bhii merii jaan hai tuu tere dam se merii zindagii hai terii qasam chha na na na na threedots

Title: saagar nahiin hai to kyaa hai
Lyrics: saagar nahiin hai to kyaa hai terii aankh kaa nashaa to hai baadal nahiin hai to kyaa hai terii zulf kii ghataa to hai saagar nahiin hai threedots  merii tamannaa kii mahafil se tum yuun uth ke jaane lage ho aisii bhii kyaa berukii ruuth kar hamase aankhen churaane lage ho mausam nahiin hai to kyaa hai mauqaa ye pyaar kaa to hai saagar nahiin hai threedots  terii ghanii zulf ke saae men chaar pal saath tere jienge saagar se roz piite hain aaj terii nazar se pienge saaqii nahiin hai to kyaa hai ik shok dilarubaa to hai saagar nahiin hai threedots  shaayad yahii hai qayaamat kii raat maan lene ko jii chaahataa hai terii qasam aaj dil hii nahiin jaan dene ko jii chaahataa hai 2 qaatil nahiin hai to kyaa hai qaafir terii adaa to hai saagar nahiin hai threedots

Title: miit naa milaa re man kaa koii to milan kaa karo re upaay
Lyrics: miit na milaa re man kaa  2 koii to milan kaa koii to milan kaa karo re upaay miit nathreedots  chain nahiin baahar chain nahiin ghar men man meraa dharatii par aur kabhii anbar men usako dhuundhaa har dagar men har nagar men galii galii dekhaa nayan uthaaye miit nathreedots  roz main apane hii pyaar ko samajhaauun vo nahiin aayegaa maan nahiin paauun shaam hii se prem diipak main jalaauun phir vohii diipak duun main bujhaaye miit nathreedots  der se man meraa aas liye dole  2 priit bharii baanii raag meraa bole koii sajanii ek khidakii bhii na khole laakh taraane kahaa main sunaaye miit nathreedots

Title: dhal gayaa din ho gaii shaam jaane do jaanaa hai
Lyrics: aa 	dhal gayaa din ho gaii shaam jaane do jaanaa hai ra 	abhiiabhii to aaii ho abhiiabhii jaanaa hai aa 	dhal gayaa din threedots  ra 	sitam mere dil pe jo dhaae qasam lage usako merii jo jaae aa 	naa aise dekho mujhe na roko zaraa ye socho buraa zamaanaa hai ra 	abhiiabhii to aaii threedots  aa 	guzaarii saath hamane kaii raaten na jaane kab katm hongii terii baaten ra 	abhii na jaanaa koii taraanaa koii fasaanaa abhii sunaanaa hai aa 	dhal gayaa din threedots  ra 	banaate ho ye roz hii bahaanaa na jaane degaa aaj tumako ye diivaanaa aa 	maanaa jii maanaa tuu hai diivaanaa meraa diivaanaa badaa sayaanaa hai aa 	dhal gayaa din threedots

Title: ye dilanashiin nazaare karate hain kyaa ishaare
Lyrics: ye dilanashiin nazaare karate hain kyaa ishaare ye kaun paravaton se chhupakar mujhe pukaare  banban men guunjatii hain kisakii hasiin sadaaen dil kii javaan umangen rahrah ke chaunk jaaen aahistaa se aan baithe koii mere sahaare ye kaun paravaton se threedots  phuulon kii ot lekar ye kaun muskaraae palpal guzar rahe hain kisake badan ke saae gairon ke kuchh nishaan hain sachamuch nadii kinaare ye kaun paravaton se threedots  sab kuchh lage fasaanaa sab kuchh lage kahaanii chehare ko usake chhuukar har subah ho suhaanii usakii hansii churaaen raaton ke chaandtaare ye kaun paravaton se threedots

Title: apane dil men jagah diijie
Lyrics: apane dil men jagah diijie hamako baanhon men le liijie mere pyaar ke devataa ham pe itanaa karam kiijie 2 apane dil men threedots  palakon kii chhaanv men rakhuungii aapako chhupaa ke 2 duniyaa kii nazaron se rakhuungii aapako bachaa ke jaaneman dil ko mere dil men basaa liijie apane dil men threedots  aapake naam kaa hamane ye jaam liyaa hai 2 dekho diivaane dil ne kaisaa ye kaam kiyaa hai kitane dinon se pyaas lagii hai haay bujhaa diijie apane dil men threedots  hamako sambhaalo sanam dekho qadam dagamagaae 2 aapake binaa ab to hamase jiyaa nahiin jaae aaj kii shaam karen yahii kaam duurii mitaa diijie apane dil men threedots

Title: dil haay meraa dil
Lyrics: dil haay meraa dil teraa dil dil se dil mil gayaa he he he he laa laa laa  zulf terii yuun udii yuun mudii ki ghataa chhaa gaii honth tere yuun hile gul khile ki bahaar aa gaii2 pyaar haay meraa pyaar mere yaar ban ke phuul khil gayaa dil haay meraa dil teraa dil dil se dil mil gayaa  aankh terii jo uthii baadshaahon ke sar jhuk gaye chaal aisii tuu chalii log raahon men hii ruk gaye 2 jaan haay merii jaan ye jahaan aasmaan hil gayaa dil haay meraa dil teraa dil dil se dil mil gayaa  ruup tere pe nazar jab padii to nazar mil gaii rang teraa ud gayaa tuu kalii kii tarah khil gaii2 nain haay mere nain tere nain mil gaye dil gayaa dil haay meraa dil teraa dil dil se dil mil gayaa

Title: haay bichhuaa das gayo re
Lyrics: haay bichhuaa das gayo re  3 miithii miithii hone lagii mere tan man men jalan haan miithii miithii hone lagii mere tan man men jalan mujhako bachaa le mere sajan jaldii se kar too koii jatan haay merii maan haan merii maan haay merii maan haay merii maan  haa haa haa haa haa haa haa haay bichhuaa das gayo re  main to yuun hii banii diiwaanii tuune merii qadar nahiin kii kabhii bhuule se bhii dilajaanii tuune merii kabar nahiin lii nas nas men sajan huii aisii chubhan lagii aisii lagan tuute meraa badan main mar gaii dard men ki meraa bachanaa mushkil hai mitawaa   haay bichhuaa das gayo re  2 miithii miithii hone lagii mere tan man men jalan haan miithii miithii hone lagii mere tan man men jalan mujhako bachaa le mere sajan jaldii se kar too koii jatan haay merii maan haan merii maan haay merii maan haay merii maan  naa to maaraa naa zindaa chhodaa dard aisaa lagaayaa hai pyaar tere pe thodaa thodaa mujhe gussaa bhii aayaa hai are o bewafaa aankhen naa churaa kar koii dawaa yaa koii duaa pachhataayegaa baad men ki meraa bachanaa mushkil hai mitawaa   haay bichhuaa das gayo re  2 miithii miithii hone lagii mere tan man men jalan haan miithii miithii hone lagii mere tan man men jalan mujhako bachaa le mere sajan jaldii se kar too koii jatan haay merii maan haay merii maan haay merii maan haay merii maan  haa haa haa haa haa haa haa  haay bichhuaa das gayo re  2

Title: mile jo kadiikadii ek zanjiir bane
Lyrics: mile jo kadiikadii ek zanjiir bane pyaar ke rang bharo zindaa tasviir bane o hamasafar ban ke chalo to suhaanaa hai safar jo akelaa hii rahe use na mile dagar  yaar ke bin koii jie to kyaa jie zindagii hai muskaraane ke lie jo bhii yahaan pe saath kuchh jaataa nahiin ho mile jo kadiikadii threedots  chaahe aur kuchh na mujhe yaar de yaar tuu jii bhar ke mujhe pyaar de badii mushqil se bhalaa yaar milataa hai yahaan koii hamaraaz na ho to hai suunaa ye jahaan mile jo kadiikadii threedots  jaane ek din ye kaise ho gayaa chalatechalate main raahon men kho gayaa subah kaa bhuulaa huaa shaam ko ghar laut aae use bhuulaa na kaho yahii hai apanii raay mile jo kadiikadii threedots

Lyrics: raahii nayenaye rastaa nayaanayaa tum naa badaliin main naa badalaa sabkuchh badal gayaa raahii nayenaye threedots  yaad suhaanii bachapan kii patthar pe khinchii rekhaa pahalaapahalaa pyaar dilon se mitate nahiin dekhaa tuufaan samay ke bujhaa na sake diip jalaa to jalaa tum naa badaliin threedots  vaqt ke saath badal jaae use pyaar nahiin kahate jo har mod pe mud jaae use yaar nahiin kahate yaar vahii jo saathii ban kar dukh men saath chalaa 2 tum naa badaliin threedots

Lyrics: mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil qayaamat kii ghadii aaii kushii se aankh bhar aaii mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil qayaamat kii ghadii aaii kushii se aankh bhar aaii   zaraa thaharo tamaashaa kyaa  hamaaraa tum naa dekhoge  2  nazar kyon pher lii kyaa ye  nazaaraa tum naa dekhoge kahiin par tootate hain dil  kahiin bajatii hai shahanaaii mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil   tumhen ham ye nahiin kahate ki waadaa tumane todaa hai  2 magar hai gam sanbhalakar kud yahaan par saath chhodaa hai ye rastaa hai ki hai manzil samajh men baat naa aaii mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil  mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil mubaarak ho tujhe ai dil

Lyrics: piyaa kii galii laage bhalii roko na sakhii jiyaa bas men nahiin kahaan tuu chalii birahaa jalii dekhe na koii sakhii jaa na kahiin  badariyaa ghir ghir aaye bijuriyaa shor machaaye main to jaauungii main to jaauungii main to jaauungii sanvar ke bindiyaa lagaa ke na jaa tuu ruup sajaa ke main to jaauungii main to jaauungii main to jaauungii chhup gaye taare rain dhalak gaii suunii rahii morii sajiyaa to kyaa hogaa piyaa kii galii threedots  raat hai kaarii barakhaa parat hai bhiige jo nainon kaa kajaraa to kyaa hogaa mast pavan hai chunarii udat hai mahake jo phuulon kaa gajaraa to kyaa hogaa chhodo chhodo chhodo bahiyaan rahaa na jaaye dekho dekho dekho dekho piyaa bulaaye kaise na jaauun kaise na jaauun 2 der se morii raah takat hai ruuthaa jo baankaa sajanaa to kyaa hogaa piyaa kii galii threedots  diivaanii chup ho jaa re piyaa kii dhun mat gaa re main to gaauungii main to gaauungii main to gaauungii jiyaa ko tuu samajhaa re sunegii sab duniyaa re main to gaauungii main to gaauungii main to gaauungii kaahe tuu toke kaahe roke rahaa chaman meraa pyaasaa to kyaa hogaa piyaa kii galii threedots

Title: dariyaa kinaare ik bangalo go porii aii jo aii
Lyrics: la dariya kinare ik bangalo go pori ai jo ai ki jaegi kahan ai pori     are jaegi kahan tere pichhe ye pora ai jo ai la ai jo ai ot     dariya kinare ik bangalo go pori ai jo ai  la main ja ke khidaki pe baithungi solah singar kar ke ki dur se hi lalachaunga kya main tujhako pukar kar ke la rahungi na tere sath are chhod mera hath ki jiya men hai koi bat zaban pe hai koi bat     kaisi tu banati hai ri ai ai la ot dariya kinare threedots  ki aisa hi bangala tere liye bandhun to pae jiya chain la e kare vada to bahon men jhulun tere din rain     sada sath nibhaun kahin aur na jaun ki kabhi hath na ae kabhi dil men samae     kahe satati hai ri ai ai la ot dariya kinare threedots

Title: raamapur kaa vaasii huun main laxman meraa naam
Lyrics: raamapur kaa vaasii huun main laxman meraa naam siidhiisaadii bolii merii siidhaasaadaa kaam o par huun badaa alabelaa sau ke baraabar akelaa raamapur kaa vaasii threedots  rukanaajhukanaa main kyaa jaanuun ai bhaaii ho yaar kii yaarii mujhako yahaan talaq laaii are khel tamaashaa mujhako mat samajho pyaaron ho abhii to paradaa uthane men der hai yaaron  tum dekhoge  2 us roz mujhe main apanii jaan pe jis din khelaa raamapur kaa vaasii threedots  pyaarmohabbat men vaise to dhiilaa huun haan lekin dil kaa main bhii badaa rangiilaa huun are aankhonaankhon hii men dil pe laharaauun o in honthon kii laalii utaar le jaauun  kar duun paagal  2 ho koii gaanv kii gorii yaa koii shaharii lailaa raamapur kaa vaasii threedots  suut pahan kar tum dekho naqalii sapanaa ho merii dhotiikurate pe sochakar hansanaa are khaddar kii chhaayaa men bhaarat jaagaa hai is laathii se angrez dar ke bhaagaa hai ye angrezii faishanvaishan main kyaa jaanuun main huun bhaarat kaa chhailaa raamapur kaa vaasii threedots

Title: saavan ke din aaye sajanavaa aan milo
Lyrics: prii saavan ke din aae sajanavaa aan milo barakhaa jiyaa tarasaae sajanavaa aan milo bhuu duurii sahii na jaae sajaniyaa yaad tumhaarii aae sajaniyaa aan milo aan milo donon birahaa jiyaa tadapaae prii sajanavaa aan milo bhuu sajaniyaa aan milo donon aan milo  prii jaise ghataa men bijurii chamake tiir uthe man men thamthamake tiir uthe man men thamthamake kaise koii dhiir bandhaae dhiir bandhaae birahaa jiyaa tadapaae sajanavaa aan milo bhuu yaad tumhaarii aae sajaniyaa aan milo donon aan milo threedots  bhuu aag lagii hai thandii pavan men chhaayaa dhuaan saa hai ankhiyan men chhaayaa dhuaan saa hai ankhiyan men jale koii tum bin haay tum bin haay birahaa jiyaa tadapaae sajaniyaa aan milo prii duurii sahii na jaae sajanavaa bhuu yaad tumhaarii aae sajaniyaa aan milo prii aan milo donon saavan ke din aae prii sajanavaa aan milo bhuu sajaniyaa aan milo prii aan milo bhuu aan milo threedots

Title: naa jaane kaise pal men badal jaate hain
Lyrics: naa jaane kaise pal men badal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte naa jaane kaise rangon men dhal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte  naa jaane kaise pal men badal jaate hain  judakar kahiin dil jod den tuuten to dil tod jaate hain ye 2 ye phuul banakar hain khilate kahiin kahiin dil men kaante chubhaate hain ye jaane kahaan kis mod pe deke dagaa ye nikal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte  naa jaane kaise pal men badal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte  apanon se yuun bichhade hain jo unhen kyaa bichhadane kaa kuchh gam nahiin  2 magar haarakar kyon dukhon se koii zahar ghol de zindagii men kahiin sab khel hai taqadiir kaa taqadiir se hii badal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte  naa jaane kaise pal men badal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte  rishte kabhii tuute kahaan jo tuut jaaen wo rishte nahiin  2 chhupii hai udaasii ke piichhe hansii dabii dard men bhii kushii hai kahiin sach to hai ye kab pyaar se jiivan hamaare badal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte  naa jaane kaise pal men badal jaate hain ye duniyaa ke badalate rishte

Title: khudaa bhii aasamaan se jab zamiin par dekhataa hogaa
Lyrics: khuda bhi aasamaan se jab zamin par dekhata hoga mere mahabub ko kisane banaya sochata hoga khuda bhi threedots  musavvir khud pareshaan hai ke ye tasvir kisaki hai banogi jisaki tum aisi hasin taqadir kisaki hai kabhi vo jal raha hoga kabhi khush ho raha hoga khuda bhi threedots  zamaane bhar kii mastii ko nigaahon men sametaa hai kalii se jism ko kitane bahaaron ne lapetaa hai nahiin tum saa koii pahale na koii duusaraa hogaa kudaa bhii threedots  farishte bhi yahaan raaton ko aakar ghumate honge jahaan rakhati ho tum paanv jagah vo chumate honge kisike dil pe kya guzari ye vo hi jaanata hoga khuda bhi threedots

Title: jab tum chale jaaoge aaj mujhe tum apanii tasaviir
Lyrics: jab tum chale jaaoge to yaad bahut aaoge tum chale jaaoge yaad bahut aaoge jab tum chale jaaoge to yaad bahut aaoge dil bahalaane kii koii tadabiir dete jaanaa aaj mujhe tum apanii tasaviir dete jaanaa   merii aankhon ne ik kwaab dekhaa hai jaise kaanton men gulaab dekhaa hai kisii chehare pe naqaab dekhaa hai               merii aankhon ne ik kwaab dehkaa hai tum mere is kwaab kii taabiir dete jaanaa aaj mujhe tum    aisaa naa ho main majabuur ho jaauun aake paas tumase duur ho jaauun shiishe kii tarah main chuur ho jaauun aisaa naa ho main majabuur ho jaauun mere haathon se merii taqadiir dete jaanaa aaj mujhe tum   chand log dhokhebaaz hote hain unake dil men kuchh raaz hote hain dillagii ke bhii andaaz hote hain chand log dhokhebaaz hote hain kasmon vaadon kii koii zanjiiir dete jaanaa aaj mujhe tum

Lyrics: main dhuul kaa udataa baadal gaataa laharaataa jaauun manzil merii main na jaanuun phir bhii chalataa jaauun main dhuul kaa udataa threedots  duniyaa mujhako kuchh bhii samajhe sabake main to kaam aauun yaaron kaa main yaar bhii huun pyaar kaa main saath nibhaauun naa farishtaa aadamii huun sabake dil kii roshanii huun 2 main dhuul kaa udataa threedots  nafaraton se duur huun main pyaar merii zindagaanii huun sabhii ke dil kaa pyaaraa kyaa budhaapaa kyaa javaanii mere piichhe ye zamaanaa aasamaan par aashiyaanaa 2 main dhuul kaa udataa threedots

Title: o diiwaano dil sanbhaalo
Lyrics: laa laa laa laa laa laa   3  laa laa laa laa   2 o o o  o diiwaano dil sanbhaalo dil churaane aaii huun main tum na maano aag paanii men lagaane aaii huun main nargisii aankhon se shabanamii gaalon se reshamii baalon se ho o o o o diiwaano dil sanbhaalo dil churaane aaii huun main tum naa maano aag paanii men lagaane aaii huun main   laa laa laa laa   2  paas aake bade hii kuubsuurat bahaanon se main karuungii yuun hii do chaar baaten diiwaanon se aur sharmaauungii loot le jaauungii phir nahiin aauungii o diiwaano dil sanbhaalo dil churaane aaii huun main tum na maano aag paanii men lagaane aaii huun main   ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu ruu   2  dekh lenaa abhii jaaduu chalegaa nigaahon kaa dillagii men kabar tumako na hogii huaa kab kyaa baaton hii baaton men in mulaaqaaton men in hasiin raaton men tum na maano aag paanii men lagaane aaii huun main  ha nargisii aankhon se shabanamii gaalon se reshamii baalon se ho o o o o diiwaano dil sanbhaalo dil churaane aaii huun main aaii huun main

Title: mainne tere liye hii saat rang ke sapane chune
Lyrics: mainne tere liye hii saat rang ke sapane chune sapane suriile sapane kuchh hansate kuchh gam ke terii aankhon ke saae churaae rasiilii yaadon ne o mainne tere liye   chhotii baaten chhotiichhotii baaton kii hai yaaden badii bhuule nahiin biitii huii ek chhotii ghadii janamjanam se aankhen bichhaaiin tere liye in raahon ne o mainne tere liye   bholebhaale bholebhaale dil ko bahalaate rahe tanhaaii men tere khayaalon ko sajaate rahe kabhiikabhii to aavaaz dekar mujhako jagaayaa khvaabon ne o mainne tere liye   ruuthii raaten ruuthii huii raaton ko manaayaa kabhii tere liye miithii subah ko bulaayaa kabhii tere binaa bhii tere liye hii diye jalaaye aahon ne o mainne tere liye

Title: ye to zindagii hai kabhii kushii hai kabhii gam
Lyrics: ye to zindagii hai kabhii kushii hai kabhii gam 2 merii jaan ronaa nahiin daaman bhigonaa nahiin zu zu hogii sahar zu zu o mere sanam ye to zindagii hai threedots  bichhuaa bichhuaa aankhon men jo aansuu bhare hain honthon se apane main inhen chhiin luungaa raahon men jo kaante bichhe hain palakon se apanii main inhen biin luungaa merii priit ye jaan le itanaa sach maan le zu zu haarenge gam zu zu 2 jiitenge ham ye to zindagii hai threedots  motii abhii lutaae hain tumane zaraa muskuraa ke kaliyaan lutaa do jisako kabhii gam naa milaa ho us aadamii kaa tum pataa to bataa do mere yaar kuchh to kaho zaalim ab to hanso zu zu mar jaauungaa zu zu 2 tumhaarii qasam ye to zindagii hai threedots

Title: javaan mohabbat jahaan  pahaluu men aa ke aag lagaa ke
Lyrics: javaan mohabbat jahaanjahaan hai  dilon kii jannat vahaanvahaan hai  pahaluu men aa ke aag lagaa ke jaatii ho jaanetamannaa kahaan sharamaanaa kaisaa ghabaraanaa kaisaa hone do ab to mohabbat javaan  dil aa rahaa hai jaan jaa rahii hai aise men ruk jaa kahaan jaa rahii hai tujhako javaan aarazuu kii qasam baanhon men aajaa simat ke sanam pahaluu men aa ke threedots  ye shok mausam dilakash nazaare aankhen aankhen dabaa ke karate ishaare bahaaren bhii puuchhen chale ho kidhar hamase bhii dam bhar milaa lo nazar pahaluu men aa ke threedots  chalatii havaaen kyuun tham rahii hain nazaren hamiin par kyuun jam rahii hain laharon men hai ye nagamaa ravaan mohabbat javaan hai javaan hai javaan pahaluu men aa ke threedots  javaan mohabbat 3

Title: sun banto baat merii
Lyrics: aanand sun banato baat merii 2        din taa guzar jaaegaa       naiin katanii raat merii 2  asha rahane de ye betaabii         ve chhuteyaa rahane de ye betaabii         main ghar nahiin jaanaa         lai phad ghar dii chaabii 2  aanand o chup kar ke gaddii de vich baijaa 2       ke roii te chaped khaaengii 2  asha terii gaddii vich naiin bainaa         ve jaa terii gaddii vich naiin bainaa         jithe terii yaad aaye         uthe baith ke ro lenaa  aanand main tujhe ghar se bhagaa ke nahiin laayaa       tujhe ghar se bhagaa ke nahiin laayaa       ke aayii hai tuu marjii se 2  asha hat chhod mazaaq channaa         oy hat chhod mazaaq channaa         terii merii naiin nibhanii         mainuun de de talaaq channaa  aanand te apane ghar rahanaa thaa       apane ghar rahanaa thaa       dolii men naa daale       baabul se kahanaa thaa 2  asha mere baabul kaa naam na lenaa 2         tuu chaahe merii jaan kad lai 2  aanand ho ik ruuthe te duujaa manaaye       ik ruuthe te duujaa manaaye       yahii to pyaar hai mitaraan       ek ruuthe  asha tum samajhe main ruuth gayii         ve jaan tuu samajhe main ruuth gayii         umaraan dii yaarii          pal naa vich tuut gayii 2

Title: aayaa hai tere dar pe savaalii

Title: saaraa pyaar tumhaaraa main ne baandh liyaa hai aanchal men
Lyrics: saaraa pyaara tumhaaraa maine baandha liyaa hai aanchala men  2 tere nae ruupa ki nai adaa hama dekhaa karenge pala pala men  2 saaraa pyaara tumhaaraa maine baandha liyaa hai aanchala men   dekha ke terii suurata mita jaatii hai eka hii pala men  jiivana kii hara thakana mere sapanon kii tuma muurata tumako paakara saphala hua hai  meraa ye jiivana   2 sapanon kii tuma muurata ho chamakii merii kismata kii rekhaa ina nayanon ke kaajala men threedots saaraa pyaara tumhaaraa maine baandha liyaa hai aanchala men   hama aura paasa aaenge hame aura paasa koi laaegaa duniyaa ko nazara aaenge hama jaba jaba vo muskaaegaa   2 aai aisii belaa ika pala ko bhii mujhe akelaa  chhoda naa denaa tuma aai aisii belaa paasa hii rahanaa kho mata jaanaa duniyaa kii halachala men saaraa pyaara tumhaaraa maine baandha liyaa hai aanchala men  tere nae ruupa ki nai adaa hama dekhaa karenge pala pala men  saaraa pyaara tumhaaraa maine baandha liyaa hai aanchala men threedots

Title: terii merii yaarii badii puraanii
Lyrics: terii merii haa merii terii terii merii yaarii badii puraanii tuune mujhe pahachaanaa main huun wahii terii diiwaanii ho ho jaanii jaanii jaanii ho jaanii terii merii haa merii terii terii merii yaarii badii puraanii  aankhon ne dekhaa dil machal gae uf ham donon kitane badal gaye kitane mausam aaye nikal gae uf ham donon kitane badal gae tuune mujhe pahachaanaa main huun wahii bhuulii kahaanii ho ho jaanii jaanii jaanii ho jaanii terii merii haa merii terii terii merii yaarii badii puraanii  suurat wo lekin wo nazar nahiin donon pe kyaa guzarii kabar nahiin koii shikwaa kar lo magar nahiin donon pe kyaa guzarii kabar nahiin tuune mujhe pahachaanaa main huun wahii sapanon kii raanii ho ho jaanii jaanii jaanii ho jaanii terii merii merii terii terii merii yaarii badii puraanii

Title: pal bhar men ye kyaa ho gayaa vo main gayii vo man gayaa
Lyrics: pal bhar men ye kya ho gayaa  vo main gayii vo man gayaa  chunarii kahe sun rii pavan  savan laayaa ab ke sajan  din bhar mujhe yuun sataaye  tum bin ab to rahaa nahiin jaae  pal bhar threedots  aashaa kii chhoti si nayyaa  leke chalii puravaiyyaa  dole dole jhumakaa bole  chupake se ye bhed khole  aajaayegaa aajaayegaa pyaar se tum bulaanaa  pal bhar threedots  aaii bahaaren simatake  kahane lagi vo lipatake  chorii chorii chalo gorii  thaame hue banyyaa mori  mil jaayegaa mil jaayegaa tumako vahii divaanaa  pal bhar threedots

Title: aaj bhii suuraj duub gayaa hai
Lyrics: shaam dhale to pankh pakheruu laut ke ghar aa jaae jinake saajan paas naa ho vo asuan diip jalaae  aaj bhii suuraj duub gayaa hai aaj bhii tum nahiin aae man ko jhuuthii aas dilaake dhal gae shaam ke saae aaj bhii suuraj duub gayaa hai aaj bhii tum nahiin aae  palpal saarii rain guzaaruun chamcham niir baahaake har aahat par tumako pukaaruun saajan main ghabaraake kaisekaise sapane mujhako paagal man dikhalaae aaj bhii suuraj duub gayaa hai aaj bhii tum nahiin aae  jabjab aae yaad tumhaarii ik pal chain naa paauun band naa honge nain jharokhe chaahe main mar jaauun baithii rahuungii raah men yuun hii pyaase nain bichaae aaj bhii suuraj duub gayaa hai aaj bhii tum nahiin aae

Title: chalii merii dulhan kii dolii
Lyrics: chalii merii dulhan kii dolii hoy chalii merii dulhan kii dolii saath hai jiivansaathii kyaa karane hain baaraatii chalii merii dulhan threedots  mast pavan ke ye jhonke sang ban ke aaj kahaar chale baabul ke ghar se gorii ko le ke saajan ke dvaar chale sang ye badariyaa bhii ho lii ho lii chalii merii dulhan threedots  duniyaa diivaanii kahatii thii patajhad men phuul nahiin khilate hatate nahiin paravat raste se dharatii aakaash nahiin milate duniyaa hai ye kitanii bholiibhaalii chalii merii dulhan threedots  phuulon ke nahiin aramaanon ke main haar tujhe pahanaauungaa kaliyon se nahiin aashaaon se main terii sej sajaauungaa mere hamaraahii hamajolii hamajolii chalii merii dulhan threedots

Title: patthar se shiishaa takaraa ke
Lyrics: vaqt ke dhaanche men apanii zindagii ko dhaal kar muskuraao maut kii aankhon men aankhen daal kar  patthar se shiishaa takaraa ke vo kahate hain dil tuute na us dhan kii kiimat kuchh bhii nahiin jis dhan ko luteraa luute na  do aankhon ke takaraane se afasaane banate hain lekin kuchh aise fasaane hain jinakaa  kaanton se daaman chhuute na patthar se shiishaa takaraa ke   threedots  aankhon kaa ishaaraa dhokhaa thaa baaton kaa sahaaraa dhokhaa thaa ab gam men dil duube lekin manjhadhaar se naataa tuutee na patthar se shiishaa takaraa ke   threedots  tuufaan men chalate rahanaa hai sholon men jalate rahanaa hai vo manzil kyaa jis manzil pe pairon ke chhaale phuute na patthar se shiishaa takaraa ke   threedots

Title: apanon ko kab he shyaam mukh dikhalaaoge
Lyrics: apanon ko kab he shyaam apanon ko kab he shyaam mukh dikhalaaoge aise men aaye na phir kab aaoge  ekal vekal panth nihaare  2 tumhare daras ko pyaase tamaam ki din se ho gaii shaam aao kanhaaii mere dhaam ki din se ho gaii shaam  ban men aur bastii men dekhaa hai chahun or tab tumase baandhii hai aashaaon kii dor  ab ulajhaao yaa sulajhaao  2 aan padaa hai tumase hii kaam ki din se ho gaii shaam aao kanhaaii mere dhaam ki din se ho gaii shaam  is man men aa jaao nainon ke pat khol saanson men dhadakan men mohan tumhare bol  tumako nahiin to kisako pukaaruun  2 mujhako to aaye ek hii naam ki din se ho gaii shaam aao kanhaaii mere dhaam ki din se ho gaii shaam  aao kanhaaii mere dhaam ki din se ho gaii shaam

Lyrics: aaye lo pyaar ke din aaye mil jaane de apane saaye yuun hii jis tarah mil jaayen jis tarah laharon se laharen jawaan hoke aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re   2  aaye lo pyaar ke din aaye   sang chalen to manzil duur nahiin hai jahaan bhii tuu hai manzil merii wahiin hai   2 ye kaaravaan chalataa rahe chaahe jahaan jalataa rahe  aaye lo pyaar ke din aaye mil jaane de apane saaye yuun hii jis tarah mil jaayen jis tarah laharon se laharen jawaan hoke aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re  aaye lo pyaar ke din aaye   yuun hii rahen nazar men jawaan nazaare is waadii men guunjen giit hamaare   2 chalatii rahe ye zindagii badhatii rahe dil kii lagii  aaye lo pyaar ke din aaye mil jaane de apane saaye yuun hii jis tarah mil jaayen jis tarah laharon se laharen jawaan hoke aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re  aaye lo pyaar ke din aaye

Title: beqaraar dil tuu gaaye jaa khushiyon se bhare vo taraane
Lyrics: beqaraar dil tuu gaaye jaa khushiyon se bhare vo taraane jinhen sun ke duniyaa jhuum uthe aur jhuum uthe dil diivaane beqaraar dil threedots  raag ho koi milan kaa sukh se bharii saragam kaa yugyug ke bandhan kaa saath ho laakhon janam kaa aise hii bahaaren gaatii rahen aur sajate rahe viiraane jinhen sun ke threedots  raat yuun hii tham jaayegii rut ye hansiin musakaaegii bandhii kalii khil jaayegii aur shabanam sharamaayegii pyaar ke vo kaise nagame jo ban jaayen afasaane jinhen sun ke threedots  dard men duubii dhun ho siine men ik sulagan ho saanson men halakii chubhan ho sahamii huii dhadakan ho doharaate rahen bas giit ye aa duniyaa se rahen begaane jinhen sun ke threedots

Lyrics: shyaam terii bansii pukaare raadhaa naam log karen miiraa ko yun hii badanaam  saanvare kii bansii ko bajane se kaam raadhaa kaa bhii shyaam voto miiraa kaa bhii shyaam  1 jamunaa kii laharen bansiibat kii chhaiyaan kisakaa nahiin hai kaho krishhn kanhaiyaa shyaam kaa divaanaa to saaraa brij dhaam log karen mira ko threedots  2 kaun jaane baansuriyaa kisako bulaae jisake man bhaae vo usii ke gun gaae kaun nahiin bansii kii dhun kaa gulaam raadhaa kaa bhii threedots

Lyrics: jaaduugaraa ho jaaduugaraa2 terii biin daa ho gayaa jaaduu hoyaa dil meraa beqaabuu jaaduugaraa ho jaaduugaraa  aisii biin bajaaii tan mere angadaaii ho aisii biin bajaaii tan mere angadaaii   ho gut khul gaii main raavaan puhl gaii haae gut khul gaii main raavaan puhl gaii terii biin daa ho gayaa jaaduu hoyaa dil meraa beqaabuu jaaduugaraa ho ho ho ho jaaduugaraa  hoii raat rangiilii kar gaii mast nashiilii ho  hoii raat rangiilii kar gaii mast nashiilii ho nashaa chadheyaa main dil phadeyaa2 terii biin daa ho gayaa jaaduu hoyaa dil meraa beqaabuu jaaduugaraa haae jaaduugaraa  dole jindadii merii ho gaiiyaan main terii ho dole jindadii merii ho gaiiyaan main terii lae gal muk gaii ke aakh chhuk gaii2  terii biin daa ho gayaa jaaduu hoyaa dil meraa beqaabuu jaaduugaraa hoe jaaduugaraa2 terii biin daa ho gayaa jaaduu hoyaa dil meraa beqaabuu jaaduugaraa haae jaaduugaraa

Title: dil kaa nazaraanaa le o diladaar le
Lyrics: ki  dil kaa nazaraanaa le o diladaar le      ye sachchaa pyaar hai meraa pyaar le      dil kaa nazaraanaa le   threedots  aa  dil kii nishaanii le mere yaar le      ye sachchaa pyaar hai meraa pyaar le      dil kii nishaanii le   threedots  ki  aasamaan to nahiin jo badal jaauungaa      pyaar kaa rang kachchaa nahiin aa  main ne dekhe yahaan pe hazaaron sanam      baat kaa koii sachchaa nahiin ki  haan ham to vo nahiin kar lo yakiin merii vafaaon kaa      ye sachchaa pyaar hai meraa pyaar le aa  ye sachchaa pyaar hai meraa pyaar le   threedots  ki  ham gale milake aao ye vaadaa karen      zindagii bhar na honge judaa aa  ab tumhiin sab kuchh ho hamaare liye      jaanodil se ham tumape fidaa ki  o sanam main huun pavan tuu hai chaman merii muhabbat kaa      ye sachchaa pyaar hai meraa pyaar le aa  ye sachchaa pyaar hai meraa pyaar le ki  dil kaa nazaraanaa le o diladaar le aa  dil kii nishaanii le o diladaar le do  ye sachchaa pyaar hai meraa pyaar le

Title: dil kyaa kare jab kisii se kisii ko pyaar ho jaae
Lyrics: dil kyaa kare jab kisii se kisii ko pyaar ho jaae jaane kahaan kab kisii ko kisii se pyaar ho jaae uunchiiuunchii diivaaron sii is duniyaa kii rasmen na kuchh tere bas men julie na kuchh mere bas men  jaise parvat pe ghataa jhukatii hai  jaise saagar se lahar uthatii hai  aise kisii chahare pe nigaah rukatii hai	 2 ho rok nahiin sakatii nazaron ko duniyaa bhar kii rasmen na kuchh tere bas men julie na kuchh mere bas men dil kyaa kare threedots  aa main terii yaad men sab ko bhulaa duun duniyaa ko terii tasaviir banaa duun meraa bas chale to dil chiir ke dikhaa duun ho daud rahaa hai saath lahuu ke pyaar tere nasnas men na kuchh tere bas men julie na kuchh mere bas men dil kyaa kare threedots

Title: ek pahelii hai tuu haan naar navelii hai tuu
Lyrics: ek pahelii hai tuu haan naar navelii hai tuu haan kuchh kahaa jitanaa main sulajhaauun aur ulajhatii jaae o haan yahaan aao naa ek pahelii hai threedots  diivaanaa hone lagaa huun tar ra ram main isape khone lagaa huun tar ra ram o nainaa tere aise jaise bhuulbhulaiyaa badii alabelii hai tuu naar navelii hai threedots  o ho kab tak piichhaa karoge yah premii aankhon ko miiche tar ra ram chalataa jaae tere piichhe la la la laa ai khinchaa chalaa jaae kachche dhaage se sainyaa khel vo khelii hai tuu naar navelii hai threedots  jaaduu koii hai ki dhokhaa tar ra ram qadamon ko na jaae rokaa jaane kahaan le ke chalii thaam ke bainyaa aate jaaie aaj akelii hai tuu naar navelii hai threedots

Title: jiivan ke har mod pe mil jaaenge hamasafar
Lyrics: ki jiivan ke har mod pe mil jaaenge hamasafar    jo duur tak saath de dhuundhe usii ko nazar 2    tu vo hii hai jisako dhuundhe kab se merii do nigaahen    chalate chalate mil jaaengii tere mere dil kii raahen    itane bade is jahaan men basaaenge ham apanaa chhotaa saa ghar    jiivan ke har mod pethreedots  a laa laa laa laa laa laa laa 4   jiivan ke har mod pethreedots  a tan ke piichhe koii bhaage koii tan kaa hai shikaarii    ho man se man kaa jodanaa to vo hii sachchaa hai pujaarii koras para pa para pa para pa     para pa pa pa pa pa pa pa3 a saare shikaarii yahaan par bhii hain    in par yakiin ab na kar    jiivan ke har mod pethreedots  ki vo laakhon men ek hai yaaro jis ko dil se mainne chaahaa a ho mainne thaamaa teraa daaman mainne teraa pyaar saraahaa koras para pa para pa para pa     para pa pa pa pa pa pa pa3 a  ho ab eka hii raaste pe chalenge ham ki hai ik hamaarii dagar     jiivan ke har mod pe  a  para pa para pa para pa ki mil jaaenge hamasafar a  para pa para pa para pa ki jo duur tak saath de  a  aaa ki dhuundhe usii ko nazar a  aaaa     jiivan ke har mod pe mil jaaenge hamasafar    jo duur tak saath de dhuundhe usii ko nazar  koras la la la la la la la a para pa para pa para pa 2 koras la la la la la la la 2 a aaaaaa

Title: maujon kii dolii chalii re
Lyrics: maujon kii dolii chalii re chalii parades chalii bagiyaa se baabul kii tod ke piyaa le chalaa premakalii re  2 maujon kii dolii chalii re  panaghat tak aaii sakhiyaan saheliyaan 2 rah gaiin piipal kii chhaanv men sab paheliyaan chhuut gaii vo galii re maujon kii dolii chalii re threedots  nadiyaa dhiire baho dulhan sharamaaye 2 man hichakole khaaye ghuunghat naa khul jaaye pavan badii manachalii re maujon kii dolii chalii re threedots

Title: dinbdin vo mere dil se
Lyrics: dinbdin vo mere dil se kyon duur duur hone lage mere aramaan mere sapane kyon chuur chuur hone lage dinbadin vo threedots   phuulon se thii sajiisajii kal kii vo zindagii aayenge kyaa na laut kar guzare vo din kabhii guzare vo din kabhii kyaa uthaa dhuaan mere do jahaan kaise benuur hone lage dinbdin vo threedots   palakon pe hai rukaarukaa ashkon kaa kaaravaan barasii ghataa to jhuumakar trishnaa bujhii kahaan trishnaa bujhii kahaan zindagii tujhe aise bhii sitam kaise manzuur hone lage dinbdin vo threedots

Title: pallo latake re mhaaro pallo latake
Lyrics: aa  pallo latake re mhaaro pallo latake  2     zaraa saa tedho ho jaa baalamaa mhaaro pallo latake        ki gorii  jiyo bhatake re mhaaro jiyo bhatake  2     zaraa saa uun zaraa saa aa     zaraa saa siidho ho jaa zaalimaa mhaaro jiyo bhatake  aa  is khaatir se tere dwaar liyo main ne pallo daar  2     par chhaatii men naa siidho laage mhaare nain kataar     zaraa saa aa zaraa saa uun     zaraa saa tedho ho jaa baalamaa mhaaro pallo latake threedots  ki  muunge jaise laale honth motii jaise gore gaal  2     zaraa saa ghunghataa uupar pher dikhaade mo ko bhii ye maal     zaraa saa uun zaraa saa aa     zaraa saa siidho ho jaa zaalimaa mhaaro jiyo bhatake threedots  aa  main huun jis bastii kii huur nagar gulaabii hai mashahuur  2 ki  gorii hans ke baiyaa daal yahii pe dikhalaa tuu uur      zaraa saa uun zaraa saa aa      zaraa saa siidho ho jaa zaalimaa mhaaro jiyo bhatake threedots

Title: vaastaa hii naa jab rahaa tumase
Lyrics: vaastaa hii naa jab rahaa tumase phir jafaaon kaa kyaa gilaa tumase tum kisii gair kii amaanat ho kaisaa shiqavaagilaa bhalaa tumase  usakii qismat pe rashq aataa hai jisake dil kaa jahaan basaa tumase achchhii qismat hii nahiin thii apanii kaise kah duun buraa bhalaa tumase vaastaa hii naa threedots  dard ke paraae ho baithe kaise maanguun davaa ab tumase vaastaa hii naa threedots

Title: maan ko pukaar kar  mere laal
Lyrics: maan ko pukaarakar puuchhaa bachche ne aayaa kahaan se huun maan bolo to padaa kahaan paayaa gayaa bolo to sunakar savaal yah maan ke stanon se uphan padaa duudh aur bah aayaa aankhon se uttar  mere laal tum to hameshaa the mere man kii abhilaashaa me mere tan kii paribhaashaa me bachapan ke gudiyaaghar me kitnii baar tujhe khelatekhelate todaa todatetodate jodaa paakar khoyaa aur khokar paayaa hai kahaan se bataauun tuu aayaa hai padaa tujhe maine kahaan paayaa hai mere laal  milaa thaa man ko mere jab ik tan upjaa thaa tuu hii ik madhur chhand ban2 ai gaatgaat ang ang mahakaa thaa chhun chananan os bharii subah se suhaag ke sangiit se sab kii manuhaar se indradhanushii sapnon saa aayaa hai kahaan se bataauun tuu aayaa hai padaa tujhe maine kahaan paayaa hai mere laal  tuu haan tuu hii to hai merii amar aashaa subah kaa sapanaa maan aur daadii kii sunaharii kvaahish prem kii parampara kvaab kii kvaahish aur prem kii aashaa se banii terii kayaa hai kahaan se bataauun tuu aayaa hai padaa tujhe maine kahaan paayaa hai mere laal

Title: dekhaa phuulon ko  nahiin main nahiin dekh sakataa
Lyrics: dekhaa phuulon ko kaanton pe sote hue dekhaa tuufaan ko kashtii dubote hue dekh sakataa huun main kuchh bhii hote hue nahiin main nahiin dekh sakataa tujhe rote hue 2  ek din bigadii qismat sanvar jaaegii ye kushii hamase bachakar kidhar jaaegii gam na kar zindagii yuun guzar jaaegii raat jaise guzar gaii sote hue nahiin main nahiin threedots  tuu bhii sun le jo maine sunaa ek din ek maalan ne mujhako kahaa ek din khel kaanton se kaliyaan pirote hue nahiin main nahiin threedots  aankh bhar aaii phir kyon kisii baat par kar bharosaa bahan bhaaii kii baat par haath rakh de yaqiin se mere haath par muskaraa de zaraa yuun hii rote hue nahiin main nahiin threedots

Title: tumhiin rahanumaa ho merii zindagii ke
Lyrics: tumhiin rahanumaa ho merii zindagii ke bigaado mujhe yaa sanvaaro mujhe mujhe sharm kaisii mere saath tum ho kisii raaste se guzaaro mujhe tumhiin rahanumaa ho threedots  tumhaare lie to main mar ke bhii jii luun sharaab to kyaa hai zahar bhii main pii luun lage dagamagaane qadam aaj mere sahaaraa to do ai sahaaron mujhe tumhiin rahanumaa ho threedots  main huun laaj ghar kii tumhaarii aaratii huun magar mahafilon kii shamaa ban gaii huun meraa ab yahaan se palatanaa hai mushqil bhale hii kahiin se pukaaro mujhe tumhiin rahanumaa ho threedots

Title: ai bhaaii zaraa dekhake chalo aage hii nahiin piichhe bhii
Lyrics: e bhaaii zaraa dekhake chalo aage hii nahiin piichhe bhii  daayen hii nahiin baayen bhii uupar hii nahiin niiche bhii  2 e bhaaii  tuu jahaan aayaa hai vo teraa  ghar nahiin gaanv nahiin galii nahiin kuuchaa nahiin rastaa nahiin bastii nahiin  duniyaa hai aur pyaare duniyaa yah ek sarakas hai aur is sarakas men  bade ko bhii chote ko bhii khare ko bhii khote ko bhii mote ko bhii patale ko bhii niiche se uupar ko uupar se niiche ko  baraabar aanaajaanaa padataa hai   aur ring maastar ke kode par  kodaa jo bhuukh hai  kodaa jo paisaa hai kodaa jo qismat hai  tarahtarah naach kar dikhaanaa yahaan padataa hai  baarbaar ronaa aur gaanaa yahaan padataa hai  hiiro se jokar ban jaanaa padataa hai		 2  girane se darataa hai kyon marane se darataa hai kyon thokar tuu jab na khaaegaa paas kisii gam ko na jab tak bulaaegaa zindagii hai chiiz kyaa nahiin jaan paayegaa rotaa huaa aayaa hai chalaa jaaegaa kaisaa hai karishmaa kaisaa khilavaad hai jaanavar aadamii se zyaadaa vafaadaar hai khaataa hai kodaa bhii rahataa hai bhuukhaa bhii phir bhii vo maalik par karataa nahiin vaar hai  aur insaan yah  maal jis kaa khaataa hai pyaar jis se paataa hai giit jis ke gaataa hai usii ke hii siine men bhokataa kataar hai   haan baabuu yah sarakas hai sho tiin ghante kaa pahalaa ghantaa bachapan hai duusaraa javaanii hai tiisaraa budhaapaa hai   aur usake baad  maan nahiin baap nahiin betaa nahiin betii nahiin tuu nahiin main nahiin kuchh bhii nahiin rahataa hai rahataa hai jo kuchh vo  kaaliikaalii kursiyaan hain kaaliikaalii taambuu hai kaaliikaalii gheraa hai binaa chidiyaa kaa baseraa hai na teraa hai na meraa hai

Title: vo vo naa rahe
Lyrics: vo vo naa rahe jinake liye ham the beqaraar ab kis kaa intezaar ajii kaisaa intezaar vo vo naa rahe  honaa thaa jo huaa jo huaa kyaa buraa huaa honaa thaa jo huaa jo huaa kyaa buraa huaa kyaa buraa huaa achchhaa hii huaa tuut gayaa jhuuthaa aitabaar ab kis kaa intezaar ajii kaisaa intezaar vo vo naa rahe  ik phuul tuutane se to ujadaa nahiin chaman ik phuul tuutane se to ujadaa nahiin chaman ujadaa nahiin chaman hain aur bhii gulashan men hasiin phuul beshumaar ab kis kaa intezaar ajii kaisaa intezaar vo vo naa rahe  naakaamayaab ishq se hii zindagii milii naakaamayaab ishq se hii zindagii milii zindagii milii hai zindagii to aur milenge hazaar yaar ab kis kaa intezaar ajii kaisaa intezaar vo vo naa rahe jinake liye ham the beqaraar ab kis kaa intezaar ajii kaisaa intezaar vo vo naa rahe

Title: jaane aaj kyaa huaa aisaa kabhii huaa na thaa
Lyrics: ki jaane aaj kyaa huaa aisaa kabhii huaa na thaa saanson men ghule nashaa jaisaa kabhii ghulaa na thaa tumhiin bolo kyaa karen aisaa hogaa pataa na thaa  aa miithaa miithaa dard saa uthe ang ang men jaage koii aag sii jiine kii umang men havaa se tape badan jaisaa kabhii tapaa na thaa saanson men ghule nashaa jaisaa kabhii ghulaa na thaa tumhiin bolo kyaa karen aisaa hogaa pataa na thaa  ki chhaayaa chhaayaa duur tak rangon kaa gubaar hai aisaa to na thaa jahaan ho na ho ye pyaar hai kvaabon kaa samaa sajaa jaisaa kabhii sajaa na thaa saanson men ghule nashaa jaisaa kabhii ghulaa na thaa tumhiin bolo kyaa karen aisaa hogaa pataa na thaa  jaane aaj kyaa huaa threedots

Title: terii javaanii tapataa mahiinaa ai naazaniinaa
Lyrics: terii javaanii tapataa mahiinaa ai naazaniinaa chhuu le nazar to aae pasiinaa ai naazaniinaa terii javaanii threedots  tere badan men phuulon kii naramii sholon kii garamii har ang teraa tarashaa nagiinaa ai naazaniinaa terii javaanii threedots  aankhon men bijalii zulfon men baadal saanson men halachal tujhasii nahiin koii qaatil hasiinaa ai naazaniinaa terii javaanii threedots  haay ye teraa bal khaa ke chalanaa ithalaa ke chalanaa tere bagair ab mushkil hai jiinaa ai naazaniinaa terii javaanii threedots
