Title: mujhe mat roko mujhe gaane do
Lyrics: mujhe mat roko  2 mujhe gaane do  main zindaa huun ye kyaa kam hai jab tak in haathon men dam hai  dafalii vaale ko  2 dafalii bajaane do mujhe mat roko threedots  naa sonaa naa chaandii naa ghode naa haathii mere giit mere saathii main duulhaa ye baaraatii  mujhe giiton kii dolii  2 sajaane do mujhe mat roko threedots  main bhii huun mushqil men tuu bhii hai mushqil men meraa gam hai tere dil men teraa gam hai mere dil men is dil ko zaraa is paagal ko bahalaane do mujhe mat roko threedots  jo hotaa hai ho jaane do mujhe mat roko threedots

Title: piital kii merii gaagarii
Lyrics: piital kii merii gaagarii diladii se mol mangaaii re  2 paanvon men ghungharuu baandhke ab paniyaa bharan ham jaaii re  2  piital kii merii gaagarii  paayaliyaa bole chhumakchhumak badalii hai chaal haay haay badalii hai chaal javaanii kii   2 chunarii sarake idharudhar besarmii dekh oy hoy besarmii dekh diivaanii kii  2 badanaamii hogii gaanv men chunarii kahiin jo tuune ganvaaii re  2 piital kii merii gaagarii    sansansansan jiyaa kare jab gagarii duube paanii men jab gagarii duube paanii men apanaa mukhadaa nayaa lage ham jabjab o ham jabjab o ham jabjab dekhen paanii men  2 gaalon pe laalii aa gaii haay kisane ye aag lagaaii re  2 piital kii merii gaagarii   ek din aisaa bhii thaa paanii thaa gaanv men paanii thaa gaanv men laate the gagarii bharake taaron kii chhaanv men taaron kii chhaanv men kahaan se paanii laaen kahaan ye pyaas bujhaaen  2 jaljalke bairii dhuup men sanvalaayaa rang duhaaii re  2 piital kii merii gaagarii

Title: piyaa tuu ab to aa jaa sholaa saa man dahake aa ke bujhaa jaa
Lyrics: a piyaa tuuthreedots ab to aa jaa he he he he ra moniikaa threedots a vo aa gayaa threedots dekho threedots dekho threedots vo aa gayaa ra moniikaa moniikaa threedots  a piyaa tu ab to aa jaa sholaa saa man dahake aa ke bujhaa jaa tan kii jvaalaa thandii ho jaa aise gale lagaa jaa ah han hah hahaa ah han hah hahaa ra moniikaa mai darling threedots  pyaase pyaase in mere labon ke liye tere hothon ne hazaar vaade kiye bhulane vaale koii jiye to kaise jiye are haan are haan are haan haa laa laa la laa laa la laa laa la laa laa la laa aa aa piyaa tuu threedots  meri haalat pe rahe jo teraa karam vo baat bhii mujhako qubul hai o sanam jisaki khaatir ruk liye the mere kadam are haan are haan are haan haa laa laa la laa laa la laa laa la laa laa la laa aa aa piyaa tuu threedots

Title: gir gayaa jhumakaa girane do
Lyrics: gir gayaa jhumakaa girane do kho gaii mundarii khone do ud gaii chunarii udane do kaahe ka dar hai baalii umar hai chhodo bahaanaa naa naa  gir gayaa jhumakaa girane do kho gaii mundarii khone do ud gaii chunarii udane do kaahe ka dar hai baalii umar hai are chhodo bahaanaa naa naa  gir gayaa jhumakaa girane do  aajaa naa naa aajaa aajaa aajaa naa naa haan haan naa naa naa naa  poochhen ye sab mujhe aaii kahaan se tuu hasiinaa rang bhare honthon kaa rang bhalaa kisane chhiinaa kahanaa chaman se phuulon ne meraa ruup churaake rakh liyaa uii kyaa huaa chubh gayaa kaantaa chubhane do khul gaya gajaraa khulane do mit gayaa kajaraa mitane do kaahe kaa dar hai baalii umar hai are chhodo bahaanaa uunhuun   gir gayaa jhumakaa  sharabatii aankhon se do ghuunth piine do mujhako reshamii zulfon ke saaye men jiine do mujhako main maan jaatii lekin dhadakate dil ne manaa kar diyaa haay haay kyaa huaa ho gaii mushkil hone do khil gaiin kaliyaan khilane do aa gaye bhanware aane do kaahe kaa dar hai baalii umar hai are chhodo bahaanaa naa naa  gir gayaa jhumakaa  aahistaa aahistaa chhedo dilon kii kahaanii kyaa karuun maane naa merii jawaanii diiwaanii aise diiwaane tum nahiin the ye tumako kya ho gayaa gayaa kyaa huaa chal gayaa jaaduu chalane do are sudhabudha khoii khone do aa gayaa koii aane do kaahe kaa dar hai baalii umar hai chhodo bahaanaa naa naa naa

Title: jisakaa mujhe thaa intazaar
Lyrics: la 	jisakaa mujhe thaa intazaar jisake lie dil thaa beqaraar 	vo ghadii  aa gaii  2 	aaj pyaar men had se guzar jaanaa hai 	maar denaa hai tujhako yaa mar jaanaa hai  	mujhape kyaa guzarii tuu kyaa jaane tuu kyaa samajhe o diivaane 	le ke rahuungii badalaa tujhase aaii huun dil kii aag bujhaane 	o qaatil merii nazaron se bach ke kahaan jaaegaa 	diyaa hai jo mujhako vahii tuu mujhase paaegaa 	vo ghadii  aa gaii  2 	tiir banake jigar men utar jaanaa hai 	maar denaa hai threedots  ki 	jaaduu teraa kisape chalaa hogaa kisii din ye faisalaa 	vo ghadii aaegii 	jaanaan tuune abhii ye kahaan jaanaa hai 	kise jiinaa hai aur kisako mar jaanaa hai 	vo ghadii aaegii threedots  	hogaa teraa aashiq zamaanaa auron kaa dil hogaa teraa nishaanaa 	naaz na kar yuun tiir nazar pe aae hamen bhii tiir chalaanaa 	jo hai khilaadii unhen khel ham dikhaaenge 	apane hii jaal men shikaarii phans jaaenge 	vo ghadii  aaegii  2 	vaqt aane pe tujhako samajhaanaa hai 	maar denaa hai threedots

Title: allaah hii allaah kar pyaare bhaii
Lyrics: allaah hii allaah kar pyaare bhaii allaah hii allaah o thandii aahen  na bhar pyaare  3 allaah hii allaah kar threedots  maulaa hii maulaa  koii aisii raat nahiin hai jisakaa hotaa nahiin saveraa  kaanton kaa dukh  2 jhelane vaale phuulon par bhii haq hai teraa  sukh de chaahe dukh de daataa  2 hans ke jholii bhar pyaare bhaii allaah hii allaah threedots maulaa hii maulaa bol   jo tere dil men khot nahiin to   2 apane kie pe kyon pachhataanaa baant le dard kisii kaa jag men aur yahaan se kyaa le jaanaa  jab tak saaf hai dil kaa shiishaa  2 duniyaa se naa dar pyaare bhaii allaah hii allaah threedots maulaa hii maulaa bol  kyaa jaane kab sapane tuuten ujad jaae kushiyon kaa melaa kab ye qismat chhod de tumako laa ke doraahon pe akelaa  kitane mod abhii hain baakii  2 kisako hai ye kabar pyaare bhaii allaah hii allaah threedots maulaa hii maulaa bol  kabhiikabhii is duniyaa men yaaron aise farishte bhii aate hain kisii ko apanaa sab kuchh de kar khaalii haath chale jaate hain  jaise sukh kii chhaayaa dekar  2 baadal jaae bikhar pyaare bhaii allaah hii allaah threedots maulaa hii maulaa bol

Lyrics: ki 	kah duun tumhen aa 	haan ki 	yaa chup rahuun aa 	naa ki 	dil men mere aaj kyaa hai aa 	kyaa hai ki 	kah duun tumhen yaa chup rahuun 	dil men mere aaj kyaa hai 	jo bolo to jaanuun guruu tumako maanuun 	chalo ye bhii vaadaa hai aa 	achchhaa ki 	kah duun tumhen threedots  aa 	sochaa hai tumane ki chalate hii jaaen 	taaron se aage koii duniyaa basaaen 	thiik hai ki 	anhaan aa 	to tum bataao ki 	bataauun aa 	haan ki 	sochaa ye hai ki tumhen rastaa bhulaaen 	suunii jagah pe kahiin chheden sataaen aa 	haay re naa naa 	ye naa karanaa 	are nahiin re nahiin re nahiin re nahiin re nahiin nahiin  ki 	kah duun tumhen threedots  aa 	sochaa hai tumane ki kuchh gunagunaaen 	mastii men jhuumen zaraa dhuumen machaaen 	ab thiik hai ki 	u huun aa 	to tum bataao naa ki 	bataauun aa 	haan ki 	sochaa ye hai ki tumhen nazadiik laaen 	phuulon se honthon kii laalii churaaen aa 	haay re naa naa 2 	ye naa karanaa 	are nahiin re nahiin re nahiin re nahiin re nahiin nahiin ki 	kah duun tumhen threedots

Title: puravaa suhaanii aayii re
Lyrics: m0k0 kahiin na aisii subah dekhii la aaaa jaise baalak kii muskaan m0k0 yaa phir duur kahiin gaae la halkiisii muralii kii taan m0k0 gurabaanii gurudwaare men la to masjid se uthatii aazaan m0k0 la aatmaa aur paramaatmaa milen jahaan yahii hai wo sthaan  ko dholii dhol bajaanaa taal se taal milaanaa     dholii dholaa dholii dholaa dholii dhol bajaanaa     taathaa thaiyyaa taktak thaiyyaa taal se taal milaanaa  la puravaa suhaanii aaii re puravaa 2     rituon kii raanii aaii re puravaa     mere ruke nahiin paanv naach utthaa saaraa gaanv     priit pe jawaanii chhaaii re puravaa     puravaa suhaanii aaii re puravaa  m0k0 mausam kaa musaafir khadaa raste men la laa laa laa laalaa lalaa lalaa m0k0 mausam kaa musaafir khadaa raste men la usake haathon sab kuchh lutaa saste men la chhotii sii umariyaa hai ma0ka0 lambii sii dagariyaa re la jiivan hai parachhaanii re puravaa     puravaa suhaanii aaii re puravaa ko hoe dholii dhol bajaanaa bajaanaa     hoe taal se taal milaanaa milaanaa  la kar le kar bhii le pyaar kii puujaa     naa naa naa naanaa nanaa nanaa la kar le kar bhii le pyaar kii puujaa     pyaar ke rang pe chadhe na rang duujaa     chaahe koii sapanaa hai mere liye apanaa hai     baat merii ban aaii re     puravaa suhaanii aaii re puravaa  man ho miiraa sii diiwaanii re naache mastaanii 2 la honthon pe hai saragam to aankhon men paanii     ghungharuu diiwaane hue man rishte puraane hue la giit men kahaanii gaaii re puravaa     puravaa suhaanii aaii re puravaa     rituon kii raanii aaii re puravaa     mere ruke nahiin paanv naach uthaa saaraa gaanv     priit pe jawaanii chaaii re puravaa     puravaa suhaanii aaii re puravaa ko hoe dholii dhol bajaanaa bajaanaa     hoe taal se taal milaanaa milaanaa     dholii dhol bajaanaa taal se taal milaanaa 2 la o threedots

Title: main tumase muhabbat karatii huun  i am sorry
Lyrics: main tumase muhabbat karatii huun par shaadii ke naam se daratii huun rahuungi main kunwaarii umr saarii   shaadii se ye pyaar kaa mazaa jaataa rahataa hai milakar intazaar kaa mazaa jaataa rahataa hai vaapas le lo ye anguuthii lagatii hai ye to jhuuthii dil lenaa denaa achchhaa ho pyaar hamaaraa hai sachchaa bade maze kii hai ye beqaraarii  main to huun mahabuubaa main kyuun banuu dulhan ham men tum men dostii ham kyuun bane dushman main sapanon kii raanii huun main koii diiwaanii huun haay aisii mast bahaaron men qaid rahuun diiwaron men mujhe hai ye aazaadii apanii pyaarii

Lyrics: ye mausam aayaa hai kitane saalon men aajaa kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men aajaa ki kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men  kaliyon ke chehare nikhar gaye hain phuulon ke sehare bikhare gaye hain sab kushbuu bas gaii hai in reshamii shabanamii baalon men  aajaa kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men aajaa ki kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men  aankhon kaa milanaa kuub rahaa hai ye dil diiwaanaa duub rahaa hai matawaale nainon ke in nargisii ujaalon men  aajaa kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men aajaa ki kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men  kahanaa nahiin thaa kahanaa padaa hai pyaar kaa jaaduu aisaa ladaa hai meraa dil naa aa jaaye in pyaar kii madabharii chaalon men  aajaa kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men aajaa ki kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men  ye mausam aayaa hai kitane saalon men aajaa kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men aajaa ki kho jaayen kwaabon kyaalon men

Lyrics: uu 	kuchh bhii kahegaa to abhii nahiin jaauungii ho 	kahiin nahiin jaauungii kabhii nahiin jaauungii ho  	chandaa maamaa se pyaaraa meraa maamaa 	o chandaa maamaa se pyaaraa meraa maamaa 	merii aankhon kaa taaraa meraa maamaa 	meraa maamaa  	aao aaj banenge mil ke ham donon hamajolii 2 	tum dhuundho main  chhupchhup jaauun  2 khelen aankhmichaulii 	kahanaa maanegaaa meraa maamaa 	o chandaa maamaa se threedots  	naa to maan kii milii hai mamataa  naa baapuu kaa saayaa  2 	terii god men aa baithii huun 	meraa jiivan sahaaraa meraa maamaa 	meraa maamaa 	o chandaa maamaa se threedots  ra 	ek din duulhe raajaa ke sang kahaar bulaauun 	apane haathon se hii dolii men tujhe bithaauun 	ek din mujhako chhod ke tuu aisii duniyaa men jaae 	har ek ladakii jahaan se vaapas laut ke phir na aae 	rotaa rahegaa bechaaraa teraa maamaa uu 	o chandaa maamaa se threedots

Title: hamen yaad kabhii tum kar lenaa
Lyrics: hamen yaad kabhii tum kar lenaa jab rotaa huaa saawan aae ho bahaar aur raah men koii phuul haay murajhaae hamen yaad kabhii tum threedots  viiraan safar men jiivan ke kab tak yuun akele chalate piyaa lekar ham ye aakir tere binaa haay aas kaa bujhataa saa diyaa hamen yaad kabhii tum threedots  dete hain duaa phir bhii tumako kushiyon kii umar lag jaae tumhen jo bhii tumako gam hon saare badale men yahaan mil jaaen hamen hamen yaad kabhii tum threedots

Title: yaarii hai iimaan meraa yaar merii zindagii
Lyrics: gar kudaa mujhase kahe   threedots gar kudaa mujhase kahe kuchh maang ai bande mere main ye maanguun   threedots main ye maanguun mahafilon ke daur yuun chalate rahen hamapyaalaa ho hamanavaalaa ho hamasafar hamaraaz hon taaqayaamat   threedots taaqayaamat jo chiraagon kii tarah jalate rahen  yaarii hai iimaan meraa yaar merii zindagii are yaarii hai iimaan meraa yaar merii zindagii pyaar ho bandon se ye o o pyaar ho bandon se ye sab se badii hai bandagii yaarii hai yaarii hai iimaan meraa yaar merii zindagii  saazedil chhedo jahaan men e e e saazedil chhedo jahaan men pyaar kii guunje sadaa ei saazedil chhedo jahaan men pyaar kii guunje sadaa jin dilon men pyaar hai unape bahaaren hon fidaa pyaar leke nuur aayaa   threedots pyaar leke nuur aayaa pyaar leke saadagii yaarii hai yaarii hai iimaan meraa yaar merii zindagii  are jaan bhii jaae agar jaan bhii jaae agar yaarii men yaaron gam nahiin 2 apane hote yaar ho gamagiin matalab ham nahiin ham jahaan hain us jagah   threedots ham jahaan hain us jagah jhuumegii naachegii kushii yaarii hai yaarii hai iimaan meraa yaar merii zindagii  gulegulazaar kyon bezaar nazar aataa hai 2 chashmebad kaa shikaar yaar nazar aataa hai chhupaa na hamase zaraa haaledil sunaa de tuu terii hansii kii qiimat kyaa hai ye bataa de tuu 2  kahe to aasamaan se chaandtaare le aauun hasiin javaan aur dilakash nazaare le aauun oe oe qurbaan teraa mamanuun huun tuune nibhaayaa yaaraanaa terii hansii hai aaj sabase badaa nazaraanaa 2 yaar ke hanaste hii   threedots yaar ke hansate hii mahafil men javaanii aa gaii aa gaii yaarii hai iimaan meraa   threedots 3  lo sher qurbaan qurbaan

Title: haal kyaa hai dilon kaa na puuchho sanam
Lyrics: haal kyaa hai dilon kaa na puuchho sanam aap kaa muskuraanaa gazab dhaa gayaa ik to mahafil tumhaarii hasiin kam na thii us pe meraa taraanaa gazab dhaa gayaa haal kyaa hai dilon kaa   threedots  ab to laharaayaa mastii bharii chhaanv men baandho lo chaahe ghungharuu mere paanv men main bahakataa nahiin thaa magar kyaa karuun aaj mausam suhaanaa gazab dhaa gayaa haal kyaa hai dilon kaa   threedots  har nazar uth rahii hai tumhaarii taraf aur tumhaarii nazar hai hamaarii taraf aankh uthaanaa tumhaaraa to phir thiik thaa aankh uthaakar jhukaanaa gazab dhaa gayaa haal kyaa hai dilon kaa   threedots  mast aankhon kaa jaaduu jo shaamil huaa meraa gaanaa bhii sunane ke qaabil huaa jisako dekho vahii aaj behos hai aaj to main diivaanaa gazab dhaa gayaa haal kyaa hai dilon kaa   threedots

Title: zulmositam ko bhii ham to adaa samajhe
Lyrics: zulmositam ko bhii ham to adaa samajhe par merii chaahat ko jaane vo kyaa samajhe kuchh to bhalaa jaanaa mujhako buraa samajhe par merii chaahat ko threedots  laayaa thaa dil ko nazar karane qurabaan ye jaanojigar karane unake binaa meraa haal hai kyaa aayaa thaa unako kabar karane 2 taal diyaa lekin mujhako bhalaa samajhe zulmositam ko threedots  haay dil mere bure hain din tere ki maar hii na daale kisii kii bedilii unakaa muskaraanaa galii men aanaajaanaa hamaaraa lut jaanaa hamaarii galatii jaan ke dushman ko jaanevafaa samajhe zulmositam ko threedots  kyaa hai mohabbat pyaar hai kyaa koii unhen batalaae zaraa husn gazab kaa husn sahii jaan to le diladaar hai kyaa 2 baat to karate hain baat binaa samajhe zulmositam ko threedots

Title: nav kalpanaa nav ruup se rachanaa rachii jab naar kii
Lyrics: nav kalpanaa nav ruup se rachanaa rachii jab naar ki  kalaa kii daasii kaaminii solah kalaa paripuurn hai kalaa kii daasii kaaminii solah kalaa paripuurn hai vishva men vish kanyaa ke ye naam se prasidh hai naam se prasidh hai bhaav bhaav anubhaav se sevaa karen bhagavaan kii nav kalpanaa threedots  chandramaa sau mukh salono shyaam varna kesh hai chandramaa sau mukh salono shyaam varna kesh hai nainon se mriganayanii hai vaanii madhur uchhaaratii vaanii madhur uchhaaratii nritya gaan trigadhaan puujaa inakaa dharam hai aaratii nav kalpanaa threedots  nii rii gaa gaa rii gaa nii rii paa maa gaa saa nii paa maa gaa rii maa gaa rii saa dev lok kii devadaasii sundar ruup lubhaavanii dev lok kii devadaasii sundar ruup lubhaavanii solah shingaar suhaavanii solah shingaar suhaavanii shankh damaruu jhaanjh jhaalar nuupur dhvanii manamohanii nav kalpanaa nav ruup se rachanaa rachii jab naar kii nav kalpanaa threedots

Title: khush raho ahalevatan ham to safar karate hain
Lyrics: darodiivaar pe hasaratenazar karate hain khush raho ahalevatan ham to safar karate hain  ham bhii aaraam uthaa sakate the ghar par rahakar hamako bhii paalaa thaa maanbaap ne dukh sahsahakar vaqteruksat unhen itanaa bhii na aaye kahakar god men aansuu jo tapake kabhii ruk se bahakar sifr unako hii samajhanaa dil ke bahalaane ko  apanii qismat men azal se yahii gam rakhaa thaa dadr rakhaa thaa   kisako paravaah thii aur kisamen ye dam rakhaa thaa hamane jab vaadiiequbrat men qadam rakhaa thaa duur tak yaadevatan aayii thii samajhaane ko  dil fidaa karate hain qubaarn jigar karate hain paas jo kuchh hai vo maataa kii nazar karate hain  khush raho ahalevatan ham to safar karate hain jaake aabaad karenge kisii viiraane ko  naujavaanon yahii maukaa hai utho khul khelo khidamateqaum men jo aaye balaa sab jhelo desh aazaad ho kyaa gam hai javaanii de do phir milegii na ye maataa kii duaayen le lo dekhen kaun aataa hai ye farz bajaanaane ko

Lyrics: mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2 ho mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2 haay haay haay maarungii aankh to niil pad jaayegaa main maarungii aankh to niil pad jaayegaa balam zaraa balam zaraa hat ke hat ke hat ke mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2 ho mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2  sutalii se patalii hai morii kamariyaa hay raam sutalii se patalii hai morii kamariyaa kamariyaa se baandhii hai maine gagariyaa gagariyaa naa chhalake zaraa hat ke hat ke hat ke  mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2 ho mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2  saukiin kahate hain chhappanchhurii hai saukiin kahate hain kahate hain kahate hain  saukiin kahate hain chhappanchhurii hai dil kii to achchhii hai aadat burii hai  2 aadii na honaa zaraa hat ke hat ke hat ke  mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2 ho mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2  baadaamii rang pe kuratii saraab kii haay haay baadaamii rang pe kuratii saraab kii sainyaan ne dekho merii aadat karaab kii mose naa lagaanaa zaraa hat ke hat ke hat ke  mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2 hay re maarungii aankh to niil pad jaayegaa main maarungii aankh to niil pad jaayegaa balam zaraa balam zaraa hat ke hat ke hat ke mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2 mere ishq men laakhon latake balam zaraa hat ke 2

Lyrics: o o o  yaaraa o yaaraa yaaraa o yaaraa ishq ne maaraa ho gayaa main to tujh men tamaam de rahe sab mujhe teraa naam main benaam ho gayaa 2  terii adaaen teraa hii jalwaa kaisii ye kaliyaan kaisii bahaar ab dil to meraa teraa nagar hai ye merii ankhiyaan hain tere dwaar ab main kahaan huun sab tuu hii tuu hai meraa man meraa tan meraa naam main benaam ho gayaa 2  kaajal dhul jaaye aansuu se aur rang dhule paanii se rang chadhaayaa mainne milakar us dilabarjaanii se suurat merii ruup hai usakaa ban gayaa ban gayaa meraa kaam main benaam ho gayaa 2

Title: bikaaner kii chunarii odhii
Film: praan jaaye par vachan na jaaye
Lyrics: biikaaner kii chunarii odhii  lahangaa pahanaa jayapur kaa haath men chuudii faizaabaadii aur merath kaa gajaraa ho gajaraa daal ke tere dil par main naachuun ho gajaraa daal ke tere dil par main naachuun 2  cholii merii ambaalevaalii jhilamil jisamen resham kii jaalii 2 jaalii se tan chamake chamakegaa  mukhadaa meraa damake are damakegaa baat bareliivaalaa daalaa donon  aankhon men kajaraa ho kajaraa daal ke tere dil par main naachuun ho kajaraa daal ke tere dil par main naachuun  chhalake chhalake saavar  ye aankhon ke dube jinamen iimaan laakhon ke 2 aise na dil machale machalenge  kaahe ko naa tadape tadapenge chaal javaanii kii mastaanii  dharam karam ye nakharaa ho nakharaa daal ke tere dil par main naachuun ho nakharaa daal ke tere dil par main naachuun

Title: mile kahiin do ajanabii
Lyrics: mile kahiin do ajanabii ho gaii unamen dostii phir sunaa doston men ho gaii dushmanii   koii unamen bewafaa hogaa  2 koii dhokhaa ho gayaa hogaa sunaa hai fasaane ko pataa kyaa zamaane ko kisane kii berukhii mile kahiin threedots   ye ishaaraa kisakii jaanib hai  2 dil hamaaraa jisakii jaanib hai wo bhii ise jaanaa naa hamen pahachaanaa naa baat kyaa logon kii mile kahiin threedots   kisaliye ye aag se darataa hai  2 bachake sholon se guzarataa hai kaho dil diiwaane ko tere aashiyaane ko phuunkegii chaandanii mile kahiin threedots

Title: kaalii palak terii gorii khulane lagii hai thodiithodii
Lyrics: he he uun huun ki 	kaalii palak terii gorii khulane lagii hai thodiithodii 	ek choranii ek chor ke ghar karane chalii hai chorii la 	kaalii palak piyaa morii khulane lagii hai thodiithodii 	ek choranii ek chor ke ghar karane chalii hai chorii ho chorii 	kaalii palak piyaa threedots  ki 	aaegii baandh ke paayal tuu honth dabaae badan ko churaae 	naazuk qamar se lagaae adaa kii kataarii zaalimaan 	pheregii dhiiredhiire tuu mere gale par ye baanhon ke kanzar 	jaaegii dil meraa lekar samajh ke anaadii baalamaa 	roz raat ko yuun hii baandhegii laton kii dorii ho dorii 	kaalii palak terii threedots  la 	na to main dor se baandhuun naa jaal bichhaauun na tiir chalaauun 	naazuk qamar se lagaauun chhurii na kataarii saajanaa 	o sajanaa main to teraa dil luungii tujhase chhupaa ke nazar ko bachaa ke 	are yuun hii zaraa muskaraa ke kahuungii anaadii saajanaa ho saajanaa 	roz raat ko tere ghar hogii terii chorii ho chorii 	kaalii palak terii threedots  ki 	achchhii huii merii chorii ek dil khoyaa ek dil paayaa 	aise koii paas aayaa ki aa gayaa lutane kaa mazaa 	hans ke lipat gae donon bas gae donon huaa jab vaadaa pyaar kaa do 	roz raat ko milenge chandaa aur chakorii o chakorii ki 	kaalii palak terii threedots

Lyrics: niile ambar ke tale 	do yahan saathi mile 	jhalake jhalake aramaan milaake lekar basane ghar chale 	niile ambar ke tale 	 	har ghadi bin raina 	chain ab ae naa 	man kahe mera saathi ab kahin jae na 	ye milan men koi ab sham na dhale 	niile ambar ke tale threedots 	 	zindagi men aise din kabhii ate hain 	rasmon ke bandhan men miit bandh jaate hain 	phir majake uthe hain tan ke phuul khile 	niile ambar ke tale threedots

Title: kyaa huaa teraa vaadaa vo qasam vo iraadaa
Lyrics: kyaa huaa teraa vaadaa vo qasam vo iraadaa 2 bhuulegaa dil jis din tumhen vo din jindagii kaa aakhirii din hogaa kyaa huaa teraa vaadaa vo qasam vo iraadaa  yaad hai mujhako tuune kahaa thaa tumase nahiin ruthenge kabhii phir is tarah se aaja mile hain kaise bhalaa chhuutenge kabhii terii baahon men biite har shaam ke tujhe kuchh bhii yaad nahiin kyaa huaa threedots  o kahane vaale mujhako farebii kaun farebii hai ye bataa ho jisane gam liyaa pyaar kii khaatir yaa jisane pyaar ko bech diyaa nashaa daulat kaa aisaa bhii kyaa bevafaa ye tujhe yaad nahiin kyaa huaa threedots  bhuulegaa dil jis din tumhen vo din jindagii kaa aakhirii din hogaa kyaa huaa teraa vaadaa vo kasam vo iraadaa

Title: apanaa desh videsh ke aage haath na phailaae
Lyrics: apanaa desh videsh ke aage haath na phailaae aaj jahaan hai ret kal vahaan khet muskaraae  aisaa ki gaanvgaanv men gangaa laharaae apanaa desh videsh threedots  mehanat kaa hii naam hai vo jisako qismat kahate hain do haathon kaa khel hai vo jisako daulat kahate hain ham jahaan pasiinaa bahaaenge motii vahaan ugaaenge nadiyaan baandh nahar nikaalen kushahaalii chhaae apanaa desh videsh threedots  desh kii har chiiz hai apanii kyon apane haathon se toden isako bachaanaa farz hai apanaa kyon sarakaar par chhoden apanaa bhaarat saaraa hamen praantpraant hai pyaaraa aapas ke hii in dangon men desh na jal jaae apanaa desh videsh threedots

Title: matalab jo samajhe mere sandesh kaa
Lyrics: haa threedots  badaa hii khuubasuurat is jagah ka har nazaaraa hai  hai magar phir bhi kisii ka naam lekar dil pukaaraa hai   matalab jo samajhe mere sandesh ka matalab jo samajhe  matalab jo samajhe mere sandesh ka  is desh men hai koi kya mere desh ka  matalab samajhe jo mere sandesh ka   ye chehare ye aankhen  2  badale libaas rang ruup to vohii hai  yaadon ki chhaaon dhuup to vohii hai  2 kya phaayadaa kya phaayadaa phir is bheshh ka  is desh men hai koi kya mere desh ka  matalab samajhe jo mere sandesh ka  matalab jo samajhe threedots  vo maatii vo pani  2  aa mil ke phuulon kii baaten karenge  saavan ke jhuulon ki baaten karenge    2 mil ke sahen mil ke sahen ye gam paradesh ka is desh men hai koi kya mere desh ka  matalab samajhe jo mere sandesh ka  matalab jo samajhe threedots

Title: prem kaa rog badaa buraa
Lyrics: prem kaa rog badaa buraa maakaa nakaa ga baaii maakaa nakaa aisaa mere ko merii maan ne kahaa maakaa nakaa nakaa baaii maakaa nakaa prem kaa rog badaa buraa   ro ro ka kate ye din kahaan kal raaton ko rahuungii  nanhe se dil men baabaa kaise main ye dukh sahuungii kachchii kalii huun rang dekho zaraa dil dil dil bhii hai naazuk meraa prem kaa rog badaa buraa   phir bhii karuun main kyaa ki tuu badaa pyaaraa mohe laage par kaise teraa meraa milan ho tuu hii bataade abhii abhii abhii haath chhodo meraa dekho dekho dekho koii hai tiisaraa prem kaa rog badaa buraa

Title: akele hii akele chalaa hai kahaan
Lyrics: akele hii akele chalaa hai kahaan kahegaa kyaa kahegaa ye mausam javaan naa jaa naa jaa ho aajaa aajaa o raahii alabele hamasafar bhii koii saath lele  duur parvat pe kyuun ek badalii jhukii kyuun pavan chalatechalate chaman men rukii ek tanahaa kalii se ye kyuun kah gaii akele hii akele threedots  thandiithandii havaaon kii baat maan le kyuun nazaare tujhe roke ye raaz jaan le kaun detaa aavaaz pahachaan le akele hii akele threedots

Title: ghodii pe ho ke savaar chalaa hai duulhaa yaar
Lyrics: ghodii pe ho ke savaar chalaa hai duulhaa yaar kamariyaa men baandhe talavaar akadataa hai chhailaa milii hai aisii lailaa ke jodii hai nahale pe dahalaa 2 ghodii pe ho ke threedots  kal tak bechaaraa ham saa kanvaaraa phirataa thaa galiigalii maaraamaaraa dekhii ek chhokarii phuulon kii tokarii bolaa dil thaam ke main haaraahaaraa yaar ko mubaarak ho muhabbat kii baazii 2 miyaan biivii raazii to kyaa karegaa kaazii 2 sadaa phuulephale donon kaa pyaar ghodii pe ho ke threedots  dulhan kii dhun hai kaisaa magan hai hogaa milan dekho abhiiabhii shaadii kii mastii lagatii hai sastii padatii hai mahangii bhii kabhiikabhii  ko  haanhaan padatii hai mahangii bhii kabhiikabhii  ye baat mat bhuulanaa pyaar kii bahaaren 2 nanhenmunnon kii lagaa dengii qataaren tab utaregaa jaa ke kumaar  ghodii pe ho ke threedots

Title: dil shaad thaa ke phuul  mujhe terii mohabbat kaa
Lyrics: ra 	dil shaad thaa ke phuul khilenge bahaar men 	maaraa gayaa gariib isii aitabaar men  la 	mujhe terii mohabbat kaa sahaaraa mil gayaa hotaa 2 	agar tuufaan nahiin aataa kinaaraa mil gayaa hotaa ra 	mujhe terii mohabbat threedots  la 	na thaa manzuur qismat ko na thii marzii bahaaron kii 	 nahiin to is gulistaan men  2 kamii thii kyaa nazaaron kii 	merii nazaron ko bhii koii nazaaraa mil gayaa hotaa 	agar tuufaan nahiin threedots ra 	mujhe terii mohabbat threedots  ra 	kushii se apanii aankhon ko main ashqon se bhigo letaa 	 mere badale tuu hans letii  2 tere badale main ro letaa 	mujhe ai kaash teraa dard saaraa mil gayaa hotaa 	agar tuufaan nahiin threedots la 	mujhe terii mohabbat threedots  	milii hai chaandanii jinako ye unakii apanii qismat hai 	 mujhe apane muqaddar se  2 faqat itanii shikaayat hai 	mujhe tuutaa huaa koii sitaaraa mil gayaa hotaa 	agar tuufaan nahiin threedots ra 	mujhe terii mohabbat threedots

Title: nigaahen churaao na daaman chhudaao
Lyrics: bhu nigaahen churaao na daaman chhudaao      mere saath aao mere saath aao  mii mohabbat kii duniyaa basaao to aauun      vafaa ko vafaa kar dikhaao to aauun      vo chaandii kaa daravaa sone kii diivaar      bedard beruuh daulat kii duniyaa      use chhodakar tum jo aao to aauun  bhu vo sone kii diivaar main tod aayaa      vo daulat kii duniyaa main chhod aayaa      basaaenge duniyaa naii ab to aao      bichhaa diin hain nazaren qadam to badhaao      mere saath aao mere saath aao

Title: main dhuundhataa huun jinako raaton ko khayaalon men
Lyrics: main dhuundhataa huun jinako raaton ko khayaalon men vo mujhako mil sake na subah ke ujaale men  suhaanii pyaar kii baaten mere diladaar kii baaten kabhii iqaraar kii baaten kabhii inakaar kii baaten ek dard saa chhupaa hai dil ke hasiin chhaalon men main dhuundhataa huunthreedots  jo yuun barabaad hote hain vo kab aabaad hote hain dilenaashaad hote hain vo ek fariyaad hote hain ulajhaa huaa huun kabase gam ke ajiib jaalon men main dhuundhataa huunthreedots

Title: do lafzon kii hai dil kii kahaanii
Lyrics: do lafzon kii hai dil kii kahaanii yaa hai mohabbat yaa hai javaanii  dil kii baaton kaa matalab na puuchho kuchh aur hamase bas ab na puuchho jisake liye hai duniyaa diivaanii yaa hai mohabbat yaa hai hai javaanii  is zindagii ke din kitane kam hai kitane hai kushiyaan aur kitane gam hain lag jaa gale se rut hai suhaanii yaa hai mohabbat yaa hai javaanii  ye kashtii vaalaa kyaa gaa rahaa hai koii ise bhii yaad aa rahaa hai jisake liye hai duniyaa diivaanii yaa hai mohabbat yaa hai javaanii  do lafzon kii hai dil kii kahaanii yaa hai mohabbat yaa hai javaanii

Title: kyaa ye zindagii hai
Singer: lata mangeshkar s d burman  chorus
Lyrics: comments sdb series lataa kyaa ye zindagii hai kaisii bebasii hai bolo kyuun khade ho gumasum 2   lataa sadiyon se yuun hii sar pe dukhataa bojh uthaaye in parabaton pe ham chal rahe hain bhuukhe nange pyaase laao haath apane saath laao haath apane saath chalke dekho do kadam tum kyaa ye zindagii hai threedots  kitanii hai duurii ham pade piiche tum badhe aage tumhen chhuu naa paayen tumhen chhuu bhii len to thukaraaye jaayen apanaa mel nahiin khel apanaa mel nahiin khel o baabuu kahaan ham kahaan tum kyaa ye zindagii hai threedots   ham ne ye maanaa ham to bure hain hamane kii buraaii tum to bhale ho tumane hamarii kii hai kyaa bhalaaii samajhaao sikhalaao samajhaao sikhalaao gale se lagaake hamen tum kyaa ye zindagii hai threedots

Title: aap yahaan aaye kisaliye aapane bulaayaa isaliye
Lyrics: a   aap yahaan aaye kisaliye k   aapane bulaayaa isaliye a   aaye hain to kaam bhii bataaiye k   haan haan haan pahale zaraa aap muskuraaiye a   muskuraane kii na koi baat hai k   ajii dekhiye to kyaa hasin raat hai a   oh kaam to bataaiye bataaiye k   na na na pahale zaraa aap muskuraaiye a   aap yahaan aaye kisaliye  k   tere binaa haay a   kyaa k   nind nahiin aatii hai a   achchhaa k   yaad terii aakar a   aahaa k   roz tadapaatii hai a   sachamuch k   apanaa banaalo a   a k   haath zaraa thaam lo a   vaah vaah vaah k   baar baar dekho naa a   kyaa k   dil se hii kaam lo a   are baabaa kaam to bataaiye k   kaam sidhaa saadhaa hai a   achchha k   aji lenaa ek vaadaa hai a   kyaa k   aajaa aajaa shaadii kaa iraadaa hai shaadii kaa iraadaa hai a   shaadii aur tumase k   haan haan shaadii kaa iraadaa hai a   shaadii naa baabaa naa k   magar kyon a   shaadii to barabaadii hai k   kyaa kahatii ho a   nahiin jaatii hai aazaadii hai k   nahiin nahiin monaa suno to threedots a   taa taa baai baai threedots k   oh ho aap yahaan aaye kisaliye aap ne bulaayaa isaliye aaye hain to kaam bhii bataaiye pahale zaraa aap muskuraaiye

Title: ai shahar ke logo sun lo ham pyaar se baaz na aayenge
Lyrics: ai shahar ke logo sun lo ai shahar ke logo sun lo ham pyaar se baaz na aayenge tum jitane zakm lagaaoge ham utane jashn manaayenge shahar ke logo sun lo ham pyaar se baaz na aayenge sun lo ai shahar ke logo  tum laakh sitam iijaad karo dilawaalon ko barabaad karo ham pyaar kii haar na maanenge jo chaaho tum bedaad karo ham dilawaale diiwaane hain jo guzaregii sah jaayenge shahar ke logo sun lo ham pyaar se baaz na aayenge sun lo ai shahar ke logo  zakmon kii zabaan to koii nahiin bolegii magar gularang zamiin tapakegaa lahuu kaa jo qataraa aayegii sadaa shiirii shiirii shiirii shiirii ye naam sajaa kar honthon par ham giit wafaa kaa gaayenge shahar ke logo sun lo ham pyaar se baaz na aayenge sun lo ai shahar ke logo  tum kah do jaakar shaahon se in jhuuthe adalpanaahon se jab ishq hamaaraa machalegaa tuufaan uthenge aahon se is shahar pe bijalii tuutegii ye mahal bhasam ho jaayenge shahar ke logo sun lo sun lo sun lo sun lo

Title: o mitavaa badaraa chhaaye re
Lyrics: o mitavaa mitavaa badaraa chhaaye re kaare kaare kajaraare  o mitavaa aa mitavaa ang lag jaa o mitavaa  aaii milan kii rut matavaalii 2 jhuum rahii hai bagiyaa saarii  kaliyaan mahake daarii daarii bhiigii bhiigii  chale puravaa re aa mitavaa threedots  ye saawan man bhaavan sang laayaa hai prem badariyaa rang daalo 2 sapanon ko chupake se milaake najariyaa baat yahii bas baat yahii sharmiilii kalii se kaanon men bhii kahe bhanvaraa re aa mitavaa threedots

Title: rut hai milan kii saathii mere aa re
Lyrics: la 	rut hai milan kii saathii mere aa re 	mohe kahiin le chal baanhon ke sahaare 	baagon men kheton men nadiyaa kinaare 	rut hai milan kii threedots  ra 	ho koii sajanavaa aajaa 	tere binaa thandii havaa sahii naa jaae aajaa 	rut hai milan kii threedots  la 	jaise rut pe hariyaalii gaharii chhaae mukh pe 	rangat nikhaar kii ra 	kheton ke sang jhuumen pavan men phulavaa sapanon ke 	daalii aramaan kii la 	tere sivaa ab to kuchh suujhe nahiin saanvare	 	rut hai milan kii threedots  ra 	o sajaniyaa jaan le le koii mose 	ab to laage nainaa tose 	aajaa o aajaa 	man kahataa hai duniyaa taj ke bas jaauun 	terii aankhon men la 	aur main gorii mahakiimahakii ghul ke rah jaauun 	terii saanson men ra 	ek duuje men yuun kho jaaen jag dekhaa kare 	rut hai milan kii threedots

Title: vaadiyon men kho jaaen ham tum  ye samaan hai suhaanaa
Lyrics: vaadiyon men kho jaaen ham tum aao in vaadiyon men kho jaaen  ham tum  2 ye samaan hai suhaanaa haan jii haan suhaanaa ho jaaen gumasum aao in vaadiyon men kho jaaen threedots  mujhe donon jahaan kii mil gaii hain kushiyaan tum jo mile hamaraahii mile dil kaa ye chaman phir lagaa muskuraane aramaanon ke hain phuul khile tum hii to ho sahaaraa haan jii haan sahaaraa chalate jaaen ham aao in vaadiyon men kho jaaen threedots  pyaaraa ye samaan hai mausam bhii javaan hai chaaron taraf husn kii daastaan hai mujhe lagataa hai jaise hamen dekhakar ye lagaa muskaraane zamiin aasamaan hai pyaar men ho ke diivaanaa jaise ye saaraa zamaanaa apanii dhun men gum aao in vaadiyon men kho jaaen threedots

Title: gumasum kyon hai sanam ab zaraa maan jaa
Lyrics: haan naa haan hothreedots  ho gumasum kyon hai sanam ab zaraa maan jaa pyaar kaa ye mausam hai aise men dil na jalaa  2 gumasum kyon hai sanam  2  jaane buujhe nazar churaaye dil kii baaten samajh na paaye o sitamagar dekh ab to ho jaa maharabaan  2 dard diyaa hai to de de davaa gumasum threedots  kab se hai beqaraar ye dil kab se kahatii huun jhuumake mil o anaadi ban khilaadi le le baahon mein  2 kaise piyaa se meraa palaa padaa gumasum threedots

Title: ek din tum bahut bade banoge ek din
Lyrics: hemalataa ek din tum bahut bade banoge ek din chaand se chamak uthoge ek din shailendra sinh  hemalataa maan lo kahiin kii shahazaadii baithii ho tumhaare liye aankhen bichhaae aur use ye zid ho ki wo shaadii kisii se naa karegii tumhaare sivaay shailendra sinh  shailendra sinh ek din le gayaa tumhe jo koii ajanabii gair kii jo ho gaii ye zindagii hemalataa  shailendra sinh saans saans men tumhaarii kushabuu kis tarah jiyuungaa bolo tumako bhulaake dil pe jaan pe kar chukii ho jaaduu jaanatii ho puuchhatii ho phir bhii sataa ke hemalataa

Title: roz akelii aae roz akelii jaae
Lyrics: roz akelii aae roz akelii jaae 2 chaand katoraa lie bhikhaaran raat roz akelii aae roz akelii jaae  motiyon jaise taare aanchal men hain saare 2 jaane ye phir kyaa maange bhikhaaran raat roz akelii aaethreedots  jogan jaisii laage na soe na jaage 2 galiigalii men jaae bhikhaaran raat roz akelii aaethreedots  roz lagaae pheraa hai koii nanhaa saveraa 2 god men bhar do aaii bhikhaaran raat  roz akelii aae roz akelii jaae 2 chaand katoraa lie bhikhaaran raat roz akelii aae roz bechaarii jaae

Title: teraa husn allaahallaah teraa ruup raamraam
Lyrics: teraa husn allaahallaah teraa ruup raamraam ek main hii nahiin tere karodon gulaam teraa husn allaah threedots  tuu jo palaken jhukaae himaalay jhuke tuu ishaaraa kare gangaajamunaa ruke terii zulfen sanvaaren kashmiir kii havaa dhoe kanyaakumaarii tere paanv sadaa teraa husn allaah threedots  aaj kitane dilon pe teraa raaj hai ye terii saadagii hii teraa taaj hai kyaa ajantaa kii main tujhako muurat kahuun tuu banaaras kii subah avadh kii hai shaam teraa husn allaah threedots

Title: pyaar pyaar  chaahie thodaa pyaar
Lyrics: pyaaaar pyaar pyaar pyaar pyaar chaahie thodaa pyaar thodaa pyaar chaahie  2 jaaneman gulbadan merii baat maanie chaahie thodaa pyaar threedots   chorii chhupe pyaar kabhii honaa chaahie rut ho javaan phir to hamen khonaa chaahie   2 jai kaalii kalakatte vaalii teraa vachan na jaae khaalii bachchaa log are bajaao taalii chaahie thodaa pyaar threedots   koii hasiin kar na sakaa meraa saamanaa merii nazar jaaduu bharii dil ko thaamanaa  2 jai kaalii kalakatte vaalii teraa vachan na jaae khaalii chhokarii log are bajaao taalii chaahie thodaa pyaar threedots

Title: juude men gajaraa mat baandho
Lyrics: juude men gajaraa mat baandho meraa giit mahak jaaegaa terii priit sulag jaaegii meraa pyaar chhalak jaaegaa  jitanii nazar jhukaaogii tum utanii nazar lagegii tumako nainon men kajaraa mat daalo koii raah bhatak jaaegaa  jab tum letii ho angadaaii dil kii dhadakan badh jaatii hai pairon men ghungharuu mat baandho koii saaz chahak jaaegaa  tere angon kii thirakan men pyaase giiton kaa saragam hai sajdhajkar itanaa mat dolo meraa raag bahak jaaegaa

Title: achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai biimaar huii aankhen
Lyrics: achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai biimaar huii aankhen murajhaaiisii rahatii hai ghabaraaiisii rahatii hain maashuuqon kii mahafil men sharmaaiisii rahatii hain kyaa jaane huaa kyaa hai patharaaiisii rahatii hain achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai biimaar huii aankhen  shokhii bhii lutaa baithiin mastii bhii ganvaa baithiin uthatii hain na jhukatii hain kyaa rog lagaa baithiin e yaar kyaa rog lagaa baithiin ki biimaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai biimaar huii aankhen  kis tarah hate dar se vaadaa hai sitamagar se kahatii hai lagan dil kii vo chal bhii chuke ghar se hai faasalaa dam bhar kaa phir dekh samaan ghar kaa vo hilane lagii chilaman vo pardaaedar sarakaa lo aa hii gayaa koii e yaar lo aa hii gayaa koii lo aa hii gayaa koii jo chaar huii aankhen  sarashaar huii aankhen sarashaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai biimaar huii aankhen  vo naqaab rukh se uthaae kyon vo bahaarehusn lutaae kyon sarebazm jalavaa dikhaae kyon tumhen ankhiyon se pilaae kyon ki vo apane nashe men chuur hai  jo nashe men chuur rahe sadaa use terii haal kaa kyaa pataa rahaa yuun hii dil kaa muaamalaa magar usakii koii nahiin khataa terii aankh kaa ye qasuur hai aankhon pe padaa pardaa e yaar aankhon pe padaa pardaa laachaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai biimaar huii aankhen  hamane aaj ek khvaab dekhaa hai khvaab bhii laajavaab dekhaa hai koii taabiir isakii batalaao raat ko aaftaab dekhaa hai  yaanii zindaa sharaab dekhoge husn ko benaqaab dekhoge raat ko aafataab dekhaa hai subah ko maahataab dekhoge chaandanii men uthii ghataa jaise daremaikhaanaa khul gayaa jaise ye fasaanaa sahii hasiin to hai nashe men rach gaii adaa jaise  koii tumasaa bhii ho na diivaanaa tum haqiiqat ko samajhe afasaanaa chaandanii usakaa rang zulf ghataa aur vo aankhen hain baademaikhaanaa maikhaane men pahunchii to e yaar maikhaane men pahunchii to maikhvaar huii aankhen gulnaar huii aankhen  achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai biimaar huii aankhen  sunate hain us dar pe jaake sar jhukaanaa manaa hai sar jhukaa bhii len agar to baith jaanaa manaa hai baith bhii jaaen kisii kone men to kyaa faayadaa jis taraf vo hon udhar nazaren uthaanaa manaa hai aur agar nazaren uthen to dardedil ko kyaa karen dardedil kaise mite aansuu bahaanaa manaa hai aur agar aansuu bahaaen bhii to vo dekhenge kyon aah bharanaa shor karanaa gul machaanaa manaa hai gul machaayaa bhii to matalab kis tarah samajhenge vo haay matalab saafsaaf un ko bataanaa manaa hai aur agar matalab bataayaa to bhii to vo denge javaab dil lagaayaa tum ne kyon jab dil lagaanaa manaa hai  dil kaa na kahaa maanaa e yaar dil kaa na kahaa maanaa dil kaa na kahaa maanaa gaddaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai laachaar huii aankhen laachaar huii aankhen maikhvaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai maikhvaar huii aankhen maikhvaar huii aankhen gulnaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai gulnaar huii aankhen gulnaar huii aankhen sarashaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai sarashaar huii aankhen achchhaa unhen dekhaa hai

Title: rangiilaa re tere rang men yuun rangaa hai meraa man
Lyrics: rangiilaa re tere rang men yuun rangaa hai meraa man chhaliyaa re na bujhe hai kisii jal se yah jalan  2 o rangiilaa re  palakon ke jhuule se sapanon kii dorii pyaar ne baandhii jo tuune vo todii khel yah kaisaa re kaisaa re saathii diyaa to jhuumen hain roye hain baakii kahiin bhii jaaye re roye yaa gaaye re chain na paaye re hiyaa vaah re pyaar vaah re vaah rangiilaa re threedots  duhkh meraa dulhaa hai birahaa hai dolii aansuu kii sadii hai aahon kii cholii aag main piyuun re jaise ho paanii naarii divaanii huun piidaa kii raanii manavaa yuun jale hai jag saaraa chhale hai saans kyon chale hai piyaa vaah re pyaar vaah re vaah rangiilaa re threedots  rangiilaa o rangiilaa  mainne to siinchii re terii ye raahen  2 baahon men terii kyon auron kii baahen kaise tuu bhuulaa vo phuulon sii raaten samajhii jab aankhon ne aankhon kii baaten aanv bhar jhuuthaa re sapanaa har tuutaa re phir bhii tuu ruuthaa re piyaa vaah re pyaar vaah re vaah  rangiilaa re rangiilaa re

Title: aisaa ho to kaisaa hogaa
Lyrics: aisaa ho to kaisaa hogaa aap ho paas to din dhale paas ho aap to din chale  kisii din aisaa bhii to ho raat kii subah hii na ho  2 raat ke baad bhii raat ho aap ho aap ho paas to din dhale  kisii din honthon se kaho phuulon se jo kahaa tumane  2 aaj to phuulon kii raat ho aap ho aap ho paas to din dhale

Title: chaand meraa dil chaandanii ho tumaa dil kyaa
Singer: rafi kishore r d burman asha
Lyrics: chaand mera dil chaandani ho tum chaand se hai dur chaandani kahaan laut ke aana hai yahin tumako ja rahe ho tum jaao meri jaan  vaise to har qadam milenge log sanam milega sachcha pyaar mushkil se dil ki dosti khel nahin koi dil se dil hai milata yaar mushkil se yahi to hai sanam pyaar kaa thikaana main hun main hun main hun threedots chaand mera dil threedots  a dil kya mahafil hai tere qadamon men aa dil kya mahafil hai tere  duniya ki bahaaren tere liye chaand sitare tere liye o threedots jaane adaa ho ho ho jaane vafa jaane vafaa tujhape main fida ho ho ho jaane vafaa tujhape main fida  ho aa dil kya mahafil hai tere qadamon men aa dil kya mahafil hai tere  duniya threedots a dil kya threedots  o tum kyaa jaano muhabbat kyaa hai dil kii mahafil ye mahafil nahiin dil hai  mil gayaa hamako saathii mil gayaa hamase gar koii jal gayaa ho ho jalane de chal gayaa pyaar kaa jaadu chal gayaa ho ho chalane de  tere liye zamaanaa tere liye aur tuu mere liye

Title: ye mahafil yuun hii sajegii
Lyrics: ye mahafil yuun hii sajegii ye duniyaan yuun hii chalegii  ye mahafil yuun hii sajegii ye duniyaan yuun hii chalegii jo dhadakan kisii kii ruke tum ruko naa  ye mehafil yuun hii sajegii ye duniyaan yuun hii chalegii  taaraa tuute koii agar ambar khaalii naa hogaa taaraa tuute koii agar ambar khaalii naa hogaa roshan apanii raat karo socho naa tum kab kyaa hogaa ye kyon ghar jalaa hai kisii kaa naa puuchho tum  mahafil yuun hii sajegii duniyaan yuun hii chalegii  apanii ulajhan kyaa kam hai auron kaa gam koii kyaa baante apanii ulajhan kyaa kam hai auron kaa gam koii kyaa baante kaliyaan kaliyaan chun lo tum rehane do gulashan mein kaante jo ho chaaq daaman kisii kaa naa dekho tum  mahafil yuun hii sajegii duniyaan yuun hii chalegii  ye mahafil yuun hii sajegii ye duniyaan yuun hii chalegii jo dhadakan kisii kii ruke tum ruko naa  ye mahafil yuun hii sajegii ye duniyaan yuun hii chalegii

Title: man meraa chaahe mehandii rachaa luun
Lyrics: man meraa chaahe mehandii rachaa luun bindiyaa lagaa luun sajanaa 2  raah merii aake bhar de maang merii  piyaa tere rangon se khilii huun main aise jab mile mausam gale to khil gae phuul jaise mujhamen aise tum samaae mere sapane muskuraae man meraa chaahe threedots  ghadiighadii dole re bole meraa man re phir vohii barase ghataa bhiige meraa tanbadan ye tuune kaise giit gaae chain mujhako ab na aae man meraa chaahe threedots

Title: dekh sakate nahiin tumako jii bhar ke ham
Lyrics: dekh sakate nahiin tumako jii bhar ke ham dil men kisake gumaan kyaa guzar jaaegaa tumako apanaa kahen to kahen kis tarah  saarii mahafil kaa cheharaa utar jaaegaa dekh sakate nahiin threedots  tum bhii betaab ho ham bhii bechain hain dil se milane kii hasarat machalane lagii sabr kaa ab to daaman sulagane lagaa pyaar kii aag siine men jalane lagii tumase milane na paae agar aaj ham lagataa hai dil hii thahar jaaegaa dekh sakate nahiin threedots  ho kisii desh men yaa kisii bhesh men shaklen apanon kii pahachaan letaa hai dil tum kaho na kaho ham kahen naa kahen baat dil kii to khud jaan letaa hai dil saamane bas yuun hii muskaraate raho zindagii kaa muqaddar sanvar jaaegaa dekh sakate nahiin threedots

Title: mere saath chale naa saayaa
Lyrics: mere saath chale naa saayaa dharam nahiin karam nahiin janam ganvaayaa  mere liye din bhii andheraa mere liye raat bhii na laaye saveraa  2 jo de ujaalaa de saveraa 2 vahii meraa hamasaayaa dharam nahiin karam nahiin threedots  mere liye jagat sautelaa bharii huii bhiid men bhii rahaa akelaa 2 jo de sahaaraa de kinaaraa 2 vahii meraa hamasaaya dharam nahiin karam nahiin threedots

Title: mahabuubaa terii tasviir kis tarah main banaauun
Lyrics: mahabuubaa terii tasviir kis tarah main banaauun 2 terii zulfon kii daastaan kis tarah main sunaauun mahabuubaa terii tasviir threedots  tere lie kahuun koii baat tere lie sochuun koii naam main to bas diivaanaa ho gayaa nahiin mere bas kaa ye kaam tere jaisaa koii kahiin dekhaa naa sunaa hai mahabuubaa threedots  dhaare maujen rut aur jaam nagmen paimaane but aur phuul sab terii raahon kii kaaq sab tere qadamon kii dhuul tere jaisaa koii kahiin dekhaa naa sunaa hai mahabuubaa threedots  nazaron ne dekhaa hai tujhe aataa nahiin phir bhii yaqiin kyonki merii duniyaa ke log hote nahiin itane hasiin tere jaisaa koii kahiin dekhaa naa sunaa hai mahabuubaa threedots

Lyrics: are pathik giridhaarii suun itanii kahiyo ter dig jhar laaii raadhikaa ab brij bhuulat pher  aa jaa sanvariyaa tohe garavaa lagaa luun ras ke bhare tore nain sanvariyaa ras ke bhare tore nain  jehii chitavat tehii bas karii raakhat naahii pade maikaa chain sanvariyaa  ras ke bhare tore nain

Title: tere vishaal hriday ne paaii saaton saagar kii gaharaaii
Lyrics: tere vishaal hriday ne paaii saaton saagar kii gaharaaii saat rang se sundar tujhako rang milaa saare sukh mil jaaenge mujhako kahiin jo teraa sang milaa tere vishaal hriday threedots  saaton gagan terii aankhon men saat suron kaa ras baaton men taal men duubii chaal ko terii jalatarang kaa dhang milaa saare sukh mil jaaenge threedots  ek badii tujhamen achchhaaii pyaar men tere hai sachchaaii madiraa bhii tuu gangaajal tuu hii tujhako anokhaa ang milaa saare sukh mil jaaenge threedots

Lyrics: inhiin logon ne inhiin logon ne inhiin logon ne le liinaa dupattaa meraa  hamarii na maano bajajavaa se puuchho hamarii na maano sainyaa threedots bajajavaa se puuchho jisane threedots jisane asharafii gaz diinaa dupattaa meraa  hamarii na maano rangarajavaa se puuchho	2 jisane gulaabii rang diinaa dupattaa meraa inhiin logon ne inhiin logon ne inhiin logon ne le liinaa dupattaa meraa  hamarii na maano sipahiyaa se puuchho	2 jisane bajariyaa men chhiinaa dupattaa meraa dupattaa meraa dupattaa meraa inhiin logon ne inhiin logon ne inhiin logon ne le liinaa dupattaa meraa

Title: aayaa huun main tujhako le jaauungaa
Lyrics: aashaa alethreedots uii uii kishor aayaa huun main tujh ko le jaauungaa apane saath teraa haath thaam ke 2 aashaa nahiin re nahiin main nahiin jaauungii tere saath teraa haath thaam ke 2 aashaa thaam ke kishor la la la  kishor aise na ruuth baaton baaton men vaade na tod aisii raaton men 2 aashaa dekhaa hai chand mulaaqaaton men dhokaa hai yaar terii baaton men 2 kishor hamen is tarah na thukraa zaalim aashiq hain ham tere naam ke 2 asha uii uii nahiin re nahiin main nahiin jaauungii tere saath teraa haath thaam ke kishor aayaa huun main tujh ko le jaauungaa apane saath teraa haath thaam ke  thaam ke thaam ke  aashaa ye maanaa tuu meraa diivaanaa hai tuu har ek shammaa kaa paravaanaa hai 2 kishore aii aii aii aii aii aii aii aii threedots vo apanaa aur ye begaanaa hai merii jaan khuub pahachaanaa hai 2 aashaa jaa re jaa re tere jaise beiimaan bevafaa mere kis kaam ke kishor aayaa huun main tujh ko le jaauungaa apane saath teraa haath thaam ke asha uii uii nahiin re nahiin main nahiin jaauungii tere saath teraa haath thaam ke thaam ke thaam ke

Title: nahiin nahiin koii tum saa hasiin
Lyrics: nahiin nahiin kyaa re nahiin are baabaa kyaa nahiin nahiin koii tum saa hasiin isakaa hai matalab dekhe hain tumane laakhon hasiin  yuunhii thodii der ko to main shaayar ban gayaa maine to dekhaa nahiin jalavaa koii husn kaa tumamen hai vo baat kisii men dekhii naa vo baat kahiin achchhaa jii are nahiin nahiin threedots  main ye kaise maan luun tum itane anajaan ho tum kitanii maasuum ho tum kitanii naadaan ho lekin tum bhii mere jaisii main kis par kar luun yaqiin nahiin nahiin threedots  maine maanaa aapako mujhase sachchaa pyaar hai par mardon kii baat kaa na koii aitabaar hai jahaan par dekhii koii achchhii suurat dil kho gayaa vahiin nahiin nahiin threedots

Title: are pyaar pe koii bas to nahiin hai
Lyrics: are pyaar pe koii bas to nahiin hai kahe diivaanaa dil 2 jisase ho jaae ho jaae ho jaae 2  kyaa kabar hai kidhar ho ravaanii pyaar gangaa kaa jamanaa kaa paanii hain jahaan men fasaane hazaaron par anokhii hai isakii kahaanii are pyaar pe koii threedots  kyon ulajhataa hai hamase zamaanaa jisako aataa nahiin dil lagaanaa hamase siikhe mohabbat men jiinaa ham badal denge dil kaa fasaanaa are pyaar pe koii threedots

Title: ai yaar sun yaarii terii mujhe zindagii se bhii
Lyrics: ai yaar sun yaarii terii mujhe zindagii se bhii pyaarii hai 2 javaab ik nahiin hamaaraa kahiin badii kuub jodii hamaarii hai ai yaar sun threedots  kyaa dekhataa huun main kab dekhataa huun terii nazar se sab dekhataa huun terii qasam ye haath hain mere magar in haathon men taaqat tumhaarii hai ai yaar sun threedots  dil men lagaaii hai tasviir terii teraa nasiibaa hai taqadiir merii tum donon ne jo kuchh kahaa maine sunaa magar ab suno merii baarii hai ai yaar sun threedots  hamase jo ulajhe vo hogaa diivaanaa aavaaz tuu de main baandhuun nishaanaa udate hue panchhii ke par ham kaat len ki main jaal huun tuu shikaarii hai ai yaar sun threedots  ham hain javaanii ke dinraat jaise lagataa hai bachapan se hai saath jaise dil yaar kaa jaan yaar kii apanaa hai kyaa ye vardii bhii to sarakaarii hai ai yaar sun threedots

Title: kyaa merii prem kahaanii
Lyrics: sharm aatii hai mujhako sahelii nayaa ghar hai main dulhan navelii baat man kii ye hai kuchh pahelii rahane do ise tum pahelii  kyaa merii prem kahaanii  nadiyaa se bichhadaa paanii  2 kyaa merii prem kahaanii  nadiyaa se bichhadaa paanii  2  bhuul jaatii hain baabul kii galiyaan duur sanjog le jaate hain phuul banatii hain jab khilake kaliyaan todake log le jaate hain ek raajaa le aayaa banaake mujhe raanii  nadiyaa se bichhadaa paanii  2  jaane kis kis galii se guzarake ghar saajan ke baaraat aaii sab saathii puraane wahiin chhuute yaad unakii mere saath aaii ye jo aansuu hain ye hain un hii kii nishaanii  nadiyaa se bichhadaa paanii  2  kyaa merii prem kahaanii  nadiyaa se bichhadaa paanii  2

Title: aapake shahar men  main tawaayaf huun
Lyrics: aapake shahar men aaii huun shauq se aapake zauq se phir bhii daratii huun main apanaa dil todakar dillagii chhodakar ek taazaa gazal pesh karatii huun main ki  jashneshaadii hai raat aadhii hai 2 kushanasiibon ko shab mubaarak ho main pashemaan huun kuchh pareshaan huun mere ashkon ko aap mat dekho jaanemahabuubii dard men duubii chiiz gaauungii muskuraauungii gam sahii dil men phir bhii mahafil men  kyaa kisii se 2 main shikawaa karuungii  main tawaayaf huun mujaraa karuungii 2   dil kii dushman huun main gam kii dulhan huun 2 tuute waadon se bhuulii yaadon se jaam jalatii hai chot lagatii hai phir bhii zindaa huun main sharmindaa huun ai meharabaano mere diiwaano thiik kahate ho chand logon ko pyaar karane kaa haq nahiin hotaa  kyaa main phir ye 2 tamannaa karuungii main tawaayaf huun    saamane hai tuu baandh luun ghungharuu 2 raqs jaarii ho raat saarii ho phir kudaa jaane tere diiwaane  kab tujhe dekhen jab tujhe dekhen kuchh na ho baakii isaliye saaqii aaj piine de zakhm siine de bhuul jaane de dagamagaane de  hosh men rahake 2 main kyaa karuungii main tawaayaf huun

Title: sun rii pavan pavan purvaiyyaa main huun akelii alabelii
Lyrics: sun rii pavan pavan puravayyaa  main huun akelii alabelii tuu sahelii merii  ban jaa saathiyaa   1 chal tuu meraa anchal thaam ke  anjaane raste is gaanv ke  saathii hain ye mere naam ke  nain ye nigode kis kaam ke  dole meraa man aise jaise nayyaa main huun threedots  2 koii to ho aise puuchhe baat jo  giruun to pakad leve haath jo  hanse roe sadaa mere sath jo  soe jaage sang din raat jo  aise ho milan jaise dhuup chhanyyaa main huun threedots

Title: yaadon kii baaraat nikalii hai
Singer: kishore rafi lata padmini shivangi chorus
Lyrics: ki  yaadon kii baaraat nikalii hai aa dil ke dwaare  dil ke dwaare  2  sapanon kii shahanaaii biite dinon ko pukaare  dil ke dwaare  ho o chhedo taraane milan ke pyaare pyaare  sang hamaare  ki badale naa apanaa ye aalam kabhii  jiivan men bichhadenge naa ham kabhii ra badale naa apanaa ye aalam kabhii  jiivan men bichhadenge naa ham kabhii  yuun bhii jaaoge aakir kahaan hoke hamaare  do yaadon kii baaraat   ra aage bhii hogaa jo usakaa karam ki ye din to manaayenge har saal ham ra apane aangan naache gaayenge chandaa sitaare  do yaadon kii baaraat

Title: jo baat ishaaron men kahii tum nahiin samajhe
Lyrics: jo baat ishaaron men kahii tum nahiin samajhe  hamane to hazaaron men kahii tum nahiin samajhe tum nahiin samajhe 2 jo baat ishaaron men kahii tum nahiin samajhe hamane to hazaaron men kahii tum nahiin samajhe  hamane ye chaahaa thaa qadamon men bas rahate ho lekin ham ye hasarat apane munh se kaise kahate 2 saanson kii pukaaron men kahii tum nahiin samajhe jo baat ishaaron men  kahii threedots  hamane niinden haariin tumane chaahat jiitii ho bhiigii rut men tapate dil par tum bin jo jo biitii 2 ashkon kii phuhaaron men kahii tum nahiin samajhe jo baat ishaaron men kahii threedots

Title: mere giit hain anaam anaam shahiidon ke naam
Lyrics: mere giit hain anaam anaam shahiidon ke naam  maathe lagii golii kii rolii phuul sahii zindagii chaman chhod bolii vatan vaasiyon meraa antim pranaam mere giit hain threedots  maatribhuumi ke lie pyaare desh ke lie hans ke praan taj die bin kahe bin sune mahaan aatmaaen chalii hain gumanaam mere giit hain threedots

Title: tuu aas kaa diipak jalaa
Lyrics: tuu aas kaa diipak jalaa ke teraa bhagawaan karegaa bhalaa ke teraa bhii din aayegaa re andheraa saaraa mit jaayegaa re tuu aas kaa diipak jalaa   srishti kaa niyam hai pyaare har dam rahataa naa andheraa  2 koii aisii raat na hotii hotaa nahiin jisakaa saveraa dukh sukh kaa yahii silasilaa ke teraa bhagawaan karegaa bhalaa    kashton se na jo ghabaraae phal usako milaa karataa hai  2 jab sau sau kaanten chubhate tab phuul khilaa karataa hai vishwaas kii jyoti jalaa ke teraa bhagawaan karegaa bhalaa

Title: koii jab tumhaaraa hriday tod de
Lyrics: koii jab tumhaaraa hriday tod de tadapataa huaa jab koii chhod de tab tum mere paas aanaa priye meraa dar khulaa hai khulaa hii rahegaa tumhaare liye koii jab threedots  abhii tumako merii zaruurat nahiin bahut chaahane vaale mil jaaenge abhii ruup kaa ek saagar ho tum kanval jitane chaahogii khil jaaenge darapan tumhen jab daraane lage javaanii bhii daaman chhudaane lage tab tum mere paas aanaa priye meraa sar jhukaa hai jhukaa hii rahega tumhaare liye koii jab threedots  koii shart hotii nahiin pyaar men magar pyaar sharton pe tumane kiyaa nazar men sitaare jo chamake zaraa bujhaane lagiin aaratii kaa diyaa jab apanii nazar men hii girane lago andheron men apane hii ghirane lago tab tum mere paas aanaa priye ye diipak jalaa hai jalaa hii rahega tumhaare liye koii jab threedots

Title: zamaane men ajii aise kaii naadaan hote hain
Lyrics: zamaane men ajii aise kaii naadaan hote hain vahaan le jaate hain kashtii jahaan tuufaan hote hain  shamaa kii bazm men aa kar ke paravaane samajhate hain yahiin par umr guzaregii yah diivaane samajhate hain magar ik raat ke yah to faqat mehamaan hote hain zamaane men threedots  mohabbat sabakii mahfil men shamaa ban kar nahiin jalatii hasiinon kii nazar sab pe chhurii ban kar nahiin chalatii jo hain taqadiir vaale bas vahii qurbaan hote hain zamaane men threedots  dubo kar duur saahil se nazaaraa dekhanevaale lagaa kar aag chup ke se tamaashaa dekhanevaale tamaashaa aap banate hain to kyon hairaan hote hain zamaane mein threedots

Title: chal sanyaasii mandir men teraa chimataa merii chuudiyaan
Lyrics: chal sanyaasii mandir men teraa chimataa merii chuudiyaan donon saath bajaaenge saathsaath khanakaaenge kyuun ham jaayen mandir men paap hai tere andar men lekar maalaa kanth dushaalaa raam naam gun gaayenge resham saa ye ruup salonaa yauvan hai yaa tapataa sonaa ye terii mohan sii suurat kar gaii mujhape haae jaaduutonaa kaisaa jaaduutonaa saarii man kii ye maayaa hai tum pe devii kisii rog kii padii vikat chhaayaa hai chal sanyaasii mandir men teraa kamandal merii gagariyaa saathsaath chhalakaayenge kyuun ham jaayen mandir men paap hai tere andar men ham to jogii raam ke rogii dhuunii alag ramaaenge jaagejaage so jaatii huun aur sapanon men kho jaatii huun tab tuu meraa ho jaataa hai aur piyaa main terii ho jaatii huun sapanon men bharamaakar maanav sachchaa sukh khotaa hai are raam naam japate rahane se kashht duur hotaa hai chal sanyaasii mandir men teraa cholaa merii chunariyaa saathsaath rangavaayenge kyon ham jaayen mandir men paap hai tere andar men chhod jhamele baith akele jiivan saphal banaayenge man se man kaa diip jalaa le madhur milan kii jyotii jagaa le puuran kar de merii aashaa aaj mujhe apanaa le apanaa le man se man kaa diip jalaanaa mujhe nahiin aataa hai bas puujaa kii jyot jalaanaa mujhe yahii bhaataa hai chal sanyaasii mandir men meraa ruup aur terii javaanii milakar jyotii jalaayenge kyon ham jaayen mandir men paap hai tere andar men dharm chhodakar dhyaan chhodakar paap nahiin apanaaenge prem hai puujaa prem hai puujan prem jagat hai prem hii jiivan mat kar tuu apamaan prem kaa prem hai naam prabhuu kaa badaa hii paavan premprem kar ke mujhako kar degii ab tuu paagal meraa dhiiraj dol rahaa hai laaj rakhe gangaa jal chal sanyaasii mandir men terii maalaa meraa gajaraa gangaa saath nahaayenge

Title: saremahafil meraa iimaan  yaaron ab kyaa hogaa
Lyrics: saremahafil meraa iimaan beiimaan ho gayaa yaaron ab kyaa hogaa meraa qaatil mere ghar men meraa mehamaan ho gayaa yaaron ab kyaa hogaa vahii hogaa jo manzuurekudaa hogaa yaaron ab kyaa hogaa  zamiin par paanv mat rakhanaa kahiin mailaa na ho jaae na jaanaa chaandanii men ye badan mailaa na ho jaae kudaayaa bhej de jannat se tuu apanii bahaaron ko sajaa de aasamaan tuu raah men inakii sitaaron ko shariiqezindagii honaa teraa ehasaan ho gayaa yaaron ab kyaa hogaa  nahiin the ham kisii qaabil jagah de dii hamen dil men karen ham shukriyaa kaise ki rakh lii laaj mahafil men naa phuulon kii tamannaa hai naa chaahat hai sitaaron kii tumhaare pyaar ke aage zaruurat kyaa bahaaron kii tumhaarii baanhon men rahanaa meraa aramaan ho gayaa yaaron ab kyaa hogaa  zamiin kii tum nahiin lagatii kahaan se aaii ho bolo merii jaan husn pariyon kaa kahaan se laaii ho bolo kudaa ne khud banaayaa hai hamen to aapakii kaatir gazal mujhako banaayaa hai banaakar aapako shaayar milan par jaaneman apanaa kudaa hairaan ho gayaa yaaron ab kyaa hogaa saremahafil meraa threedots

Title: merii hasaraton kii duniyaa tuu mile kahiin jo mujhako
Lyrics: ra 	merii hasaraton kii duniyaa 	tuu mile kahiin jo mujhako 	siine se lagaa luun tujhako 	merii hasaraton kii threedots  	pyaar meraa ishq meraa koii mit jaane kii shai nahiin hai 	tuu milegii mere dil ko aaj bhii to ye puuraa yaqiin hai 	 tuu jahaan hai  2 pyaar mere 	tuu jahaan hai pyaar mere mere kvaabon kii manzil vahiin hai 	merii hasaraton kii threedots  kri 	o o mere dilabar zindagii bhar naam teraa rahegaa zubaan par 	sar jhukegaa us jagah par paanv tere padenge jahaan par ra 	 puure honge  2 saare vaade 	puure hon sanam saare vaade jojo aapas men hamane kie hain 	merii hasaraton kii threedots

Title: he re kanhaiyaa kisako kahegaa tuu maiyaa
Lyrics: he re kanhaiyaa kisako kahegaa tuu maiyaa ek ne tujhako janm diyaa re ek ne tujhako paalaa kanhaiyaa kisako kahegaa threedots  maanii maanataaen aur deviidev puuje piir sahii devakii ne duudh men nahalaane kaa god men khilaane kaa sukh paayaa yashodaa jii ne ek ne tujhako janm diyaa ek ne jiivan sambhaalaa kanhaiyaa kisako kahegaa threedots  marane ke dar se bhej diyaa dhar se devakii ne re gokul men binaa die janm yashodaa banii maataa tujhako chhupaayaa aanchal men janm diyaa ho chaahe paalaa ho kisii ne bhed ye mamataa na jaane koii bhii ho jisane diyaa ho pyaar maan kaa man to maan usii ko maane ek ne tujhako dii hain ye aankhen ek ne diyaa ujaalaa kanhaiyaa kisako kahegaa threedots

Title: ham jiyen yaa maren haay ham kyaa karen
Lyrics: ham jiyen yaa maren haay haay ham kyaa karen ham jiyen yaa maren haay ham kyaa karen 2 kyaa karen 3 haay ham kyaa karen 4  khil rahii chaandanii mast hai kaaminii ruup hai rang hai ang men ang hai ruup hai rang hai ang men ang hai mat lagaa tuu agan jal rahaa hai badan kab talak yuunhii aahen bharen  ham jiyen yaa maren haay ham kyaa karen 2  phulajhadii hai umar jal rahe hain nagar har nazar tez hai hans rahii sej hai har nazar tez hai hans rahii sej hai tuune ghaayal kiyaa dekh luungii piyaa ham gunaahon se kaahe daren  ham jiyen yaa maren haay ham kyaa karen 2  haa aa  zindagii dharm hai puny hii karm hai  2 are chal  zindagii prem hai prem hii marm hai  2 pyaar tan se nahiin pyaar man se karo isakaa matalab hai kyaa zindagii bhar maro vaasanaa ke pare aankh kholo zaraa 2 tum bhii ho tum sahii hans ke bolo zaraa tum bhii ho tum sahii hans ke bolo zaraa  do dinon ke liye ruup hai gandh hai 2 is liye bhog lo wo hii aanand hai 2 tum samajhate ho kyaa zindagii aish hai aish ho yaa na ho kyaa wo upadesh hai saty hai zindagii jhuuth hai vaasanaa 2 vaasanaa ke binaa jhuuth hai saadhanaa 2 bhog men tyaag hai tyaag aanand hai duur dekhegaa kyaa jo nazarband hai ruup hai do ghadii pyaar hai sarvadaa ek hai jhiil to ek hai narmadaa roshanii ke liye diip banakar jalo megh bankar chalo mom banakar galo zindagii tyaag hai yaa ki vyaapaar hai jo ki kudagarz hai usakaa dhikkaar hai usakaa dhikkaar hai 2 chalate duniyaa kaa dukh ham haren  ham jiyen yaa maren haay ham kyaa karen 3

Title: bemausam bahaar
Lyrics: kishor bemausam bahaar ke din kaise aaye in baahon men pyaar se tum jaise aaye lataa chalo re nikal jaayen kahiin nikal ke machal jaayen kahiin re kishor bemausam bahaar ke din kaise aaye  kishor ye terii do aankhen dil men meraa pyaar mil jaayen to laharon ko bhii aa jaaye qaraar to aajaa ki mil jaayen gale lataa khule aasamaanon ke tale re kishor bemausam bahaar ke din kaise aaye lataa in baahon men pyaar se tum jaise aaye  lataa jab se tuu hai dilabar mujhape meharabaan tere dam pe jannat hain mere donon jahaan jahaan bhii gaye ham ai sanam kishor bahaaron ne chuume hain qadam haaye kishor bemausam bahaar ke din kaise aaye lataa in baahon men pyaar se tum jaise aaye donon chalo re nikal jaayen kahiin nikal ke machal jaayen kahiin re

Title: kabhii kabhii mere dil men sahirs talkhiiyaan
Lyrics: kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai ki zindagii terii zulfon kii narm chhaaon men  guzarane paatii to shaadaab ho bhii sakatii thii  yah tiraagii jo mere zist kaa mukaddar hai terii nazar kii shuaanon men kho bhii sakatii thii bigskip ajab na thaa ki main begaanaaeaalam ho kara tere jamaal kii raanaaiyon men kho rahataa  teraa gudhdaaz badana terii niimabaaz aankhen inhiin hasiin fazaaon men main ho rahataa bigskip pukaaratiin mujhe jab talakiyaan zamaane kii tere labon se halaavat ke ghuunt pii letaa  hayaat chiikhatii phiratii barehanaasara aur main ghanerii zulfon kii chhaaon men chhup ke jii letaa  bigskip magar ye ho na sakaa magar ye ho na sakaa aur ab ye aalam hai  ki tuu nahiin teraa gama terii justuzuu bhii nahiin  guzar rahii hai kuchh is tarah zindagii jaise  ise kisii ke sahaare kii aarazuu bhii nahiin bigskip zamaane bhar ke dukhon ko lagaa chukaa huun gale guzar rahaa huun kuchh anajaanii rahaguzaaron se muhiib saaye merii simat bharate aate hain hayaatomaut ke parhaal khaarzaaron se  bigskip na koii jadaa na manzila na roshanii kaa suraag bhatak rahii hai kayaalon men zindagii merii  inhiin kayaalon men rah jaauungaa kabhii kho kara main jaanataa huun mere hamnafasa magar yuun hiin kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai

Title: kush raho saathiyo tumhen chhodake
Lyrics: ki kush raho saathiyo tumhen chhodake ham chale 2 la tumhen chhodake ham chale hamen chhodake gam chale donon khush raho saathiyo threedots  la mujhe tere dukh ne sainyaan kitanaa rulaayaa hai ki mujhe tere prem ne gorii maut se bachaayaa hai la bahate bahate magar ye aaj aansuu tham chale donon kush raho saathiyo threedots  ki tumhen ham nahiin bhuulenge hamen tum bhulaanaa naa la milenge kabhii aashaa ke diipak bujhaanaa naa ki hansate hansate tumhaarii aankhen karake nam chale donon kush raho saathiyo threedots  ki gaii re judaaii aaiin prem kii ratiyaan la gaii re judaaii aaiin prem kii ratiyaan ki kisii aur ke mukhade pe thahare na ankhiyaan la tere mukh pe saanvariyaa mere nainaa jam chale donon kush raho saathiyo threedots

Title: meraa tumhaaraa saath to sadiyon kaa saath hai
Lyrics: su 	meraa tumhaaraa saath to sadiyon kaa saath hai ra 	ab tak gale na mil sake su 	ye aur baat hai do 	meraa tumhaaraa saath threedots  ra 	manzil pe aayaa kaaravaan 	phir ho gae aramaan javaan 	mahasuus hone lagaa qadamon men hain donon jahaan 	jisakii talaash thii vo mere saath hai su 	ab tak gale na mil sake ra 	ye aur baat hai do 	meraa tumhaaraa saath threedots  su 	tuufaan se nikale hain ham aayaa nahiin saahil abhii 2 ra 	mere tumhaare pyaar kii ik aur bhii manzil abhii do 	shaayad hamaarii maut hii hamaarii hayaat hai su 	ab tak gale na mil sake ra 	ye aur baat hai do 	meraa tumhaaraa saath threedots

Title: tum hamase milo ham tumase milen
Lyrics: tum hamase milo ham tumase milen logon ko manzuur nahiin manzuur nahiin  wo baat bhalaa phir kaise ho jo duniyaa kaa dastuur nahiin dastuur nahiin  honthon pe hansii laake apane ashqon ko chhupaayaa hai hamane aankhen bhii churaayii hai hamane daaman bhii bachaayaa hai hamane o  ye yaad rahe lekin tumako  majabuur hai ham magaruur nahiin  magaruur nahiin  tum hamase  duniyaa kii diivaaren lekin ye ulfat todake detii hai ye tuute dil tuute rishte ye qismat jod bhii detii hai o  jis din ham tum mil jaayenge  wo din shaayad ab duur nahiin duur nahiin  tum hamase

Title: ek dam  chillam kaa ek dam
Lyrics: ek dam bas ek dam sirf ek dam bhulaa detaa hai saare zindagii ke gam chillam kaa ek dam bas ek dam sirf ek dam bhulaa detaa hai saare zindagii ke gam lagaa le dam pe dam kahaan ke ranjogam   zamaanaa hamase hai zamaane se nahiin ham  nashiilaa ye dhuaan udaa kar dekh le nayaa ik aasamaan banaa kar dekh le niraalaa ik jahaan basaa kar dekh le jawaan jaaduu hai ye jagaa kar dekh le bahakane de zaraa yunhii zaraa apane qadam chillam kaa ek dam threedots  rivaajon par na jaa inhen jhuthalaaye jaa ye duniyaa dhuul hai ise thukaraaye jaa nashaa badhataa rahe yuunhii laharaaye jaa jo tere dil men hai use apanaaye jaa zamaanaa kuchh nahiin kuchh bhii nahiin sab kuchh hain ham chillam kaa ek dam threedots

Title: mitavaa mitavaa more man mitavaa
Lyrics: mitavaa mitavaa more man mitavaa aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re tujhako pukaare pyaar kisii kaa aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re  raat ke mukh par chaand kaa tiikaa tujh bin laage phiikaa phiikaa o mitavaa raat ke mukh par mitavaa aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa mitavaa aajaa tujhako pukaare pyaar kisii kaa  ik pal rok na paaye aansuu kyuun itane barasaaye aansuu	 2 koii na jaane dukh badalii kaa	 2 aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re aajaa re mitavaa mitavaa

Title: muhabbat bade kaam kii chiiz hai
Lyrics: har taraf husn aur javaanii hai aajakii raat kyaa suhaanii hai reshamii jism tharatharaate hain maramarii honth gunagunaate hain  dhadakanon main suruur phailaa hai rang najadiikoduur phailaa hai  daavateishq de rahi hai fazaa aaj ho jaa kisii hasiin pe fidaa   ki muhabbat bade kaam kii chiiz hai kaam kii chiiz hai  muhabbat ke dam se hai duniyaa ye roshan  muhabbat na hoti to kuchh bhi naa hota  najar aur dil kii panaahon kii khaatir  ye jannat na hoti to kuchh bhi naa hotaa  yahii ek aaraam kii chiiz hai kaam kii chiiz hai muhabbat bade kaam kii chiiz hai kaam kii chiiz hai  ye kitaabon men chhapate hai chaahat ke kisse haqikat kii duniya men chaahat nahiin zamaane ke baazaar men ye vo shah hai  ke jisakii kisiko zaruurat nahiin hai ye bekaar bedaam kii chiiz hai naam kii chiiz hai  ki ye kudarat ke inaam kii chiiz hai  muhabbat se itanaa khafaa hone vaale chal aa aaj tujhako muhabbat sikhaa de  teraa dil jo barason se viiraan padaa hai  kisii nazaniinaan ko isame basaa den  meraa mashavaraa kaam kii chiiz hai kaam kii chiiz hai  muhabbat bade kaam kii chiiz hai kaam kii chiiz hai

Title: hai tere saath merii vafaa main nahiin to kyaa
Lyrics: hai tere saath merii vafaa main nahiin to kyaa zindaa rahegaa pyaar meraa main nahiin to kyaa hai tere saath merii vafaa   siine men dard dil men tamannaa jagaae jaa ye raat jaagane kii hai shammen jalaae jaa tuu jashn zindagii kaa manaa main nahiin to kyaa hai tere saath merii vafaa   tere liye ujaalon kii koii kamii nahiin sab terii raushanii hai merii raushanii nahiin koii nayaa chiraag jalaa main nahiin to kyaa hai tere saath merii vafaa   kuchh dhadakanon kaa zikr ho kuchh dil kii baat ho mumakin hai isake baad na din ho na raat ho mere liye na ashk bahaa main nahiin to kyaa hai tere saath merii vafaa

Title: aa rii aa jaa nindiyaa tuu le chal kahiin udan khatole men
Lyrics: aa rii aa jaa nindiyaa tuu le chal kahiin udanakhatole men duur duur duur yahaan se duur  meraa to ye jiivan samaa  mere yaar badaa dukh de par mujhako jahaan men milaa sukh kaun badaa tujhase tere liye merii jaan zahar hazaar  main pii luungaa taj duungaa duniyaa ek tere sang jii luungaa khuub  nazar ke nuur  aa rii aa jaa nindiyaa tuu le chal kahiin udanakhatole men duur duur duur yahaan se duur  ye sach hai ki main agar sukh chain dilaataa huun terii duniyaa se main phir kahiin kab duur chalaa jaaun nahiin mere  daddy  aisii baat phir se naa kahanaa rah jaanaa jab tuu  phir mujhako bhii nahiin rahanaa naa jaa tuu hamase duur

Title: tum saamane baithe raho palaken merii tham jaaen
Lyrics: tum saamane baithe raho palaken merii tham jaaen hasarat hai ye ghadiyaan jab aaen vo tham jaaen tum saamane baithe raho threedots  tumase hii mohabbat hai tum par hii aqiidat hai ai jaanetamannaaii ye baat haqiiqat hai ab chhote se is dil men ye chhotii sii hasarat hai tum saamane baithe raho threedots  aae na kabhii duurii koii na ho majabuurii tohafaa hai yahii meraa rahe maang ye sinduurii 2 mere dil kii duaa hai ke ho aas merii puurii tum saamane baithe raho threedots

Title: main tasviir utaarataa huun
Lyrics: main tasviir utaarataa huun  bikharii huii hasiinon kii julfen savaarataa huun  phir julfon ke sang men main raaten guzaarataa huun   koi hasiinaa kitanii bhi magaruur ho  husn kii duniya men kitanii mashahuur ho  mastii men chuur ho paas ho ya dur ho daudii chalii ati hai  main jisako pukaarataa huun  main tasviir utaarataa huun threedots   chaand ki bhi na padii jinape kiran maine dekhe un hasiinon ke badan  meraa aisa hai chalan jaanejaan o jaaneman tod ke saare bandhan  main sabako nihaarataa huun  main tasviir utaarataa huun threedots   thak ke saahil pe samandar so gayaa yaad teri aa gayii main so gayaa  ye gayaa threedots main vo gayaa threedots ye mujhe kya ho gayaa  ye gayaa main vo gayaa ye mujhe kya ho gayaa  naam tera leta huun main jisako pukaarataa huun  main tasviir utaarataa huun threedots

Title: bol sakhii rii apane piyaa ko kaise aaj rijhaauun
Lyrics: bol sakhii rii apane piyaa ko kaise aaj rijhaauun kajaraa daaruun maang sanwaaruun yaa bindiyaa chamakaauun bol sakhii rii apane piyaa ko kaise aaj rijhaauun  aayenge aaj sajan more anganaa pahanuun sakhii main kaun saa kanganaa kaun saa jhuumar kaun sii maalaa kaise paayal chhanakaauun bol sakhii rii apane piyaa ko kaise aaj rijhaauun  koii payal ke ghungharuu jaage dharatii pe moraa pag naahin laage naachat naachat naachat naachat aaj kushii se naachat naachat naachat naachat 3 aaj kushii se main na kahiin mar jaauun main na kahiin mar jaauun

Title: do dil tuute do dil haare
Lyrics: do dil tuute do dil haare duniyaan vaalon sadake tumhaare  dekhegii mukhadaa apanaa ab se javaanii dil ke daag men barasegaa kaise saavan kaise padenge jhuule baag men bain karenge kvaab kunvaare do dil tuute do dil haare  main na rahuungii lekin guunjenge aahen mere gaanv men ab na khilegii sarason ab na lagegii mehandii paanv men ab na ugenge chaand sitaare do dil tuute do dil haare  pyaar tumhaaraa dekhaa dekhaa tumhaaraa aankhen modanaa tod ke jaanaa dil ko khel nahiin hai dil kaa todanaa tadapoge tum bhii saath hamaare do dil tuute do dil haare

Title: raqqaasaa meraa naam
Lyrics: raqqaasaa meraa naam raqqaasaa mera naam ai saahib sab ko salaam 2 aap kii kidamat ke liye main haazir huun aaj kii shaam raqqaasaa meraa naam ai saahib saba ko salaam  taubaa taubaa dekhe to mere andaaz koii aa uu taubaa taubaa dekhe to mere andaaz koii phir sun ke dekhe apane dil kii aawaaz koii maine chhedii gazal ab chhedegaa koii mahveraqs huun main dekho mahvediid hain log tamaam ai saahib 2 raqqaasaa meraa naam ai saahiib saba ko salaam  rafii marahabaa dilarubaa marahabaa e dilarubaa 3 taubaa aashaa taubaa rafii al habiibii khubas marhabaa e dilarubaa taubaa aashaa o o rafii taariif ke qaabil hai tuu ik hasiin qaatil hai tuu ik nazar dekh idhar jaanejigar dil chaahe bas ho jaauun tere ishq men main badanaam raqqaasaa teraa naam aashaa ai saahib sab ko salaam rafii o raqqaasaa teraa naam aashaa ai saahib sab ko salaam aap kii kidamat ke liye main haazir huun aaj kii shaam raqqaasaa meraa naam ai saahib sab ko salaam

Title: ronaa kabhii nahiin ronaa chahe tuut jaae
Lyrics: ronaa kabhii nahiin ronaa chahe tuut jaae koii khilaunaa sonaa chupake se sonaa chahe tuut jaae koii sapanaa salonaa ronaa kabhii nahiin threedots  dukhsukh kii kyaa baat hai kyaa din hai kyaa raat hai aansuu bhii muskaan banen yah to apane haath hai aashaaon kii dorii men sadaa tum man ke phuul pironaa ronaa kabhii nahiin threedots  dekho bachchon baag men sab kaliyaan nahiin khilatiin duniyaa men insaan ko sab chiizen nahiin milatiin apanaa nahiin tum usake lie jo apanaa hai nahiin khonaa ronaa kabhii nahiin threedots  rang se aur na dhaam se jaat se aur na naam se izzat milatii hai yahaan dekho achchhe kaam se koii kaam buraa tum mat karanaa badanaam kabhii nahiin honaa ronaa kabhii nahiin threedots

Title: tum mujhe yuun bhulaa naa paaoge
Lyrics: tum mujhe yun bhulaa naa paaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa naa paaoge jab kabhii bhii sunoge giit mere sang sang tum bhii gunagunaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa naa paaoge ho tum mujhe yun threedots  vo bahaaren vo chaandanii raaten hamane kii thii jo pyar kii baaten   2 un nazaaron kii yaad aaegii jab khayaalon men mujhako laaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa naa paaoge ho tum mujhe yun threedots  mere haathon men teraa cheharaa thaa jaise koi gulaab hotaa hai   2 aur sahaaraa liyaa thaa baahon kaa vo shaam kis tarah bhulaaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa naa paaoge ho tum mujhe yun threedots  mujhako dekhe binaa qaraar naa thaa ek aisaa bhii daur guzaraa hai   2 jhuth maanun to puchhalo dil se main kahungaa to ruth jaaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa naa paaoge  jab kabhii bhii threedots

Title: aa mere saathii aa
Lyrics: aa mere saathii aa dil kii baat sunataa jaa raahon men bichhaauun taare ho ho aa mere saathii aa dil kii baat sunataa jaa raahon men bichhaauun taare  ruu  ruu ruu ruu ruu  ruu ruu ruu ruu  ruu ruu ruu ruu   wahaan terii duniyaa jahaan main huun magar tuu naa jaane kahaan main huun  2 ujaalon men khoye hue  o sanam yahaan main huun mere hamadam yahaan main huun ho ho aa mere saathii aa dil kii baat sunataa jaa raahon men bichhaauun taare   idhar bhii zaraa bekabar dekh le jo dhuundhe tujhe wo nazar dekh le  2 pukaaruun main kab se tujhe o sanam udhar tuu hai mere hamadam idhar main huun ho ho aa mere saathii aa dil kii baat sunataa jaa raahon men bichhaauun taare   zamiin se pare is jahaan se pare mere saath chal aasamaan se pare  2 kayaalon men duube hue o sanam jawaan tuu hai mere hamadam jawaan main huun ho ho aa mere saathii aa dil kii baat sunataa jaa raahon men bichhaauun taare

Title: mujhe nahiin puuchhanii tumase biitii baaten
Lyrics: mujhe nahiin puuchhanii tumase biitii baaten kaise bhii guzaarii hon tumane apanii raaten jaisii bhii ho bas aaj se tum merii ho merii hii banake rahanaa mujhe tumase hai itanaa kahanaa mujhe nahiin puuchhanii threedots  biite hue kal pe tumhaare adhikaar nahiin hai meraa us dvaar pe main kyon jaauun jo dvaar nahiin hai meraa biitaa huaa kal to biit chukaa kal kaa dukh aaj naa sahanaa mujhe nahiin puuchhanii threedots  main raam nahiin huun phir kyuun ummiid karuun siitaa kii koii insaanon men dhuundhe kyon paavanataa gangaa kii duniyaa men farishtaa koii nahiin insaan hii banake rahanaa mujhe nahiin puuchhanii threedots

Title: raajuu chal raajuu apanii mastii men tuu
Lyrics: raajuu chal raajuu apanii mastii men tuu koii jie yaa mare kyaa hamako baabuu raajuu chal raajuu threedots  maanaa ke hasiin hain duniyaa ke mele ab to ham bhii rahenge mele men akele jab tak na ho jaae apanaa dil beqaabuu raajuu chal raajuu threedots  jag men jo buraa hai ham dekhen na sunen kaanton ko hataa ke phuulon ko chunen sab duniyaa begaanii do apane main aur tuu raajuu chal raajuu threedots  pariyaan ye kahaan le chalii aaiin gaanv men aae niind haay zulfon kii chhaanv men ham pe na chal jaae in zulfon kaa jaaduu raajuu chal raajuu threedots

Title: apanii nigaaheshauq ke  are maine tujhako chaahaa
Lyrics: apanii nigaaheshauq ke qaabil banaa diyaa hamako duaaen do tumhen qaatil banaa diyaa  are maine tujhako chaahaa ye hai merii meharabaanii main galiyon kaa raajaa tuu mahalon kii raanii 2 are maine tujhako threedots  maine badal daalaa terii taqadiir ko rangon se bhar daalaa khaalii tasviir ko 2 banaa daalii maine terii zindagaanii are maine tujhako threedots  tuu kuubasuurat hai teraa kyaal hai jaa merii aankhon kaa ye sab kamaal hai mere pyaar ne dii hai tujhako javaanii  are maine tujhako threedots  mahalon men hogii bahut dhaak terii galiyon men varanaa qadar kaaq terii ke main aag huun aag huun tuu hai paanii are maine tujhako threedots

Title: merii duur se aaii baaraat maiyaa main to paunii
