Lyrics: meri duur se aaii baaraat maiyaa main to paunii 2   balamaa chhail chhabiilaa man ko mohe balamaa  jodaa rang rangiilaa tan pe sohe balamaa 2  padaa paanv ye kisakaa aangan men khile phuul se mere tan man men chhuutaa maike kii galiyon kaa saath maiyaa main to paunii  meri duur se aaii baaraat maiyaa main to paunii   le gaye dil ko luut ke tere bol rasiile  ghaayal kar gaye haay ghaayal kar gaye jaan ko tere nain katiile  main to vaarii jaauun baalii haarii jaauun  jab mukhadaa dekhuun darpan men teri surat ubhare nainan men bhalii laage na naihar kii baat maiyaa main to paunii  meri duur se aaii baaraat maiyaa main to paunii   vaar diyaa mainne tujh par dil vaar diyaa  haar diyaa mainne sab kuchh are haar diyaa  maar diyaa tune zulmii haay maar diyaa  main to vaarii jaauun baalii haarii jaauun  tera naam base mere tan man men tera ruup base mere sapanan men liyaa saajan ne hathon men haath  maiyaa main to paunii  meri duur se aaii baaraat maiyaa main to paunii

Title: ye naa hogaa  ham donon mil ke kaagaz pe dil ke
Lyrics: aa 	ye naa hogaa mu 	nahiin hogaa hogaa aa 	kaise mu 	maano tum agar meraa kahanaa 	ham donon mil ke kaagaz pe dil ke 	chitthii likhenge javaab aaegaa  aa 	chitthii ke lifaafe pe naam kyaa likhenge mu 	naam chhodo puuchho paigaam kyaa likhenge aa 	o likhenge ki chitthii milate hii chale aao mu 	baagon men phuulon ke khilate hii chale aao aa 	chamakenge taare dil men hamaare 	aur ban ke vo mahataab aaegaa mu 	ham donon mil ke threedots  aa 	vaadaa thaa tumhaaraa kabhii doge ik nishaanii mu 	duungaa abhii to baaqii hai saarii zindagaanii aa 	jab ham na honge tab shaayad ye baat ho mu 	ho sakataa hai aaj hii vo pyaar bharii raat ho aa 	hai vo safar men is suune ghar men 	ban ke mehamaan o janaab aaegaa mu 	ham donon mil ke threedots

Title: kal kyaa hogaa kisako pataa
Lyrics: he he he he threedots laa laa laa threedots kal kyaa hogaa kisako pataa abhii zindagii kaa le lo mazaa 2  he dilawaalo duniyaa kii aisii taisii har pal apanaa hai din kaisaa raat kaisii he aish karo naacho gaao khaao piyo he jiinaa hai to mastii men rahake jiyo he he he he threedots laa laa laa threedots kal kyaa hogaa threedots  he ham jahaan hallaa gullaa hogaa wahiin ham se duniyaa hai duniyaa se ham nahiin he jab tak dam men hai dam pyaare he tab tak kaahe kaa hai gam pyaare he he he he threedots laa laa laa threedots kal kyaa hogaa threedots

Title: jagat musaafir khaanaa lagaa hai aanaa jaanaa
Lyrics: jagat musaafir khaanaa lagaa hai aanaa jaanaa  chaand chhupe to suuraj nikale suuraj duube ho jaae shaam rut aae rut jaae mausam aane jaane kaa hai naam ho jogii kisakaa thaur thikaanaa threedots  dekhe pahunche kaun kahaan par raahii nikalaa gaataa hansataa sabakii apaniiapanii manzil apanaaapanaa rastaa o jogii jiivan path anjaanaa threedots  chaar dinon kaa mel hai bhaiyaa jisane saare khel rachaae maan bachchon se milane aae phir vaapas ghar jaae o jogii ye dasatuur puraanaa threedots

Title: pag laage daasii daras kii pyaasii
Lyrics: pag laage daasii daras kii pyaasii2 aajaa darshan de he banavaasii pag laage daasii daras kii pyaasii ho pag laage daasii daras kii pyaasii aajaa darshan de he banavaasii pag laage daasii daras kii pyaasii  aajaa terii binatii karuun main raah men terii siis dharuun main aajaa terii binatii karuun main mohe apane hii rang men rangade2 aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa mohe apane hii rang men rangade rangade re mohe apanaa rang de re banavaasii pag laage daasii daras kii pyaasii ho pag laage daasii daras kii pyaasii  mujhako apanaa ruup dikhaade priit bachaade laaj nibhaade mujhako apanaa ruup dikhaade2 der naa kar mere bhaag jagaade aag ke bujhate diip jalaade mujhako apanaa ruup dikhaade mohe apane hii rang men rangade2 aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa he banavaasii5 he banavaasii he banavaasii he banavaasii banavaasii7 mohe apane hii rang men rangade apane hii rang men rangade he banavaasii mohe apane hii rang men rangade apane hii rang men rangade rang de re aaaaa rang de re aaaaa rang de re

Title: chehare se zaraa aanchal jab aapane sarakaayaa
Lyrics: mu 	chehare se zaraa aanchal jab aapane sarakaayaa 	duniyaa ye pukaar uthii lo chaand nikal aayaa 	chehare se zaraa threedots  	maanaa ke vo hiiraa ho mushkil se jo haath aae 	itanaa bhii na tadapaao ke jaan nikal jaae 	chhodo jii aa 	naa naa mu 	ye jhagade aa 	naa naa mu 	chhodo jii ab ye jhagade ek baar muskaraa do 	taqadiir hai kyaa apanii maine jo tumhen paayaa 	duniyaa ye pukaar threedots  aa 	vaise to mujhe tum par puuraa hii bharosaa hai 	par kaise bhulaa duun main aankhon ne jo dekhaa hai 	chhedoge mu 	taubaa aa 	dil todoge mu 	taubaa aa 	chhedoge dil todoge ek baar muskaraa do mu 	bas itanii shiqaayat par kitanaa mujhe tadapaayaa 	duniyaa ye pukaar threedots

Title: gunche lage hain kahane
Lyrics: gunche lage hain kahane phuulon se bhii sunaa hai taraanaa pyaar kaa kahataa hai dil aake mil o merii zindagii tanahaa na biit jaaye din bahaar kaa  abhii abhii ik havaa kaa jhonkaa  yaad terii le aayaa yaad ke saazon par dil ne  ik priit kaa giit sunaayaa 2 o merii dilarubaa sun le zaraa kahataa hai dil tujhase ye kyaa afasaanaa gunche lage hain kahane threedots  dilabar mere dil men kyaa hai tuu jo ise sun letii mere sang jiivan ke kitane sapane tuu bun letii 2 o merii dilarubaa tuu ban shamaa aur dekh jaa jalataa huaa paravaanaa gunche lage hain kahane threedots

Title: diiwaaron kaa jangal jisakaa aabaadii hai naam
Lyrics: diiwaaron kaa jangal jisakaa aabaadii hai naam baahar se chupchup lagataa hai andar hai koharaam  diiwaaron ke is jangal men bhatak rahe insaan apaneapane ulajhe daaman jhatak rahe insaan apanii vipadaa chodake aaye2 kaun kisii ke kaam baahar se chupchup lagataa hai andar hai koharaam  siine kaalii aankhen suunii cheharon par hairaanii 2 jitane ghane hangaame isamen utanii ghanii viiraanii raaten kaalii subahen mujrim 2 mulzim hai har shaam baahar se chupchup lagataa hai andar hai koharaam

Title: raaste kaa patthar qismat ne mujhe banaa diyaa
Lyrics: raaste kaa patthar qismat ne mujhe banaa diyaa jo raaste se guzaraa ek thokar lagaa gayaa raaste kaa patthar threedots  kitane ghaav lage hain ye mat puuchho mere dil pe kitanii thokar khaaii naa pahunchaa manzil pe koii aage phenk gayaa to koii piichhe hataa gayaa raaste kaa patthar threedots  pahale kyaa kar paayaa kyaa isake baad karuungaa main jaa rii jaa ai duniyaa kyaa tujhako yaad karuungaa main do din terii mahafil men kyaa aayaa kyaa gayaa raaste kaa patthar threedots

Title: dil ki gahraaii naap gar paate
Lyrics: dil kii gaharaaii naap gar paate aapakii yaad se mafarr paate  mafarr  escape bachane kaa raastaa  mujhako koii gilaa nahiin tumase kaash itanii sii baat kar paate  bhuul jaate gamon ko jis lamhaa tere shaanon pe apanaa sar paate  dardegurabat ko bhii amaan milatii ham agar teraa  sangedar paate  maang kar dard saarii duniyaa ke ham nishaatealam se mar paate

Title: machal ke jab bhii aankhon se chhalak jaate hain do aansuu
Lyrics: machal ke jab bhi aankhon se chhalak jaate hain do aansuu sunaa hai aabashaaron ko badi taqaliif hoti hai  khudaaraa ab to bujh jaane do is jalati hui lau ko charaagon se mazaaron ko badi taqaliif hoti hai machal threedots  kahuun kyaa vo badi maasuumiyat se puuchh baithe hain kyaa sachamuch dil ke maaron ko badi taqaliif hoti hai machal threedots  tumhaaraa kyaa tumhen to raah de dete hain kaante bhi magar ham kaakazaaron ko badi taqaliif hoti hai machal threedots

Title: sun jaa aa thandii havaa  aahaa tham jaa ai kaalii ghataa
Lyrics: la 	 sun jaa aa thandii havaa ki 	aahaa tham jaa ai kaalii ghataa 	kuchh pyaariipyaarii baaten hamaarii aa jaatejaate tuu bhii sun jaa  2 	tham jaa ai kaalii threedots  ki 	ham aaj donon akele hain sun baavarii 	yuun hii shor machaanaa naa tuu la 	jo niind aa jaae saiyaan kii baiyaan men 	to zindagii bhar jagaanaa na tuu ki 	dhiiredhiire haulehaule la 	man kii kahaanii aa rii diivaanii 	chhupatechhupaate tuu bhii sun jaa ki 	tham jaa ai kaalii threedots  la 	par yaad rakhanaa ye baaten 	kisii aur se jaa ke bairan tuu kahanaa nahiin ki 	nainon men nindiyaa nahiin aaj bas  	aaj hamare jiyaa men bhii chainaa nahiin la 	choriichorii chupakechupake ki 	ek duusare se ham jo kahenge 	hansatehansaate tuu bhii sun jaa 	tham jaa ai kaalii threedots

Title: duur rahakar na karo baat kariib aa jaao
Lyrics: duur rah kar na karo baat qariib aa jaao yaad rah jaaegii ye raat qariib aa jaao  ek muddat se tamannaa thii tumhen chhuune kii aaj bas men nahiin jazabaat qariib aa jaao  sard jhokon se bhadakate hain badan men shole jaan le legii ye barasaat qariib aa jaao  is kadar hamase jhijhakane kii zaruurat kyaa hai zindagii bhar kaa hai ab saath qariib aa jaao

Title: dekh mausam kah rahaa hai baanhon men aa ke merii jhuul jaa
Lyrics: dekh mausam kah rahaa hai baanhon men aa ke merii jhuul jaa maan na maan merii jaan mausam kii to maan bhii jaa  chhod bhii de munh banaanaa ye bhii zaraa maan le aaj choriichorii tuu dil men lagaanaa  ab to tuu kaisekaise rangruup dikhaae tere pyaar se piyaa re baaj aae he aajaa re aajaa rahane bhii de tuu kaahe tiikhetiikhe nakhare dikhaae lagii dil kii merii kaahe ko badhaaii zindagii pyaar ke din yuun hii na jaaen biit re  merii baaton men terii mujhako to dar hai aatejaate na aa jaauun phir kyaa hogaa ye bhii soch ghabaraauun hai sun mahakiimahakii saanson men terii apanii thandii saansen aa milaauun ai pyaar yahii to kaise samajhaauun unhen maan le maan jaauun jaanejaan merii har baat ko kyaa kahegaa dekh mausam kah threedots

Title: mere mahabuub tere dam se hai duniyaa men bahaar
Lyrics: mere mahabuub tere dam se hai duniyaa men bahaar varanaa is gam se bharii duniyaa men kyaa rakhaa hai 2 mere mahabuub tere threedots  terii aankhon men nazar aaii hai jannat mujhako merii jannat terii aankhon ke sivaa koii nahiin mere mahabuub tere threedots  main tasavvur men tere jhuum liyaa karataa huun merii daulat terii chaahat ke sivaa koii nahiin mere mahabuub tere threedots  zindagaanii men kaii rang ke mod aate hain tuu salaamat rahe shaayar kii duaa kahatii hai chaand ghatataa hai ghate husn teraa badhataa hii rahe main rahuun yaa na rahuun merii vafaa kahatii hai mere mahabuub tere threedots

Title: niind churaaye chain churaaye
Lyrics: niind churaaye chain churaaye daaka daale terii bansii2 are dindahaade are dindahaade chorii kare raat bhar jagaaye  daaka daale terii bansii threedots  man men lage aise agan jaise chamake bijuriyaa baadal men2 chup ke kabhii le jaauungii terii bansii chhupaake aanchal men kaahe shaam dhale kaahe shaam dhale kadam tale mujhako bulaaye daaka daale terii bansii threedots  samajhii thii main natakhat hai tuu bas maakhan churaayaa karataa hai2 diivaanii main naa jaane tuu kaahe panaghat pe aayaa kartaa hai mohe laaj aaye mohe laaj aaye haay nahiin baat kahii jaaye daaka daale terii bansii threedots  bansii kii dhun sunake piyaa jiyaa meraa kahiin kho jaataa hai2 main kyaa kahuun kyaa naa kahuun mohe naa jaane kyaa ho jaataa hai giit priit bhare giit priit bhare gaaye sudhbudh bisaraaye daaka daale terii bansii threedots

Title: sajii nahiin baarat to kyaa  bin phere ham tere
Lyrics: sajii nahiin baaraat to kya  aaii na milan kii raat to kya  byaah kiyaa teri yaadon se  gathabandhan tere vaadon se  bin phere ham tere 3   tan ke rishte tuut bhi jaaye  tuute na man ke bandhan  jisane diyaa mujhako apanaapan  usiikaa hai ye jivan  baandh liyaa man ka bandhan  jivan hai tujh par arpan  sajii threedots   tuune apana maan liyaa hai  ham the kahaan is kaabil  jo ehasaan kiyaa jaan dekar  usako chukaanaa mushkil  deh banii na dulhan to kya  pahane nahiin kangan to kya  sajii threedots   jisakaa hamen adhikaar nahiin tha  usakaa bhi balidaan diyaa  bhale bure ko ham kya jaane  jo bhi kiyaa tere liye kiyaa  laakh rahen ham sharamindaa  magar rahe mamataa zindaa  sajii threedots   aanch na aaye naam pe tere  khaak bhale ye jivan ho  apane jahaan men aag lagaa den  tera jahaan jo raushan ho   tere liye dil tod len ham  dil to kya jag chhod den ham  sajii threedots

Title: mujhe de rahe hain tasalliyaan
Lyrics: mujhe de rahe hain tasalliyaan vo har ek taazaa payaam se kabhii aa ke manzareaam par kabhi hat ke manzareaam se   na garaz kisii se na vaasataa mujhe kaam apane hii kaam se tere zikr se terii fikr se terii yaad se tere naam se   mere saaqiyaa  mere saaqiyaa tujhe marhabaa tujhe marhabaa tuu pilaaye jaa tu pilaaye jaa isii chashmejaambajaam se   teri subhoaish hai kyaa balaa tujhe ai falak jo ho hausalaa kabhii kar le aa ke muqaabalaa gamehijreyaar kii shaam se

Title: mere nainaa saavan bhaadon phir bhii meraa man pyaasaa
Lyrics: mere nainaa saavan bhaadonn phir bhii meraa man pyaasaa  2  ai dil diivaane khel hai kyaa jaane dard bharaa ye giit kahaan se in honthon pe aae duur kahiin le jaae bhuul gayaa kyaa bhuul ke bhii hai mujhako yaad zaraa saa phir bhii threedots  baat puraanii hai ek kahaanii hai ab sochuun tumhen yaad nahiin hai ab sochuun nahiin bhuule vo saavan ke jhuule ritu aaye ritu jaaye deke jhuuthaa ek dilaasaa phir bhiithreedots  barason biit gae hamako mile bichhade bijurii banakar gagan pe chamake biite samay kii rekhaa main ne tum ko dekhaa man sang aankhmichaulii khele aashaa aur niraashaa phir bhiithreedots  mere nainaa saavan bhaadon phir bhii meraa man pyaasaa  2  baat puraanii haithreedots  ai dil diivaane threedots  barason biit gae hamako mile bichhade bijurii banakar gagan pe chamake biite samay kii rekhaa mainne tumako dekhaa tadap tadap ke is birahan ko aayaa chain zaraasaa phir bhii threedots  ghungharuu kii chhamachham ban gaii dil kaa gam duub gayaa dil yaadon men phir ubharii berang lakiiren dekho ye tasaviiren suune mahal men naach rahii hai ab tak ek rakkaasaa phir bhiithreedots

Title: atharaa baras kii tuu hone ko aaii re  jatan kuchh kar le
Lyrics: ra 	atharaa baras kii tuu hone ko aaii re 	kaun puuchhegaa jatan kuchh kar le 	sajan kar le jatan kuchh kar le la 	kaalii baaton se terii baat naa banegii raajaa  2 	hamase na hogaa milan kuchh kar le 	kuchh kar le jatan kuchh kar le  	mere ghungharuu salaamat hazaaron qadaradaan hain 	ek tuu hii nahiin dil men dil men laakhon mehamaan hain 2 ra 	lekin ab tak naachegii kabhii to thakegii 	jatan kuchh kar le threedots  	kar le hamase mohabbat mohabbat 	kar le hamase mohabbat guzar naa jaaen ghadiyaan 	haay tuutatii hai paayal to banatii hain hathakadiyaan 2 la 	 main hathakadiyaan pahanuungii  2 na pahanuungii tere kangan kuchh kar le 	kuchh kar le 	jatan kuchh kar le threedots

Title: mahakaamahakaa ruup tumhaaraa bahakiibahakii chaal
Lyrics: mahakaamahakaa ruup tumhaaraa bahakiibahakii chaal ai phuulon kii daal ye raahii puuchhe ek savaal tumhaaraa naam kyaa hai 2  honth ye gulaabii aankh ye sharaabii bahake na piike raat ko to raat kyaa huii 2 mahakaamahakaa ruup threedots  jo dekh le to kaise bhuule naa raastaa jaan lene vaalii ye saadagii tumhaarii do roz aur jiine do kudaa kaa vaastaa mahakaamahakaa ruup threedots  bolatii nigaahen ye bolatii adaaen hai chaal mastaanii ye jhuumatii javaanii ki dekhate hii dekhate dil kaa qaraar kho gayaa 2 ho mahakaamahakaa ruup threedots  aankh naa churaao zaraa saa ruk jaao do pyaar bhare bol to huzuur bol do tan jal rahaa hai ye badan jal rahaa hai ghataaon jaise kaalekaale baal khol do 2 ho mahakaamahakaa ruup threedots

Title: gam kii davaa to pyaar hai
Lyrics: gam kii davaa to pyaar hai gam kii davaa sharaab nahiin thukaraao naa hamaaraa pyaar itane to ham karaab nahiin gam kii davaa to threedots  jaataa hai jo jaane do aataa hai vo aane do biitii baaten biit gaiin naii bahaaren aane do bagiyaa men phuul hazaaron hain ek hii to gulaab nahiin gam kii davaa to threedots  ghaav jiyaa ke bhar denge tuutaa dil ham jodenge ban ke rahenge saathii ham saath kabhii naa chhodenge ab koii tumako sataa sake itanii kisii men taab nahiin gam kii davaa to threedots

Title: jiivan men tuu daranaa nahiin
Lyrics: jiivan men tuu daranaa nahiin sar niichaa kabhii karanaa nahiin himmat vaale ko maranaa nahiin ko 	maranaa nahiin 2 jiivan men tuu threedots  hai saathii tuu apanaa koii duujaa nahiin apanii har mushkil men akelaa tuu muskuraa jag men tuu sabase badaa hai dil chhotaa karanaa nahiin ko 	karanaa nahiin 2 jiivan men tuu threedots  jiinaa hai to pyaare tuu ladanaa zindagii se aandhii ho yaa tuufaan naa dabanaa kisii se jag men tuu aage hii badhanaa piichhe qadam dharanaa nahiin ko 	dharanaa nahiin 2 jiivan men tuu threedots

Title: uupar vaalaa dukhiyon kii naahiin sunataa re
Lyrics: ki 	uupar vaalaa dukhiyon kii naahiin sunataa re di 	sotaa hai bahut jaagaa hai naa ki 	uupar vaalaa dukhiyon kii naahiin sunataa re 	kaun hai jo usako gagan se utaare 	banbanban mere jaisaa ban 	is jiivan kaa yahii hai jatan saalaa yahii hai jatan  di 	are gam kii aag bujhaanaa hai to hamase siikho yaar 	aag lagii ki 	aag lagii hamarii jhopadiyaa men ham gaaven malhaar 	dekh bhaaii kitane tamaashe kii zindagaanii hamaar  	he bholebhaale lalavaa khaae jaa rotii baasii di 	are ye hii khaa ke javaan hogaa betaa ki 	bholebhaale lalavaa khaae jaa rotii baasii 	badaa ho ke banegaa saaheb kaa chaparaasii 	khelkhelkhel maatii men holii khel 	gaal men gulaal hai na zulfon men tel di 	are apanii bhii javaanii kyaa hai sunaa tene yaar 	aag lagii ki 	aag lagii hamarii threedots  	he sajanii tuu kaahe aaii nagarii hamaarii di 	chal jaa bhaag jaa bhaag ki 	sajanii tuu kaahe aaii nagarii hamaarii 	dhare saa bidesii baabuu bahiyaan tumhaarii 	thaamthaamthaam gorii zaraa thaam 	naahiin lut jaaegii raam kasam di 	are kehuun naahiin aaegaa re sun ke pukaar 	aag lagii ki 	aag lagii hamarii threedots

Title: main har ik pal kaa shaayar huun
Lyrics: main har ik pal kaa shaayar huun har ik pal merii kahaanii hai har ik pal merii hastii hai har ik pal merii javaanii hai main har ik pal kaa shaayar huun  rishton kaa ruup badalataa hai buniyaaden khatm nahiin hotiin kvaabon aur umangon kii miyaaden khatm nahiin hotiin ik phuul men teraa ruup basaa ik phuul men merii javaanii hai ik cheharaa terii nishaanii hai ik cheharaa merii nishaanii hai main har ik threedots  tujhako mujhako jiivan amrit ab in haathon se piinaa hai inakii dhadakan men basanaa hai inakii saanson men jiinaa hai tuu apanii adaaen baksh inhen main apanii vafaaen detaa huun jo apane lie sochiin thii kabhii vo saarii duaaen detaa huun main har ik threedots

Title: main na bhuuluungaa main na bhuuluungii
Lyrics: main naa bhuuluungaa main naa bhuuluungii in rasmon ko in qasamon ko in rishte naaton ko main naathreedots  chalo jag ko bhuulen khayaalon men jhuulen bahaaron men dolen sitaaron ko chhuulen aa terii main maang sanvaaruun tuu dulhan ban jaaye maang se jo dulhan kaa rishtaa main naa bhuuluungiithreedots  samay kii dhaaraa men umar bah jaanii hai jo ghadii jii lenge vahii rah jaanii hai main ban jaauun saans aakhirii tuu jiivan ban jaaye jiivan se saanson kaa rishtaa main naa bhuuluungiithreedots  barasataa saavan ho mahakataa aangan ho kabhii dil dulhaa ho kabhii dil dulhan ho gagan banakar jhuumen pavan banakar jhuumen chalo ham raah moden kabhii naa sang chhoden taras chakh jaanaa hai nazar chakh jaanaa hai  kahiin pe bas jaaenge ye din kat jaaenge are kyaa baat chalii vo dekho raat dhalii ye baaten chalatii rahen ye raaten dhalatii rahen main man ko mandir kar daaluun tuu puujan ban jaaye mandir se puujaa kaa rishtaa main naathreedots

Title: ai shaamegam bataa ke sahar kitanii duur hai
Lyrics: ai shaamegam bataa 2 ai shaamegam bataa ke sahar kitanii duur hai ai shaamegam bataa aansuu nahiin jahaan wo nagar kitanii duur hai ai shaamegam bataa  dam todatii nahiin hai jahaan par kisii kii aas 2 wo zindagii kii raahaguzar kitanii duur hai ai shaamegam bataa  ab koii paasabaan na koii apanaa hamasafar 2 manzil hamaarii kisako kabar kitanii duur hai ai shaamegam bataa  koii pukaarataa hai tujhe kab se ai kudaa 2 kahate hain tuu hai paas magar kitanii duur hai ai shaamegam bataa ai shaamegam bataa ke sahar kitanii duur hai ai shaamegam bataa

Title: tanman tere rangranguungii
Lyrics: tanman tere rangranguungii chhaayaa banakar sang chaluungii sevaa karuungii ang laguungii archanaa main terii saajanaa tanman tere threedots  janmjanm tere binaa nainaa nahiin soe ghadiighadii sapane tere palakon ne piroe tuu hai mere jiivan kii saadhanaa tanman tere threedots  pyaar teraa kumakum hai baanhen terii maalaa praan meraa pujaarii teraa man hai shivaalaa zindagii hai terii praarthanaa tanman tere threedots  jhuum uthaa anganaa meraa padii nazar terii raam kare laage tujhe saarii umar merii duniyaa ruuthe tuu naa ruuthanaa tanman tere threedots

Title: sandhyaa jo aaye
Lyrics: sandhyaa jo aaye  man ud jaaye jaane re kahaan karuun kyaa upaay sandhyaa jo aaye  man ud jaaye jaane re kahaan karuun kyaa upaay sandhyaa jo aaye   kaun rahaa hai apanaa kisako pukaaruun re kisako pukaaruun baithii akelii huun main panth nihaaruun re panth nihaaruun panchii bhii jaa sab laut aaye tum hii na aaye karuun kyaa upaay sandhyaa jo aaye  apanii to ek rainaa birahaa kii rainaa birahaa kii rainaa din kyaa hai ye na jaane  mere do nainaa mere do nainaa ek raat jaaye ek raat aaye tum hii kaho karuun kyaa upaay sandhyaa jo aaye  man ud jaaye jaane re kahaan karuun kyaa upaay sandhyaa jo aaye

Title: aap saa koii hasiin
Lyrics: aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pehale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pehale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin merii bhii zindagii kaante se phuul ho dil jo gariib kaa tumako qubuul ho  aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pehlae kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin  in hasiin aankhon se dil kaa payaam lo ek diiwaane kaa pehalaa salaam lo dil duaaen degaa girate ko thaam lo qariibeaashanaan itane qariib ho lagataa hai muddat se mere habiib ho  aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pehale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin aap saa koii hasiin  malakaaedilamaaraa meraa naam aaj hai husn kii suurat hai gulon kaa mizaaj hai aap ke sar bhii ulafat kaa taaj hai mittii ko aap ne pahunchaa diyaa kahaan jaise ude koii taaron ke darmiyaan  aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pehale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin  2

Title: man meraa teraa jogii aashaa puurii kab hogii
Lyrics: man meraa teraa jogii aashaa puurii kab hogii 2  aa jhuumatii chaandanii men ham aaj jii bhar nahaaen ye chaand hama ko takataa hai aao kahiin chhup jaaen lenaa hogaa shaayad hamako jag men janam dobaaraa man meraa teraa jogii threedots  hamako kahaan hai jaanaa manzil na koii thikaanaa meraa bhatakanaa teraa ye milanaa jiine kaa hai ik bahaanaa  hai pyaar men shaam guzarii jaane kahaan ab sahar ho hamako bharosaa nahiin zindagii kaa puuraa kahaan ye safar ho man meraa teraa jogii threedots

Title: vaqt thodaa saa abhii kuchh aur guzar jaane de
Lyrics: aa 	vaqt thodaa saa abhii kuchh aur guzar jaane de 	dil men uthataa huaa tuufaan thahar jaane de ki 	aur thodii der dekh lene de ye cheharaa 	zindagii bhar kii hasarat dil se nikal jaane de aa 	vaqt thodaa saa threedots  ki 	terii maasuum javaanii kaa hai ehasaas mujhe 	phir bhii baithaa le ghadii bhar ke lie paas mujhe 	o raanii aa 	tan kii duurii na rahe man kaa milan ho sachchaa 	pyaar kii aag men tanman bikhar jaane de 	vaqt thodaa saa threedots  	terii baanhon kaa kanval chuum luun to chain mile raajaa 	terii baanhon men zaraa jhuum luun to chain mile raajaa ki 	chand ghadiyaan mil gaiin jo zindagii se hamako 	apanii baanhon kii panaahon men guzar jaane de do 	vaqt thodaa saa threedots

Title: gorii teraa gaanv badaa pyaaraa
Lyrics: gorii teraa gaanv badaa pyaaraa main to gayaa maaraa aake yahaan re aake yahaan re usapar ruup teraa saadaa chandramadhu aadhaa aadhaa javaan re aadhaa javaan re  jii karataa hai mor ki pairon men paayaliyaa pahanaa duun kuhuu kuhuu gaati koyaliyaa ko phuulon ka gahanaa duun jhar jhar jharate hue jharane man ko lage harane aisaa kahaan re aisaa kahaan re usapar ruup teraa saadaa   threedots  rang birange phuul khile hain log bhii phuulon jaise aa jaaye ik baar yahaan jo jaayegaa phir kaise yahiin ghar apanaa banaane ko panchhii kare dekho tinake jamaa re tinake jamaa re usapar ruup teraa saadaa   threedots  paradesii anjaan ko aise koii nahiin apanaataa tum logon se jud gayaa jaise janam janam kaa naataa apane dhun men magan dole log yahaan bole dil kii zabaan re dil kii zabaan re usapar ruup teraa saadaa   threedots

Title: tuu jo nahiin koii meraa meraa koii nahiin
Lyrics: tuu jo nahiin koii meraa meraa koii nahiin zindagii terii yaadon men khoii phir bhii khoii nahiin  terii chaahat na jab tak milegii ruuh merii bhatakatii rahegii haal meraa agar vo sunenge mujhape diivaane bhii ro padenge haal sunake meraa phir bhii terii aankh roii nahiin tuu jo nahiin koii threedots  phir se dekhaa tujhe hamane jis dam mar chale the magar jii uthe ham berukii se hamen tuune maaraa tuu hai kaisaa masiihaa hamaaraa jab lagaanii na thii paar naiyaa kyon duboii nahiin tuu jo nahiin koii threedots

Title: pahale pahale pyaar kii main tumako kyaa kahuun
Lyrics: aa      pahale pahale pyaar kii mulaaqaaten yaad hain          mujhako to tumhaarii saarii baaten yaad hain          tumako kaise bhuul gayaa dil kaa ye afasaanaa          main tumako kyaa kahuun          ho o main tumako kyaa kahuun ki      diiwaanaa 2           kitane logon se main milakar bhuul jaata huun aa      ye to main jaanati huun ki      merii aadat hai aksar main bhuul jaataa huun aa      haa baabaa haa jaanati huun ki      kitane logon se main milakar bhuul jaata huun          merii aadat hai aksar main bhuul jaataa huun          dekhaa phir kuchh bhuul gayaa mujhko yaad dilaanaa          meraa kyaa naam hai aa      ye bhii bhuul gaye ki      he meraa kyaa naam hai aa      anjaanaa          main tumako kyaa kahuun ki      diiwaanaa           achchhaa main sab baaton kaa hisaab rakkhuungaa aa      yaad rahegaa naa ki      bilkul          yaadon aur waadon kii ek kitaab rakkhuungaa aa      dekho bhuulanaa nahiin ki      bilkul nahiin          achchhaa main sab baaton kaa hisaab rakkhuungaa          yaadon aur waadon kii ek kitaab rakkhuungaa          sabase pahale isamen tum apanaa naam likhaanaa          teraa kyaa naam hai2 aa      sultaanaa          main tumako kyaa kahuun ki      diiwaanaa

Title: sun we balorii akh waalyaa
Lyrics: sun we balorii akh waalyaa assan dil tere naal laa lyaa terii maharbaanii mere haanii meraa ban jaa  dil agge ik naiyon chaladii saanwaan ch ag jaii baladii dhokhaa jawaanii hatthon khaa lyaa chup kiite dil nuun ganwaa lyaa  lukyaa nayiin rahndaa kadii pyaar we zid chad kar iqraar we sohanyaan tuun badaa chir taalyaa had kolon buhtaa azmaa lyaa  ghairaan waang saanuun naa tuun mil we qadmaan ch rakh daan gii dil we kadii je tuun has ke bulaa lyaa mainuun jad apanaa banaa lyaa

Title: karunaa suno shyaam morii
Lyrics: karunaa suno shyaam morii main to hoii rahii cherii torii karunaa suno shyaam morii  tumare kaaran sab sukh chhodyaa ab mohe kyon tarasaa ho viraha vyathaa laagii ur antar so tum aae bujhaa  karunaa suno shyaam morii threedots

Title: tuune hamen kyaa diyaa rii zindagii
Lyrics: tuune hamen kyaa diyaa rii zindagii hamane maangii to milii naa maut bhii  kaalii haath aae the kaalii haath ham chale dilajale hamane chaahe the phuul hii hamane paaii naa dhuul bhii  naa diyaa naa kiran man kaa ye suunaapan phuunke tan duur galiyon men raat bhar jhilamilaatii hai chaandanii  haan bevafaa bekabar beiimaan beqadar tuu magar giit gaataa hai tere hii duniyaa men har aadamii

Title: aapakaa sarakaar kyaa kuchh kho gayaa hai
Lyrics: aapakaa sarakaar kyaa kuchh kho gayaa hai ye achaanak aapako kyaa ho gayaa hai kuchh kahie chup na rahie khoekhoe se ho kisalie aapakaa sarakaar threedots  lo gayaa vo gayaa ab use bhuulie zulf se haan khelie haan baanhon men jhuulie  dekhe naa  3 koii aankhon men aa aa jaaie jaane na jaane koii dil men samaa jaaie aapakaa sarakaar threedots  aapako dekhakar dil par bijalii girii is qadar berukii ye berukii chhodakar aisaa milegaa naa dil duusaraa dil naa meraa todie aapakaa sarakaar threedots

Title: dil kii baaten dil hii jaane
Lyrics: ki 	dil kii baaten la 	dil hii jaane ki 	aankhen chheden la 	sau afasaane ki 	naazuknaazuk la 	pyaarepyaare ki 	vaade hain la 	iraade hain ki 	aaaa mil ke daaman daaman se baandh len la 	aaaa mil ke daaman daaman se baandh len ki 	dil kii baaten threedots  	tuu hans padii yaa phulajhadii chhuutii kahiiin dhadakan badhii 	ik sholaa saa laharaa gayaa la 	haa haa ye nuur hogaa terii aankhon men pyaar kaa ki 	yaa nagamaa guunjaa hogaa bahaar kaa 	dil kii baaten threedots  la 	tuu jo kahe main vo kahuun saayaa banuun sangsang rahuun 	tuu aur main ab ek hain ki 	aaaa main giit ban tere honth chuum luun la 	aa sapanaa ban ke in aankhon men jhuum luun do 	dil kii baaten threedots

Title: taaron men sajake apane suuraj se dekho dharatii chalii milane
Film: jal bin machli nritya bin bijili
Lyrics: taaron men sajake apane suuraj se dekho dharati chali milane jhanaki paayal macha gai halachal ambar saaraa lagaa hilane  hai ghataaon kaa do nain men kaajal dhuup kaa mukh pe daale sunaharaa saa aanchal  2 ho threedots yuun laharaai li angadaai lagi jaise dhanak khilane  taaron men sajake apane suuraj se threedots  aag si lapake jalati hui raahen ji ko bahalaaen bechain tuufaan kii aanhen  2 ho threedots naa daregi naa rukegii dekhen kyaa ho kahaa dil ne  taaron men sajake apane suuraj se threedots

Title: paas nahiin aanaa bhuul nahiin jaanaa
Lyrics: la 	paas nahiin aanaa bhuul nahiin jaanaa 	tumako saugandh hai ki aaj mohabbat band hai 	paas nahiin aanaa threedots  ki 	pahale to aag bhadakaatii hai 	phir dil kii pyaas tuu bujhaatii hai 	terii yahii adaa to mujhako pasand hai la 	achchhaa ki 	haanhaan la 	magar aaj mohabbat band hai threedots  la 	kitanaa mazaa hai aise jiine men 	dhakdhak bhii hotii nahiin siine men 	koii bechainii nahiin kitanaa aanand hai 	ki aaj mohabbat band hai threedots  ki 	mat chhed apane diivaane ko 	rahane de tuu is bahaane ko 	honthon pe naa hai magar dil to razaamand hai la 	razaamand hai 	magar aaj mohabbat band hai threedots

Title: ik pyaar kaa nagamaa hai maujon kii ravaanii hai
Lyrics: ek pyaar kaa nagamaa hai maujon kii ravaanii hai zindagii aur kuchh bhii nahiin terii merii kahaanii hai  2  kuchh paakar khonaa hai kuchh khokar paanaa hai jiivan kaa matalab to aanaa aur jaanaa hai do pal ke jiivan se ek umr churaanii hai zindagii aur  tuu dhaar hai nadiyaa kii main teraa kinaaraa huun tuu meraa sahaaraa hai main teraa sahaaraa huun aankhon men samandar hai aashaaon kaa paanii hai zindagii aur  tuufaan to aanaa hai aakar chale jaanaa hai baadal hai ye kuchh pal kaa chhaakar dhal jaanaa hai parachhaainyaan rah jaatiin rah jaatii nishaanii hai zindagii aur  jo dil ko tasallii de vo saaz uthaa laao dam ghutane se pahale hii aavaaz uthaa laao khushiyon kii tamannaa hai ashkon kii ravaanii hai zindagii aur

Title: ek do tiin chaar paanch chhe aur saat
Lyrics: ek do tiin chaar paanch chhe aur saat saat saathii khel khelen chhuut na jaaye saath   gaii o gaii o gaii gaii gaii piilii jisakii saadii nikalii badii anaadii rah gae chhe khilaadii  2 ek haare ek jiite sharam kii kyaa hai baat 2 chhe saathii khel khelen chhuut na jaaye saath   gaii o gaii o gaii gaii gaii niilii jisakii ankhiyaan miithii jisakii batiyaa  raha gaii paanch hii sakhiyaan 2 ek haare ek jiite sharam kii kyaa hai baat 2 paanch saathii khel khelen chhuut na jaaye saath   gaii o gaii o gaii gaii gaii naam thaa jisakaa raakhii jisane kii chaalaakii raha gaii tiin hii baakii  ek haare ek jiite sharam kii kyaa hai baat 2 tiin saathii khel khelen chhuut na jaaye saath

Title: halkii sii qasakmasak hotii hai dil men
Lyrics: halkii sii qasakmasak haayhaay qasakmasak hotii hai dil men huun is dil ke haathon par pad gae mushqil men huun huun  nirlaj pavan ke jhonke bade hain besharm mere piichhe pade hain sau baar odhuun aanchal na chhoduun phir bhii chunar rahe dhalakii sii halkii sii dhadakdhadak haayhaay dhadakdhadak hotii hai dil men threedots  bas chale aae chaaho jo ho jaae lambii umar ik pal kii sii halkii sii ataksatak haayhaay ataksatak hotii hai dil men threedots  main gir na jaauun mujhako sambhaalo aankhon men rakh lo dil men chhupaa lo chhaaii hai aisii mastii ye kaisii rahatii hai bas jo palak sii halkii sii latakmatak haayhaay latakmatak hotii hai dil men threedots

Title: jab tum ho mere hamasafar kuubasuurat
Lyrics: jab tum ho mere hamasafar kuubasuurat 2 to hai zindagii kaa safar kuubasuurat jab tum ho threedots  chalaa tiir tiir se sharamaanaa kyaa ki jaan merii jaaegii ghabaraanaa kyaa idhar bhii hai pyaare jigar kuubasuurat jab tum ho threedots  mujhe dekhakar yuun na gusse men aa milen na milen phir zaraa muskaraa chehare pe gussaa agar kuubasuurat jab tum ho threedots  chamakate hain gaalon pe dilaqash andhere hai phuulon se naazuk kamar kuubasuurat jab tum ho threedots

Title: tayyab alii pyaar ka dushaman
Lyrics: r  tayyab alii pyaar kaa dushaman haay haay     merii jaan kaa dushaman haay haay      ladakaa aur ladakii ko raazii r  phir bhii na maane ko qaazii r  ye zidd na chhode mere dil ko tode     ye banane na de merii salamaa ko merii dulhan     tayyab alii pyaar kaa dushaman haay haay  r  lakadii beche aur na samajhe ladakii ke aramaanon ko     motaa seth taraazuu men tole     haan taraazuu men tole     chhote insaanon ko     ho jaaye buddhaa ko haan jii r  allaah ko pyaaraa ko haan jii r  main kar luun shaadii     khaanaa aabaadii     sulajh jaaye pal men merii barason kii ulajhan     tayyab alii   threedots      saath baras kii umar men aise cheharaa kisii kaa khilataa hai     hamako hai maaluum kisii se kisii se     chhupakar ye bhii milataa hai     main naam bataauun mu na jii na jii na jii r  tasaviir dikhaauun mu na jii na jii na jii r  dar gayaa ye kaise     baazaar men aise     shariifon ko ham rusavaa nahiin karate miyaan jumman     tayyab alii   threedots

Title: yaadon men wo sapanon men hai
Lyrics: yaadon men wo sapanon men hai jaayen kahaan  dhadakan kaa bandhan to dhadakan se hai  saanson se huun main kaise judaa apanon ko duun main kaise bhulaa yaadon men wo sapanon men hai jaayen kahaan dhadakan kaa bandhan to dhadakan se hai  ye raah ye galiyaan sabhii rok rahii raahen merii ye miit ye sakhiyaan sabhii dhuundh rahii nigaahen merii har mod par ek sapanaa khadaa jaanaa hai mushkil meraa yaadon men wo threedots  nainaa mere ansuan bhare puuchh rahe chalii hai kahaan bahatii nadii kahane lagii teraa to hai ye hii jahaan har mod par koii apanaa khadaa dekhuun main mudake jahaan yaadon men wo threedots

Title: ham na rahenge tum naa rahoge ye pyaar hamaaraa hameshaa rahegaa
Lyrics: ham na rahenge tum naa rahoge ye pyaar hamaaraa hameshaa rahegaa pyaar kaa aisaa fasaanaa rachenge ki yaad hamaarii zamaanaa karegaa ham naa rahenge  suuraj dharatii chandaa jaisaa apanaa naataa hai sadiyon puraanaa chalate chalate chaahe ye ruka jaaye phir bhii rahegaa ye rishtaa suhaanaa aandhii yaa tuufaan aandhii yaa tuufaan chaahe jo bhii aae kaaravaan hamaaraa to chalataa rahegaa  janam maran kaa saath hamaaraa har jiivan ham mil ke rahenge chamakegen kabhii ban ke sitaare phuul ban ke kabhii ham sab khilenge samay kaa saagar samay kaa saagar suukh bhii jaaye prem kaa kamal to khilataa rahegaa  ham naa rahenge tum naa rahoge

Title: o baabula pyaare o roe paayala kii chhama chhama
Lyrics: o baabula pyaarethreedots  o baabula pyaarethreedots o roe paayala kii chhama chhama o sisake saanson ki saragama o nisa dina tujhe pukaare mana ho o baabula pyaarethreedots  teri hii baahon men bachapana biitaa khilatii gayii zindagaanii ho aandhii aisii phira chalii tuuti daalii se kalii bina saavana ke ujadaa chamana ho o baabula pyaarethreedots  kaise suhaagana bane ye abhaagana kauna bithaae dolii kaise aaegii baaraata kaise piile honge haatha kaise betii banegii dulhana ho o babula pyaarethreedots  janaka ne kaise tyaaga diyaa hai apanii hii jaanakii ko ho betii bhatake raahon me maataa duubii aahon men tarase tere daras ko nayana ho o baabula pyaarethreedots

Title: do qadam tum bhii chalo do qadam ham bhii chalen
Lyrics: la 	do qadam tum bhii chalo do qadam ham bhii chalen mu 	do qadam tum bhii chalo do qadam ham bhii chalen 	manzilen la 	pyaar kii do 	manzilen pyaar kii aaengii chalatechalate 	do qadam tum threedots  la 	kal tak to anjaan thiin hamase raahen pyaar kii mu 	lekin apanii ho gaiin ab to baanhen pyaar kii la 	ab hamen mu 	ye jahaan la 	ab hamen ye jahaan dekhegaa jalatejalate do 	do qadam tum threedots  mu 	merii jo bhii soch thii usakaa hii tum ruup ho la 	main huun nadiyaa tum ghataa main chhaayaa tum dhuup ho me 	pyaar ye la 	ho javaan me 	pyaar ab ye ho javaan aankhon men palatepalate do 	do qadam tum threedots  la 	aisii hii ik shaam thii dekhaa thaa jab aapako mu 	tum is dhalatii shaam ko roko to kuchh baat ho la 	jaan se mu 	jaaenge la 	jaan se jaaenge shaam ke dhalatedhalate do 	do qadam tum threedots

Title: jab diip jale aanaa jab shaam dhale aanaa
Lyrics: jab diip jale aanaa jab shaam dhale aanaa sandes milan kaa bhuul na jaanaa meraa pyaar naa bisaraanaa jab diip jale aanaa threedots  nit saanjh savere milate hain unhen dekhake taare khilate hain lete hain vidaa ek duuje se kahate hain chale aanaa jab diip jale aanaa threedots  nii re ga re ga  ma ga re sa sa nii pa pa ma re ga sa nii sa ga pa ma pa  main palakan dagar buhaaruungaa terii raah nihaaruungaa merii priit kaa kaajal tum apane nainon men male aanaa jab diip jale aanaa threedots  jahan pahali baar mile the ham jis jagah se sang chale the ham nadiya ke kinare aaj usi amava ke tale aanaa jab diip jale aanaa threedots

Title: tere bagair jaanejaanaa sochataa huun yahii main diivaanaa
Lyrics: tere bagair jaanejaanaa sochataa huun yahii main diivaanaa haay  ye palaken jin men hain mere sapane ye lab jo lagate hain mere apane inako main ganvaa duungaa to rahuungaa kaise kaise kaise tere bagair jaanejaanaa  phiruungaa ho ho ke main pareshaan chhupaaye aankhon men laakh tuufaan gam ke in tuufaanon ko ho main piyuungaa kaise kaise kaise

Title: kal tak main akelaa thaa  waqt waqt kii baat hai
Lyrics: kal tak main akelaa thaa aaj zamaanaa saath hai waqt waqt kii baat hai samajhe naa waqt waqt kii baat hai  kal tak main akelaa thaa aaj zamaanaa saath hai waqt waqt kii baat hai 2  jab itanaa mashahuur naa thaa yaaron meraa naam tab paanii naa milataa thaa ab milate hain jaam kal ye raat andherii thii aaj suhaanii raat hai waqt waqt kii baat hai 2  sunakar merii baaton ko hai duniyaa hairaan dekhate rah gae sab mainne maar liyaa maidaan kal dil men viiraanii thii aaj magar baaraat hai waqt waqt kii baat hai 2  aaj tuu jaanegii mujhako ai mere mahabuub bholaa bhaalaa huun lekin aadamii huun main khuub kal thaa jis kaa intazaar aaj vo mulaaqaat hai waqt waqt kii baat hai 2  kal tak main threedots

Title: aajaa o mere raajaa jannat kii sair karaaungii main
Lyrics: aajaa re aajaa re aajaa aajaa re aajaa re aajaa  aahaa aahaa ohoa ohoa he he  he he  la laa la laa la la la laa laa laa laaa o ho ho ho  aajaa o mere raajaa jannat kii sair karaauungii main are duniyaa dikhaaungii main saagar uthaa tuu mujhako pilaa tujhako pilaauungii main lahaalaa lahaalaa laa 2  aajaa o mere raajaa jannat kii sair karaaungii main  ye tuu kyaa karataa hai shammaa se darataa hai jiite bhii marataa hai aahen kyuun bharataa hai mere paravaane aa mere diiwaane aa oy oy oy haa haa haa jaanewafaa o mujhako jalaa tujhako jalaauungii main lahaalaa lahaalaa lahaa  haa hoii haa hoii ahaahaahaa uuhuun huun huun huun apane hii aankhon se tuu naa dekhe nazaare ab merii aankhon se dekh tuu chaand sitaare aa mere pyaar aa mere sahaare aa oy hoy hoy aa aa aa aake milaa o mujhako sataa tujhako sataauungii main are haa  saarii raat piinaa hai saarii umar jiinaa hai saagar hai miinaa hai aur abhii piinaa hai rahane do jaane de mastii me aane de oy hoy hoy ho ho ho aaye mazaa o tuu jo riijhaa tujhako manaauungii main aa lai lai lai  laa laa laa are duniyaa dikhaauungii main saagar uthaa tuu mujhako pilaa tujhako pilaauungii main aajaa o mere raajaa jannat kii sair karaauungii main

Title: jo main hotaa ek tuutaa huaa taaraa
Lyrics: ki jo main hotaa ek tuutaa huaa taaraa     terii raaton kaa raaton kaa to kyaa hotaa aa jo main hotii ek koii bhatakii kiran     us taare kii us taare kii to kyaa hotaa  donon banate sang sangaa mitate sangsang     jiite sang sangaa marate sangsang  aa jo main hotii udiiudii niinden     terii aankhon kii aankhon kii to kyaa hotaa ki jo main hotaa miithaamiithaa sapanaa     un niindon kaa niindon kaa to kyaa hotaa  donon banate sangthreedots  ki jo main hotaa qismat kaa likhaa     tere haathon kaa haathon kaa to kyaa hotaa aa jo main hotii chhupaachhuptaa matalab     tere baaton kaa tere baaton kaa re to kyaa hotaa  donon banate sangthreedots

Title: aap kii aankhon men kuchh mahake hue se raaz hai
Lyrics: kishor	aap kii aankhon men kuchh mahake hue se raaz hai aapase bhii khuubasuurat aapake andaaz hain aap kii aankhon men kuchh mahake hue se raaz hai  lab hile to mogare ke phuul khilate hain kahiin      2 aap kii aankhon men kyaa saahil bhii milate hain kahiin aap kii khaamoshiyaan bhii aap kii aavaaz hain  lataa	aap kii aankhon men kuchh mahake hue se raaz hai aap se bhii khuubasuurat aapake andaaz hain aap kii aankhon men kuchh mahake hue se raaz hai  aap kii baaton men phir koi sharaarat to nahiin      2 bevajah taarif karanaa aap kii aadat to nahiin aap kii badamaashiyon ke ye naye andaaz hain kishor	aap kii aankhon men kuchh mahake hue se raaz hai lataa	aap se bhii khuubasuurat aapake andaaz hain aap kii aankhon men kuchh mahake hue se raaz hai

Title: sun pagalii pavan
Lyrics: printtitile sun pagalii pavan sun udatii ghataa 2 mere ang ang se har umang se kaliyaan chitakane kii aatii hai sadaa sun pagalii pavan sun udatii ghataa sun pagalii pavan  hai mast fazaa man puuch rahaa aaiin saanvarii ghataaen kis or se mausam hai hasiin chup chup ke kahiin gaae baanvarii koyal bade zor se gaae giit pyaar ke intezaar ke nagamen barasate hain hotaa hai nashaa sun pagalii pavan sun udatii ghataa 2 mere ang ang se har umang se kaliyaan chitakane kii aatii hai sadaa sun pagalii pavan sun udatii ghataa sun pagalii pavan  bijalii kii chamak dikhalaae jhalak uduun baadalon ke sang sang jhuum ke jhuulaa hai meraa rangiin dhanak niile aasmaan ko aaii huun main chuum ke dil thaam thaam luun pii kaa naam luun apane tadapane kaa letii huun mazaa sun pagalii pavan sun udatii ghataa 2 mere ang ang se har umang se kaliyaan chitakane kii aatii hai sadaa sun pagalii pavan sun udatii ghataa sun pagalii pavan endsong

Title: chandaa o chandaa kisane churaaii
Lyrics: chandaa o chandaa  2 kisane churaaii terii merii nindiyaa jaage saarii rainaa tere mere nainaa  2  hansake main teraa man bahalaauun  apane ye aansuu magar kise main dikhaauun 2 mainne to guzaaraa jiivan saaraa besaharaa ho jaage saarii rainaa tere mere nainaa  chandaa o threedots  terii aur merii ek kahaanii ham dono ki kadar kisii na jaanii   2 saath ye andheraa jaise meraa vaise teraa ho jaage saari rainaa tere mere nainaa   sapanon men khoyii duniyaa hai soyii terii aur merii kabar puuchhe na koii 2 aa jaa karen baaten mulaaqaaten biite raaten ho jaage saarii rainaa tere mere nainaa

Title: ye duniyaa ye mahafil mere kaam kii nahiin
Lyrics: ye duniyaa ye mahafil mere kaam kii nahiin  2  kisako sunaauun haaledil beqaraar kaa bujhataa huaa charaag huun apane mazaar kaa ai kaash bhuul jaauun magar bhuulataa nahiin kis dhuum se uthaa thaa janaazaa bahaar kaa ye duniyaathreedots  apanaa pataa mile na khabar yaar kii mile dushman ko bhii naa aisii sazaa pyaar kii mile unako khudaa mile hai khudaa kii jinhe talaash mujhako bas ik jhalak mere diladaar kii mile ye duniyaathreedots  saharaa men aake bhii mujhako thikaanaa na milaa gam ko bhuulaane kaa koii bahaanaa na milaa dil tarase jis men pyaar ko kyaa samajhuun us sansaar ko ik jiitii baazii haarake main dhuundhuun bichhade yaar ko ye duniyaathreedots  duur nigaahon se aansuu bahaataa hai koii kaise na jaauun main mujhako bulaataa hai koii yaa tuute dil ko jod do yaa saare bandhan tod do ai parbat rastaa de mujhe ai kaanton daaman chhod do ye duniyaathreedots

Title: kahiin haath ham se chhudaa to na loge
Lyrics: kahiin haath ham se chhudaa to na loge kisii aur se dil lagaa to na loge                                                                                  bade kuubasuurat hain duniyaa ke dhokhe ye dhokhe merii jaan khaa to na loge                                                                                  muhabbat kii manzil men aage badhaakar qadam apanaa piichhe hataa to na loge                                                                                  sunaa hai zamaanaa badaa bevafaa hai kahiin ham se aankhen chhudaa to na loge

Title: chuudii nahiin ye meraa
Lyrics: ki chuudii nahiin ye meraa       chuudii nahiin ye meraa dil hai dekho dekho tuute naa       chuudii nahiin ye meraa    ki niiliipiilii rangbirangii pyaar kii ye saugaat       na na na na aise nahiin dhiiredhiire chupakechupake daalo inmen haath      kaanch hai kachchaa lekin inse ho sachchaa singaar       sonaa nahiin chaandii nahiin hiiraa nahiin motii nahiin qiimat inkii pyaar      phuulonsii naazuk hai dekho dekho dekho dekho tuute naa       chuudii nahiin ye meraa  la giggles achchhaa sach ki chuudii nahiin ye meraa   ki meraa pyaar hai chuudii jaisaa isakaa or na chhor      yahaan nahiin vahaan nahiin dekho kabhii tuute nahiin jiivan kii ye dor      inkii khankhan dil kii dhadakan hai meraa sangiit      suno zaraa socho zaraa nagamaa ye pyaar bharaa o mere man miit      laajavaab haan bemisaal dekho dekho tuute naa       chuudii nahiin ye meraa   la aa haa haa  2       terii chaahat terii ulafat hai merii manzil      ghere mujhe baanhen terii baandhe tujhe chaahen merii dil meraa teraa dil      koii bhii ho meraa hai tuu ai mere hamadam      gam mile khushii mile kahiin rahen kaise rahen bichhadenge na ham  ki phir bhii  la huun huun   ki jaaneman la huun huun ki  dekho dekho dekho tuute naa       chuudii nahiin ye meraa   ki chuudii nahiin ye  la teraa dil hai ki  dekho dekho tuute naa       chuudii nahiin ye meraa haan la giggles

Title: dekhaa na haay re sochaa na haay re rakh dii nishaane pe jaan
Lyrics: dekhaa na haay re sochaa na haay re rakh dii nishaane pe jaan  kadamon men tere nikale meraa dil hai bas yahii aramaan  2  dole dole dole ae ae dole dole dole ae ae  dole dole ae ae aae   mit jaayenge mar jaayenge kaam koi kar jaayenge  marake bhi chain na mile to jaayenge yaaron kahaan   2 are oho threedots  huun huun huun  dekhaa na haay threedots  qaatil hai kaun kahaanahiin jaye  chup bhi to rahaa nahiin jaaye  bulabul hai kaun kaun sayyaad  kuchh to kaho re meri jaan   2 are oho threedots huun huun huun  dekhaa na haay threedots  ghar se nikale ham khaake qasam  chhodenge piichhaa na ham  sar pe kafan baandhe hue aaye divaanaa yahaan   2 are oho threedots huun huun huun   dekhaa na haay re sochaa na haay re rakh dii nishaane pe jaan  kadamon men tere nikale meraa dil hai bas yahii aramaan

Title: are ho goriyaa kahaan teraa des re goriyaa kahaan teraa des
Lyrics: ra he goriyaa jaldii aa re  threedots  are ho goriyaa kahaan teraa des re goriyaa kahaan teraa des are ho tohe dekhun to laage thes re goriyaa kahaan teraa des  a mmm threedots laal laal laal chunar odhe ban men phire bahaar ra hai gaal gaal sulage re teraa jiyaa jale hamaar a ho threedots chhaiyaan pade jahaan tori re ho threedots dagar vahiin saajan morii re yayayaya yayaya naahi ra are ho badalaa kaise tune bhes re goriyaa kahaan teraa des ko hurr aa haa takadhin  a oy oy oy oy oy oy oy oy  ghum ghum ke galii galii jaanaa piyaa ke dvaar ra o mod mod pe gorii terii paayal kare pukaar a ho threedots raah men paayal morii baajegii o threedots  dharatii gagan tale naachegii yayayaya yayaya aahe ra are ho mukh pe ude kaale kes re goriyaa kahaan teraa des  a nain nain men kaajal daale dhundhun dhundhun piyaa kaa haath o dekh dekh re udataa baadal naa din ruke na raat o threedots ujiyaara hai kahiin andheraa aa threedots saanjh kahiin kahiin saveraa yayayaya yayaya aahe ra are ho banjaaron kaa nahiin des re goriyaa kahaan teraa des

Title: piinaa zaruurii hai jiine ke lie
Lyrics: piinaa zaruurii hai jiine ke lie jiinaa zaruurii hai piine ke lie kair ham to sharaab piite hain jo nahiin piite kaaq jiite hain  he jiinaa zaruurii hai 2 jiine ke lie piinaa oh zaruurii hai piinaa zaruurii hai piine ki lie jiinaajiinaa taubaa jiinaa zaruurii hai jiine ke lie threedots  ham ko to bas kaam hai apane hii kaam se kabhii pii lii botal se kabhii pii lii jaam se 2 farq nahiin padataa koii dil kisii naam se lekin ik hasiinaa zaruurii hai jiine ke lie threedots  haan haan bevajah nahiin gussaa janaab kaa naam hai badaa buraa is kaanaakaraab kaa 2 achchhaa nahiin piinaa har mausam men sharaab kaa saavan kaa mahiinaa zaruurii hai piine ke lie threedots  tuutate hain shaq se rishte dilojaan ke sachche pyaar ko jo chhod de jhuuthaa pyaar maan ke 2 kahate hain ki chehare pe aise insaan ke sharm kaa pasiinaa zaruurii hai jiine ke lie threedots piine ke lie threedots

Title: maine pii sharaab to tumane kyaa piyaa
Lyrics: maine pii sharaab to tumane kyaa piyaa aadamii kaa kuun main zaliil huun tumako kyaa kahuun maine pii sharaab threedots  tum pio to thiik ham pien to paap tum karo to puny ham karen to paap ham tabaahhaal ham faqiir log zindagii bhii rog maut bhii azaab maine pii sharaab threedots  tum kaho to sach ham kahen to jhuuth tumako sab muaaf zulm ho ke luut tumane kitane dil chaaq kar die maine to kiyaa khud ko hii karaab maine pii sharaab threedots  riiti aur rivaaz sab tumhaare saath dharm aur samaaj sab tumhaare saath apane saath kyaa dhuul aur dhuaan aane vaalaa daur legaa sab hisaab maine pii sharaab threedots

Title: diiwaanaa karake chhodoge lagataa hain yuun hamako
Lyrics: ki diiwaanaa karake chhodoge lagataa hain yuun hamako     sau baar kahaa ai jaanejahaan yuun pyaar se tum dekhaa naa karo la haay jiinaa mushkil kar doge lagataa hain yuun hamako     sau baar kahaa ai jaanejahaan yuun pyaar se tum dekhaa naa karo     haay jiinaa threedots      laa laa laa threedots      aise na bas jaanaa thaa merii palakon ke tale ki ho o o o raahii wahii rukate hain ghanii jahaan chhanv mile la ho o o o o o pyaar se ruk ruk dekh rahe kyaa ho mujhamen ki ho o o o sar se qadam tak sapanon ke kaii gaanv mile la ho o o kaisii huun main saajan phir se kaho naa kaho naa ki ho diiwaanaa threedots      tum na mile the kuchh bhii nahiin thaa jiine men la o o o o aafat hai milanaa saawan ke mahiine men ki o o o u u u tuufaan kyaa hai dekho merii in aankhon men la aa aa aa aa aankhon kii tasviir banii mere siine men ki o o o tum hii tum ho in saanson men suno naa suno naa la haay jiinaa threedots  ki aur zaraa kuchh aur kariib aa mere hasiin la o o o o waadaa karo baahon men uthaa loge to nahiin ki o o o u u u dil to yahii chaahe ki mile aur muskaae la o o o o rang mere hothon se churaa loge to nahiin ki ho ho ho chorii chorii tum hii ham tak aao naa aao naa     ho diiwaanaa threedots

Title: koii to aaye re
Lyrics: koii to aaye re badaa intazaar hai kabase taras rahaa meraa pyaar hai2 koii milataa to main kahatii ki aaj kii raat sanam tere saath koii to aaye re badaa intazaar hai  haulehaule aake baanhon men uthaa le kahaan paauun aisaa hamadam jo na dekhaa mujhe aake dikhaa de vahii mausam terii ye duniyaa jo kuchh bhii kahatii  main kahatii terii qasam ki ki aaj kii raat sanam tere saath koii to aaye re badaa intazaar hai kab se taras rahaa meraa pyaar hai2  badan men jaisii agan lagii hai mere siine men hai tuufaan haae sanbhaale nahiin aaj sanbhalate mere aramaan koii jo aayaa to kyaa kahuungii  kahuungii terii qasam ki ki aaj kii raat sanam tere saath koii to aaye re badaa intazaar hai badaa intazaar hai

Title: jogii o jogii pyaar men kyaa hogaa
Lyrics: la 	jogii o jogii pyaar men kyaa hogaa 2 ki 	har din suhaanaa hogaa har raat suhaanii hogii la 	jogii o jogii threedots  ki 	ban jaaengii raaten phir sapanon kii baaraaten 	guzaregaa ab jiivan bas karate prem kii baaten 	hamase karo tum ye vaadaa vaadaa to naa tod dogii la 	jogii o jogii threedots  	chandaataare soye ye mast nazaare soye 	raat kaa jaaduu chhaayaa ham tum bin saare soye ki 	kaise hamen niind aaye ham donon hain dil ke rogii la 	jogii o jogii threedots  	phuulon kii paayal ho aur taaron kaa jhuumar ho 	premnagar men sainyaa ai kaash hamaaraa ghar ho ki 	ghar kii zaruurat nahiin hai tum mere dil men rahogii la 	jogii o jogii threedots

Title: aao aao jaanejahaan
Lyrics: koras ruu ruu ruurururuu  kishor ajii aap log bhii gaaiye naa  koras louder ruu ruu ruurururuu  aashaa kyaa jaano tum bin thii kyaa dil ko beqaraarii mahafil kii mahafil kii diivaanii sii tumhaarii chain aayaa jab dekhii ye suurat pyaarii pyaarii aao aao jaanejahaan aao aao jaanejahaan dil ne dhuundhaa tujhe kahaan kahaan  kishor aao ham bhii aae hain baahon ke haar leke honthon pe ek nagamaa aankhon men pyaar leke is dil ke shiishe men tasaviireyaar leke aao aao jaanejahaan  dil ne dhuundhaa tujhe kahaan kahaan aao aao jaanejahaan  aashaa ulfat hai yaa kyaa hai kuchh kam hai dil kii ulajhan pahale thii khoyii sii ab chanchal hai ye chitavan tum chhuu lo kuchh aise laharaaye meraa tanman  donon aao aao jaanejahaan dil ne dhuundhaa tujhe kahaan kahaan aao aao jaanejahaan

Title: ik baat kahuun gar maano tum
Lyrics: ik baat kahuun gar maano tum sapanon men na aanaa jaano tum main niind men uthakar chalatii huun jab dekhatii huun sach maano tum  2  kal bhii huaa ki tum guzare the paas se thode se anamane thode udaas se bhaagii thii manaane niind men lekin sofe se gir padii haa haa haa haa  ik baat kahuun gar maano tum sapanon men na aanaa jaano tum main niind men uthakar chalatii huun jab dekhatii huun sach maano tum  parason kii baat hai tumane bulaayaa thaa tumhaare haath men cheharaa chhupaayaa thaa chuumaa thaa haath ko niind men lekin paayaa palang kaa thaa haa haa haa haa  ik baat kahuun gar maano tum sapanon men na aanaa jaano tum  us din bhii raat ko tum kwaab men mile aur kwaahmakwaah ke bas karate rahe gile kaash phir niind aur kwaab ke yuun hii chalate rahen silasile  ik baat kahuun gar maano tum sapanon men na aanaa jaano tum main niind men uthakar chalatii huun jab dekhatii huun sach maano tum  laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa

Title: baaadab baamulaahijaa  dilarubaa dillii vaalii
Lyrics: aa 	baaadab baamulaahijaa hoshiyaar 	mahafil men lutane vaalaa hai pyaar 	aa gaii zulfon vaalii 	aankhon men suramaa honthon pe laalii 	 dilarubaa dillii vaalii  2 dilavaalon men aa gaii 	nashaa banakar uthii jhuum kar chhaa gaii 	dilarubaa dillii vaalii threedots  ma 	subahaanallaah 2 	jaisaa sunaa thaa vaisaa hii paayaa 	aapako dekhaa to yaqiin aayaa 	gar firadaus bararue zamiinast hamiiasto hamiiasto hamiiast   aa 	aap aae haan aap aae mil gaii daulat hamen zamaane kii 	ki aap hii se haan aap hii se 2 	hai raunaq gariibakaane kii 2 	aap kyaa aae ghar men bahaar aa gaii 	dilarubaa dillii vaalii threedots  ma 	baaadab baamulaahijaa hoshiyaar 	aa rahe hain aashiqon ke saradaar mu 	taubaataubaa ye aaj merii chashmeaavaaraa 	kyaa dekh rahii hai nazaaraa 	ki meraa raqiib tere qariib are phuute nasiib ma 	aapakii taariif aa 	ek aashiqegariib mu 	haan ye gairon se ulfat kadaradaanii terii 	mujhako dar hai le na duube tujhako naadaanii terii aa 	banaa ke husn ko naadaan  na yuun sitam todo 	bas apane dil hii ko samajhaao meraa gam chhodo 2 	ki main piikar ye jaam hosh men aa gaii mu 	 dilarubaa dillii vaalii  2 ab hosh men aa gaii aa 	nashaa banakar uthii threedots  ma 	 inako dekho  2 haay haay inako dekho mu 	ye giraftaarii kii baaten gesuon kii chhaanv men 	dekhanaa padatii hai zanjiir ab kisake paanv men ma 	dekhanaa hai mu 	dekhanaa hai ma 	ho dekhanaa hai mu 	dekhanaa hai aa 	aa aa jo tumako dekh rahaa hai vo aur kyaa dekhe 	kahiin tumhaare sivaa ab merii balaa dekhe 2 	ab to merii nazar tumase takaraa gaii 	dilarubaa dillii vaalii threedots  mu 	jo chhedaa maine taraanaa aa 	sun aur samajh liyaa 2 ma 	sunaayaa maine jo gaanaa aa 	vo dil pe likh bhii liyaa  likha liyaa  2 mu 	aur mere dil kii baat aa 	vo bhii yaad aa gaii 5 mu 	to bujhaakar chiraag aa bhii jaa tuu  dil men  2 	ki jalane vaalon kaa kyaa kaam mahafil men ko 	dilarubaa dillii vaalii threedots aa 	nashaa banakar uthii threedots

Title: nainaa hain pyaase mere pyaasaa hai praan meraa
Lyrics: nainaa hain pyaase mere pyaasaa hai praan meraa main huun ek barakhaa ke bin jalataa saa din aashiyaan hai sunasaan meraa threedots  man kii hai lagan tan se tan kaa hai tiirath duujaa pyaasii rahii milake unase pyaas ko hii maine puujaa ye hii to hai abhimaan meraa threedots  pyaar puujaa praarthanaa to ek saath rahanaa chaahe saath agar saath naa de sang aa jaatii aahen ab yahii hai tuufaan meraa threedots

Title: kyaa mausam hai ai diivaane dil chal kahiin duur nikal jaayen
Lyrics: ki  kyaa mausam hai la  aa ki  ai diivaane dil      are chal kahiin duur nikal jaaen la  aa ki  chal kahiin duur nikal jaaen      koii hamdam hai la  aa ki  chaahat ke qaabil      to kis liye ham sanbhal jaaen la  aa ki  chal kahiin duur nikal jaaen  la  jhuum ke jab jab kabhii do dil gaate hain      chaar kadam chalate hain phir kho jaate hain ki  he he he       aisaa hai to kho jaane do mujh ko bhii aaj      ye kyaa kam hai la  aa ki  do pal ko raahii      are mil jaaen bahal jaaen la  aa ki  chal kahiin duur nikal jaaen  ra  ye mastiyaan ye bahaar dil ho chalaa beqaraar      main girataa huun mujhe thaam lo      bhiige labon se meraa naam lo la  duniyaa ko ab do nazar kyon aaen ham      itane qariib aao ke ik ho jaaen ham      ke ik ho jaaen ham donoke ik ho jaaen ham ra  ke ik ho jaaen ham  la  huun      khoye se ham khoyii sii manzil      achchhaa hai sanbhal jaaen ki  chal kahiin duur nikal jaaen la  ho achchhaa hai sanbhal jaaen ki  chal kahiin duur nikal jaaen la  ho achchhaa hai sanbhal jaaen

Title: huun bahaaron ne kie sajade gulon ne sar jhukaayaa hai
Lyrics: huun bahaaron ne kie sajade gulon ne sar jhukaayaa hai badii furasat se maalik ne hasiin tumako banaayaa hai bahaaron ne kie sajade threedots  tere gaalon kii surkii ko churaane gulaab aae teraa naazuk badan jisakii balaa lene shabaab aae vo gore haath jisamen sangemaramar kii safedii hai ghataa saavan kii zulfon men terii aaraam karatii hai hasiinaa o hasiinaa 2 bahaaron ne kie sajade threedots  teraa cheharaa zamiin kaa chaand banakar jagamagaayaa hai magar kyuun chaandanii ko apane ghuunghat men chhupaayaa hai do aankhen aisii hain jaise gazal ke pahale do misare terii maasuumiyat par baithe hain andaaz ke pahare hasiinaa o hasiinaa 2 bahaaron ne kie sajade threedots

Title: do panchhii do tinake kaho le ke chale hain kahaan
Lyrics: aa 	do panchhii do tinake kaho le ke chale hain kahaan ki 	ye banaaenge ek aashiyaan 2  aa 	ye to apanii hii dhun men gaaen uuncheuunche udate jaaen ki 	inakii mastii ko aur badhaaen saavan kii ye havaaen aa 	manzil ke matavaale dekho chhuune chale aasamaan ki 	ye banaaenge ek threedots  ki 	ek phuulon bharii ho daalii aur us par ho baseraa aa 	kuchh aisaa hii miithaamiithaa hai sapanaa teraa meraa ki 	ye sapanaa sach hogaa kah rahii dhadakanon kii zubaan do 	ham banaaenge ek aashiyaan 2

Title: nazar aatii nahiin manzil tadapane se bhii kyaa haasil
Lyrics: nazar aatii nahiin manzil tadapane se bhii kyaa haasil taqadiir men ai mere dil andhere hii andhere hain  majabuurii ne jisako maaraa usakaa kaun sahaaraa maanjhii to mil jaate hain lekin milataa nahiin kinaaraa  nainon se yuun chhin gaii jyoti siip se jaise motii ek jaan aur sau dushman hain kaash ye jaan na hotii  khalatii hai ye paas kii duurii jalatii aas adhuurii kisako koii doshh lagaae sabake sang majabuurii

Title: o padosan kii ladakii
Lyrics: o padosan kii ladakii tujhe dekh tabiiyat bhadakii are o padosan kii ladakii tujhe dekh tabiiyat bhadakii naa band kar khidakii nazaaraa lene de ik baar to jalawon kaa sahaaraa lene de  banake pawan kaa jhonkaa main zulfen terii bikharaa duun gore rang ke in honthon pe pyaar kii mohar lagaa duun sun baat apane  e e he he he he sun baat apane dilabar kii kyaa aadat hai dil tadapaane kii  o padosan kii ladakii tujhe dekh tabiiyat bhadakii naa band kar khidakii nazaaraa lene de ik baar to jalawon kaa sahaaraa lene de  sun le merii baat hasiinaa naa kar tuu manamaanii donon qismat se milate hain dilabar husn jawaanii diladaar teraa e e he he he he diladaar teraa aayaa hai jaldii hai tujhako le jaane kii  o padosan kii ladakii tujhe dekh tabiiyat bhadakii naa band kar khidakii nazaaraa lene de ik baar to jalawon kaa sahaaraa lene de

Title: ek ajanabii hasiinaa se yuun mulaakaat ho gaii
Lyrics: ek ajanabii hasiinaa se yuun mulaakaat ho gaii phir kyaa huaa ye naa puuchho kuchh aisii baat ho gaii ek ajanabii threedots  vo achaanak aa gaii yuun nazar ke saamane jaise nikal aayaa ghataa se chaand chehare pe zulfen bikharii huii thiin din men raat ho gaii ek ajanabii threedots  jaaneman jaanejigar hotaa main shaayar agar kahataa gazal terii adaaon par main ne ye kahaa to mujhase kafaa vo jaanehayaat ho gaii ek ajanabii threedots  khuubasuurat baat ye chaar pal kaa saath ye saarii umar mujhako rahegaa yaad main akelaa thaa magar ban gaii vo hamasafar vo mere saath ho gaii ek ajanabii threedots

Title: shaadii ke liye razaamand kar lii razaamand kar lii
Lyrics: shaadii ke liye razaamand kar lii razaamand kar lii main ne ik ladakii pasand kar lii o udatii chidiyaa pinjare men band kar lii  udatii chidiyaa pinjare men band kar lii  maine ik threedots  merii nazaron ne husna kii nazuk bahaaron ko chhuu liyaa naaz hai mujhako taqadiir par maine sitaaron ko chhuu liyaa maine to qismat  maine to qismat buland kar lii maine ik threedots  banake bhanvaraa ab baag men kaliyon ke pichhe nahiin bhaagungaa main saanjhsavere bas aaj se galiyon men ab nahii jhaankuungaa main nainon kii khidakii nainon kii khidaki maine band kar lii maine ik threedots

Title: faujii gayaa jab gaanv men
Lyrics: faujii gayaa jab gaanv men 2 pahan ke rangaruut ful buut paanv men faujii gayaa jab threedots  pahale logon ne rakhaa thaa meraa naam nikhattuu do din men jag aise ghuumaa jaise ghuumaa lattuu bharatii ho ke karanailaa karanail sinh ban baithaa meraa baapuu saath mere jaranail sinh ban baithaa aate dekhaa mujhako to karane lage salaamii aagepiichhe daude chaachaachaachii maamaamaamii yaaron ne saamaan uthaa kar rakhaa apane sar pe daravaaje par baithe the sab jab main pahunchaa ghar pe kas kar puure jor se phir maine sailyuut jo maaraa sabakii chhuttii ho gaii phir maine buut jo maaraa faujii gayaa jab threedots  ghar ke andar jaa kar phir jab maine kholaa baksaa dekh rahe the sab dekhen jag kaa nakshaa sabako thaa maaluum shaam ko khulegii ram kii botal sab aa baithe ghar par mere ghar meraa ban gayaa hotal biich men baithaa thaa main sab baithe the aajuubaajuu itane men banduuk chalii bhaii gaanv men aae daakuu utar gaii thii sabakii chhup gae saare dar ke maare main ghar se nikalaa sab meraa naam pukaaren maar ke laathii zamiin pe jhat se daakuon ko lalakaaraa ve the chaar akelaa main maine chaaron ko maaraa faujii gayaa jab threedots  chhod ke apane ghode daakuu jaan bachaa kar bhaage merii vaahvaah karate subah niind se log jaage main kheton kii sair ko nikalaa mausam thaa mastaanaa raste men vo milii meraa jisase thaa ishq puraanaa kuub sune aur kuub sunaae kisse agalepichhale nikalaa chaand to ham donon bhii khet se baahar nikale haayhaay mach gayaa shor saare gaanv men faujii gayaa jab threedots

Title: kisii raah men kisii mod par  mere hamasafar
Lyrics: la 	kisii raah men kisii mod par kahiin chal na denaa tuu chhod kar 	mere hamasafar 4 mu 	kisii haal men kisii baat par kahiin chal na denaa tuu chhod kar 	mere hamasafar 4  la 	meraa dil kahe kahiin ye na ho  nahiin ye na ho  2 	kisii roz tujhase bichhad ke main tujhe dhuundhatii phiruun darbadar 	mere hamasafar 4  mu 	teraa sang saayaa bahaar kaa teraa ruup aaiinaa pyaar kaa 	tujhe aa nazar men chhupaa luun main tujhe lag na jaae kahiin nazar 	mere hamasafar 4  la 	teraa saath hai to hai zindagii mu 	teraa pyaar hai to hai roshanii la 	kahiin din ye dhal jaae kyaa pataa mu 	kahaan raat ho jaae kyaa kabar do 	mere hamasafar 4  la 	kahiin chal na denaa threedots

Title: milo na tum to ham ghabaraaye
Lyrics: milo na tum to ham ghabaraaye milo to aankh churaaye hamen kyaa ho gayaa hai tumhiin ko dil kaa raaz bataayen tumhiin se raaz chhupaayen hamen kyaa ho gayaa hai   threedots  o bhole saathiyaa dekhe jo shokhii tere pyaar kii oy hoy o bhole saathiyaa  dekhe jo shokhii tere pyaar kii aanchal men bhar lii hamane saarii baharen sansaar kii nayii adaa se ham ithalaayen paayii khushii lutaayen hamen kyaa ho gayaa hai   threedots  ruuthe kabhii kabhii maan gaye baaten tumhaarii ham jaan gaye aa aisii adaayen qurabaan gaye tumhen manaaye dil bahalaayen kyaa kyaa naaz uthaayen hamen kyaa ho gayaa hai   threedots  o sohane jogiyaa rang le hamen bhii isii rang men oy hoy o sohane jogiyaa  rang le hamen bhii isii rang men phir se sunaa de bansii kaliyaan khilaa de gore ang men vahii jo taanen aag lagaaye unhiin se aag bujhaaen hamen kyaa ho gayaa hai   threedots

Title: aankhonaankhon men baat hone do
Lyrics: ki 	aankhonaankhon men baat hone do aa 	mujhako apanii baanhon men sone do ki 	shaadii ho jaane do aa 	shaadii ho jaaegii 	pahale miithe sapanon men khone do ki 	na na na 	aankhonaankhon men threedots  	man kaa panchhii dole aa 	achchhaa ki 	priit kii bolii bole aa 	baat badhegii aage lekin haulehaule ki 	kab tak intazaarii aa 	umr padii hai saarii 	dil ko zaraa dil men samone do 	aankhonaankhon men threedots  ki 	pahale bhii barakhaa thii aa 	to kyaa huaa ki 	par aise na bhalii thii aa 	achchhaa jii ki 	phuul banii hai ab tuu pahale band kalii thii 	dil men aag lagii hai aa 	dil kii aag bujhegii 	motii zaraa nath men pirone do 	aankhonaankhon men threedots

Title: piite piite kabhiikabhii yuun jaam badal jaate hain
Lyrics: rafii piite piite kabhiikabhii yuun jaam badal jaate hain  jaam badal jaate hain  2 are kaam badal jaate hain logon ke naam badal jaate hain   rafii ye paravaanaaeshamaa mehamaan hai ik raat kaa  2  dil kii baaten chhed duun dar hai bas is baat kaa  yahaan se vahaan tak jaane men vahaan se yahaan tak aane men  log ye kahate hain jii  2  band lifaafe men bhii dil ke paigaam badal jaate hain  piite piite threedots  aashaa do rukh har tasviir ke hairaan huun main dekh ke  rafii hairaan huun main dekh ke  aashaa hai ik cheharaa aur bhii chehare pe har ek ke  rafii chehare pe har ek ke  aashaa najar ko najar jo aataa hai fariibiinazar kahalaataa hai  niind ke ik jhonke se aankh ke is dhokhe se  rafii raam aur shaam badal jaate hain   dono piite piite threedots

Title: maine tujhe maangaa tujhe paayaa hai
Lyrics: maine tujhe maangaa tujhe paayaa hai tuune mujhe maangaa mujhe paayaa hai aage hamen jo bhii mile yaa naa mile gilaa nahiin  chhaanv ghanii hii nahiin dhuup kadii bhii hotii hai raahon men gam ho ki kushiyaan hon hamako sabhii lenaa hai baanhon men yon dukhii ho ke jiine vaale kyaa ye tujhe pataa nahiin maine tujhe maangaa threedots  zid hai tumhen to lo lab pe na shikavaa kabhii bhii laaenge hans ke sahenge jo dard yaa gam ye jahaan se paaenge tujhako jo buraa lage aisaa bhii kiyaa nahiin maine tujhe maangaa threedots

Title: kaahe manavaa naache
Lyrics: kaahe manavaa naache hamaraa sakhii rii koii ise ab samajhaaye kaahe manavaa naache   threedots  nayanan kajaraa daalan baithii maathe pe suuraj paalan baithii biich men aaye dekho sapane kaan se kaahe manavaa naache   threedots  nas nas men ye kaun utaraa hai dil men kis kaa dil dhadakaa hai naabaa naam kaa nis din baase kaahe manavaa naache   threedots

Title: thaade rahiyo o baanke yaar re
Lyrics: chaandanii raat badii der ke baad aaii hai ye mulaaqaat badii der ke baad aaii hai aaj kii raat vo aae hain badii der ke baad aaj kii raat badii der ke baad aaii hai  thaade rahiyo o baanke yaar re  2 thaade rahiyo  3  thaade rahiyo o baanke yaar re thaade rahiyo  thaharo lagaay aauun nainon men kajaraa thaharo lagaay aauun kajaraa chotii men guundh aauun phuulon kaa gajaraa main to kar aauun solah singaar re  3 thaade rahiyo   dhaa tiita takita dhaadhaa tiita diradaa tiita dhaage tiita dhaa na dhaa na dhaa  3  jaage na koii aaa  jaage na koii rainaa hai thodii bole chhamaachham paayal nigodii bole nigodii bole chhamaachham paayal nigodii ajii dhiire se kholuungii dvaar re sainyaan dhiire se kholuungii dvaar re main to chupake se ajii haule se kholuungii dvaar re saiyaan dhiire se kholuungii dvaar re thaade rahiyo

Title: hazaar baaten kahe zamaanaa merii vafaa pe yaqiin
Lyrics: hazaar baaten kahe zamaanaa merii vafaa pe yaqiin rakhanaa 2 har ek adaa men men hai begunaahii merii adaa pe yaqiin rakhanaa hazaar baaten kahe threedots  merii mohabbat kii zindagii ko nazar na lag jaae is jahaan kii 2 yahii sadaa hai dhadakate dil kii merii sadaa pe yaqiin rakhanaa hazaar baaten kahe threedots  kisii ko hansataa na dekh paae ajiib shai hai ye bairii duniyaa 2 ye bemuravvat hai bevafaa hai na bevafaa pe yaqiin rakhanaa hazaar baaten kahe threedots  nazar men rahanaa hai kushanasiibii nazar se giranaa hai behayaaii 2 hayaa hai aurat kaa ek gahanaa merii hayaa pe yaqiin rakhanaa hazaar baaten kahe threedots

Title: maanaa terii nazar men teraa pyaar ham nahiin
Lyrics: maanaa terii nazar men teraa pyaar ham nahiin kaise kahen ke tere talabagaar ham nahiin  tan ko jalaa ke kaaq banaayaa bichhaa diyaa lo ab tumhaarii raah men diivaar ham nahiin maanaa terii nazar men threedots  jisako nikhaaraa hamane tamannaa ke kuun se gulashan men us bahaar ke haqadaar ham nahiin maanaa terii nazar men threedots  dhokhaa diyaa hai khud ko mohabbat ke naam par ye kis tarah kahen ki gunahagaar ham nahiin maanaa terii nazar men threedots

Title: kyaa hai is baansuriyaa men  kabhii honthon se mujhe
Lyrics: kyaa hai is baansuriyaa men jo mujhamen nahiin saanvariyaa kabhii honthon se mujhe bhii lagaa le baansurii banaaii ke ho baansurii banaaii ke main to gaauun tere giit mere miit saare jag ko bhulaaii ke kabhii honthon se threedots  tore sang nehaa laagaa tore rang raatii banban dvaaredvaare phiruun madamaatii tujhamen hii samaa gaii main tere paas aaii ke kabhii honthon se threedots  saaraa jag jaan gayaa raadhaa bhaii shyaam kii chheden teraa naam leke sakhiyaan saare gaanv kii ho chhaliyaa tuune sudh naa liinii baavarii banaaii ke kabhii honthon se threedots

Title: sun lo sunaataa huun tumako kahaanii ruutho naa re mammaa re mammaa re
Lyrics: sun lo sunaataa huun tumako kahaanii ruutho naa hamase o gudiyon kii raanii re mammaa re mammaa re re mammaa re mammaa re  1 ham to gae baazaar men lene ko aaluu aaluu vaaluu kuchh na milaa piichhe padaa bhaaluu re mammaa threedots  2 ham to gae baazaar men lene ko lattuu lattuu vattuu kuchh na milaa piichhe padaa tattuu re mammaa threedots  3 ham to gae baazaar men lene ko rotii rotii votii kuchh na milii piichhe padii motii re mammaa threedots

Title: aankhon men kaajal hai
Lyrics: aankhon men kaajal hai kaajal men meraa dil hai o ho ho ho  aankhon men kaajal hai kaajal men meraa dil hai aankhon men kaajal hai kaajal men dil hai chalo dil men bithaake tumhen tumase hii pyaar kiyaa jaaye ho chalo dil men bithaake tumhen tumase hii pyaar kiyaa jaaye  baalon men kushabuu hai kushabuu men tuu hii tuu hai baalon men kushabuu hai kushabuu men tuu hai  chalo baalon ke tale tale  baahon kaa haar siyaa jaaye  ho chalo dil men bithaake tumhen tum se hii pyaar kiyaa jaaye  tum to ho merii bahaar merii nazar men khilo kaliyon se milake sanam phir aake hamase milo aise tere nainaa lade jaise koii nashaa chadhe haay bindiyaa hanse chalii jaaye terii bindiyaa darpan hai darpan men saajan hai terii bindiyaa darpan hai darpan men sajan chalo bindiyaa se leke tumhen dil men utaar liyaa jaaye ho chalo dil men bithaake tumhen tum se hii pyaar kiyaa jaaye  kaisaa hai apanaa milan kaisii mulaaqaat hai jaise adaa men merii koii naii baat hai banii rahe adaa terii sadaa rahe wafaa merii aise hii ye jiivan biit jaaye jiivan kyaa chaahat hai chaahat kyaa jiivan hai jiivan kyaa chaahat hai chaahat kyaa jiivan chalo saare jiivan kaa yahiin milake iqaraar kiyaa jaaye ho chalo dil men bithaake tumhen tumase hii pyaar kiyaa jaaye  aankhon men kaajal hai kaajal men meraa dil hai aankhon men kaajal hai kaajal men dil hai chalo dil men bithaake tumhen tumase hii pyaar kiyaa jaaye ho chalo dil men bithaake tumhen tumase hii pyaar kiyaa jaaye

Title: jhuuthaa kahiin kaa mujhe aisaa milaa
Lyrics: jhuuthaa kahiin kaa mujhe aisaa milaa jise hai merii wafaaon se gilaa ruuthe tuu jabhii tabhii terii qasam jaan jaae koii samajhaae ise ab to zaraa maan jaae  dekhe agar tuu pyaar se mujhako hans ke main de duungii piyaa jaan bhii tujhako ho hothon pe ghadii ghadii teraa hii bas naam aae koii samajhaae ise ab to zaraa maan jaae  roz lagen naa priit ke mele aaj to bedardii mujhe baahon men le le ho dekho nirmohii binaa baat ke hii ruuth jaae koii samajhaae ise ab to zaraa maan jaae

Title: ek teraa sundar mukhadaa ek teraa pyaar
Lyrics: ek teraa sundar mukhadaa ek teraa pyaar se bharaa dil milanaa mushqil ek teraa sundar threedots is or dhuundhuun chaahe us or dhuundhuun koii manzil 2 milanaa mushqil ek teraa sundar threedots  aa ke sirahaane tere tujhako jo dekhaa har saans meraa phir to kushabuu se mahakaa jaisii milii hai mujhako aisii suhaanii koii manzil milanaa mushqil ek teraa sundar threedots  resham se gesuu tere raaten milan kii kaamosh lab kahate hain baaten milan kii dekhe hazaaron qaatil aisaa hasiin koii qaatil milanaa mushqil ek teraa sundar threedots

Title: man mandir men shyaam padhaare
Lyrics: man mandir men shyaam padhaare raadhaa diip jalaae jyot jagii more prem duaare krrishna kanhaiyaa aae  chun ke laaii kiran phuul daasii torii charan dhuul  aaa2  sochuun torii batiyaan jaaguun saarii ratiyaan ik pal naa palak lagaauun2 munh se naa boluun bhed naa kholuun2 sapanon men pii ko bulaauun baarbaar kholuun dvaar dekhuun raah karuun singaar aaa chun ke laaii kiran phuul daasii torii charan dhuul  aaa2  puuchen mohe sakhiyaan dhuundhen kise akhiyaan unako main kaise bataauun2 nikaluun jo ghar se guzaruun jidhar se2 laaj se marmar jaauun laage nain aae naa chain ye lagan man kare bain aaa chun ke laaii kiran phuul daasii torii charan dhuul  aaa2

Title: o bade bevafaa hain ye husn vaale
Lyrics: o bade bevafaa hain ye husn vaale 2 par terii baat kuchh aur hai bade bekabar hain ye ishq vaale 2 par merii baat kuchh aur hai bade bevafaa hain threedots  mit gayaa jisape ye ho gae meharabaan husn vaalon kii bas yahii daastaan kaisekaise naa jaane diivaane dil inhiin bevafaaon ne tod daale bade bevafaa hain threedots  tuu kahiin jaaneman ruuth jaanaa nahiin zikr teraa ye teraa fasaanaa nahiin bholiibhaalii hai inakii suurat magar bade sangdil hain ye bholebhaale bade bevafaa hain threedots

Title: tere chahare se nazar nahiin hatatii nazaare ham kyaa dekhen
Lyrics: tere chehare se nazar nahiin hatatii nazaare ham kyaa dekhen tujhe milake bhii pyaas nahiin ghatatii nazaare ham kyaa dekhen  pighale badan tere tapatii nigaahon se sholon kii aanch aae barfiilii raahon se lage kadamon se aag lipatatii nazaare ham threedots  rangon kii barakhaa hai khushabuu kaa saath hai kisako pataa hai ab din hai kii raat hai lage duniyaa bhii aaj simatatii nazaare ham threedots  palakon pe phailaa terii palakon kaa saayaa hai chehare ne tere meraa cheharaa chhupaayaa hai tere jalavon kii dhundh nahiin chhantatii nazaare ham threedots

Title: choriichorii koii aae
Lyrics: chorii chorii koii aae chupake chupake sab se chhupake kvaab kaii de jaae  aankhen daale aankhon men jaane mujhase kyaa vo puuchhe main jo boluun boluun kyaa hans duun mujh ko kuchh na suujhe aise taake dil men jhaanke saans merii ruk jaae  miithe miithe bolon se dil pe aisaa jaaduu daale khoyii khoyii jaauun main jo bhii chaahe manavaa le mujh ko chuume dil to jhuume aankh magar jhuk jaae  baithii baithii sochuun main vo to chal de mujh ko dasake mujh ko maar daale naa apane baazuon men kasake dil jo dhadake aise dhadake ek nashaa chhaa jaae

Title: tere mere liye taaron ke diye
Lyrics: tere mere liye taron ke diye  ye raat le kar kabase phire jaagijaagi  aao karo koi tere bina dharati gagan  lagate hain bairagi   ye baharon ki dulhan mausam ke hai sath magan  jaane kab hoga magar tera mera madhur milan  kab talak tarasenge ye pyaase pyaase mere nayan  aao karo koi threedots   vaqt aisa bhi kabhi aaye dushman pe nahiin  samane miit ho par usaki lage phir bhi kamii  chandani kaisii hai ye jisane laga di hai agan aao karo koi threedots

Title: dushman naa kare dost ne  barason puraanaa ye yaaraanaa
Lyrics: dushman naa kare dost ne vo kaam kiyaa hai ki dostii ke naam ko badanaam kiyaa hai  barason puraanaa ye yaaraanaa ek pal men kyon tuutaa yaar mere tuu aise ruuthaa  jaise meraa rab ruuthaa  2 barason puraanaa threedots  teraa jahaan bhii giraa pasiinaa maine kuun bahaayaa teraa lahuu banaa kyon paanii ye kaisaa din aayaa vo terii dostii thii merii zindagii banake pujaarii pyaar men tuune pyaar kaa mandir luutaa jaise meraa rab ruuthaa barason puraanaa threedots  laharon par jyon gire lakiiren tuutii qasmen saarii ret kii ik diivaar thii mere yaar kii jhuuthii yaarii ye sitam kyaa huaa kyaa lagii badduaa jism se jaise jaan judaa ho saath teraa yuun chhuutaa jaise meraa rab ruuthaa barason puraanaa threedots

Title: hamane tumako dekhaa tumane hamako dekhaa aise
Lyrics: hamane tumako dekhaa tumane hamako dekhaa aise  hamane tumako dekhaa tumane hamako dekhaa aise ham tum sanam saaton janam milate rahe hon jaise ho hamane tumako dekhaa tumane hamako dekhaa aise   aankhon kaa rah rahake milanaa milake jhuk jaanaa kar detii hain yahii adaaen dil ko diiwaanaa   2 huaa yuun saamanaa padaa dil thaamanaa ho huaa yuun saamanaa padaa dil thaamanaa  ho hamane tumako dekhaa tumane hamako dekhaa aise ham tum sanam saaton janam milate rahe hon jaise   basate basate bas jaayegii is dil kii bastii ho tab hii jiivan men aayegii pyaar bharii mastii   2 hamaarii daastaan kahegaa ye jahaan  ho hamaarii daastaan kahegaa ye jahaan   hamane tumako dekhaa tumane hamako dekhaa aise ham tum sanam saaton janam milate rahe hon jaise   2

Title: sajanaa bhuul naa jaanaa meraa pyaar
Lyrics: sajanaa bhuul naa jaanaa meraa pyaar in raahon men nain bichaae teraa karuungii intazaar sajanaa bhuul naa jaanaa meraa pyaar meraa pyaar3  jab jab saajan phuul khilenge dil ko naye kuch dard milenge jii ko jalayegii baahaar sajanaa bhuul naa jaanaa meraa pyaar in raahon men nain bichaae teraa karuungii intazaar sajanaa bhuul naa jaanaa meraa pyaar meraa pyaar3  jab tak din sang raat rahegii2 merii duaa tere saath rahegii karatii rahuungii main pukaar sajanaa bhuul naa jaanaa meraa pyaar in raahon men nain bichaae teraa karuungii intazaar sajanaa bhuul naa jaanaa meraa pyaar meraa pyaar3

Title: ulajhan hazaar koii daale
