Lyrics: aisaa haaa jalawaa ha alla ulajhan hazaar koii daale  ulajhan hazaar koii daale haay rukate kahaan hain dil waale haay dekho naa aa gaye mastaane chhaa gaye baahon men baahen daale niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa aisaa ha jalawaa ha alla niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa  ulajhan hazaar koii daale ho rukate kahaan hain dil waale ho o dekho naa aa gaye mastaane chhaa gaye baahon men baahen daale niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa  jaaduu bhare kwaabon kaa rangiin nagar diiwaanon diiwaanon dekho naa dekho naa jaise koii khoii huii jannat ka dar mastaanon mastaanon dekho naa ahaa rang badalate parbat ke dil men jhuumar bhii jalate manzar kahaan aisaa o matawaale niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa  aisaa ha jalawaa ha alla ulajhan hazaar koii daale ho rukate kahaan hain dil waale ho o dekho naa aa gaye mastaane chhaa gaye baahon men baahen daale niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa  jaise bahaar liye khadii haathon ke haar diiwaanon diiwaanon dekho naa dekho naa sadiyon se teraa meraa thaa intezaar mastaanon mastaanon dekho naa ahaa ulfat ke aage pathhar ke dil kii dhadakan bhii jaage dhadakan jagaataa chal o matawaale niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa  aisaa ha jalawaa ha alla ulajhan hazaar koii daale ho rukate kahaan hain dil waale ho o dekho naa aa gaye mastaane chhaa gaye baahon men baahen daale niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa  ulajhan hazaar koii daale ho rukate kahaan hain dil waale dekho naa aa gaye mastaane chhaa gaye baahon men baahen daale niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa niinaa

Title: laayii kahaan ai zindagii
Lyrics: aashaa laayii kahaan ai zindagii hai saamane manzil merii phir bhii manzil tak main jaa na sakuun sapanon kii duniyaa paa na sakuun laayii kahaan ai zindagii threedots  ghar se chalii thii apanii hii dhun men main kyaa kyaa aramaan liye pahunchii yahaan to chupake khadii huun dil thaame aansuu piye nikalii na dil kii aavaaz bhii laayii kahaan ai zindagii threedots  lataa aa meraa to jiivan hai giit mere chup kaise rah jaauungii o honthon pe chaahe ho kuun dil kaa phir bhii main to gaauungii diivaanii main sangiit kii laayii kahaan ai zindagii threedots  aashaa zakmii qadam hain ghaayal hai raahii qismat kii zanjiir se haarii nahiin jo duniyaa ke gam se vo haarii taqadiir se majabuur kitanii hai zindagii laayii kahaan ai zindagii threedots

Title: parabat ke piichhe chambe daa gaanv
Lyrics: parabat ke piichhe chambe daa gaanv gaanv men do premii rahate hain ham to nhiin vo diivaanaa jinako diivaanaa log kahate hain  milenge yaa bichhadenge haay raam kyaa hogaa na jaane in donon kaa anjaam kyaa hogaa muft men ho jaayenge badanaam kyaa hogaa ghar se nikal ke raste pe chal ke taane hazaar sahate hain gaanv men do premii rahate hain   threedots

Title: lekar ham diiwaanaa dil
Lyrics: lekar ham diiwaanaa dil phirate hain manzil manzil kahiin to pyaare kisii kinaare mil jaao tum andhere ujaale taram pam lekar ham diiwaanaa dil phirate hain manzil manzil  jis galii men tum us galii men ham phir bhii ye duuriyaan yahaan tum yahiin kahiin ham yahiin kahiin par ye majabuuriyaan yahaan waah re duniyaa duniyaa tere jalawe hain niraale ha aa lekar ham diiwaanaa dil phirate hain manzil manzil  tuu kahiin rahe yuun lage mujhe mere dil ke paas hai yahaan maanguun terii kair aa tere bagair dil meraa udaas hai yahaan aajaa aajaa aajaa hamako siine se lagaa le ha aa lekar ham diiwaanaa dil phirate hain manzil manzil  kahiin to pyaare kisii kinaare mil jaao tum andhere ujaale taram pam lekar ham diiwaanaa dil phirate hain manzil manzil

Title: tere honthon ko terii laalii ko tere yauvan kii
Lyrics: tere honthon ko terii laalii ko tere yauvan kii hariyaalii ko terii angadaaii men milaa duun bolo to giit banaa duun tere honthon ko threedots  zulfon ke aavaaraa saavan men tere angang ke darshan men tere man ke kore darpan men apanii tasviir sajaa duun bolo to giit banaa threedots  palakon ke tirachhe kone ko tere ruup ke mast khilaune ko tere gahariile rang salone ko ik aisii girah lagaa duun bolo to giit banaa threedots  bindiyaa kii chanchal chitavan se baanhon ke khanakate kangan se paayal kii jhanakatii jhanjhan se apanii aavaaz milaa duun bolo to giit banaa threedots

Title: naam gum jaayegaa cheharaa ye badal jaayegaa merii aavaaz hii
Lyrics: naam gum jaayegaa cheharaa ye badal jayegaa merii aavaaz hii pahachaan hai gar yaad rahe  vaqt ke sitam kam hasiin nahiin aaj hain yahaan kal kahiin nahiin vaqt se bhare agar mil gaye kahiin merii aavaaz hii threedots  jo guzar gaii kal kii baat thii umr to nahiin ek raat thii raat kaa silaa agar phir mile kahiin merii aavaaz hii threedots  din dhale jahaan raat paas ho zindagii kii lau uunchii kar chalo yaad aaye gar kabhii jii udaas ho merii aavaaz hii threedots

Title: chaahe aaj mujhe naa pasand karo
Lyrics: chaahe aaj mujhe naa pasand karo chaahe dvaar hriday ke band karo aakir men tumhen merii hii honaa hogaa 2 tuu mile to puuchhuun threedots  bachapan ke pyaar kii mitatii nahiin nishaanii kitanaa bhii mitaanaa chaahe ise javaanii jahaan yaad terii soii ho duujaa na aur koii ho koii dil kaa tumhaare aisaa bhii konaa hogaa aakir men tumhen threedots  main kyaa se kyaa ban gayaa tumhaare kaaran naa samajho ise dikhaavaa hai ye mere pyaar kaa daavaa mere hansane pe hansanaa rone pe ronaa hogaa aakir men tumhen threedots

Title: na ro tuu yahaan aise  ai mere dil yahaan tuu akelaa nahiin
Lyrics: na ro tuu yahaan aise pagalaa kahiin kaa musiibat ko apane gale se lagaa le tere gam kii duniyaa tujhe de gae hain yahaan se vahaan ruuth kar jaane vaale  ai mere dil yahaan tuu akelaa nahiin aur bhii hain bahut gam ke maare hue 2 ai mere dil yahaan threedots  har qadam par yahaan har mod par gam kii ik daastaan  kah rahii har nazar  2 kitanii bechainiyaan rah ke kaamosh bhii de rahii hain sadaa bin pukaare hue ai mere dil yahaan threedots  pyaar jisane kiyaa usako paagal kahaa apanii duniyaa men ye  zulm hotaa rahaa  2 saikadon baar ye khel khelaa gayaa saikadon baar aise nazaare hue ai mere dil yahaan threedots  aise insaan bhii maine dekhe kaii maut jinake lie zindagii ban gaii jinakii aahon se hai  guunjatii ye fizaa  2 jinake aansuu gagan ke sitaare hue ai mere dil yahaan threedots

Title: pattaa pattaa buutaa buutaa haal hamaaraa jaane hai
Lyrics: pattaa pattaa buutaa buutaa haal hamaaraa jaane hai pattaa pattaathreedots jaane na jaane gul hii na jaane baag to saaraa jaane hai pattaa pattaathreedots  koii kisii ko chaahe to kyuun gunaah samajhate hain log koii kisii kii khaatir tarase agar to hansate hain log begaanaa aalam hai saaraa yahaan to koii hamaaraa dard nahiin pahachaane hai pattaa pattaathreedots  chaahat ke gul khilenge chalatii rahe hazaar aandhiyaan ham to kisii chaman men baandhenge pyaar kaa aashiyaan ye duniyaa bijalii giraae ye duniyaa kaante bichhaae ishq magar kab maane hai pattaa pattaathreedots  dikhalaaenge jahaan ko kuchh din jo zindagaanii hai aur kaise na ham milenge hamane bhii dil men thaanii hai aur abhii matavaale dilon kii muhabbat vaale dilon kii baat koii kyaa jaane hai pattaa pattaathreedots

Title: tumasaa miit milaa
Lyrics: ta tumasaa miit milaa dil kaa phuul khilaa ta chalataa rahe yuun hii sanam kushiyon kaa qaafilaa gii tumasaa miit milaa dil kaa phuul khilaa gii chalataa rahe yuun hii sanam kushiyon kaa qaafilaa  ta jaise din sang hai raat rahengen ham tum saath gii chhuute na ab to kabhii aake haathon men haath ta bichhaden na milake kabhii ab ham tum gii tumasaa miit milaa dil kaa phuul khilaa gii chalataa rahe yuun hii sanam kushiyon kaa qaafilaa  gii ghadii ghadii ab to yahii kahatii hai dil kii sadaa gii waadaa karo ke kabhii hoge na mujhase judaa gii tere sivaa kaun meraa mere hamadam ta tumasaa miit milaa dil kaa phuul khilaa ta chalataa rahe yuun hii sanam kushiyon kaa qaafilaa  ta aao kho jaaen ham pyaar kii raahon men ta bhuul ke duniyaa ke gam sapanon kii baahon men ta gaate hue pyaar kii miithii saragam gii tumasaa miit milaa dil kaa phuul khilaa gii chalataa rahe yuun hii sanam kushiyon kaa qaafilaa  ta tumasaa miit milaa gii dil kaa phuul khilaa ta chalataa rahe yuun hii sanam do kushiyon kaa qaafilaa

Title: kaii baar yuun hii dekhaa hai
Lyrics: kaii baar yuun hii dekhaa hai  ye jo man kii siimaa rekhaa hai  man todane lagataa hai  anjaanii pyaas ke piichhe  anjaanii aas ke piichhe  man daudane lagataa hai   raahon men raahon men jiivan kii raahon men  jo khile hain phuul phuul muskuraake  kaun saa phuul churaake rakh luun man men sajaake  kaii baar yuun hii dekhaa hai threedots  jaanuun na jaanuun na ulajhan ye jaanuun na sulajhaauun kaise kuchh samajh na pauun  kisako miit banaauun kisakii priit bhulaauun kaii baar yuun hii dekhaa hai threedots

Title: aap kii yaad aatii rahii raat bhar
Lyrics: aap kii yaad aatii rahii raat bhar chashmenam muskuraatii rahii raat bhar  aap kii yaad aatii rahii threedots   raat bhar dard kii shamaa jalatii rahii gam kii lau tharatharaatii rahii raat bhar threedots   baansurii kii suriilii suhaanii sadaa  yaad banabanake aatii rahii raat bhar threedots   yaad kii chaand dil men utaratii rahii  chaandanii dagamagaatii rahii raat bhar threedots    koii diivaanaa galiyon men phirataa rahaa  koii aavaaz aatii rahii raat bhar threedots

Title: aap kahen aur ham na aayen aise to haalaat nahiin
Lyrics: aap kahen aur ham na aayen aise to haalaat nahiin manzil pe pahunchenge kaise aapakaa jab tak saath nahiin aap kahen aur ham na aayen aise to haalaat nahiin  chaahane vaalon ke aaj duniyaa men chaahane vaale aa gae ulfat kii may aankhon se lo aaj pii lene vaale aa gae aap piien aur aap na jhuumen manzil pe pahunchenge kaise aapakaa jab tak saath nahiin  kasaa huaa hai tiir husn kaa zaraa sambhalake rahiyegaa nazar nazar ko maaregii to kaatil hamen na kahiyegaa chaal chalii hai sochake hamane is khel men apanii maat nahiin  paas aake ye aapake hamen hone lagaa ehasaas hai dam hai to bas aapake damase aap hii se saans hai bayaan karen jo haaledil ko aise koii jazbaat nahiin  aap kahen aur ham na aayen aise to haalaat nahiin manzil pe pahunchenge kaise aapakaa jab tak saath nahiin aap kahen aur ham na aayen aise to haalaat nahiin

Title: na koii umang hai na koii tarang hai
Lyrics: na koii umang hai na koii tarang hai merii zindagii hai kyaa ik katii patang hai  aakaash se girii main ik baar kat ke aise duniyaa ne phir na puuchhaa luutaa hai mujhako kaise na kisii kaa saath hai na kisii kaa sang merii zindagii hai kyaa ik katii patang hai  lag ke gale se apane baabul ke main na ro sakii dolii uthii yuun jaise arthii uthii ho kisii ki yahii dukh to aaj bhii meraa ang sang hai merii zindagii hai kyaa ik katii patang hai  sapanon ke devataa kyaa tujhako karuun main arpan patajhad kii main huun chhaayaa main aansuon kaa darpan yahii meraa ruup hai yahii meraa rang hai merii zindagii hai kyaa ik katii patang hai

Title: ik miithii sii chubhan
Lyrics: ik miithii sii chubhan ik thandii sii agan  main aaj pavan men paauun aaj pavan men paauun   ik miithii sii chubhan ik thandii sii agan main aaj pavan men paauun man hii man men naach rahii huun man hii man muskaauun ik miithii sii chubhan thandii thandii sii agan  jaag uthaa hai pyaar jhuume sab sansar angadaaii sii lete hain sapane angadaaii sii lete hain sapane leke ruup hazaar jaag uthaa hai pyaar aaj meraa jhuum rahaa sansar man kaa aangan jo suunaa thaa man kaa aangan jo suunaa thaa chhaaii hai us men bahaar gajaraa mahake kajaraa bahake lat ulajhii sulajhaauun sulajhaauun kyuun ki ik miithii sii chubhan  ai mere bhagavaan itanaa kar ehasaan ye rasavan kii havaa kahiin na ban jaaye tuufaan pyaar meraa naadaan man bhii hai anjaan jal na jaye bairaagan men jal na jaye bairaagan men jiivan ke varadaan chintaa jaage dhiiraj bhaage man hii man ghabaraauun ghabaraauun

Title: jaanejaan dhuundhataa phir rahaa huun
Lyrics: jaanejaan dhuundhataa phir rahaa huun tumhen raat din main yahaan se vahaan mujhako aavaaz do chhup gaye ho sanam tum kahaan main yahaan  tum kahaan main yahaan jaanejaan   threedots  dil machalane lagaa yuunhii dhalane lagaa rang bharaa pyaar kaa ye samaa aur aise men bas chhod ke chal diye tum kahaan main yahaan   threedots  ai mere hamasafar pyaar kii raah par saath chale ham magar kyaa khabar raaste men kahiin rah gaye hamnashiin tum kahaan main yahaan   threedots  paas ho tum khade mere dil men chhupe aur mujhe kuchh pataa na chalaa dil men dekhaa nahiin dekhaa saaraa jahaan tum kahaan main yahaan   threedots

Title: jaane kyon priitam na aae
Lyrics: jaane kyon priitam na aae pyaar kii dhadakan badhatii jaae                                                                                  gumasum paayal bichhuvaa ghaayal baat nihaare paanv bekal tadap rahe hain rukruk chalchal romrom ko nain banaae jaane kyon priitam na aae                                                                                  gajaraa chanchal menhadii shiital haath ko tarase haath ye komal pyaar pukaare aa mil aa mil aas kaa aanchal chhuutaa jaae jaane kyon priitam na aae                                                                                  man men halachal priit hai nirbal sochen suunii saansen bojhal tham gae jaise har chhin har pal pyaas milan kii badhatii jaae jaane kyon priitam na aae

Title: barakhaa raanii zaraa jamke baraso  barakhaa bairan zaraa thamke
Lyrics: barakhaa raanii zaraa jamke baraso meraa dilabar jaa na paae jhuumakar baraso barakhaa raanii   ye abhii to aae hain kahate hain ham jaaen hain   tuu baras barason baras ye umr bhar na jaae re barakhaa raanii   mast saavan kii ghataa bijuriyaa chamakaa zaraa yaar meraa darke mere siine se lag jaae re barakhaa raanii     barakhaa bairan zaraa thamke baraso pii mere aa jaae to chaahe jamke phir baraso barakhaa bairan   pii se hai meraa milan kyon hai rii tujhako jalan haay re paapan zaraa ruk jaa zaraa tham jaa na re barakhaa bairan   pii ko mere aane de ang se lag jaane de phir tuu dushman yuun barasanaa jaane paae vo na re barakhaa bairan

Title: tang main aa gayaa huun javaanii se
Lyrics: tang main aa gayaa huun javaanii se paas aao zaraa meharabaanii se tang main aa gaii is kahaanii se  aag lagaa ke dil men samaa ke dekho aise hanso na tiir chalaa ke suno samajho merii baat jii zaraa dil pe rakh do haath jii aag bujhatii nahiin dil kii paanii se  dard liyaa dil jo diyaa hai tumane apanaa kud ye haal kiyaa hai bahaanon se tum mat naam lo haath na thaam lo beiimaanii se  haath pakad lo maan bhii jaao baatonbaaton men sanam ruuth gae ho mere dil kii duniyaa khil gaii mujhe saarii duniyaa mil gaii aur maanguun main kyaa zindagaanii se

Title: karatii huun tumhaaraa vrat main
Lyrics: karatii huun tumhaaraa vrat main swiikaar karo maan manjhadhaar men main atakii bedaapaar karo maan bedaapaar karo maan he maan santoshii  2  mere liye to band hain duniyaa kii sab raahen 2 kalyaan meraa ho sakataa hai maan aap jo chaahe chintaa kii aag se meraa uddhaar karo maan manjhadhaar men main atakii   durbhaagya kii diiwaar ko tum aaj hataa do 2 maateshvarii waapas mere saubhaagya ko laa do is abhaagini naarii se kuchh pyaar karo maan manjhadhaar men main atakii

Title: ek naa ek din ye kahaanii banegii
Lyrics: ek naa ek din ye kahaanii banegii tuu mere sapanon kii raanii banegii main teraa diivaanaa banuungaa raanii tuu merii diivaanii banegii ek naa ek din threedots  chain luutaa hai niind luutii hai aise mausam men tuu mujhase ruuthii hai 2 ye tere haathon kii anguuthii prem kii pahalii nishaanii banegii ek naa ek din threedots  ye gussaa tuu bhuul jaaegii tere honthon pe hansii aaegii ye aaj ho yaa kal ho ye berukii meharabaanii banegii ek naa ek din threedots  yuun to pahale laaj aatii hai baad men gorii maan jaatii hai teraameraa nayaanayaa milan hai ye mulaaqaat puraanii banegii ek naa ek din threedots

Title: aate jaate khuubsuurat aavaaraa sadakon pe
Lyrics: aate jaate khuubsuurat aavaaraa sadakon pe kabhii kabhii ittefaaq se kitane anjaan log mil jaate hain un men se kuchh log bhuul jaate hain kuchh yaad rah jaate hain  aavaaz kii duniyaa ke doston kal raat isii jagah pe mujhako kis qadar ye hasiin kayaal milaa hai raah men ik reshamii rumaal milaa hai jo giraayaa thaa kisii ne jaan kar jis kaa ho le vo jaaye pahachaan kar varanaa main rakh luungaa us ko apanaa jaan kar kisii husnvaale kii nishaanii maan kar nishaanii maan kar hansate gaate logon kii baaten hii baaten men kabhii kabhii ik mazaak se kitane javaan kisse ban jaate hain un kisson men chand bhuul jaate hain chand yaad rah jaate hain un men se kuchh log threedots  taqadiir mujh pe maharabaan hai jis shokh kii ye daastaan hai us ne bhii shaayad ye paigaam sunaa ho mere giiton men apanaa naam sunaa ho duur baithii ye raaz vo jaan le merii aavaaz ko pahachaan le kaash phir kal raat jaisii barasaat ho aur merii us kii kahiin mulaaqaat ho lambii lambii raaton men niind nahiin jab aatii kabhii kabhii is firaaq se kitane hasiin kvaab ban jaate hain un men se kuchh kvaab bhuul jaate hain kuchh yaad rah jaate hain un men se kuchh log threedots

Title: pyaar ke is khel men
Lyrics: pyar ke is khel men do dilon ke mel men tera pichha na main chhodunga soniye bhej de chahe jel men pyar ke is khel men threedots  darata main nahin chahe ho zamin chahe aasamaan jahan bhi tu jaayegi main vahan chala aaunga   2 tera pichha na main chhodunga soniye  2 bhej de chahe jel men pyar ke is khel men threedots  o jaanejigar din men tu agar mujhase na mili sapanon men aake saari raat jagaunga   2 tera pichha na main chhodunga soniye  2 bhej de chahe jel men pyar ke is khel men threedots  dil ke haath se likh le baat ye vaada ye raha tere ghar leke baraat kabhi aaunga   2 tera pichha na main chhodunga soniye  2 bhej de chahe jel men pyar ke is khel men threedots

Title: ye bekasii ke andhere zaraa
Lyrics: ye bekasii ke andhere zaraa to dhalane de bujhaa na de mere dil kaa charaag jalane de  kud apanii aag men jalanaa meraa muqaddar hai main ek shammaa huun palpal mujhe pighalane de  ye bhatakiibhatakii jawaanii ye dagamagaaye qadam sanbhal to jaauun zamaanaa agar sanbhalane de  na sun sake to yahiin katm zikregam kar duun jo sun sake to merii daastaan chalane de

Title: ai baadal jhuum ke chal
Lyrics: ai baadal  2 jhuum ke chal zamiin ko chuum ke chal mausam mahakaamahakaa hai dil bahakaabahakaa jaae ai baadal jhuum ke threedots  chal 5  kyaa rangrangiilii vaadii hai ye dhuup chamakatii chaandii hai is apane vatan se ho is apane vatan se ik priit kii dorii baandhii hai haay ai baadal jhuum ke threedots  jhonkaa jo havaa kaa aataa hai kushbuu ko churaakar laataa hai titalii bhii dole o bhanvaraa bhii bole jharanaa bhii taraane gaataa hai haay ai baadal jhuum ke threedots

Title: kaalii ghataa chhaaii prem ritu aaii
Lyrics: kaalii ghataa chhaaii prem ritu aaii aaii aaii aaii aaii terii yaad aaii tujhe dhuundhe mere nain nahiin niind nahiin chain kaalii ghataa chhaaii threedots  yuun hii nahiin chalii aaiin bahaaren phuul yuun hii nahiin khile kuchh to hai kaaran itane yugon se do premii nahiin mile chhotaa saa jiivan lambii judaaii kaalii threedots  parbat parbat gulashan gulashan mele milan ke lage ek hii pal men niind se jaise dard hazaaron jage dil kii lagii ne lii angadaaii kaalii threedots  birahaa kii kaalii raaton ke rang se kaajal banaa kaajal mil gayaa ansuvana men to kaalaa baadal banaa kis baadal ne aag lagaaii kaalii threedots

Title: mushkil hai jiinaa bedardon kii duniyaa men
Lyrics: mushkil hai jiinaa bedardon kii duniyaa men dard uthe to chup rahanaa apane hii aansuu piinaa  dil bhii apanaa dard bhii apanaa baaqii sabhii paraaye hain kaisii qismat lekar jaane ham duniyaa men aaye hain dard uthe to chup rahanaa threedots  din phiike se raaten suunii kab tak inase pyaar karuun apanii kahaanii apane hii se kahate kahate aankh bharuun dard uthe to chup rahanaa threedots  pahare udaasiyon ke chhoden na saath meraa koii kushii to kabhii thaamegii haath meraa duur kahiin se dekhuun dhundhalaa saa ek saayaa saayaa to hai chhaayaa kab haath kisii ke aayaa dard uthe to chup rahanaa threedots

Title: navaprabhaat aayaa jaago navaprabhaat aayaa
Lyrics: aa aa aa aa  chandra chhupaa suuraj ugaa bikharaa laal gulaal daal daal panchii jage jaago he gopal  aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa aa navaprabhaat aayaa jaago navaprabhaat aayaa jaago navaprabhaat aayaa threedots  aa aa aa aa aa aa aa phuul jage kaliyaan jaagii chanchal maalaniyaan jaagii 2  gokul kii gaiyaan jaagii gaaon kii gwalaniyaan jaagii  2  jaag uthii hai navajiivan men dharatii kii kaayaa threedots  koii sakhii shrringaar kare thumak thumak kar paanv bhare  2  chham chham karati panihaaran chhal chhal jal ke kalash bhare  2  dekh sunahare ravikiranon ne amrit barasaayaa aa aa aa 2

Title: karo baaten mulaaqaaten aisii raaten
Lyrics: karo baaten mulaaqaaten aisii raaten jaagii jaagii soye soye khoye khoye main aur tuu karo baaten mulaaqaaten aisii raaten jaagii jaagii soye soye khoye khoye main aur tuu  aankhon se karanaa tum baaten chup rahanaa tumane jo kat men likkhaa thaa mat kahanaa haan haan logon se kah duun main dil kaa afasaanaa tumane samajhaa hai kyaa mujhako diiwaanaa laakh chhupaao chhup nahiin sakate pyaar aur kushabuu  dekho raazedil ye duniyaa naa jaane koii dekhe to ban jaanaa begaane hen hen dil ko lene do laharaake angadaaii mahafil men dhuundho thodii sii tanahaaii aankhon hii aankhon men chalane do pyaar kaa jaaduu  karo baaten mulaaqaaten aisii raaten jaagii jaagii soye soye khoye khoye main aur tuu

Title: chorii chorii solah singaar karuungii
Lyrics: chorii chorii solah singaar karuungii aaj saarii raat intazaar karuungii soye hain mere piiyarawaa soye hain mere piiyarawaa  ho chorii chorii solah singaar karuungii aaj saarii raat intazaar karuungii soye hain mere piiyarawaa soye hain mere piiyarawaa  haan haan chorii chorii solah singaar karuungii  lipate badan se shole agan ke  terii lagan ke khelo naa man se mere kah duungii main ye sajan se ho ho haan haan  terii lagan ke khelo naa man se mere kah duungii main ye sajan se naa jii naa haan haan jii haan ek ye gilaa sau baar karuungii aaj saarii raat intazaar karuungii soye hain mere piiyarawaa soye hain mere piiyarawaa  ho chorii chorii solah singaar karuungii  nainon ke raste chupake se aake sapanon men jaake paayal bajaake chhan se rakh duungii unako jagaake ho ho haan haan sapanon men jaake paayal bajaake chhan se rakh duungii unako jagaake naa jii naa haan haan jii haan pyaar kiyaa hai mainne pyaar karuungii aaj saarii raat intazaar karuungii soye hain mere piiyarawaa soye hain mere piiyarawaa  haan haan chorii chorii solah singaar karuungii aaj saarii raat intazaar karuungii soye hain mere piiyarawaa soye hain mere piiyarawaa

Title: meraa paradesii na aayaa
Lyrics: meraa paradesii na aayaa 2 sabake man miit mile hain baagon men phir se phuul khile hain meraa man murajhaayaa meraa paradesii na threedots  saavan barasaa yuun man tarasaa main jii bhar ke roii 2 jisane dekhaa paagal samajhaa ye na samajhaa koii meraa paradesii na threedots  yaad men kisakii jaane zulmii bhuul gayaa birahan ko 2 raah men jaane kis sautan ne rok liyaa saajan ko meraa paradesii na threedots  saanjhsakaare ye kahkah ke chhede duniyaa saarii 2 vo aatii hai vo jaatii hai ik birahaa kii maarii meraa paradesii na threedots

Title: main shaayar to nahiin magar ai hasiin
Lyrics: main shaayar to nahiin magar ai hansiin jabase dekhaa mainne tujhako mujhako shaayarii aa gai  mainn aashiq to nahin magar ai hasin jabase dekhaa mainne tujhako mujhako ashiqi aa gai  pyaar kaa naam mainne sunaa thaa magar pyaar kyaa hai ye mujhako nahiin thii khabar main to ulajhaa rahaa ulajhanon kii tarah doston men rahaa dushmanon kii tarah main dushman to nahiin magar ai hansiin jab se dekhaa main ne tujhako mujhako dostii aa gai  sochataa huun agar main duaa maangataa haath apane uthaakar main kyaa maangataa jab se tujhase muhabbat main karane lagaa tab se aise ibaadat main karane lagaa main qaafir to nahiin magar ai hansiin jab se dekhaa main ne tujhako mujhako bandagii aa gai

Title: o tushimaa rii tushimaa aaj jaane kis kaaran
Lyrics: o tushimaa rii tushimaa 2 aaj jaane kis kaaran haulehaule dole man aa gayaa tuufaan haan aa gayaa tuufaan 2 o tushimaa rii tushimaa 2  chhaaii mastii bastiibastii parvatparvat jhuumen2 yuun chalii puravaaii angang leve angadaaii dharatii chhuuve aasamaan aa gayaa tuufaan aa gayaa tuufaan haan aa gayaa tuufaan o tushimaa rii tushimaa threedots  thandaa paanii chhuune se bhii aag badan men laage2 niind se joban jaagaa chupake se dhadakan laagaa meraa manavaa beiimaan aa gayaa tuufaan aa gayaa tuufaan haan aa gayaa tuufaan o tushimaa rii tushimaa threedots  mainne dekhaa apanaa mukhadaa maujon ke darpan men 2 man se mainne puuchhaa yah huun main yaa koii duujaa  itanii sundar main kahaan aa gayaa tuufaan aa gayaa tuufaan haan aa gayaa tuufaan o tushimaa rii tushimaa threedots

Title: main vahii darpan vahii naa jaane ye kyaa ho gayaa
Lyrics: main vahii darpan vahii naa jaane ye kyaa ho gayaa ki sab kuchh laage nayaanayaa  main to gaane lagii gungunaane lagii na jaane main ye kis or jaane lagii tan vahii meraa man vahii na jaane   ik jaaduu kii chhadii tanman pe padii main jahaan thii rah gai vahiin pe khadii ghar vahii aangan vahii naa jaane   kahiin duur papiihaa bole piyaapiyaa ud jaane ko bekal hai moraa jiyaa dil vahii dhadakan vahii naa jaane

Title: abake saawan men jii kare
Lyrics: abake saawan men jii kare rimajhim tan pe paanii gire man men lage aag sii ho o o abake saawan men jii kare rimajhim tan pe paanii gire man men lage aag sii ho  aisaa mausam pahale kabhii bhii aayaa nahiin aisaa baadal ambar pe sajanaa chhayaa nahiin ho o o aisaa mausam pahale kabhii bhii aayaa nahiin aisaa baadal ambar pe sajanaa chhayaa nahiin ho ye suhaanaa samaan prem kii khoj men mauj men ho o o paagal premii banake phire rimajhim tan pe paanii gire man men lage aag sii  aa tujhako aankhon men basaa luun is raat men kajaraa gajaraa bah jaayegaa rii barasaat men ho o o aa tujhako aankhon men basaa luun is raat men kajaraa gajaraa bah jaayegaa rii barasaat men ho hosh se kaam lo raam kaa naam lo thaam lo ho o o jaane bairan rut kyaa kare rimajhim tan pe paanii gire man men lage aag sii  abake saawan men jii kare rimajhim tan pe paanii gire man men lage aag sii  man men lage aag sii man men lage aag sii

Title: ambar kii ek paak suraahii baadal kaa ek jaam uthaakar
Lyrics: ambar kii ek paak suraahii baadal kaa ek jaam uthaakar ghuunt chaandanii pii hai hamane baat kufr kii kii hai hamane   kaise isakaa karz chukaaen maang ke apanii maut ke haathon umr kii cholii sii hai hamane baat kufr kii   apanaa isamen kuchh bhii nahiin hai rozeadal se usakii amaanat usako vahii to dii hai hamane baat kufr kii    ambar kii ek paak suraahii baadal kaa ik jaam uthaaye ghuunt chaandanii pii hai hamane  hamane aaj ye duniyaa bechii aur ek diin khariid ke laaye baat kufr kii kii hai hamane  sapanon kaa ek thaan bunaa thaa gaj ek kapadaa phaad liyaa aur umr kii cholii sii hai hamane  kaise isakaa karz chukaauun maang ke apanii maut ke haathon ye jo zindagii lii hai hamane

Title: des parades are khushiyaan yahiin pe milenge haan mere
Lyrics: des parades are khushiyaan yahiin pe milengi haan mere apanaa hai apanaa ye des parades  vahii puraane hain vahii puraane hain saare phasaane nayaa hai lekin jahaan are raste naye hain ye manzil nai hai  lekin vahii aasamaan teraa naa meraa apanaa hai apanaa  ye des parades  akelaa nahiin huun main akelaa nahiin huun main tere binaa sanga mere terii yaad hai milakara khilen phuul hara ranga ke basa yahii merii phariyaad hai sapanaa hai sapanaa ye des paradesthreedots

Title: haay haay ye majabuurii ye mausam aur ye duurii
Lyrics: are haay haay ye majabuurii ye mausam aur ye duurii  are haay haay haay majabuurii ye mausam aur ye duurii mujhe pal pal hai tadapaaye terii do takiyaan dii naukarii te meraa laakhon kaa saavan jaaye haay haay ye majabuurii threedots  kitane saavan biit gaye baithii huun aas lagaaye jis saavan men mile sajanavaa vo saavan kab aaye kab aaye madhur milan kaa ye saavan haathon se nikalaa jaaye terii do takiyaan dii threedots  prem kaa aisaa bandhan hai jo bandh ke phir naa tuute are naukarii kaa hai kyaa bharosaa aaj mile kal chhuute kal chhuute ambar pe hai rachaa svayanvar phir bhii tuu ghabaraaye terii do takiyaan dii threedots

Title: jaan gaii main to jaan gaii  koii banaae bahaane
Lyrics: jaan gaii main to jaan gaii o ho jaan gaii main to jaan gaii koii banaae bahaane moraa chanchal jiyaravaa lubhaane jaan gaii main to threedots  binaa kaaran kare mose baaten o binaa kaaran kare mose baaten main to samajhuun vo sab usakii ghaaten 2  mudmud ke  2 mohe bulaae more nainon se nainaa milaane ko ho jaan gaii main to threedots  mohe dekhe to man usakaa dole o ho mohe dekhe to man usakaa dole par vo ye baat khul ke na bole 2  chaahe vo  2 kitanaa chhupaae jiyaa tadape hai garavaa lagaane ko jaan gaii main to threedots  moraa man naachenaache kushii men ho ho moraa man naachenaache kushii men maine ghar kar liyaa usake jii men 2  yuunhii  2 nahiin usane chaahaa more juude men phulavaa lagaane ko jaan gaii main to threedots

Title: aankhen milaaenge aaj sirf gaanaa gaaenge
Lyrics: la aankhen milaaenge baaten sunaaenge     palken bichhaaenge zulfen bikharaaenge     phir kisii din ki aaj kyaa karenge la ho aaj sirf gaanaa gaaenge la aankhen milaaenge baaten sunaaenge     palken bichhaaenge zulfen bikharaaenge     phir kisii din ki bhai aaj kyaa karenge la ho aaj sirf gaanaa gaaenge  ki gaane ke liye yahaan aanaa kyaa zaruurii thaa     jaane ke liye ye bahaanaa kyaa zaruurii thaa la achchhaa maan jaate hain nahiin tadapaate hain ki ye baat huii naa la la la laa laa laa laa laa laa     mil ke laharaaenge kabhii paas aaenge     kabhii paas aaenge kabhii duur jaaenge     phir kisii din ki oho aaj kyaa karenge la ho aaj sirf gaanaa gaaenge  ki pyaar men gilen shikawen kaa maukaa detii ho     ghar se bulaa ke raste men dhokhaa detii ho la achchhaa chalothiik hai kuchh bhii ho priit hai ki waadaa rahaa naa la haan waadaa        la la laa laa laa laa laa laa     priit ye nibhaaenge aankhon men basaaenge     tum ko naa rulaaenge hasenge hasaaenge     phir kisii din ki bhai aaj kyaa karenge la ho aaj sirf gaanaa gaaenge  ki aankhen milaaenge baaten sunaaenge     palken bichhaaenge zulfen bikharaaenge     phir kisii din la to aaj kyaa karenge ki aaj sirf gaanaa gaaenge

Title: re man sur men gaa
Lyrics: re man sur men gaa koii taar besur na bole na bole re man sur men gaa threedots  jiivan hai sukh duhkh kaa sangam madhyam ke sang jaise pancham donon ko ek banaa re man sur men gaa threedots  dil jo dhadake taal baje re taal taal men samay chale re samay ke sang ho jaa re man sur men gaa threedots  jag hai giiton kii rajadhaanii sur hai raajaa lay hai rannii saaz ruup ban jaa re man sur men gaa threedots

Title: ye vahii giit hai jisako maine dhadakan men basaayaa hai
Lyrics: ye vahii giit hai jisako maine  dhadakan men basaayaa hai tere honthon se isako churaakar  honthon pe sajaayaa hai ye vahii giit hai  ye vahii giit hai  maine ye giit jab gungunaayaa saj gaii hai khayaalon kii mahafil pyaar ke rang aankhon men chhaaye  muskuraai ujaalon kii mahafil     2 ye vo nagamaa hai jo zindagii men  roshanii banake aayaa hai tere honthon se isako churaakar threedots  mere dil ne yahii giit gaakar jab kabhii tujhako aavaaz dii hai phuul zulfon men apanii sajaakar tuu mere saamane aa gaii hai  2 tujhe aqsar merii bekhudii ne  siine se lagaayaa hai tere honthon se isako churaakar threedots

Title: haan ishq meraa diiwaanaa ye diiwaanaa mastaanaa
Lyrics: haan ishq meraa diiwaanaa ye diiwaanaa mastaanaa teshe ko banaa kar apanaa qalam likhegaa nayaa afasaanaa ishq meraa diiwaanaa ye diiwaanaa mastaanaa  is ishq men aisii mastii hai jo dilawaalon kii jaan bane simate to dhale kuchh aahon men phaile to yahii tuufaan bane phaile to yahii tuufaan bane zanziir se bhii shamashiir se bhii qisamat kii likhii tahariir se bhii aataa hai ise takaraanaa ishq meraa diiwaanaa ye diiwaanaa mastaanaa  maaluum na thaa diiwaane ko yuun apanaa muqaddar tuutegaa teshaa to chalegaa patthar par patthar kii jagah dil tuutegaa ab rote hain aramaan mere sab kaab huye viiraan mere hansataa hai dekh zamaanaa  female 	farahaad tujhe kis baat kaa dar jab terii wafaa hai saath tere 	chuumengii chattaane tere qadam terii hii duaa hai saath tere 	ai dekh idhar o dekh udhar is vaadii men us chotii par 	hai tujhape jamiin shiirii kii nazar ab usakii laaj nibhaanaa 	ishq meraa diiwaanaa ye diiwaanaa mastaanaa 	teshe ko banaa kar apanaa qalam likhegaa nayaa afasaanaa 	ishq meraa diiwaanaa likhegaa nayaa afasaanaa  do 	haan ishq meraa diiwaanaa likhegaa nayaa afasaanaa me 	ai ishq madad 5

Lyrics: jo raah chunii tuune usii raah pe raahii chalate jaanaa re ho kitanii bhii lambii raat diyaa ban jalate jaanaa re  kabhii ped kaa saayaa ped ke kaam na aayaa sevaa men sabhii kii usane janam bitaayaa koii kitane bhii phal tode use to hai phalate jaanaa re usii raah pe raahii chalate jaanaa re  jiivan ke safar men aise bhii mod hain aate jahaan chal dete hain apane bhii tod ke naate kahiin dhiiraj chhuut na jaaye tuu dekh sambhalate jaanaa re usii raah pe raahii chalate jaanaa re  tere pyaar kii maalaa kahiin jo tuut bhii jaaye janamon kaa saathii kabhii jo chhuut bhii jaaye de dekar jhuuthii aas tuu khud ko chhalate jaanaa re usii raah pe raahii chalate jaanaa re  terii apanii kahaanii ye daparn bol rahaa hai bhiigii aankh kaa paanii haqiikat khol rahaa hai jis rang men dhaale vaqt musaafir dhalate jaanaa re usii raah pe raahii chalate jaanaa re

Title: khinche hamase saanware
Lyrics: khinche hamase saanware itane kyuun ho roko paagal man ko ki jisane chaahaa tumako merii baanhon se pare itane kyuun ho  rut ye duurii kii nahii hain gorii kahiin hain pii kahiin hain rukiye to arerererere rukiye to arererere aisaa kyaa arererere suniye to roko chanchal man ko ki jisane chaahaa tumako ajii gusse men khade itane kyuun ho  kabhii naa puuchhaa naa haal meraa lage ujaalaa bhii andheraa dam aur to arerererere rukataa hai arererere mana meraa arerererere dukhataa hain roko vyaakula man ko ki jisane chaahaa tumako piyaa apanon se phire itane kyuun ho  pyaar kii huun main to pyaasii tum naa samajhe ye udaasii aage aur nanananana kahanaa kyaa tumare bina nanananana rahanaa kyaa roko paagal man ko ki jisane chaahaa tumako chatur hoke baanware itane kyuun ho

Title: jaane kyon log muhabbat kiyaa karate hain
Lyrics: is zamaane men is mohabbat ne  kitane dil tode kitane ghar phuunke  jaane kyon log muhabbat kiyaa karate hain  2 dil ke badale dardedil liyaa karate hain jaane kyon log muhabbat kiyaa karate hain   tanhaaii milatii hai mahafil nahiin milatii raahen muhabbat men kabhii manzil nahiin milatii dil tut jaataa hai naakaam hotaa hai ulfat men logon kaa yahii anjaam hotaa hai koii kyaa jaane kyon ye paravaane  kyon machalate hain gam men jalate hain  aahen bhar bhar ke divaane jiyaa karate hain  2 jaane kyon log muhabbat kiyaa karate hain   saavan men aankhon ko kitanaa rulaatii hai furaqat men jab dil ko kisii kii yaad aatii hai ye zindagii yuun hii barabaad hotii hai har vaqt honthon pe koii fariyaad hotii hai naa davaaon kaa naam chalataa hai naa duaaon se kaam chalataa hai zahar ye phir bhii sabhii kyon piyaa karaten hain  2 jaane kyon log muhabbat kiyaa karate hain   mahabuub se har gam manasuub hotaa hai din raat ulfat men tamaashaa khuub hotaa hai raaton se bhii lambe ye pyaar ke kisse aashiq sunaate hain jafaaeyaar ke qisse bemuravvat hai bevafaa hai vo  us sitamagar kaa apane dilabar kaa  naam le le ke duhaaii diyaa karate hain  2 jaane kyon log muhabbat kiyaa karate hain

Title: rimjhim gire saavan sulag sulag jaaye man  both versions
Lyrics: rimjhim gire saavan sulag sulag jaae man bhiige aaj is mausam men lagii kaisii ye agan rimjhim gire saavan threedots  pahale bhii yuun to barase the baadal pahale bhii yuun to bhiigaa thaa aanchal ab ke baras kyuun sajan  sulag sulag jaae man bhiige aaj is mausam men lagii kaisii ye agan rimjhim gire saavan threedots  is baar saavan dahakaa huaa hai  is baar mausam bahakaa huaa hai jaane piike chalii kyaa pavan  sulag sulag jaae man bhiige aaj is mausam men lagii kaisii ye agan rimjhim gire saavan threedots  rimjhim gire saavan sulag sulag jaae man bhiige aaj is mausam men lagii kaisii ye agan rimjhim gire saavan threedots  jab ghungharuon sii bajatii hain buunde aramaan hamaare palake na muunde kaise dekhe sapane nayan  sulag sulag jaae man bhiige aaj is mausam men lagii kaisii ye agan rimjhim gire saavan threedots  mahafil men kaise kah den kisii se dil bandh rahaa hai kis ajanabii se haay kare ab kyaa jatan  sulag sulag jaae man bhiige aaj is mausam men lagii kaisii ye agan rimjhim gire saavan threedots

Title: yahaan nahiin kahuungii
Lyrics: aa paa paa paa paa paa       lo suno ki a bolo naa aa yahaan nahiin kahuungii ki  phir kahaan kahogii aa are yahaan naa     to to to phir kahaan kisi aur jagah aa haa aa haa chalo naa re lo suno suno naa to chalo chalo naa  ki dekho zaraa chaaron taraf yahaan wahaan       khile hue rang hain ruup hain phuul hain 2 aa bechain rahane lagii huun main haan       achchhaa lo kahane lagii huun main      yahaan nahiin   ki thandii hawaa mastii men aaii       ye uunche parabat chuumake jhuumake ghuumake 2 aa hai baraf kaisii gorii gorii        ye baat sunalo chorii chorii       yahaan nahiin   aa o bekabar use koii ladakii par bhii hai iqaraar kyaa prem kaa pyaar kaa 2 ki main ye ishaaraa samajhaa nahiin       matalab tumhaaraa samajhaa nahiin aa yahaan nahiin

Lyrics: haay aa ke dard jawaan hai 2 sajanaa haay  raat kaa ishaaraa hai pyaar ne pukaaraa hai  2 baanhon men lele mujhe aah aa ke dard jawaan hai 2  aisii badariyaa pahalii baar chhaaii hai jhuum ke uthii to hai barasane na paaii hai  merii ye nigaahen garm baanhen ab na maanengii  2 aakir terii saansen mere dil kaa dard jaanengii aa haa aa ke dard jawaan hai 2  nazaren gulaabii hon to har shai gulaabii hai merii nazar se dekho duniyaa sharaabii hai  dekho mere dil men aaj kaisii beqaraarii hai  2 ghaayal main hiraniyaa mere dil kaa tuu shikaarii hai aa haa  aa ke dard jawaan hai 2 sajanaa haay  raat kaa ishaaraa hai pyaar ne pukaaraa hai  2 baanhon men lele mujhe aah aa ke dard jawaan hai haay aa ke dard jawaan hai

Title: maine kyaa jii  kii gal hai koii nahiin
Lyrics: maine kyaa jii  ki 	oy kii gal hai la 	koii nahiin ki 	terii aankhon se lagataa hai tuu kal raat ko soii nahiin la 	niind hai kyaa kaun sii chiiz jo maine tere pyaar men khoii nahiin  ki 	gal kaa matalab baat bich na baat nahiin koii aisii 	dil kii aag bujhaae jo barasaat nahiin koii aisii 	jii bhar ke ham mile hon la 	jab mulaaqaat nahiin koii aisii 	are ye to merii himmat hai main tadapii jaagii roii nahiin ki 	kii gal hai threedots  la 	ik ham aaj akele us pe mausam ye mastaanaa 	jaag uthaa dil men shaayad dard koii puraanaa ki 	tuu jo kuchh bhii aaj kahegii hogaa ik bahaanaa 	main tujhako chheduungaa varanaa chhod de sharamaanaa la 	dekhanesunane vaalaa duujaa aur yahaan par koii nahiin ki 	kii gal hai threedots

Title: tumhaare bin guzaare hain kaii din
Lyrics: la 	tumhaare bin guzaare hain kaii din ab na guzarenge 	jo dil men aa gaii hai aaj ham vo kar hii guzarenge ra 	kabar kyaa thii ke apane bhii sitaare aise bigadenge 	ke jo puujaa ke qaabil hain vahii yuun rang badalenge  la 	kaii din baad phir ye saajsingaar paayaa hai 	nahiin maaluum thaa ke aap yuun inakaar kar denge 	tumhaare bin guzaare threedots  ra 	tumhen kaise bataaen kyaa hamaare saath guzarii hai 	tumhaaraa kvaab tuutegaa agar yah baat kah denge 	tumhaare bin guzaare threedots  la 	tumhaarii ek na maanenge karenge aaj manamaanii 	bahut tarasaayaa hai tumane nahiin ab aur tarasenge 	tumhaare bin guzaare threedots  ra 	sataayaa to nahiin karate kabhii qismat ke maaron ko 	kisii kii jaan jaaegii kisii ke aramaan nikalenge 	tumhaare bin guzaare threedots  la 	manaayaa tumako kitanii baar lekin tum nahiin maane 	to majabuur hokar ham sharaarat par bhii utarenge 	tumhaare bin guzaare threedots  ra 	haqiiqat kyaa hai ye pahale bataa dete to achchhaa thaa 	kud apane jaal se ham na jaane kaise nikalenge 	tumhaare bin guzaare threedots

Title: o ghataa saanvarii thodii thodii baavarii
Lyrics: o ghataa saanvarii thodii thodii baavarii ho gaii hai barasaat kyaa har saans hai bahakii huii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa har baat hai bahakii huii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa 2  paake akelii mujhe meraa aanchal mere saath ulajhe chhuu le achaanak koii lat men aise meraa haath ulajhe kyuun re baadal tune threedots e e e threedots haa threedots uii tuune chhuaa meraa haath kyaa  o ghataa saanvarii thodii thodii baavarii ho gaii hai barasaat kyaa har saans hai bahakii huii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa har baat hai bahakii huyii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa  aavaaz thii kal yahii phir bhii aise lahakatii na dekhii pag men thii paayal magar phir bhii aise chhanakatii na dekhii chanchal ho gae ghungharuu threedots ruu threedots me  re threedots  ghungharuu mere raaton raat kyaa  o ghataa saanvarii thodii thodii baavarii ho gaii hai barasaat kyaa har saans hai bahakii huii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa har baat hai bahakii huii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa  mastii se bojhal pavan jaise saayaa koii man pe dole barakhaa kii har buund par  tharatharii sii mere tan pe dole paagal mausam jaa re jaa jaajaa jaa hmm threedots hmm threedots jaa tuu lagaa mere saath kyaa  o ghataa saanvarii thodii thodii baavarii ho gaii hai barasaat kyaa har saans hai bahakii huii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa har baat hai bahakii huii ab ke baras  hai ye baat kyaa

Title: jiyaa naa laage moraa
Lyrics: u u u threedots aa aa aa threedots o o  jiyaa naa laage moraa  2 naa jaa re naa jaa re naa jaa jiyaa naa threedots  kaahe pat kholaa tuune mere dwaar kaa haa aa aa aa aayaa barason men koii jhonkaa pyaar kaa haa aa aa aa  do pal to thahar jaa  2 mohe itanaa bhii naa sataa jiyaa naa threedots  sunake merii baaten palak terii kyuun jhukii haa aa aa achchhaa re bedardii jaa nahiin main rokatii haa aa aa aa  ye hai teraa rastaa  2 kahiin jaa sakataa hai to jaa jiyaa naa threedots

Title: tere nainaa kyon bhar aae
Lyrics: tere nainaa kyon bhar aae vo hai sabakaa rakhavaalaa tuu kaahe ko ghabaraae tere nainaa kyon threedots  ye aansuu aur ye dukh saare le jaa prabhuu ke dvaare vo hii tuutii aas bandhaae bigade kaaj sanvaare dvaar se usake koii khaalii haath na vaapas jaae tere nainaa kyon threedots  jiivan kii ye dhuupchhaanv sab hai kheltamaashaa man se aankhmichaulii khele aashaa aur niraashaa aaj hai dukh to kal sukh hogaa kaahe niir bahaae tere nainaa kyon threedots

Title: chaand akelaa jaaye sakhii rii
Lyrics: chaand akelaa jaaye sakhii rii kaahe akelaa jaaye sakhii rii man moraa ghabaraaye rii sakhii rii sakhii rii o sakhii rii chaand akelaa   threedots  vo bairaagii vo manabhaavan kab aayegaa more aangan itanaa to batalaaye rii sakhii rii sakhii rii o sakhii rii chaand akelaa   threedots  ang ang men holii dahake man men belaa chamelii mahake ye rit kyaa kahalaaye rii bhaabhii rii bhaabhii rii o bhaabhii rii chaand akelaa   threedots

Title: tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii
Lyrics: tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii sapane to apane hoke rahenge hamen thaa yaqeen aap ik din kahenge  tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii  dilon kaa baseraa basaayen wahaan pe koii pyaar kaa naa ho dushman jahaan pe dilon kaa baseraa basaayen wahaan pe koii pyaar kaa naa ho dushman jahaan pe waheen pe milegii zindagii kii har khushii  tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii  mohabbat ke ye din kabhii naa bhulaaen sadaa pyaar ke ham madhur giit gaaen mohabbat ke ye din kabhii naa bhulaaen sadaa pyaar ke ham madhur giit gaaen jawaan dhadakanon ke saaz men hai dilakashii  tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii sapane to apane hoke rahenge hamen thaa yaqeen aap ik din kahenge  tumhiin ho tumhiin ho jaanejaan ab merii zindagii

Title: har hasiin chiiz kaa main talabgaar huun
Lyrics: har hasiin chiiz kaa main talabgaar huun  2  ras kaa phuulon kaa giiton kaa biimaar huun  2  har hasiin chiiz kaa main talabgaar huun  saaraa gaanv mujhe rasiyaa kahe 2 jo bhii dekhe manbasiyaa kahe haay re jo bhii dekhe manbasiyaa kahe sab kii nazaron kaa ek main hii diidaar huun ras kaa phuulon kaa giiton kaa biimaar huun threedots  koii kahe bhanvaraa mujhe koii diivaanaa  bhed mere man kaa magar kisii ne na jaanaa  2 ronaa main ne kabhii siikhaa nahiin 2 chakhaa jiivan men phal phiikaa nahiin haay re haay chakhaa jiivan men phal phiikaa nahiin main to har mol dene ko taiyaar huun ras kaa phuulon kaa giiton kaa biimaar huun threedots

Title: tere honthon ko terii laalii ko tere yauvan kii hariyaalii ko
Lyrics: tere honthon ko terii laalii ko tere yauvan kii hariyaalii ko2 terii angadaaii men milaaduun2 bolo to giit banaaduun tere honthon ko terii laalii ko tere yauvan kii hariyaalii ko  zulfon ke aawaaraa daaman men tere ang ang ke darashan men tere man ke kore darapan men apanii tasaviir sajaaduun2 bolo to giit banaaduun tere honthon ko terii laalii ko tere yauvan kii hariyaalii ko  bindiyaa kii chanchal chitavan se2 baahon pe khanakate kangan se paayal kii chanakatii thanthan se apanii aawaaz milaaduun2 bolo to giit banaaduun tere honthon ko terii laalii ko tere yauvan kii hariyaalii ko

Title: tan man dhan sab hai teraa
Lyrics: tan man dhan sab hai teraa bin tere kyaa hai meraa raatdin main tere giit gaataa rahuun tan man dhan sab threedots  kyaa dharatii kyaa suurajchandaa jag moh maayaa kaa hai phandaa main huun siidhaasaadaa bandaa jag choron kaa hai deraa tan man dhan sab threedots  kyaa apanaa aur kyaa begaanaa jaan ke kaahe dhokhaa khaanaa jiivan hai bas aanaajaanaa jogii vaalaa pheraa tan man dhan sab threedots

Title: jaaneanajaane log mile magar koii milaa naa apanaa
Lyrics: jaaneanajaane log mile magar koii milaa naa apanaa ho 2 jaane kyaa hamane sochaa thaa rah gayaa ban ke sapanaa o jaaneanajaane log threedots   milaa naa koii aisaa insaan dil kaa dard mitaataa kam se kam do baat to karataa dil kii aas bandhaataa  2 dard bharaa hai afasaanaa bhaagy men likhaa tadapanaa jaaneanajaane log threedots   aasniraas ke doraahe par dil to hamaaraa tuutaa is qismat ne dhiiredhiire apanaa sab kuchh luutaa  2 bhiig chukii hain ye palaken bhuul gae ham hansanaa jaaneanajaane log threedots

Title: merii dushman hai ye  ye khidakii jo band rahatii hai
Lyrics: merii dushman hai ye merii ulajhan hai ye badaa tadapaatii hai dil ko tarasaatii hai  ye khidakii  2 jo band rahatii hai 2 merii dushman hai ye threedots  lagataa hai melaa na jaane kahaan aashiq jamaa hote hain jahaan are sabako pataa hai ye daastaan is ghar men hai ek ladakii javaan aankhen jhukaa ke guzaro is galii se aanejaane vaalon se kahatii hai ye khidakii jo band threedots  gam kii ghataa hai ye chhat jaaegii aahon se diivaar phat jaaegii jab saamane se ye hat jaaegii ghuunghat men gorii simat jaaegii ik roz gir jaaegii tuut ke ye kitane nazaron ke tiir sahatii hai ye khidakii jo band threedots  aae kabhii chaubaare pe vo kuchh soche mere baare men vo are baaten kare do ishaare men vo chup sii khadii hai us kinaare pe vo us paar vo hai aur is paar main huun nadiyaa biich men bahatii hai ye khidakii jo band threedots

Title: muhabbat bharaa koii paigaam de yaa ashkon men duubii huii shaam de
Singer: manna de mahendra kapoor usha timothy chorus
Lyrics: aathreedots aa mahafil men aa gaye hain yaanii ke mushkil men aa gaye hain are mahafil men aa gaye hain mauqaa hai ye kushii kaa ham sabakaa jaam bhar de mausam hai maikashii kaa par kataraa hai zindagii kaa kyaa haal hogaa jaane ab apanii family kaa  muhabbat bharaa koii paigaam de yaa ashkon men duubii huii shaam de hamen dard de yaa aaraam de ab ye chhod diyaa hai tujhape chaahe zahar de yaa jaam de  tuu jo chaahe mere giiton ko tabassum de de merii aankhon ko chamak lab tabassum de de aa shabevasl hataakar ke shabegam mujhako de de tere kabze men hai jannat ke jahannum de de sazaa hamen yaa iimaan de ab ye chhod diyaa hai tujhape chaahe zahar de yaa jaam de  dil lubhaane ke liye koii chhamaachham de de chhananananan chham chhanan chham chhanan chham de de baat ban jaae haay haay agar chaand sii begam de de ho gayaa hai terii jannat kaa housefull to kisii huur ke pahaluu men jahannum de de yaa bekaar rakh yaa koii kaam de ab ye chhod diyaa hai tujhape chaahe zahar de yaa jaam de  merii aankhon kaa aisaa jaaduu hai ki lutere bhii lut jaate hain aankh kyaa shay hai aur jaaduu puuchh ke maan se apanii aate hain kaatate hain pahaad shiishe se aise hotaa hai aashiqon kaa jigar dekh lo ek nazar tuutii jaatii hai kamar tum dekho gair nahiin jaan kii kair nahiin merii zulf hai ghataa taar banduuk hataa terii zulfon kii qasam terii muuchhon kii qasam tere honthon kii qasam tere noton kii qasam saa re saa re gaa maa paa dhaa paa dhaa nii saa	3 main kahaan phansaa	4 aa aa gaa maa paa dhaa saa nii mujhe yaad aaii naanii	2 are paa			3 gaa maa mar gaye ham nii nii saa re praan bachaa re nii nii saa re saa re krishhna hamaare praan bachaa re saa re gaa maa gaa re saa hare krishhna hare raamaa raam saa re saa re gaa maa gaa re saa hare krishhna hare raam raam raam

Title: hinduu huun main na musalamaan huun
Lyrics: hinduu huun main na musalamaan huun 2 mazahab se apane main anjaan huun bas itanaa pataa hai main insaan huun  jisako pataa ho bole  mazahab kaa raaz khole main jab paidaa huaa thaa likhaa huaa nahiin thaa chehare pe naam meraa sab ko salaam meraa logon ne jo bhii pukaaraa main ban gayaa bechaaraa baat samajh nahiin aatii kisakaa banuun main saathi taubaa hai main kitanaa naadaan huun mazahab se   likkhaapadhaa nahiin main rakhataa huun isape yakiin main mainne kahiin sunaa hai kisii shaayar ne kahaa hai mazahab nahiin sikhaataa  aapas men bair rakhanaa kahane kaa ye matalab hai ye kaun saa mazahab hai jisane tumhen bhadakaayaa aapas me ladanaa sikhayaa tum ho khafaa aur main hairaan huun mazahab se   mandir maszid gurudwaare 2 maalik ke ghar hain saare ha se hinduu banaa hai ma se muslim banaa hai ha aur ma se jaano ham sab bane diwaano do haath paanv mere do haath paanv tere jab jism hai ek jaise to ham judaa hain kaise pahachaano main sach kii pahachaan huun mazahab se

Title: kabhii kabhii mere dil men khayaal aataa hain from the movie
Lyrics: kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai ke jaise tujhako banaayaa gayaa hai mere liye  tuu abase pahale sitaaron men bas rahii thii kahiin  tujhe zamiin pe bulaayaa gayaa hai mere liye  kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai  kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai ke ye badan ye nigaahen merii amaanat hain ye gesuon kii ghanii chhaanv hain merii kaatir ye honth aur ye baahen merii amaanat hain kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai  kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai ke jaise tuu mujhe chaahegii umra bhar yuunhii uthegii merii taraf pyaar kii nazar yuunhii main jaanataa huun ke tuu gair hai magar yuunhii kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai  kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai ke jaise bajatii hain shahanaaiyaan sii raahon men suhaag raat hai ghuunghat uthaa rahaa huun main  2 simat rahii hai tuu sharamaa ke merii baahon men kabhii kabhii mere dil men kayaal aataa hai

Title: pal pal dil ke paas tum rahatii ho
Lyrics: pal pal dil ke paas tum rahatii ho jiivan miithii pyaas ye kahatii ho pal pal threedots  har shaam aankhon par teraa aanchal laharaae har raat yaadon kii baaraat le aae main saans letaa huun terii khushabuu aatii hai ek mahakaa mahakaa saa paigaam laatii hai mere dil ki dhadakan bhii tere giit gaatii hai pal pal threedots  tum sochogii kyuun itanaa main tumase pyaar karuun tum samajhogii diivaanaa main bhii iqaraar karuun diivaanon kii ye baaten diivaane jaanate hain jalane men kyaa mazaa hai paravaane jaanate hain tum yuun hii jalaate rahanaa aa aa kar kvaabon men pal pal threedots  kal tujhako dekhaa thaa maine apane aangan men jaise kah rahii thii tum mujhe baandh lo bandhan men ye kaisaa rishtaa hai ye kaise sapane hain begaane ho kar bhii kyuun lagate apane hain  main soch main rahataa huun dar dar ke kahataa huun pal pal threedots

Title: sun sun qasam se
Lyrics: sun sun qasam se laaguun tere qadam se suno naa ha sun sun qasam se laaguun tere qadam se rahaa jaaye naa hamase gale lag jaa gale lag jaa  sun sun qasam se laaguun tere qadam se rahaa jaaye naa hamase gale lag jaa gale lag jaa  phir ik dafaa piyaa mere pakad merii bainyyaan pakadake phir baahon men tuu uthaa mere sainyyaan bhaarii gathariyaa nahiin uthaanii chhod de piichhaa arii diiwaanii haay re haay haay re haay haay re haay  sun sun qasam se laaguun tere qadam se rahaa jaaye naa hamase gale lag jaa gale lag jaa  jaane de re badii terii  hogi maharabaanii aayaa idhar galatii huii maafii dedo raanii are maafii dedo jaane de re badii terii  hogi maharabaanii aayaa idhar galatii huii maafii dedo raanii baith gaii re nahiin uthuungii pyaar karegaa tabhii hatuuungii haay re haay haay re haay haay re haay  sun sun qasam se laaguun tere qadam se naa ulajh re hamase tuu chalii jaa tuu chalii jaa  achhaa re phir mujhe bhii to aataa hai tadapaanaa jaataa hai tuu kaise main bhii dekhuun teraa jaanaa are dekhuun teraa jaana ha aa achhaa re phir mujhe bhii to aataa hai tadapaanaa jaataa hai tuu kaise main bhii dekhuun teraa jaanaa ai rii tuu aise jo sar chadhegii patak duungaa main to gir padegii haay re haay haay re haay haay re haay  ho o o sun sun qasam se laaguun tere qadam se rahaa jaaye naa hamase gale lag jaa gale lag jaa

Title: le lo chuudiyaan jii
Lyrics: ki 	le lo chuudiyaan jii le lo chuudiyaan 	niilii piilii laal harii aasamaanii 	le lo chuudiyaan jii le lo chuudiyaan 	are niiliiniilii piiliipiilii laal harii aasamaanii  la 	de do chuudiyaan jii de do chuudiyaan 	ke suunii hai kalaaii merii dol jaanii  ki 	dekho ye chuudii vaalaa hai dilavaalaa 	pyaar kaa rasiyaa hai badaa matavaalaa 2 	 rahiyo bachake  3 ruup kii o raanii 	le lo chuudiyaan threedots  la 	tere lie hii maine sun chuudii vaale ki 	o sunaa kudiye la 	ab tak daale rakhe dil par taale ki 	oe qurabaan jaauun re la 	tere lie hii maine sun chuudii vaale 	ab tak daale rakhe dil par taale 	 teriimerii  3 dostii hai kitanii puraanii 	de do chuudiyaan threedots ki 	le le le le le le le eii 	le lo chuudiyaan threedots  	dekhii na aisii kabhii naram kalaaii la 	haath lagaayaa zaraa aur murajhaaii 	haay main to huun chhuiimuii kumhalaa jaauungii 	dhuundhoge jag saaraa haath na aauungii ki 	 chhup na sakegii  3 pyaar kii nishaanii 	le lo chuudiyaan la 	aa haa ki 	jii le lo chuudiyaan threedots la 	o ho ki 	are niilii piilii threedots

Title: hurraa ho maaraa  sun champaa sun taaraa
Lyrics: hurraa ho maaraa  sun champaa sun taaraa koii jiitaa koii haaraa are badaa mazaa aae haay suno merii baat jhuumen naachen gaaen chalo aaj saarii raat sun champaa threedots  sach ke gale men padii maalaa jhuuthon kaa to munh huaa kaalaa kaise huaa aise huaa hairaan hai jag saaraa sun champaa threedots  bandaa huun main to siidhaasaadaa karataa huun tumase main ye vaadaa aaj se hogaa vah dukh meraa dukha hai jo tumhaaraa sun champaa threedots  chhamchham bajii merii paayal dil dushmanon ke hue ghaayal is jiivan pe sabako haq hai apanaa hai ye naaraa sun champaa threedots

Title: chalo diladaar chalo chaand ke paar chalo
Lyrics: chalo diladaar chalo chaand ke paar chalo ham hain taiyaar chalo  aao kho jaaen sitaaron men kahiin  2 chhod den aaj ye duniyaa ye zamiin duniyaa ye zamiin chalo diladaarthreedots  ham nashe men hain sambhaalo hamen tum  2 niind aatii hai jagaa lo hamen tum jagaa lo hamen tum chalo diladaarthreedots  zindagii khatm bhii ho jaaye agar  2 na kabhii khatm ho ulfat kaa safar ulfat kaa safar chalo diladaarthreedots

Title: suuraj se jo kiran kaa naataa saagar se jo laharon kaa
Lyrics: mu 	suuraj se jo kiran kaa naataa saagar se jo laharon kaa 	vahii hai teraameraa rishtaa tuu jaane yaa naa jaane la 	phuul men jaise basii ho kushbuu tuu hai basaa mere man men 	pyaar teraa hai jiivan meraa tuu maane yaa naa maane mu 	suuraj se jo kiran threedots  	pahalii baar tujhe dekhaa to ham aise sudhbudh bhuule la 	ho jaise saavan kii pahalii puravaaii dharatii ko chhuu le 	dharatii se jo niilagagan kaa saavan se jo puravaaii kaa mu 	suuraj se jo kiran threedots  la 	do din kii dekhaadekhii men yugyug ke manmiit mile mu	tum bole do bol se mujhako janamjanam ke giit mile 	taar se jo jhankaar kaa naataa giiton se jo saragam kaa la 	suuraj se jo kiran threedots mu 	vahii hai teraameraa threedots do 	suuraj se jo kiran threedots

Title: tuu jo mere sur men sur milaa le
Lyrics: ye tuu jo mere sur men 2    sur milaa le sang gaa le    to zindagii ho jaae safal he tuu jo mere man kaa 2    ghar banaa le man lagaa le    to bandagii ho jaae safal donon tuu jo mere sur men  ye chaandanii raaton men haath lie haathon men he chaandanii raaton men haath lie haathon men donon duube rahen ek duusare kii ras bharii baaton men ye tuu jo mere sang men 2    muskuraa le gunagunaa le    to zindagii ho jaae safal  he tuu jo mere man kaathreedots donon tuu jo mere sur menthreedots  he kyon ham bahaaron se khushiyaan udhaar len ye kyon ham bahaaron se khushiyaan udhaar len donon kyon na milake ham khud hii apanaa jiivan sudhaar len he tuu jo mere path men 2    diip gaa le o ujaale    to bandagii ho jaae safal  ye tuu jo mere sur men 2    sur milaa le sang gaa le    to zindagii ho jaae safal

Title: aap agar aap na hote to bhalaa kyaa hote
Lyrics: aap agar aap na hote to bhalaa kyaa hote log kahate hain ki patthar ke masiihaa hote  sangemaramar pe taraashe hue chehare pe agar aapake hansane kaa andaaz yahi hotaa magar vo jo sharamaa ke jhukaa lete hain aap nazar aise sharamaane pe kyon na ham fidaa hote aap agar threedots  aapake maathe pe basati hai javaan shaam kaa shahar  achchhi lagati hai hamen aapaki peshaani magar vo jo maathe pe pasinaa ubhar aati hai magar aise maathe pe bhalaa kyon na log fidaa hote aap agar threedots

Title: tum mujh se duur chale jaanaa naa
Lyrics: tum mujh se duur chale jaanaa naa main tum se duur chale jaauungii  main thii anjaan jii kii baaton se anjaanii pyaar kii baaraaton se dolii banaaane chalii thii main arathii banii mere haathon se  sochaa thaa pyaar kar ke chorii se main tum ko baandh luungii dorii se kyaa thaa pataa chhup jaayegaa chandaa yuun ruuth ke chakorii se  kyaa merii priit birahaa kii maarii aansuu men duub gaii chingaarii main tum se haar gayii tum jiite tum mujh se jiit gaye main haarii  tum mujh se duur chale jaanaa naa main tum se duur chale jaauungii

Title: ye raat hai pyaasiipyaasii pyaasii naa guzar jaae
Lyrics: ye raat hai pyaasiipyaasii  2 pyaasii naa guzar jaae  tum baanhon men aa jaao  2 yaa vaqt thahar jaae ye raat hai threedots  naii aag dil ko jalaane lagii hai machalanaa sikhaane lagii hai javaan pyaar qaabuu men kaise rahegaa ke angadaaii aane lagii hai ye palaken uthaao ye nazaren milaao mastii bikhar jaae ye raat hai threedots  kaii rang dekhe tumhaare labon men kaho to koii ham churaa len zaraa shok kar len ye saadaa saa jiivan javaanii ko rangiin banaa len ye aankhen na phero ye zulfen bikhero duniyaa sanvar jaae ye raat hai threedots

Title: he ho gorii o gorii prem kar le
Lyrics: he ho ho ho ho gorii o gorii prem kar le aisaa premii phir naa milegaa aa tere baalon men ye phuul lagaa duun ke aisaa phuul phir naa khilegaa gorii o gorii threedots  jab tere dil se haan jab tere dil se ho jab tere dil se meraa dil takaraaegaa 2 terii qasam bas mazaa aa jaaegaa  dolegii dharatii  2 aur ambar hilegaa aisaa premii phir naa threedots  phir na kahanaa aavaaz na dii  baaten karenge mulaaqaate karenge  baaten karenge  2 ham chupakechupake 2 choriichorii milenge duniyaa se chhup ke  kisii ko bhii  2 kuchh pataa naa chalegaa aisaa premii phir naa threedots

Title: merii baat ke maane do
Film: paise ki gudiyaa ghunghat aur ghungharoo
Lyrics: merii baat ke maane do 2 jo achchhaa lage vo apanaa lo jo buraa lage use jaane do merii baat ke maane do  insaan ke saare jiivan men bas ek javaanii hotii hai   2 kabhii vo apanii hotii hai kabhii begaanii hotii hai kabhii begaanii hotii hai isii umr men aake to banate hain afasaane do jo achchhaa lage vo apanaa lo jo buraa lage use jaane do merii baat ke maane do  duniyaa jisako dil kahatii hai vo do rango kaa hotaa hai   2 mil jaaye to ye hansataa hai tuut jaaye to rotaa hai tuut jaaye to rotaa hai thukaraanaa hai thukaraa do milataa hai mil jaane do jo achchhaa lage vo apanaa lo jo buraa lage use jaane do merii baat ke maane do  ye cheharaa bhii ek darpan hai jo tasviiren dikhalaataa hai    man men hai khushiiyaan  kaii gam sab is pe nazar aa  aa  sab is pe nazar aa jaataa hai mere dil men jo baaten hai mujhko aaj bataane do jo achchhaa lage vo apanaa lo jo buraa lage use jaane do merii baat ke maane do

Title: meharabaano qadaradaano  duniyaa men rahanaa hai to kaam karo
Lyrics: meharabaano qadaradaano dosto yaaro are khel dekho khel one two three up  duniyaa men rahanaa hai to kaam karo pyaare haath jod sabako salaam karo pyaare varanaa ye duniyaa jiine nahiin degii khaane nahiin degii piine nahiin degii khel koii nayaa subahshaam karo pyaare duniyaa men rahanaa threedots  paise binaa duniyaa men rotii nahiin milatii rotii nahiin milatii langotii nahiin milatii haath jod sabako salaam karo pyaare duniyaa men rahanaa threedots  ek din teremere kvaab honge puure aisii koii baat kar chal o jamuure rah jaaen sab dil thaam kar o pyaare duniyaa men rahanaa threedots  taange men lagii jaisii ghodii chalii jaae rassii pe gorii aisii daudii chalii jaae chal ghar chalen raamraam karo pyaare duniyaa men rahanaa threedots

Title: diye jalate hain phuul khilate hain badii mushkil se magar
Lyrics: diye jalate hain phul khilate hain badii mushkil se magar duniyaa men log milate hain  jab jis vaqt kisiikaa yaar judaa hotaa hain kuchh naa puchho yaaron dil kaa haal buraa hotaa hai dil pe yaadon ke jaise tiir chalate hain diye threedots  daulat aur javaanii ek din kho jaatii hai sach kahataa huun saarii duniyaa  dushman ban jaatii hai umr bhar dost lekin saath chalate hain diye threedots  is rangdhuup pe dekho haragij naaz naa karanaa jaan bhii maange yaar to de denaa naaraaz naa karanaa rang ud jaate hain dhuup dhalate hain diye threedots

Title: kasam kyaa hotii hai  jo todii naa jaae bichhodii naa paae
Lyrics: kasam kyaa hotii hai kasam vo hotii hai jo todii naa jaae bichhodii naa paae kasam kyaa hotii hai threedots  yaar bichhadane lagate hain to rab kii aankh bhii rotii hai kasam kyaa hotii hai threedots  terii kasam luun hamase jo ruuthii jaan se guzar jaaenge hii terii haan se jii uthenge naa se mar jaaenge hii baat baat men kasam kyaa khaanaa kasam mazaak nahiin hai kasam hai jitanii paak chiiz koii utanii paak nahiin hai dilon kaa sangam hai ho kasam gangaajal hai pyaar pe daag jo lag jaae to apane lahuu se dhotii hai kasam kyaa hotii hai threedots  dilon ke lie zaruurii nahiin hai duniyaa kii manzuurii kasam pyaar kii nahiin maanatii janmon kii bhii duurii tanhaaii ko mahakaatii hai yaadon kii kastuurii kasam hai vo jo har haalat men kii jaatii hai puurii kasam ik giitaa hai kasam vo siitaa hai raajamahal ke chhod ke sukh jo angaaron pe sotii hai kasam kyaa hotii hai threedots

Title: jaanii o jaanii jaldii se aajaa mil aake
Lyrics: jaanii o jaanii 3 jaldii se aajaa mil aake biitii jaae ye javaanii jaanii o jaanii threedots  bigadaa nasiibaa banane ke lie ek ishaaraa teraa kaafii hai 2 aashiq ke jiinemarane ke lie itanaa sahaaraa teraa kaafii hai tujhape lutaa duungaa mitaa duungaa main ye zindagaanii jaanii o jaanii threedots  aankhon men terii tasviir lie dhuundh rahaa huun tujhe raste men 2 terii galii men teraa diivaanaa bech rahaa dil saste men karake ye saudaa le jaa de jaa raanii dil kii nishaanii jaanii o jaanii threedots

Lyrics: aaj ham apanii duaaon kaa asar dekhenge tirenazar dekhenge zakhmejigar dekhenge 2  aap to aankh milaate hue sharamaate hain aap to dil ke dhadakane se bhii dar jaate hain phir bhii ye ziddh hai ke ham zakhmejigar dekhenge tirenazar dekhenge zakhmejigar dekhenge 2  pyaar karanaa dilebetaab buraa hotaa hai sunate aaye hain ke ye khvaab buraa hotaa hai aaj is kvaab kii taabiir magar dekhenge tirenazar dekhenge zakhmejigar dekhenge 2  jaanalevaa hai muhabbat kaa samaa aaj kii raat shamaa ho jayegii jal jal ke dhunaa aaj kii raat aaj ki raat bachenge to sahar dekhenge 2 tirenazar dekhenge zakhmejigar dekhenge 2

Title: terii chhotii sii ek bhuul ne saaraa gulshan jalaa diyaa
Lyrics: terii chhotii sii ek bhuul ne saaraa gulshan jalaa diyaa kyaa mahakenge phir phuul kabhii kyaa phir se bahaaren aaengii  jaane kahaan kii riit hai ye koii kare aur koii bhare nyaaya nahiin anyaaya hai ye doshii jie nirdosh mare sun le tuu ai qaafil  tujhase kahe teraa dil terii chhotii sii threedots  tuune andhere de ke ise chhiin lii nainon kii muskaan saanjh savere raat aur din isake lie ek samaan sun le tuu ai qaafil  tujhase kahe teraa dil terii chhotii sii threedots  tere chalan kii aandhii ne dekh le kitane ghar luute bikhar gae rishte naate jiivan ke saathii chhuute sun le tuu ai qaafil  tujhase kahe teraa dil terii chhotii sii threedots

Title: arre fashion kii diivaanii ye gudiyaan hain japaanii
Lyrics: arre fashion kii diivaanii ye gudiyaan hain japaanii 2 kaun kahegaa bolo inako ladakii hindustaanii  bolo bolo bolo bolo bolo naa ko fashion kii diivaanii ye gudiyaan  hain japaanii kaun kahegaa bolo inako ladakii hindustaanii  kaanon tak baal kataake achchhii kaasii surat kaa  rakkhaa ye haal banaake 2 haath hain suune maathaa nangaa aankhen suramedaanii arre kaun kahegaa bolo inako ladakii hindustaanii  bolo bolo bolo bolo bolo naa ko fashion kii diivaanii threedots  taubaa taubaa ye beauty naqalii hai bilakul jhuuthii inase kii jisane shaadii usakii to qismat phuutii 2 duur se unako taakaa karanaa gar ho jaan bachhaanii arre kaun kahegaa bolo inako ladakii hindustaanii  bolo bolo bolo bolo bolo naa ko fashion kii diivaanii threedots  ko wauu  ik din is desh men naarii samajhii jaatii thii devii hoke ab biis baras kii ye kahalaatii hain baby 2 arre kaun kahegaa bolo inako ladakiii hindustaanii  bolo bolo bolo bolo bolo naa ko fashion kii diivaanii threedots

Title: terii tasaviir ko siine se lagaa rakhaa hai
Lyrics: pothii padh padh jag muaa pandit bhayaa na koy dhaaii akshar prem kaa padhe so pandit hoy  terii tasaviir ko siine se lagaa rakhaa hai hamane duniyaa se alag gaanv basaa rakhaa hai terii tasaviir ko   threedots  merii kismat kii lakiiron ko sajaayaa tuune ek naachiiz ko fanakaar banaayaa tuune main ne har bol teraa dil men sajaa rakhaa hai hamane duniyaa se   threedots  tujhako din raat khayaalon men hai puujaa main ne tere pairon ke nishaan par kiyaa sajadaa main ne bandagii men tere sar ab bhii jhukaa rakhaa hai hamane duniyaa se   threedots  main ne giiton se chhavi terii banayii barason duur rah kar tujhe aavaaz sunaayii barason kis liye tuu ne mujhe gair banaa rakhaa hai ham ne duniyaa se threedots

Title: raaton ke saaye ghane jab bojh dil par bane
Lyrics: raaton ke saaye ghane jab bojh dil par bane  na to jale baatii na ho koii saathii  2  phir bhii na dar agar bujhen diye  sahar to hai tere liye			 2  jab bhii mujhe kabhii koii jo gam ghere lagataa hai honge nahiin sapane yah puure mere  2 kahataa hai dil mujhako maanaa hain gam tujhako phir bhii na dar agar bujhen diye sahar to hai tere liye  jab na chaman khile meraa bahaaron men jab duubane main laguun raaton kii majadhaaron men  2 maayuus man dole par yah gagan bole phir bhii na dar agar bujhen diye sahar to hai tere liye  jab zindagii kisii tarah bahalatii nahiin khaamoshiyon se bharii jab raat dhalatii nahiin  2 tab muskuraauun main yah giit gaauun main phir bhii na dar agar bujhen diye sahar to hai tere liye  raaton ke saaye ghane jab bojh dil par bane na to jalen baatii na ho koii saathii  2 phir bhii na dar agar bujhen diye sahar to hai tere liye

Title: jaggeyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa kade ishq chhupan naiyon lageyaa
Singer: mahendra kapoor pamela chopra s k mahan chorus
Lyrics: ishq aur mushq kade na chhupade te chaahe lakh chhupaaiye oe akhaan lakh jhukaake chaliye te pallaa lakh bachaaiye  ishq aur mushq kade na chhupade te chaahe lakh chhupaaiye akhaan lakh jhukaake chaliye pallaa lakh bachaaiye ishq hai sachche rab dii rahamat ishq ton kyuun sharmaaiye chadhade chand ne chadhake rahanaa ho chadhade chand ne chadhake rahanaa kaannuu parde paaiye kaannuu parde paaiye  jaggeyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa kade ishq chhupan naiyon lageyaa  ho ho ho ho threedots aa aa aa aa aa threedots  duniyaa dii is bhiid de andar haan te duniyaa dii is bhiid de andar je koii apanaa paaiye apane nuun khushakismat kahiye rab daa shukar manaaiye dil badale dil milen te yaaraa threedots ho threedots  hoye dil badale dil milen te yaaraa saudaa jhat chukaaiye ambar te jo svarag base oe ambar te jo svarag base o dharatii te lai aaiye dharatii te lai aaiye  jaggeyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa kade ishq chhupan naiyon lageyaa  hoye threedots kade ishq chhupan naiyon lageyaa ho   threedots kade ishq chhupan naiyon lageyaa hoye threedots kade ishq chhupan naiyon lageyaa  o duniyaa chaar dinaan daa melaa duniyaa chaar dinaan daa melaa o duniyaa chaar dinaan daa melaa ho matthe bal na paaiye ho matthe bal na paaiye hoye kaun bhale kaun mande jag vichch kaun bhale kaun mande jag vichch sabanaa naal nibhaaiye sabanaa naal nibhaaiye threedots  jaggeyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa saannuu kaul ai sachchaa lageyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa saannuu kaul ai sachchaa lageyaa  paapaan dii is nagarii andar kis de aib ginaaiye apane andar jadjad takiye apane andar jadjad takiye o threedots o threedots o threedots apane ton sharmaaiye threedots apane ton sharmaaiye  jaggeyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa saannuu kaul ai sachchaa lageyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa jaggeyaa saannuu kaul ai sachchaa lageyaa

Title: kudaa kare ke muhabbat men vo maqaam aaye
Lyrics: kudaa kare ke muhabbat men vo maqaam aaye kisii kaa naam luun lab pe tumhaaraa naam aaye  tumhaaraa pyaar mere gesuuon kii ulajhan ho tumhaare naam se dil kaa charaag roshan ho sahar nazar se mile zulf le ke shaam aaye kisii kaa naam luun lab pe tumhaaraa naam aaye kudaa kare threedots  jahaan talak ye hasiin gunagunaatii raat chale nazar nazar se mile dil se dil kii baat chale hamaare dil kii tadap aaj kuchh to kaam aaye kisii kaa naam luun lab pe tumhaaraa naam aaye kudaa kare threedots  mere kayaalon kii tasaviir huubahuu tum ho mere huzuur nigaahon kii aarazuu tum ho nazar uthe merii jaanib koii salaam aaye kisii kaa naam luun lab pe tumhaaraa naam aaye kudaa kare threedots

Lyrics: rafii saanson men kabhii dil men kabhii nazaron men rahaa karanaa jag bairii ho to kyaa tum hamase wafaa karanaa2  aashaa jaane pyaar nibhaanaa diiwaane dil kii lagii ke2 kyaa hai mohabbat zamaanaa ham se ye siikhe pyaar hamane kiyaa pyaar hamako sadaa karanaa saanson men kabhii dil men kabhii nazaron men rahaa karanaa jag bairii ho to kyaa tum hamase wafaa karanaa  rafii aaye kushiyon kaa mausam ki aaye gam kaa mahiinaa2 aashaa tumhiin pe maranaa tumhaare sangsang hai jiinaa rafii kabhii hoen naa judaa bas itanii duaa karanaa  saanson men kabhii dil men kabhii nazaron men rahaa karanaa aashaa jag bairii ho to kyaa tum hamase wafaa karanaa rafii jag bairii ho to kyaa aashaa tum hamase wafaa karanaa

Title: insaan hanse yaa roe  kahaanii qismat kii
Lyrics: insaan hanse yaa roe jo honaa hai so hoe kyaa honaa hai kab honaa hai likhane vaalaa jaane kahaanii kahaanii qismat kii  ko 	kahaanii qismat kii  man hii man naadaan zamaanaa samajhe ke tadabiir badii hai ye na socho qadamqadam par raaste men taqadiir khadii hai haar hai kisakii jiit hai kisakii likhane vaalaa jaane kahaanii kahaanii qismat kii  ko 	kahaanii qismat kii  kabhii arsh hai kabhii farsh hai duniyaa kii riit puraanii kahiin pe saragam kahiin pe maatam har ik shai hai aaniijaanii kyuun sukhdukh ke mausam badale likhane vaalaa jaane kahaanii kahaanii qismat kii  ko 	kahaanii qismat kii  jiivan ke jitane din honge usamen ik din kam na hogaa jisane raaz ye jaan liyaa hai phir usako koii gam na hogaa kab tak lagaa rahe ye melaa likhane vaalaa jaane kahaanii kahaanii qismat kii  ko 	kahaanii qismat kii  hotehote bhii anahonii baat koii aisii ho jaae manzil par raahii jab pahunche dekhe to manzil kho jaae abhii haqiiqat abhii hai sapanaa likhane vaalaa jaane kahaanii kahaanii qismat kii  ko 	kahaanii qismat kii

Title: main pal do pal kaa shaayar huun
Lyrics: main pal do pal kaa shaayar huun pal do pal merii kahaanii hai pal do pal merii hastii hai pal do pal merii javaanii hai main pal do pal kaa shaayar huun threedots  mujhase pahale kitane shaayar aae aur aakar chale gae kuchh aahen bhar kar laut gae kuchh nagame gaakar chale gae vo bhii ek pal kaa kissaa thaa main bhii ek pal kaa kissaa huun kal tumase judaa ho jaauungaa vo aaj tumhaaraa hissaa huun main pal do pal kaa shaayar huun threedots  kal aur aaenge nagamon kii khilatii kaliyaan chunane vaale mujhase behatar kahane vaale tumase behatar sunane vaale kal koii mujhako yaad kare kyuun koii mujhako yaad kare masaruuf zamaanaa mere liye kyuun vaqt apanaa barabaad kare main pal do pal kaa shaayar huun threedots

Title: khushiyaan hii khushiyaan hon daaman men jisake
Film: dulhan wahi jo piya man bhaye
Lyrics: khushiyaan hii khushiyaan ho daaman men jisake kyon na khushii se vo diivaanaa ho jaaye aise mubaarak mauke pe saathii pesh duaaon kaa nazaraanaa ho jaaye khushiyaan hii khushiyaan ho threedots  der se samajhaa hamako zamaanaa shukr karo ki samajh to gayaa sang rahane kaa kvaab suhaanaa ban ke haqiikat saj to gayaa tum jo kaho to mahafil se kah de tum jo kaho to saarii mahafil se kah de pal bhar men mashahuur afasaanaa ho jaaye khushiyaan hii khushiyaan ho threedots  koii kyaa jaane ham ne kyaa kyaa khel rachaaye tumhaare liye ham bhii kaisii kaisii manzil chhod ke aaye tumhaare liye kaliyaan hii kaliyaan mahakaa do aise ki aabaad dil kaa ye viiraanaa ho jaaye khushiyaan hii khushiyaan ho threedots  hans ke hamarii har bhuul bhulaa denaa ham hain tumhare jab chaaho bulaa lenaa apanon kii is mahafil men ab kaam nahiin hai begaanon kaa ye duniyaa kyaa mol karegii ik mufalis ke aramaanon kaa itanii sii hai bas apanii tamannaa terii khushii se dil paravaanaa ho jaaye khushiyaan hii khushiyaan ho   threedots

Title: soii jaa taaraa leike apane khilaune
Lyrics: soii jaa taaraa aa soii jaa taaraa  leike apane khilaune sapane salone galiyan men aayaa ik banjaaraa soii jaa taaraa threedots  chhukchhuk donon chalen yauvan ke kheltamaashaa karen shor machaae dekho zaraa saa kheltamaashaa karen tuu bhii akelii main bhii akelaa tuu besahaaraa main besahaaraa soii jaa taaraa threedots  hamako roz galii ye aangan kitte akele laagen aaj tuu ghar aaii gariib ke ghar men mele laagen kaa boluun aage hamako to laage aaj ye kutiyaa uunchaa chaubaaraa soii jaa taaraa threedots  hamarii duhaaii badal ke raamaa la la la lorii banii dor ye phaansii kii dekho bhaaii jhuule kii dorii banii tuune to aay ke hans ke rulaay ke badal diyaa sansaar saaraa soii jaa taaraa threedots

Lyrics: saanvare mat jaa mat jaa mat jaa raadhikaa araj kare kar jode  shyaam chale madhupurii raadhikaa  murajhaae madhuban men agan lagan kii man men duube  brajamandal ansuvan men saanvare mat jaa mat jaa mat jaa  dhenu chare trin nahiin shyaam bin baaje na venu rasiilii hariyaalii man brindaavan kii  padii virah men piilii saanvare mat jaa mat jaa mat jaa  chandra binaa kyon rahe chandrikaa praan binaa kyon kaayaa gyaan na jaane prem yoginii bhakti amaanii maayaa saanvare mat jaa mat jaa mat jaa

Lyrics: sab tithiyan kaa chandramaa jo dekhaa chaaho aaj dhiire dhiire ghuunghataa sarakaavo sarataaj  chaand jaise mukhade pe bindiyaa sitaaraa nahiin bhuulegaa merii jaan ye sitaaraa vo sitaaraa maanaa terii nazaron men main huun ek aavaaraa ho aavaaraa nahiin bhuulegaa merii jaan ye aavaaraa vo aavaaraa  saagar saagar motii milate pavrat pavrat paaras tan man aise bhiije jaise barase mahue kaa ras pyaase giiton kii gangaa kaa tuu hii hai kinaaraa nahiin bhulegaa merii jaan ye kinaaraa vo kinaaraa  kajaraare chanchal nainon men suuraj chaand kaa deraa ruup ke is paavan mandir men hansaa kare baseraa are kastuurii ko khojataa phirataa hai ye banjaaraa nahiin bhuulegaa merii jaan ye banjaaraa vo banjaaraa  chaand jaise mukhade pe bindiyaa sitaaraa nahiin bhuulegaa merii jaan ye aavaaraa vo aavaaraa
