Title: bhaiyaa aaj to ham tumhen ek nae jamaanekii kathaa sunaaenge
Lyrics: bhaiyaa aaj to ham tumhe ek nae jamaanekii kathaa sunaaenge are baabaa kisiibhii jamaanekii sunaao par sunaao zaruur  siyaavara raamachandrakii jaya  he raamachandra kaha gaye siyaase aisaa kalajuga aaegaa hansa chugegaa daanaa dunakaa kauvvaa motii khaaegaa  siyaane puchhaa  kalajugamen dharam karamako koii nahiin maanegaa to prabhuu bole  dharam bhii hogaa karam bhii hogaa  parantu sharama nahiin hogii baata baata para maata pitaako  ladakaa aankha dikhaaegaa raajaa aur prajaa dononmen   hogii nisadina khiinchaataani kadama kadama para karenge  dono apanii apanii mana maanii jisake haath men hogii laathii  bhainsa vahii le jaaegaa suno siyaa kalajugamen kaalaa dhana aur kaale mana honge chora uchakke nagara setha aur prabhu bhakta nirdhana honge jo hogaa lobhii aur bhogii vo jogii kahalaaegaa mandira suunaa suunaa hogaa bharii rahengii madhushaalaa pitaake sanga sanga bharii sabhaamen naachegii gharakii baalaa kaisaa kanyaadaana bidaahii kanyaakaa dhana khaaegaa  muurakhakii priita burii juekii jiita burii 	  bure sanga baitha baitha bhaage hii bhaage kaajalakii kotharii men kaisehii jatana karo 	  kaajalakaa daaga bhaaii laage hii laage kitanaa jatii ho koii kitanaa satii ho koii 	  kaamaniike sanga kaama jaage hii jaage suno kahe gopiiraama jisakaa hai raamadhaama 	  usakaa to phanda gale laage hii laage

Title: aisii chiiz sunaaen  jiinaa to hai usii kaa
Lyrics: aisii chiiz sunaaen ki mahafil de taalii pe taalii varanaa apanaa naam nahiin banne khaan bhopaalii munne miyaan badhaaii bano kush honahaar donon jahaan kii kushiyaan hon aap pe nisaar bachapan ho kushagavaar javaanii sadaabahaar allaah kare ye din aae hazaar baar  jiinaa to hai usii kaa jisane ye raaz jaanaa hai kaam aadamii kaa auron ke kaam aanaa  kisii ne kahaa tuu hai taaron kaa raajaa kisii ne duaa dii kisii ne dii badhaaii sabakii aankhon kaa tuu taaraa bane terii hii roshanii men chamake teraa gharaanaa  dil lagaakar tuu padhanaa hameshaa aage badhanaa sach kaa daaman na chhuute chaahe ye duniyaa ruuthe kaam tuu achchhaa karanaa sirf allaah se daranaa sabhii ko gale lagaa kar mohabbat men lut jaanaa  mohabbat vo kazaanaa hai kabhii jo kam nahiin hotaa hai jisake paas daulat use kuchh gam nahiin hotaa teraameraa karake jo marate unako ye samajhaanaa  suurat pe maashaa allaah vo baat hai abhii se tadapenge dil hazaaron guzaroge jis galii se dolii men jab bithaakar laaoge phulajhadii ko zindaa rahe to ham bhii dekhenge us ghadii ko agar allaah ne chaahaa to ham us dil bhii aaenge badhaaii hamane gaaii hai to ham seharaa bhii gaaenge chaandsuuraj bhii aaenge niiche duulhaadulhan ke piichhe hai kaam aadamii kaa threedots

Title: jis din se main ne tumako dekhaa hai is dil men ik sapanaa saa jaagaa hai
Lyrics: r jis din se maine tumako dekhaa hai is dil men ik sapanaa saa jaagaa hai ijaazat ho to sunaa duun  2  a is dil ne jabase tumako paayaa hai kuchh choriichorii maine bhii dekhaa hai gar ijaazat ho to bataa duun  2  r shokhii hai nazaaqat hai aankhon men sharaarat hai aise bhii sharamaanaa kyaa kah do ki mohabbat hai a kahane kii zaruurat kyaa baaton kii haqiiqat kyaa chhalake na nigaahon se aisii bhii muhabbat kyaa kuchh khoyaakhoyaa dil bhii rahataa hai kuchh choriichorii maine bhii dekhaa hai ijaazat ho threedots  r dil ko naa sambhaaluun to siine se lagaa luun to hothon kii jo laalii hai usako main churaa luun to a yuun nazaren na daalo tum ab dil ko sambhaalo tum dekhe na hamen duniyaa siine men chhupaa lo tum na jaane mujhako dar kyon lagataa hai kuchh choriichorii maine bhii dekhaa hai ijaazat ho threedots

Title: samundar samundar yahaan se wahaan tak
Lyrics: samundar samundar yahaan se wahaan tak ye maujon kii chaadar bichhii aasmaan tak mere meharabaan merii had hai kahaan tak yahaan tak yahaan tak yahaan tak  samundar samundar yahaan se wahaan tak ye maujon kii chaadar bichhii aasmaan tak mere meharabaan merii had hai kahaan tak yahaan tak to yahaan tak achchhaa yahaan tak   main karatii huun waadaa uthaatii huun qasamen ye bulabul rahegii sadaa tere bas men  2 mujhe qaid karate ho kyon is tapas men main udakar bhii jaauungii aakir kahaan tak  ye maujon kii chaadar bichhii aasmaan tak mere meharabaan merii had hai kahaan tak yahaan tak bolo yahaan tak yahaan tak  mohabbat se ye kah rahii hai jawaanii sitam ho chuke ab karo meharabaanii kisii pyaar kii koii chhedo kahaanii chalii aaii hai baat dil kii zubaan tak  ye maujon kii chaadar bichhii aasmaan tak mere meharabaan merii had hai kahaan tak yahaan tak yahaan tak yahaan tak  samundar samundar yahaan se wahaan tak ye maujon kii chaadar bichhii aasmaan tak mere meharabaan merii had hai kahaan tak achchhaa yahaan tak yahaan tak yahaan tak

Lyrics: musaafir huun main yaaron naa ghar hai naa thikaanaa mujhe chalate jaanaa hai bas chalate jaanaa musaafirthreedots  	ek raah ruk gaii to aur jud gai 	main mudaa to saathsaath raah mud gai 	havaa ke paron pe meraa aashiyaanaa 	musaafirthreedots  	din ne haath thaam ke idhar bithaa liyaa 	raat ne ishaare se udhar bulaa liyaa 	subah se shaam se meraa dostaanaa 	musaafirthreedots

Lyrics: vaa 	le chalo le chalo ab kahiin le chalo mu 	soch lo soch lo phir zaraa soch lo vaa 	le chalo le chalo threedots  	pyaar tumase kiyaa hai kushii ke lie 	tumako saathii chunaa zindagii ke lie 	ye na ho tum kahiin raah men chhod do mu 	soch lo soch lo threedots  mu 	gar nahiin hai yaqiin to qadam rok lo vaa 	le chalo le chalo threedots  mu 	pyaar kii raah men hain kaii mushkilen 	tumako soche hue sukh milen na milen 	nibhaa sako to nibhaane kaa vaadaa karo vaa 	le chalo le chalo threedots do 	han han han han 3

Title: ab rahoge tum apane hii bas men
Lyrics: ab rahoge tum apane hii bas men hamane tumako dil ke qafas men umr bhar ke liye  giraftaar kar liyaa giraftaar kar liyaa  ho   2  bandhan bandh gayaa ye kuchh aise ab to daaman laakh chhudaaoge kuchh naa kar paaoge tumako de dii dekho aazaadii ghoomake phir tum in zulfon ke saaye men aaoge yahiin pe hansii hai yahiin pe kushii hai yahiin pe zindagii hai  ab rahoge tum apane hii bas men hamane tumako dil ke qafas men umr bhar ke liye  giraftaar kar liyaa giraftaar kar liyaa  ho  manzil ab to mil hii jaayegii hamasafar ham banake chalenge jab pyaar kii in raahon men hamane de diyaa jo dil tumako chain ab is dil ko milegaa bhii rahake in baanhon men pyaar se badhake kuchh bhii nahiin hai pyaar bandagii hai  ab rahoge tum apane hii bas men hamane tumako dil ke qafas men umr bhar ke liye  giraftaar kar liyaa giraftaar kar liyaa  ho

Title: hamaare desh men kahate  hamane gaanv ke panaghat pe
Lyrics: hamaare desh men kahate the har ladakii hindustaanii yaa raadhaa hai yaa siitaa hai yaa jhaansii kii raanii raamaa ho raamaa 3  hamane gaanv ke panaghat pe bhaii hamane gaanv ke panaghat pe dekhii thii panihaariyaan chakkar khaa gae ham to re bhaiyaa dekh shahar kii naariyaan ho ho  yahaan sadake hain vahaan galiyaan thiin yahaan kaante hain vahaan kaliyaan thiin vahaan taangaa thaa yahaan tamatam hai vahaan gorii thii yahaan madam hai vahaan paayal thii yahaan sandal hai vahaan jhuumar thaa yahaan pandel hai vahaan ghuunghat thaa yahaan jalavaa hai vahaan shaanti thii yahaan balavaa hai baatbaat pe karatii  hain ye ladane kii taiyaariyaan chakkar khaa gae ham threedots  koii bulabul hai koii titalii koii sholaa hai koii bijalii hai koii ma hai koii ba hai koiikoii to pa hai bas naam hii to ek asalii hai baaqii jo hai sab naqalii hai kaisii dolii kyaa baaraatii kud chun len ye jiivansaathii  shaadii se pahale karatii hain  2 aksar prem kuvaanriyaan chakkar khaa gae ham threedots

Title: chalo sahelii  holii ke din dil khil jaate hain
Lyrics: chalo sahelii chalo re saathii o pakadopakado re ise na chhodo are bainyaa na modo zaraa thahar jaa bhaabhii jaa re saraabii kyaa ho raajaa galii men aajaa holii re holii bhang kii golii o nakhare vaalii duungii main gaalii o raaamuu kii saalii holii re holii  holii ke din dil khil jaate hain rangon men rang mil jaate hain gile shiqave bhuul ke dosto dushman bhii gale mil jaate hain  gorii tere rang jaisaa thodaa saa rang milaa luun aa tere gulaabii gaalon se thodaa saa gulaal churaa luun jaa re jaa diivaane tuu holii ke bahaane tuu chhed na mujhe besharam puuch le zamaane se aise hii bahaane se lie aur die dil jaate hain holii ke din dil threedots  yahii terii marazii hai to achchhaa tuu kush ho le paas aa ke chhuunaa naa mujhe chaahe duur se bhigo le hiire kii kanii hai tuu motii kii banii hai tuu chhuune se tuut jaaegii kaanton ke chhuune se phuulon se naazuknaazuk badan chhil jaate hain holii ke din dil threedots

Title: kahiin ek maasuum naazuk sii ladakii
Lyrics: kahiin ek maasuum naazuk sii ladakii bahut khuubasuurat magar saanvalii sii  mujhe apane khvaabon kii baanhon men paakar kabhii niind men muskuraatii to hogii usii niind men kasamasaakasamasaakar sarahaane se takiye giraatii to hogii  vahii khvaab din kii munderon pe aake use man hii man men lubhaate to honge kaii saaz siine kii khaamoshiyon men merii yaad men jhanajhanaate to honge vo besaakhtaa dhiimedhiime suron men merii dhun men kuchh gunagunaatii to hogii  chalo khat likhen jii men aataa to hogaa magar ungaliyaan kanpkanpaatii to hongii kalam haath se chhuut jaataa to hogaa umangen kalam phir uthaatii to hongii meraa naam apanii kitaabon pe likhakar vo daanton men ungalii dabaatii to hogii  zubaan se agar uf nikalatii to hogii badan dhiimedhiime sulagataa to hogaa kahiin ke kahiin paanv padate to honge dupattaa zamiin par latakataa to hogaa kabhii subah ko shaam kahatii to hogii kabhii raat ko din bataatii to hogii  har ek chiiz haathon se giratii to hogii tabiiyat pe har kaam khalataa to hogaa paleten kabhii tuut jaatii to hongii kabhii duudh chuulhe pe jalataa to hogaa garaz apanii maasuum naadaaniyon par vo naazukbadan jhenp jaatii to hogii  kahiin ek maasuum

Title: gulaabii aankhen jo terii dekhiin sharaabii ye dil
Lyrics: gulaabii aankhen jo terii dekhiin sharaabii ye dil ho gayaa sambhaalo mujhako o mere yaaron sambhalanaa mushkil ho gayaa gulaabii aankhen jo threedots  dil men mere kvaab tere tasviiren jaise hon diivaar pe tujhape fidaa main kyuun huaa aataa hai gussaa mujhe pyaar pe main lut gayaa maan ke dil kaa kahaa main kahiin kaa naa rahaa kyaa karuun main dilarubaa buraa ye jaaduu terii aankhon kaa ye meraa qaatil ho gayaa gulaabii aankhen jo threedots  maine sadaa chaahaa yahii daaman bachaa luun hasiinon se main terii qasam kvaabon men bhii bachataa phiraa naazaniinon se main taubaa magar mil gaii tujhase nazar mil gayaa dardejigar sun zaraa o bekabar zaraa saa hans ke jo dekhaa tuune main teraa bismil ho gayaa gulaabii aankhen jo threedots

Title: tuu auron kii kyon ho gayii
Lyrics: tujhako aaj bataanaa hogaa kyaa thii vo majabuurii saath umr bhar kaa denaa thaa de dii umr bhar kii duurii  kitane atal the tere iraade yaad to kar tuu vafaa ke vaade tuune kahaa thaa khaakar qasamen sadaa nibhaayenge pyaar kii rasamen tuu auron kii kyon ho gayii tuu hamaarii thii jaan se pyaarii thii tere liye main ne duniyaa sanvaarii thii tuu auron kii kyon ho gayii   threedots  pyaar kii mastii tuune na chaahii tuune to chaahaa chaandii kaa pyaalaa aansuu kisii ke kyaa tuu pahanatii tujhako pahananii thii motii kii maalaa ho tujhako pahananii thii motii kii maalaa pag pag par vishvaas ke badale chhalaa karegii tujhako shankaa aag ke lapaton men lipatii hai ye terii sone kii lankaa tuu auron kii kyon ho gayii   threedots  kyaa ye tere sukh ke saadhan merii yaad ko bhulaa sakenge merii yaad jab niind udaa degii kyaa ye tujhako sulaa sakenge ho kyaa ye tujhako sulaa sakenge saadhan men sukh hotaa nahiin hai sukh jiivan kii ek kalaa hai mujhase hii chhal kiyaa na tuune apane ko tuune aap chhalaa hai tuu auron kii kyon ho gayii   threedots  tere liye main laayaa bahaaren tere liye main jaan pe khelaa do din bhii tuune raah na dekhii chhod ke chal dii mujhe akelaa ho chhod ke chal dii mujhe akelaa terii judaaii merii chitaa hai gam ki chitaa men main jal rahaa huun man meraa dahake maraghat jaisaa angaaron pe main chal rahaa huun tuu auron kii kyon ho gayii   threedots  tuu hamaarii thii jaan se pyaarii thii tere liye main ne duniyaa sanvaarii thii tuu auron kii kyon ho gayii   threedots

Title: puuchhe jo koii mujhase bahaar kaisii hotii hai
Lyrics: puuchhe jo koii mujhase bahaar kaisii hotii hai 2 naam teraa le ke kah duun ki yaar aisii hotii hai puuchhe jo koii mujhase ghataa ghanaghor kaisii hotii hai 2 tere jaisii hotii hai aur kaisii hotii hai puuchhe jo koii threedots  gustaakii maine kabhii kii nahiin main kyaa paagal huun nahiin jii nahiin vaise to maine kabhii pii nahiin par main aisaa bekabar bhii nahiin puuchhe jo koii mujhase sharaab kaisii hotii hai naam teraa le ke kah duun janaab aisii hotii hai puuchhe jo koii threedots  tujhako kyuun aaii hayaa kyaa pataa naa jaane jannat kyaa hai kyaa pataa mujhako ye baaten bhalaa kyaa pataa  puuchhe jo koii mujhase huur kaisii hotii hai naam teraa le ke kah duun huzuur aisii hotii hai puuchhe jo koii threedots

Title: aatii rahengii bahaaren
Lyrics: aatii rahengii bahaaren jaatii rahengii bahaaren dil kii nazar se duniyaan ko dekho duniyaan sadaa hii hasiin hai      main ne to bas yahii maangii hai duaaen phuulon kii tarah ham sadaa muskuraaye gaate rahen ham khushiyon ke giit yuun hii jaaye biit zindagii ho aatii rahengii bahaaren threedots           tum jo mile ho to dil ko yaqiin hai dharatii pe svarg jo hai to yahiin hai gaate rahe ham khushiyon ke giit yuun hii jaaye biit zindagii ho aatii rahengii bahaaren threedots  tum se hain jab jiivan men sahaare jahaan jaaye nazaren vahiin hain nazaare leke aayegii har nayii bahaar rang bharaa pyaar aur khushii ho aatii rahengii bahaaren threedots

Title: main kise apanaa kahuun aaj meraa koii nahiin
Lyrics: main kise apanaa kahuun aaj meraa koii nahiin meraa hamadard mere dil ke sivaa koii nahiin  ek tinake kii tarah ham to ude jaate hain kahaan le jaae hawaa isakaa pataa koii nahiin  tiis banbanake sadaa detii hai kyon yaad terii ik mohabbat ke sivaa merii kataa koii nahiin  tujhako maaluum nahiin terii tamannaa ke sivaa dil ke jalate hue zakmon kii davaa koii nahiin

Title: ye nainaa ye kaajal ye zulfen ye aanchal
Lyrics: ye nainaa ye kaajal ye zulfen ye aanchal 2 kuubasuurat sii ho tum gazal kabhii dil ho kabhii dhadakan kabhii sholaa kabhii shabanam tum hii ho tum merii hamadam ye nainaa ye kaajal threedots  zindagii tum merii tum merii zindagii  merii aankhon se dekho merii nazaron se jaano 2 tum maalaa ham motii tum diipak ham jyoti ye nainaa ye kaajal threedots  sapanon kaa panaghat ho aashaa kaa jhuramut ho 2 tum nadiyaa ham dhaaraa tum chandaa ham taaraa ye nainaa ye kaajal threedots  merii saanson se puuchho merii aahon ko samajho 2 tum puujaa ham pujaarii tum kismat ham juaarii ye nainaa ye kaajal threedots

Title: tun tunaa  kabhii khole na tijorii kaa taalaa
Lyrics: tun tunaa 3 kabhii khole na tijorii kaa taalaa haan meraa sasuraa badaa paise vaalaa kab nikalegaa isakaa diivaalaa meraa sasuraa threedots  hat jaao mat shor karo sasure ko mat bore karo sasuraa achchhaa bandaa hai maanaa kaalaa dhandhaa hai uunchii mil kaa maalik hai chhote dil kaa maalik hai itanaa dhan kaise aayaa main boluun aise aayaa lekar naam nasiibon kaa chuusaa kuun gariibon kaa saadhuu ban kar ye daakaa daalaa haan meraa sasuraa threedots  milie ab is gorii se merii premchakorii se kaisii pyaarii lagatii hai abalaa naarii lagatii hai gaanv ko dhokhaa de aaii mujhako shahar men le aaii kad kii thodii chhotii hai par shataranj kii gotii hai aisii chaal ye chalatii hai kahate jaan nikalatii hai kaisii aurat se pad gayaa paalaa haan meraa sasuraa threedots  ab tum puuchho kaun hai ye kitanii der se maun hai ye ye sevak hai svaamii kaa rishtedaar hai tomy kaa karachhii hai naa karachhaa hai ye chhotaa saa chamachaa hai kutte saa piichhe daude pakade to phir naa chhode achchhaa isakaa kaam nahiin par ye namakharaam nahiin choron ke maal kaa ye rakhavaalaa haan meraa sasuraa threedots

Title: nafarat karane vaalon ke siine men pyaar bhar duun
Lyrics: nafarat karane vaalon ke siine men pyaar bhar duun  2 are main vo paravaanaa huun patthar ko mom kar duun nafarat karane vaalon ke siine men pyaar bhar duun  phir aap kyaa hain hain  aakhir to phuul hain faulaad nahiin hain are bulabul hain kisii baag ke saiyaad nahiin hain  bulabul ke tadapane se saiyaad pighalataa hai  2 aahon men asar ho to faulaad pighalataa hai faulaad ke bhii dil men ulafat kii aag bhar duun are main vo paravaanaa huun patthar ko mom kar duun nafarat karane vaalon ke siine men pyaar bhar duun  sharmohaya kaa pardaa dushvaar nahiin hai ajii halkaa saa ik parada hai diivaar nahiin hai 	 aanchal kii ye diivaar to diivaar nahiin hai  2 phir aap ke bhii dil men inkaar nahiin hai inkaar jin labon men iqaraar unamen bhar duun are main vo paravaanaa huun patthar ko mom kar duun nafarat karane vaalon ke siine men pyaar bhar duun  ham vo hain zindagii men kabhii saatha naa chhodenge thaamenge agar haath to phir haath naa chhodenge  ham haath naa chhodenge tuufaan se kinaaron tak  2 ham saath naa chhodenge dharatii se sitaaron tak chaahata ke sitaaron se dharati kii maang bhar duun are main vo paravaanaa huun patthar ko mom kar duun nafarat karane vaalon ke siine men pyaar bhar duun are main vo paravaanaa huun patthar ko mom kar duun nafarat karane vaalon ke siine men pyaar bhar duun

Title: jhuum baraabar jhuum sharaabi
Lyrics: naa haram men naa sukuun milataa hai butakhaane men chain milataa hai to saaqii tere maikhaane men  jhuum jhuum jhuum  jhuum baraabar jhuum sharaabii jhuum baraabar jhuum  3 kaalii ghataa hai aa aathreedots mast fazaa hai aa aathreedots kaalii ghataa hai mast fazaa hai jaam uthaakar ghuum ghuum ghuum jhuum baraabar threedots  aaj anguur kii betii se muhaubbat kar le shekh saahab kii nasiihat se bagaavat kar le isakii betii ne uthaa rakhii hai sar par duniyaa ye to achchhaa huaa ke anguur ko betaa naa huaa kamasekam suratesaaqii kaa nazaaraa kar le aake maikaane men jiine kaa sahaaraa kar le aankh milate hii javaanii kaa mazaa aayegaa tujhako anguur ke paanii kaa mazaa aayegaa har nazar apanii basad shauq gulaabii kar de itanii piile ke zamaane ko sharaabii kar de jaam jab saamane aaye to mukaranaa kaisaa baat jab piine ki aajaaye to daranaa kaisaa dhuum machii hai aa aathreedots maikaane men aa aathreedots dhuum machii hai maikaane men tuu bhii machaa le dhuum dhuum dhuum jhuum baraabar threedots  isake piinese tabiiyat men ravaanii aaye isako buudhaa bhii jo piile to javaanii aaye piine vaale tujhe aajaaegaa piine kaa mazaa isake har ghuunt men poshiidaa hai jiine kaa mazaa baat to jab hai ke tuu mai kaa parastaar bane  tuu nazar daal de jis par vohii maikvaar bane mausamegul men to piine kaa mazaa aataa hai piine vaalon ko hii jiine kaa mazaa aataa hai jaam uthaale aa aathreedots munh se lagaale aa aathreedots jaam uthaale munh se lagaale munh se lagaakar chuum chuum chuum jhuum baraabar threedots  jo bhii aataa hai yahaan piike machal jaataa hai jab nazar saaqii ki padatii hai sambhal jaataa hai aa idhar jhuumake saaqii kaa leke naam uthaa dekh vo abr uthaa tuu bhii zaraa jaam uthaa is qadar piile ke ragrag men suruur aajaaye kasarat mai se tere chehare pe nuur aajaaye isake har katare men naazaan hai nihaan dariyaadilii isake piinese pataa hotii hai ke zindaadilii shaan se piile aa aathreedots shaan se jiile aa aathreedots shaan se piile shaan se jiile ghuum nashe men ghuum ghuum ghuum jhuum baraabar threedots

Title: zindagii ai zindagii
Lyrics: zindagii ai zindagii  zindagii tere hain do ruup 2 biitii huii raaton kii baaton kii tuu chhaayaa chhaayaa vo jo banegii dhuup  kabhii tere kiranen thii thandii thandii haay re ab tuu hii mere jii men aag lagaaye 2 chaandanii ai chaandanii  chaandanii tere hain do ruup tuute hue sapanon kii apanon kii tuu chhaayaa chhaayaa vo jo banegii dhuup  aate jaate pal kyaa hain samay ke ye jhuule hain bichhade saathii kabhii yaad aaye kabhii bhuule hain2 aadamii ai aadamii  aadamii tere hain do ruup duhkh sukh ke jhuulon kii phuulon kii tuu chhaayaa chhaayaa vo jo banegii dhuup 2  koii bhuulii huii baat mujhe yaad aaii hai khushii bhii tuu laaii thii aur aansuu bhii tuu laaii hai2 dillagii ai dillagii  dillagii tere hain do ruup kaise kaise vaadon kii yaadon kii tuu chhaayaa chhaayaa vo jo banegii dhuup

Title: o sonaa sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re
Lyrics: koras  ru ru  aashaa o sonaa sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re sonaa re sonaa sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re ye sonaa koras le jaa le  aashaa ye ruupaa koras le jaa le  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa  aashaa haa sonaa mile to log aaj kal dil ko kabhii na len priit ke munh par kaalikh mal den pyaar ko thokar den o sakhii rii ab hai zamaanaa duusaraa o sonaa sonaa re sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re ye sonaa koras le jaa le  aashaa ye ruupaa koras le jaa le  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa  aashaa haa sonaa mile to log aaj kal dil ko kabhii na len priit ke munh par kaalikh mal den pyaar ko thokar den o sakhii rii ab hai zamaanaa duusaraa sonaa sonaa re sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re  aashaa jaaduu bhare ishaare sab jhuuthe hain matalab bhare sahaare sab jhuuthe hain vaade kabhii na sunanaa pachhataaegii sapane kabhii na bunanaa lut jaaegii o sakhii rii ab hai zamaanaa duusaraa sonaa sonaa re sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re ye sonaa koras le jaa le  aashaa ye ruupaa koras le jaa le  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa aashaa laa laa sonaa sonaa re  aashaa palakon tale thikaanaa koii maange naa dil kaa bharaa khazaanaa koii maange naa apanaa inhen na kahanaa sansaarii hain sadame padenge sahanaa vyaapaarii hain o sakhii rii ab hai zamaanaa duusaraa sonaa sonaa re sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re ye sonaa koras le jaa le  aashaa ye ruupaa koras le jaa le  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa  aashaa mujhe tuu koras dil de jaa aashaa haa sonaa mile to log aaj kal dil ko kabhii na len priit ke munh par kaalikh mal den pyaar ko thokar den o sakhii rii ab hai zamaanaa duusaraa sonaa sonaa re sonaa ruupaa sonaa ruupaa laayo re sonaa sonaa re

Title: vafaa ke naam par mitanaa  agar tuu aabaruu apanii
Lyrics: vafaa ke naam par mitanaa nahiin aayaa agar tujhako to phir jismevafaa baazaar men kyuun bechatii hai tuu  agar tuu aabaruu apanii bachaa letii to achchhaa thaa jo apanii aag men khud ko jalaa letii to achchhaa thaa agar tuu aabaruu threedots  lagaa kar aag honthon se kisii kaa ghar jalaa denaa kisii kii jaan jaanaa aur teraa muskaraa denaa ki teraa muskaraa denaa kisii par jaan dekar muskaraa letii to achchhaa thaa agar tuu aabaruu threedots  satii to aan hotii hai tuu unakii nishaanii hai na haragiz bhuul begairat tuu hindostaanii hai ki tuu hindostaanii hai agar tuu sharm ko jevar banaa letii to achchhaa thaa agar tuu aabaruu threedots

Title: samajhautaa gamon se kar lo
Lyrics: samajhautaa gamon se kar lo 2 zindagii men gam bhii milate hain ho patajhad aate hii rahate hain 2 ke madhuban phir bhii khilate hain ho samajhautaa gamon se threedots  raat kategii honge ujaale phir mat giranaa o girane vaale 2 insaan vo kud sambhale auron ko bhii sambhaale 3 ho samajhautaa gamon se threedots  bhuul sabhii se hotii aaii kaun hai jisane naa thokar khaaii 2 bhuulon se siikhe jo manzil usane paaii 2 ho samajhautaa gamon se threedots

Title: raajaa banaa moraa chhailaa
Lyrics: aalii aalii raajaa banaa moraa chhailaa kaisaa dekho morii guiyaan re 2 aao gorii gorii bainyaan vaaro le leke balaiyaan sadake uuke daaro ancharavaa kii chhainyyaa jhilamil jhilamil raajaa banaa moraa chhailaa threedots  rahe sadaa raajaa ke paas hiiraa motii umm bharaa kyaa huaa jo ye ruup kaa laalachii hai zaraa 2 are aise dekhe mohe jaise moraa sainyaan  daiyaa daiyaa raajaa banaa moraa chhailaa threedots  aisaa bholaa aisa naadaan dekhaa nahiin haah kahiin aage hai kaun piichhe hai kaun jaanataa bhii nahiin 2 isii se main aaii daudii paiyyaan paiyyaan chhamchham chhamchham  raajaa banaa moraa chhailaa threedots  raajaa kaa to naukar bhii hai kaisaa pyaaraa haah pyaaraa aisa kaii ghante se chuur baithaa hai bechaaraa 2 are isase jale  bhanvaraa duaa karo koii dhang dhang dhang dhang raajaa banaa moraa chhailaa threedots

Title: muskuraataa huaa gul khilaataa huaa meraa yaar
Lyrics: muskuraataa huaa gul khilaataa huaa meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar aankhen malataa huaa tan churaataa hyaa meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar   threedots  gore gore mukh ko chuumen hiire motii aisii sharaarat ham say bhii hotii dhiire se chuu luun main gaalon ko chuumuun main bhiige se baalon ko bolo na      na na na na na na karataa huaa jag se darataa huaa meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar   threedots  pyaarii pyaarii chhabi hai adaa bholii bhaalii ab na lagaanaa honthon pe laalii dil pe kyaa biite hai jaano na itanaa saa kahanaa hai maano na maano na      haan baabaa haan haan karataa huaa par sanvarataa huaa meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar   threedots  khoye khoye nainaa dekhen meraa sapanaa pyaar mubaarak milaa koii apanaa chupake se baahon men aa jaanaa merii jaan ab to naa sharmaanaa sharamaao na      jaa jaa jaa jaa karataa huaa dard sahataa huaa meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar meraa yaar   threedots

Title: ai bas ab tarasaanaa chhodo  hamen bahakaanaa chhodo
Lyrics: ki 	ho ho ho ai bas ab tarasaanaa chhodo yuun hii sharamaanaa chhodo uun uun 	jo dil men pyaar kaa tuufaan hai ham jaan gae hain 2 aa 	hamen bahakaanaa chhodo an hn ke piichhe aanaa chhodo uun huun 	tumhen jis chiiz kaa aramaan hai ham jaan gae hain  	chhedo naa hamako hato jaao tumhen aisaa na thaa hamane jaanaa 2 ki 	chhodo bahaane ajii aao bhalaa apanon se kaisaa sharamaanaa aa 	pakado naa aanchal meraa jakado naa baanhen 	ki jitanii aap se pahachaan hai ham jaan gae hain 2 ki 	bas ab tarasaanaa chhodo threedots  	karanii hain tumase kaii baaten vo jo kaanon men kahane vaalii hain 2 aa 	jaanuun main jaanuun sabhii ghaaten jo hain chaalen vo dekhiibhaalii hain ki 	zulfon ke niiche de do dil ko panaahen 	ye mushkil kis kadar aasaan hai ham jaan gae hain 2 aa 	hamen bahakaanaa chhodo threedots

Lyrics: ra 	he maii jabjab piir padii bhagatan par tuune sunii pukaar mu 	he maii jisakii raxaa tuu kare use kyaa maare sansaar do 	use kyaa maare sansaar  ra 	he aayoaayo navaraatri tyauhaar o ambe maiyaa ko 	terii jayjayakaar ho ambe maiyaa terii jayjayakaar mu 	he  kar de kar de bhakton kaa bedaa paar  2 o ambe maiyaa ko 	terii jayjayakaar threedots  ra 	ham to baalak tere maataa aur tuu jiivan daataa hai ko 	aur tuu jiivan daataa hai mu 	koii usako chhuu nahiin paataa terii sharan jo aataa hai ko 	terii sharan jo aataa hai ra 	ho aaii sinh pe savaar terii shakti apaar 	tujhe ambe jagadambe jag saaraa jaane re ko 	ho jag saaraa jaane re mu 	aaj apanaa aaj apanaa dikhaa de chamatkaar ko 	ho aaj apanaa aaj apanaa dikhaa de chamatkaar ho ambe maiyaa ra 	kar de kar de threedots  ra 	vipadaa men hai desh hamaaraa tuu hii bachaane vaalii hai ko 	tuu hii bachaane vaalii hai mu 	aanchal men ye diip chhupaa le aandhii aane vaalii hai ko 	aandhii aane vaalii hai ra 	ho bairii piichhe pade hamen ghere khade 	tujhe ambe jagadambe jag saaraa jaane re ko 	ho jag saaraa jaane re mu 	deshadrohii kii kar de bantaadhaar ambe maiyaa ko 	ho ambe maiyaa ra 	kar de kar de threedots  ra 	chaaron khaane chitt hai dushman usane hamako maan liyaa ko 	usane hamako maan liyaa mu 	naacho gaao mauj manaao maiyaa ne kalyaan kiyaa ko 	maiyaa ne kalyaan kiyaa ra 	he aisii devii ne aaj rakhii bhakton kii laaj 	tujhe ambe jagadambe jag saaraa jaane re ko 	ho jag saaraa jaane re mu 	nahiin bhuulenge teraa upakaar ko 	ho nahiin bhuulenge teraa upakaar ho ambe maiyaa 	aayoaayo navaraatri threedots

Title: ruk jaanaa o jaanaan hamase do baaten
Lyrics: ruk ruk 3 ruk jaanaa zaraa ruk jaanaa ruk jaanaa o jaanaan hamase do baaten karake chalii jaanaa ke mausam hai diivaanaa o ruk jaanaa o jaanaan threedots  he is dil kaa salaam de duun aa tujhako paigaam de duun achchhaa saa ik naam de duun rukasaanaa 4 ruk jaa  ruk jaanaa o jaanaan threedots  zuu zuu aisaa kyaa janaab gussaa pyaar kaa javaab gussaa hotaa hai karaab gussaa naa naa naa 4 ruk jaanaa o jaanaan threedots  laakhon men tuu ek ladakii lagatii hai tuu nek ladakii hans ke zaraa dekh ladakii sharamaa naa 4 ruk jaanaa o jaanaan threedots

Title: baandhii re kaahe priit
Lyrics: baandhii re kaahe priit piyaa ke sang anjaanii riit 2 baalii umar men main naa samajhii 2 kyaa hai priit kii riit baandhii re kaahe priit 2 piyaa ke sang anjaanii riit  paas rahii to main naa samajhii duur huii to jaanaa pyaar men kaise apanaa ban ke koii bane begaanaa kaise biitegaa ab jiivan 2 bin saathii bin miit baandhii re kaahe priit piyaa ke sang anjaanii riit  ang lagii hai ped kii belaa lahar ko mile kinaaraa bin saajan kii main huun akelii meraa kaun sahaaraa aisaa suunaa laage jiivan 2 jaise sur bin giit baandhii re kaahe priit 2 piyaa ke sang anjaanii riit

Title: zindagii kaisii hai pahelii haay
Lyrics: zindagii threedots kaisii hai pahelii haae kabhii to hansaaye kabhii ye rulaaye zindagii threedots  kabhii dekho man nahiin jaage piichhe piichhe sapanon ke bhaage ek din sapanon kaa raahii chalaa jaae sapanon ke aage kahaan zindagii threedots  jinhone sajaae yahaan mele sukhdukh sangsang jhele vahii chunakar kaamoshii yuun chalii jaae akele kahaan zindagii threedots

Title: kis kaa rastaa dekhe ai dil ai saudaaii
Lyrics: kis kaa rastaa dekhe ai dil ai saudaaii miilon hai khaamoshii barason hai tanahaaii bhuulii duniyaa kabhii kii tujhe bhii mujhe bhii phir kyon aankh bhar aaii o kis kaa rastaa dekhe threedots  koii bhii saayaa nahiin raahon men koii bhii aaegaa na baahon men tere lie mere lie koii nahiin rone vaalaa ho jhuutaa bhii naataa nahiin chaahon men tuu hii kyon duubaa rahe aahon men koii kisii sang mare aisaa nahiin hone vaalaa koii nahiin jo yuun hii jahaan men baante piir paraaii ho kis kaa rastaa dekhe threedots  tujhe kyaa biitii huii raaton se mujhe kyaa khoii huii baaton se sej nahiin chitah sahii jo bhii mile sonaa hogaa ho gaii jo dorii chhuut haathon se o lenaa kyaa chhuute hue saathon se khushii jahaan maangii tuune vahiin mujhe ronaa hogaa na koii teraa na koii meraa phir kisakii yaad aaii o kis kaa rastaa dekhe threedots

Title: mehngaaii maar gaii mehngaaii maar gaii
Singer: mukesh lata chanchal jani babu qawwal
Lyrics: usane kahaa tuu kaun hai mainne kahaa ulfat terii  usane kahaa takataa hai kyaa mainne kahaa suurat terii  usane kahaa chaahataa hai kyaa mainne kahaa chaahat terii  mainne kahaa samajhaa nahiin usane kahaa qismat terii   ek hamen aankh kii ladaaii maar gaii  duusarii to yaar kii judaaii maar gaii  tiisarii hameshaa kii tanhaaii maar gaii  chauthii ye khudaa kii khudaaii maar gaii  baakii kuchh bachaa to manhagaaii maar gaii   1 tabiiyat thiik thii aur dil bhii beqaraar naa thaa  ye tab kii baat hai jab kisii se pyaar naa thaa  jab se priit sapanon men samaaii maar gaii  man ke miithe dard kii gaharaaii maar gaii  nainon se nainon kii sagaaii maar gaii  soch soch men jo soch aaii maar gaii  baakii kuchh bachaa threedots  2 kaise vaqt men aa ke dil ko dil kii lagii bimaarii  manhagaaii kii daur men ho gaii manhagii yaar kii yaarii  dil kii lagii dil ko jab lagaaii maar gaii  dil ne kii jo pyaar to duhaaii maar gaii  dil kii baat duniyaa ko bataaii maar gaii  dil kii baat dil men jo chhupaaii maar gaii  baakii kuchh bachaa threedots  3 pahale mutthii vich paise lekar  pahale mutthii men paise lekar thailaa bhar shakkar laate the  ab thaile men paise jaate hain mutthii men shakkar aatii hai  haay manhagaaii manhagaaii threedots duhaaii hai duhaaii manhagaaii manhagaaii threedots tuu kahaan se aaii tujhe kyon maut na aaii hay manhagaaii threedots shakkar men ye aate kii milaaii maar gaii  paudar vaale duddh dii malaaii maar gaii  raashan vaali lain dii lambaaii maar gaii  janataa jo chiikhii chillaaii maar gaii  baakii kuchh bachaa threedots  gariib ko to bachchon kii padhaaii maar gaii  betii kii shaadii aur sagaaii maar gaii  kisii ko to rotii kii kamaaii maar gaii  kapade kii kisii ko silaaii maar gaii  kisii ko makaan kii banavaaii maar gaii  jivan de bas tinn nisaan  rotii kapadaa aur makaan    ke har insaan  kho baithaa hai apanii jaan  jo sach sach bolaa to sachchaaii maar gaii  aur baakii kuchh bachaa to manhagaaii maar gaii threedots

Title: raam prabhu aadhaar
Lyrics: raam prabhu aadhaar jagat ke  2 raam jiivan aadhaar raam ek aadarsh hamaare vandan karuun hazaar ho vandan karuun hazaar shrii raam shrii raam  do akshar kii amogh shakti  2 mahaamantra hai mangal naam  2 shrii raam shrii raam shrii raam jai raam jai jai raam raam prabhu aadhar threedots  ajaanubaahu viir dhanurdhar shaamal kaanti shariir sundar 2 sur nar paalak asura sanhaarak bhakt janon ke hain vishraam shrii raam threedots  raam prabhuu aadhar threedots

Title: tumase kahuun ik baat paron sii halkiihalkii
Lyrics: tumase kahuun ik baat paron sii halkiihalkii raat merii hai chhanv tumhaare hii aanchal kii halkiihalkii  soii galiyaan baanh pasaare aankhen miiche  2 main duniyaa se duur ghanii palakon ke niiche dekhuun chalate kwaab lakiiron par kaajal kii tumase kahuun threedots   dhundhalii dhundhalii rain milan kaa bistar jaise  2 khulataa chhupataa chaand sej ke uupar jaise chalatii phiratii khaat hawaaon par baadal kii tumase kahuun threedots   hai bhiigaa saa jism tumhaaraa in haathon men  2 baahar niind bharaa panchhii bhiigii shaakhon me aur barakhaa kii buund badan se dhalkiidhalkii tumase kahuun threedots

Title: duniyaa hanse hansatii rahe main huun ganvaar
Lyrics: duniyaa hanse hansatii rahe 2 main huun ganaar mujhe sabase hai pyaar  nagariinagarii gaataa chal pyaar kaa raag sunaataa chal pyaar sanam hai pyaar kudaa duniyaa ko samajhaataa chal sune naa sune koii terii pukaar duniyaa hanse threedots  tujhase bhii pyaar mujhe inase bhii pyaar raam se bhii pyaar hai rahiim se bhii pyaar duniyaa hanse threedots  naa main saadhuusanyaasii naa main jogiivanavaasii ghuum ke aayaa gangaajamanaa lekin ab tak hai pyaasii tan kii dholak man kaa sitaar duniyaa hanse threedots  kitane hii dhanavaan mile dharatii ke bhagavaan mile ek tamannaa baaqii hai inamen koii inasaan mile jisako salaam karuun sausau baar duniyaa hanse threedots

Title: are he uunchiiuunchii baaton se kisii kaa pet bharataa nahiin
Lyrics: ra 	are he uunchiiuunchii baaton se kisii kaa pet bharataa nahiin aa 	are he hai raam kaa bharosaa jise kabhii bhuukhaa marataa nahiin 	are he uunchiiuunchii threedots  ko 	aa aa aa ra 	koii kuchh bhii kar le pyaare 	jhuuth naa jiitee sach naa haare aa 	ye aisaa dastuur hai bas jo badalataa nahiin 	are he uunchiiuunchii threedots  ko 	he he he he ho ho ho ho ra 	lene vaalaa dene vaalaa 	kaun hai bolo uupar vaalaa ko 	uupar vaalaa aa 	vo hai jisake saath vo duniyaa se darataa nahiin 	are he uunchiiuunchii threedots

Title: rasmeulfat ko nibhaaen to nibhaaen kaise
Lyrics: rasmeulfat ko nibhaaen to nibhaaen kaise har taraf aag hai daaman ko bachaaen kaise rasmeulfat ko nibhaaenthreedots  dil kii raahon men uthate hain jo duniyaa vaale	2 koii kah de ke voh diivaar giraaen kaise		2 rasmeulfat ko nibhaaenthreedots  dard men duube hue nagame hazaaron hain magar	2 saazedil tuut gayaa ho to sunaae kaise		2 rasmeulfat ko nibhaaenthreedots  bojh hotaa jo gamon kaa to uthaa bhii lete		2 zindagii bojh banii ho to uthaaen kaise		2 rasmeulfat ko nibhaaenthreedots

Title: merii duniyaa men tum aayiin
Lyrics: ra   merii duniyaa men tum aayiin kyaa kyaa apane saath liye       tan kii chaandii man kaa sonaa sapanon vaalii raat liye        tanhaa tanhaa khoyaa khoyaa dil men dil kii baat liye       kab se yuun hii phirataa huun main aramaan kii baaraat liye  raa  andhere kaa ishaaraa samajho       ab diyaa dil kaa jalaanaa hogaa pri  tum bade vo ho mujhe jaane do raa  jaa sakogii pri  mujhe jaanaa hogaa raa  to jaao pri  chhodo bhii raa  nahiin pri  chhodo na raa  aaj kii raat to dil todo na  la   dhalakaa aanchal phailaa kaajaal aankhon men ye raat liye       kaise jaauun sakhiyon men ab terii ye saugaat liye       dhalakaa aanchal phailaa kaajal        dil kii ye dhadakan sun le na koii       haay haay haay dekhe na koii ra   na jaao na jaao na jaao la   hato hato dar lagataa hai ra   suno suno la   dar lagataa hai ra   dil men kitanii kaliyaan mahakii kaise kaise phuul khile       naazuk naazuk miithe miithe honthon kii khairaat liye  la   chaand se kaise aankh milaauun ra   baahon men aao tum ko bataauun la   bas bhii karo ra   ab na daro raat hai ye apanii la   paayal chhanake kanganaa khanake badalii jaaye chaand merii       manzil manzil chalanaa hogaa haathon men ab haath liye  ra   merii duniyaa men tum aayiin kyaa kyaa apane saath liye       tan kii chaandii man kaa sonaa sapanon vaalii raat liye       merii duniyaa men tum aayiin

Title: tujhe bhuul ke maatii  o terii duniyaa kaisii tuu jaane
Lyrics: tujhe bhuul ke maatii kii putalii par koii man kii khidakii khol rahaa jisamen teraa naam tule jag usamen sonaachaandii tol rahaa  apanaa kyaa hai ham to anajaane o terii duniyaa kaisii tuu jaane jiivan path pe nikale do pal ko ham apane jii ko bahalaane o terii duniyaa threedots  tuune jab duniyaa ye banaaii dharatii kii chaadar phailaaii chandaasuuraj kii jot jalaaii par jisake lie jag tuune rachaa vo karake ise viiraan rahaa dharatii kii chaadar chhiin chukaa ab chaand aur suuraj maang rahaa ye tere bandon ke afasaane o terii duniyaa threedots  ultii gangaa bahe jogii chup kaise rahe ab devataa kuchh bhii nahiin maanavataa kuchh bhii nahiin yaar se yaarii gaii vo diladaarii gaii aisii chhaayaa tale ham diivaane bhale kaisaa pyaar kahaan kii dostii kaisaa rishtaanaataa tere hote insaan teraa shaitaan huaa o daataa par ye kyaa kah rahe ham diivaane o terii duniyaa threedots  jab dil men paraayaa dard uthe duuje ke tuu kaam aae yaaraa tab gyaan milaa jiivan tujhako chaandiisone se bhii pyaaraa varanaa dhan to chiiz hii kyaa hai kahe miyaan naziiraa kaa ikataaraa sab thaath padaa rah jaaegaa jab laad chalegaa banjaaraa kaam aaenge yahii pyaar ke nazaraane o terii duniyaa threedots

Title: tere honthon ke do phuul pyaarepyaare
Lyrics: mu 	tere honthon ke do phuul pyaarepyaare 	mere pyaar kii bahaaron ke nazaare 	ab mujhe chaman se  kyaa lenaa  2 la 	terii aankhon ke do taare pyaarepyaare 	merii raaton ke chamakate sitaare 	ab mujhe gagan se  kyaa lenaa  2 mu 	tere honthon ke threedots  	terii kaayaa kanchankanchan kiranon kaa hai jisamen baseraa 	terii saansen mahakiimahakii terii zulfon men kushbuu kaa deraa 	teraa mahake angang jaise sone men sugandh 	mujhe chandanvan se  kyaa lenaa  2 la 	terii aankhon ke threedots  	maine dekhaa jabase tujhako mere sapane hue sinduurii 	tujhe paa ke mere jiivandhan har kamii huii merii puurii 	piyaa ek teraa pyaar mere solah singaar 	mujhe ab darpan se  kyaa lenaa  2 mu 	tere honthon ke threedots  	teraa mukhadaa damakechamake jaise saagar pe chamake saveraa la 	terii baanhen pyaar ke jhuule terii baanhon men jhuule man meraa mu 	terii miithii har baat 2 la 	ras kii hai barasaat do 	hamen ab saavan se  kyaa lenaa  2 mu 	tere honthon ke threedots la 	terii aankhon ke threedots  do 	hamen  kyaa lenaa  2

Title: jinnaaraa  saath tere hai  jiivan se naa haar
Lyrics: jinnaaraa jin jinnaaraa 4 saath tere hai uupar vaalaa vahii hai sabakaa rakhavaalaa  jiivan se naa haar jiine vaale baat merii tuu maan are matavaale har gam ko tuu apanaa kar aur apanaa dard chhupaakar badhataa chal tuu laharaa kar duniyaa ke sukhdukh ko bisaraa kar jiivan se naa haar threedots  sukhdukh jiivan ke do paae dhuup sunaharii kahiin ghanere saae jo suuraj andhiyaare men kho jaae vahii lautakar nayaa saveraa laae jiivan se naa haar threedots  bahatii nadiyaa tujhako yaad dilaae samay jo jaae kabhii laut ke phir naa aae diip to vo jo havaa men jalataa jaae khud ko jalaakar jag ko raah dikhaae jiivan se naa haar threedots

Title: ab ke sajan saavan men
Lyrics: ab ke sajan saavan men 2 aag lagelii badan men ghataa barasegii nazar tarasegii magar  mil na sakenge do man ek hii aangan men  ab ke sajan saavan men  do dilon ke biich khadii kitanii diivaaren kaise sunuungii main piyaa prem kii pukaaren chorii chupake se tum laakh karo jatan sajan mil na sakenge do man ek hii aangan men  ab ke sajan saavan men  itane bade ghar men nahiin ek bhii jharonkaa kis tarah ham denge bhalaa duniyaa ko dhokaa raat bhar jagaaegii ye mast mast pavan sajan mil na sakenge do man ek ki aangan men iishthreedots  ab ke sajan saavan men  tere mere pyaar kaa ye saal buraa hogaa jab bahaar aaegii to haal buraa hogaa kaante lagaaegaa ye phuulon bharaa chaman sajan mil na sakenge do man ek hii aangan men  ab ke sajan saavan men aag lagelii badan men

Title: idhar intazaar udhar intazaar tuu bhii beqaraar
Lyrics: idhar intazaar udhar intazaar tuu bhii beqaraar main bhii beqaraar jag kii maryaadaa dekho banii hai diivaar idhar intazaar threedots  thandii thandii aahen aur jalatii javaanii aag se dekho jaise lipataa hai paanii ye tanahaaii ye angadaaii ik hai javaanii aur gam beshumaar idhar intazaar threedots  paas paas rahake bhii itanii hai duurii koii nahiin samajhegaa terii majabuurii zindagii hai terii raat andherii ruuth na jaae kahiin ruup kii bahaar idhar intazaar threedots

Title: aa raat jaatii hai chupake se mil jaayen donon
Lyrics: aa raat jaatii hai chupake se mil jaayen donon chalake kahiin apanii aag men jal jaayen donon  are aap kyon chup gaye aaiiye hamaare saath gaaiiye naa  mauqaa bhii hai aarazuu bhii lag jaa tuu mere gale se rangiin sii bekhudii men hon jaam do saath leke ye beqaraarii ka mausam ye saans letaa andheraa yuun daal zulfon ke saaye phir naa kabhii ho saveraa haathon men ye haath leke machal jaayen donon do rang jaise ki milate hain mil jaayen donon  aa raat jaatii hai chupake se mil jaayen donon chalake kahiin apanii aag men jal jaayen donon  pyaale men kyaa hai mujhe to apane labon kii pilaa de bujh naa sakii jo umar bhar wo pyaas tuu hii bujhaa de nazadiik tuu itanii aa jaa siine men pad jaaye halachal deke badan kaa sahaaraa mujhako udaaye liye chal kho jaayen aise ki phir na sanbhal paayen donon tadapen kuchh aaj is tarah se bahal jaayen donon  aa raat jaatii hai chupake se mil jaayen donon chalake kahiin apanii aag men jal jaayen dono

Title: ishq ne todii sar pe qayaamat
Lyrics: ishq ne todii sar pe qayaamat zoreqayaamat kyaa kahiye  sunane vaalaa koii nahiin hai ruudaademuhabbat kyaa kahiye  dil hai kisii kaa raazehaqiikat raazehaqiikat kyaa kahiye  hairatejalavaa moharblab hai jalavaaehairat kyaa kahiye  us pe kisii kii tiiresitam sii mashqesiyaasat kyaa kahiye

Title: shiiriin shiiriin shiiriin jaanefarahaad
Lyrics: aa haa haa haa aa haa haa shiiriin shiiriin shiiriin jaanefarahaad aa haa haa haa aa haa haa  aa haa haa uunchii diiwaaron se mahalon miinaaron se haa haa haa takaraayaa pyaar apanaa in shaharayaaron se in shaharayaaron se in taazadaaron se jiitaa hai farahaad aa haa haa haa aa haa haa shiiriin shiiriin shiiriin jaanefarahaad aa haa haa haa aa haa haa  shaharon men gaanvon men ban men saharaaon men naachegaa diiwaanaa zulfon kii chaanvon men zulfon kii chaanvon men zanjiir paanvon men aur dil hai aazaad shiiriin shiiriin shiiriin jaanefarahaad aa haa haa haa aa haa haa  aa haa haa shiiriin kii galiyon men kaante bhii kaliyaan hain aa haa haa bikharii fazaaon men ambar kii daliyaan hain ambar kii daliyaan hain wo rangraliyaan hain jannat hai aabaad aa haa haa haa aa haa haa shiiriin shiiriin shiiriin jaanefarahaad aa haa haa haa aa haa haa

Title: aareaare dil ke saahaare
Lyrics: aareaare dil ke saahaare dil kii har dhadakan tujhako pukaaare 3 aareaare  pyaar men do dil aaj mile hain armaanon ke phuul khile hain honthon pe mere giit hai teraa saajan tuu hii miit hai meraa 2 meraa 2 aareaare dil ke saahaare dil kii har dhadakan tujhako pukaaare aareaare  pyaar kaa vaadaa dekh naa tuute teraameraa saath naa chuute chaahe qasam tuu apanii lele jiivan bhar main saath huun tere 2 tere2 aareaare dil ke saahaare dil kii har dhadakan tujhako pukaaare aareaare

Title: muttukodii kavaadihadaa aiyyo re pyaar men jo naa karanaa chaahaa
Lyrics: muttukodii kavaadihadaa muttukodii kavaadihadaa ayyo re pyaar men jo naa karanaa chaahaa vo bhi mujhe karanaa padaa threedots  1 kahataa thaa chaahuun tujhako ji se tu to ghabaraataa hai abhi se chalane lag jaa re phir dikhaa duun dharati upar hai svarg niche thodaa to duniyaa se dar le yendei kar le yendei kar le naa maane bedardi aiyyodaa muttukodi threedots  2 kar detaa hai re mujhe be kal kal kal kal kal kal kal sine se gir ke teraa aanchal dagamag chalake naa gir paduun main matavaale mujhako thaam ke chal sinaa taane baahen khole aise ye mastaani bole bole jaise daaru kaa ghadaa muttukodi threedots

Title: he nadiyaa kinaare he raaii aaii kanganaa
Lyrics: he nadiyaa kinaare he raaii aaii kanganaa aise ulajh gae anaadii sajanaa nadiyaa kinaare   threedots  kaahe panaghat uupar gaii thii chalake akelii maare hans hans taanaa saarii sakhiyaan sahelii  gorii aur jaao na maano kahanaa nadiyaa kinaare   threedots  ab khadii khadii sochuun dekhii hai saas nanandiiyaa sab kaa karii hai bahaanaa ab to suunii kalaaii lai ke chorii chorii jaanaa bhaarii padaa re piyaa se milanaa nadiyaa kinaare   threedots

Title: raat kalii ek khvaab men aaii aur gale kaa haar huii
Lyrics: raat kalii ek khvaab men aaii aur gale kaa haar huii subah ko jab ham niind se jaage aankh tumhii se chaar huii raat kalii ek khvaab men aaii aur gale kaa haar huii  chaahe kaho ise merii mohabbat chaahe hansiin men udaa do ye kyaa huaa mujhe mujhako khabar nahiin ho sake tum hii bataa do tumane kadam jo rakhaa zamiin par siine men kyon jhankaar huii raat kalii threedots  aankhonmen kaajal aur latonmen kaalii ghataa kaa baseraa saanvalii suurat mohanii muurat saavan rut kaa saveraa jabase ye mukhadaa dil me khilaa hai duniyaa merii gulazaar huii raat kalii threedots  yuun to hasiinon ke mahajabiinon ke hote hain roz nazaare par unhen dekh ke dekhaa hai jab tumhen tum lage aur bhii pyaare baahon men le luun aisii tamannaa ek nahiin kaii baar huii raat kalii threedots

Title: motiyon kii ladii huun main
Lyrics: motiyon kii ladii huun main phulavaa kii chhadii huun main re sundar badii huun main duniyaa bhulaae ankhiyaan bichhaae kab se khadii huun main 2 motiyon kii ladii threedots  bechain huun kitanii der se baithaa hai tuu nigaahen kyon pher ke zaraa saa to mujhe dekh chhed ke 2 main bhadak gaii to phir aag naa bujhegii ik phulajhadii huun main duniyaa bhulaae threedots  main kaun huun terii pyaas huun husn kii main adaa ek kaas huun aaj qismat se main tere paas huun 2 main nikal gaii to phir haath nahiin aauungii aisii ghadii huun main duniyaa bhulaae threedots

Title: huun huun ek ritu aae ek ritu jaae mausam badale naa
Lyrics: huun huun ek ritu aae ek ritu jaae mausam badale naa badale nasiib kaun jatan karuun kaun upaay ek ritu aae threedots  tak tak suukhe patte aankhen taras gaiin baadal to na barase aankhen baras gaiin baras baras dukh badhataa jaae ek ritu aae threedots  ho ho pyaasii banjar dharatii kisakaa pet bhare o bhukhe pyaase bachche khetii kaun kare maan kii mamataa niir bahaae ek ritu aae threedots  aah pyaar na karanaa nafarat karanaa siikh liyaa sab logon ne ladanaa maranaa siikh liyaa inako jiinaa kaun sikhaae ek ritu aae threedots

Lyrics: jamunaa kinaare aajaa chhaliyaa pukaare aajaa raadhaa jaae naa 2 haan paniyaa bharan panaghat pe aae naa raadhaa jaae naa jaae naa raadhaa jaae naa  ho o o o   chaar qadam chale aur ruk jaae 2 bairan aankh nigodii jhuk jaae 2 laaj ke pahare ko tod wo paae naa raadhaa jaae naa jaae naa raadhaa jaae naa  man dole jag bole baavariyaa pama gamagaa saarenisaa pama gamagaa nisaa dhanidha nireni rega niregama pamapa gamare nidha nire saa man dole jag  tod na laae kahiin kaalii gagariyaa 2 ankhiyon men jamunaa jal bhar laae naa raadhaa jaae naa jamunaa kinaare aajaa

Title: nazaron se kah do pyaar men milane kaa mausam aa gayaa
Lyrics: nazaron se kah do pyaar men milane kaa mausam aa gayaa baahon men baahen daal ke khilane kaa mausam aa gayaa  1 is pyaar se teraa haath lagaa laharaa gae gesuu mere kuchh bhii nazar aataa nahiin mastii men mujhe tere pare kandhe pe mere zulf ke dhalane kaa mausam aa gayaa nazaron threedots  2 tum mil bhii gae phir bhii dil ko kyaa jaane kaisii aas hai tum paas ho phir bhii honthon men jaane kaisii pyaas hai honthon kii thandii aag men jalane kaa mausam aa gayaa nazaron threedots

Title: kuchh to log kahenge logon kaa kaam hai kahanaa
Lyrics: kuchha to loga kahenge logon kaa kaama hai kahanaa chhodo bekaara kii baaton men kahiin biita naa jaae rainaa   2 kuchha to loga kahenge logon kaa kaama hai kahanaa  kuchha riita jagata kii aisii hai hara eka subaha kii shaama huii  2 tu kauna hai teraa naama hai kyaa siitaa bhii yahaan badanaama huii phira kyuun sansaara kii baaton se bhiiga gaye tere nayanaa kuchha to loga kahenge logon kaa kaama hai kahanaa chhodo bekaara kii baaton men kahiin biita naa jaae rainaa kuchha to loga kahenge threedots  hamako jo taane dete hain hama khoe hain ina rangaraliyon men  2 hamane unako bhii chhupa chhupake aate dekhaa ina galiyon men ye sacha hai jhuuthii baata nahiin tuma bolo ye sacha hai naa kuchha to loga kahenge logon kaa kaama hai kahanaa chhodo bekaara kii baaton men kahiin biita naa jaae rainaa kuchha to loga kahenge threedots

Title: mitavaa  piine vaalon ko piine kaa bahaanaa
Lyrics: mitavaa 3 kaun devadaas to tumhen kyaa lagaa charanadaas devadaas huun kis haal men jii rahe ho kyaa kahaa pii rahe ho are dard kii davaa milii na kahiin aur mujhe aa gayaa huun tere adde pe aaj ho ke dukhii  tujhe qasam  2 hai jii bhar ke pilaa de paaro dil meraa tod ke chal dii hai kahiin chandramukhii sab ultaa ho rahaa hai kyaa ultaa kyaa sultaa kyaa devii kyaa kulataa sab galat ho rahaa hai kyaa galat kyaa sahii are kyaa duudh kyaa dahii kaisii kahii kuub kahii kuub devadaas huun zaraa hosh men aao paaro paaro mere aagosh men aao main paaro nahiin chandramukhii huun lekin main badaa dukhii huun devadaas huun tuune pii lii hai zyaadaa kyaa kahaa aadhaa are are meraa to hai puurii piine kaa iraadaa kyuunki 3  piine vaalon ko piine kaa bahaanaa chaahie are piine vaalon ko piine kaa bahaanaa chaahie  devadaas mitavaa gaao chandramukhii ke paas aao chandramukhii ho yaa paaro koii farq nahiin hai yaaron yaaron ko to jiine kaa bahaanaa chaahie piine vaalon ko threedots  do hafte hamane is gam men pii ki bichhadaa hai diladaar meraa do hafte hue kushii men pii ki tujhako milaa pyaar teraa piinaa lekin kam kushii ho yaa gam are piinaa lekin kam kushii ho yaa gam kuub pienge ham tharraa ho yaa rum are piine kaa mazaa kuchh to aanaa chaahie are piine vaalon ko threedots

Title: chaandanii chaand se hotii hai
Lyrics: chaandanii chaand se hotii hai sitaaron se nahiin pyaar bhii ek se hotaa hai hazaaron se nahiin phir bhii bulabul se milo aaj bahaaron se nahiin ye nazar tumase hai aabaad nazaaron se nahiin chaandanii chaand se threedots  maine tumako nahiin samajhaa thaa kataavaar huun main jo sazaa chaaho mujhe de do gunaahagaar huun main ab to zanjiiron se baandhon mujhe haaron se nahiin badalaa lete to magar apane hii pyaaron se nahiin chaandanii chaand se threedots  paas bhii tum ho aur aankhon men nashaa chamake bhii ho to jaatii hai galat baat koii hamase bhii shokiyaan kiije magar pyaar ke maaron se nahiin tab naa khul paae to kah duungii ishaaron se nahiin chaandanii chaand se threedots  duubakar hamako in aankhon men rah jaane do aaj baanhon kii inhiin laharon men bah jaane do aaj qaabuu men ham aaenge hazaaron se nahiin apanaa tuufaan se rishtaa hai kinaaron se nahiin chaandanii chaand se threedots

Title: koii phuul na khilataa  agar tuu na hotii
Film: paise ki gudiyaa ghunghat aur ghungharoo
Lyrics: koii phuul na khilataa ye kalii bhii na hotii zindagii bhii na hotii agar tuu na hotii koii phuul na khilataa threedots  na hotaa ujaalaa aur ye raat bhii na hotii koii baat hii na hotii agar tuu na hotii koii phuul na khilataa threedots  koii zamiin na hotii aur aasamaan na hotaa 2 koii hasiin na hotaa koii javaan na hotaa 2 na taare muskaraate ye nazaare bikhar jaate koii kushii na hotii naa intazaar hotaa 2 koii phuul na khilataa threedots  naa koii dil machalataa naa beqaraar hotaa puuchhe jo koii hamase ye sab hai tere dam se koii shai bhii na hotii agar tuu na hotii koii phuul na khilataa threedots

Title: sajaayaa na karo phuul baalon pe
Lyrics: sajaayaa na karo phuul baalon pe giraayaa na karo zulf gaalon pe dilajalon ko sataanaa burii baat hai sajaayaa na karo threedots  uf javaanii kaa ye muskaraataa chaman haay ye naramonaazuk saa ujalaa badan chhuu ke mailaa na kar de koii jaaneman sajaayaa na karo threedots  yuun na angadaaii lo jhuum kar naazaniin aaiine kii nazar lag naa jaae kahiin is qadar husn par naaz achchhaa nahiin sajaayaa na karo threedots

Title: balamaa moraa aancharaa mahake re
Lyrics: lataa balamaa moraa aancharaa mahake re lage niind men doluun main 2 pag moraa bahake re balamaa balamaa moraa aancharaa  mannaa dil ko mere chhuu le tere badan kii ye kushabuu suhaanii dekho dekho chhupake naache lahuu men umangen diivaanii  2  lataa gaatii man men ras kii dhaaraa jhuume ang ang saaraa machale jiyaa matavaaraa  2  mannaa jhuumejhuume palaken jaaduu jagaaen chorii chorii dekho hamako bulaaen 2 aankhon pe chhaae tere palakon ke saaye  lataa aaa aaa aaa balamaa moraa aancharaa  mannaa chupake chupake dekho sab kuchh to kah de simatatii ye baahen niichiiniichii nazaren kyaa kyaa na maangen ye kyaa kyaa na chaahen 2  lataa lagii tan men miithii jwaalaa chhalakatii nayan se haalaa kyaa jaane kyaa kar daalaa  2  mannaa thandiithandii dekho chanchal hawaayen kabhii chuume kabhii siine lagaayen  2 phir ham se ye haay kaahe daaman bachaayen  lataa aaa aaa aaa balamaa moraa aanchara

Title: dil to dil hai kisii din machal jaayegaa
Lyrics: dil to dil hai kisii din machal jaayegaa ek din ye iraadaa badal jaayegaa chaahe haan kahiye chaahe na kahiye   threedots  aisaa ishaaraa hogaa hogaa dil ye hamaaraa hogaa hogaa jaanejigar maanaa teraa patthar jigar hai patthar jigar lekin merii aahon men hai itanaa asar haan itanaa asar dhiire dhiire ye patthar pighal jaayegaa ek din ye iraadaa badal jaayegaa   threedots  jaaduu chalegaa dhiire dhiire gussaa dhalegaa dhiire dhiire maahejabiin ye pyaar kii naazuk umar hai naazuk umar aayegaa dil kispae kahaan kisako khabar hai kisako khabar dil tumhaaraa kisii din phisal jaayegaa ek din ye iraadaa badal jaayegaa   threedots

Title: mohabbat ke suhaane din javaanii kii hasiin raaten
Lyrics: mohabbat ke suhaane din javaanii kii hasiin raaten judaaii men nazar aatii hain ye sab kvaab kii baaten mohabbat ke suhaane threedots  ye tanhaaii nahiin thii is jagah thii pyaar kii mahafil tere gam se gale milakar jahaan ab ro rahaa hai dil yahiin hanshans ke hotii thiin kabhii apanii mulaakaaten mohabbat ke suhaane threedots  mere maayuus honthon pe tere gam kii kahaanii hai kahaanii ye nahiin gam kii ulfat kii nishaanii hai ye aansuu aur ye aahen mohabbat kii saugaaten mohabbat ke suhaane threedots  na aise dil tadapataa thaa naa main aise tarasataa thaa isii gulashan men dekho to kabhii saavan barasataa thaa isii vaadii men ab hone lagiin ashqon kii barasaaten mohabbat ke suhaane threedots  pataa main puuchhataa phirataa huun teraa is zamaane se huaa kyaa haal is dil kaa tere ik duur jaane se janaaze ban gaii is dil ke aramaanon kii baaraaten mohabbat ke suhaane threedots

Title: jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa
Lyrics: ra	jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa 	rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa 	aisaa sundar sapanaa apanaa jiivan hogaa la	jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa   ra	prem kii galii men ek chhotaasaa ghar banaaenge 	kaliyaan naa mile naa sahii kaanton se sajaaenge 	bagiyaa se sundar vo ban hogaa 	rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa la	jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa  ra	rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa  la	terii aankhon se saaraa sansaar main dekhuungii 	dekhuungii is paar yaa us paar main dekhuungii 	nainon ko teraa hii darshan hogaa 	rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa ra	jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa  la	rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa  ra	phir to mast havaaon ke ham jhonke ban jaaenge la	nainaa sundar sapanon ke jharokhe ban jaaenge 	man aashaaon kaa darpan hogaa do	rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa 	aisaa sundar sapanaa apanaa jiivan hogaa      jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa aisaa sundar sapanaa apanaa jiivan hogaa jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa   terii aankhon se saaraa sansaar main dekhuungii dekhuungii is paar yaa us paar main dekhuungii nainon ko teraa hii darshan hogaa rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa   roengii ye aankhen phir bhii main to muskuraauungii dukh ke tuufaanon se bhii main na ghabaraauungii jab saath mere meraa saajan hogaa rimajhim barasataa saavan hogaa jhilamil sitaaron kaa aangan hogaa

Title: chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose nainaa milaayake
Lyrics: la apanii chhab banaayake      jo main pii ke paas gayii      aa apanii chhab banaayake     jo main pii ke paas gayii       do jab chhab dekhii piihoo kii      so main apanii bhool gayii          o chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose nainaa milaayake 2     chhaap tilak  la sab chhiinii re mose nainaa      nainaa mose nainaa      nainaa re mose nainaa milaayake     nainaa milaayake   do chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose  aa nainaa nainaa milaayake 2   do chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose nainaa milaayake     	 la e rii sakhii      main tose kahuun 2     haay tose kahuun  	     main jo gayii thii     paniyaa bharan ko 3     chhiin jhapat morii matakii patakii     chhiin jhapat morii jhapat morii matakii patakii      nainaa milaayake  do chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose nainaa milaayake   aa balbal jaauun main 2     tore rang rajevaa 2     balbal jaauun main 2     tore rang rajevaa 3     apaniisii 3      rang liinii re mose      nainaa milaayake  do chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose nainaa milaayake  aa e rii sakhii      main tose kahuun 2     haay tose kahuun   la harii harii chuudiyaan 2     gorii gorii bahiyaan 2     harii harii chuudiyaan     gorii gorii bahiyaan 3     bahiyaan pakad har liinii 2     re mose nainaa milaayake  do chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose  aa nainaa     nainaa milaayake 3  do chhaap tilak sab chhiinii re mose nainaa milaayake

Title: ham to hain raahii dil ke pahunchenge rukatechalate
Lyrics: ham to hain raahii dil ke pahunchenge rukatechalate manzil hai kisako pyaarii ho are ham to man ke raajaa raajaa kii chalii savaarii 2 ho suno zaraa ham to hain raahii threedots  ham do alabele hain saarii duniyaa se jhele hain apane to sapane laakhon kahane ko akele hain are sabakaa bojhaa leii ke chalatii hai apanii laarii are ho suno zaraa ham to hain raahii threedots  jab tak chalate jaaen sabakaa dil ho apanaaen jab roe koii duujaa nainaa apane chhalak aaen pyaare kaam aaegii sun taazaa baat hamaarii are ho suno zaraa ham to hain raahii threedots  hare hare shankar jay shiv shankar bhuushan vallabh jay maheshvar pandit mullaa daanten par ham sabakaa dukh baanten saare hain apane pyaare bolo kisakaa galaa kaaten raamuu yaa ramajaanii apanii to sabase yaarii are o suno zaraa ham to hain raahii threedots

Title: naa soenge naa sone denge
Lyrics: la  naa soenge naa sone denge  2      aaj saarii raat hogii mulaaqaat ki savere baat karenge to nahiin chalegaa la aa haan chalegaa magar saarii raat meraa dil jalegaa      jalegaa re      naa soenge        pyaare pyaare hoton se pyaare priitam ko pukaaraa hai      ho ho lambii kaalii raaton kii zulfon ko main ne sanwaaraa hai      laa laa       ye dil hai beqaraar       karenge ham pyaar ki savere pyaar karenge to nahiin chalegaa la chalegaa aa chalegaa magar raat bhar dil pe tiir chalegaa      naa soenge   ki chhodo mat chhedo ke dekho pyaar kaa waqt hotaa hai la ho ho premii jaag jaate hai saaraa jab zamaanaa ye sotaa hai ki naa naa naa naa hun hun hun hun ki kudaa ke liye jaao la zaraa saa muskuraao ki savere muskuraaenge to nahiin chalegaa la chalegaa aa chalegaa magar raat bhar dil men gam palegaa      naa soenge         aankhon men basaa ho koii to kisi ko niind aati hai      ho ho niind kyaa hai taubaa aise men taubaa bhii tuut jaatii hai      laa laa       ye aisii chaandanii      naa aaegii kabhii ki savere chaand dekhenge to nahiin chalegaa la chalegaa aa chalegaa magar raat bhar men ye chaand dhalegaa      naa soenge

Title: khilaunaa jaanakar tum to meraa dil tod jaate ho
Lyrics: ho threedots khilaunaa jaanakar tum to meraa dil tod jaate ho  mujhe is haal men kisake sahaare chhod jaate ho  khilauna threedots  mere dil se na lo badalaa zamaane bhar kii baaton ka  thahar jaao suno mehamaan huun main chand raton ka  chale jaanaa abhii se kis liye muh mod jate ho  khilauna threedots  gilaa tumase nahiin koi magar afasos thodaa hai  ke jis gam ne meraa daaman badii mushkil se chhodaa hai  usii gam se meraa phir aaj rishtaa jod jaate ho  khilauna threedots  khudaa ka vaastaa dekar manaaluun dur huun lekin  tumhaaraa raastaa main rok luun majabuur huun lekin  ke main chal bhi nahiin sakataa huun aur tum daud jaate ho  ho khilaunaa threedots

Title: zindagii cigarette kaa dhuaan
Lyrics: zindagii cigarette kaa dhuaan ye dhuaan jaataa hai kahaan yaa kahiin jaataa nahiin ye socho na socho merii jaan  dil ko apane tuu chhotaa na karanaa ye kalii dil kii phir se khilegii chhin gaii hai jo shakti badan kii vahii shakti tujhe phir milegii tere paanv ko chuumegii parbat kii sab chotiyaan sab chotiyaan  phir se daudegaa chalane lagegaa lahuu tan men machalane lagegaa dil pe chhaayaa hai jo ye andheraa ye andheraa bhii dhalane lagegaa tujhe chaand pe chalate dekhegaa saaraa jahaan saaraa jahaan

Title: dil machal rahaa hai rang badal rahaa hai
Lyrics: dil machal rahaa hai rang badal rahaa hai aag dil men lagii hai bujhaa de naa abhii samaa nahiin hai rang jamaa nahiin hai chaar din aur yuunhii bitaa denaa dil machal rahaa threedots  ye berukii kaisii hain chaar din is zindagii ke do din javaanii ke hain vo to aa jaa naa mil ke bitaaen sanam ye dillagii chhodo koii hamen agar hamen dekh legaa to dar hai ki duniyaa ki nazaron men aise hii rusavaa na ho jaaen ham kyaa karegii duniyaa jal maregii duniyaa tuu jalan mere dil kii bujhaa denaa abhii samaa nahiin threedots  aauungii dolii men sajadhaj ke jab ghar piyaa ke kabhii to kar lenaa jii bhar ke puure tuu aramaan jaanejaan dil ke sabhii dekho ye tanhaaii jo hamen phir milegii tuu lag jaa gale se uthaa hai muhabbat kaa tuufaan dil men abhii tuu maan jaa sainyaa ab chhod de bainyaa jaage aramaan abhii to sulaa de naa dil machal rahaa threedots

Title: chalate chalate yuunhii koii mil gayaa thaa
Lyrics: chalate chalate chalate chalate yuunhii koi mil gayaa thaa yuunhii koi mil gayaa thaa sare raah chalate chalate sare raah chalate chalate vahiin thamake rah gai hai vahiin thamake rah gai hai merii raat dhalate dhalate merii raat dhalate dhalate  jo kahii gai hai mujhase jo kahii gai hai mujhase vo zamaanaa kah rahaa hai vo zamaanaa kah rahaa hai ke fasaanaa ke fasaanaa ban gai hai ke fasaanaa ban gai hai merii baat talate talate merii baat talate talate  yuunhii koi mil gayaa thaa yuunhii koi mil gayaa thaa sare raah chalate chalate sareraah chalate chalate threedots  shabeintazaar aakhir shabeintazaar aakhir kabhii hogii muqtasar bhii kabhii hogii muqtasar bhii ye chiraag ye chiraag bujh rahe hain ye chiraag bujh rahe hain mere saath jalate jalate mere saath jalate jalate  ye chiraag bujh rahe hain ye chiraag bujh rahe hain  3 mere saath jalate jalate mere saath jalate jalate  yuunhii koi mil gayaa thaa yuunhii koi mil gayaa thaa sareraah chalate chalate sareraah chalate chalate threedots

Title: mere dil men aaj kyaa hai tuu kahe to main bataa duun
Lyrics: mere dil men aaj kyaa hai tuu kahe to main bataa duun terii zulf phir savaaruun terii maang phir sajaa duun mere dil men threedots  mujhe devataa banaakar terii chaahaton ne puujaa  2 meraa pyaar kah rahaa hai main tujhe khudaa banaa duun terii zulf phir threedots  koi dhuundhne bhii aae to hamen naa dhuundh paae  2 tuu mujhe kahiin chhupaa de main tujhe kahiin chhupaa duun terii zulf phir threedots  mere baazuon me aakar teraa dard chain paae  2 tere gesuon me chhupakar main jahaan ke gam bhulaa duun terii zulf phir threedots

Title: koii maane yaa na maane jo kal tak the anjaane
Lyrics: ki  koii maane yaa na maane jo kal tak the anjaane      vo aaj hamen jaan se bhii pyaare ho gaye aa  koii maane yaa na maane   threedots  ki  ab to hamako ek hii sapanaa puuraa karanaa hai      janam janam kaa saath tumhaarii maang men bharanaa hai aa  jis din se tumako jaanaa hamane qisamat ko maanaa      tumhaaraa hii honaa thaa tumhaare ho gaye      koii maane yaa na maane   threedots       aise na dekho hans kar hamako kuchh ho jaataa hai      tan par qaabuu rakhate hain to man kho jaataa hai ki  dil se jab dil milataa hai to ham se kyaa pardaa hai      jab aankhon hii aankhon men ishaare ho gaye      koii maane yaa na maane   threedots       aankhon men dore gaalon pe laalii honthon pe phuul khile aa  jitanaa bhii dekhuun dil nahiin bharataa tum ham khuub mile ki  ye kaalii kaalii zulfen ye gorii gorii baahen      kitane saare jiine ke sahaare ho gaye do  koii maane yaa na maane   threedots

Title: matalab nikal gayaa hai to pahachaanate nahiin
Lyrics: matalab nikal gayaa hai to pahachaanate nahiin yuun jaa rahe hain jaise hamen jaanate nahiin  apanii garaz thii jab to lipatanaa qabuul thaa baahon ke daayare men simatanaa qabuul thaa ab ham manaa rahe hain magar maanate nahiin  hamane tumhen pasand kiyaa kyaa buraa kiyaa rutabaa hii kuchh baland kiyaa kyaa buraa kiyaa har ik galii kii kaak to ham chhaanate nahiin  munh pher kar na jaao hamaare qariib se milataa hai koii chaahane vaalaa nasiib se is tarah aashiqon pe kamaan taanate nahiin

Title: ham premii prem karanaa jaanen
Lyrics: ham premii prem karanaa jaanen kahen na dil kii baat sadaa chup rahanaa jaanen ham premii prem karanaa jaanen pyaar ke dushman ko hazaaron men pahachaanen ham premii threedots  apanon se jab thes koii lag jaatii hai himmat apanii aur bhii badh jaatii hai ye mat bhuulo aise hii diivaanon ke pairon men zanjiir bhii pad jaatii hai diivaane zanjiir se kyaa daranaa jaanen ham premii threedots  mujarim ko paradaa chhupaa naa paaegaa chingaarii ke khel men jal jaaegaa jalane vaalaa aag bhii lagaa sakataa hai ye to usakaa vaar hii batalaaegaa ham to jisakaa vaar usii par dharanaa jaanen ham premii threedots  aapas men takaraanaa kaisaa gaao milakar saath mere mere lie to ho tum donon jaise ye do haath mere aapake qadamon ke jaisaa duniyaa men kahaan aaraam koii aapakii chhaayaa hai ham pe to kar jaaenge kaam koii ham matavaale pyaar men jiinaamaranaa jaanen ham premii threedots

Title: banaa ke kyuun bigaadaa re bigaadaa re nasiibaa
Lyrics: banaa ke kyuun bigaadaa re bigaadaa re nasiibaa uupar vale 2  jo tujhako manzuur nahiin thaa phuul khilen is pyaar ke phir kyon tuune in aankhon ko rang dikhaae bahaar ke aas bandhaa ke pyaar jataa ke bigaadaa re nasiibaa uupar vale 2 banaa ke kyuun threedots  paap kare insaan agar to vo paapii kahalaataa hai tuune bhii ye paap kiyaa phir kaise kahuun tuu daataa haii raah dikhaa ke raah pe laa ke bigaadaa re nasiibaa uupar vale 2 banaa ke kyuun threedots

Title: meraa antar ek mandir hai teraa
Lyrics: meraa antar ek mandir hai teraa hai teraa piiyaa meraa jiivan terii puujaa  souun yaa main jaaguun subah aur shaam palpal chhin tujh se tujhako maanguun paake tujhe apanaa banaake tujhako hii lautaa duun teraa antar ek mandir hai teraa  pyaar teraa  raam jaane phir bhii kyon hai jiivan suunaa suunaa kaise kahuun kaise kaise dekhuun main koii sapanaa teraa antar ek mandir hai teraa

Title: jiinaa yahaan maranaa yahaan
Lyrics: jiinaa yahaan maranaa yahaan isake sivaa jaanaa kahaan jii chaahe jab hamako aavaaz do ham hain vahiin ham the jahaan jiinaa yahaan maranaa yahaan   threedots  kal khel men ham hon na hon gardish men taare rahenge sadaa bhuuloge tum bhuulenge vo par ham tumhaare rahenge sadaa honge yahiin apane nishaan isake sivaa jaanaa kahaan jiinaa yahaan maranaa yahaan   threedots  ye meraa giit jiivan sangiit kal bhii koii doharaayegaa jag ko hansaane baharuupiyaa ruup badal phir aayegaa svarg yahiin nark yahaan isake sivaa jaanaa kahaan jiinaa yahaan maranaa yahaan   threedots

Lyrics: ko 	khattaamiithaa 4 ki 	ye jiinaa hai anguur kaa daanaa uu 	kuchh kachchaa hai kuchh pakkaa hai ki 	are jitanaa khaayaa miithaa thaa 	jo haath naa aayaa khattaa hai ko 	ye jiinaa hai threedots  ki 	ye ghuumataa pahiyaa gol rupaiyaa haath naa aae re 2 	are main huun isake saath ai saathii saath naa jaae re 2 	are haay haay haay haay haay dil bole 	ki haay dil bole  	haath naa aae to samajho hai sapanaa 	jeb men hai to maal hai apanaa 	ye jiinaa hai threedots  	jii ke dekho jiine vaale yuun bhii jiite hain 2 uu 	din kii chaadar phat jaae to raat ko siite hain 2 ki 	are haay haay haay haay haay dil bole 	ki haay dil bole  uu 	thodaa saa ro ke thodaa saa hansanaa 	thodaa saa rukanaa thodaa saa chalanaa 	ye jiinaa hai threedots

Title: jisane dil ko aansuu bakshe gam jisakaa nazaraanaa hai
Lyrics: jisane dil ko aansuu bakshe gam jisakaa nazaraanaa hai ab tak usakaa dam bharataa hai dil bhii kyaa diiwaanaa hai  sadiyaan guzariin phuul khile the jiivan kii anganaaii men aa jaatii hain yaaden jinakii jaane kyuun tanhaaii men ashkon ke kaamosh labon par aaj bhii ek afasaanaa hai  raaton kaa sannaataa jisako samajhaataa ho raaz koii yuun lagataa hai aaj ki jisako detaa ho aawaaz koii na jaane taqadiir men dil ke kab tak thokar khaanaa hai  is nagarii men majabuuron ko chaahat kaa adhikaar kahaan jis duniyaa kii riit ho nafarat us duniyaa men pyaar kahaan is paagal ko kyaa samajhaauun bholaa hai anajaanaa hai

Lyrics: ham na kabhii honge judaa maut hamen aaye to kyaa  2  phir janam lenge ham  2 ho ho ham na kabhii honge judaa maut hamen aaye to kyaa  phir janam lenge ham  2  ho o ho ho ho ho ho o ho ho ho ho  ek hai jaan do badan ek mahak do chaman ho ek hai jaan do badan ek mahak do chaman siitaa huun main raam kii raadhaa huun main shyaam kii ho ho ham na kabhii honge judaa maut hamen aaye to kyaa  phir janam lenge ham  2  pahale bhii the saathii ham aaj bhii teraa saath hai ho pahale bhii the saathii ham aaj bhii teraa saath hai ek do janam kuchh nahiin  sadiyon kii ye baat hai ho ho ham na kabhii honge judaa maut hamen aaye to kyaa  phir janam lenge ham  2  ho o ho ho ho ho

Title: sajanaa re kyuun bhiige tore nain
Lyrics: sajanaa rea kyuun bhiige tore nain2 tod naa apane sundar sapane badalenge din raina kyuun bhiige tore nain sajanaa re kyuun bhiige tore nain  tere pyaar kii kaatir sajanaaa aaaa tere pyaar kii kaatir sajanaa vaaruungii main tan man apanaa main huun terii prem pujaaran tuu meraa sukh chaina kyuun bhiige tore nain sajanaa re kyuun bhiige tore nain  laakh ho gam kaa ghor andheraaa aaaa sajanaa re sajanaa hoa hoa sajanaaa sajanaaa re laakh ho gam kaa ghor andheraa hogaa ik din prem saveraa mit jaaenge ye dukh saare paaegaa man chaina kyuun bhiige tore nain tod naa apane sundar sapane badalenge din raina kyuun bhiige tore nain sajanaa re kyuun bhiige tore nain

Title: baagon men bahaar aaii  honthon pe pukaar aaii
Lyrics: lataa o o o bakshii oo o oo  bakshii baagon men bahaar aaii honthon pe pukaar aaii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa merii raanii lataa rut beqaraar aaii rut beqaraar aaii dolii men sawaar aaii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa mere raajaa bakshii baagon men bahaar aaii honthon pe pukaar aaii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa merii raanii  bakshii phuulon kii galii men aaiin bhanvaron kii toliyaan bhanvaron kii toliyaan diye se patangaa khele aankhmichauliyaan bole aisii boliyaan ki pyaar jaagaa jag so gayaa lataa rut beqaraar aaii dolii men sawaar aaii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa mere raajaa bakshii baagon men bahaar aaii  lataa sapanaa to sapanon kii baat hai pyaar men baat hai pyaar men niind nahiin aatii sainyaa tere intazaar men hoke beqaraar tujhe dhuundhuun main tuu kahaan kho gayaa bakshii baagon men bahaar aaii honthon pe pukaar aaii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa merii raanii lataa aajaa mere raajaa  bakshii lambiilambii baaten chheden chhotiisii raat men chhotiisii raat men lataa saarii baaten kaisii hongii ik mulaaqaat men ek hii baat men lo dekh lo saveraa ho gayaa bakshii baagon men bahaar aaii honthon pe pukaar aaii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa merii raanii lataa rut beqaraar aaii dolii men sawaar aaii aajaa aajaa aajaa aajaa mere raajaa bakshii aajaa merii raanii lataa aajaa mere raajaa

Title: jab ek kazaa se guzaro to ik aur kazaa mil jaatii hai
Lyrics: jab ek kazaa se guzaro to ik aur kazaa mil jaatii hai marane kii ghadii milatii hai agar jiine kii razaa mil jaatii hai jab ek kazaa se threedots  is dard ke bahate dariyaa men har gam hai maraham koii nahiin har dard kaa iisaa milataa hai iisaa kii mariyam koii nahiin saanson kii ijaazat milatii nahiin jiine kii sazaa mil jaatii hai jab ek kazaa se threedots  main vaqt kaa muzarim huun lekin is vaqt ne kyaa insaaf kiyaa jab tak jiite ho jalate raho jal jaao to kahanaa maaf kiyaa jal jaae zaraa sii chingaarii to aur havaa mil jaatii hai jab ek kazaa se threedots
