Title: ham ko to jaan se pyaarii hain tumhaarii aankhen
Lyrics: ham ko to jaan se pyaarii hain tumhaarii aankhen haay kaajal bharii madahosh ye pyaarii aankhen  mast aankhen hain ke gaate hue mayakhaane hain mast aankhen hain ke chhalke hue paimaane hain hamane dekhii nahiin aisii to kanvaarii aankhen haay kaajal bharii madahosh ye pyaarii aankhen ham ko to jaan se threedots  roshanii chaand men suuraj men hain jab tak kaayam jyot roshan rahe aankhon men tumhaarii har dam ye duaa hai ki salaamat rahe pyaarii aankhen haay kaajal bharii madahosh ye pyaarii aankhen ham ko to jaan se threedots

Title: yaar hamaarii baat suno aisaa ik insaan chuno
Lyrics: yaar hamaarii baat suno aisaa ik insaan chuno jisane paap naa kiyaa ho jo paapii naa ho 2  koii hai chaalaak aadamii koii siidhaasaadaa 2 hamamen se har ek hai paapii thodaa koii zyaadaa ho koii maan gayaa re koii ruuth gayaa ho koii pakadaa gayaa koii chhuut gayaa yaar hamaarii baat suno aisaa ik beiimaan chuno ho jisane paap naa threedots  is paapan ko aaj sazaa denge milakar ham saare 2 lekin jo paapii na ho vo pahalaa patthar maare ho pahale apane man saaf karo re phir auron kaa insaaf karo yaar hamaarii baat suno aisaa ik naadaan chuno ho jisane paap naa threedots

Title: chain se hamako kabhii aapane jiine naa diyaa
Film: praan jaaye par vachan na jaaye
Lyrics: chain se hamako kabhii aapane jiine naa diyaa zahar bhii chaahaa agar piinaa to piine naa diyaa chain se hamako kabhii  chaand ke rath men raat kii dulhan jab jab aaegii yaad hamaarii aapake dil ko tarasaa jaaegii aapane jo hai diyaa vo to kisiine naa diyaa zahar bhii chaahaa agar piinaa to piine naa diyaa chain se threedots  aapakaa gam jo is dil men dinraat agar hogaa sochake ye dam ghutataa hai phir kaise guzar hogaa kaash naa hotii apanii judaai maut hii aa jaatii koi bahaane chain hamaarii ruuh to paa jaatii ik pal hansanaa kabhii dil kii lagii ne naa diyaa zahar bhii chaahaa agar piinaa to piine naa diyaa

Title: tere kuuche men teraa diivaanaa aaj dil kho baithaa
Lyrics: tere kuuche men teraa diivaanaa aaj dil kho baithaa  2  teraa diivaanaa huun inkaar nahiin kaise kah duun ke mujhe pyaar nahiin kuchh sharaarat terii aankhon kii bhii hai main akelaa hii gunahagaar nahiin  tuune maangaa to  2 diyaa nazaraanaa teraa diivaanaa threedots  tuu nahiin hai to adhuuraa saa nazar aataa huun aaj apane men bahut terii kamii paataa huun mujhako aavaaraa samajhate hain tere gaanv ke log terii sakhiyon men main badanaam huaa jaataa huun  har zubaan par hai  2 meraa afasaanaa teraa diivaanaa threedots  muskaraane kii adaa bhii qaatil sar jhukaane kii adaa bhii qaatil ishq kii baanhon men aateaate laut jaane kii adaa bhii qaatil  kaise qaatil se  2 huaa yaaraanaa teraa diivaanaa threedots

Title: main jat yamalaa pagalaa diivaanaa
Lyrics: main jat yamalaa pagalaa diivaanaa 2 o rabbaa ittii sii baat naa jaanaa ke ke ke o mainnuu pyaar karatii hai saade utte o maradii hai 2  usane to kahaa har baat ko ishaare men diyaa bhii jalaa ke rakhaa raaton ko chaubaare men reshamii dupattaa phenkaa piing ke hulaare men mele men akele biich baazaar saare men kaun saa banaayaa na  bahaanaa  3 main jat yamalaa threedots  aisaa nahiin hotaa to vo aise sharamaatii naa mujhe aate dekh sadak se bhaag jaatii naa zulfon ke ghuunghat men mukhadaa chhupaatii naa chhotii sii umar men vo jaan ko lagaatii naa prem kaa rog  puraanaa  2 main jat yamalaa threedots

Title: koii roko naa diivaane ko man machal rahaa
Lyrics: koii roko naa diivaane ko man machal rahaa kuchh gaane ko 2  ye bhiigaabhiigaa mausam ye bhiigiibhiigii raahen chale do ham raahii baanhon men daale baahen to phuulon ne khil ke kahaa ye dil se haan din suhaanaa mausam salonaa daaman se baandh lo pyaaraa samaan koii roko naa threedots  umar ke safar men jise jo yahaan bhaae usii ke sapanon men ye man rang jaae to rangon men priit ke range rangiilaa gaa le taraanaa jo ye rasiilaa alabelaa giit vo bhuule kahaan koii roko naa threedots

Title: madabharii ye hawaaen paas aaen
Lyrics: madabharii ye hawaaen paas aaen naam lekar mujhako ye bulaaen madabharii ye hawaaen   mainne raaton se kar lii dostii taaron ke liye aur churaake liyaa mainne ye din bahaaron ke liye ai zamiin aasamaan mujhako do duaaen madabharii ye hawaaen   mainne laharon kii baanhen thaamakar dhuundhe hain bhanvar saahilon pe kisii ajanabii kii talaashii hai dagar kaash lekar use laharen laut aaen madabharii ye hawaaen   meraa aanchal pakadke pyaar se kahatii hai havaa chal jidhar main chaluun jaa milegaa unhiin se raastaa jinase manzil mile unase jod raahen madabharii ye hawaaen

Title: sun niitaa main tere pyaar ke giit
Lyrics: sun niitaa  sun niitaa main tere pyaar ke giit gaane lagaa huun mahafil ko anjaane afasaane sunaane lagaa huun   2  o tuune mujhe kabhii dil diyaa mainne tujhe kabhii dil diyaa kyaa yaad nahiin are tuune mujhe kabhii dil diyaa mainne tujhe kabhii dil diyaa kyaa yaad nahiin guzarii huii wo raaten terii bhuulii huii wo baaten terii tujhako yaad dilaane lagaa huun e sun niitaa main tere pyaar ke giit gaane lagaa huun mahafil ko anjaane afasaane sunaane lagaa huun  e tujhako nayaa sanam mil gayaa mujhako nayaa ye gam mil gayaa ye kuub huaa tujhako nayaa sanam mil gayaa mujhako nayaa ye gam mil gayaa ye kuub huaa sharmaane ghabaraane lagii  tuu uthakar kyon jaane lagii mahafil se main jaane lagaa huun e sun niitaa main tere pyaar ke giit gaane lagaa huun mahafil ko anjaane afasaane sunaane lagaa huun

Title: ho ho main jahaan chalaa jaauun  main banaphuul
Lyrics: ho ho main jahaan chalaa jaauun 2 bahaar chalii aae ho mahak jaae raahon kii dhuul main banaphuul ban kaa phuul 2  bairii badaa zamaanaa kadar merii naa jaanaa 2 kisii kii bhii aankhon ne mujhe nahiin pahachaanaa duniyaa gaii mujhako bhuul main banaphuul threedots  phiruun re main banajaaraa dagardagar aavaaraa 2 kisii dilavaale kaa dhuundhuun main sahaaraa mujhe koii kar le qubuul main banaphuul threedots

Title: ham qashmqashegam se guzar kyon nahiin jaate
Lyrics: ham qashmqashegam se guzar kyon nahiin jaate maranaa to baharhaal hai mar kyon nahiin jaate ham qashmqashegam threedots  ye vaqt ke haathon men chamakate hue kanzar ik saath kaleje men utar kyon nahiin jaate ham qashmqashegam threedots  bahake hue qadamon pe ye saanson ke janaaze aakir kisii manzil pe thahar kyon nahiin jaate ham qashmqashegam threedots  sochaa hii nahiin thaa kabhii yah haal bhii hogaa ham apanii hii tasviir se dar kyon nahiin jaate ham qashmqashegam threedots

Title: yaadon men vo sapanon men hai jaaen kahaan
Lyrics: yaadon men vo sapanon men hai jaaen kahaan dhadakan kaa bandhan to dhadakan se hai saanson se huun kaise judaa apanon ko duun main kaise bhulaa yaadon men vo threedots  ye phuul ye kaliyaan sabhii rok rahiin raahen merii ye miit ye sakhiyaan sabhii dhuundh rahiin nigaahen merii har mod par ek sapanaa khadaa jaanaa hai mushkil meraa yaadon men vo threedots  nainaa mere ansuan bhare puuchh rahe chalii hai kahaan bahatii nadii kahane lagii teraa to hai ye hii jahaan har mod par koii apanaa khadaa dekhuun main mud ke jahaan yaadon men vo threedots

Title: meraa padhane men nahiin laage dil
Lyrics: meraa padhane men nahiin laage dil kyuun meraa padhane men nahiin laage dil dil pe kyaa pad gayii mushkil huun are raat bhii suunii suunii laage are din bhii suunaa suunaa laage koii ye to bataa de mujhe wo to nahiin ho gayaa 2 meraa padhane men nahiin laage dil ho  o baithe baithe man muskaaye 2 main na jaanuun wo kyon yaad aaye 2 kisase baaten karatii huun main 2 chupake chupake hansatii huun koii ye to bataa de  mujhe wo to nahiin ho gayaa 2 meraa padhane men nahiin laage dil ho  o dil men kyaa hai likh nahiin paauun 2 kat likhuun to use kaise pahunchaauun 2 paas bhii usake jaa na sakuun main 2 duur bhii usase rah na sakuun koii ye to bataa de mujhe wo to nahiin ho gayaa 2 meraa padhane men nahiin laage dil ho

Title: sabake rahate lagataa hai aise koii nahiin hai meraa
Lyrics: sabake rahate lagataa hai aise koii nahiin hai meraa 2 suuraj ko chhuune nikalaa to aayaa haath andheraa koii nahiin hai meraa 2 sabake rahate threedots  merii qismat men hai thokar yuun to bahut hain sahaare 2 mere dil kaa diip bujhaa to phir kyaa chaandsitaare  chandaa vaalii raat bhii kaalii  2 kaalaa hai meraa saveraa koii nahiin hai meraa 2 sabake rahate threedots  jaane kahaan le ke chalii hai mujhako samay kii dhaaraa 2  tuutii naiyaa bichhade khivaiyaa  2 tuufaanon ne gheraa koii nahiin hai meraa 2 sabake rahate threedots

Title: merii pyaarii bahaniyaa banegii dulhaniyaa
Lyrics: merii pyaarii bahaniyaa banegii dulhaniyaa sajake aaenge duulhe raajaa o bhaiyaa raajaa bajaaegaa baajaa 2  apane pasiine ko motii kar duungaa motiyon se bahanaa kii maang bhar duungaa aaegii baaraat dekhegii saarii duniyaa honge laakhon men ek duulhe raajaa bhaiyaa raajaa threedots  solah singaar merii bahinaa karegii tiikaa chadhegaa aur haldii lagegii bahanaa ke honthon pe jhuulegii nathaniyaa 2 aur jhuumenge duulhe raajaa bhaiyaa raajaa threedots  sej pe baithegii vo dolii pe chalegii dharatii pe bahanaa raanii paanv na dharegii palakon kii paalakii men bahanaa ko bithaa ke le jaaenge duulhe raajaa bhaiyaa raajaa threedots  sajanaa ke ghar chalii jaaegii jo bahanaa honth hansenge mere roenge ye nainaa rakhiyaa ke roz raanii bahanaa ko bulaauungaa 2 le ke aaenge duulhe raajaa bhaiyaa raajaa threedots

Lyrics: bhanvare kii gunjan hai meraa dil  kabase sanbhaale rakhaa hai dil  tere liye tere liye	2	   		2  mujhe kabase thii pyaar kii justajuu  merii zindagaanii men hai tuu hii tuu	2 main aayaa huun duniyaa men tere liye mere dil men jhuume terii aarzuu  bhanvare kii gunjan hai meraa dil threedots  gagan se bhii uunchaa meraa pyaar hai  tujhii par mituungaa ye iqaraar hai		2 tuu itanaa samajh le mere hamasafar tere pyaar se meraa sansaar hai bhanvare kii gunjan hai meraa dil threedots

Title: main ek chor tuu merii raanii
Lyrics: ki main ek chor tuu merii raanii	 2     choriichorii le chalaa      main tumako tumase hii churaake     main ek chor tuu merii raanii	 2  sharmilaa chor nahiin  la tuu meraa raajaa main terii raanii	 2     chal padii main saath tere     saarii duniyaa ko bhulaake     tuu meraa raajaa main terii raanii     tuu meraa raajaa threedots  la ham donon me dekhaa hai ek sapanaa      kahiin pe chhotaa sa ek ghar hai apanaa	 2      o othreedots  ki aangan men utarii hain chaandanii raaten     ham baithe karate hain prem kii baaten     ye baaten ye raaten bhuul jaaen ham     to hamen yaad dilaanaa ho bhuul na jaanaa     sharmilaa kyaa     main ek chor tuu merii raanii     choriichorii threedots  ki kismat ne to hamako dukh hii baante      apane raste men bikharaae kaante	2  la ho hamane sajaaii pyaar se apanii gaiyaan     kaante chunchun ke bikharaaii kaliyaan     ye kaliyaan ye galiyaan bhuul jaaen ham     to hamen yaad dilaanaa ho bhuul na jaanaa     raajesh kyaa     tuu meraa raajaa main terii raanii     chal padii threedots  ki main ek chor threedots  la tuu meraa raajaa ki tuu merii raanii

Title: ye raaten naii puraanii aate aatejaate
Lyrics: ye raaten naii puraanii 2 aate aatejaate kahatii hain koii kahaanii ye raaten threedots  aa rahaa hai dekho koii jaa rahaa hai dekho koii sabake dil hain jaagejaage sabakii aankhen khoiikhoii kaamoshii karatii hai baaten ye raaten threedots  kyaa samaan hai jaise kushbuu ud rahii ho kaliyon se guzarii ho nindiyaa men palakon kii galiyon se sundar sapanon kii baaraaten ye raaten threedots  kaun jaane kab chalengii kis taraf se ye havaaen saal bhar to yaad rakhanaa aisaa na ho bhuul jaaen is raat kii mulaakaaten ye raaten threedots

Title: raam kaa naam badanaam na karo
Lyrics: dekho ai divaano tum ye kaam na karo   raam ka naam badanaam na karo badanam na karo    2  raam ne hans kar sab sukh tyage tum sab dukh se dar kar bhaage  krishhn ne karm ki riit sikhai  2 tumane farz se aankh churaaii o raam duhaaii  hare krishhna hare raam chorus jivan naam hai kaam ka aaram na karo  raam ka naam badanam na karo badanam na karo  dekho ai divaano threedots  raam ko samajho krishhn ko jaano nind se jaago o mastaano  jiit lo man ko padh ke giitaa  2 man hii haaraa to kya jitaa to kya jitaa  hare krishhna hare raam chorus jivan ko nashe ka tum gulam na karo  raam ka naam badanam na karo badanam na karo   dekho ai divaano tum ye kaam na karo  raam ka naam badanam na karo badanam na karo

Title: tumako mohabbat ho gaii hai hamase
Lyrics: tumako mohabbat ho gaii hai hamase aur hamako mohabbat ho gaii hai tumase are tumako mohabbat ho gaii hai hamase aur hamako mohabbat ho gaii hai tumase ab to mil jaayegaa wo fasaanaa jisake piichhe hai saaraa zamaanaa gulaabii gaalon kaa na na  reshamii baalon kaa uunhuun gorii baahon kaa na na  nashiilii aankhon kaa na na na jisakii kaatir huaa huun main diiwaanaa diiwaanaa  tumako mohabbat haan haan are tumako mohabbat ho gaii hai hamase aur hamako mohabbat ho gaii hai tumase  diiwaane haan kis baat pe ho batalaao naa diiwaane bolo kis baat pe ho batalaao naa sharamaao naa kyaa hai dil men tumhaare faramaao naa pahale jaldii jaldii baanhon men aa jaao phir samajhaa denge ham aise na ghabaraao kahiin rusawaa na kar de zamaanaa zamaanaa tumako mohabbat  haan tumako mohabbat ho gaii hai hamase aur hamako mohabbat ho gaii hai tumase  ajii chhodo rusawaa to sabhii hain zamaane men 2 kuchh aayegaa kuchh jaayegaa bhii dil lagaane men aane jaane kaa ye raaz bhii samajhaao dil men rahake dekho dil ko naa tadapaao dil kaa aanaa hii dil kaa hai jaanaa o jaanaan tumako mohabbat haan haan are tumako mohabbat ho gaii hai hamase aur hamako mohabbat ho gaii hai tumase  tumako mohabbat ho gaii hai hamase aur hamako mohabbat ho gaii hai tumase

Title: koii saharii baabuu dillaharii baabuu haay re
Lyrics: koii saharii baabuu dillaharii baabuu haay re pag baandh gayaa ghungharuu main chhamchham nachadii phiraan  2  main to chaluun haulehaule phir bhii man dole haay re mere rabbaa main kii karaan  main chhamchham nachadii phiraan koii saharii baabuu dillaharii baabuu haay re pag baandh gayaa ghungharuu main chhamchham nachadii phiraan   panaghat pe main kam jaane lagii natakhat se main sharamaane lagii  2 dhadakan se main ghabaraane lagii darapan se main kataraane lagii man khaaye hichakole aise jaise naiyaa dole haay re mere rabbaa main kii karaan  main chhamchham nachadii phiraan koii saharii baabuu dillaharii baabuu haay re pag baandh gayaa ghungharuu main chhamchham nachadii phiraan   sapanon men chorii se aane lagaa raaton kii nindiyaa churaane lagaa  2 nainon kii dolii bithaa ke mujhe le ke bahut duur jaane lagaa mere ghunghataa ko khole miithemiithe bol bole haay re mere rabbaa main kii karaan  main chhamchham nachadii phiraan koii saharii baabuu dillaharii baabuu haay re pag baandh gayaa ghungharuu main chhamchham nachadii phiraan

Title: jab tak rahe tan men jiyaa
Lyrics: jab tak rahe tan men jiyaa vaadaa rahaa o saathiyaa ham tumhaare liye tum hamaare liye othreedots ham tumhaare liye tum hamaare liye   dhuup lagegii jab jab tumako sajanaa  o daaruungii main aanchal kii chhaiyaan  saanjh pade jab thak jaaoge balamaa vaaruungii main gorii gorii baiyaan doluungii banake chaandanii main tere anganaa jab tak rahe tan men jiyaa vaadaa rahaa o saathiyaa ham tumhaare liye tum hamaare liye   saarii janam ko ab to apane tan pe haan o odhii chunariyaa mainne saajan kii khilii rahe muskaan terii phir chaahe o lut jaaye bagiyaa mere jiivan kii main jiivan chhod duun chhoduun na main terii galiyaan jab tak rahe tan men jiyaa vaadaa rahaa o saathiyaa ham tumhaare liye tum hamaare liye

Title: sultaanaa sultaanaa meraa naam hai sultaanaa
Lyrics: sultaanaa sultaanaa meraa nam hai sultaanaa mere husn kaa har andaaz mastaanaa main pariyon kii raanii   kukuu merii chadhatii javaanii   kukuu jo bhii dekhe ho jaaye diivaanaa   sultaanaa sultaanaa sultaanaa threedots  main chaal chaluun to hiranii ruk jaaye angadaaii luun to bijalii sharamaaye haan main shokh kalii huun   kukuu chanchal titalii huun   kukuu main shokh kalii chanchal titalii har koii detaa hai dil nazaraanaa   sultaanaa sultaanaa sultaanaa threedots  maasuum samajh ke dore mat daalo dil se jaaoge are o dil vaalon haan main aaj yahaan huun   kukuu kal jaane kahaan huun   kukuu main aaj yahaan kal jaane kahaan banjaaron kaa kab koii thikaanaa   sultaanaa  sultaanaa sultaanaa meraa nam hai sultaanaa mere husn kaa har andaaz mastaanaa

Lyrics: nekii terii saath chalegii baabaa saath yahii ek baat chalegii baabaa sang na denge bandhubaraatii sang na denge jiivansaathii nekii terii saath chalegii threedots  ve jinake lie tuune mahal banaae ye na tujhe bahalaaenge bhaaii aag pe ik din so jaaegaa banake dhuaan tuu kho jaaegaa nekii terii saath chalegii threedots  ai yaad men terii aansuu bahaakar jiivan koii na khoegaa ik taaraa tuut gayaa to aasamaan kyon roegaa kaisii baabul kii mamataa matalab kaa har naataa nekii terii saath chalegii threedots

Lyrics: ek pate kii baat sunaauun sun mere hamajolii sabase achchhii sabase sundar bolii prem kii bolii  ye jiivan sangraam nahiin jiivan hai khel tamaashaa kadave bol na bolo bhaiyaa bolo miithii bhaashaa kadavii baat lage dil par ban ke banduuk kii golii sabase achchhii sabase threedots  kyaa puurab hai kyaa pashchim kyaa uttar dakkhan hai ham sab ek chaman ke panchhii ek hamaaraa gulashan hai sab ek hain to kyon alag banaaen apanii tolii sabase achchhii sabase threedots  ek ke paas zyaadaa hai aur ek ke paas jo kam hai baant len ek baraabar aapas men to phir kyaa gam hai bolo phir kyon phailaaen ham jaakar apanii jholii sabase achchhii sabase threedots

Title: na bole tum na mainne kuchh kahaa
Lyrics: ra na bole tum na mainne kuchh kahaa la magar na jaane aisaa kyon lagaa ra ki dhuup men khilaa hai chaand din men raat ho gaii la ye pyaar kii binaa kahe sunaharii baat ho gaii		2  ra badal rahii hai zindagii badal rahe hain ham koras aa aa aa aa aa aa aa la thirak rahe hain jaane aaj kyon mere kadam ra mere kadam mere kadam koras kisii ko ho na ho magar hamen to hai pataa  na bole tum threedots  ra ghulii sii aaj saanson men kisii kii saans hai la saans hai saans hai     ye kaun aaj dil ke mere aaspaas hai koras aa aa aa aa aa aa aa la ye dhiiredhiire ho rahaa hai pyaar kaa nashaa  na bole tum threedots  ra ye lag rahaa hai saarii ulajhanen sulajh gaiin la sulajh gaiin sulajh gaiin     ye dhadakanon kii baat dhadaken samajh gaiin koras aa aa aa aa aa aa aa  la na boliye kii bolane ko kuchh nahiin rahaa  na bole tum threedots na bole tum threedots

Title: mujhe jaan na kaho merii jaan merii jaan
Lyrics: merii jaan mujhe jaan na kaho merii jaan merii jaan merii jaan mujhe jaan na kaho merii jaan merii jaan merii jaan  jaan na kaho anjaan mujhe  jaan kahaan rahatii hai sadaa     2 anjaane kyaa jaane jaan ke jaae kaun bhalaa merii jaan mujhe jaan na kaho merii jaan threedots  suukhe saavan baras gae kitanii baar in aankhon se do buunden naa barase in bhiigii palakon se merii jaan mujhe jaan na kaho merii jaan   threedots  honth jhuke jab honthon par saans ulajhii ho saanson men   2 do judavaan honthon kii baat kaho aankhon se merii jaan mujhe jaan na kaho merii jaan   threedots

Title: aap yuun faasalon se guzarate rahe
Lyrics: aap yuun faasalon se guzarate rahe dil se kadamon kii aavaaz aatii rahii aahaton se andhere chamakate rahe raat aatii rahii raat jaatii rahii  ho gunagunaatii rahiin merii tanahaaiyaan duur bajatii rahiin kitanii shahanaaiyaan zindagii zindagii ko bulaatii rahii aap yuun faasalon se guzarate rahe dil se kadamon kii aavaaz aatii rahii aap yuunthreedots  kataraa kataraa pighalataa rahaa aasmaan 2 ruuh kii vaadiyon men na jaane kahaan ik nadiithreedots ik nadii dilarubaa giit gaatii rahii aap yuun faasalon se guzarate rahe dil se kadamon kii aavaaz aatii rahii aap yuunthreedots  aap kii garm baahon men kho jaaenge aap kii narm zaanon pe so jaaenge so jaaenge muddaton raat niinden churaatii rahii aap yuun faasalon se guzarate rahe dil se kadamon kii aavaaz aatii rahii aap yuunthreedots

Title: jiivan path pe ek rath ke do pahiye ban chalate jaaen
Lyrics: ye  jiivan path pe ek rath ke do pahiye ban chalate jaaen  2 aa o ho o o o o priit ke bandhan men bandha ke ham donon ek   nagar aaen ye jiivan path pe threedots  ye  jab se teraa pyaar paayaa hai chhaaii hai mastii nigaahon   men  2 aa  sukh mil gayaa swarga kaa mujhako  2      aake sajan terii baahon men  2     janam janam ke saathii ham har janam men yuun hii   muskaaen ye o ho o o o o priit ke bandhan men threedots aa jiivan path pe threedots  aa  ruuthe agar tuu kabhii mujhase puujaa se apanii manaa luun   main  2 ye  jiivan men wo pal na aaye kabhii  2      tujhase kahiin duur jaauun main  2     jidhar jidhar main dekhaa maruun bas tere hii saaye   laharaaye aa o ho o o o o priit ke bandhan men threedots ye jiivan path pe threedots  aa  kal kaa bane sahaaraa jo aayaa hai ghar men wo apanaa  2 ye  dekhaa thaa milake jo hamane  2      puuraa huaa hai wo sapanaa  2 do dekh ke apanii prem nishaanii badhatii jaaen aashaaen     o ho o o o o laa laa laa threedots

Title: saamane ye kaun aayaa dil men huii halachal
Lyrics: saamane ye kaun aayaa dil men huii halachal dekh ke bas ek hii jhalak ho gaye ham paagal baaten mulaaqaaten to hongii ham se bhii vo ham pe khulengii kabhii aaj nahiin to kal  aankhon hii aankhon men  baaton hii baaton men kabhii jaan pahachaan hogii sun lo ye kahaanii hasiinaa ik anajaanii kisii din maharabaan hogii zuu zu zuu zuu zu zuu zuu zu zuu zuu zu zu zu saamane ye kaun aayaa   threedots  rahanaa hai yahaan to donon hain javaan to bhalaa duur kaise rahenge maanaa vo hasiin hai to ham bhii kam nahiin hain vo magaruur kaise rahenge la laa ra la laa ra la laa ra la laa la la saamane ye kaun aayaa   threedots

Title: saathii re bhuul na jaanaa meraa pyaar
Lyrics: saathii re bhuul na jaanaa meraa pyaar 2 merii vafaa kaa ai mere hamadam kar le na aitabaar saathii re threedots  duur kabhii kar de jo majabuurii vah duurii to hogii nazar kii duurii  2 terii duaayen gar saath rahiin aaegii phir se bahaar saathii re threedots  kaash kabhii ye rainaa na biite priit kaa ye paimaanaa kabhii na riite  2 dar hai kahiin aane vaalii sahar le le na dil kaa qaraar saathii re threedots

Title: meraa tujh se hai pahale kaa naataa koii
Lyrics: meraa tujh se hai pahale kaa naataa koii yuun hii nahiin dil lubhaataa koii jaane tuu yaa jaane na maane tuu yaa maane na  dhuaandhuaan thaa vo samaa yahaanvahaan jaane kahaan tuu aur main kahiin mile the pahale dekhaa tujhe to dil ne kahaa jaane tuu yaa jaane na maane tuu yaa maane na  tuu bhii rahii mere lie main bhii rahaa tere lie pahale bhii main tujhe baahon men leke jhuumaa kiyaa aur jhuumaa kiyaa jaane tuu yaa jaane na maane tuu yaa maane na  dekho abhii khonaa nahiin kabhii judaa honaa nahiin ab khel men yuunhii rahenge donon vaadaa rahaa ye is shaama kaa jaane tuu yaa jaane na maane tuu yaa maane na

Lyrics: mu 	pyaar kaa bandhan kuun kaa rishtaa chhuute se naa chhuute do 	dil se dil kii dor bandhii jo tuute se naa tuute 	pyaar kaa bandhan threedots  la 	lage rahen aur bhare rahenge pyaar bhare ye mele 	ho pyaar bhare ye mele mu 	kushiyon kaa jhuulaa jhuulenge bhaaiibahan alabele 	ho bhaaiibahan alabele 	sun le daataa inakaa naataa janamjanam naa chhuute do 	dil se dil kii threedots  mu 	jagamagjagamag aae diivaalii laxmii dhan barasaae 	ho laxmii dhan barasaae la 	rangbirange dhaage lekar raakhii kaa din aae 	ho raakhii kaa din aae 	in dhaagon kaa rang ho gaharaa chhuute se naa chhuute do 	dil se dil kii threedots

Title: chalate chalate mere ye giit yaad rakhanaa
Lyrics: chalate chalate mere ye giit yaad rakhanaa kabhii alavidaa naa kahanaa kabhii alavidaa naa kahanaa rote hansate bas yuunhii tum gunagunaate rahanaa kabhii alavidaa threedots  pyaar karate karate ham tum kahiin kho jaaenge inhii bahaaron ke aanchal men thak ke so jaaenge sapanon ko phir bhii tum yuunhii sajaate rahanaa kabhii alavidaa threedots  biich raah men dilavar bichhad jaaen kahiin ham agar aur suunii sii lage tumhen  jiivan kii ye dagar ham laut aaenge  tum yuunhii bulaate rahanaa kabhii alavidaa threedots  chalate chalate threedots rote hansate threedots  alavidaa to ant hai aur ant kisane dekhaa ye judaaii hii milan hai jo ham ne dekhaa yaadon men aakar tum yuunhii gaate rahanaa kabhii alavidaa threedots

Title: ye kis kaa tasavvur hai ye kis kaa fasaanaa hai
Lyrics: ye kis kaa tasavvur hai ye kis kaa fasaanaa hai jo ashq hain aankhon men tasbiih kaa daanaa hai   aankhon men namii sii hai chupchup se voh baithe hain naazuk sii nigaahon men naazuk saa fasaanaa hai  ye ishq nahiin aasaan itanaa to samajh liije ik aag kaa dariyaa hai aur duub ke jaanaa hai  yaa vo the kafaa ham se yaa ham hain kafaa un se kal un kaa zamaanaa thaa aaj apanaa zamaanaa hai

Title: jab mohabbat javaan hotii hai
Lyrics: jab mohabbat javaan hotii hai har adaa ik jabaan hotii hai tum jahaan pyaar se qadam rakh do vo zamiin aasamaan hotii hai jab mohabbat javaan threedots  gunchegunche men hans rahe ho tum in kyaalon men bas rahe ho tum yuun mere dil men bas rahe ho tum jaise muralii kii taan hotii hai jab mohabbat javaan threedots  kuchh kaho to kahaa nahiin jaataa dard dil kaa sahaa nahiin jaataa bin tumhaare rahaa nahiin jaataa haay mushqil men jaan hotii hai jab mohabbat javaan threedots  halkaahalkaa suruur hotaa hai dil to mastii men chuur hotaa hai baat jo bhii kahii nahiin jaatii vo nazar se bayaan hotii hai jab mohabbat javaan threedots

Title: ek main aur ek tuu
Lyrics: kishor  ek main aur ek tuu donon mile is tarah ho ek main aur ek tuu donon mile is tarah aur jo tan man men ho rahaa hai ye to honaa hii thaa  kyuun nahiin milate hain yaar yaar se de mujhe pyaar kaa javaab pyaar se dhadakanen huii javaan vaqt bhii hai maharabaan phir ye kaisii duuriyaan bolo bolo bolo bolo bolo  aashaa   ek main aur ek tuu donon mile is tarah ho ek main aur ek tuu donon mile is tarah aur jo tan man men ho rahaa hai ye to honaa hii thaa  duuriyaan vaqt aane pe mitaayenge ek din itanaa paas paas aayenge intazaar tab talak beqaraar tab talak yuun hii pyaar tab talak bolo bolo bolo bolo bolo  kishor  ek main aur ek tuu donon mile is tarah ho ek main aur ek tuu donon mile is tarah aur jo tan man men ho rahaa hai ye to honaa hii thaa  aashaa   dillagii ban gayii hai dil kii lagii  kishor   he zindagii naam hai isii kaa zindagii  aashaa   ho khel khel men sanam aa gaye jahaan pe ham rok le vahiin kadam bolo bolo bolo bolo bolo  kishor   ek main aur ek tuu  aashaa   donon mile is tarah  kishor   ek main aur ek tuu  aashaa  donon mile is tarah  kishor  aur jo tan man men ho rahaa hai  aashaa   huun huun huun huun huun huun  kishor  ye to honaa hii thaa  aashaa  ye to honaa hii thaa  kishor  ye to honaa hii thaa

Title: kajaraa lagaake re bindiyaa sajaake
Film: jal bin machhali nritya bin bijalee
Lyrics: kajaraa lagaake re bindiyaa sajaake ho aaii main to aaii re aaii mohe laaii milan dhun piyaa kii laharal kii chaand detii madhur taan ho aaii main to aaii threedots   e tum naa bologe naa bolo naa bolo naa bolo naa bolo  ham sang naa sang naa ham sang naa dologe naa dolo naa dolo naa dolo naa dologe hiss main hiss bhii hiss  boluungii nahiin tum hiss sang doluungii nahiin karuun par main kyaa bas men nahiin jiyaa ho aaii main to aaii re aaii threedots  lo main hii haarii re haarii re haarii re haarii re haarii bhaii tum pe tum pe bhaii tum pe vaarii re main vaarii re vaarii re vaarii re vaarii re hiss e hiss jii hiss ab to bol do naa jaao akhiyaan khol do balam jaago re garavaa laago more ho aaii main to aaii re aaii threedots

Title: teraa jogii aayaa tuu daal de bhixaa pyaar kii
Lyrics: teraa jogii aayaa 2 tuu daal de bhixaa pyaar kii aur lele duaa diladaar kii teraa jogii aayaa threedots  main jaanuun tuu jaane yaa rab jaane 2  hiir bane tuu raanjhaa ban ke terii galii main aauun naam agar ho teraa lailaa main majanuun kahalaauun tere pyaar men patthar khaauun aur mar ke amar ho jaauun teraa jogii aayaa threedots  pyaar ke raahii janamjanam men ruup badal ke aae phir bhii aankhen naa pahachaanen ye to samajh naa paae mere dil ke aramaan gaaen aur tujhako yaad dilaaen teraa jogii aayaa threedots

Title: tum mujhe yuun bhulaa na paaoge
Lyrics: tum mujhe yun bhulaa na paaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa na paaoge jab kabhii bhii sunoge giit mere sang sang tum bhii gunagunaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa naa paaoge ho tum mujhe yun threedots  biitii baaton kaa kuchh kayaal karo kuchh to bolo kuchh hamase baat karo 2 raazedil men tumhen basaauungii main tumhaarii huun maan jaaoge  haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa na paaoge haan tum mujhe yun threedots  merii kaamoshiyon ko samajho tum zindagii aaj men guzaarii hai 2 main mitii huun tumhaarii chaahat men aur kitanaa mujhe mitaaoge  haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa na paaoge tum mujhe yun threedots  dil hii dil men tumhiin se pyaar kiyaa apane jiivan ko bhii nisaar kiyaa 2 kaun tadapaa tumhaarii raahon men jab ye sochoge jaan jaaoge haan tum mujhe yun bhulaa na paaoge tum mujhe yun threedots

Title: falaq se tod ke sitaare  koii nazaraanaa le kar aayaa
Lyrics: falaq se tod ke sitaare dekho log laae hain magar main vo nahiin laayaa jo saare log laae hain  koii nazaraanaa le kar aayaa huun main diivaanaa tere lie aaj chhalakaa hai kushiyon kaa paimaanaa tere lie  sabhii ke dilon ko ye dhadakaa rahaa hai samaan saazedil pe gazal gaa rahaa hai saarii baaten ruk gaii hain sabakii aankhen jhuk gaii hain terii mahafil men aayaa shaayad koii mastaanaa tere lie koii nazaraanaa threedots  tujhe dushmanon kii nazar lag na jaae rahen duur tujhase sadaa gam ke saae gunagunaae tuu hameshaa muskaraae tuu hameshaa gulashan ban jaae ummiidon kaa har ek viiraanaa tere lie koii nazaraanaa threedots

Title: dukh men hii sukh hai chhipaa re
Lyrics: gagan ye samajhe chaand sukhii hai chandaa kahe sitaare  saagar kii laharen ye samajhe hamase sukhii kinaare  o sathi dukh men hii sukh hai chhipaa re threedots  dur ke parvat dur hii rah ke lagate sabako suhaane  paas agar jaakar dekhen to patthar kii chattaane  kaliyaan samajhe chaman sukhii hai chaman kahen re bahaaren  o sathi dukh men hii sukh hai chhipaa re o saathii threedots  bhaiyaa re sathi re bhaiyaa re ho raamaa re  hai raamaa hai raamaa ko  raat andherii threedots hai raamaa ko  raat andherii soche man men hai din men ujiyaaraa  din kii garamii soch rahii hai  hai shiital andhiyaaraa  o sathi hai shiital andhiyaaraa  patajhad samajhe sukhii hai savan  savan kahe angaare  o sathi dukh main hii sukh hai chhipaa re o saathii   o sathi re o bandhu re threedots sathi re bandhu re  nirdhan dhan kii chaah ko lekar firataa maaraa maaraa  dhan vaalon ko chain nahiin  ye kaisii jag kii maayaa  ik duje ko sukhii samajhate sukh ko sabhii pukaare  o sathi dukh men hii sukh hai chhipaa re o saathii threedots

Title: duniyaa o duniyaa teraa javaab nahiin
Lyrics: duniyaa o duniyaa teraa javaab nahiin terii jafaaon kaa bas koi hisaab nahiin  tuu chhaanv hai yaa hai dhuup khabar kisako kyaa hai teraa asalii ruup khabar kisako aaye nazar kaise tuu aansuu hai kvaab nahiin duniyaa o threedots  tere zubaan pe hai zikr sitaaron kaa tere labon pe hai naam bahaaron kaa par tere daaman men kaante hain gulaab nahiin duniyaa o threedots  ye kin khayaalon men kho gaye hain aap kyon kuchh pareshaan se ho gaye hain aap  aapase to mujhako kuchh shiqavaa janaab nahiin duniyaa o threedots

Lyrics: ho sar pe mukut saje mukh pe ujaalaa haath men dhanush gale men pushp maalaa ham daas inake ye svaamii sabake anjaan ham ye antarayaamii shiish jhukaao raamgun gaao bolo jay vishnu ke avataarii  raam jii kii nikalii savaarii raam jii kii liilaa hai nyaarii ko 	raam jii kii nikalii threedots ek taraf laxman ek taraf siitaa biich men jagat ke paalanahaarii ko 	raam jii kii nikalii threedots  dhiire chalaa rath o rath vaale tohe kabar kyaa o bholebhaale ko 	tohe kabar kyaa o bholebhaale ik baar dekho jii naa bharegaa sau baar dekho phir jii karegaa vyaakul pade hain kabase khade hain ko 	vyaakul pade hain kabase khade hain darshan ke pyaase sab narnaarii raam jii kii nikalii threedots ko 	raam jii kii nikalii threedots  chaudah baras kaa vanavaas paayaa maataapitaa kaa vachan nibhaayaa ko 	maataapitaa kaa vachan nibhaayaa dhokhe se har lii raavan ne siitaa raavan ko maaraa lankaa ko jiitaa ko 	raavan ko maaraa lankaa ko jiitaa tabtab ye aae 2 ko 	tabtab ye aae 2 jabjab duniyaa inako pukaarii raam jii kii nikalii threedots ek taraf laxman threedots ko 	raam jii kii nikalii threedots

Title: aaj se pahale aaj se zyaadaa
Lyrics: aaj se pahale aaj se zyaadaa khushii aaj tak nahiin milii itanii suhaanii aisii miithii ghadii aaj tak nahiin milii aaj se pahale   isako sanjog kahen yaa qismat kaa lekhaa ham jo achaanak mile hain manchaahe saathii paake ham sabake chehare dekho to kaise khile hain o taqadiiron ko jod de aisii in taqadiiron ko jod de aisii kadii aaj tak nahiin milii aaj se pahale   sapanaa ho jaae vo puuraa jo hamane dekhaa ye mere dil kii duaa hai ye pal jo biit rahe hain inake nashe men dil meraa gaane lagaa hai o isii khushii ko dhuundh rahe the ham isii khushii ko dhuundh rahe the yahii aaj tak nahiin milii aaj se pahale   dil men tuufaan uthaa hai honthon pe nagamaa aankhon men aansuu khushii ke apanon ke paas pahunchake apane se duurii  aisaa na ho sang kisii ke o  koii kahe naa manzil mujhako yuun koii kahe naa manzil mujhako milii aaj tak nahiin milii aaj se pahale

Title: zindagii hansane gaane ke lie hai pal do pal
Lyrics: zindagii hansane gaane ke lie hai pal do pal ise khonaa nahiin kho ke ronaa nahiin zindagii hansane gaane threedots  tere girane men bhii terii haar nahiin ki tuu aadamii hai avataar nahiin jo ho desh vo bhes banaa pyaare chale jaise kaam chalaa pyaare pyaare tuu gam na kar zindagii hansane gaane threedots  jahaan sach naa chale vahaan jhuuth sahii jahaan haq na mile vahaan luut sahii yahaan chor hain sab koii saadhu nahiin sukh dhuundh le sukh aparaadh nahiin pyaare tuu gam na kar zindagii hansane gaane threedots

Title: kahataa hai jokar saaraa zamaanaa
Lyrics: kahataa hai jokar saaraa zamaanaa aadhii haqiikat aadhaa fasaanaa chashmaa uthaao phir dekho yaaro duniyaa nayii hai cheharaa puraanaa kahataa hai jokar   threedots  dhakke pe dhakkaa rele pe relaa hai bhiid itanii par dil akelaa gam jab sataaye siitii bajaanaa par masakharii se dil na lagaanaa kahataa hai jokar   threedots  apane pe hans ke jag ko hansaayaa ban ke tamaashaa mele men aayaa hindu na muslim puurab na pashchim mazahab hai apanaa hansanaa hansaanaa kahataa hai jokar   threedots

Title: maulaa saliim chishtii aaqaa saliim chishtii
Lyrics: suukhii rut men chhaaii badariyaa chamakii bijuriyaa saath duubo tum bhii sang mere yaa thaamo meraa haath  maulaa saliim chishtii aaqaa saliim chishtii	2 aabaad kar do dil kii duniyaa saliim chishtii	2  jitanii balaayen aaii sab ko gale lagaayaa	2 khuun ho gayaa kalejaa shikavaa na lab pe aayaa 2 har dard ham ne apanaa apane se bhii chhupaayaa har dard ham ne apanaa haa har dard ham ne apanaa apane se bhii chhupaayaa  2 tum se nahiin hai koii pardaa saliim chishtii maulaa saliim chishtii threedots  jaaegaa kaun aake pyaasaa tumhaare dar se	2 kuchh jaam se piienge kuchh maharbaan nazar se 2 kuchh jaam se piienge haa kuchh jaam se piienge kuchh maharbaan nazar se 2     ek pyaalii bhar ke de saaqii maiegulafaam kii ek apane naam pii aur ek allaah naam pii met de puurii merii hasarat dilenaakaam kii dede dede dard men koii suurat aaraam kii ghuunt hii pilaa magar joshetamannaa daal kar ek qataraa de magar qatare men dariyaa daal kar kuchh jaam se piienge kuchh maharbaan nazar se threedots  ye sangedar tumhaaraa todenge apane sar se 2 ye sangedar tumhaaraa haa ye sangedar tumhaaraa todenge apane sar se 2   ye dil agar tumhaaraa tuutaa saliim chishtii	2 maulaa saliim chishtii threedots  is sangedar ke sadaqe is rahaguzar ke sadaqe bhatake hue musaafir manzil pe pahunche aakir ujade hue chaman men ye rangepairahan men sau rang muskuraae sau phuul lailahaae aaii naii bahaaren pahalane lagii phuaaren ghuunghat kii laaj rakhanaa is sar pe taaj rakhanaa is sar pe taaj rakhanaa  aaqaa saliim chishtii maulaa saliim chishtii threedots

Title: chhotii sii umar men lag gayaa rog
Lyrics: chhotii sii umar men lag gayaa rog   chhotii sii umar meneh lag gayaa rog kahate hain log main mar jaaungii ho main mar jaaungii  2  par marane se pahale kuchh karane se pahale le ke teraa naam tujhe badanaam main kar jaauungii ho main mar jaauungii  ho ho  yehe kisii saharii chhorii kii priit nahiin hai baabuu  2 ek banjaaran keh matawaare nainonoh kaa hai jaaduu tuu na jaa merii musakaan pe khel jaauungii main jiijaan pe chhoduungii naa saath 2 aisii kyaa hai baat ke main dar jaauungii  ho main mar jaauungii  chhotii sii umar menhe lag gayaa rog kahate hain log main mar jaaungii ho main mar jaaungii  par marane se pahale kuchh karane se pahale le ke teraa naam tujhe badanaam main kar jaauungii ho main mar jaauungii  ho ho  kab talak rokegaa meraa rastaa laaj kaa paharaa  2 yaad ye rakhanaa tuu sajanaa ye meraa vaadaa thaharaa baabul kii galiyaan chhod ke aauungii chunariyaa odh ke laike umang 2 sainyaan tere sang tere ghar jaauungii  ho main mar jaauungii  chhotii sii umar menhe lag gayaa rog kahate hain log main mar jaaungii ho main mar jaaungii  par marane se pahale kuchh karane se pahale le ke teraa naam tujhe badanaam main kar jaauungii ho main mar jaauungii

Title: gaanv men piipal  paanii men aag lagaae raanii terii javaanii
Lyrics: gaanv men piipal piipal kii chhainyaa chhainyaa men panaghat panaghat men paanii paanii men aag lagaae raanii terii javaanii gaanv men piipal threedots  nikalii nahaa ke gorii taalaab se kuchh aise saavan ke baadalon se nikalaa ho chaand jaise 2 kaanon men jhumake mukhade pe aanchal aankhon men kajaraa paanv men paayal paayal ke giit sunaae o raanii terii javaanii gaanv men piipal threedots  ye ruup hai yaa sholaa ye rang hai ke jaaduu ye nain hain ke jhuule ye zulf hai ki baadal haay teraa kyaa kahanaa dekhe jo nainaa to saarii rainaa jaage ye nainaa nainon se niind churaae o raanii terii javaanii gaanv men piipal threedots

Title: ye kaisaa sur mandir hai
Lyrics: ye kaisaa sur mandir hai jis men sangiit nahiin giit likhe diivaaron pe gaane kii riit nahiin  viinaa terii merii jaise ek kahaanii is ghar men ham donon kii kisii ne qadar na jaanii teraa bhii koii miit nahiin meraa bhii miit nahiin ye kaisaa sur mandir hai threedots  muurat rakh dene se kyaa mandir ban jaataa hai yuun hii padaa rahane se shiishaa patthar ban jaataa hai vo puujaa kaisii puujaa hai jis men priit nahiin ye kaisaa sur mandir hai threedots

Title: o shaam aaii rangon men
Lyrics: o shaam aaii rangon men rangii huii paayalvaayaal mere paanvon men koii baandho naache naii naii  mujhe koii naii chunarii dilaa do mere liye nayaa kanganaa koii laa do ye suune se maathe pe  kare chamcham kumakum ki tum aisii koii bindiyaa lagaa do  ye jaaduu kaisaa hai jaanuun naa  lage mujhe ye to jiivan meraa sonaa sajaa le tuu nainon men  dhiiredhiire are manavaa merii  koii aisa sapanaa salonaa  mere man kii aashaa adhuurii  hogii ik din ye to kahiin puurii kabhii na main bhuuluungii  sangsang tere saathii mere biite ye jo shaam suhaanii

Title: chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii
Lyrics: lataa e he he chhatarii na khol  kishor kyon lataa ud jaayegii  kishor aan  lataa hawaa tez hai kishor kholane de lataa na kishor bhiig jaayenge are baarish tez hai e lataa chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii hawaa tez hai kishor are kholane de he bhiig jaayenge baarish tez hai lataa na na lataa chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii hawaa tez hai kishor e kholane de e bhiig jaayenge are baarish tez hai he he lataa chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii   lataa bhiige bhiige aanchal men bhiigegaa tan lataa tan men hai man aur man men agan  2 kishor aise jo bujhaanii ho man kii agan kishor ambar ke baadalon kaa paanii hai kam lataa he he he kishor o ho ho ho lataa e e he kishor o haa haa lataa chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii hawaa tez hai kishor e kholane de e bhiig jaayenge are baarish tez hai e he lataa chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii  kishor ek baar dekho merii aankhon men sanam kishor pyaar aayegaa to ud jaayegii sharam kishor ho ek baar dekho merii aankhon men sanam kishor pyaar aayegaa to ud jaayegii sharam lataa ho jhukii jhukii aankhon kii tumako qasam lataa mujhako sanbhaalo bahe jaate hain qadam kishor aao zaraa paas to aao a aao na lataa nahiin nahiin lataa chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii hawaa tez hai kishor he kholane de are bhiig jaayenge baarish tez hai e he he lataa chhatarii na khol ud jaayegii lataa aa haa aa haa aa haa aa haa  kishor chhatarii kii chhaayaa men chhupaauungaa tumhen kishor achchhii burii aankhon se bachaauungaa tumhen kishor ho chhatarii kii chhaayaa men chhupaauungaa tumhen kishor achchhii burii aankhon se bachaauungaa tumhen lataa ho itanii sii baat hai kah na paaye dil lataa sochatii huun kaise main bataauungii tumhen lataa itanii sii baat hai kah na paaye dil lataa sochatii huun kaise main bataauungii tumhen kishor kah do na lataa kar intazaar aayegaa wo din thodii der hai kishor kab aayegaa kishor are are kishorlataa are are are are are lataa chhatarii ud gaii lataa chhatarii ud gaii kishor ud jaane de  lataa ho bhiig jaayenge kahaa baarish tez hai  kishor he bhiig jaayenge are baarish tez hai kishor e bhiig jaayenge are baarish tez hai

Lyrics: r  chal shuruu hojaa  ki  uhun uhun khaansataa hai hai haa hai haa galaa thiik karataa hai  saa aa a aa aa aa  r  are  bas bas bas bas  saa pe ruk gayaa  aage badh  ki  re r  re ke aage kya hai  ki  gaa r  are vaah vaah vaah vaah kya gale men taasiir hai ki  ye baat hai  to maa r  chal vaapas aajaa apanii jagah pe  ki  saa re gaa maa  r  aahaa  ki  maa saa re gaa r  vaah vaah  ki  gaa saa re maa  r  oho  ki  maa gaa re saa  r  oh oh oh   ki  saa re gaa maa maa saa re gaa gaa saa re maa maa gaa re saa  r  pa dha pa maa maa pa maa ga ra pa maa maa ga re saa  dono  saa re gaa maa maa saa re gaa gaa saa re maa maa gaa re saa   ki  giit pahale bana tha ya banii thi ye saragam  ek hii saath hua tha do dilon ka ye sangam   2 r  pyaar ka ye taraanaa zamaanaa sun le  saa re gaa maa  dono  saa re gaa maa maa saa re gaa gaa saa re maa maa gaa re saa   ki  jaise dil milaten hain vaise sur khilaten hain dhiime  jaise dil milaten hain vaise sur khilaten hain tej  r  phuul kab giiton ke honthon pe khilaten hain  ki  tuum tanaanaa dhin tanaanaa zamaanaa sun le  r  saa re gaa maa  ki  saa re gaa maa  r  maa saa re gaa ki  gaa saa re maa  r  maa gaa re saa   dono  maa gaa re saa at least 56 times from loud to slow

Title: pardaa hai pardaa hai pardaa hai pardaa
Lyrics: shabaab pe main zaraa sii sharaab phainkuungaa kisii hasiin kii taraf ye gulaab phainkuungaa  pardaa hai pardaa hai pardaa hai pardaa hai  pardaa hai pardaa parde ke piichhe pardaa nashiin hai pardaa nashiin ko bepardaa na kar duun to aqabar meraa naam nahiin hai pardaa hai pardaathreedots  main dekhataa huun jidhar log bhii udhar dekhen kahaan thaharatii hai jaakar merii nazar dekhen mere kvaabon kii shahazaadii main huun aqabar ilaahabaadii main shaayar huun hasiinon kaa main aashiq mahajabiinon kaa teraa daaman na chhoduungaa main har chilman ko toduungaa  na dar zaalim zamaane se adaa se yaa bahaane se zaraa apanii suurat dikhaa de samaa kuubasuurat banaa de nahiin to teraa naam leke tujhe koii ilzaam deke tujhako is mahafil men rusavaa na kar duun to aqabar meraa naam nahiin hai pardaa hai pardaathreedots  kudaa kaa shukr hai chaharaa nazar to aayaa hai hayaa kaa rang nigaahon pe phir bhii chhaayaa hai kisiikii jaan jaatii hai kisiiko sharm aatii hai koii aansuu bahaataa hai to koii muskuraataa hai sataakar is tarah aqsar mazaa lete hain ye dilabar yahii dastuur hai inakaa sitam mashahuur hai inakaa  kafaa hoke chaharaa chhupaa le magar yaad rakh husnavaale jo hai aag terii javaanii meraa pyaar hai sarz paanii main tere gusse ko thandaa na kar duun to aqabar meraa naam nahiin hai pardaa hai pardaathreedots

Title: jo tumako ho pasand vahii baat karenge
Lyrics: jo tumako ho pasand vahii baat karenge tum din ko agar raat kaho raat kagenge jo tumako threedots  chaahenge nibhaaenge saraahenge aap hii ko aankhon men dam hai jab tak dekhenge aap hii ko apanii zubaan se aapake jazabaat kahenge tum din ko agar raat kaho raat kahenge jo tumako ho pasand threedots  dete na aap saath to mar jaate ham kabhii ke puure hue hain aap se aramaan zindagii ke ham zindagii ko aapakii saugaat kahenge tum din ko agar raat kaho raat kahenge jo tumako ho pasand threedots  jo tumako ho pasand threedots

Title: phir kahiin koii phuul khilaa chaahat naa kaho usako
Lyrics: phir kahiin koi phuul khilaa chaahat naa kaho usako     2 phir kahiin koi diip jalaa manzil naa kaho usako phir kahiin threedots  man kaa samundar pyaasaa huaa kyuun kisii se maange duaa    2 laharon kaa lagaa jo melaa tuufaan naa kaho usako phir kahiin threedots  dekhen sab vo sapane khud hii sajaae jo hamane     2 dil unase bahal jaae to raahat naa kaho usako phir kahiin threedots

Title: khaalii pyaalaa dhundhalaa darpan
Lyrics: khaalii pyaalaa dhundhalaa darpan khaalii khaalii man khaalii khaalii man bujhataa suuraj jalataa chandaa patajhaarii saavan patajhaarii saavan khaalii pyaalaa   patte piile kaante phuule registaanii tan raaten suunii piidaa duunii viiraanaa jiivan khaalii pyaalaa   kyaaha  saveraa tapii dupaharii godhuulii nirjan aankhen jaagii soyii siharan khoyaa apanaapan khaalii pyaalaa    pyaalaa chhalakaa ujalaa darpan jagamag man aangan jagamag man aangan  jharii dhuup men suuryamukhii kaa kaanp siharataa tan kaanp siharataa tan barf pighalatii paagal jharane tuut khule bandhan tuut khule bandhan pyaalaa chhalakaa   subah gulaabii alak dupaharii shaam khilaa yauvan laa laa laa  aankhen soyii jaage sapane bhuulaa apanaapan bhuulaa apanaapan pyaalaa chhalakaa

Title: aayaa na hamako pyaar jataanaa
Lyrics: aayaa na hamako pyaar jataanaa pyaar kabhii se tujhe karate hain bholaapan teraa bhaa gayaa hamako saadagii par terii marate hain  jisane hamaare dil ko samajhaa vo ek teraa hii dil hai teraa aanchal bas apanii yahii to manzil hai bholaapan teraa   threedots  suurat achchhii siirat achchhii tuu to ek hai laakhon men kud pe bharosaa badh jaataa hai jab tere saath guzarate hain bholaapan teraa   threedots  ek hii jiivan men to dil kii pyaas bujhaa nahiin paayenge tujhako phir paane ke liye ham agale janam men aayenge pyaar amar hai amar hii rahegaa marane vaale inasaan marate hain bholaapan teraa   threedots

Title: main ek raajaa huun tuu ik raanii hai
Lyrics: main ek raajaa huun tuu ik raanii hai   2 prema nagara kii ye ik sundara prema kahaanii hai main ik raajaa huun threedots  kyaa hotii hai prema kahaanii ye bhii tuu naadaana naa jaanii kitanii pyaarii pyaarii terii  ye naadaanii hai main ik raajaa huunthreedots  premii bhanvare rangaraliyon ke kyaa kahate hain ina kaliyon se main tujhako kaise samajhaauun tuu divaanii hai main ik raajaa huunthreedots  mana meraa ik mahala ho jaise tuu isamen rahatii hai aise jaise siip men motii hai saagara men paanii hai main ik raajaa huunthreedots

Title: merii pyaarii bahaniyaa banegii dulhaniyaa
Lyrics: o o kah do kah do haan tum jo kah do pyaar kii har tamannaa javaan kar len  o o kah do kah do haan tum jo kah do pyar kaa ham tarannum javaan kar len 2 o kah do threedots  tum to ho sholaabadan tum bhii kuchh kam nahiin tum ho gul main chaman ab koii gam nahiin isase pahale ki bijalii gire pyaar par 2 pyaar kaa ham muqaddar javaan kar len 2 o kah do threedots  paas aae ho kyon terii aavaaz pe 2 dil diyaa hamako kyuun tere andaaz pe ye adaaen ye shokii sharaarat bharii pyaar kii sharaarat ham javaan kar len 2 o kah do threedots  kaun hain ham tere dil ke mehamaan ho 2 nahiin qaabil tere phir bhii aramaan ho ab to tere binaa jiinaa mushqil huaa pyaar kaa ham dastuur javaan kar len 2 o kah do threedots

Title: tuu jahaan kahiin bhii jaae
Lyrics: sthaayii nuurajahaan tuu jahaan kahiin bhii jaae meraa pyaar yaad rakhanaa 2 tere dam se hai salaamat ye bahaar yaad rakhanaa tuu jahaan kahiin bhii jaae meraa pyaar yaad rakhanaa  antaraa 1 mehadii hasan mere dil men bas rahii hai terii aarazuu kii kushabuu 2 kisii aur kaa jahaan men na chalegaa mujh pe jaaduu tere naam par mitegaa dilezaar yaad rakhanaa  nuu tuu jahaan kahiin bhii jaae meraa pyaar yaad rakhanaa  antaraa 2 nuu tujhe chhiin le na mujhase kisii mod par zamaanaa 2 me kabhii bhuul kar bhii dil me ye kayaal tum na laanaa nuu mere baag men hai tujhase ye bahaar yaad rakhanaa  tuu jahaan kahiin bhii jaae meraa pyaar yaad rakhanaa  antaraa 3 nuu tere baad kyaa kahuungii dilemubtilaa se apane 2 me jo phiruun kabhii wafaa se to phiruun kudaa se apane mere pyaar kii nishaanii ye singaar yaad rakhanaa  nuu tuu jahaan kahiin bhii jaae meraa pyaar yaad rakhanaa tere dam se hai salaamat ye bahaar yaad rakhanaa tuu jahaan kahiin bhii jaae meraa pyaar yaad rakhanaa

Title: dil ko dekho cheharaa na dekho chehare ne laakhon ko luutaa
Lyrics: dil ko dekho cheharaa na dekho chehare ne laakhon ko luutaa haan dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa  dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa  jo apanii sachchii suurat dikhaa den aise nahiin duniyaavaale sab ne hii apane cheharon ke aage jhuuth ke parade hain daale miithii hothon pe baat dil men rahatii hai khaat dil kaa honthon se naataa hii jhuuthaa haan dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa  dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa  tan se to aazaad ham ho gaye hain man se gaii naa gulaamii paradeshii bhaashhaa aur veshh ko hii dete hain ab tak salaamii bhuulakar apanaa rang siikhe auron kaa dhang apanepan kaa chalan hamase chhuutaa haan dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa  marzii tumhaarii tum kuchh bhii samajho jo ham hain vo ham hii jaane rang ruup dekhen to dekhen zamaanaa ham pyaar ke hain divaane puuje dhan ko sansaar hame man se hai pyaar dhan kisii baat par hamase ruuthaa haan dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa dil sachchaa aur cheharaa jhuuthaa

Title: ye mulaaqaat ik bahaanaa hai
Lyrics: ye mulaaqaat ik bahaanaa hai pyaar kaa silasilaa puraanaa hai  dhadakane dhadakanon men kho jaayen dil ko dil ke qariib laanaa hai  kvaab to kaanch se bhii naazuk hai tuutane se inhen bachaanaa hai  man meraa pyaar kaa shivaalaa hai aap ko devataa banaanaa hai  main huun apane sanam ke baahon men mere qadamon tale zamaanaa hai

Title: kitane raanjhe tujhe dekh ke bairaagii ban gaye
Lyrics: kitane raanjhe tujhe dekh ke bairaagii ban gaye bairaagii dekh ke tujhe anuraagii ban gaye anuraagii ban gaye ban gaye re kitane raanjhe threedots  honthon pe aag liye saanson men raag liye kisako dasane tuu chalii zulfon ke naag liye 2 ho a a kitane raanjhe tujhe threedots  rab ka nazaaraa badan pyaar se pyaaraa badan dil kahe jiivan dekar le luun tumhaaraa badan 2 ho a a kitane raanjhe tujhe threedots

Title: gore rang pe naa itanaa gumaan kar
Lyrics: ki 	gore rang pe naa itanaa gumaan kar 2 	goraa rang do din men dhal jaaegaa la 	main shamaa huun tuu hai paravaanaa 2 	mujhase pahale tuu jal jaaegaa ki 	gore rang pe threedots  ki 	ruup mit jaataa hai ye pyaar ai diladaar nahiin mitataa la 	ho ho phuul murajhaane se gulazaar o sarakaar nahiin mitataa ki 	kyaa baat kahii hai hoy taubaa 2 	ye dil beiimaan machal jaaegaa 	gore rang pe threedots  ki 	o o aapako hai aisaa inkaar to ye pyaar yahiin chhodo la 	o o pyaar kaa mausam hai bekaar kii takaraar yahiin chhodo ki 	haathon men haath zaraa dedo 2 	baaton men vaqt nikal jaaegaa 	gore rang pe threedots  la 	o o main tujhe kar daaluun masaruur nashe men chuur to maanoge ki 	o o tumase main ho jaauun kuchh duur e magaruur ho maanoge la 	tuu laakh bachaa mujhase daaman 2 	ye husn kaa jaaduu chal jaaegaa ki 	gore rang pe threedots

Title: agar dilabar kii rusvaaii hamen manzuur ho jaaye
Lyrics: agar dilabar kii rusvaaii hamen manzuur ho jaaye sanam tuu bevafaa ke naam se mashhuur ho jaaye  2 agar dilbar kii threedots ho jaaye sanam threedots ho jaaye  hamen fursat nahiin milatii  2 kabhii aansuu bahaane se kaii gam paas aa baithe 2 tere ek duur jaane se  2 agar tuu paas aa jaaye to har gam duur ho jaaye  2 sanam tuu threedots ho jaaye  vafaa kaa vaastaa dekar  2 mohabbat aaj rotii hai na aise khel is dil se  2 ye nazuk chiiz hotii hai  2 zaraa sii thes lag jaaye to shiishaa chuur ho jaaye 2 sanam tuu threedots ho jaaye  tere rangiin honthon ko  2 kamal kahane se darate hain terii is berukii pe ham  2 gazal kahane se darate hain  2 kahiin aisaa na ho tuu aur bhii magaruur ho jaaye  2  agar dilbar ki three dots ho jaaye sanam tuu threedots ho jaaye

Title: tore jaisii chhorii hotii koii gaanv maan hamaare
Lyrics: tore jaisii chhorii hotii koii gaanv maan hamaare to sahar ham naahiin aate 2 mil jaataa kahiin gaanv maa ii rang bharaa pyaar to sahar ham naahiin aate 2  dekh sahar maan ruup kii garmii aavan lagaa pasiinaa haayhaay kisii ne bholaa jaan ke luutaa kisii ne manavaa chhiinaa phir bhii ham ii baat ke khush hain jiinaa ii hai jiinaa bhaiyaa jiinaa ii hai jiinaa o jahaan sunii jaae aise jo kunvaaron kii pukaar to sahar ham threedots  nainaa phisalaii cheharon se juun giirii sadak se paanv haay haay raamqasam ab chhod sahar ham kabahuun na jaiibe gaanv jahaan naa ii ankhiyan kii madiraa naa julphan kii chhaanv bhaiyaa naa julphan kii chhaanv ho aisii goriigorii baanhon ke mile jo hote haar to sahar ham threedots

Title: mujh ko gamehaalaat
Lyrics: mujh ko gamehaalaat kii tasviir samajhnaa is kat ko merii aakirii tahariir samajhnaa  afsaanaa gamedil kaa tujhe kaise sunaauun tuutaa jo sitam dil pe tujhe kaise bataauun is payaar ko bigadii huii taqadiir samajhnaa  chaahaa to buhat main ne teraa saath na chhute haathon se mere teraa kabhii haath na chhute is khwaab ko qisamat kii taabiir samajhnaa

Title: jaanaa hai hamen to jahaan qaraar mile
Lyrics: la  jaanaa hai hamen to jahaan qaraar mile ki  luutenge raahon men jahaan bahaar mile la ki  jaanaa hai  la  jab tak chaluun chalatii rahuun main        baahon ke saaye men tere ki  jaanaa hamen kahaan yah bhii nahiin sochen       niind sii aankhon men bhare la  manzil hamen mile na mile       teraa pyaar mile la  jaanaa hai hamen to threedots  ki  mujhe duniyaa men jiine kaa sahaaraa       kaafii hai dil kii lagii la  kuchh bhii naa chaahuun rahe mere liye       yah tere honthon kii hansii ki  saarii duniyaa se lenaa hamen kyaa       hamako yaar mile la  jaanaa hai hamen to threedots  la  tere sang piyaa padate hain mere       niilagagan pe qadam ki  tum ho mere to dharatii ghataa pe       raaj hamaaraa hai sanam la  ho aaj nazaare sar jhukaake       sau sau baar mile la  jaanaa hai hamen to threedots

Title: milaa jo pyaar to ham pyaar ke qaabil naa rahe
Lyrics: milaa jo pyaar to ham pyaar ke qaabil naa rahe kizaa men pal ke ham bahaar ke qaabil naa rahe  gae jo duub kinaaron se unakaa naataa kyaa 2 ujad gae jo bahaaron se unakaa naataa kyaa tum to ik phuul ho ham haar ke qaabil naa rahe milaa jo pyaar to threedots  hamen mitaa do ke ham zindagii se haare hain hamen bhulaa do ke ham tuute hue taare hain hain vafaadaar magar yaar ke qaabil naa rahe milaa jo pyaar to threedots

Title: ham chhupe rustam hain
Lyrics: ham chhupe rustam hain qayaamat kii nazar rakhate hain zamiin to kyaa hai aasmaan kii kabar rakhate hain ham chhupe rustam hain threedots   chhup na paae koii tasviir hamaare aage tuut jaatii hai kud shamashiir hamaare aage chal na paae koii tadabiir hamaare aage sar jhukaatii hai har taqadiir hamaare aage   raah kaanton men banaa lete hain aasmaan sar pe uthaa lete hain ham agar taish men aaen to aag paanii men lagaa dete hain   hamaare dam se ye zamaanaa hai sharaabojaam hai maikaanaa hai ham jahaan sar ko jhukaa den yaaron vahiin kaabaa vahiin butakaanaa hai   ham inasaan hain inasaan ke lie dar pe sar rakhate hain zamiin to kyaa hai aasmaan kii kabar rakhate hai ham chhupe rustam hain threedots   torii nazariyaa gaurii jaise ras kii nadii laharaae ek baar jo duube in men palpal gotii khaae o shamaa threedots palpal gotaa khaae   nazar ye tiir bhii talavaar bhii hai nazar inakaar bhii iqaraar bhii hai nazar ye phuul bhii kaar bhii hai thal bhii megh bhii malahaar bhii hai   nazar dil kii zubaan hotii hai motiyon kaa makaan hotii hai pyaar kaa imtehaan hotii hai zamiin par aasmaan hotii hai   nazar uth jaae to duaa ban jaae agar jhuk jaae to hayaa ban jaae jo tirachhii ho to adaa ban jaae pade siidhii to qazaa ban jaae   nazar koii bhii ho ham sab pe nazar rakhate hain zamiin to kyaa hai aasmaan kii kabar rakhate hain ham chhupe rustam hain threedots   ham terii talaash men jaanejahaan jiine kaa kyaa dastuur bane kabhii kais kabhii farahaad kabhii kaiyyaam kabhii mansuur bane kyaakyaa na bane ham tere lie par jo bhii bane bharapuur bane natakhat ham natavar tere lie   dardar ghuume banban bhatake parabat pe gae suulii pe chadhe nit khaae muqaddar se jhata ke tere ghuunghat pat kii salavat men atat ye more nainaa atake jhatapat de hamen darasan ham to pyaase hain terii kaalii lat ke   o merii aarazuuu aa o merii justajuu aa zaraa tuu ruubaruu aa le hii jaaenge uthaa ke bharii mahafil se tujhe churaa len aankh se kaajal vo hunar rakhate hain ham chhupe rustam hain threedots

Title: merii aawaaz kisii shor men gar duub gayii
Lyrics: merii aawaaz kisii shor men gar duub gayii merii kaamoshii bahut duur sunaaii degii  merii aawaaz kisii shor men gar duub gayii merii kaamoshii ko tum paas bulaa kar sunanaa phir kisii raat ke parde men kahiin apane honthon se meraa naam bulaakar sunanaa  baat sahame hue honthon pe sambhal jaayegii tum zaraa der agar dekho hamaarii jaanib ham yahii sochake har mod pe mud jaate hain kaash ye mod bhii mudataa ho tumhaarii jaanib

Title: haan kaisaa hai mere dil tuu khilaadii
Lyrics: haan kaisaa hai mere dil tuu khilaadii bhar ke bhii hai teraa pyaalaa khaalii 2 kaisaa hai mere dil threedots  kyaa nahiin mere paas 2 dhan bhii izzat bhii bangalaa bhii kaar bhii jaam bhii sharaab bhii baagobahaar bhii 2 are kyaa nahiin mere paas haa he nazaren nazaare bhii chaand aur taare bhii saaqii maikaanaa bhii saaraa zamaanaa bhii aaj main duniyaa khariid sakataa huun lekin hn kaisaa hai mere dil threedots   zindagii hai ik sigaar ho terii zindagii hai ik sigaar  2 kaun tujhe samajhaae zor se jitanaa kash khiinche tuu 2 utanii jalatii jaae aah he apane se khel tuu duniyaa se khel tuu zindagii se khel tuu qismat se khel tuu tuu sabhii se khel sakataa hai lekin kaisaa hai mere dil threedots

Title: naa jaane din kaise jiivan men aaye hain
Lyrics: naa jaane din kaise jiivan men aaye hain ke mujhase to bichhade kud mere saaye hain  kyaa kyaa sochaa thaa kyaa thii ummiiden jisake liye bhii mainne kho dii aankhon kii ye niinden usiise dukhon ke tohafe ye paaye hain naa jaane threedots  samajhaa sukh jisako chhaayaa thii gam kii jaise kahiin ret pe chamake kuchh buunden shabanam kii ye dhokhe nazar ke hamane bhii khaaye hain naa jaane threedots

Title: mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa
Lyrics: aajaa ho aajaa 3 ke mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa 2 kahaan se na jaane chalaa aayaa ye mausam pyaaraa pyaaraa mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa 2 aajaa ho aajaa threedots  tere raste pe main aankhen bichhaye baithaa huun tere intazaar kii main duniyaa sajaaye baithaa huun 2 dekhen terii nazaron ko bhaaye na bhaaye ye nazaaraa mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa 2  teraa meraa pyaar ik raaz hii rahataa to achchhaa thaa soz na banataa ye saaz hii rahataa to achchhaa thaa 2 jaane kyaa hogaa jab hogaa ye milan hamaaraa mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa 2  dhadak rahaa hai dil dil ko main kaise samajhaauun tujhase miluun yaa mile bin yahaan se chalaa jaauun 2 aisaa na ho tuu ye dil tode zamaanaa hanse saaraa mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa  ho mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa kahaan se na jaane chalaa aayaa ye mausam pyaaraa pyaaraa mere dil ne tadap ke jab naam teraa pukaaraa 2 aajaa ho aajaa  2

Title: tum besahaaraa ho to kisii kaa sahaaraa bano
Lyrics: tum besaharaa ho to kisii kaa sahaaraa bano tum ko apane aap hii sahaaraa mil jaayegaa kashtii koii duubatii pahunchaa do kinaare pe tum ko apane aap hii kinaaraa mil jaayegaa tum besahaaraa ho to threedots  hans kar zindaa rahanaa padataa hai apanaa duhkh khud sahanaa padataa hai rastaa chaahe kitanaa lambaa ho dariyaa ko to bahanaa padataa hai tum ho ek akele to ruk mat jaao chal nikalo raste men koii saathii tumhaaraa mil jaayegaa tum besahaaraa ho to threedots  jiivan to ek jaisaa hotaa hai koii hansataa koii rotaa hai sabr se jiinaa aasaan hotaa hai fiqrase jiinaa mushkil hotaa hai thode phuul hain kaante hain jo taqadiir ne baante hain hum ko in men se hissaa hamaaraa mil jaayegaa tum besahaaraa ho to threedots  tum besahaaraa ho to threedots  na bastii men na viiraanon men na kheton men na khalihaanon men na milataa hai pyaar bazaaron men na bikataa hai chain dukaanon men dhuundh rahe ho tum jis ko us ko baahar mat dhuundho man ke andar dhuundho priitam pyaaraa mil jaayegaa tum besahaaraa ho to threedots

Title: apanii aankhon men basaakar koii iqaraar karuun
Lyrics: apanii aankhon men basaakar koii iqaraar karuun  2 jii men aataa hai ki jii bhar ke tujhe pyaar karuun apanii aankhon men basaakar koii iqaraar karuun  main ne kab tujh se zamaane kii kushii maangii hai ek halakii sii mere lab ne hansii maangii hai	 2 saamane tujh ko bithaakar teraa diidaar karuun jii men aataa hai ki jii bhar ke tujhe pyaar karuun apanii aankhon men basaakar koii iqaraar karuun  sahamiisahamii ye nigaahen ye javaanii taubaa mast nazaron men hai ulfat kii kahaanii taubaa aa merii jaanetamannaa teraa singaar karuun jii men aataa hai ki jii bhar ke tujhe pyaar karuun apanii aankhon men basaakar koii iqaraar karuun  saath chhuute na kabhii teraa yah qasam le luun har kushii deke tujhe tere sanam gam le luun	 2 haay main kis tarah se pyaar kaa izahaar karuun jii men aataa hai ki jii bhar ke tujhe pyaar karuun apanii aankhon men basaakar koii iqaraar karuun

Title: main tulasii tere aangan kii
Lyrics: main tulasii tere aangan kii koii nahiin main koii nahiin main tere saajan kii main tulasii tere aangan kii  maang bhii terii sinduur bhii teraa sab kuchh teraa kuchh nahiin meraa tohe saugandh tere mere ansuan kii main tulasii tere aangan kii  kaahe ko tuu mujhase jalatii hai ai rii mohe to tuu lagatii hai koii sahelii bachapan kii main tulasii tere aangan kii

Title: sabase kahate hain  o jattaa aaii baisaakhii
Lyrics: sabase kahate hain ye ghaayal haath ye tuutii taang ham de sakate hain jaanen ham kyaa logon se maangen 2 jo auron pe mar sakate hain vo apanii madad kar sakate hain  tum ham pe mat ehasaan karo ye dhandaulat na daan karo ham to naukar sarakaar ke hain bas bhuukhe pyaar ke hain ham men koii laachaar nahiin ham aashiq hain biimaar nahiin sab bhaashan usake yaad kar le pahale us din ko yaad kar le jab jang chhide baaruud phate sab apane gharon men soe rahe ham jaage khade karane sabakii raakhii o jattaa aaii baisaakhii  gaanv men jab melaa laage hotii kuub kabaddii badebade ko main giraa detaa maar ke addii kabaddii 4 jab main guzarataa baazaaron se sab jhaankate chaubaaron se ik kudii ishaare karatii sii vo mere chalan pe maratii sii vo rah gaii bas aahen bharatii pind chhod ke ham ho gae bharatii dikhalaa zor javaanii kaa shauq hamen qurbaanii kaa ham aae inhiin ummiidon men karen apanaa naam shahiidon men jab dil kii lagii aayaa mauqaa dushman ne diyaa badaa dhokhaa dil ke badale paanv pe golii maarii ki savaalon kii haay jahaan aaii sii o jattaa aaii threedots  aaj bhii ham terii chaal pe ham qurbaan vatan de sheraa ham bik jaaen phir bhii teraa karzaa chukaa na paaen teraa tuune apanaa farz nibhaayaa apanaa farz baakii o jattaa aaii threedots

Title: tumase bichhad ke chain kahaan ham paaenge
Lyrics: tumase bichhad ke chain kahaan ham paaenge hoge jahaan tum ham bhii wahiin aa jaaenge puuchho kyuun haan haan haan haan puuchho kyuun ham ye kahenge ki tum ho hamaarii manzil 2 tumase bichhad ke threedots  dil hamen laayaa yahaan ham aa gaye 2 dekhakar tum hamako kyuun ghabaraa gaye raaz tum ham raazadaan saath jaise jismojaan chhupake jaaoge kahaan nazar churaaoge aur nazar ham aaenge ham aaenge ham aaenge  tumase bichhad ke threedots  kitanaa dilakash hai ye ruuhon kaa safar 2 paanv kaanton par phuulon par nazar dar hai kyaa diivaar kyaa jiit kyaa hai haar kyaa ruuk sakegaa pyaar kyaa phuul to kyaa hai kaanton ko ham mahakaaenge mahakaaenge mahakaaenge tumase bichhad ke threedots  naam honthon par tumhaaraa dil me pyaar 2 bas yahii sajdhaj yahii apanaa singaar zindagii tumase hasiin tum kahiin aur ham kahiin dil khilaunaa to nahiin tum hii bataa do kaise ise bahalaaenge bahalaaenge bahalaaenge tumase bichhad ke threedots

Title: haa haa kitane sapane kitane aramaan laayaa huun
Lyrics: haa haa yaa huu kitane sapane kitane aramaan laayaa huun main dekho naa 2 ai ai ai meraa dil bhii ik mahafil hai tum bhii kabhii aao naa baitho naa  tumase mil ke yuun to mahak rahaa huun phir bhii main akelaa bahak rahaa huun 2 merii andherii hain tanhaaiyaan koii diyaa tum jalaa do naa  he he kitane sapane threedots  har taraf jahaan bhii palak thamiin hai pyaar kii jahaan men bahut kamiin hai 2 berang hain ye mere raatdin  tum rang koii milaa do naa he he kitane sapane threedots  koii mujh men dekhe to kyaa nahiin hai haan vo gam men bhiigii sadaa nahiin hai 2 mere taraanon men badh jaae jo tum koii dhadakan jagaa do naa he he kitane sapane threedots

Title: chhed mere hamaraahii giit koii aisaa
Lyrics: chhed mere hamaraahii giit koii aisaa umr bhar ham jise gunagunaate rahen chhed mere hamaraahii threedots  milake na bichhaden ye dil ye pal ye aankhen aae naa aae naa ye rut ye din ye raaten mausam baagon men aatejaate rahen chhed mere hamaraahii threedots  mudake na dekhenge ye pal ye raahen piichhe rah jaaen jiivan kii sab siimaaen raahon pe qadam dagamagaate rahen chhed mere hamaraahii threedots  tan ik diipak hai saans diipak kii baatii ham donon ke dil banake taare o saathii kaalii raaton men jagamagaate rahen chhed mere hamaraahii threedots

Lyrics: arii muniyaa rii muniyaa tuu bataa main kaun huun 2 arii duniyaa rii duniyaa tuu bataa main kaun huun 2 sikandar huun kalandar huun machhandar huun ke bandar huun 2 pahachaano jaano main kaun huun 2  baharuupiyon kaa jag deraa hai chehare ke andar cheharaa hai 2 baahar vaalaa hai duniyaa kaa aur andar vaalaa meraa hai juaarii huun pujaarii huun bhikhaarii huun shikaarii huun pahachaano jaano main threedots  main koii khilaune vaalaa huun yaa jaaduutone vaalaa huun 2 dekho naa tang karo mujhako varanaa main rone vaalaa huun main jhuuthaa huun ke sachchaa huun main bachchaa huun ke kaashiichachchaa huun pahachaano jaano main threedots

Lyrics: main piital kii paayaliyaa bhii pahanuun jo paanv men sone kaa bhaav sone kaa bhaav gir jaaye shiishe kaa bhii nag jo chadhaa luun nathaniyaa men hiire kaa bhaav hiire kaa bhaav gir jaaye  piital kii paayaliyaa threedots  meraa singaar yahii suurat hai merii suurat bhii kyaa kuubasuurat hai merii gahanon kii mujhako zaruurat nahiin hai gahanon ko shaayad zaruurat ho merii main ang apane jisako sajaauun usakaa nasiib khil jaaye main piital kii paayaliyaa threedots  ye pyaar meraa tuujhe mahangaa padegaa tuu mol kyaa mere dil kaa chukaaye vo haar mere gale kaa banegaa jo pyaar men jaan par khel jaaye merii nazar se gir jaaye jo dil sholon men vahii ghir jaaye main piital kii paayaliyaa threedots

Title: kahiin karatii hogii vo meraa intazaar
Lyrics: kahiin karatii hogii vo meraa intazaar  jisakii tamannaa men phirataa huun beqaraar   dur zulfon ki chhaaon se  kahataa huun main havaaon se  usii but ki adaaon ke afasaane hazaar  vo jo baahon men machal jati  hasarat hii nikal jati  meri duniya badal jati mil jaataa qaraar  kahiin karatii hogii threedots  kahiin baithii hogii raahon men gum apanii hii baahon men liye khoyii sii nigaahon men khoyaa khoyaa sa pyaar saayaa rukii hogii aanchal kii chup hogii dhun paayal kii hogii palakon men kaajal kii khoyii khoyii bahaar kahiin karatii hogii threedots  aramaan hai koi paas aaye in hathon men vo haath aaye  phir kvaabon kii ghataa chhaaye barasaaye khumaar  unhiin biitii din raton pe  matavaalii mulaqaaton pe  ulfat bharii baaton pe ham hote nisaar   kahiin karatii hogii vo meraa intazaar  jisakii tamannaa men phirataa huun beqarar

Title: dil todane vaalon kii mahafil  agar dil hamaaraa
Lyrics: dil todane vaalon kii mahafil men aa gayaa huun kaise duaaen duun main badii mushqil men aa gayaa huun  agar dil hamaaraa shiishe ke badale patthar kaa hotaa patthar kaa hotaa to tuutataa na phuutataa maanataa na ruuthataa na baarbaar hansataa na zaarzaar rotaa agar dil hamaaraa threedots  na ehasaas hotaa kushii men kushii kaa 2 na mahasuus hotaa ye gam zindagii kaa vo priitam kii galiyaan nahiin naa sahii muqaddar men kaliyaan nahiin naa sahii ye chunchun ke kaanton kii maalaa naa pirotaa agar dil hamaaraa threedots  hai kaagaz ke phuulon kaa ye gulistaan 2 mahak inakii naqalii hai naqalii kizaan sitamagar tujhe bevafaa jaanataa agar terii nazaron ko pahachaanataa gharaunde main sapanon ke kyon kar sanjotaa agar dil hamaaraa threedots

Title: ankhiyon men chhotechhote sapane sajaaike
Lyrics: ankhiyon men chhotechhote sapane sajaaike banhiyon men nindiyaa ke pankh lagaaike chandaa men jhuule merii bitiyaa raanii chaandanii re jhuum ho chaandanii re jhuum 2  yahii to kalii hai pyaarii merii saarii bagiyaa men ho yahii to kalii hai pyaarii merii saarii bagiyaa men mainne yahii motii paayaa jiivan nadiyaa men mamataa lutaauun aisii mach jaae dhuum chaandanii re jhuum ho chaandanii re jhuum   kyaa kyaa mainne tere liye bhes banaayaa hai ho kyaa kyaa mainne tere liye bhes banaayaa hai kyaa nahiin biitii phir bhii tujhe bahalaayaa hai tere lie main rahaa galii galii ghuum chaandanii re jhuum ho chaandanii re jhuum   ankhiyon men chhotechhote sapane sajaaike bahiyon men nindiyaa ke pankh lagaaike chandaa men jhuule merii bitiyaa raanii chaandanii re jhuum ho chaandanii re jhuum 2

Title: ham bolegaa to bologe ke bolataa hai
Lyrics: ham bolegaa to bologe ke bolataa hai 2  ek memasaab hai saath men saab bhii hai memasaab sundarsundar hai saab bhii khuubasuurat hai donon paaspaas hain baaten khaaskhaas hain duniyaa chaahe kuchh bhii bole bole duniyaa chaahe kuchh bhii bole ham kuchh nahiin bolegaa ham bolegaa to threedots  hamaraa ek padosii hai naam jisakaa joshii hai 2 vo paas hamare aataa hai aur hamako ye samajhaataa hai jab do javaan dil mil jaaenge tab kuchh naa kuchh to hogaa do se chaar ho sakate hain aath se saath ho sakate hain jo karataa hai so paataa hai are apane baap kaa kyaa jaataa hai joshii padosii kuchh bhii bole bole joshii padosii kuchh bhii bole  ham kuchh nahiin bolegaa ham bolegaa to threedots  merii budhiyaa naanii thii lekin badii sayaanii thii godii men mujhe bithaatii thii aur sachchii baat sunaatii thii jab saal sataravaan laagegaa dil dhadakdhadak to karegaa kisii sundarii se nainavaa milegaa to dil khusurphusur bhii karegaa jab aag se ghii milegaa phir ghii bhii to pighalegaa na aag se na ghii se hamako kyaa kisii se naanii chaahe kuchh bhii bole ham kuchh nahiin bolegaa ham bolegaa to threedots

Title: saare zamaane pe  aap aae bahaar aaii
Lyrics: saare zamaane pe mausam suhaane pe is dil diivaane pe viiraanii sii thii chhaaii aap aae bahaar aaii  2  aapakaa hii thaa sabako intazaar 2 aapake lie sab the beqaraar havaaen ghataaen fizaaen baagon men phuulon ne lii jhuum ke angadaaii aap aae bahaar threedots  aapane kiyaa aa ke ehasaan 2 thaa ye viiraanaa ab hai gulistaan pukaaren nazaare ye saare gulashan kii galiyon se kaliyon se sunie aavaaz ye aaii aap aae bahaar threedots  liijie naa bas ab jaane kaa naam 2 ruuth jaaenge jalave ye tamaam ye bastii ye mastii ye hastii aisaa naa ho jaae ban jaae ye mahafil phir tanhaaii aap aae bahaar threedots
