Lyrics: ra	terii palakon men 	terii palakon men kaajal ai hasiinaa hamase behatar hai  2 	kahaan qismat hamaarii jo terii in kaalii aankhon men 	base rahate hameshaa in hasiin matawaalii aankhon men 	ye kaajal uf ye kaajal ai hasiinaa  su	tumase behatar hai suno jii tumase behatar hai 	ye pahale to charaagon men jalaa merii muhabbat men 	ye kaajal phir dhuaan banakar udaa merii muhabbat men 	na kyon palakon men rakh luun ye diiwaanaa tumase behatar hai  2  ra	teraa udataasaa aanchal ai hasiinaa hamase behatar hai  2 	sataane ko hamen ye terii baanhen thaamakar jhuule 	jahaan se chaahe phir ye jhuulakar teraa badan chhuu le 	ye aanchal uf ye aanchal ai hasiinaa  su	tumase behatar hai suno jii tumase behatar hai 	har ek naazuk se isake taar ne khaaye hazaaron bal 	hazaaron suuraten badaliin to resham se banaa aanchal 	is ek bejaan kii chaahat kaa qariinaa tumase behatar hai  2  ra	hamen kaajal banaa le ham hain jalane ke lie raazii 	tujhe paane ko har suurat badalane ke lie raazii su	jo yuun hai to terii baanhon men jiinaa sab se behatar hai  2 ra	ye sach hai sab se behatar hai su	suno jii sab se behatar hai  2

Title: ek hasarat thii ki aanchal kaa mujhe pyaar mile
Lyrics: ek hasarat thii ki aanchal kaa mujhe pyaar mile maine manzil ko talaashaa mujhe baazaar mile  zindagii aur bataa  2 teraa iraadaa kyaa hai ek hasarat thii threedots  mujhako paidaa kiyaa sansaar men do laashon ne aur barabaad kiyaa qaum ke ayyaashon ne tere daaman men bataa maut se zyaadaa kyaa hai zindagii aur bataa threedots  jo bhii tasviir banaataa huun bigad jaatii hai dekhatedekhate duniyaa hii ujad jaatii hai merii kashtii teraa tuufaan se vaadaa kyaa hai zindagii aur bataa threedots  tuune jo dard diyaa usakii qasam khaataa huun itanaa zyaadaa hai ki ehasaan se dabaa jaataa huun merii taqadiir bataa aur taqaazaa kyaa hai zindagii aur bataa threedots  maine jazbaat ke sang khelate daulat dekhii apanii aankhon se mohabbat kii tijaarat dekhii aisii duniyaa men mere vaaste rakhaa kyaa hai zindagii aur bataa threedots  aadamii chaahe to taqadiir badal sakataa hai puurii duniyaa kii vo tasviir badal sakataa hai  aadamii soch to le  2 usakaa iraadaa kyaa hai 2 zindagii aur bataa threedots

Title: rekhaa o rekhaa jab se tumhen dekhaa
Lyrics: rekhaa o rekhaa jab se tumhen dekhaa khaanaapiinaasonaa dushvaar ho gayaa main aadamii thaa kaam kaa bekaar ho gayaa rekhaa o rekhaa threedots  tumase dil kyaa lagaayaa hai tumako qaabil banaayaa hai dinraat jalaatii ho diivaanaa banaatii ho are meraa bhii ek din zaruur aaegaa rekhaa o rekhaa threedots  kaafii mahangaa ye pyaar hai shaadii kaa intazaar hai maalik pe bharosaa hai maine to ye sochaa hai are mehanat jo kii hai to phal bhii milegaa rekhaa o rekhaa threedots

Title: bujhaa do diipak huun
Lyrics: bujhaa do diipak huun andheraa kar do uthaa do ghuunghat haay saveraa kar do bujhaa do diipak huun   threedots  sharam ke maare haathon se ye cheharaa dhaanp ke na duur duur jaao sar se kaanp kaanp ke ki ab aao paas merii pyaas to bujhaa do koii gam hai to haay vo meraa kar do bujhaa do diipak huun   threedots  badal lo ruup apanaa aaj mere pyaar se sajaa do merii suunii sej ko bahaar se khushii ke phuul gam ke dhuul pe bichhaa ke ise khushiyon kaa haay baseraa kar do bujhaa do diipak huun   threedots

Title: achchhaa hii huaa dil tuut gayaa
Lyrics: achchhaa hii huaa dil tuut gayaa achchhaa hii huaa jo tuune kiyaa luungaa na kabhii ab naamevafaa achchhaa hii huaa threedots  thaa jinakaa ruup nigaahon men vo hai gairon kii baanhon men kis baat kaa badalaa mujhase liyaa achchhaa hii huaa threedots  naqalii the phuul mohabbat ke jhuuthe the vaade ulfat ke har bandhan se main chhuut gayaa achchhaa hii huaa threedots  dil men to sochaa kyaakyaa thaa teraa pyaar to ret kaa dariyaa thaa naa tair sakaa naa duub sakaa achchhaa hii huaa threedots

Title: pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men
Lyrics: pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men jal gaye saath men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men jal gaye saath men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men  aane waalii raat kaa koii rishtaa jod lo jaane waalii raat kaa koii hissaa tod lo ho aane waalii aane waalii raat kaa koii rishtaa jod lo jaane waalii raat kaa koii hissaa tod lo kaise sab aramaan nikalenge chhotii sii mulaaqaat men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men jal gaye saath men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men  haa haa haa haa haa haa nashe men hai zindagii hosh se kaam lo chhodo bhii ye dillagii taubaa kaa naam lo nashe men hai nashe men hai zindagii hosh se kaam lo chhodo bhii ye dillagii taubaa kaa naam lo log bahakane lagate hain aksar aise haalaat men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men jal gaye saath men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men  pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men jal gaye saath men pyaase do badan pyaasii raat men

Title: giit gaataa chal o saathii gunagunaataa chal
Lyrics: giit gaataa chal o saathii gunagunaataa chal o bandhuu rethreedots hansate hansaate biite har ghadii har pal git gata chal threedots  1 khulaa khulaa gagan ye harii bharii dharatii jitanaa bhii dekhuun tabiyat nahiin bharatii sundar se sundar har ik rachanaa phuul kahe kaanton se bhii sikho hansanaa o raahii sikho hansanaa o raahii re kumhalaa na jaae kahiin man teraa komal giit gaataa threedots  2 chaandii saa chamakataa ye nadiyaa ka paanii re paanii kii har ik buund detii zindagaanii ambar se barase zamiin pe giire niir ke binaa ho bhaiyaa kaam naa chale o bhaiyaa kaam naa chale o meghaa re jal jo na hotaa to ye jag jaataa jal giit gaataa threedots  3 kahaan se tuu aayaa aur kahaan tujhe jaanaa hai khush hai vahii jo is baat se begaanaa hai chal chal chalatii havaaen karen shor udate pakheru khiinche manavaa kii dor o khiinche manavaa kii dor o panchhii re panchhiyon ke pankh leke ho jaa tuu ojhal giit gaataa threedots

Title: dil kaanton men ulajhaayaa hai
Lyrics: dil kaanton men ulajhaayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai 2 sholaa shabanam men laharaayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai dil kaanton men  jaaduu saa chalane lagaa hai mausam badalane lagaa hai 2 lagataa hai mere siine se dil baahar nikalane lagaa hai shiishaa pathhar se takaraayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai  dil kaanton men ulajhaayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai dil kaanton men threedots  na paas aane diyaa hai na duur hone diyaa hai 2 na honthon ko hansane diyaa hai na aankhon ko rone diyaa hai badaa zaalim ne tadapaayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai  dil kaanton men ulajhaayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai dil kaanton men threedots  aisaa sitam karane se sainyyaan banaa re na jaane jab tak ho sakaa ye hamase ham ruuthe rahe nahiin maane yahii gussaa ye rang laayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai  dil kaanton men ulajhaayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai sholaa shabanam men laharaayaa hai ik dushman pe pyaar aayaa hai dil kaanton men threedots

Title: phuulon kaa taaron kaa sabakaa kahanaa hai
Lyrics: phuulon kaa taaron kaa sabakaa kahanaa hai ek hazaaron men merii bahanaa hai saarii umar hamen sang rahanaa hai phuulon threedots  ye na jaanaa duniyaa ne tuu hai kyuun udaas terii pyaasii aankhon men pyaar kii hai pyaas aa mere paas aa kah jo kahanaa hai ek hazaaron threedots  bholiibhaalii jaapaanii gudiyaa jaisii tuu pyaariipyaarii jaaduu kii pudiyaa jaisii tuu daidii kaa mammii kaa sab kaa kahanaa hai ek hazaaron threedots  jab se merii aankhon se ho gaii tuu duur tab se saare jiivan ke sapane hain chuur aankhon men niind naa man men chainaa hai ek hazaaron threedots  dekho ham tum dono hain ek daalii ke phuul main na bhuulaa tuu kaise mujhako gaii bhuul aa mere paas aa kah jo kahanaa hai ek hazaaron threedots  jiivan ke dukhon se yuun darate nahiin hain aise bachake sach se guzarate nahiin hain sukh kii hai chaah to dukh bhii sahanaa hai ek hazaaron threedots

Title: main pyaasaa tum saavan
Lyrics: main pyaasaa tum saavan main dil tum merii dhadakan  ho naa huun to  2 main pyaasaa tum threedots  aankhon ko jab band karuun main sapane ye samajhaaen pyaar binaa ye jiivan phiikaa sapane tumhaare aaen man se man kii dorii kaa tumhiin ho bandhan  ho naa huun to  2 main pyaasaa tum threedots  main jab chheduun dil ke taraane chupake se sun lenaa ye nagmen ye pyaar ke nagmen dhiire se chun lenaa teraameraa rishtaa jaise kushbuu aur chandan  ho naa huun to  2 main pyaasaa tum threedots  maine jabjab anjaane dekhii haath kii rekhaa main batalaa duun us rekhaa men tumane mujhe hii dekhaa main to ek paraaii huun tum ho mere darpan  ho naa huun to  2 main pyaasaa tum threedots

Title: nadiyaa se dariyaa dariyaa se saagar saagar se gaharaa jaam
Lyrics: nadiyaa se dariyaa dariyaa se saagar saagar se gaharaa jaam 2 ho ho ho jaam men duub gayii yaaron mere jivan kii har sham 2 nadiyaa se dariyaa threedots  jo na piye vo kya jaane piite hai kyon ham divaane yaar ahaa jab se hamane piinaa siikhaa jiinaa siikhaa maranaa siikhaa yaar ahaa o ham jab yuun nashe men dagamagaane lag gaye ho ho ho dil kii bechainii ko aayaa thodaa saa aaraam nadiyaa se dariyaa threedots  meraa kya main gam ka maaraa nashe men aalam hai saaraa yaar ahaa kisii ko daulat ka nashaa kahiin muhabbat ka nashaa yaar ahaa o kahakar ai sharaabii sab pukaaren ab mujhe ho ho ho aur koii thaa ye to nahiin thaa pahale meraa naam nadiyaa se dariyaa threedots

Title: dulhan kuubasuurat hai  abhii gyaarah nahiin baje hain
Lyrics: dulhan kuubasuurat hai kitanaa hasiin mahuurat hai sehare kii zaruurat hai duulhaa mujhe banaao yaaron aao lekin pahale thaharo abhii gyaarah nahiin baje hain 2  ek buzurg ne kahaa thaa betaa jiinaa chaahe maranaa gyaarah bajane se pahale koii achchhaa kaam na karanaa anguuthii pahanaao pahanaao jii pahanaao yaaron aao lekin pahale threedots  ek do tiin chaar paanch chhah saath aath nau das gyaarah ek aur ek gyaarah  gyaarah ke nambar men dekhe hote hain do ikke ek huun main ek hai tuu yaaron aao lekin pahale threedots  aa mil jaaen donon dil de ke mandap men le jaao jii 2 yaaron aao lekin pahale threedots  vaqt se pahale chale jo manzil se nikale vo aage vaqt ke baad jo nikale samajho subah der se jaage ghadii se ghadii milaao jii 2 yaaron aao lekin pahale threedots

Title: ai choriichorii chupakechupake tere mere bin
Lyrics: ai choriichorii chupakechupake tere mere bin is kamare men aur kaun hai kisane bulaayaa binaa puuchhe chalaa aayaa ise pakado ye chor kaun hai choriichorii threedots  o ye khidakii khulii hai ye to band thii nahiin mujhe taazaa havaa pasand thii are mujhase kahaa hotaa main razaamand thii sharmohayaa kii diivaar buland thii achchhaa ye sab chhodo par itanaa to socho ki main bhii chup tum bhii chup kisane machaayaa ye shor kaun hai kaun hai bhaii ye to pardaa hai choriichorii threedots  dhadakan ko chhedaa na dil se hii khele kaash aaj raat ham hote akele hote jo akele to qayaamat ho jaatii baad men hotaa par muhabbat ho jaatii uf kyaa sitam hai badaa besharm hai dekho phir aayaa hamen kar rahaa hai ye bore kaun hai ye kaun hai are kaun hai ye to main huun bhaii o ho ho ho

Title: mangal bhavan amangal haarii drabahu sudasarath achar bihaarii
Lyrics: mangal bhavan amangal haarii drabahu sudasarath achar bihaarii raam siyaa raam siyaa raam jay jay raam  2  ho hoihai vahii jo raam rachi raakhaa ko kare taraf badhaae saakhaa  ho dhiiraj dharam mitra aru naarii aapad kaal parakhiye chaarii  ho jehike jehi par satya sanehu so tehi milay na kachhu sandehu  ho jaakii rahii bhaavanaa jaisii raghu murati dekhii tin taisii  raghukul riit sadaa chali aaii praan jaae par vachan na jaaii raam siyaa raam siyaa raam jay jay raam  ho hari anant hari kathaa anantaa kahahi sunahi bahuvidhi sab santaa raam siyaa raam siyaa raam jay jay raam

Title: ye dil aur unakii nigaahon ke saaye
Lyrics: ye dil aur unakii nigaahon ke saaye  3 mujhe gher lete hain baahon ke saaye  2  pahaadon ko chanchal kiran chuumatii hai  2 havaa har nadii kaa badan chuumatii hai  2 yahaan se vahaan tak hain chaahon ke saaye  2 ye dil aur unakii nigaahon ke saaye threedots  lipatate ye pedon se baadal ghanere  2 ye pal pal ujaale ye pal pal andhere  2 bahut thande thande hain raahon ke saaye  2 ye dil aur unakii nigaahon ke saaye threedots  dhadakate hain dil kitanii aazaadiyon se  2 bahut milate julate hain in vaadiyon se  2 muhabbat kii rangiin panaahon ke saaye  2 ye dil aur unakii nigaahon ke saaye threedots

Title: le jaaenge le jaaenge dilvaale dulhaaniyaa le jaaenge
Lyrics: ki le jaaenge le jaaenge dilvaale dulhaaniyaa le jaaenge     are rah jaaenge rah jaaenge paisevaale dekhate rah jaaenge ko le jaaenge le jaaenge threedots  ki tum ho kalii to gulaab ham hain ko ho gulaab ham hain ki honthon se lagaa lo to sharaab ham hain ko ho sharaab ham hain ki kahate hain log ki karaab ham hain     terii har baat kaa javaab ham hain ko laajavaab ham hain ki apane do haathon se     kamaayaa huaa khaanevaale     haq na paraayaa kabhii khaaenge     sasurjii ko le jaaenge threedots     terii son machhariyaa ki le jaaenge  aa main bhii tere saath huun dil bhii tere saath ko sajanaa dil bhii tere saath aa chaahe jab aajaa channaa le ke baaraat ko chhetiichhhetii aajaa channaa le ke baaraat ki mere paas kothii hai na kaar sajanii     kadakaa hai teraa diladaar sajanii ko diladaar sajanii aa kothii bangalaa na mujhe kaar chaahie     dil chaahie diladaar chaahie ki haan chal phir chhalie sonie nii balie     dil kii hii duniyaa basaaenge ko le jaaenge threedots      tere baag kii bulabul ki le jaaenge ko le jaaenge le jaaenge threedots

Lyrics: ki 	hoy  aasamaan se tod ke taare zulf men terii sajaauungaa 	is jahaan kaa sabase badaa main jaaduugar kahalaauungaa  2  	chiin pataak dam dam d d dam jain kaalii k k jam 	sab hoii jaatii dang pati kabahuu ke pag nahiin sakat bakhaan  	chhuu chhuu chhuu allaadiin kaa huun chelaa 	is jahaan men main akelaa 	jisane merii baat na maanii apanii jaan pe khelaa 	khelaa khelaa khilaa duun kelaa aah 	are bol o merii mainaa 	tere dil men kyaa hai kahanaa 	bol o bol  su 	paanii men tuu aag lagaa de ki 	ye le su 	isake sar ke baal udaa de ki 	ye le aa 	is ladakii ko ladakaa banaa de ki 	ye le abhii le 2 	chiin pataak dam dam gili gili gili gili gili duu 	haath lagaaoge kaanon ko aisaa khel dikhaauungaa 	is jahaan kaa sabase threedots  	main baharuupiyaa huun aisaa pahachaan lo to maanuun 	main kab kyaa karuungaa tum ye jaan lo to maanuun 	teraa cheharaa hai bagule kaa mujhe shauq badaa tabale kaa 	bum bum uu huun huun  	ho terii chhuttii ho gaii hai 	ho terii bitiyaa kho gaii hai su 	jaaduugar bichhadon ko milaa de 	isako usakaa pataa bataa de ki 	o no no no no no 	main bichhad jaauungaa usase isase agar  milaauungaa  3 	sataak sataak siitaaraam satak satak satak satak 	chal hat natakhat panaghat jhatapat 2 	vrindaavan kii haayhaay vrindaavan kii kunj galiyan men 	kaahe tuu yuun bhatak naa bhatak 	satakam satakam bhatakam bhatakam 2

Title: main to aaratii utaaruun re santoshii maataa kii
Lyrics: u  main to aaratii utaaruun re santoshii maataa kii  2     jaya jaya santoshii maataa jaya jaya maan  2      badii mamataa hai badaa pyaar maan kii aankhon men ko maan kii aankhon men u  badii karunaa maayaa dulaar maan kii aankhon men ko maan kii aankhon men u  kyuun naa dekhuun main baarambaar maan kii aankhon men     dikhe har ghadii dikhe har ghadii nayaa chamatkaar maan kii aankhon men ko maan kii aankhon men u  ho nritya karuun jhuumjhuum jham jhamaajham jhuumjhuum ko nritya karuun jhuumjhuum jham jhamaajham jhuumjhuum u  jhaankii nihaaruun re o baankii baankii jhaankii nihaaruun re ko main to aaratii   u  sadaa hotii hai jayajayakaar maan ke mandir men ko maan ke mandir men u  nit jhaanjhar kii hoe jhankaar maan ke mandir men ko maan ke mandir men u  sadaa manjiir karate pukaar maan ke mandir men     varadaan ke varadaan ke bhare hain bhandaar maan ke mandir men ko maan ke mandir men u  diip dharuun dhuup dharuun prem sahit bhakti karuun     jiivan sudhaaruun re o pyaaraa pyaaraa jiivan sudhaaruun re ko main to aaratii

Title: sab thaath padaa rah jaavegaa jab laad chalegaa
Lyrics: sab thaath padaa rah jaavegaa jab laad chalegaa banjaaraa dhan tere kaam na aayegaa jab laad chalegaa banjaaraa  jo paayaa hai vo baant ke khaa kangaal na kar kangaal na ho jo sabakaa haal kiyaa tuune ek roz vo teraa haal na ho is haath de de us haath le le ho jaave sukhii ye jag saaraa sab thaath padaa rah threedots  kyaa kothaakothii kyaa bangalaa ye duniyaa rainbaseraa hai kyuun jhagadaa teremere kaa kuchh teraa hai na meraa hai sun kuchh bhii saath na jaavegaa jab kuuch kaa baaje nakkaaraa sab thaath padaa rah threedots  ik bandaa maalik ban baithaa har bande kii qismat phuutii thaa itanaa moh kazaane kaa do haathon se duniyaa luutii the donon haath magar khaalii jo uthaa sikandar bechaaraa sab thaath padaa rah threedots

Title: ai mere bete sun meraa kahanaa
Lyrics: kishor ai mere bete sun meraa kahanaa chaahe dukh hoe hansate hii rahanaa 2  kishor tuu mere bete kyon roe ankhiyon ke motii kyon khoe main teraa ghodaa main haathii main tere sukh dukh kaa saathii teraa main sahaaraa huun meraa tuu sahaaraa hai jaan se bhii pyaaraa hai aajaa aajaa ai mere bete threedots  kishor rakhanaa bharosaa usape sadaa jisane hai sabako janam diyaa kal teraa paapaa rahe na rahe ab jo kahaa phir kahe na kahe kahaa na bhulaanaa tuu vahii rakhavaalaa hai usii ko bulaanaa tuu aajaa aajaa ai mere bete threedots  kishor sochaa thaa kyaa aur kyaa laayaa dete hue jii bhar aayaa le ye baisaakhii lele re mere abhaage haathon se isii ke sahaare chal chal mere pyaare chal paapaa ke dulaare chal aajaa aajaa  sushamaa ai mere paapaa sun meraa kahanaa chaahe dukh hove hansate hii rahanaa

Title: maine dekhaa ik sapanaa
Lyrics: maine dekhaa ik sapanaa kyaa dekhaa bolo  bolo naa  2 tab se dhadake dil kitanaa haay kitanaa bolo  bolo naa  2 dekhaa paagal saa ik naujavaan terii raahon men hai achchhaa haan aur tuu paagalon kii tarah usakii baanhon men hai vo naujavaan khelataa hii rahaa tere baalon se aur taubaataubaa tere haath the usake gaalon pe laten terii padii kahiin aanchal teraa aur kahiin hai ho aage bhii kuchh dekhaa thaa jii magar kuchh yaad nahiin hai  suno suno maine bhii dekhaa ek sapanaa kyaa dekhaa bolo threedots  dekhaa pyaaraa saa ik naujavaan merii raahon men hai achchhaa aur meraa rangiilaa badan usakii baanhon men hai bilkul tumhaarii tarah hii thaa raamaa duhaaii re kis pyaar se haay thaamii thii merii kalaaii re haay maine dekhaa laten kahiin aur aanchal meraa aur kahiin hai ho aage kuchh dekhaa nahiin isalie yaad nahiin hai ab to vahii bas vahii mere is dil men basataa hai achchhaa to phir aaj se bas alag apanaa rastaa hai hai baat aisii to dil meraa vaapas kie jaao in bholii baaton pe raanii duaaen lie jaao haay teraameraa rahaa kahaan ek hue donon ke dil o jaise mile kvaabon men sajanaa mere aa vaise mil

Title: puravaiyaa ke jhonke aaye
Film: dulhan wahi jo piya man bhaye
Lyrics: puravaiyaa ke jhonke aaye chandan ban kii mahak bhii laaye duur vo nindyaa raanii muskaaye muund lo nainaa to nainon men aa jaaye puravaiyaa ke jhonke aaye  niind kii dulhan badii sharmiilii ujiyaare men na aaye koii jo chaunke koii kuchh bole to raste pe mud jaaye diip bujhaa do to pal bhar men aa jaaye muund lo nainaa to threedots  niind kii chintaa le ke jo jaage usako niind na aaye phuul saa manavaa le ke jo soye usako hii niind sulaaye chhod do chintaa to pal bhar men aa jaaye muund lo nainaa to threedots

Title: ek se badhakar ek
Lyrics: laa laa laa threedots ek se badhakar ek main laaii huun tohafe anek zulfon kii shaam laaii ho dil tere naam laaii zulfon kii shaam laaii dil tere naam laaii mazaa aaegaa mulaaqaat kaa e kyaa program hai aaj raat kaa ek se badhakar ek threedots  ek muhabbat duujii jawaanii tiijaa bahataa paanii rokane se nahiin rukate tiino sun le dilabar jaanii vaqt hai soch le jaan le dekh le mazaa aaegaa mulaaqaat kaa e kyaa program hai aaj raat kaa ek se badhakar ek threedots  main huun sholaa main huun shabanam main huun mast bahaar chun le jo bhii marzii terii mere rang hazaar maan le baat ko thaam le haath ko mazaa aaegaa mulaaqaat kaa e kyaa program hai aaj raat kaa ek se badhakar ek threedots

Title: dhanno kii aankhon men hai raat kaa suramaa
Lyrics: dhanno kii aankhon men hai raat kaa suramaa aur chaand kaa chummaa ho o threedots dhanno kii aankhon men hai raat kaa suramaa aur chaand kaa chummaa  ho sahar bhii tere binaa raat lage chhaalaa pade aag jaise chaand pe jo haath lage 2 ho o threedots dhanno kaa gussaa hai ek tiir kaa chummaa aur chaand kaa chummaa  ho dhanno tujhe kwaab men dekhaa hai lailaa kii hiir kii kitaab men dekhaa hai 2 ho o threedots dhanno kii aankhon men hai raat kaa suramaa aur chaand kaa chummaa

Title: dil se mile dil mil gaii manzil duur huii mushkil
Lyrics: dil se mile dil 2 mil gaii manzil duur huii mushkil dil se mile hain dil mushkil se mile par mil to gae hain aakir aaj ye dil dil se dil mil gae mil ke yuun khil gae dil se mile dil threedots   saaraa jahaan gaa rahaa hai banake bahaar chhaa rahaa hai  2 koii kushii laa rahaa hai dekho gam jaa rahaa hai dil se dil mil gae threedots   hai vo hasiin ham javaan hain aur usape samaan meharabaan hai  2 jhuumate zamiin aasamaan hain mahakaa ye gulasitaan hai dil se dil mil gae threedots

Title: dil sajan jalataa hai
Lyrics: laa laa threedots  dil sajan jalataa hai ye badan jalataa hai lagii dil kii lagii huii kab se hai jaanii jab se lagaa kahiin pe dil tab se hai jaanii dil sajan jalataa hai threedots  chalii havaa ye kaisii phuulon kii galiyon men shabanam ke girane se aag lage kaliyon men ho chalii havaa ye kaisii phuulon kii galiyon men shabanam ke girane se aag lage kaliyon men ye chaman jalataa hai ye badan jalataa hai threedots  pyaar kaa rang lagaa hai jab se merii bindiyaa men ye dharatii jalatii hai sapanon men nindiyaa men ho pyaar kaa rang lagaa hai jab se merii bindiyaa men ye dharatii jalatii hai sapanon men nindiyaa men ye gagan jalataa hai ye badan jalataa hai threedots

Title: main tere ishq men mar na jaauun kahiin
Lyrics: main tere ishq men mar na jaauun kahiin tuu mujhe aazamaane kii koshish na kar kuubasuurat hai tuu to huun main bhii hasiin  mujhase nazaren churaane kii koshish na kar  main tere ishq men  shauq se tuu meraa imtihaan le  tere qadamon men rakh dii hai jaan le bekabar beqadar maan jaa zid naa kar todakar dil meraa ai mere hamanashiin is tarah muskaraane kii koshish na kar  main tere ishq men  pher lii kyon nazar mujhase ruuthakar dil ke tukade hue tuuttuutakar kyaa kahaa dilarubaa tuu hai mujhase kafaa ik bahaanaa hai ye ye haqiiqat nahiin tuu bahaane banaane kii koshish na kar  main tere ishq men  kab se baithii huun main intazaar men jhuuthaa waadaa hii kar koii pyaar men  kyaa sitam hai sanam tere sar kii qasam yaad chaahe naa kar to mujhe gam nahiin haan magar bhuul jaane kii koshish na kar  main tere ishq men mar naa jaauun kahiin tuu mujhe aazamaane kii koshish na kar kuubasuurat hai tuu to huun main bhii hasiin  mujhase nazaren churaane kii koshish na kar  main tere ishq men

Title: har taraf ab yahii afasaane hain ham terii aankhon ke
Lyrics: har taraf ab yahii afasaane hain ham terii aankhon ke diivaanen hain har tarafthreedots  itanii sachchaaii hai in aankhon men khote sikke bhii khare ho jaayen tuu kabhii pyaar se dekhe jo udhar suukhe jangal bhii hare ho jaayen baag ban jaae baag ban jaae jo viiraanen hain ham terii aankhon ke diivaane hain har tarafthreedots  ek halkaa saa ishaaraa inakaa kabhii dil aur kabhii jaan luutegaa kis tarah pyaas bujhegii usakii kis tarah usakaa nashaa tuutegaa jisakii qismat men jisakii qismat men ye paimaanen hain ham terii aankhon ke diivaanen hain har tarafthreedots  niichii nazaron men hain kitanaa jaaduu ho gae pal men kaii khvaab javaan kabhii uthane kabhii jhukane kii adaa le chalii jaane kidhar jaane kahaan raaste pyaar ke raaste pyaar ke anjaane hain ham terii aankhon ke diivaanen hain  2 har tarafthreedots

Title: baalii umariyaa bhajan karuun kaise
Lyrics: la baalii baalii umariyaa bhajan karuun kaise     chadhatii jawaanii jogan banuun kaise mu jhuuthaa jhuuthaa guru kaa vachan karuun kaise     saadhu huun teraa sajan banuun kaise     jhuuthaa  la ho chaal merii bahakii nazar merii dolii 2     chhuut gayaa bachapan badal gayii bolii mu terii tuu jaan mujhe chhod de akelaa     main na ban paauungaa saadhu se chhailaa     maayaa men man ko magan karuun kaise la chadhatii jawaanii threedots  mu naa ghar kii paravaah naa logon kaa dar hai 2     aisii kyaa terii hii chadhatii umar hai la jaane kyon tujh par na koii asar hai     terii aur merii baraabar umar hai     naazuk naazuk kamariyaa sambhal chaluun kaise mu saadhu huun teraa threedots  mu baar baar tujhako ye kaise samajhaauun 2     tujhase koii rishtaa main jod nahiin paauun la laaj lage batiyaan main kaise bataauun     aisaa naa ho main kunwaarii rah jaauun     thandii thandii ye man kii agan karuun kaise mu saadhu huun teraa threedots

Title: hai naa bolo bolo  paapaa ko mammii se
Lyrics: hai naa bolo bolo 3 paapaa ko mammii se mammii ko paapaa se pyaar hai pyaar hai  paapaa mammii milate hain chupakechupake hansate hain 2 jaane kyaakyaa kahate hain baaten karate rahate hain paapaa mammii milate hain chupakechupake hansate hain jaane kyaakyaa kahate hain baaten karate rahate hain hai naa bolo bolo 2 paapaa ko mammii se mammii ko paapaa se pyaar hai pyaar hai  mammii terii achchhii hai kitanii bholiibhaalii hai paapaa bhii to achchhe hain kitane pyaarepyaare hain  mammii terii achchhii hai kitanii bholiibhaalii hai paapaa bhii to achchhe hain kitane pyaarepyaare hain hai naa bolo bolo hai naa bolo bolo munnii bolo bolo diipuu bolo bolo paapaa ko mammii se mammii ko paapaa se pyaar hai pyaar hai  hai naa bolo bolo 2 paapaa ko diipuu se mammii ko munnii se pyaar hai pyaar hai

Title: sapanaa meraa tuut gayaa
Lyrics: sapanaa meraa tuut gayaa wo naa rahaa kuchh naa rahaa  sapanaa meraa tuut gayaa are wo naa rahaa kuchh naa rahaa rotii huiin yaaden miliin bas aur mujhe kuchh naa milaa  aapako aapako maaluum hai aapakii tarah meraa bhii ik sundar saajan thaa usakii aankhon men nashaa baazuu men taaqat aur dil men himmat thii bijalii kii tarah naachataa huaa wo mere paas aataa thaa gaataa thaa naachataa thaa main main main paagal ho jaatii thii dekho naa wo aa gayaa sirf mere liye mere liye  aajaa merii baahon men aa pyaar bharii raahon men aa sun le machalate hue dil kii sadaa re dil kii sadaa ho ho  dil kah rahaa hai teraa saath hai ye teraa meraa ab zindagii men kabhii ho naa judaa re ho naa judaa la la la la la raaja are phir se naa jaa chalaa gayaa  sapanaa meraa tuut gayaa woh naa rahaa kuchh naa rahaa rotii huiin yaaden miliin bas aur mujhe kuchh naa milaa  yuun baar baar ham milate the par haan ek din meraa haath pakadakar mujhe khiinchataa huaa wo le gayaa aur ek sundar gaadii men bithaakar bola haan ye tere liye hai raanii car zooming away raaja gaadii to hawaa se baaten kar rahii hai dekho naa mujhe dar lag rahaa hai suno naa raaja aahistaa please aahistaa gaadii rukii are main to isakii baahon men huun  sharamaanaa chhod de tuu ghabaraanaa chhod de tuu aaj to bujhaa de mere dil kii lagii re dil kii lagii ho ho  ham to hain jiivan saathii main huun diyaa tuu hai baatii pyaar men yuun jalane kaa hai naam zindagii re naam zindagii  la la la la la la la la la la  frustrated laugh pagale sapane bhii kahiin sach hote hain sapanaa hii thaa tuut gayaa  sapanaa meraa tuut gayaa wo naa rahaa kuchh naa rahaa

Title: chandaa ki kiranon se lipatii havaaen
Lyrics: chandaa ki kiranon se lipatii havaaen 2 sitaaron kii mahafil javaan  aa ke mil jaa  2 aisaa mausam mile phir kahaan  aa ke mil jaa  2 chandaa kiranon se threedots   nazaaron ke rangon men shabanam milaa ke terii maang bhar duun suhaagan banaa ke  2 bechain main huun betaab tuu hai bahaaren bhii hain meharabaan  aa ke mil jaa  2 aisaa mausam mile threedots   tere nain kahate hain terii kahaanii ki chhupate nahiin chdh ke chaand aur javaanii  2 qadam dagamagaanaa badan kaa churaanaa mohabbat ke hain ye nishaan  aa ke mil jaa  2 aisaa mausam mile threedots

Title: zahar detaa hai mujhe koii davaa detaa hai
Lyrics: zahar detaa hai mujhe koii davaa detaa hai jo bhii milataa hai mere gam ko badhaa detaa hai  kyon sulagatii hain mere dil men puraanii yaaden kaun bujhate hue sholon ko hawaa detaa hai  haal hanshansake bulaataa hai kabhii baanhon men kabhii maazii mujhe roroke sadaa detaa hai   zahar detaa hai mujhe koii davaa detaa hai jo bhii milataa hai mere gam ko badhaa detaa hai  kisii hamadam kaa sareshaam judaa ho jaanaa niind jalatii huiin aankhon se udaa detaa hai  vaqt hii dard ke kaanton pe sulaae dil ko vaqt hii dard kaa ahasaas mitaa detaa hai  pyaas itanii hai merii ruuh kii gaharaaii men ashk girataa hai to daaman ko jalaa detaa hai

Title: sukh ke sab saathii dukh men na koii
Lyrics: sukh ke saba saathii dukhamen na koii mere raama mere raama teraa naama hai saachaa duujaa na koii  jiivana aanii jaanii chhaayaa jhuuthii maayaa jhuuthii kaayaa phira kaahe ko saarii umariyaa  paapakii gatharii dhoii  naa kuchha teraa naa kuchha meraa ye jaga jogiivaalaa pheraa raajaa ho yaa ranka sabhiikaa anta ekasaa hoii  baaharakii tuu maatii phaanke manake bhiitara kyuun na jhaanke ujale tanapara maana kiyaa aur 	     manakii maila na dhoii

Title: tum merii zindagii men kuchh is tarah se aaye
Lyrics: la u u threedots  tum merii zindagii men kuchh is tarah se aaye ki bhuulaa saa kwaab jaise sach hoke muskaraaye la ho o o o tim merii threedots  la bhuulii bisarii kitanii yaaden aaj gale milane aaii hain  anjaane baahon se chunakar kaliyaan daaman men laaii hai ki itane suhaane safar kii kabhii manzil naa aane paaye la ho o o o tim merii threedots  ki rukatii badhatii dil kii dhadakan kahatii hai kitane afasaane  dil ke saagar kitane gahare dil hii samajhe dil hii jaane la aaye samajh men ye raaz tab jab umr biit jaaye  ho o o o tim merii threedots

Title: qayaamat hai ye kaisii gam kii shaam hai ye kaisii
Lyrics: ra 	qayaamat hai 4 	ye kaisii gam kii shaam hai ye kaisii ko 	qayaamat hai threedots  ra 	tuu piir hai faqiir hai 	tere dar pe sar hain jhuke hue o 	aankhon men aansuu ruke hue a 	ye barabaadii ko 	aa a 	huii kaisii ye barabaadii 	huii kaisii  	kis pe ye ilzaam hai 2  	savaal kaa javaab de kyon tere hote hue hai ye 	ye duaa hai yaa badduaa hai ye ko 	kyon tere hote hue ye 	ye duaa hai yaa badduaa hai ye ra 	basii bastii ujad jaae 2 	kyaa apanaa ye anjaam hai kyaa apanaa 	pukaar hai intazaar hai  a 	kisii roz to koii aaegaa ra 	ham sabakii jo bigadii banaaegaa ko 	kisii roz to koii aaegaa 	ham sabakii bigadii banaaegaa 	chale aae yahaan ko 	qayaamat hai 2 do 	ab aage teraa kaam hai ab aage a 	ye kaisii 	gam kii shaam hai threedots

Title: aapake kamare men koii rahataa hai
Lyrics: ki 	aapake kamare men koii rahataa hai 	ham nahiin kahate zamaanaa kahataa hai  	ham aaj idhar se guzare to bade itmiinaan se 	giraa rahaa thaa koii paradaa haay sareshaam se 	udhar aapakii photo se sajii diivaar pe 	padaa huaa thaa ek saayaa bade aaraam se 	aapake kamare men threedots  aa 	magar ek din main guzarii galii men sarakaar kii 	tabhii se chalatii dil pe haay talavaar sii 	dabiidabii halkiihalkii hansii kii adaao men 	machal rahii kisii chuudii kii haay jhankaar sii 	yah na samajho koii gaafil rahataa hai  ki 	agar main kahuun jo dekhaa nahiin thaa vah koii kvaab 	padaa thaa table pe chashmaa vah kisakaa janaab 	gore gale men vah mafalar thaa kis hasiin kaa 	zaraa haath dil par rakh kar diijie javaab 	aapake kamare men threedots

Title: meghaa chhaae aadhii raat bairan ban gaii nindiyaa
Lyrics: meghaa chhaae aadhii raat bairan ban gai nindiyaa  bataa de main kyaa karuun  meghaa chhaae aadhii raat bairan ban gai nindiyaa   sab ke aangan diyaa jale re more aangan jiyaa  havaa laage shuul jaisii taanaa maare chunariyaa   2 kaise kahuun main man kii baat bairan ban gayin nindiyaa  bataa de main kyaa karuun  meghaa chhaae aadhii raat bairan ban gai nindiyaa   tuut gaye re sapane saare chhuut gayi re aashaa  nain bahe re gangaa more phir bhi man hai pyaasaa   2 aaii hai aansuu kii baaraat bairan ban gayi nindiyaa  bataa de main kyaa karuun  meghaa chhaae aadhii raat bairan ban gai nindiyaa

Title: sonaa kare jhilamil jhilamil
Lyrics: sonaa sonaa ruupaa ruupaa  sonaa kare jhilamil jhilamil ruupaa hanse kaise khilakhil aahaa aahaa vrishhti pade taapur tupur tip tip taapur tupur vrishhti pade taapur tupur taapur tupur  kaagaz kii chhotii sii naiyyaa jal kii ye laharen lipatii khevaiyyaa hoke isii naiyyaa pe savaar chal den chal nadiyaa ke paar jaamun jahaan madhur moti miithii madhur madhur vrishhti pade taapur tupur taapur tupur sonaa   threedots  baadal yuun shor machaaye parabat kaa bhii dil hil jaaye lekin bayaa badii hoshiyaar aisaa ghar kare taiyyaar tanik na ho idhar udhar vrishhti pade taapur tupur taapur tupur sonaa   threedots  laal gulaabii niile piile indradhanush ke rang sajiile dekho dekho gagan kii bahaar rangon kaa lagaa hai baazaar duniyaa dekhe tukur tukur khel ye tukur tukur vrishhti pade taapur tupur taapur tupur sonaa   threedots

Title: tadap tadap sagarii rain gujarii
Film: shataranj ke khilaadi the chess players
Lyrics: tadap tadap sagarii rain gujarii kaun des gayo saanwariyaa hoa bhar aaii ankhiyaan madawaarii tadap tadap gayii chunariyaa  tumhare ghodan mere dwaare se jo nikase sudh bhuul gayii main baawariyaa  tadap tadap sagarii rain gujarii kaun des gayo saanwariyaa

Title: sone detii hai na raat koii baat karo
Lyrics: sone detii hai na raat koii baat karo ho suhaagan ye mulaakaat koii baat karo  tuu javaan main bhii javaan pyaas javaan dil javaan main jaluun ban ke patangaa tuu machal ban ke shamaa ishq kii umar hai ik raat koii baat karo sone detii hai na threedots  haay maasuum nazar usape qaatil ye adaa jaise de javaanii bachapan ko sadaa jaane phir ho ke na ho saath koii baat karo ho suhaagan ye threedots  jaise bachchaa koii kho jaae mele men karavaten badale koii aarazuu dil men yuun bahake hue jazbaat koii baat karo ho suhaagan ye threedots

Title: jay ho raadheshyaam kii  ii hai bambaii nagariyaa tuu dekh
Lyrics: jay ho raadheshyaam kii jay ho siyaaraam kii aur jay ho bambaiidhaam kii  ii he ii hai ii hai bambaii nagariyaa tuu dekh babuuaa 2 sonechaandii kii dagariyaa tuu dekh babuuaa   jaaduutone kii bajariyaa men  2 maayaa kii nagariyaa men badale jhatapat badale muqaddar kaa lekh babuuaa ii hai bambaii nagariyaa threedots  o dekho duurduur se 2 log duurduur se ihaan aate hain daanv lagaane 2 desgaanv chhod ke priitpyaar tod ke  soyaasoyaa nasiibaa jagaane  2  are apanaa kyaa hogaa  2 hogaa so hogaa paasaa hamane diyaa hai phenk babuuaa ii hai bambaii nagariyaa threedots   o koii maalaamaal hai  2 koii tangahaal hai zindagii hai ihaan kii niraalii 2 maal kitanaa bharaa phir bhii dekho zaraa ihaan har aadamii hai savaalii 2 bigadii banaa le are bigadii banaa le tuu cash karavaa le apane muqaddar kaa cheque babuuaa ii hai bambaii nagariyaa threedots  ye shaharon men shahar hai shahar bambaiivaa are vaahvaah bambaiivaa ye baat sabhii ultii phir bhii vaah re bambaiiyaa 2 bin paanii kaa dhobii taalaab dekho dekho ihaan retii pe paanii kaa bhaav dekho dekho ghodon pe karodon kaa daanv dekho hasiinon se sabhii kaa lagaav dekho koii bandar nahiin hai phir bhii naam baandraa ajab hai ye rang anokhaa hai dhang naii hai tarang naii hai umang koii kanjuus hai koii hai malang machii hai yahaan dekho aapas men jang aahaa  aapas men jang  2 de ghumaa ke are samundar men jaise hai ghul gaii bhang ye rang dekh ke main ho gayaa dang to kyaa samajhe ii hai bambaii nagariyaa threedots

Title: jaanejahaan ruuthaa na karo
Lyrics: jaanejahaan ruuthaa na karo koii jii na sake aisaa na karo  2  do hii pal men bhuule meraa pyaar tum kyaa jaano kyaa hai intazaar naadaan ho abhii samajhaa to karo jaanejahaan ruuthaa na karo koii jii na sake aisaa na karo  ab do hamako chaahe jo sazaa ho gaii ab to hamase ye kataa jaane do sanam jhagadaa na karo jaanejahaan ruuthaa na karo koii jii na sake aisaa na karo  jaanejahaan ruuthaa na karo koii jii na sake aisaa na karo aisaa na karo aisaa na karo

Title: are  koii maane yaa naa maane  oy paise vasuul
Lyrics: are koii maane yaa naa maane mere dil kii mahabuubaa ne meraa tohafaa kiyaa qabuul oy kudaa kii qasam aaj  paise vasuul  2 koii maane yaa naa threedots  aankh terii taubaataubaa taubaataubaa zulfen allaaallaaallaa chaahe kuchh ho thaam liyaa hai maine teraa ye pallaa sab ladake chhodaa naa maine teraa ye pallaa sab kuchh teraa le jaa bas ek nishaanii de jaa pyaar bharaa ye phuul dede ye le kudaa kii qasam aaj threedots  vaade kyaa hain qasamen kyaa hain ye to duniyaa jaane meraa pyaar hai sachchaa baaqii hain sab afasaane kaahe kaa ye sharamaanaa kaahe kaa ye ghabaraanaa aaj mere sang jhuum le aa aa jaanaa lo aa gaii kudaa kii qasam aaj threedots

Title: tuu laalii hai savere vaalii gagan rang de
Lyrics: ki 	tuu laalii hai savere vaalii gagan rang de tuu mere man kaa aa 	jo suuraj tuu main dharatii terii tuu saathii hai mere jiivan kaa ki 	tuu laalii hai threedots aa 	jo suuraj tuu threedots  ki 	ho teremere biich kii mitegii kab duurii aa 	ho hotii hai kuchh to sanam sabhii kii majabuurii ki 	tum ho nigaahon men kab aaogii baanhon men aa 	tum men jo himmat ho mujh se mohabbat ho 	jag se mujhe chhiin lo ki 	tuu laalii hai threedots aa 	jo suuraj tuu threedots  aa 	ho tere hii phere karuun khiinchii huii main aauun ki 	ho dekhuun tujhe duur se gale naa lag jaauun aa 	kisane tumhen rokaa kar lo vo jo sochaa ki 	hansii naa udaao aur naa jalaao 	aanchal kii tum chhaanv do ki 	tuu laalii hai threedots aa 	jo suuraj tuu threedots

Title: yuunhii tum mujhase baat karatii ho
Lyrics: ra yuunhii tum mujhase baat karatii ho     yaa koii pyaar kaa iraadaa hai la adaaen dil kii jaanataa hii nahiin     meraa hamadam bhii kitanaa saadaa hai  ra roz aatii ho tum kayaalon men	2     zindagii men bhii merii aa jaao     biit jaae na ye savaalon men     is javaanii pe kuchh taras khaao la haaledil samajho sanam	2     munh se na kahenge ham     hamaarii bhii koii maryaadaa hai yuunhii tumthreedots      ra ban gaii ho merii sadaa ke liye     yaa mujhe yuun hii tum banaatii ho la kahiin baahon men na bhar luun tumako     kyon mere hausale badhaatii ho ra hausale aur karo faasale duur karo     paas aate na daro     dil na todenge apanaa vaadaa hai yuunhii tumthreedots      ra bholepan men hai vafaa kii khushabuu     isape sab kuchh na kyuun lutaauun main la meraa betaab dil ye kahataa hai     tere saae se lipat jaauun main ra mujhase ye mel teraa   2     na ho ik khel teraa     ye karam mujhape kuchh ziyaadaa hai yuunhii tumthreedots

Title: dil kii kalii yuun hii sadaa khilatii rahe hansatii rahe
Lyrics: la la la la la  2  du ru daa raa du ru daa raa du ru du ru du ru du  2  dil kii kalii yuun hii sadaa khilatii rahe hansatii rahe bagiyaa tumhaarii mahakatii rahe  2  bhaabhii  shaadiyaan kar chuke jitane bhii yaar the ek ham rah gaye taaliyaan maarate gar duaa hai doston kii mahafil to sajatii rahe  la la threedots du ru threedots  2  ye jo hai biich men chaand saa laadalaa do dilon ke jawaan pyaar kaa silasilaa isake jiivan men khushii kii barakhaa barasatii rahe  la la threedots  2  du ru threedots  2  dil kii kalii threedots

Title: mere ghar aaii ek nanhii parii ek nanhii parii
Lyrics: mere ghar aai ek nanhii parii ek nanhii parii chaandanii ke hasiin rath pe savaar mere ghar aai threedots  usakii baaton men shahad jaisii mithaas usakii saason men itar kii mahakaas honth jaise ke bhiigebhiige gulaab gaal jaise ke bahakebahake anaar mere ghar aai threedots  usake aane se mere aangan men khil uthe phuul gunagunaayii bahaar dekh kar usako jii nahiin bharataa chaahe dekhuun use hazaaron baar     2 mere ghar aai threedots  maine puuchhaa use ke kaun hai tuu hansake bolii ke main huun teraa pyaar main tere dil men thii hameshaa se ghar men aai huun aaj pahalii baar mere ghar aai threedots

Title: haalchaal thiikthaak hai sab kuchh thiikthaak hai
Lyrics: haalchaal thiikthaak hai sab kuchh thiikthaak hai lagataa hai vo bhii enven kiyaa kaam nahiin hai varanaa yahaan aapakii duaa se sab thiikthaak hai haalchaal thiikthaak hai   aabohavaavaavaavaavaavaa aabohavaa desh kii bahut saaf hai qaayadaa hai qaanuun hai insaaf hai allaah miyaan jaane koii jiye yaa mare aadamii ko khuunvuun sab maaf hai aur kyaa kahuun chhotiimotii chorii rishvatkhorii  detii hain apanaa guzaaraa yahaan  aapakii duaa se baaqii thiikthaak hai  baazaaron ke bhaav baazaaron ke bhaav haan baazaaron ke bhaav mere taauu se bade makaanon pe pagadiivaale sasur khade buddhii bhuukh maratii nahiin zindaa hai abhii koii in buzurgon se kaise lade aur kyaa kahuun roz koii miiting roz koii bhaashhan bhaashhan pe raashan nahiin hai yahaan aapakii duaa se baaqii thiikthaak hai  golmol rotii kaa pahiyaa chalaa  2 piichhepiichhe chaandii kaa rupaiyaa chalaa  rotii ko bechaarii ko chiil le gayii o terii chaandii leke munh kaalaa kauvaa chalaa aur kyaa kahuun maut kaa tamaashaa chalaa hai betahaashaa  jiine kii furasat nahiin hai yahaan  aapakii duaa se baaqii thiikthaak hai very good  haalchaal thiikthaak hai

Title: o saathii re tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa
Lyrics: o saathii re tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa  phuulon men kaliyon men sapanon kii galiyon men  tere binaa kuchh kahiin na  tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa   2  o saathii re tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa  jaane kaise anajaane hii aan basaa koii pyaase man men apanaa sab kuchh kho baithe hain paagal man ke paagalapan men dil ke afasaanethreedots dil ke afasaane main jaanuun tuu jaane aur ye jaane koii na tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa o saathii rethreedots  har dhadakan men pyaas hai terii saanson men terii khushabuu hai is dharatii se us ambar tak merii nazar men tuu hii tuu hai pyaar ye tuute na threedots pyaar ye tuute na tuu mujhase ruuthe na saath ye chhuute kabhii na tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa o saathii re threedots  tujh bin jogan merii raaten tujh bin mere din banjaaran meraa jiivan jalatii buunden bujhebujhe mere sapane saare tere binaa merii threedots tere binaa merii mere binaa terii ye zindagii zindagii na tere binaa bhii kyaa jiinaa o saathii rethreedots

Title: chham chham baaje re paayaliyaa
Lyrics: chhamchham baaje re paayaliyaa raah chalat lachake panihaarii chhalake gagariyaa chham chham baaje re paayaliyaa threedots  gore badan par bhiigii saarii aur lage sundar ye naarii motii banbana tapake paanii bhiigata jaaye dagariyaa chham chham baaje re paayaliyaa threedots  chandramukhii jab lat bikharaaye jag saaraa ye dhokhaa khaaye koii kahe lo saavan aayaa aayii kaarii badariyaa chham chham baaje re paayaliyaa threedots  mukhade par aanchal malamal kaa yaa koii khilataa phuul kamal kaa aayii na jaane kaun nagar se jaaye kaun nagariyaa chham chham baaje re paayaliyaa threedots

Title: khilate hain gul yahaan khilake bikharane ko
Lyrics: khilate hain gul yahaan khilake bikharane ko milate hain dil yahaan milake bichhadane ko khilate hain gul yahaan threedots  kal rahe naa rahe mausam ye pyaar kaa  kal ruke na ruke dolaa bahaar kaa   2 chaar pal mile jo aaj pyaar men guzaar de khilate hain gul yahaan threedots  jhiilon ke honthon par meghon kaa raag hai phuulon ke siine men thandii thandii aag hai dil ke aaine men tuu ye samaa utaar de khilate hain gul yahaan threedots  pyaasaa hai dil sanam pyaasii ye raat hai honthon me dabii dabii koii miithii baat hai in lamhon pe aaj tuu har khushii nisaar de khilate hain gul yahaan threedots

Lyrics: tere naam kaa diiwaanaa tere ghar ko dhuundhataa hai jis nazar pe dil fidaa hai us nazar ko dhuundhataa hai tere naam kaa diiwaanaa threedots  aawaaz dil kii pahachaan le main kaun huun tuu ye jaan le ek raat kaa sitaaraa ek sahar ko dhuundhataa hai tere naam kaa diiwaanaa threedots  jaanewafaa o jaanejigar ye bhi nahiin tujhako hai kabar is safar men ye musaafir hamsafar ko dhuundhataa hai tere naam kaa diiwaanaa threedots

Title: chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya
Lyrics: hoa hoa hoa ore saanvariyaa chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya 2 ho chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya dekh ke tujhako huii baanvariyaa dhadakan ke sang aae saanvariyaa chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya ho chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya  chodaa mainne saare jag ko tuu mere man bhaayaa main naachuun meraa manavaa naache naache meraa saayaa priit ke giit 2 sunaane ko main aa gaii saajan terii nagariyaa chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya ho chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya  kar gae kaisaa jaaduu mujh par tere tiikhe nainaa o jaaduugar tere liye meraa man tadape din rainaa ghaayal kar gaii 2 pagale man ko saajan terii pahalii najariyaa chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya 2 ho chan chan chan morii baaje paayaliya 2

Title: savere kaa suuraj tumhaare liye hai
Lyrics: savere ka suuraj tumhare liye hai ye bujhate diye ko na tum yaad karanaa  hue ek biitii hui baat ham to  koi aansuu ham par na barabaad karanaa   tumhare liye ham tumhare diye ham  lagan ki agan men abhii tak jale hain  hamaarii kamii tum ko mahasuus kyon ho  tumhaarii subah ham tumhen de chale hain  jo har dam tumhari khushi chaahate hain  udaas hoke unako na naashaad karanaa  savere threedots  sabhii vaqt ke aage jhukate rahe hain  kisi ke liye vaqt rukataa nahiin hai chiraag apanii dharatii kaa bujhataa hai jab bhii sitaare to ambar ke hote nahiin hain  koi naav tuufaan men duube to kyaa hai kinaare to saagar ke hote nahiin hain kinaare to saagar ke hote nahiin hain hain ham dolatii naav duube to kyaa hai kinaare ho tum tum na fariyaad karanaa savere kaa suuraj threedots  chaman se jo ek phul bichhadaa to kyaa hai naye gul se gulashan ko aabaad karanaa  savere threedots

Title: gangaa teraa paanii amrit
Lyrics: gangaa teraa paanii amrit jharjhar bahataa jaae yugyug se is desh kii dharatii tujhase jiivan paae gangaa teraa paanii threedots  duur himaalay se tuu aaii giit suhaane gaatii bastiibastii parvatparvat sukhsandesh sunaatii terii chaandii jaisii dhaaraa miilon tak laharaae gangaa teraa paanii threedots  kitane suuraj ubhareduube gangaa tere dvaare yugonyugon kii kathaa sunaaen tere bahate dhaare tujhako chhod ke bhaarat kaa itihaas likhaa na jaae gangaa teraa paanii threedots  is dharatii kaa dukhsukh tuune apane biich samoyaa jabjab desh gulaam huaa hai teraa paanii royaa jabjab ham aazaad hue hain tere tat muskaae gangaa teraa paanii threedots  khetonkheton tujhase jaagii dharatii par hariyaalii fasalen teraa raag alaapen jhuume baaliibaalii teraa paanii pii kar mittii sone men dhal jaae gangaa teraa paanii threedots  tere daan kii daulat uunche khalihaanon men dhalatii kushiyon ke mele lagate mehanat kii daalii phalatii lahaklahak kar dhuum machaate terii god men jaae gangaa teraa paanii threedots

Title: maine kuchh khoyaa hai  tere pyaar men
Lyrics: maine kuchh khoyaa hai maine kuchh paayaa hai tere pyaar men 2 mere kuchh vaade hain mere kuchh aramaan hain mere kuchh sapane hain maine kuchh khoyaa threedots   kafaa hone kaa ye koii daur nahiin tere sivaa mere koii aur nahiin  2 duniyaa kii aankhon se bachenge ham kahaan aur qariib aur qariib aa jaanejahaan main tere piichhe huun koii mere piichhe hai dushman itane hain maine kuchh khoyaa threedots   terii bholii adaa pe bechain huun main abhii tujhe pataa nahiin kaun huun main  2 man meraa paapii hai bachaa mujhe sanam hanso nahiin jo main kahuun sach hai sanam are kyaa jaane tuu nahiin pahachaane tuu mujhe gam kitane hain maine kuchh khoyaa threedots

Title: dolii chadhate hii hiir ne bain kiye
Lyrics: dolii chadhate hii hiir ne bain kiye o mujhe le chale baabul le chale ve mujhe rok le baabul rok le tuu dolii bairii kahaar lai chale re  do chaar ghadii bhii na chain paayaa duhkh dard musiibaten lai chale ve meraa kahaa sunaa sab maaf karanaa kuchh roz tere ghar rah chale ve  tujhe raanjhanaa rab ke havaale kiyaa ham des men zaalimaa ke chale ve rahii pyaar kii jholii dekh khaalii koii chiiz bhii saath na le chale ve  mere baad kabar terii kaun legaa tere bhaag men hai tanhaaiyaan ve mujhe aur ummiid thii aur huaa kii rab ne beparavaainyaa ve o kii rab ne beparavaainyaa ve

Title: kajaraa lagaa ke gajaraa sajaa ke bijurii giraa ke
Lyrics: ki 	kajaraa lagaa ke gajaraa sajaa ke bijurii giraa ke jaiyo naa la 	nain milaa ke chain churaa ke nindiyaa udaa ke jaiyo naa  ki 	mukhadaa na dekho darpan men jhaanko zaraa mere man men 	aise jiyaa pe chhaaii ho jaise ghataaen saavan men 	raat aur din tumhare bin man men aur kaun hai 	ab zid chhodo na aageaage daudo dil naa meraa todo 	ghunghataa giraa ke mukhadaa chhipaa ke bijurii giraa ke jaiyo naa la 	nain milaa ke threedots  	chhodo merii 	ho o zulmii 	chhodo merii kalaaii ko sun lo merii duhaaii ko 	kyon chhedate ho raste men ladakii kisii paraaii ko 	meraa naam ho badanaam jo koii dekh le 	chalo hato jaao jiyaa na dhadakaao dekho baaj aao 	apanaa banaa ke sapanaa dikhaa ke nindiyaa udaa ke jaiyo naa ki 	kajaraa lagaa ke threedots

Title: ek pyaar kaa nagamaa hai maujon kii ravaanii hai
Lyrics: ek pyaar kaa nagamaa hai maujon kii ravaanii hai	 zindagii aur kuchh bhii nahiin terii merii kahaanii hai  2  kuchh paakar khonaa hai kuchh khokar paanaa hai jiivan kaa matalab to aanaa aur jaanaa hai do pal ke jiivan se ek umr churaanii hai zindagii aurthreedots  tuu dhaar hai nadiyaa kii main teraa kinaaraa huun tuu meraa sahaaraa hai main teraa sahaaraa huun aankhon men samandar hai aashaaon kaa paanii hai zindagii aurthreedots  tuufaan to aanaa hai aakar chale jaanaa hai baadal hai ye kuchh pal kaa chhaakar dhal jaanaa hai parachhaainyaan rah jaatiin rah jaatii nishaanii hai zindagii aurthreedots  jo dil ko tasallii de vo saaz uthaa laao dam ghutane se pahale hii aavaaz uthaa laao khushiyon kii tamannaa hai ashkon kii ravaanii hai zindagii aurthreedots

Title: aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin
Lyrics: aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pahale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin merii bhii zindagii kaante se phuul ho dil jo gariib kaa tumako qubuul ho  aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pahale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin aap saa koii hasiin  in hasiin aankhon se dil kaa payaam lo ek diiwaane kaa pahalaa salaam lo dil duaaen degaa girate ko thaam lo in hasiin aankhon se dil kaa payaam lo ek diiwaane kaa pahalaa salaam lo dil duaaen degaa girate ko thaam lo qariibeaashanaa itane qariib ho lagataa mujhako ki tum mere habiib ho  aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pahale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin aap saa koii hasiin  malakaaedil jaanaan meraa naam aaj hai husn kii suurat hai gulon kaa mizaaj hai aap ke sar bhii ulafat kaa taaj hai malakaaedil jaanaan meraa naam aaj hai husn kii suurat hai gulon kaa mizaaj hai aap ke sar bhii ulafat kaa taaj hai mittii ko aapane pahunchaa diyaa kahaan jaise ude koii taaron ke darmiyaan  aap saa koii hasiin dilarubaaodilanashiin aap se pahale kahiin hamane dekhaa hii nahiin aap saa koii hasiin

Title: ye javaanii hai diivaanii
Lyrics: ye javaanii hai diivaanii hat merii raanii ruk jaa o raanii dekh zaraa piichhe mudake chalii kahaan aise ud ke gili gili akkhaa gili gili akkhaa bili bili bili   threedots  baaten mulaaqaaten karane kii shaam hai aise men ruuthanaa diivanon kaa kaam hai he ye javaanii hai diivaanii   threedots  khilake dil milate khil jaataa banake phuul par tujhako na bhuuli chhotii sii merii bhuul he ye javaanii hai diivaanii   threedots  ruuthii chalii jhuuthii hat chhuutii dostii shiqavaa hai honthon pe aankhon men pyaar bhii he ye javaanii hai diivaanii   threedots

Title: i am in love  koii hai aashiq koii mahabuub hai
Lyrics: koii hai aashiq koii mahabuub hai yah duniyaa kuub hai 2  kahiin pe romiyojuuliyat kahiin raanjhaa kahiin hiir kahiin shiiriifarahaad ye naam sabako hai yaad sabake bahaane dil se manasuub hain yah duniyaa kuub hai threedots  kitane hain mausam lekin yah rut hai ek suhaanii barason kii zindagaanii men do din kii hai javaanii aur ye javaanii dil se manasuub hai yah duniyaa kuub hai threedots

Title: thodaa ruk jaayegii to teraa kyaa jaayegaa
Lyrics: thodaa ruk jaayegii to teraa kyaa jaayegaa nain bhar ke dekh lenge chain aa jaayegaa o kaaminii o kaaminii thoda ruk jaayegii   threedots  dhiilaa dhiilaa kurtaa hai pajaamaa tang tang hai apanii adaa hai terii apanaa hii rang hai thoda ruk jaayegii   threedots  diijiye to ek maukaa apane paas aane kaa naam nahiin lenge aap aur kahiin jaane kaa thoda ruk jaayegii   threedots  gesuon men raat khoyii dil bhii meraa kho gayaa koii teraa ho na ho dil meraa teraa ho gayaa thoda ruk jaayegii   threedots

Lyrics: mu 	 kar le dil kii baat  2  aaj mauqaa hai  2 la 	 chal duniyaa ke saath  2  aaj mauqaa hai  2  	pyaar teraa dhadakan men rakh luun miithaa dard banaa ke 	apane ghuunghat kii badalii men le jaauun tujhe chhupaa ke mu 	apane maathe pe likh luun tujhako taqadiir banaa ke 	terii duniyaa men kho jaauun apanaa aap bhulaa ke 	 naachuun tere saath  2  aaj mauqaa hai  2 la 	 chal duniyaa ke threedots  mu 	pataliipatalii qamar ye terii lachak gaii bal khaa ke 	lut gayaa ik paradesii gorii terii galii men aa ke la 	jitane bhii aramaan hain mere sab ke giit banaa de 	sab rang phiike pad jaaen tuu aisaa rang jamaa de 	are  kar de sabako maat  2  aaj mauqaa hai  2 mu 	kar le dil kii threedots  	jhukjhuk lambe ho gae terii palakon ke ye saae 	maang ye terii zulfon kii kuchh kahane se sharamaae la 	apane munh se kaise kah duun tujhako hii man chaahe 	mere dil kii baat sharam se honthon pe ruk jaae 	are  sab kuchh tere haath  2  aaj mauqaa hai  2 mu 	kar le dil kii threedots la 	chal duniyaa ke threedots

Title: le to aaye ho hamen sapanon kii gaanv men
Film: dulhan wahi jo piya man bhaye
Lyrics: le to aaye ho hamen sapanon kii gaanv men pyaar kii chhaanv men bithaaye rakhanaa sajanaa o sajanaa threedots  tumane chhuaa to taar baj uthe man ke tum jaisaa chaaho rahe vaise hii ban ke tum se shuruu tumhiin pe kahaanii khatm kare duujaa na aaye koii naino ke gaanv men le to aaye ho hamen threedots  chhotaa saa ghar ho apanaa pyaaraa saa jag ho koii kisii se pal bhar na alag ho isake sivaa ab duujii koii chaah nahiin hansate rahe ham donon phuulon ke gaanv men le to aaye ho hamen threedots

Title: chup ho aaj kaho kyaa hai baat
Lyrics: chup ho aaj kaho kyaa hai baat zaraa bolo naa dhal na jaaye kahiin dhalatii raat zaraa bolo naa 2 na to jaagatii na to soii sii badii duur ho kahiin khoii sii zaraa bolo naa chup ho aaj kaho kyaa hai baat zaraa bolo naa bolo naa dhal na jaaye kahiin dhalatii raat zaraa bolo naa  yuun to saath ho sabake par judaa judaa sii ho is hasiin mahafil se kuchh kafaa kafaa sii ho saans kii kushabuu aankh kaa jaaduu is mahafil men gholo naa chup ho aaj kaho kyaa hai baat zaraa bolo naa bolo bolo dhal na jaaye kahiin dhalatii raat zaraa bolo naa  in hasiin aankhon men berukii nahiin sajatii phuul jaise honthon pe kaamoshii nahiin sajatii naaz ye kyaa hai raaz ye kyaa hai chup na raho dil kholo naa chup ho aaj kaho kyaa hai baat zaraa bolo naa dhal na jaaye kahiin dhalatii raat zaraa bolo naa  na to jaagatii na to soii sii badii duur ho kahiin khoii sii zaraa bolo naa  chup ho aaj kaho kyaa hai baat zaraa bolo naa bolo naa dhal na jaaye kahiin dhalatii raat zaraa bolo naa

Title: na jaane kyon hotaa hai ye zindagii ke saath
Lyrics: na jaane kyuun hotaa hai ye zindagii ke saath achaanak ye man kisii ke jaane ke baad  kare phir usakii yaad chhotii chhotii sii baat  na jaane kyuun   vo anjaan pal dhal gaye kal aaj vo rang badal badal  man ko machal machal rahen na chal na jaane kyuun vo anjaan pal tere binaa mere nainon me tuute re haay re sapanon ke mahal na jaane kyuun hotaa hai ye zindagii ke saath threedots  vahii hai dagar vahii hai safar hai nahiin saath mere magar  ab meraa hamasafar dhuundhe nazar na jaane kyuun vahii hai dagar kahaan gain shaamen madabharii vo mere mere vo din gaye kidhar na jaane kyuun hotaa hai ye zindagii ke saath threedots

Lyrics: mere lie aatii hai shaam chandaa bhii hai meraa gulaam dharatii se sitaaron tak hai meraa intazaam raaton kaa raajaa huun main  mahafil saje doluun jidhar se saaqii bahake merii nazar se chaahuun to abhii khud chal ke aae jaam raaton kaa raajaa threedots  khidakii khule mujhe bulaae mahalon men hai mere hii saae sotejaagate sab jaanen meraa naam raaton kaa raajaa threedots  mainen javaan honthon kii laalii akasar palakon se hii churaa lii saare gulabadan mujhe karate hain salaam dharatii se sitaaron tak threedots

Lyrics: he kahiye kahaan se aanaa huaa cheharaa to hai pahachaanaa huaa  he kahiye kahaan se aanaa huaa cheharaa to hai pahachaanaa huaa  ho sochiye naii baat koii ab ye mazaak puraanaa huaa  wo suhaanaa milan pyaar kii wo lagan bhuul gaye kyaa sanam  tarram parram parram pam  kahiye kahaan se aanaa huaa bhupinder cheharaa to hai pahachaanaa huaa  ho sochiye naii baat koii ab ye mazaak puraanaa huaa  wo suhaanaa milan pyaar kii wo lagan bhuul gaye kyaa sanam  yaad ab aayaa re haan aagare kii kunj galiyaan  para pa para pa para pa para pa  yaad ab aayaa re haan aagare kii kunj galiyaan  piichhepiichhe ladakon kii fauj aageaage tum merii jaan  phir lage the gale taajamahal tale bhuul gaye kyaa sanam  tarram parram parram pam kahiye kahaan se aanaa huaa cheharaa to hai pahachaanaa huaa  ho sochie naii baat koii ab ye mazaak puraanaa huaa  aaine men kabhii dekh lete chhabii bhuul gaye kyaa sanam  wa wa wa wa wa wa wow wa wa wa wa wa wa wow wa wa wa wa wa wa wow  yaad hai saawan kii rumajhum jab the mere pyaar men gum  pa ra pa pa ra pa pa ra pa pa ra pa  yaad hai saawan kii rumajhum jab the mere pyaar men gum  maar ke thokar apanon ko ghar se bhaag liye the tum  phir hamaarii chhadii yaar aisii padii bhuul gaye kyaa sanam  tarram parram parram pam  kahiye kahaan se aanaa huaa  ta ra ra  cheharaa to hai pahachaanaa huaa  la la la ho sochiye naii baat koii ab ye mazaak puraanaa huaa  la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la  tarram parram parram pam  kahiye kahaan se aanaa huaa cheharaa to hai pahachaanaa huaa  are are ye to asalii tapak padii  kahiye kahaan se aanaa huaa cheharaa to hai pahachaanaa huaa  hukka hua hukka hua hu hu hukaa hua

Lyrics: sochaa thaa mainne to ai jaan merii motiyon se bhar duungaa maang terii par kuchh naa tujhe de sakaa ik majabuur dil ke siwaa  sochaa thaa mainne to ai jaan merii motiyon se bhar duungaa maang terii par kuchh naa tujhe de sakaa ik majabuur dil ke siwaa  tadape dil palakon ke peechhe kitane mahal kwaabon ke liye khilate kabhi to mahalon ke dar gadate kabhi aramaanon ke diye tuu hansatii ik gul kii tarah main gaataa bulabul kii tarah  sochaa thaa mainne to ai jaan merii motiyon se bhar duungaa maang terii  kab chaahaa parbat ban jaanaa detaa hai jo sadiyon kaa pataa chaahuun bas ik pal kaa taraanaa banake kisii gunache kii sadaa khil jaataa ik pal hii sahii dhuul kaa phir aanchal hii sahii  sochaa thaa mainne to ai jaan merii motiyon se bhar duungaa maang terii  phir bhii is jalate siine men ab to yahii aramaan pale chaandii ke sone ke kazaane rakh duun tere qadamon ke tale uthataa hai tuufaan uthe lutatii hai to jaan lute  o jaan e man ghabaraao nahiin main tere saath huun to phir

Title: tum bhii chalo ham bhii chalen chalatii rahe zindagii
Lyrics: tum bhi chalo ham bhi chalen chalatii rahe zindagii  2  na zamiin manzil na aasamaan zindagii hai zindagii  tum bhi chalo ham bhi chalen chalatii rahe zindagii   piichhe dekhen na kabhi mud ke raahon men ho  jhume meraa dil tumhen leke baahon men ho  dhadakanon kii zubaan nit kaahe daastaan  pyaar kii jhilmil chhaaon men palatii rahe zindagii  tum bhi chalo ham bhi chalen chalatii rahe zindagii   bahate chale ham mastii ke dhaaron men ho  gunje yahii dhun sada dil ke taaron men ho  ab ruke na kahiin pyaar ka kaaravaan  nit nai rut ke rang men dhalati rahe zindagii  tum bhi chalo ham bhi chalen chalatii rahe zindagii  na zamiin manzil na aasamaan zindagii hai zindagii  tum bhi chalo ham bhi chalen chalatii rahe zindagii   ab yahaan koii nahiin koii nahiin aayegaa

Title: logo na maaro ise
Lyrics: logon na maaro ise yahii to meraa diladaar hai dil se jo dil takaraaye nahiin dushamanii ye pyaar hai ham zaraa jo ulajh gaye kyuun ladaaii samajh gaye pyaarii pyaarii ye thii hamaarii mohabbat kii dillagii zaraa kaahe ko ruuthaa divaanaa meraa tuu hii to sapanaa suhaanaa meraa ye lo saiyaan main hii haarii ulataa padaa nishaanaa meraa  2 tut tut tut tut threedots kaahe ko ruuthaa divaanaa meraa   yuun to shuruu se huun main tum hii par ye dil haare hue lekin kafaa hoke tum to aaj aur bhii pyaare hue pyaar thaa to sataayaa tumhen rang adaa kaa dikhaayaa tumhen kaisaa naadaan bholaa bhaalaa abhii tak hai mastaanaa meraa kaahe ko ruuthaa divaanaa meraa  threedots  tere milan se yuun hii mahakataa rahe meraa jahaan sadaa sajii rahuun gale kabhii na dhale ab ye samaa terii chaahat javaanii merii teraa gam zindagaanii merii tujh ko chaahuun tujhii ko puujuun yahii bas ho afasaanaa meraa kaahe ye ruuthaa divaanaa meraa  threedots

Title: bhadak rahii hai aag sii hawaaon men
Lyrics: bhadak rahii hai aag sii hawaaon men sulag rahaa huun baadalon kii chaanvon men bahaar mujhase chhin gaii mujhe bahaar chaahiye mujhe sukuun chaahiye mujhe qaraar chaahiye  kisii kii dillagii ko pyaar jaan ke main lut gayaa huun dil kii baat maan ke 2 na mujhako chaahiye wafaa na mujhako pyaar chaahiye mujhe sukuun chaahiye mujhe qaraar chaahiye sulag rahaa huun baadalon kii chaanvon men  na jaane kab ye dil kaa dard jaayegaa rahuungaa hosh men to gam sataayegaa 2 mere liye to raatdin bas ik kumaar chaahiye mujhe sukuun chaahiye mujhe qaraar chaahiye sulag rahaa huun baadalon kii chaanvon men  tadap na mere dil kisii kii aas men hazaar talkiyaan hai terii pyaas men tujhe to saarii zindagii kaa intazaar chaahiye mujhe sukuun chaahiye mujhe qaraar chaahiye sulag rahaa huun baadalon kii chaanvon men

Title: maaii rii main kaase kahuun piir apane jiyaa kii
Lyrics: maaii rii haan maaii rii main kaase kahuun piir apane jiyaa kii maaii rii  os nayan kii unake merii lagii ko bujhaaye naa tan man bhiigo de aake aisii ghataa koii chhaaye naa mohe bahaa le jaaye aisii lahar koi aaye naa os nayan kii unake merii lagii ko bujhaaye naa padii nadiyaa ke kinaare main pyaasii  pii kii dagar men baithaa mailaa huaa rii moraa aancharaa mukhadaa hai phiikaa phiikaa nainon men sohe nahiin kaajaraa koii jo dekhe maiyaa priit kaa vaase kahuun maajaraa pii kii dagar men baithaa mailaa huaa rii moraa aancharaa lat men padii kaisii birahaa kii maatii maaii rii threedots  aankhon men chalate phirate roz mile piyaa baavare bainyaa kii chhainyaa aake milate nahiin kabhii saanvare duhkh ye milan kaa lekar kaah kaaruun kahaan jaaun re aankhon men chalate phirate roz mile piyaa baavare paakar bhii nahiin unako main paatii maaii rii threedots

Title: mujhe ishq hai tujhii se
Lyrics: mujhe ishq hai tujhii se merii jaanezindagaanii tere paas meraa dil hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii mujhe ishq hai tujhii se threedots  merii zindagii men tuu hai mere paas kyaa kamii hai jise gam nahiin kizaa kaa vo bahaar tuu ne dii hai mere haal par huii hai terii kaas maharabaanii tere paas meraa dil hai threedots  tere husn ne dikhaaii mujhe bekudii kii raahen ye hasiin lab nashiile  ye jhukiijhukii nigaahen terii zulf se uthii hai ye ghataaon kii javaanii tere paas meraa dil hai threedots

Lyrics: huun huun huun  kyaa jaano main huun kaun maaraa huaa zindagii kaa mujhako to mahafil men laayaa haii pyaar kisii kaa  2 lag ke gale se phir bhii machal naa sakuun main dekho ye mere bandhe haath kaise miluun tumase chaahuun to mil naa sakuun main dekho ye mere bandhe haath   murajhaae gul ke paas jaise bahaar kii baanhen mere paas vaise hii phailii hain yaar kii baanhen  2 thaam ke inako phir bhii sanbhal naa sakuun main dekho ye mere threedots   siine men dil meraa kahane ko pyaar kaa dil hai dhadake naa khul ke jo vo bekaar saa dil hai  2 jalataa huun lekin pahaluu badal naa sakuun main dekho ye mere threedots

Lyrics: ye niir kahaan se barase hai ye badarii kahaan se aaii hai 2 ye badarii kahaan se aaii hai  gahare gahare naale gaharaa gaharaa paanii re gahare gahare naale gaharaa paanii re gahare man kii chaah anajaanii re jag kii bhuulbhulaiyaan men 2 kuunj koii bauraaii hai  ye badarii kahaan se aaii hai  chiidon ke sang aahen bhar liin chiidon ke sang aahen bhar liin aag chanaar kii maang men dhar lii bujh naa paaye re bujh naa paaye re bujh naa paaye re raakh men bhii jo aisii agan lagaaii hai  ye niir kahaan se barase hai threedots   panchhii pagale kahaan ghar teraa re panchhii pagale kahaan ghar teraa re bhuul na jaiyo apanaa baseraa re koyal bhuul gaii jo ghar 2 vo lautake phir kab aaii hai 2   ye niir kahaan se barase hai ye badarii kahaan se aaii hai

Title: khaalii ghar kii diivaaron pe  jaa jaa jaa mujhe naa
Lyrics: khaalii ghar kii diivaaron pe shiishe kii tasviiren hain main ye tod ke rakh duungaa ye yaadon kii zanjiiren hain  jaa jaa jaa mujhe naa ab yaad aa 2 mujhe bhuul jaane de jaane de jaa jaa jaa mujhe naa threedots  mere labon pe ye kahaanii kyon rahe 2 tuu naa rahii terii nishaanii kyon rahe ye javaanii kyon rahe zindagaanii kyon rahe jaa jaa jaa mujhe naa threedots  ujadaa mahal ye viiraanon kii tarah 2 isamen phiruun main diivaanon kii tarah anjaanon kii tarah begaanon kii tarah jaa jaa jaa mujhe naa threedots

Title: saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa re piyaa
Lyrics: saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa re piyaa  saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa din to duubaa duub naa jaaye2 aas kaa suuraj aa jaa re  saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa re piyaa saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa   duur mile vo ambar dharatii raat milii hai din se tere pii kahaan hain puuchhe puravaa mujh birahan se samajh naa paauun kyaa batalaauun2 tuu hii ye batalaa jaa re  saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa re piyaa saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa  ban gaii terii aahat mere suune man kii dhadakan saans bhii luun to yuun lagataa hai aayaa meraa saajan kaanpatii palakon pe asuvan ke2 jalate diip bujhaa jaa re  saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa re piyaa din to duubaa duub naa jaaye aas kaa suuraj aa jaa re saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa re piyaa saanjh bhaii ghar aajaa

Title: more nainaa bahaae niir
Lyrics: more nainaa bahaae niir sakhii kaa karuun moraa jiyaa na maane 2  pal chhin pii kii raah nihaaruun saanjh sakaare unako pukaaruun bhatakuun main jamunaa ke tiir more nainaa threedots  kaagaa jo bole to ankhiyaan phadake birahaa kii agni aur bhii bhadake jaljal jaae shariir more nainaa threedots  aansuu bahe jaise nadiyaa kii dhaaraa nadiyaa kii dhaaraa men priitam pyaaraa banake kamal muskaaye bairii bas men na aae jaauun kahaan jaauun kahaan jaauun kahaan moraa manavaa huaa adhiir more nainaa threedots

Title: tum bhii kuubasuurat ho au dil bhii
Lyrics: tum bhii kuubasuurat ho dil bhii kuubasuurat hai 2 isalie sab hasiinon men tumase mujhe mohabbat hai tum bhii kuubasuurat threedots  jab bhii gussaa karatii ho kuchh aur bhii achchhii lagatii ho chuudii ke ye saaj bajaakar aur gazab kar jaatii ho o in thirakate qadamon men naachatii qayaamat hai 2 isalie sab hasiinon men threedots  chehare par yuun lat hai jaise chaand ke mukh par baadal ho kaajal hai in aankhon men 2 yaa mayakhaane men botal ho gorii hasiin baahon men zindagii kii raahat hai isalie sab hasiinon men threedots

Title: dil kahe ruk jaa re ruk jaa yahiin pe kahiin
Lyrics: dil kahe ruk jaa re ruk jaa yahiin pe kahiin      jo baat 2 is jagah men hai kahiin pe nahiin  1  parbat upar khidaki khuule jhaanke sundar bhor      chale pavan suhaanii      nadiyon ke ye raag rasile jharanon ka ye shor      bahe jhar jhar paani      mad bharaa mad bharaa samaa ban dhulaadhulaa      har kalii sukh palii yahaan ras ghulaaghulaa      to dil kahe ruk jaa he ruk jaathreedots  2  uuncheuunche ped ghanere chhanati jinase dhuup      khadii baanh pasaare      niilii niilii jhiil men jhalake niil gagan kaa ruup      bahe rang ke dhaare      daaliidaalii chidiyon ki sadaa sur milaamilaa      champaaii champaaii fijaa din khilaakhilaa      to dil kahe ruk jaa re rukthreedots  3  pariyon ke ye jamaghata jinake phuulon jaise gaal      sab shokh hatheli      inamen hai vo alhada jisaki hiranii jaisii chaal      badii chhailchhabili      manachaliimanachalii adaa chhab javaan javaan      har ghadi chadha rahaa nashaa sudh rahii kahaan      to dil kahe ruk jaa re ruk jaathreedots

Title: maan jaaie baat mere dil kii jaan jaaie
Lyrics: ra 	maan jaaie maan jaaie baat mere dil kii jaan jaaie aa 	sharam se jhukii aankh kii rukii saans kii 	kyaa hai marazii pahachaan jaaie 	maan jaaie threedots  aa 	pyaar men ye dinraat bade rangiin hone vaale hain ra 	ek the ham phir do hue ab tiin hone vaale hain aa 	na ginie aage bas balam aap hain bade hii anajaan jaaie 	maan jaaie threedots  ra 	in baaton se ek hasiinaa ruuth jaaegii dekho aa 	chup ho jaao niind hamaarii tuut jaaegii dekho ra 	yahaan niind kaa kyaa kaam liyaa naam aap hain bade naadaan jaaie 	maan jaaie threedots  ra 		paas aa ke tum dekho ik baar aise mausam men 	vo harajaaii jo chhede hai takaraar aise mausam men aa 	magar aapakaa yaqiin nahiin jii nahiin 	aap hain bade beiimaan jaaie 	maan jaaie threedots

Title: aao bachcho  mere pass aao mere dosto ek qissaa suno
Lyrics: aao bachcho aaj tumhen ek kahaanii sunaataa huun main sher kii kahaanii sunoge hun  huun huun mere pass aao mere dosto ek qissaa suno 2  kaii saal pahale kii ye baat hai bolo naa chup kyuun ho gaye bhayaanak andherii siyaah raat men liye apanii banduuk main haath men ghane jangalon se guzarataa huaa kahiin jaa rahaa thaa 2 jaa rahaa thaa nahiin aa rahaa thaa nahiin jaa rahaa thaa  of fo aage bhii to bolo naa bataataa huun bataa huun  ghadii thii andheraa magar sakt thaa koii das savaa das kaa vaqt thaa  larazataa thaa koyal kii bhii kuuk se buraa haal huaa us pe bhuukh se lagaa todane ek berii se ber mere saamane aa gayaa ek sher  koii gighghii  banatii nazar phir gaii to banduuk bhii haath se gir gaii  main lapakaa wo jhapakaa main uupar wo niiche wo aage main piichhe main ped pe wo piichhe are bachaao 2 main daaldaal wo paatpaat main pasiinaa wo baagbaag main sur men wo taal men ye jangal paataal men bachaao bachaao are bhaago re bhaago are bhaago  phir kyaa huaa kudaa kii qasam mazaa aa gayaa mujhe maar kar besaram khaa gayaa  khaa gayaa lekin aap to zindaa hain  are ye jiinaa bhii koii jiinaa hai lalluu aain  la la la ra la la

Title: e sakhii raadhike baanvarii ho gaii
Lyrics: e sakhii raadhike baanvarii ho gaii shyaam ko dhuundhate aap hii kho gaii  galiigalii men gokul kii yah naam pukaare shyaam pukaare baithii hai jamunaa kinaare kabhii mere kabhii tere ghar ko gaii  kabhii kahiin pe mil bhii gayaa vah anajaanaa bansii bajii pii ne pukaaraa bansii men kaise khoii vah so gaii

Title: merii sonii merii tamannaa
Lyrics: ho merii sonii merii tamannaa jhuuth nahiin hai meraa pyaar diiwaane se ho gaii galatii jaane do yaar i love you i love you  merii sonii merii tamannaa jhuuth nahiin hai meraa pyaar diiwaane se ho gaii galatii jaane do yaar i love you i love you  aake merii aankhon men tum dekho in men har ik ada tumhaarii hai kahane ko ye dil hai meraa lekin dhadakan men sadaa tumhaarii hai tum se hai chain meraa tum se hai meraa qaraar  laa laa laa i love you i love you  mere sonaa merii tamannaa jhuuth nahiin hai meraa pyaar diiwaanii se ho gaii galatii jaane do yaar i love you i love you  tadapatii huun bahut naa tadapaao achchhaa baabaa chalo ham hii haare tum ne agar dil se mujhe chaahaa tum bhii to ho sanam mujhe pyaare mere qariib aao zaraa sun bhii lo dil kii pukaar  laa laa laa i love you i love you  merii sonii merii tamannaa jhuuth nahiin hai meraa pyaar diiwaane se ho gaii galatii jaane do yaar i love you laa laa laa i love you laa laa laa i love you

Title: chhailaa teraa chhailaa maan ko badaa sataae
Lyrics: chhailaa teraa chhailaa maan ko badaa sataae aangan men chhup jaae kho jaae to kyaa ho mere raamuu  na ro maan na ro sun lii maine terii pukaar aaj milaa hai vaapas maan bete se khoyaa ye pyaar duniyaa tujhase haarii maan tuu jiitii ye jiivan sangraam chhailaa traa chhailaa threedots  jii chaahe ke main tere siine pe sar rakh ke rouun na jaae bachapan vaapas main terii god men souun phir bhii maan pyaarii main  tujhako manaauun  2 maan tujhako pranaam chhailaa traa chhailaa threedots

Title: gam kaa fasaanaa ban gayaa achchhaa ek bahaanaa ban gayaa achchhaa
Lyrics: gam kaa fasaanaa ban gayaa achchhaa ek bahaanaa ban gayaa achchhaa sarakaar ne aake meraa haal to puuchhaa gam kaathreedots  tumhaare kayaalon men kho jaayen ye jii chaahataa hai kii so jaayen dekho baatonbaaton men chaandanii raaton men kvaab suhaanaa ban gayaa achchhaathreedots  bataayen tumhen kyaa kahaan dard hai yahaan haath rakhanaa yahaan dard hai dekho baaton baaton men do hii mulaakaaton men dil ye nishaanaa ban gayaa achchhaathreedots  muhabbat kii rangiin mahafil men jagah mil gaii aapake dil men dekho baatonbaaton men pyaar kii baraaton men apanaa thikaanaa ban gayaa achchhaathreedots

Title: chuudiyaan baazaar se mangavaa de
Lyrics: aa 	chuudiyaan baazaar se mangavaa de re pahale sainyaa 	pakad phir bainyaa o pakad phir bainyaa 	reshamii salavaar to silavaa de re pahale sainyaa 	pakad phir bainyaa threedots  ra 	gore mukhade se gorii sarakaa de chunar rang lene de 	kachchaa rang hai utar jaaegaa na dar rang lene de aa 	jo utare naa phir ang se mohe rang de aise rang se 	pyaar zaraa gulaal men milaa le ho pahale sainyaa 	pakad phir bainyaa threedots  ra 	maane baat jo tuu ek merii main maanuun sau baaten 	tere qadamon men daal duun laa ke zamaane kii saugaate aa 	pahale le de mujhako ghaagharaa phir le chal mujhako aagaraa 	taajamahal kii sair to karavaa de re pahale sainyaa 	pakad phir bainyaa threedots

Lyrics: shaa 	jaane mujhe tuune yah kyaa chiiz pilaa dii 	pyaas to bujhaaii nahiin aag lagaa dii ki 	are aaj to logon ne qayaamat hii uthaa dii 	dekhie sharaab ko sharaab pilaa dii shaa 	jaane mujhe tuune threedots  	soii tamannaaon men halachal sii machaa dii 	kaun sii duniyaa yah mujhe aaj dikhaa dii ki 	garm huii saans haraarat hii badhaa dii 	dekhie sharaab ko threedots shaa 	jaane mujhe tuune threedots  ki 	romeo hi lolita shaa 	hosh ud chuke hain qadam de chuke hain javaab 	leke kahaan aae aap hain bade karaab ki 	husn kii maasuum kalii shok banaa dii  	dekhie sharaab ko threedots shaa 	jaane mujhe tuune threedots  	jii chaahataa hai tumase pyaar karuun ki 	pyaar ke baad aahaa shaa 	jaane mujhe tuune threedots  	ham jo gir gae to lenge naam tumhaaraa 	thaam lo baanhon men zaraa de do sahaaraa ki 	gir ke sambhalane kii adaa tumako sikhaa dii 	dekhie sharaab ko threedots shaa 	jaane mujhe tuune threedots

Title: ye kaun hansaa are kaun hansaa
Lyrics: ye kaun hansaa haa haa haa haa are kaun hansaa haa haa haa haa ye kaun hansaa haa haa haa haa are kaun hansaa uun huun huun aisaa lagaa mujhe  jaise merii galii men koii dhiire se aake  bade pyaar se pukaare meraa naam kaise haa haa haa haa  ye kaun hansaa haa haa haa haa are kaun hansaa haa aisaa lagaa mujhe  jaise merii galii men koii dhiire se aake  bade pyaar se pukaare meraa naam e haa haa haa haa ye kaun hansaa haa haa haa haa are kaun hansaa  kyaa kahuun kabhii aisii ho jaatii huun magan main to chup rahuun magar hansataa hai tan badan ye naa jaanuun kaise aa aa aa aa aa aa ye naa jaanuun kaise baithe baithe hii jaise apane hii chhue se gudagudii sii uthe hai mere raam aa haa haa haa haa  ye kaun hansaa haa haa haa haa are kaun hansaa haa haa haa haa  laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa  ho koii naa ho lekin itanaa to hai zaruur main thahar thahar jaauun chal chalake thodii duur dhat kaisii huun main aa aa aa aa aa aa dhat kaisii huun main jab bhii chhaayen andhere lage piichhe se mere koii meraa dupattaa rahaa thaam uii maan haa haa haa haa  ye kaun hansaa main nahiin nahiin nahiin phir kaun hansaa kaun phir kaun hansaa main nahiin nahiin nahiin phir kaun hansaa kaun uun huun main nahiin haa haa haa haa
