Lyrics: mu 	meraa chimataa bole chhanak chhanak chhan chhanak chhanak 	meraa chimataa bole o bole 	kabhii na milaanaa kahiin akh naal akh 	teriimerii baat rahe teremere tak aa 	ho merii dhaphalii bole dhamak dhamak dham dhamak dhamak 	ho merii dhaphalii bole o bole 	dil kii baat is dil men tuu rakh 	teriimerii baat threedots mu 	meraa chimataa bole threedots  aa 	aaj mere naachane kaa dhang dekh le 2 	ruup dekh ruup kii  umang dekh le  2 	ruup dekh le rang dekh le rangbirange dhang dekh le 	aur pyaar ke anjaam kaa  rang dekh le  2  mu 	are ret men kabhii na koii phuul khilegaa 2 	chalatii havaaon men na diip jalegaa 	duniyaa men paap nahiin phuule phalegaa 	is pal karoge us pal milegaa 2 	are rahaa nahiin koii bhii durjan aaj tak 	teriimerii baat threedots do 	teriimerii baat threedots

Title: phuulon ke dere hain saaye ghanere hain
Lyrics: ho ho ho hoho hoho hoho threedots he he he hehe hehe hehe threedots hii hii threedots  phuulon ke dere hain saaye ghanere hain jhuum rahii hain havaaen aise nazaaron men khilatii bahaaron men pyaar mile to ruk jaaen phuulon ke dere hain threedots  kahiin bhii aasmaan ke niiche  gaatii nigaahon kaa laharaatii baahon kaa  haar mile to ruk jaaen	2 haar mile to ruk jaaen phuulon ke dere hain threedots  chale hain duur ham diivaane  koii rasiilaa saa baankaa sajiilaa saa  yaar mile to ruk jaaen	2 yaar mile to ruk jaaen  phuulon ke dere hain	threedots he pyaar mile to ruk jaaen ho pyaar mile to ruk jaaen

Title: ab to hai tumase har khushii apanii
Lyrics: ab to hai tumase har khushii apanii tumape maranaa hai zindagii apanii o ho ab to hai tumase   jab ho gayaa tumape ye dil diivaanaa phir chaahe jo bhii kahe hamako zamaanaa koii banaaye baaten chaahe ab jitanii o ho ab to hai tumase   tere pyaar men badanaam duurduur ho gaye tere saath ham bhii sanam mashhuur ho gaye dekho kahaan le jaaye bekhudii apanii o ho ab to hai tumase

Title: aadamii jo kahataa hai aadamii jo sunataa hai
Lyrics: kabhii sochataa huun ki main chup rahuun kabhii sochataa huun ki main kuchh kahuun  aadamii jo sunataa hai aadamii jo kahataa hai zindagii bhar vo sadaayen piichhaa karatii hain aadamii jo detaa hai aadamii jo karataa hai raaste me vo duaaen piichhaa karatii hain  koii bhii ho har kvaab to achchhaa nahiin hotaa bahut jyaadaa pyaar bhii achchhaa nahiin hotaa hai kabhii daaman chhudaanaa ho to mushkil ho pyaar ke raste chhute to pyaar ke rishte tuute to zindagii bhar phir vafaaen piichhaa karatii hain   threedots  kabhii kabhii man dhuup ke kaaran tarasataa hai kabhii kabhii phir dil men saavan barasataa hai pyaas kabhii bujhatii nahiin ik buund bhii milatii nahiin aur kabhii rim jhim ghataaen piichhaa karatii hain   threedots

Title: mausam hai aashiqaanaa
Lyrics: mausam hai aashiqaanaa ai dil kahiin se unako aise men dhuundh laanaa  kahanaa ke rut javaan hai aur ham taras rahe hain kaalii ghataa ke saae birahan ko dans rahe hain dar hai na maar daale saavan kaa kyaa thikaanaa  2 mausam hai threedots  suuraj kahiin bhii jaae tum par na dhuup aae tumako pukaarate hain in gesuon ke saae aa jaao main banaa duun palakon kaa shaamiyaanaa  2 mausam hai threedots  firate hain ham akele baanhon men koii le le aakhir koii kahaan tak tanahaaiyon se khele din ho gae hain zaalim raaten hain qaatilaanaa  2 mausam hai threedots  ye raat ye khaamoshii ye kvaab se nazaare jugnuu hain yaa zamiin par utare hue hain taare betaab merii aankhen madahoshh hai zamaanaa  2 mausam hai threedots

Title: my heart is beating keeps on repeating i am waiting for you
Lyrics: my heart is beating keeps on repeating i am waiting for you    2 my love encloses a plot of roses and when shall be then our next meeting cos love extended you know that time is fleeting threedots 3 times  3rd time is longer  oh when i look at you the blue of heaven seems to be deeper blue and i can say that god himself seems to be looking through hoohoo zuzuzuzuruzu    thats what it sounds like ill never part from you and if it is so when are we meeting cos love you know that time is fleeting time is fleeting time is fleeting  spring is the season that rolls the reason of lovers who are truly true young birds are mating while i am waiting for you hoohoo darling you haunt me say do you want me and if it so when are we meeting cos love you know that time is fleeting time is fleeting time is fleeting  my heart is beatingthreedots

Title: jiijaajii jiijaajii hone vaale jiijaajii
Singer: suresh wadkar anuradha paudwal dilraj kaur
Lyrics: jiijaajii jiijaajii hone vaale jiijaajii shaadii ke phere hain saat aur hamaarii sharten saat tumako ho manzuur agar tabhii milegaa diidii kaa haath jiijaajii jiijaajii   threedots  pahalii shart aapako bataa den ki diidii khaanaa nahiin pakaayegii are isakii mujhe paravaah nahiin  duusarii ye shart hai hamarii ki nain kisii se nahiin ladaaoge are diivaanaa huun in naino kaa in se main nain ladaauungaa saalii o saaliijii hone vaalii saaliijii jiijaajii jiijaajii hone vaale jiijaajii  tiisarii ye shart hai hamaarii ki siidhe daftar se ghar aaoge oy ghar ke sivaa jaana kahan ghar men hii daftar banaa luungaa  aur chauthii shart hai hamaarii ki diidii ko tum saarii kamaaii doge na rakhuungaa main kuchh apane liye sab kuchh inhen main de duungaa saali o saaliijii hone vaaliisaaliijii jiijaajii jiijaajii hone vaale jiijaajii  aur paanchavii shart to suniye diidii jab bhii maike men jaayegii to jaldii vaapas nahiin bulaaoge are gharvaalii bin ghabaraayaa dil to saaliijii tumako bulaa luungaa  chhathii shart to suniye diidii kii taariif men hameshaa naii kavitaa roz sunaaoge kavitaa merii na bhaayegii to tulasii ke dohe sunaa duungaa  saatviin ye shart hai hamaarii ki diidii bachche nahiin khilaayegii are diidii ko kashht na duungaa kabhii bachcho ko kud hii sambhaaluungaa  merii bhii ek shart suniyejii are bas bas bas shaadii zaraa hone to do jo bhii kahogii main maanuungaa biiviijii biiviijii hone vaalii biiviijii

Title: meraa jiivan koraa kaagaz koraa hii rah gayaa
Lyrics: meraa jiivan koraa kaagaz koraa hii rah gayaa jo likhaa thaa jo likhaa thaa aansuon ke sang bah gayaa meraa jiivan threedots  ik havaa kaa jhonkaa aayaa  2 tuutaa daalii se phuul  2 naa pavan kii naa chaman kii kisakii hai ye bhuul  2 kho gai  2 khushabuu havaa men kuchh na rah gayaa meraa jiivan threedots  udate panchhii kaa thikaanaa  2 meraa na koii jahaan  2 naa dagar hai naa khabar hai jaanaa hai mujhako kahaan  2 ban ke sapanaa   2 hamasafar kaa saath rah gayaa meraa jiivan threedots  dukh ke andar sukh kii jyotii dukh hii sukh kaa gyaan  2 dard sah ke janm letaa har koii inasaan  2 vo sukhii hai  2 jo khushii se dard sah gayaa meraa jiivan threedots

Title: aaegii aaegii aaegii kisii ko hamaarii yaad aaegii
Lyrics: aaegii aaegii aaegii kisii ko hamaarii yaad aaegii meraa man kahataa hai pyaase jiivan men kabhii koii badalii chhaaegii aaegii aaegii threedots  jo baat nikalatii hai dil se kuchh usakaa asar hotaa hai kahane vaalaa to rotaa hai sunane vaalaa bhii rotaa hai fariyaad merii duniyaa kii diivaaron se takaraaegii aaegii aaegii threedots  duniyaa men kaun hamaaraa hai kashtii bhii hai tuutiiphuutii aur kitanii duur kinaaraa hai maanjhii na sahii koii mauj kabhii saath hamen le jaaegii aaegii aaegii threedots  in gam kii galiyon men kab tak ye dard hamen tadapaaegaa in raston pe chalatechalate hamadard koii mil jaaegaa had hogii koii taqadiir yuun hii hamen kab tak thukaraaegii aaegii aaegii threedots

Title: baar baar meraa pyaar mujhe puuchh rahaa diladaar
Lyrics: baarbaar meraa pyaar mujhe puuchh rahaa diladaar ki aisaa tujhamen kyaa hai kyaa hai jo meraa chain gayaa hai  maine dekhaa hai jab se tujhako chaahaa hai tab se aur mere fasaane men kuchh bhii nahiin mujhako itanaa pataa hai tujhamen aisii adaa hai naam jisakaa zamaane men kuchh bhii nahiin phir kaise main samajhaauun aur kaise main batalaauun ki aisaa tujhamen threedots  ye ujaalaa badan kaa chaand jaise gagan kaa kaise lafzon men ye ruup dhal paaegaa main jo gaanaa bhii chaahuun gunagunaanaa bhii chaahuun giit meraa adhuuraa saa rah jaaegaa phir kaise main samajhaauun aur kaise main batalaauun ki aisaa tujhamen threedots

Title: jaag aankhen khol  kahaan teraa insaaf hai
Lyrics: jaag aankhen khol chup kyon hai bol mere bhagavan ye kyaa ho rahaa hai 2  kahaan teraa insaaf hai kahaan teraa dastuur hai  main to huun majabuur o bhagavan  2 kyaa tuu bhii majabuur hai kahaan teraa insaaf threedots  sab kahate hain tuune har abalaa kii laaj bachaaii aaj huaa kyaa tujhako tere naam kii raam duhaaii aisaa zulm huaa to hogii terii hii rusavaaii 2  aankhon men aansuu bhare hain  2 dil bhii gam se chuur hai kahaan teraa insaaf threedots  kaisaa atyaachaar hai shaadii hai yaa vyaapaar hai daulat men sab zor hai dharm badaa kamazor hai bikate hain sansaar men insaan bhii baazaar men duniyaa kii ye riit hai bas paise kii jiit hai aisaa agar nahiin hai to sach bhagavaan kahiin hai to mere saamane aae vo ye vishvaas dilaae vo 3

Title: sadaqe hiir tujh pe ham faqiir sadaqe
Lyrics: sadaqe hiir tujh pe ham faqiir sadaqe tujh se lut kar tere hii dwaar aaye tuu to phuulon kii sej pe jaa baithii mere hisse men raahon ke kaar aaye  jhuuthe waade the tere wafaa jhuuthii khote saude men zindagii haar aaye yahii ishq hai to kah do duniyaa se kisii but pe na kisii ko pyaar aaye  dede dil hamaaraa hamen waapas jogii le kar yahii pukaar aaye aur maangen jo kuchh to maut maangen tere dar pe hain aakirii baar aaye  jogii le kar yahii pukaar aaye

Title: teraa mujhase hai pahale kaa naataa koii
Lyrics: teraa mujhase hai pahale kaa naataa koii yuun hii nahiin dil lubhaataa koii jaane tuu yaa jaane naa maane tuu yaa maane naa   dhuaan dhuaan thaa vo samaa yahaan vahaan jaane kahaan 2 tuu aur main kahiin mile the pahale dekhaa tujhe to dil ne kahaa jaane tuu yaa jaane naa maane tuu yaa maane naa   dekho abhii khonaa nahiin kabhii judaa honaa nahiin 2 ab ke yuun hii mile rahenge donon vaadaa rahaa ye is shaam kaa jaane tuu yaa jaane naa maane tuu yaa maane naa   vaade gaye baaten gaiin jaagiijaagii raaten gaiin chaahaa jise milaa nahiin to bhii hamen gilaa nahiin apanaa to kyaa jiye mare chaahe kuchh ho tujhako to jiinaa raas aa gayaa jaane tuu yaa jaane naa maane tuu yaa maane naa

Title: sataraa baras kii chhokariyaa pe buddhe kaa dil
Lyrics: sataraa baras kii hoo sataraa baras kii chhokariyaa pe buddhe kaa dil aa gayaa 2 buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2 raamaa ho raamaa terii duhaaii buraa zamaanaa aa gayaa buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2  paniyaa bharan ko panaghat pe jab ghuunghat mainne kholaa panihaaran main bhii huun pyaasaa buddhaa hansakar bolaa 2 paanii ke do ghuunt hii piike wo mastii men aa gayaa buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2 raamaa ho raamaa ho terii duhaaii buraa zamaanaa aa gayaa buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2  ki prem dagar pe dekhake tujhako ho gayaa main diivaanaa saath mujhe le chal mujhako bhii prem nagar hai jaanaa 2 aa chaar qadam jo chalaa to phuulii saans pasiinaa aa gayaa buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2 raamaa ho raamaa terii duhaaii buraa zamaanaa aa gayaa buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2  aa saath baras men buddhe par yuun chhantake aaii jawaanii ki kisii jawaan se mujhe ladaake dekh le merii raanii 2 aa dekh ke ghar apanaa sone kaa haar mujhe pahanaa gayaa ki buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2 sataraa baras kii chhokariyaa pe buddhe kaa dil aa gayaa buddhaa sathiyaa gayaa 2

Lyrics: jiivan bhar dhuundhaa jisako vo pyaar milaa par nahiin milaa saath nibhaataa sukhdukh men vo yaar milaa par nahiin milaa jiivan bhar dhuundhaa threedots  usakii suurat aankhon men usakaa jalavaa dil men hai mujhako aisaa lagataa hai jaise vo mahafil men hai rang badalatii duniyaa men diladaar milaa par nahiin milaa jiivan bhar dhuundhaa threedots  is duniyaa kii riit kii kaatir maine baat nibhaaii hai yuun to hansataa rahataa huun par chot jigar pe khaaii hai chaahat ke doraahe par gamakvaar milaa par nahiin milaa jiivan bhar dhuundhaa threedots

Lyrics: ki jiine kaa din mar jaane kaa mausam hai in nazaaron men is dil kaa kyaa haal karun aisii bahaaaron men  la jiine kaa din mar jaane kaa mausam hai in nazaaron men main apanaa kyaa haal karuun kah do ishaaron men  ki chhuune se mere surk labon kii kaliyaan nikhariin jaise sulaken la aaj talak dil men jo dabe the aramaan kah do sajanaa khulake laa laa laa threedots chupake se kyon baat chale chaahat ke maaron men jiine kaa din mar jaane kaa mausam threedots  la aaj mujhe dekhen ye nazaare jaise main huun sundar sapanaa ki aaj to ye gulzaar ye gul ye shaaken roke chaahe jitanaa laa laa laa threedots chuum hii legii merii nazar tumako hazaaron men jiine kaa din mar jaane kaa mausam threedots  ki tum ho lagii siine se to dil kii dhadakan thaharii thaharii jaae la duub chalii baahon men tumhaarii saajan tumhare saaye saaye laa laa laa threedots jaise suuraj ambar ke niile kinaaron men jiine kaa din mar jaane kaa mausam threedots

Lyrics: motii jaisaa rang ang men  2 ras kaa saagar laharaae tere ruup kii aanch lage to patthar dil bhii pighal jaae motii jaisaa rang threedots  nainon men hai tere jaise kiranon kaa baseraa nikharaa teraa yauvan jaisaa bikharaa ho saveraa suuraj tere darshan ko har din aaejaae motii jaisaa rang threedots  hogaa vo bhii sundar jisape hogii terii chhaayaa hogaa vo bhii mohit jisane tujhako hai banaayaa jiivan kar de roshan tuu jo muskaraae motii jaisaa rang threedots

Lyrics: duniyaa mujhase kahatii hai ki piinaa chhod de 2 ye kyuun nahiin kahatii zaalim jiinaa chhod de kyaa samajhe ye duniyaa kyaa jaane ye duniyaa 2  kitanaa mushqil hai ye zindagii kaa safar maut aankhen dikhaatii hai har mod par jag se ghabaraakar main jo sharaab na piiuun to kah do mere dosto main kaise jiiuun duniyaa mujhase kahatii threedots  merii behoshiyon ko na ilzaam do 2 ho sake to mujhe ek aur jaam do mere din raat piine men ik raaz hai mere marane men jiine kaa andaaz hai duniyaa mujhase kahatii threedots

Title: har dil men nafarat bharii hai  tuu mile to puuchhuun
Lyrics: har dil men nafarat bharii hai koii dil saaf nahiin hai maalik terii saarii duniyaa men kahiin insaaf nahiin hai  tuu mile to puuchhuun tujhase kyaa ye hai nyaay teraa duniyaa ko die ujaale aur mujhako diyaa andheraa tuu mile to puuchhuun threedots  nekii karane vaalon ko to milatii yahaan buraaii hai kudagarzii ke tuufaanon men duub gaii sachchaaii hai kisii kii nagarii bas gaii dekho kisii kaa lut gayaa deraa tuu mile to puuchhuun threedots  kitanii umangen laae the ham dil men sametakar le jaa le aa rahe hain hasaraten qafan men lapetakar ab kisape karen bharosaa jab tuune hii munh pheraa duniyaa ko die ujaale threedots  terii jhuuthii duniyaa kii ham sab diivaaren tod chale tujhe mubaarak terii duniyaa ham to duniyaa chhod chale mar kar bhii na bhuul sakenge ham ehasaan ye teraa tuu mile to puuchhuun threedots

Title: main shaayar badanaam ho main chalaa main chalaa
Lyrics: main shaayar badanaam ho main chalaa main chalaa mahafil se naakaam ho main chalaa main chalaa main shaayar badanaam  mere ghar se tumako kuchh saamaan milegaa diivaane shaayar kaa ek diivaan milegaa aur ik chiiz milegii tutaa khaalii jaam ho main chalaa main chalaa main shaayar badanaam  sholon pe chalanaa thaa kaanton pe sonaa thaa aur abhii jii bharake kismat pe ronaa thaa jaane aise kitane bakii chhodake kaam ho main chalaa main chalaa main shaayar badanaam  rastaa rok rahii hai thodii jaan hai baakii jaane tute dil men kyaa aramaan hai baakii jaane bhii de ai dil sabako mera salaam ho main chalaa main chalaa main shaayar badanaam

Title: mujhako agar ijaazat ho to main ik giit sunaauun
Lyrics: mujhako agar ijaazat ho to main ik giit sunaauun mahafil men shaamil ho kar aapakaa dil bahalaauun  aapake qadam uthe yuun merii aavaaz se aa gae kuchh sher yaad husn ke andaaz se mujhako agar ijaazat ho to aage baat badhaauun mahafil men shaamil ho threedots  is maze kii raat men chaandanii kaa naam luun aapasaa koii nahiin main kisakaa naam luun mujhako agar ijaazat ho to naam koii le jaauun mahafil men shaamil ho threedots

Title: jangaljangal doluun main doluun
Lyrics: jangaljangal doluun main doluun hiranhiran meraa naam kaun tuu kaun kahaan se hai aayaa kyaa hai yahaan teraa kaam bhaag le bhaag nahiin to sher ko bulawaa luungaa bhediye ko bulawaa ke khaal terii nuchawaa luungaa aadamii kaa bachchaa hah jangaljangal doluun main doluun hiranhiran meraa naam  kaun aawat hai  baal hain kaale kaale kuchh bhii nahiin jangal kii tumako adaa re aao mere paas mite nahiin aas dekho gaat gaat apane ghar ek aaii aadamii kii jaat madad ko aanaa are kisane dikhalaayaa ise jangal kaa rastaa bhale o ghar men rahanaa nahiin hai itanaa sastaa aadamii kaa bachchaa  kaalaa bhaaluu khaaye aaluu re o kaalaa bhaaluu khaaye aaluu re siidhaasaadaa laage gumasum rahe badaa chaaluu re kaalaa bhaaluu khaaye aaluu re  o bhaaluu maamaa suno kyaa hai be kyaa hai hangaamaa kaho kaho o nashe men huun main mujhako o bachcho abhii na bulaanaa re aur nashe ke aalam men uthanaa baithanaa chalanaa phiranaa daaktar kii taraf se sakt manaa hai kyuunki mainne mahuaa piyaa hai merii bas ye kataa hai kahiin mushkil hai aanaa jaanaa re 2  duur hato 2 duur hato ai duniyaa waalo bangale taal hamaaraa hai 2  bhole bhaale praanii re terii pal bhar kii zindagaanii re ye sher tujhe khaa jaaegaa ho jaayegii katm kahaanii re  ai aadamii kaa bachchaa raaj karane aayaa hai banduuk chalaane aayaa hai maarmaar ke jangal se nikaal dungaa haath hilaa ke chal  o re banavaasiyo mere pyaaro mere laadalo path bhuule pathik ko kshamaa kar do ghar aaye atithi par dayaa kar lo o o re banavaasiyo mere pyaaro mere laadalo  shaktishaalii ho use do shakti kaa parichay jo tumhaarii shakti ko lalakaarane aaye pyaar kaa laayaa ujaalaa jo andhere men kyuun usii nirdosh ko tum maarane aaye usake jiivan kii kaatir duaa kar do usako hansate hansaate vidaa kar do  o o re banavaasiyo mere pyaaro mere laadalo

Title: betaab dil kii tamannaa yahii hai
Lyrics: betaab dil kii tamannaa yahii hai tumhen chaahenge tumhen puujenge tumhen apanaa kudaa banaaenge betaab threedots  suune suune kvaabon men jab tak tum na aaye the kushiyaan thiin sab auron kii gam bhii saare paraaye the apane se bhii chupaaii thii dhadakan apane siine kii ham ko jiinaa padataa thaa kwaahish kab thii jiine kii ab jo aake tum ne hamen jiinaa sikhaa liyaa hai chalo duniyaa naii basaaenge betaab threedots  bhiigii bhiigii palakon par sapane itane sajaae hain dil men jitanaa andheraa thaa utane ujaale aae hain tum bhii ham ko jagaanaa naa baahon men jo so jaaen jaise kushbuu phuulon men tum men yuun hii kho jaaen pal bhar kisii janam men kabhii chhuute naa saath apanaa tumhen aise gale lagaaenge betaab threedots  vaade bhii hain qasamen bhii biitaa vaqt ishaaron kaa kaise kaise aramaan hain melaa jaise bahaaron kaa saaraa gulashan de daalaa kaliyaan aur khilaao naa hansate hansate ro den ham itanaa bhii to hansaao naa dil men tumhiin base ho rahaa aanchal vo bhar chukaa hai kahaan itanii kushii chhupaaenge betaab threedots

Title: aaye tum yaad mujhe gaane lagii har dhadakan
Lyrics: aae tum yaad mujhe gaane lagii har dhadakan kushabuu laai pavan mahakaa chandan aae tum yaad mujhe threedots  jis pal nainon men sapanaa teraa aae us pal mausam pe menhandii rach jaae   2 aur tuu ban jaaye jaise dulhan aae tum yaad mujhe threedots  jab main raaton men taare ginataa huun aur tere kadamon kii aahat sunataa huun  2 lage mujhe har taaraa teraa darapan aae tum yaad mujhe threedots  har pal man meraa mujhase kahataa hai jisakii dhun men tuu khoyaa rahataa hai   2 bhar de phuulon se usakaa daaman aae tum yaad mujhe threedots

Title: pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa
Lyrics: mil jaatii hai sansaar men sansaar se muktii milatii nahiin marake bhii magar pyaar se muktii  pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa jo musaafir ke baad rahataa hai  pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa jo musaafir ke baad rahataa hai bhuul jaate hain log sab lekin kuchh naa kuchh phir bhii yaad rahataa hai  pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa  rok letii hain raah men yaaden jab bhii raahon se ham guzarate hain  2 kho gaye qahaqahon men jo gham wo aansuon men talaash karate hain dil pe halakii sii chot lagatii hai dard aankhon se tuut bahataa hai  pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa  kuchh bhii to kam nahiin huaa dekho jashn hain phuul hain bahaaren hain  2 tum nahiin ho magar tum hii tum ho sab tumhaarii hii yaadagaaren hain tuut jaane se tuut jaate hain dil ke rishte ye kaun kahataa hai  pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa  ye galat hai kii marane waalon ko  2 zindagii se nijaat milatii hai ye galat hai kii marane waalon ko zindagii se nijaat milatii hai is bahaane se gam ke maaron ko aur lambii hayaat milatii hai maanaa zanjiiren tuut jaatii hain aadamii phir bhii qaid rahataa hai  bhuul jaate hain log sab lekin kuchh naa kuchh phir bhii yaad rahataa hai  pyaar hai ik nishaan qadamon kaa jo musaafir ke baad rahataa hai

Title: tere milane se pahale bhii
Lyrics: tere milane se pahale tere milane se pahale bhii jiite the ham jiinewaalii magar baat koii na thii 2 muskuraatii huii subah koii na thii gunagunaatii huii raat koii na thii  aaj har chiiz se jaan pahachaan hai 2 ye tere pyaar kaa mujh pe ahasaan hai aaj har chiiz se jaan pahachaan hai  ye tere pyaar kaa mujh pe ahasaan hai dil se dil is tarah aaj milane lage jaise pahale mulaaqaat koii na thii tere milane se pahale bhii jiite the ham jiinewaali magar baat koii na thii  isase pahale bhii chaae the baadal magar 2 kaaqedil par to gunchaa na koii khilaa isase pahale bhii chaae the baadal magar kaaqedil par to gunchaa na koii khilaa isase pahale ghataaen ghataaen na thiin yaa ghataaon men barasaat koii na thii  tere milane se pahale bhii jiite the ham jiinewaalii magar baat koii na thii muskuraatii huii subah koii na thii gunagunaatii huii raat koii na thii  laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa laa

Lyrics: qasamen ham apanii jaan kii khaae chale gae phir bhii vo aitabaar na laae chale gae  kahakar gae the vo ki na aaenge ab kabhii lekin khayaal banake vo aae chale gae  rusavaaion ke dar se na daaman bhigo sake palakon men aansuon ko chhupaae chale gae  anavar sujuudeshauq kii mat puuchh intahaa harhar qadam pe sar ko jhukaae chale gae

Title: jaane kyaa pilaayaa tuune
Lyrics: jaane kyaa pilaayaa tuune badaa mazaa aayaa jhuum uthii re main diiwaanii mastaanii jaane jaane kyaa pilaayaa tuune badaa mazaa aayaa  paayal nahiin ghungharuu nahiin chham chham kaise ye hone lagii dhuundo mujhe main khone lagii ho paayal nahiin ghungharuu nahiin chham chham kaise ye hone lagii dhuundo mujhe main khone lagii huaa kyaa mujhe uii taubaa main naa jaanii jhuum uthii re main diiwaanii mastaanii jaane jaane kyaa pilaayaa tuune badaa mazaa aayaa  aisaa lagaa tuune piyaa khiinchaa najariyaa ki dor se dhadakaa meraa dil zor zor se huun aisaa lagaa tuune piyaa khiinchaa najariyaa ki dor se dhadakaa meraa dil zor zor se teraa naam leke dolii merii jawaanii jhuum uthii re main diiwaanii mastaanii jaane jaane kyaa pilaayaa tuune badaa mazaa aayaa  mere balam merii nazar mare sharam ke jhukane lagii chalataa zamaanaa rukane lagii ho mere balam merii nazar mare sharam ke jhukane lagii chalataa zamaanaa rukane lagii aise waqt chhedo koii aisii kahaanii jhuum uthii re main diiwaanii mastaanii jaane jaane kyaa pilaayaa tuune badaa mazaa aayaa

Lyrics: main vahii vahii baat 2 mere lie to har din nayaa din har raat naii raat main vahii vahii baat threedots  achchhii yaa karaab pii lii jaisii milii sharaab pii lii saaqii nayaa hai jaam puraanaa rang nayaa hai naam puraanaa subah ho yaa shaam mujhe mastii se kaam kyuunki har din nayaa din threedots  apanaa hii lahuu pii rahaa huun marane ki lie jii rahaa huun dil apanaa hai gam apane hain duniyaa paraaii  ham apane hain  2 mujhe aae naa qaraar main rahuun beqaraar kyuunki har din nayaa din threedots

Title: dil kaa guladastaa baanhon kaa haar
Lyrics: apane jiivan kii ulajhan ko kaise main sulajhaauun 2 apanon ne jo dard die hain kaise main batalaauun  pyaar ke vaade ho gae jhuuthe  vafaa ke bandhan tuute  2 banake jiivansaathii koii  chain meraa kyon luute  2 aise jiivansaathii se main kaise saath nibhaauun apane jiivan kii threedots  kaisekaise bhed chhupaaen  haathon kii rekhaaen  2 koii naa jaane is jiivan ko  ye kis or le jaaen  2 padh naa paauun lekh vidhi kaa palpal main ghabaraauun apane jiivan kii threedots dil men aisaa dard chhupaa hai  mujhase sahaa naa jaae  2 kahanaa to chaahuun apanon se main  phir bhii kahaa naa jaae  2  apane jiivan kii threedots

Lyrics: koi gaataa main so jaataa  2  sansriti ke vistrit saagar men sapanon ki naukaa ke andar dukh sukh ki laharon men uth gir bahataa jaataa main so jaataa threedots  aankho men lekar pyaar amar aashiish hathelii men bhar kar koi meraa sar godii men rakh sahalaataa main so jaataa threedots  mere jiivan kaa kaaraajal mere jiivan kaa haalaahal koi apane svar men madumay kar doharaataa main so jaataa  koi gaataa main so jaataa threedots

Lyrics: mere ghar aap aaye kahiye kyaa khaatir karuun main badii mushqil men huun kii baat kyaa aakhir karuun aap hii se hii puuchhatii huun aap hii faramaaiye pesh karuun main dilekidamat yaa kii jaan haazir karuun oho oho ho ek tuu hai piyaa jis pe dil aa gayaa terii ek nazar ne raajaa beqaraar kar diyaa terii ek nazar ne raajaa beqaraar kar diyaa  apanii to nazar men tuu raajaa koii chor hai jis kaa kii saare zamaane pe hii jor hai aur kahuun kyaa tujh ko haay luut liyaa re mujh ko tune aankh milaa ke jiinaa dushwaar kar diyaa tune aankh milaa ke jiinaa dushwaar kar diyaa ek tu hai  dhiire dhiire hum tum kahaan se kahaan aa gaye donon ke dil ke iraade takaraa gaye phir se ye dilawaalii nahii laut ke aanewaalii bairii aaj agar jo tuune inakaar kar diyaa bairii aaj agar jo tuune inakaar kar diyaa ek tuu hai

Lyrics: main huun ghodaa ye hai gaadii merii rikshaa sab se niraalii naa gorii hai naa ye kaalii ho ho ho ho ho ho ghar tak pahunchaa dene vaalii threedots  ek rupaiyaa bhaadaa paisenjar itanaa jaadaa malaa naako re naako re naako re ho dubalaa patalaa chalegaa aadaa tirachhaa chalegaa saalaa ho yaa ho vo saalii yaane kii aadhii gharavaalii ek dikhaakar biidii rukavaa dii chaar gaadii are paise kaa khelaa hai khiilaa ho jo marazii hai karaa lo paakit se not nikaalo phir le jaao jeb khaalii baajuu hat burke vaalii ham aazaad hain mistar kyaa inasaan aur kyaa jaanavar mere desh men saare baraabar ho kuttaa  pe soe maanav kaa ghar to roe zindagii lagatii hai jaalii ho zindagii lagatii hai jaalii

Lyrics: aashiq huun ik maahazabiin kaa log kahen mujhe pagalaa kahiin kaa  2 dil kii tamannaa puurii kar do saathii banaa lo mujhe zindagii kaa aashiq huun ik threedots  mahafilmahafil dhuum machaauun 2 paagal banakar naach dikhaauun 2 jaanetamannaa saath hai mere 2 haal na puuchho merii kushii kaa aashiq huun ik threedots  jaane vo kaisii jaanejahaan hai 2 usake binaa to chain kahaan hai 2 shaamsaberaa kuchh nahiin dekhuun 2 pheraa maaruun usakii galii kaa aashiq huun ik threedots  ek sanam ko apanaa liyaa hai 2 pyaar kaa bandhan baandh liyaa hai 2 mujhako to apanaa hosh nahiin hai 2 mujhape nashaa hai aashiqii kaa aashiq huun ik threedots

Title: nafarat kii duniyaa ko chhod ke pyaar kii duniyaa men

Title: kyaa nazaare kyaa sitaare
Lyrics: kyaa nazaare kyaa sitaare sab ko hai intazaar sab hain beqaraar tuu kab sab dekhegii har kalii men har galii men dekhegii meraa pyaar pyaar kii bahaar tuu sab jab dekhegii kyaa nazaare kyaa sitaare threedots  baadal ambar pe yuun hii aataa jaataa rahegaa tere reshamii aanchal kii tarah laharaataa rahegaa qadamon kii dhuul chuumegii ye phuul tuu jab sab dekhegii har kalii men har galii men threedots  man men tuu aise samaayii jaise nadiyaa men niir mere nainon ke darpan men lagii hai yuun terii tasaviir apanaa ye ruup ye chhaanv dhuup tuu jab sab dekhegii kyaa nazaare kyaa sitaare threedots

Title: pyaar maangaa hai tumhiin se na inkaar karo
Lyrics: pyaar maangaa hai tumhiin se na inakaar karo paas baitho zaraa aaj to iqaraar karo  kitanii hasiin hai raat dulhan banii hai raat 2 machale hue jazabaat baat zaraa hone do mujhe pyaar karo 2 pyaar maangaa hai tumhiinse na inakaar karo  pahale bhii tumhen dekhaa pahale bhii tumhen chaahaa 2 itanaa hasiin na paayaa saath hasiin hone do mujhe pyaar karo 2 pyaar maangaa hai tumhiinse na inakaar karo  kitanaa madhur safar hai tuu meraa hamasafar hai 2 biite hue vo din zaraa yaad karo mujhe pyaar karo 2 pyaar maangaa hai tumhiinse na inakaar karo paas baitho zaraa aaj to iqaraar karo

Title: roz shaam aatii thii magar aisii na thii
Lyrics: roz shaam aatii thii magar aisii na thii roz roz ghataa chhaatii thii magar aisii na thii ye aaj merii zindagii men kaun aa gayaa roz shaam aatii thii threedots  daalii men ye kisakaa haath karen ishaare bulaae mujhe jhuumatii chanchal hawaa chhuuke tan gudagudaae mujhe haule haule dhiire dhiire koii giit mujhako sunaae priit man men jagaae khulii aankh sapane dikhaae dikhaae dikhaae dikhaae khulii aankh sapane dikhaae ye aaj merii zindagii men kaun aa gayaa threedots  aramaanon kaa rang hai jahaan palaken uthaatii huun main hans hansake hai dekhatii jo bhii muurat banaatii huun main jaise koii mohe chhede dil kho aur bhii jaatii huun main jagamagaatii huun main diiwaanii huii jaatii huun main diiwaanii diiwaanii diiwaanii diiwaanii huii jaatii huun main ye aaj merii zindagii men kaun aa gayaa threedots

Title: dil ne pyaar kiyaa hai ik bevafaa se
Lyrics: dil ne pyaar kiyaa hai ik bevafaa se 2 pachhataa rahe hain dil men dil hamaaraa thaa hamane haaraa thaa tumape vaaraa thaa dil ne pyaar kiyaa threedots  kal tumane jo hamase vaade kie the  kahaan hain  3 vo vaade kal tumane jo hamase khaaii thiin kasamen  kahaan hain  3 vo kasamen na itaraaiye na muskaaiye na sharamaaiye dil hamaaraa thaa threedots  ai gulabadan sabase mumataaz thiin tum mahal pyaar kaa ik banaayaa thaa maine ye kisakii nazar se jalaa aashiyaanaa bade naaz se ghar sajaayaa thaa maine lutii zindagii mitii zindagii milii beqasii dil hamaaraa thaa threedots

Title: raamaa raamaa gajab huii gavaa re
Lyrics: haay raam   raamaa raamaa gajab huii gavaa re 2 haal hamaraa ajab huii gavaa re raamaa raamaa threedots  aaii rut ye suhaanii barasaa pahale bhii paanii ye huaa na jo ab huii gavaa re raamaa raamaa ho raamaa raamaa raamaa raamaa threedots  dil machal saa gayaa hai kuchh badal saa gayaa hai jaane kaise ye kab huii gavaa re raamaa raamaa ho raamaa raamaa raamaa raamaa threedots  kisane jaaduu chalaayaa barason men jo ho na paayaa ek pal men vo sab huii gavaa re raamaa raamaa ho raamaa raamaa raamaa raamaa threedots

Title: kyaa khuub lagatii ho badii sundar dikhatii ho
Lyrics: kyaa khuub lagatii ho badii sundar dikhatii ho phir se kaho kahate raho achchhaa lagataa hai jiivan kaa har sapanaa ab sachchaa lagataa hai kyaa khuub lagatii ho threedots  taariif karoge kab tak bolo kab tak mere siine men saans rahegii jab tak kab tak main rahuungii man men haan man men suuraj hogaa jab tak niil gagan men phir se kaho threedots  khush ho naa mujhe tum paa kar mujhe paakar pyaase dil ko aaj milaa hai saagar kyaa dil men hai aur tamannaa hai tamannaa har jiivan men tum mere hii bananaa phir se kaho threedots

Title: uthe sab ke kadam taaraa rampampam
Lyrics: uthe sabake kadam  taraa rampampam ajii aise giit gaayaa karo kabhii khushii kabhii gam  taraa rampampam hanson aur hansaayaa karo  vo pyaare din aur vo pyaarii raaten yaad hame hain vo mulaakaaten nahiin koi gam mujhe nahiin hai gilaa zindagii kii raah men milaa hai jabase tuu mere hamadam shabanam ham hain aur tum sholaa ban jaayaa karo kabhii khushii threedots  rang nayaa hai ruup nayaa hai jiine kaa to jaane kahaan dhang gayaa hai kise hai fikar inhen kyaa pasand pyaar ke jahaan men razaamand jab ham tum tum ham ban gae hain sanam bedhadak mere ghar aayaa karo kabhii khushii threedots  laa laa threedots

Lyrics: aa aah jaa re jaa bewafaa nahiin tujhako pataa jaa re jaa bewafaa nahiin tujhako pataa yah sharaafat hai kyaa yah muhabbat hai kyaa jhuuthaa hai teraa pyaar teraa kyaa aitabaar kabhii is pe nazar kabhii us pe nazar jaa re jaa beqadar nahiin tujhako kabar kaise lete hain dil yah badaa hai mushkil2  kishor o sanam tere sar kii qasam bekabar huun zaruur bevafaa main nahiin kar mujh pe yaqiin tuu aise naa jalaa dil   donon laa laa laa threedots   kishor  o sanam tere sar kii qasam bekabar huun zaruur bewafaa main nahiin kar mujh pe yaqiin tuu aise naa jalaa dil  aashaa ye badaa hai mushkil jaa re jaa beimaan jaane saaraa jahaan ye bahaane hain khuub afasaane hain khuub tuu patangaa nahiin parawaanaa nahiin tuu hai koii bhanwar paanii jaisii nazar kabhii is daal par kabhii us daal par jaa re jaa sangadil yah badaa hai mushkil jaa re jaa beimaan jaane saaraa jahaan  kishor aa yahaan tuu hai kyon badgumaan aazamaa ke to dekh dil lagaa ke to dekh hai tuu hii meraa jiivan merii manzil  donon laa laa laa threedots  kishor aa yahaan tuu hain kyon badgumaan aazamaa ke to dekh dil lagaa ke to dekh hai tuu hii meraa jiivan merii manzil  aashaa yah badaa hai mushkil jaa re jaa bewafaa nahiin tujhako pataa jaa re jaa bewafaa nahiin tujhako pataa yah sharaafat hai kyaa yah muhabbat hai kyaa jhuuthaa hai teraa pyaar teraa kyaa aitabaar kabhii is pe nazar kabhii us pe nazar jaa re jaa beqadar nahiin tujhako kabar kaise lete hain dil yah badaa hai mushkil laa laa laa laa laa  kishor laa laa laa laa laa aashaa laa laa laa laa laa kishor laa laa laa laa laa

Title: aaj kii raat  koii aane ko hai re baabaa
Lyrics: aaj kii raat  koii aane ko hai re baabaa re baabaa re baabaa  intazaar aur thodaa saa intazaar aaj kii raat  koii aane ko hai re baabaa use aane to de o dilebeqaraar phir kar lenaa  jii bhar ke pyaar shubu shubu shubu shubu shubu shubu shubu shubu shubu shubu 2  naa naa naa naa naa naa nananaa nananaa nananaa nananaa   tuu to na aayaa aayaa koii aur saajan mujhe aakar bachaale to tuu ki tuu bachaale luute hai mujhako merii javaanii kaa dushman koii kab tak sanbhaale tuu tuu tuu bachaale bachaale aisaa naa ho lut jaaye re teraa pyaar  aaj kii raat threedots  aajaa ab to aajaa naa aajaa  aaj kii raat threedots

Title: jo tum hansoge to duniyaa hansegii
Lyrics: jo tum hansoge to duniyaa hansegii rooge tum to  naa roegii duniyaa  2 tere aansuon ko samajh naa sakegii tere aansuon pe  hansegii ye duniyaa  2  suuraj kii kiranon ne jag men kiyaa saveraa 2 diipak jo hansane lagaa to ho gayaa duur andheraa 2 jagamagaate raho gunagunaate raho zindagii men sadaa muskaraate raho jo tum hansoge threedots  kalii hansii to phuul khilaa phuul se hanse nazaare 2 lekar hansii nazaaron kii hans die chaandsitaare 2 tum sitaaron kii tarah tum nazaaron kii tarah zindagii men sadaa muskaraate raho jo tum hansoge threedots

Title: aayaa naa karo gudiyaa mere paas
Lyrics: aayaa naa karo gudiyaa mere paas dukh meraa sunake tum ho jaaogii udaas sthaayii  main to wo huun ki duniyaa men aaye hain jo aansuu piine ke liye meraa jiinaa kyaa jiinaa ki jiitii huun main yuun hii jiine ke liye sapanaa koii naa koii aas 1  mujhako mamataa kii pyaasii tumhaarii nazar kar detii hai beqaraar maan ke aanchal kaa saayaa main de na sakuun itanaa chaahuun baarbaar kuchh bhii nahiin hai mere paas 2

Lyrics: main aya huun leke saaz hathon men  mahafil kii mastaanii ho mastaanii raaton men in in in in  main aya huun   todake dilon ko main ye kaam kar rahaa huun haan main mohabbat ko naye andaaz de rahaa huun  basakar sabakii aankhon men in dilakash mulaakaaton men  main aya huun   shokh hasiinon ko main aavaaz de rahaa huun  haan naam javani ka main badanaam kar rahaa huun  hansakar baaton baaton men nagamon ki baaraaton men  main aya huun    giit mere sunakar naujavaan jaag uthe hain  haan niind nahiin ati kaii aramaan jaag uthe hai  thaam ke dil ko hathon men jalate hain barasaton men  main aya huun   main aya huun  leke saaz hathon men  mahafil kii mastaanii  ho mastaanii raaton men in in in in

Title: madhuban khushabuu detaa hai
Lyrics: madhuban khushabuu detaa hai saagar saavan detaa hai jiinaa usakaa jiinaa hai jo auron ko jiivan detaa hai madhuban threedots  suuraj na ban paae to banake diipak jalataa chal 2 phuul milen yaa angaare sach kii raahon pe chalataa chal 2 pyaar dilon ko detaa hai ashkon ko daaman detaa hai jiinaa usakaa jiinaa hai jo auron ko jiivan detaa hai madhuban threedots  chalatii hai laharaake pavan ke saans sabhii kii chalatii rahe 2 logon ne tyaag diye jiivan ke priit dilon men palatii rahe 2 dil vo dil hai jo auron ko apanii dhadakan detaa hai jiinaa usakaa jiinaa hai jo auron ko jiivan detaa hai madhuban threedots

Title: tum to sabake ho rakhawaale
Lyrics: tum to sabake ho rakhawaale bahut sunaa hai naam 2 main tab jaanuun jab tum merii bigadii banaa do shyaam tum to sabake ho rakhawaale  binatii sun lo mujhape kar do bas itanaa upakaar vaapas de do jisakaa tumane chhiinaa hai adhikaar mere vachan kii laaj bachaa lo 2 ab to tumhaaraa kaam tum to sabake ho rakhawaale bahut sunaa hai naam  sabakaa jiivan saphal banaake in charanon kii dhuul banake suhaagan rahii main abhaagan mujhase huii kyaa bhuul jag ke swaamii antaryaamii 2 tum ko laakhon pranaam tum to sabake ho rakhawaale bahut sunaa hai naam main tab jaanuun jab tum merii bigadii banaa do shyaam 2 tum to sabake ho rakhawaale

Title: aa aajaa dikhaauun tujhe jannat kii shaam
Lyrics: aa aajaa dikhaauun tujhe jannat kii shaam zulfon kii chhainyaa men kar le aaraam aa aajaa threedots  jo rang mere badan men hai vo gulon men kahaan mahak uthii hai ye mahafil ajab gulaab huun main merii adaa merii paayal ye giit mastaane meraa javaab nahiin haay laajavaab huun main aankhen milaa ke pii le aankhon ke jaam aa aajaa threedots  jahaan men aaye ho kuchh roz aish kar jaao na jaane kal ye zamaanaa rahe rahe na rahe ye zindagii hai badii bevafaa tumhaarii qasam na jaane kal ye taraanaa rahe rahe na rahe dekhaa jaayegaa jo hogaa anjaam aa aajaa threedots

Title: merii saanson ko jo mahakaa rahii hai
Lyrics: la merii saanson ko jo mahakaa rahii hai    ye pahale pyaar kii khushabuu    terii saanson se shaayad aa rahii hai     shuruu ye ye silasilaa usii din se huaa thaa 2    achaanak tuune jis din mujhe yuunhii chhuaa thaa 2    lahar jaagii jo us pal tanbadan men    vo man ko aaj bhii bahakaa rahii hai     ye pahale pyaar kii khushabuu    terii saanson se shaayad aa rahii hai  ma bahut tarasaa hai ye dil tere sapane sajaake 2    ye dil kii baat sun le merii baahon men aake 2    jagaake anokhii pyaas man men    ye miithii aag jo dahakaa rahii hai  la ye pahale pyaar kii khushabuu    terii saanson se shaayad aa rahii hai     ye aankhen bolatii hain jo ham na bol paae    jagii vo pyaas man kii nazar men jhilamilaae    honthon pe terii halakii sii hansii hai    merii dhadakan bahakatii jaa rahii hai     ye pahale pyaar kii khushabuu    terii saanson se shaayad aa rahii hai

Title: agar saaz chhedaa taraane banenge
Lyrics: agar saaz chhedaa taraane banenge taraane banenge fasaane banenge taraane bane to fasaane bane to fasaane bane to diivaane banenge agar saaz chhedaa taraane banenge   threedots  fasaane bane to sunegii ye mahafil sunegii ye mahafil badii hogii mushakil rusavaaiyon ke bahaane banenge agar saaz chhedaa taraane banenge   threedots  bahaanon se phir to mulaaqaat hogii yuunhii din kategaa basar raat hogii naye dost ik din puraane banenge agar saaz chhedaa taraane banenge   threedots  diivanon pe hansataa hai saaraa zamaanaa zamaanaa muhabbat kaa dushaman puraanaa diivaane nahiin ham sayaane banenge sayaane nahiin ham sayaane nahiin ham diivaane banenge agar saaz chhedaa taraane banenge   threedots

Title: kahanaa ik diivaanaa terii yaad men aahen bharataa hai
Lyrics: kahanaa ik diivaanaa terii yaad men aahen bharataa hai likh kar teraa naam zamiin par us ko sajade karataa hai  shaakh girebaan khaaq basar phirataa hai suunii raahon men saayon ko lipataataa hai aur lailaa lailaa karataa hai  terii ek jhalak kii khaatir jaan aankhon men atakii hai jii kaa aisaa haal huaa hai jiitaa hai na marataa hai  kud ko bhuul gayaa hai lekin terii yaad nahiin bhuulaa dil ke jitane zakm hain un men teraa hii aqs ubharataa hai likh kar teraa naam zamiin par threedots  kahanaa mere diivaane se lailaa terii amaanat hai terii baahon men dam degii tuu jis kaa dam bharataa hai dil ke jitane zakm hain un men teraa hii aqs ubharataa hai  sadake jaauun is qaasid par jis se ye paigaam milaa meraa qaatil meraa masiihaa ab bhii mujh par marataa hai meraa qaatil meraa masiihaa meraa masiihaa meraa qaatil meraa qaatil meraa masiihaa ab bhii mujh par marataa hai  lailaa lailaa lailaa lailaa

Title: mujhe ishq hai tujhii se
Lyrics: mujhe ishq hai tujhii se merii jaane zindagaanii tere paas meraa dil hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii mujhe ishq hai tujhii se   merii zindagii men tuu hai mere paas kyaa kamii hai jise gam nahiin kizaan kaa wo bahaar tuune dii hai   2 mere haal par huii hai terii kaas meharabaanii tere paas meraa dil hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii mujhe ishq hai tujhii se   tere husn ne dikhaaiin  mujhe bekudii kii raahen ye hasiin lab nashiile ye jhukii jhukii nigaahen   2 terii zulf se uthii hai ye ghataaon kii jawaanii tere paas meraa dil hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii  mujhe ishq hai tujhii se merii jaanezindagaanii tere paas meraa dil hai mere pyaar kii nishaanii mujhe ishq hai tujhii se

Title: pannaa kii tamannaa hai ki hiiraa mujhe mil jaaye
Lyrics: lataa	pannaa kii tamannaa hai ki hiiraa mujhe mil jaaye chaahe merii jaan jaaye chaahe meraa dil jaaye ho threedots pannaa kii tamannaa hai ki hiiraa mujhe mil jaaye chaahe merii jaan jaaye chaahe meraa dil jaaye  kishor	hiiraa to pahale hii kisii aur kaa ho chukaa  2 kisii kii madabharii aankhon men kho chukaa yaadon kii bas se dhuul ban chukaa dil kaa phuul lataa	siine pe main rakh duun jo haath phir khil jaaye chaahe merii jaan jaaye chaahe meraa dil jaaye ho threedots pannaa kii tamannaa hai ki hiiraa mujhe mil jaaye chaahe merii jaan jaaye chaahe meraa dil jaaye  lataa	dil to dete hain lete hain log kaii baar  2 huaa kyaa kisii se kiyaa thaa tumane pyaar yaadon ko chhod de vaadon ko tod de kishor	apanii jagah se kaise parabat hil jaaye chaahe merii jaan jaaye chaahe meraa dil jaaye  kishor	bhuulaa naa mere dil ko kabhii jis kaa khayaal  2 ho sake to use mere dil se tuu nikaal lataa  laughs  naa karuun main ye kaam to nahiin meraa naam     2 kishor	baaton se ye zakhmejigar kaise sil jaaye chaahe merii jaan jaaye chaahe meraa dil jaaye lataa ho threedots pannaa kii tamannaa hai ki hiiraa mujhe mil jaaye chaahe merii jaan jaaye chaahe meraa dil jaaye

Title: tuu mungalaa mungalaa main gud kii dalii
Lyrics: tuu mungalaa mungalaa main gud kii dalii mangataa hai to aajaa rasiyaa naahiin to main ye chalii tuu mungalaa mungalaa threedots  o le bahinyaan thaam gorii gulaabii  2 daaruu kii botal chhod ore anaadii sharaabii o sharaablii mungalaa mungalaa main gud kii dalii zaraa meraa nashaa bhii chakh le aayaa jo merii galii tuu mungalaa mungalaa threedots  aafat kii chaal dekhe sulat jaae 2 tuu jis pe nainaa daal haathon se pyaalaa satak jaaye aa chitak jaa mungalaa mungalaa main gud kii dalii kaisaa mulagaa hai re sharamiilaa tujhase to mulagii bhalii tuu mungalaa mungalaa threedots

Title: kar bhalaa hogaa bhalaa ant bhale kaa bhalaa
Lyrics: kar bhalaa hogaa bhalaa ant bhale kaa bhalaa aaj sab kuchh hai teraa kal kaa hai kisako pataa kar bhalaa hogaa bhalaa threedots  jaisaa koii biij hai botaa vaisii chadhatii bel yahaan kaisaa raajaa kaun bhikhaarii sab karmon kaa khel yahaan saath kisii ke melaa koii bhatake akelaa kar bhalaa hogaa bhalaa threedots  jiivan kam hai duur hai manzil sapanon men naa dol zaraa niind men biitii jaae umariyaa aankh musaafir khol zaraa dekh tere jiivan kaa ek din aur dhalaa kar bhalaa hogaa bhalaa threedots

Title: sitaaro merii raaton ke sahaaro
Lyrics: sitaaron merii raaton ke sahaaron muhabbat kii chamakatii yaadagaaron sitaaron threedots  na jaane mujh ko niind aaye ke naa aaye tumhiin aaraam kar lo beqaraaron  gavaahii do merii barabaadiyon kii merii tanahaaiion ke yaadagaaron sitaaron threedots  udaate ho hansii kyuun mere gam kii ye shab merii tarah ro kar guzaaro sitaaron threedots

Title: ham aur tum tum aur ham kush hain yuun aaj
Lyrics: ki 	ham aur tum tum aur ham kush hain yuun aaj mil ke 2 	jaise kisii sangam par mil jaaen do nadiyaan tanhaa bahatebahate aa 	ham aur tum threedots ki 	ham aur tum threedots  ki 	mud kar kyon dekhen aa 	piichhe chaahe kuchh bhii ho ki 	chalate hii jaaen aa 	naii manzilon ko ki 	raste aasaan hain aa 	nahiin aaj ham do 	tuu merii baanhon men main terii baanhon men 	laharaaen raahon men ki 	chalen jhuumate hamtum aa 	ham aur tum threedots do 	ham aur tum threedots ki 	ham aur tum threedots  aa 	zulf ko khilane do saanson ko ghulane doo 	dil se dil tulane do ki 	diivaane ho jaaen kohare men kho jaaen 	mil ke yuun so jaaen 	jaise kisii parvat par mil jaaen do baadal tanhaa udateudate do 	ham aur tum threedots

Title: merii bagiyaa kii kalii tuu sadaa hii khilanaa
Lyrics: merii bagiyaa kii kalii tuu sadaa hii khilanaa jin raahon pe main chalii tuu unape na chalanaa teraa naa ho mere jaisaa haal merii bagiyaa kii kalii threedots  sab kuchh kiyaa nisaar tujhe tab maine paayaa tujh pe na padane paae kabhii kaanton kii chhaayaa sukh kii nindiyaa sonaa pade naa mujh saa ronaa merii bagiyaa kii kalii threedots  teraa koii sapanaa sansaar na tode biich raah men koii teraa saath na chhode tere man kii paatii samajhe teraa saathii merii bagiyaa kii kalii threedots  itanaa kyon ye duniyaa dhan ke piichhe bhaage kuchh bhii nahiin dhan pyaar bhare ik man ke aage laaj hai aisaa gahanaa phir se na jaae pahanaa merii bagiyaa kii kalii threedots

Title: ham chaahen yaa na chaahen
Lyrics: ham chaahen yaa naa chaahen hamaraahii banaa letii hain hamako jiivan kii raahen ham chaahen yaa na chaahen   threedots  ye raahen kahaan se aate ye raahen kahaan le jaate raahen dharatii ke tan par aakaash kii phailii baahen ham chaahen yaa na chaahen   threedots  utaraa aakaash dharaa par tan man kar diyaa nichhaavar jo phuul khilaanaa chaahen hans hans kar saath nibaahen ham chaahen yaa na chaahen   threedots

Title: tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile
Lyrics: tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile aa aa aa tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile kaisii zamiin phir meraa qadam aakaash par mile  tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile phir ye duniyaa chaahe naa mujhe saarii umar mile  paas aa tujhe apanaa banaa luun sajanaa re sajanaa baanhen kholake dil se lagaa luun sajanaa re sajanaa nazaron men tum ho sapanon men tum ho  tum ho man men kuuche khile tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile phir ye duniyaa chaahe naa mujhe saarii umar mile  chal kahiin chalen ki bahaar kaa ye kahanaa hai kahanaa rang rang ke ab sang sang rahanaa hai rahanaa galii galii bahake rut rut mahake  mahaken aaj milake gale aa aa aa tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile kaisii zamiin phir meraa qadam aakaash par mile  kyaa kahuun sajan dil beqaraar kitanaa thaa kitanaa tum mile mujhe mujhe intazaar kitanaa thaa kitanaa dekhuun tumhen jab se chaahuun tumhen tab se tab se tum se ye dil jale tere dil men zaraa sii jagah agar mile phir ye duniyaa chaahe naa mujhe saarii umar mile kaisii zamiin phir meraa qadam aakaash par mile phir ye duniyaa chaahe naa mujhe saarii umar mile

Title: aadamii musaafir hai aataa hai jaataa hai
Lyrics: aadamii musaafir hai aataa hai jaataa hai aatejaate raste men yaaden chhod jaataa hai  jhonkaa havaa kaa paanii kaa relaa 2 mele men rah jaae jo akelaa 2 vo phir akelaa hii rah jaataa hai aadamii musaafir hai threedots  kyaa saath laae kyaa chhod aae raste men ham kyaa chhod aae manzil pe jaa ke hii yaad aataa hai aadamii musaafir hai threedots  jab dolatii hai jiivan kii naiyaa koii to ban jaataa hai khivaiyaa koii kinaare pe hii duub jaataa hai aadamii musaafir hai threedots  rotii hai aankh jalataa hai ye dil jab apane ghar ke phenke diye se aangan paraayaa jagamagaataa hai aadamii musaafir hai threedots

Title: teraa phuulon jaisaa rang  chaahe chalen chhuriyaan
Lyrics: ki 	teraa phuulon jaisaa rang teraa shiishe jaisaa ang 	padii jaise hii nazar main to rah gayaa dang la 	aatejaate kare tang tere achchhe nahiin dhang 	main to karuungii sagaaii kisii duusare ke sang ki 	o mere hote koii aur kare tere baare gaur 2 	ye na hogaa kisii taur chaahe chalen chhuriyaan  	siidhesiidhe haan karatii hai yaa chalanaa hai thaane la 	thaane jaatejaate mar gae tujhase kaii diivaane ki 	yuun hii nakhare na kar terii chotii ko pakad 2 	tujhe laauungaa main ghar chaahe chalen chhuriyaan  la 	haay terii baaten hain ajab ki 	are ho le honaa hai jo ab la 	tujhe merii hai qasam kahiin dhaanaa na gazab ki 	ho tujhe chhodenge na ham chaahe roke hamen rab la 	tuu hai itanaa hii tang to main rangii tere rang 	le main chalii tere sang chaahe chalen chhuriyaan  la 	dil aane kii baat hai jab jo lag jaae pyaaraa ki 	dil par kisakaa zor hai dil ke aage har koii haaraa 	haay o mere yaaraa 	dil milane se teraameraa mel hai la 	dil milanaa muqaddaron kaa khel hai ki 	dil milane kaa melaa ye jahaan hai la 	dil milane se duniyaa javaan hai 	dil aane kii baat hai threedots  	tiir ishaq vaalaa koii maane yaa naa maane bekamaan hai 	mohabbat har dil kaa aramaan mohabbat har dhadakan kii jaan 2 	kisii se kar le tuu pahachaan kisii ko dede dil aur jaan 	kisii ko rakh dil men mehamaan kisii ke rah dil men mehamaan 	javaanii aatii hai ik baar ye mausam rahataa hai din chaar 	na khonaa is rut ko bekaar nahiin nit khilataa ye gulazaar 	kisii se kar lenaa ikaraar kisii se le lenaa ikaraar 	kisii kii kaatir ho badanaam yahii hai dilavaalon kaa kaam 	zamaanaa chaahe de ilzaam samajh har tohaman ko iinaam 	kisii se le dil kaa paigaam kisii ko de dil kaa paigaam 	dil aane kii baat hai threedots

Title: gunii janon re bhakt janon
Lyrics: gunii janon re bhakt janon 2 harii naam se naataa re jodo bhaaii maayaa se munh modon re jagatnaaraayan kii jayjay bolobolo nagadnaaraayan ko chhodo re ko 	jagatnaaraayan kii threedots  are rajdhan are gajdhan 2 gajdhan rajdhan rajdhan gajdhan raajdhan anaajdhan  laal ratan dhan khaan re 2 aayo re jab santoshdhan baabaa sab dhan dhuul samaan re bolo re sab dhan dhuul samaan re  dhan to hai  2 diivaar ret kii dhan se priitii todo re ko 	jagatnaaraayan kii threedots  jay govindam jay gopaalam 4 duniyaa karatii ruup kii bhakti kaisii maayaaruup re are ham to usake bhakt hain bhakton jisane banaayaa ruup re  sundar naarii priitam pyaarii  2 chhavi dikhalaae jay govindam jay gopaalam 2 sunosuno chalchitram kii kathaa sunaae kathaa sunaae bhakt kishoram 2 ko 	jay govindam threedots  brhmaande he koti sitaaram prithvii par bhii anek sitaaram are aashiirvaadam ashokakumaaram prithviiputram raajakapuuram shammiikapuuram shashiikapuuram raamam shyaamam diliipakumaaram puurabapashchim manojakumaaram are premapujaarii devaanandam ruupapujaarii aaii es jauharam are niilamakamalam raajakumaaram yaade yaadam suniiladattam are ittefaaqam raajeshakhannam jay jaanii raajendranaatham uchhalamakuudam jay mahamuudam  are svarg lok men ek hai indr are prithvii kaare hain tiin indr are jay jitendra jay dharmendra jayjayjay ho jay raajendra ko 	jay govindam threedots  jagat naaraayan ko chhod ke santon nagad naaraayan ke hain sab yaaram ko 	nagad naaraayan ke threedots  in sabake piichhe are pad gayaa inkam taiksam are bambam naache kishorakumaaram bambam naache threedots

Title: kachche dhaage ke saath jise
Lyrics: kachche dhaage ke saath jise baandh liyaa jaae vo bandii kyaa chhuute vahiin pe jie vahiin mar jaae kachche dhaage ke threedots  jin pe chal na paae zanjiiron kii joraazorii unako khiinch ke le aae kachchii resham kii dorii kisii ne sach hii kahaa hai ki do hii baaton ke biich man kaa miit ban jaae vo dushman jo badebadon ke kabhii haath na aae kachche dhaage ke threedots  aisaa bhii aataa hai koii mast pavan kaa jhonkaa gangaajal pe bhii ho jaataa hai madiraa kaa dhokhaa kisii ne sach hii kahaa hai ki jhuuthe vaade ke saath jise tod diyaa jaae vo bandhan kyaa jude jude to jude gaanth pad jaae kachche dhaage ke threedots  manmandir men suurat terii roz karuun main puujaa meraa tere dvaar binaa priitam naahiin ghar duujaa kisii ne sach hii kahaa hai ki sachche naate ke saath jise prem kiyaa jaae vo panchhii kyaa ude ude to ude laut kar aae kachche dhaage ke threedots

Title: pyaar ke din  main tumase pyaar karatii huun
Lyrics: la pyaar ke din aaye kaale baadal chhaye 3     khulake barase ghataa ghanaghor se kaho ki are mainne nahiin sunaa zaraa zor se kaho la main tumase pyaar karatii huun 2      mere saath huaa dhokhaa mere baalam sunate ho     ye mujhako maalum na thaa tum thodaa kam sunate ho ki kyaa bolii zaraa phir se bolo la mere saath huaa dhokhaa mere baalam sunate ho     ye mujhako maaluum na thaa tum thodaa kam sunate ho     der se ye jaanaa mausam hai mastaanaa     naache jhuume zaraa man mor se kaho ki are mainne nahiin sunaa zaraa zor se kaho la main tumase pyaar karatii huun 2  ki kyaa kahanaa kyaa sunanaa hai hamtum do diiwaanon ko     pyaar men aankhon ko kholo band karo in kaanon ko la kyaa phir se kaho ki kyaa kahanaa kyaa sunanaa hai hamtum do diiwaanon ko     pyaar men aankhon ko kholo band karo in kaanon ko siikh lo chup rahanaa jo kuchh bhii hai kahanaa     mere badale wo kisii aur se kaho la are mainne nahiin sunaa zaraa zor se kaho ki main tumase pyaar karataa huun la main tumase pyaar karatii huun ki main tumase pyaar karataa huun la main tumase pyaar karatii huun

Title: ho goriyaa re ho goriyaa re tere aane se saj gaii hamarii ye tuutii
Lyrics: ho goriyaa re ho goriyaa re tere aane se saj gai hamarii ye tuutii phuutii naav 2  naiyaa to hamaaraa ghar aanganaa is se hii paanaa aur maanganaa gorii ye duaaen denaa zaruur maanjhii se naiyaa ho nahiin duur o goriyaa re threedots  sab ko kinaare pahunchaayegaa maanjhii to kinaaraa nahiin paayegaa gaharii nadii kaa or na chhor laharon se zyaadaa manavaa men shor o goriyaa re threedots  apanaa to nit yahii kaam hai aane jaane vaalon ko salaam hai kabhii kabhii aanaa is naav men ik ghar teraa hai mere gaanv men o goriyaa re threedots

Title: o mere raajaa khafaa na honaa vaadaa to nibhaayaa
Lyrics: lataa o o mere raajaa khafaa na honaa der se aaii  duur se aaii majabuurii thii phir bhii maine vaadaa to nibhaayaa  vaadaa to nibhaayaa kishor o o merii raanii  samajh gayaa main vahii puraanaa  teraa bahaanaa der se aanaa aur ye kahanaa vaadaa to nibhaayaa  vaadaa to nibhaayaa  kishor intazaar ke ek ek pal kaa badalaa luungaa lataa aisaa bhii kyaa kishor ye na samajhanaa aaj bhii aise jaane duungaa lataa aisaa bhii kyaa kishor kitanaa sataayaa pahale usakaa hisaab do ankhiyon men ankhiyaan daalake javaab do lataa bachatii bachaatii kishor o o lataa bachatii bachaatii threedots chhupatii chhupaatii tum kyaa jaano kaise aaii vaadaa to nibhaayaa o o mere raajaa kishor samajh gayaa main  vahii puraanaa  teraa bahaanaa threedots lataa o o mere raajaa threedots  lataa baahon kii in zanjiiron men yuun naa jakado kishor ham jakadenge lataa mud jaaegii merii kalaai haath na pakado kishor ham pakadenge lataa chhodo naa kishor nahiin lataa chhodo naa kishor aise to naazuk nahiin haath sarakaar ke mauke bhii kabhii kabhii milate hain pyaar ke lataa pyaar abhii to kishor ho o o lataa pyaar abhii to nayaa nayaa hai merii vafaa kii kadar karo ki vaadaa to nibhaayaa o o mere raajaa threedots kishor o o merii raanii threedots  kishor kaho ye gaalon ke angaare kisake liye hain  kaho kaho lataa ajii tumhaare kishor haa haa haa haa honthon pe ye shahad ke dhaare kis ke liye hain  bolo bolo lataa ajii tumhaare kishor haan  sharm kahaan kii aao gale lag jaao jii kab se khadaa huun pyaasaa pyaas bujhaao jii lataa hat jaao jii kishor bujhaao jii lataa badanaamii se kishor ho o o lataa badanaamii se dar lagataa hai ye to socho kis mushkil se  vaadaa to nibhaayaa o o mere raajaa threedots kishor samajh gayaa main  vahii puraanaa  teraa bahaanaa threedots lataa o o mere raajaa threedots

Title: prem kahaanii men ek ladakaa hotaa hai ek ladakii hotii hai
Lyrics: kishor ek kahani jab ati hai rut pe javani  tab banati hai prem kahani prem kahani men  ek ladaka hota hai  ek ladaki hoti hai  kabhi dono hansate hain kabhi dono rote hain   lata prem kahani men  ek ladaka hota hai  ek ladaki hoti hai  kabhi dono hansate hain kabhi dono rote hain   kishor prem kahani men  ek ladaka hota hai  lata ek ladaki hoti hai  dono kabhi dono hansate hain kabhi dono rote hain   kishor itani si chhoti si hoti hai ek chingari  2 jal jati hai phunk jati hai jis men duniya sari  chandani raton men  lata raton men kishor ek dipak hota hai  lata hota hai  kishor ek bati hoti hai kabhi dono jalate hain kabhi dono bujhate hain  lata prem kahani men  ek ladaka hota hai  kishor ek ladaki hoti hai  dono kabhi dono hansate hain kabhi dono rote hain   lata jhumake parabat pe rimajhim jab ata hai savan  2 savan men premi pagal ho jaate hain saajan  in barasaton men  kishor hmmm lata ek badal hota hai  kishor hmmm lata ek bijali hoti hai  kabhi dono tarasate hain kabhi dono barasate hain  kishor prem kahani men  ek ladaka hota hai  lata ek ladaki hoti hai  dono kabhi dono hansate hain kabhi dono rote hain   kishor sath milan ke naam judai ka likha hai aisa  lata ye jivan bhi khel tamasha hai ek natak jaisa  jaise natak men  kishor ho raja hota hai  lata hmmm  rani hoti hai  dono kabhi dono milate hain kabhi dono bichhadate hain   lata prem kahani men  ek ladaka hota hai  kishor ek ladaki hoti hai  dono kabhi dono hansate hain kabhi dono rote hain

Title: qasam khaao tum ik baar
Lyrics: qasam khaao tum ik baar mere yaar mere diladaar chale to naa jaaoge tum baabuu kahiin leke meraa pyaar he he he he he he he he qasam khaataa hai meraa pyaar mere yaar mere diladaar aayegaa diiwaanaa leke dolii sanam kabhii tere dwaar haa haa aa aa aa aa aa aa  qasam khaao tum ik baar  paagal kaho mujhe yaa diiwaanii kaho la la la ab to terii huii balam jo ho so ho la la la merii balaa se koii rahe yaa naa rahe la la la agar merii nazar men tuu sajii rahe aa la la la laa he he he he he he he he basaa kar lenaa sarakaar mere yaar mere diladaar chale to naa jaaoge tum baabuu kahiin leke meraa pyaar he he he he he he he he  qasam khaataa hai meraa pyaar  tuune to ye samaan chhodaa mere liye la la la mainne saaraa jahaan chhodaa tere liye la la la chhotii se main badii jis aangan men huii la la la naataa us aangan se todaa tere liye la la la laa he he he he he he he he jiivaa kar duniyaa is baar mere yaar mere diladaar aayegaa diiwaanaa leke dolii sanam kabhii tere dwaar haa haa he he he he he he  qasam khaao tum ik baar  rang se tere chunarii merii rangii rahe la la la maathe mere bindiyaa terii lagii rahe la la la chandaa suuraj ko to mudake naa dekhuun main la la la agar merii baanhon men tuu sajii rahe ho la la la laa he he he he he he he he sajaa kar lenaa sarakaar mere yaar mere diladaar chale to naa jaaoge tum baabuu kahiin leke meraa pyaar haa haa aa aa haa haa aa aa

Title: tuu jahaan mile mujhe
Lyrics: tuu jahaan mile mijhe vahiin mere donon jahaan donon jahaan vahiin mere mile mujhe tuu jahaan tu hai to sab hai yahaan re  2 tuu jahaan threedots  hotaa nahiin ye magar ho jaaye aisaa agar tuu hii nazar aaye tuu jab bhi uthe ye nazar  2 ho tu hai to sab hai yahaan re tuu jahaan threedots  palakon kii chhaanv tale kahate hain ye log bhale jab koii hotaa nahiin aao mil jaaen gale  2 ho tu hai to sab hai yahaan re tuu jahaan threedots  tere paanv ke nishaan kho gayen hain kahaan suunii ho gayii hai nazar gum hain donon jahaan  2 ho tu thaa to sab thaa yahaan re tuu jahaan threedots

Lyrics: lataa sainyaan binaa ghar suunaa suunaa sainyaan binaa ghar suunaa raahii binaa jaise suunii galiyaan bin khushabuu jaise suunii kaliyaan sainyaan binaa ghar suunaa   suunaa din kaalii ratiyaa ansuvan se bhiige takiyaa har aahat pe dariidarii raah take merii ankhiyaan chaand binaa jaise suunii ratiyaa phuul binaa jaise suunii bagiyaa sainyaan binaa ghar suunaa   andhiyaare baadal chhaae kuchh bhii naa man ko bhaae dekh akelii ghere mujhe yaadon ke kaale saaye chaand binaa jaise suunii ratiyaa phuul binaa jaise suunii bagiyaa sainyaan binaa ghar suunaa   bhuupindar aansuu yuun na bahaao ye motii na lutaao rukatii nahiin hai vaqt kii dhaaraa palpal badale jag ye saaraa jaise dhalegii raat andherii musakaaegaa suuraj pyaaraa sukh ke lie pade dukh bhii sahanaa ab na kabhii phir tum ye kahanaa sainyaan binaa ghar suunaa

Lyrics: zikr hotaa hai jab qayaamat kaa tere jalavon kii baat hotii hai tuu jo chaahe to din nikalataa hai tuu jo chaahe to raat hotii hai zikr hotaa hai jab threedots  tujhako dekhaa hai merii nazaron ne terii taariif ho magar kaise ke bane ye nazar zubaan kaise ke bane ye zubaan nazar kaise naa zubaan ko dikhaaii detaa hai naa nigaahon se baat hotii hai zikr hotaa hai jab threedots  tuu chalii aae muskuraatii huii to bikhar jaaen har taraf kaliyaan tuu chalii jaae uth ke pahaluu se to ujad jaaen phuulon kii galiyaan jis taraf hotii hai nazar terii us taraf qaayanaat hotii hai zikr hotaa hai jab threedots  tuu nigaahon se naa pilaae to ashq bhii piine vaale piite hain vaise jiine ko to tere bin bhii is zamaane men log jiite hain zindagii to usii ko kahate hain jo guzar tere saath hotii hai zikr hotaa hai jab threedots

Title: kis liye main ne pyaar kiyaa dil ko yuunhii beqaraar kiyaa
Lyrics: kis liye main ne pyaar kiyaa  dil ko yuunhii beqaraar kiyaa  shaam savere terii raah dekhii  raat din intazaar kiyaa      2  aankhon men main ne kaajal daalaa maathe pe bindiyaa lagaaii aise men tuu aa jaae to kyaa ho raam duhaaii chhup ke munh men armaanon ne lii kaisii angadaaii koii dekhe to kyaa samajhe ho jaae rusvaaii main ne kyon singaar kiyaa dil ko yuun beqaraar kiyaa shaam savere terii raah dekhii raat din intazaar kiyaa hothreedots kis liye main ne pyaar kiyaa  aaj vo din hai jisake liye main tadapii banake raadhaa aaj mere man kii bachainii bad gaii aur zyaadaa pyaar men dhokaa na khaa jaae ye man siidhaasaadaa aisaa na ho jhuuthaa nikale aaj milan kaa vaadaa main ne kyon aitabaar kiyaa dil ko yuunhii beqaraar kiyaa  shaam savere terii raah dekhii  raat din intazaar kiyaa hothreedots  kis liye main ne pyaar kiyaa  2

Title: is reshamii paazeb kii jhankaar ke sadake
Lyrics: is reshamii paazeb kii jhankaar ke sadake jis ne ye pahanaaii hai us diladaar ke sadake  us zulf ke qurabaan laboruqasaar ke sadake har jalavaa thaa ik sholaa husneyaar ke sadake  javaanii maangatii ye hasiin jhankaar barason se tamanna bun rahii thii dhadakanon ke taar barason se chhupchhup ke aane vaale tere pyaar ke sadake is reshamii paazeb kii threedots  javaanii so rahii thii husn kii rangiin panaahon men churaa laaye ham un ke naazaniin jalave nigaahon men qisamat se jo huaa hai us diidaar ke sadake us zulf ke qurabaan threedots  nazar laharaa rahii thii ziist pe mastii sii chhaaii hai dubaaraa dekhane kii shauq ne halchal machaaii hai dil ko jo lag gayaa hai us azaar ke sadake is reshamii paazeb kii threedots

Title: tumhen dekhatii huun to lagataa hai aise
Lyrics: tumhen dekhatii huun to lagataa hai aise ke jaise yugon se tumhe jaanatii huun agar tum ho saagar threedots agat tum ho saagar main pyaasii nadii huun agar tum ho saavan main jalatii kalii huun       mujhe merii niinden meraa chain de do mujhe merii sapanon kii ik rain de do na yahii baat threedots yahii baat pahale bhii tumase kahii thii vahii baat phir aaj doharaa rahii huun  tumhen chhuuke pal men bane dhuul chandan 2 tumhaarii mahak se mahakane lage tan mere paas aao threedots mere paas aao gale se lagaao piyaa aur tumase main kyaa chaahatii huun  muraliyaa samajhakar mujhe tum uthaa lo bas ik baar honthon se apane lagaa lo na koii sur to jaage koii sur to jaage merii dhadakanon men ke main apanii sargam se ruuthii huii huun

Title: kaanp rahii main abhii zaraa tham jaanam
Lyrics: kaanp rahii main abhii zaraa tham jaanam baakii hai raat abhii  haanf rahii main le luun zaraa dam jaanam naa kar ye baat abhii   tuune o re mere jaanii jo hai jii men thaanii usase daruun main daruun main tuu jo paas mere aaye jaan merii jaaye aahen bharuun main jaane de re rok zaraa haath abhii  abhii gul hain diiye saare paas aa jaa pyaare ban jaa diiwaanaa diiwaanaa zaraa mast main bhii ho luun to ye tujhe boluun tuu hai nishaanaa main bhii huun tuu bhii hai saath abhii

Title: bahut duur mujhe chale jaanaa hai
Lyrics: la bahut duur mujhe chale jaanaa hai     bahut nazadiik mujhe aanaa hai     terii baanhon men mujhe aaj mar jaanaa hai  2  ki kisiiko is jagah pe nahiin aanaa hai     kisiiko is jagah se nahiin jaanaa hai     terii baanhon men mujhe aaj mar jaanaa hai      jaane mile yaa na mile phir aisii tanahaaii     dil kii lagii lene lagii siine men angadaaii la ho mujhako chhupaale dil men basaale dekh buraa ye zamaanaa hai u u u ki kisiiko is jagah pe nahiin aanaa hai     kisiiko is jagah se nahiin jaanaa hai la o terii baanhon men mujhe aaj mar jaanaa hai  ki kyaa zindagii kat jaaegii bas terii yaadon men     ye raat bhii dhal jaaegii kyaa yuun hii vaadon men la ho aramaan nikale yaa jaan nikale pyaar meraa diiwaanaa hai u u u ki kisiiko is jagah pe nahiin aanaa hai     kisiiko is jagah se nahiin jaanaa hai la ho terii baanhon men mujhe aaj mar jaanaa hai  la mere badan me o sajan jaagii ik chinagaarii      phunk jaaegii jal jaaegii is men duniyaa saarii ki is ko bujhaa de sholaa banaa de kahataa ye parawaanaa hai u u u  la bahut duur mujhe chale jaanaa hai     bahut nazadik mujhe aanaa hai do terii baanhon men mujhe aaj mar jaanaa hai     u u u      terii baahon men mujhe aaj mar jaanaa hai

Lyrics: prem ke pujaarii prem ke pujaarii ham hain ras ke bhikhaarii  ham hain prem ke pujaarii ho prem ke pujaarii   kahaan re himaalaa aisaa kahaan aisaa paanii yahii vo zamiin jisakii duniyaa diivaanii 2 sundarii na koii jaisii hai dharatii hamaarii prem ke pujaarii    raajaa gae haay  raajaa gae taaj gae badalaa jahaan saaraa roz magar badhataa jaaye kaaravaan hamaaraa 2 phuul ham hazaaron leke khushabuu ek hamaarii prem ke pujaarii

Lyrics: ghar jaayegii tar jaayegii ho doliyaan chadh jaayegii ho o o o mehendii lagaayake re kaajal sajaayake re dulhaniyaa mar jaayegii o o o o dulhaniyaa mar jaayegii  dhiire dhiire leke chalanaa aangan se nikalanaa koii dekhe naa dulhan ko galii men ho ankhiyaan jhukaaye hue ghunghataa giraaye hue mukhadaa chhupaaye hue chalii main jaayegii ghar jaayegii tar jaayegii ho ghar jaayegii threedots  mehendii mehendii khelii thii main terii hii sahelii thii main tuune to suman ko chunaa thaa ho tuune meraa naam kabhii aankhon se bulaayaa nahiin main ne jaane kaise sunaa thaa jaayegii ghar jaayegii laa laa laa ho ghar jaayegii threedots

Lyrics: tumane kisii se kabhii pyaar kiyaa hai bolo naa tumane kisii se kabhii pyaar kiyaa hai pyaar bharaa dil kisii ko diyaa hai  pyaar kahaan apanii kismat men pyaar kaa bas diidaar kiyaa hai tumane kisii se threedots  tum ho itane hasiin ki tum par laakhon maratii hongii tum ho itane javaan hazaaron aahen bharatii hongii kisako kahaa tumane apanaa ban ke rahe kis kaa sapanaa sapanen to sapanen hain aakhir kisane inhen saakaar kiyaa hai tumane kisii se threedots  maine dekhaa haal dilon kaa dekhe do dilavaale maine dekhe do dilavaale ek duuje ke pyaar pe donon jaan lutaane vaale donon jaan lutaane vaale pyaar kaa saaraa jahaan dushman dekh sakaa naa unakaa milan auron kii chhodo apanii sunaao tumane kahaan dil haar diyaa hai tumane kisii se threedots

Title: shariifon kaa zamaane men  sharaafat chhod dii maine
Lyrics: shariifon kaa zamaane men ajii bas haal vo dekhaa ki sharaafat chhod dii maine muhabbat karane vaalon kaa yahaan anjaam vo dekhaa ki muhabbat chhod dii maine  chhudaa ke haath apanon se chalii aaii main gairon men pahan lii ghungharuon kii phir vahii zanjiir pairon men main gaauungii main naachuungii ishaaron pe sitamagaaron ke bagaavat chhod dii maine sharaafat chhod dii threedots  na hiiraa hai na motii hai na chaandii hai na sonaa hai nahiin qiimat koii dil kii ye mittii kaa khilaunaa hai merii diivaanagii dekho ki kahanaa maan ke dil kaa ye daulat chhod dii maine sharaafat chhod dii threedots

Title: jo mere pyaar par ho shak to kar lo saaf dil beshak
Lyrics: ra jo mere pyaar par ho shak to kar lo saaf dil beshak tumhiin se pyaar karate hain dariicheshak dariicheshak 2  aa kisii ko ho bhalaa kyon shak yaqiin kar len vo ab beshak ke ham bhi pyaar karate hain dariicheshak dariicheshak 2  ra kuchh to duniyaa men aap the tanhaa aur kuchh hamen aap kii zaruurat thii bas yuun hii mil gae doraahe par hai yahii daastaan mohabbat kii agar ho phir bhii tumako shak to le lo imtihaan beshak dariicheshak dariicheshak 2  aa pyaar kii baat kaa bharosaa kyaa mard kii zaat kaa bharosaa kyaa aaj vaadon pe aitabaar to hai kal ke haalaat kaa bharosaa kyaa nahiin ab tak hamen kuchh shak bharosaa kiijiye beshak ke ham bhii pyaar karate hain dariicheshak dariicheshak 2 threedots

Title: aur nahiin bas aur nahiin gam ke pyaale aur nahiin
Lyrics: aur nahiin bas aur nahiin gam ke pyaale aur nahiin  dil men jagah nahiin baakii rok najar apanii saakii to aur nahin bas threedots  1 sapane nahiin yahaan tere apane nahiin yahaan tere  sachchaaii kaa mol nahiin chup ho jaa kuchh bol nahiin  pyaar priit chillaaegaa to apanaa galaa ganvaaegaa  patthar rakh le siine par qasamen khaa le jiine par  gaur nahiin hai aur nahiin paravaanon par gaur nahiin  aansuu aansuu dhalate hain angaaron par chalate hain to  aur nahiin bas aur nahiin threedots  2 kitanaa padhuun zamaane ko kitanaa gadhuun zamaane ko  kaun gunon ko ginataa hai kaun dukhon ko chunataa hai  hamadardii kaafuur hui nekii chakanaachuur hui  jii karataa bas kho jaauun kafan odhakar so jaauun  daur nahiin ye aur nahiin insaanon kaa daur nahiin  farz yahaan par farzii hai asalii to khudagarzii hai to  aur nahiin bas aur nahiin threedots  3 bimaar ho gai duniyaa bekaar ho gai duniyaa  marane lagii sharam ab to bikane lage sanam ab to  ye raat hai nazaaron kii gairon ke sath yaaron kii  jii hai bigaad duun saarii duniyaa ujaad duun saarii  zor nahiin hai zor nahiin dil pe kisii kaa zor nahiin  koii yaad machal jaae saaraa aalam jal jaae to  aur nahiin bas aur nahiin threedots

Title: jiivan men hamasafar milate to hain zaruur
Lyrics: jiivan men hamasafar ruk kyon gaye gaao naa raastaa kat jaayegaa  he he he laa laa laa la la laa  jiivan men hamasafar milate to hain zaruur par kho jaate chalake thodii duur jiivan men hamasafar milate to hain zaruur par kho jaate chalake thodii duur jiivan men hamasafar   ajab raahon men zindagaanii hai khoii ki dhuundo kisii ko to milataa hai koii   2 kab umr bhar saath chalataa hai koii  jiivan men hamasafar milate to hain zaruur par kho jaate chalake thodii duur jiivan men hamasafar milate to hain zaruur   hamadam saathii mere dil jigar ke kahaan chhup gaye mujhako aawaaz karake   2 main thak gaayaa justujuu karate karate  jiivan men hamasafar milate to hain zaruur par kho jaate chalake thodii duur jiivan men hamasafar milate to hain zaruur

Title: aaiie aapako main apane bangale kii sair karaauun
Lyrics: aaiie aapako main apane bangale kii sair karaauun chhote se ik parivaar kaa aapase mel karaauun ye meraa bangalaa hai aur ye main huun  maine samajhaa prem pyaar ko ik saavan kaa jhuulaa taubaa merii taubaa main to shaadii karake bhuulaa haal huaa ye meraa logon dekho ban kar duulhaa sej ke badale merii qismat men likhaa hai chuulhaa ye merii prem kathaa hai aur ye main huun  inakii kyaa taariif karuun insaan hain ye kuchh aise inase milie kaun hain ye naadaan hain ye kuchh aise ye mere saassasur hain aur ye main huun  vaise is desh men sab kuchh kahane ko aazaadii hai chain se soii hai vo dekho saamane ik shahazaadii hai bhuul se kar baithii vah mujh jaise kangaal se shaadii haan vah merii biivii hai aur ye main huun aaiie aapako main threedots

Title: mere dil se ye nain mile rahane do jaaneman
Lyrics: shai mere dil se ye nain mile rahane do jaaneman ke do ghadii bahal jaataa hai dil diiwaanaa  aa ke do ghadii bahal jaataa hai dil diiwaanaa  shai inake binaa yahaan vahaan aise phiruun uljhan kaa maaraa pairon tale jaise koii rakhataa chale jalataa angaaraa ho dukh meraa ye jaane yaa jaane meraa haal ye viiraanaa  aa ho mere dil se ye nain threedots  tum bhii mujhe dekho yuun hii hotii rahe dil kii do baaten tum hii se mile mujhe jiivan ke din jiivan kii raaten ho ye raat din ruk jaaen phir bhii na ruk paae ye afasaanaa  ho mere dil se ye nain threedots
