Title: aaie shauq se kahie kyaa hai koii kaam
Lyrics: aaie shauq se kahie kyaa hai koii kaam ajii kaamvaam men kyaa rakhaa hai ham to hain aapake gulaam  kyaa hai jii aapakaa naam ajii naamvaam men kyaa rakhaa hai ham to hain aapake gulaam  kamare men aap kyaa aae nakshaa badal gayaa saaraa main bhii yahii sochatii mile naa mile mauqaa phir ye dobaaraa ek do ghadii mile to sabakii kidamat karate jaaie  koii dekho aa rahaa hai thaharo udhar nazar kar lo ham apanaa munh idhar kar len tum apanaa munh udhar kar lo chhup nahiin sakoge dear sundar mukhadaa tum chaahe jidhar kar lo aaie shauq se threedots

Title: naacho re  chhallaa mere chhailaa ne chhiinaa
Lyrics: naacho re haan naacho re mere pyaar aaj to ai man mere kar singaar haay re haay re haay challaa mere chailaa ne chiinaa  usape jadaa nagiinaa 2 naacho re haan naacho re mere pyaar  pyaar kii kushii men kyaa jaane kyaa hai jii men ki ankhiyaan phadaken merii saathii mere man ke dekho binaa pavan ke chunariyaa sarake merii 2 ho rahaa meraa jiyaa beqaraar haay re haay re haay kyon na sakhii  jiyaa pe likh luun  ye din yahii mahiinaa challaa mere chailaa ne chiinaa threedots  strii koras chiikiinaaka chiikiinaaka chiikiinaaka chiikiinaaka  purush koras tithaa tithaa dhin lataa haa haa purush koras tithaa tithaa dhin lataa are purush koras tithaa tithaa dhin lataa ui daiyaa strii koras haay raam lataa haay  ab to yaar jaanii pahanii terii nishaanii pahan ke utare nahiin banake meraa apanaa dikhaa diyaa jo sapanaa ye sapanaa bikhare nahiin 2 pahalii baar  jiivan men aayii hai bahaar haay re haay re haay kyon na sakhii  jiyaa pe likh luun  ye din yahii mahiinaa challaa mere chailaa ne chiinaa threedots

Title: simatiisii sharamaaiisii kis duniyaa se tum aaii ho
Lyrics: simatiisii sharamaaiisii kis duniyaa se tum aaii ho kaise jahaan men samaaegaa itanaa husn jo laaii ho simatiisii   hiiraa nazar chaandii badan resham hansii mukhadaa chaman kangaal hain saare hasiin bas ek tumhiin rakhatii ho dhan lutane kaa dar hai ghabaraaii ho  2 simatiisii   jab tak tumhen dekhaa nahiin ye dil kabhii dhadakaa nahiin aaegae kitane sanam mainne magar puujaa nahiin tum dil kii pahalii angadaaii ho  2 simatiisii   aankhen miliin vaadaa huaa kuchh kah diyaa kuchh sun liyaa thahare kahaan betaab dil kaise mile apanaa pataa zulfon kii badalii jab chhaaii ho  2 simatiisii

Title: duur hai kinaaraa gaharii nadii kii dhaaraa
Lyrics: duur hai kinaaraa 2 gaharii nadii kii dhaaraa tuutii terii naiyaa maajhii khete jaao re he he naiyaa khete jaao re duur hai kinaaraa ho  aandhii kabhii tuufaan kabhii kabhii majhadhaar o maajhii re he he maajhii re aandhii kabhii tuufaan kabhii kabhii majhadhaar jiit hai usii kii jisane maanii nahiin haar  maajhii khete jaao re duur hai kinaaraa ho  duubate huye ko bahut hai tinake kaa sahaaraa o maajhii re he he maajhii re duubate huye ko bahut hai tinake kaa sahaaraa man jahaan maan le maajhii e he man jahaan maan le maajhii wahiin hai kinaaraa  maajhii khete jaao re duur hai kinaaraa ho he he naiyaa khete jaao re

Title: rote hue aate hain sab hansataa huaa jo jaaegaa
Lyrics: rote hue aate hain sab hansataa huaa jo jaaegaa vo muqaddar kaa sikandar jaaneman kahalaaegaa  vo sikandar kyaa thaa zisane zulm se jiitaa zahaan pyaar se jiite dilon ko vo jhukaa de aasamaan jo sitaaron par kahaanii pyaar kii likh jaaegaa vo muqaddar kaa sikandarthreedots  zindagii to bevafaa hai ek din thukaraaegii maut mahabuubaa hai apane saath lekar jaaegii mar ke jiine kii adaa jo duniyaa ko sikhalaaegaa vo muqaddar kaa sikandarthreedots  hamane maanaa ye zamaanaa dard kii jaagiir hai har kadam pe aansuon kii ik nai zanjiir hai aae din par jo khushii ke giit gaataa jaaegaa vo muqaddar kaa sikandarthreedots  rote hue aate hain sab hansataa huaa jo jaaegaa vo muqaddar kaa sikandar jaaneman kahalaaegaa

Title: ruup teraa aisaa darapan men naa samaay
Lyrics: haaregaa jab koi baazii threedots tabhii to hogii kisii kii jiit dost yahii duniyaa ki riit threedots tumhen mubaarak man kaa miit  ruup teraa aisaa dapran men naa samaay     2 khushabuu tere tan ki madhuban men naa samaay o mujhe khushii milii itanii o mujhe khushii milii itanii  ke man men naa samaay palak band karaluun kahiin jhalak hii naa jaay ruup teraa threedots  mujhe naa milii jo vo khushii tuune paaii ai dost mubaarak ho tujhe pyaar kii shahanaai duaa mere dil kii duaa mere dil kii  daaman men naa samaay tujhe pyaar mile itanaa jiivan men naa samaay mujhe khushii milii itanii threedots  miit meraa chhiin liyaa tuune chhab dikhaake sadaa use rakhanaa palakon pe tuu bithaake itanaa sukh denaa jiivan men naa samaay yuun ras barasaanaa aangan men na samaay mujhe khushii milii itanii threedots

Title: tumane piyaa diyaa sab kuchh
Lyrics: tumane piyaa tumane piyaa diyaa sab kuchh mujhako apanii priit daii ke raam kare yuun hii biite jiivan tumhare giit gaii ke2 tumane piyaa  main to huun bholii aisii bholii piyaa  jaise thii raadhikaa kaanhaa kii premikaa2 shyaam kahiin shyaam kahiin ban jaiyyo na tum merii sudh bhulaii ke raam kare yuun hii biite jiivan tumhare giit gaii ke tumane piyaa  mere mitawaa re mere mitawaa re mile jab se tum mujhe bindiyaa maathe saje paayal merii baje2 maang bhare  maang bhare merii nis din ab sinduurii saanjh aii ke  tum ne piyaa diyaa saba kuchh mujhako apanii priit daii ke raam kare yuun hii biite jiivan tumhare giit gaii ke

Title: mahvekhayaal yaar hain
Film: dulhan wahi jo piya man bhaye
Lyrics: ab ranj se khushii se bahaarokizaa se kyaa mahvekayaal yaar hain ham ko jahaan se kyaa  unakaa kayaal unakii talab unakii aarazuu jis dil men vo ho maange kisii maharabaan se kyaa  ham ne chiraag rakh diyaa tuufaan ke saamane piichhe hategaa ishq kisii imtahaan se kyaa  koii chale chale na chale ham to chal pade manzil kii dhun ho jisako use kaaravaan se kyaa  ye baat sochane kii hai vo ho ke maharabaan puuchhenge haaledil to kahenge zabaan se kyaa

Title: he tuu naa milii to ham jogii ban jaaenge
Lyrics: he tuu naa milii to  2 ham jogii ban jaaenge saarii umariyaa ke rogii ban jaaenge tuu naa milii to threedots  o mere sapanon kii raanii tujhape nichhaavar merii javaanii aa terii tasviir banaa duun chiir ke apanaa siinaa dikhaa duun raam base hanumaan ke dil men tuu mere dil kii mahafil men tujhako agar ho koii shankaa jalaa den apane dil kii lankaa tere saamane hansate hue jal jaaenge tuu naa milii to threedots  aur suno tere milan men sukh hain saare tere darshan sabase pyaare tuu mahake jaise raat kii raanii angang se chhalake javaanii tuune bahut mere dil ko sataayaa daal de ab zulfon kaa saayaa kamal kalii sii terii kaayaa ruup menakaa jaisaa paayaa tujhe dekh ke jogii bhii bhogii ban jaaenge tuu naa milii to threedots

Title: aao manaayen jashnemuhabbat
Lyrics: aao manaayen jashnemuhabbat  jaam uthaayen jaam ke baad shaam se pahale kaun ye soche  kyaa honaa hai shaam ke baad  aao manaayen  hamaarii tamannaa tumhen pyaar karanaa hamen aur karanaa kyaa hamen aur karanaa kyaa muhabbat men rusawaa hue bhii to kyaa hai duniyaa se daranaa kyaa aage koii ilzaam nahiin hai chaahat ke ilzaam ke baad  aao manaayen jashnemuhabbat jaam uthaayen jaam ke baad shaam se pahale kaun ye soche  kyaa honaa hai shaam ke baad  aao manaayen  ye aalam hai kaisaa udaa jaa rahaa huun tumhen leke baahon men tumhen leke baahon men hamaare labon se tumhaare labon tak nahiin koii raahon men kaise koii ab dil ko sanbhaale itane hasiin paigaam ke baad  aao manaayen jashnemuhabbat  jaam uthaayen jaam ke baad shaam se pahale kaun ye soche  kyaa honaa hai shaam ke baad  aao manaayen

Title: jaise suuraj ki garmii se jalate hue tan ko
Lyrics: jaise suuraj kii garmii se jalate hue tan ko mil jaaye taruvar ki chhaayaa aisaa hii sukh mere man ko milaa hai main jabase sharan terii aayaa mere raam  bhatakaa huaa meraa man thaa koi mil naa rahaa thaa sahaaraa laharon se ladatii hui naav ko jaise mil naa rahaa ho kinaaraa mil naa rahaa ho kinaaraa us ladakhadaatii hui naav ko jo kisii ne kinaaraa dikhaayaa aisaa hii sukh threedots  shiital bane aag chandan ke jaisii raaghav kripaa ho jo terii ujiyaalii puunam kii ho jaaen raaten jo thiin amaavas andherii jo thiin amaavas andherii yugyug se pyaasii marubhuumi ne jaise saavan kaa sandes paayaa aisaa hii sukh threedots  jis raah kii manzil teraa milan ho us par kadam main badhaaun phuulon men khaaron men patajhad bahaaron men main na kabhii dagamagaaun main na kabhii dagamagaaun paanii ke pyaase ko taqadiir ne jaise jii bhar ke amrit pilaayaa aisaa hii sukh threedots

Title: nain hamaare saanjh sakaare dekhen laakhon sapane
Lyrics: nain hamaare saanjh sakaare dekhen laakhon sapane sach ye kahiin honge yaa nahiin koii jaane naa koii jaane naa yahaan  chalate rahe dagar pe gam kii jinake vaaste chhalate rahe dilon ko ajanabiise raaste sadiyon se chhaae ye jo sapanon ke saaye sach ye kahiin   man ye kahe dukhii na ho dukhon se haar ke likhate rahe jo aansuon se giit pyaar ke giit vo chaahe roe koii hansake gaae sach ye kahiin   sunate rahe bahaaron kii jo roz aahaten chunate rahe labon pe gam ko muskuraahaten dil men dabaae laakhon aramaan jo haay sach ye kahiin

Title: ik din bik jaayegaa maatii ke mol
Lyrics: ik din bik jaaegaa maatii ke mol jag men rah jaaenge pyaare tere bol duuje ke honthon ko dekar apane giit koii nishaanii chhod phir duniyaa se dol ik din bik jaayegaa   threedots  laa laa lalallallaa  anahonii pag men kaanten laakh bichhaae honii to phir bhii bichhadaa yaar milaae   2 ye birahaa ye duurii do pal kii majabuurii phir koii dilavaalaa kaahe ko ghabaraaye tarampam dhaaraa to bahatii hai bahake rahatii hai bahatii dhaaraa ban jaa phir duniyaa se dol ek din threedots  parade ke piichhe baithii saanvalii gorii thaam ke tere mere man kii dorii    2 ye dorii naa chhuute ye bandhan naa tuute bhor hone vaalii hai ab rainaa hai thodii tarampam sar ko jhukaae tuu baithaa kyaa hai yaar gorii se nainaa jod phir duniyaa se dol ek din threedots

Title: maano to main gangaa maan huun
Lyrics: maano to main gangaa maan huun naa maano to bahataa paanii 2  jo svarg ne dii dharatii ko  2 main huun pyaar kii vahii nishaanii  yugyug se main bahatii aaii niil gagan ke niiche sadiyon se merii dhaaraa pyaar kii dharatii siinche merii laharlahar pe likhii hai is desh kii amar kahaanii  hari om allaa ho akabar allaa 2 koii vajuu kare mere jal se koii suuraj ko nahalaae kahiin dhobii kapade dhoe kahiin pandit pyaas bujhaae ye jaat dharam ke jhagade insaan kii hain naadaanii  gautam ashok akabar ne yahaan pyaar ke phuul khilaae tulasii gaalib miiraa ne yahaan gyaan ke diip jalaae mere tat pe aaj bhii guunje naanak kabiir kii vaanii maano to main threedots

Title: bataauun baat to  ye hain pyaar ke nazaare hulle hullaa re
Lyrics: bataauun baat to baaton se baat badhatii hai aur chhupaauun to yah baat sar pe chadhatii hai udhar kii baat na bigade idhar kii baat rahe bachaake baat hamen baat yah kahanii padatii hai                                                                                 kyaa                                                                                  ye hain pyaar ke nazaare hulle hullaa re hulle hullaa re nigaahon ke hasiin ishaare hulle hullaa re hulle hullaa re                                                                                 kabhii nakharaa kabhii jhagadaa kabhii shokii kabhii gussaa 2 na yah inkaar na iqaraar is men jiit hai na haar taubaa ishq kaa vyopaar kaisaa khel hai pyaare jo is takaraar ko hii pyaar kahate hain to ham haare ye hain pyaar ke nazaare threedots                                                                                 kabhii baadal kabhii bijalii kabhii gudiyaa kabhii titalii 2 kahiin mahakii huii zulfen kahiin bahakii huii nazaren jo badhakar rok le raahen to apanaa dosh kyaa pyaare ke ham to dekhate hain shok pe andaaz to maare ye hain pyaar ke nazaare threedots

Title: jay bholenaath jay ho prabhu
Lyrics: jay bholenaath jay ho prabhu sabase jagat men uunchaa hai tuu is dar se chhotaabadaa koii na khaalii gayaa par khaalii hai aanchal meraa  har daag dhulataa hai yahaan har bhaagy khulataa hai yahaan har ang khilataa yahaan are main bhii usii dar pe aayaa banatii sabakii bigadii jahaan jhuuthaa zamiinaasamaan meraa to sab kuchh yahaan ab main jaauun kahaan ab aas maalik tuu hii jay bholenaath threedots  kahiin chain mujhe milataa nahiin haan milataa nahiin are din ke ujaale men khoyaa mere dil kaa tukadaa kahiin mujhe bhii terii chhaanv na mulq maanguun na gaanv dede mere bachche ko paanv jay bholenaath threedots

Title: khush rahe tuu sadaa ye duaa hai merii
Lyrics: terii shaadii pe duun tujhako tohafaa main kyaa pesh karataa huun dil ek tuutaa huaa  khush rahe tuu sadaa ye duaa hai merii bevafaa hii sahii dilarubaa hai merii khush rahe threedots  jaa main tanahaa rahuun tujhako mahafil mile duubane de mujhe tujhako saahil mile aaj marazii yahii naakudaa hai merii  umr bhar ye mere dil ko tadapaaegaa dardedil ab mere saath hii jaaega maut hii aakirii bas davaa hai merii

Title: band kamare men ek ladakii akelii
Lyrics: aashaa band kamare men ek ladakii akelii aur ek ajanabii saath ho raat ho raat ho to kyaa ho haath men donon ke pyaale chhalakate honth par anabujhii pyaas ho raat ho raat ho to kyaa ho  mahendra husn kis qadar navaazish pe utar aayaa hai vaqt shaayad kisii saazish pe utar aayaa hai  aashaa chhaaii dekho chhaaii re kumaarii khoii khoii jaauun main diivaanii 2 aajaa dede baanhon kaa sahaaraa pyaasiipyaasii merii ye javaanii aise men niiyat kisii kii jo dagamagaaii to kyaa ho  band kamare men ek ladakii akelii aur ek ajanabii saath ho raat ho raat ho to kyaa ho  mahendra raat jaagii hai javaanii kii umangen lekar aaj shab kair nahiin tere diivaane kii  aashaa baanhen terii baanhon se milii hain aankhen terii aankhon men samaaii haan re baanhen terii baanhon se milii hain aankhen terii aankhon men samaaii saansen terii saanson ko chhue re kyon ho pyaase honthon pe duhaaii aise men ye raushanii bhii mainne bujhaaii to kyaa ho  band kamare men ek ladakii akelii aur ek ajanabii saath ho raat ho raat ho to kyaa ho haath men donon ke pyaale chhalakate honth par anabujhii pyaas ho raat ho raat ho to kyaa ho

Title: bambaii se aayaa meraa dost
Lyrics: miithii hai mausambii to kadavaa hai karelaa maashuuq tere andar tuu hik tuu hik tuu bahaar khadelaa jaa jaa javaanii kabase hik kabase hik kabase bulaa rahii hai buddhii ke chakkar men tuu kaaeku hik kaaeku hik kaaeku padelaa  bambaii se aayaa meraa dost dost ko salam karo  2 rat ko khao piyo din ko aram karo  vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah  sab milake naacho gaao chhuttii hai mauj manaao  2 are are sab milake naacho gaao chhuttii hai mauj manao  2 bambaii se aayaa meraa dost threedots vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah  gaye raajaa mahaaraajaa ab sab tujha maajhaa  2 are are milake bajaao baajaa halavaa khaao taajaa  2 sabhii amiir bano gariibii duur karo raat ko khaao piyo din ko aaraam karo bambaii se aayaa meraa dost threedots vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah vaah  ab naa koi ho kadakaa naa koi paise vaalaa  2 are are naachenge sab milake jiijaa ho yaa saalaa  2 chhodo kaale dhandhe safed kaam karo raat ko khaao piyo din ko aaraam karo bambaii se aayaa meraa dost dost ko salaam karo  2 raat ko khaao piyo din ko aaraam karo

Title: aanaa to sajanii din ko aanaa  sapanon men aake
Lyrics: aanaa to sajanii din ko aanaa sapanon men aake sataanaa naa  din ko jab gul khile merii jaan tuu mile phir adaa kaa kazaanaa aake mujhape lutaanaa par ye guzaarish sunatii jaanaa sapanon men aake threedots  dekh le zaalim ye tadapanaa meraa merii nindiyaa kii chorii tuune kii o chakorii haay mujhe kar ke diivaanaa sapanon men aake threedots  tere jalave hazaar tuu hai jaanebahaar leke aanchal kii chhainyaa kahiyo o more sainyaa jaaguun to chaahe jo faramaanaa sapanon men aake threedots

Title: bahanaa ne bhaaii kii kalaaii se pyaar baandhaa hai
Lyrics: bahanaa ne bhaaii kii kalaaii se  bahanaa ne bhaaii kii kalaaii se pyaar baandhaa hai   pyaar ke do taar se sansaar baandhaa hai  resham kii dorii se 2  resham kii dorii se sansaar baandhaa hai            2  sundarataa men jo kanhaiyaa hai mamataa men yashodaa maiyyaa hai vo aur nahiin duujaa koii vo to meraa raajaa bhaiyaa hai bahanaa ne bhaaiithreedots  meraa phuul hai tuu talvaar hai tuu merii laaj kaa paharedaar hai tuu main akelii kahaan is duniyaa men meraa saaraa sansaar hai tuu bahanaa ne bhaaiithreedots  hamen duur bhale kismat kar de apane man se na judaa karanaa saavan ke paavan din bhaiyaa bahanaa ko yaad kiyaa karanaa bahanaa ne bhaaiithreedots

Title: har tan men kavi  kavi re o kavi re
Lyrics: har tan men kavi har man men kavi jab gam ke diip jale lagate aise men bataa tujhe haay re haay kyon priit ke giit bhale lagate 2  kavi re o kavi re  jab pagpag apanii dharatii par  andhakaar ne daale hon dere ik mutthii bhar daanon ke liye jab marate baalak bahutere jab raatdinaa har dhan vaalaa jiivan se gariibon ke khele jab jiinaa ik aparaadh lage 2 jab maanav dukh par dukh jhele  aise men bataa tujhe haay re haay kyon priit ke giit bhale lagate 2

Title: mere haathon men lage to rang laae
Lyrics: mere haathon men lage to rang laae mehandii tere naam kii piyaa maange re piyaa maange re maange re merii maang laalii tose shaam kii  gorii nadiyaa kaa goraa badan jhuume tujhe dekhe to thandii pavan jhuume chuudii khanake jaise koii giit milan kaa gaae chham chham karatii paayal tujhako apane paas bulaae maange maange re piyaa maange re maange re merii maang laalii tose shaam kii  jaane kab se main dekhuun yahii sapanaa rahuun banake dulhaniyaa tore anganaa mere tan kii daalii terii baahon men khil jaae jhuum uthe maathe kii bindiyaa tuu jo ang lagaae piyaa maange re piyaa maange re maange re merii maang laalii tose shaam kii  mere haathon men lage to rang laae threedots

Title: mushqil se thodii sii baat hotii hai
Lyrics: mushqil se thodii sii baat hotii hai rah jaatii hai baat itanii chhotii sii mulaaqaat hotii hai do dinon ke biich kitanii lambiilambii kaaliikaalii raat hotii hai  aaj mile ho phir kal miloge phir parason miloge zaraa jaldiijaldii milaa karo naa jii haaledil aaj sunaa hai phir kal sunoge phir parason sunoge zaraa jaldiijaldii sunaa karo naa jii  tumane kahii hai baat ye hasiin tere binaa dil lagataa nahiin tab to tumako mere paas rahanaa chaahie kahate rahanaa chaahie ye tumane aaj kahaa hai phir kal kahoge phir parason kahoge zaraa jaldiijaldii kahaa karo naa jii  kuchh soch ke dar jaatii huun sharm se mar jaatii huun aankhonaankhon men aise ishaare karate ho uf tum hansate ho sainyaa kitane achchhe lagate ho aise tum aaj hanse ho phir kal hansoge phir parason hansoge zaraa jaldiijaldii hansaa karo naa jii

Lyrics: naa main ladii thii shyaam nikas gaye sthaayii  naa main bolii naa main chaalii 2 taan dupatadaa soii padii thii taan dupatadaa main soii padii thii shyaam nikas gaye 1  paanch sakhii morii sang kii sahelii 2 inase puuchho main kuchh naa kahii thii inase puuchho main kuchh naa kahii thii shyaam nikas gaye 2  das darawaaze band kar soyii 2 naa jaanuun koii khidakii khulii thii naa jaanuun koii khidakii khulii thii shyaam nikas gaye 3  kahat kamaalii kabiir kii betii 2 is byaahii se to kunwaarii bhalii thii is byaahii se to kunwaarii bhalii thii shyaam nikas gaye 4

Title: sabase badaa naadaan vahii hai
Lyrics: sabase badaa naadaan vahii hai jo samajhe naadaan mujhe kaunkaun kitane paanii men sabakii hai pahachaan mujhe sabase badaa naadaan threedots  daulat hai tere qadamon men qismat hai tere haathon men kushiyaan hain terii palakon men mastii hai terii aankhon men sab kuchh tujhako maalik ne diyaa main tujhako kyaa de sakataa huun ik ruup ko bhent kii rishvat denaa lagataa hai aparaadh mujhe kaunkaun kitane paanii threedots  koii shaan kii kaatir paise ko paanii kii tarah bahaataa hai kahiin bin qiimat maalik kaa diyaa paanii paise se bikataa hai is sabhaa kii sundar cheharon se raunak to badhatii hai lekin raunak vaale cheharon ke piichhe mile hain dil sunasaan mujhe kaunkaun kitane paanii threedots  dharmkarm sabhyataa maryaadaa nazar na aaii mujhe kahiin giitaa gyaan kii baaten dekho aaj kisii ko yaad nahiin maaf mujhe kar denaa bhaaiyon jhuuth nahiin main boluungaa vahii kahuungaa aapase jo giitaa se milaa hai gyaan mujhe kaunkaun kitane paanii threedots

Title: tere dar pe aayaa huun kuchh kar ke jaauungaa
Lyrics: tere dar pe aayaa huun kuchh kar ke jaauungaa jholii bhar ke jaauungaa yaa mar ke jaauungaa main tere dar pe aayaa huun threedots  tuu sab kuchh jaane hai har gam pahachaane hai jo dil kii ulajhan hai sab tujh pe raushan hai ghaayal paravaanaa huun vahashii diivaanaa huun terii shoharat sun sun ke ummiiden laayaa huun tere dar pe main tere dar pe aayaa huun threedots  dil gam se hairaan hai merii duniyaa viiraan hai nazaron kii pyaas bujhaa meraa bichhadaa yaar milaa ab yaa gam chhuutegaa varanaa dam tuutegaa ab jiinaa mushakil hai fariyaaden laayaa huun tere dar pe main tere dar pe aayaa huun threedots

Title: tumako kitanaa pyaar hai kitanaa beqaraar hai jiyaa
Lyrics: tumako kitanaa pyaar hai kitanaa beqaraar hai jiyaa jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen haan jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen dekh liyaa hamane bhii sarakaar dekh liyaa gusse men hai pyaar dekh liyaa  2  pal men nazar tumhaarii kabhii to dil ke qariib sii hai pal men hai duur ye bhii adaa tumhaarii ajiib hai ho pal men nazar tumhaarii kabhii to dil ke qariib sii hai pal men hai duur ye bhii adaa tumhaarii ajiib hai ik mere tum to ho tum bhii kafaa ho jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen dekh liyaa hamane bhii sarakaar dekh liyaa gusse men hai pyaar dekh liyaa tumako kitanaa pyaar hai kitanaa beqaraar hai jiyaa jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen haan jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen dekh liyaa hamane bhii sarakaar dekh liyaa gusse men hai pyaar dekh liyaa  aao gale lagaakar tumhaarii baahon men jhuul jaayen kho jaayen ek duuje men saarii baaton ko bhuul jaayen ho aao gale lagaakar tumhaarii baahon men jhuul jaayen kho jaayen ek duuje men saarii baaton ko bhuul jaayen aaj phir pyaar se hamako bataao jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen dekh liyaa hamane bhii sarakaar dekh liyaa gusse men hai pyaar dekh liyaa tumako kitanaa pyaar hai kitanaa beqaraar hai jiyaa jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen haan jaao jii jaao hamane tumhen dekh liyaa hamane bhii sarakaar dekh liyaa gusse men hai pyaar dekh liyaa

Title: saanchaa naam teraa tuu shyaam meraa
Lyrics: aashaa aa aa aa huun uun aa aa         saanchaa naam teraa         ho saanchaa naam teraa         tuu shyaam meraa saanchaa naam teraa tuu shyaam meraa         sagaraa jagat hai jhuuthaa saathii         tuute diipak bujh jaaye baatii ushaa  har rang men tuu sang men hai         chaahe saanjh ho chaahe saveraa donon saanchaa naam teraa tuu shyaam meraa saanchaa naam teraa  aashaa main tujh men khoii re uushaa duujaa na koii re aashaa aa jaagii yaa soii re         tuu ek apanaa jiivan sapanaa donon sagaraa jagat hai jhuuthaa saathii         tuute diipak bujh jaaye baatii aashaa main ne bigaadaa har kaam apanaa         tuune sanvaaraa har kaam meraa donon saanchaa naam teraa tuu shyaam meraa saanchaa naam teraa  aashaa duhkh sukh kii dhaaraa uushaa tuu hai kinaaraa aashaa huun manamohan pyaaraa         sab kaa khevaiyaa krishhna kanhaiyaa donon sagaraa jagat hai jhuuthaa saathii         tuute diipak bujh jaaye baatii aashaa tod ke ye man mandir banaa duun         ho man ke mandir men dhaam teraa donon saanchaa naam teraa tuu shyaam meraa saanchaa naam teraa

Title: shaam dhale jamunaa kinaare
Lyrics: shaam dhale jamunaa kinaare kinaare aajaa raadhe aajaa tohe shyaam pukaare kabhii ruke kabhii chale raadhaa chorii chorii piyaa kahe aa jiyaa maane nahiin gorii shaam dhale threedots   raadhaa sharamaaye manavaa ghabaraaye paniyaa bharane ko jaaye na jaaye haiyaa ho threedots khadii soye brijabaalaa brij men hai horii kaanhaa rang denge tohe haay barajorii log karenge ye ishaare ishaare aajaa raadhe aajaa threedots   ko ii  kahe shyaam se naa baansurii bajaaye chain kisii kaa jo chitachor na churaaye dagamag dole jiyaa kii naiyaa chale jab puravaiyaa chhede bansii kanhaiyaa jaaduu bhare nainaa daare nainan kii dorii soye saaraa jag jaage ek chakorii raat kate gin gin ke taare taare aajaa raadhe aajaa threedots   panaghata pe sakhiyaan karatii hai batiyaan mohan se laagii raadhaa kii akhiiyaan jo bhii mile yahii puuchhe sun o kishorii ga ii kahaan nindiyaa re bindiyaa torii raam qasam chhedenge saare saare aajaa raadhe aayaa threedots

Title: tere hasiin badan men jo dil bhii hasiin hotaa
Lyrics: tere hasiin badan men jo dil bhii hasiin hotaa phir koii tere muqaabil duniyaa men nahiin hotaa tere hasiin badan threedots  aankhen badiibadii hain phir tangadil hai kaise hai badan to phuul jaisaa phir sangadil hai kaise komal kalii ke jaisaa jo dil bhii kahiin hotaa phir koii tere muqaabil threedots  siikhaa singaar tuune pyaar kyuun na aayaa inkaar to hai aataa ikaraar kyuun na aayaa jaisaa libaas teraa ehasaas kahiin hotaa phir koii tere muqaabil threedots

Title: tuu pii aur jii tuu jii he he aur pii
Lyrics: tuu pii aur jii tuu jii he he aur pii   saradii men jab piyoge yaaron  saradii men jab piyoge yaaron garam kot ban jaayegaa  ye aai garamii ko madiraa jal thandak tumako pahunchaaegaa  are rang bharegaa sapanon men ankhon men jab ye bas jaayegaa man ko tere miit teraa bas yahiin kahin pe mil jaayegaa kaahe ko tuu phire akelaa are kaahe ko tuu phire akelaa dekh zaraa maujon kaa melaa aa tuu bhi aa laharaathreedots  are aao naa akele kabhi raho naa akele kabhii  kabhi kah gaye kabiir ke uupar niiche aage piichhe chhai kaisii mastii zaraa pii aur jiithreedots   ye gujaraatii vo bangaalii ye gujaraatii vo bangaalii ye dilavaalaa vo dilavaalii  main desii huun tuu paradesii phir bhi dhadakan hai ek jaisii are ye madraasii vo panjaabii har taale ki hai ek chaabhii pyaar ke maare sab bechaare gore kaale ye matavaale are varkar ho yaa maalik mil kaa varkar ho yaa maalik mil kaa raat kaa pyaasaa bhuukhaa din kaa aa tuu aa naa ghabaraa udhaar naa chadhaao kabhii paise sath laao abhii abhii ye dukaan hai khulii ke pahalii pahalii bikrii merii bechuun main to sastii zaraa pii aur jiithreedots   gharavaalon ki yaad sataaye gharavaalon ki yaad sataaye yaa ankhon men aansuu aaye hamako dekho ghuunt hansii ke pii kar ham kaise muskaaye isamen kitane raaz chhupe hain puuchho mere dil se tum baithe baithe mahafil se hotaa hai kaise koi gam  are duniyaadaari hil jaayegi duniyaadaari hil jaayegi fati jeb bhi sil jaayegi aa tuu ban jaa raajaa are lafadaa naa karo kabhi jhagadaa naa karo kabhii bhandadaa to paao zaraa jat ji  are balle balle bach ke kahin duube naa ye kashti zaraa pii aur jii kahataa ye hai toni he he come on madam ha ha  oe aano naa sistar bolo cheers

Title: tere mere milan kii ye rainaa nayaa koii gul khilaayegii
Lyrics: tere mere milan kii ye rainaa nayaa koi gul khilaayegii tabhii to chanchal hain tere nainaa dekho naa dekho naa  tere mere milan kii ye rainaa 	     nanhaan saa gul khilegaa anganaa suunii bainyaan sajegii sajanaa  2 jaise khele chandaa baadal men khelegaa vo tere aanchal men chandaniyaa gunagunaayegii  2 tabhii to chanchal hain tere nainaa dekho naa threedots  tujhe thaame kai haathon se miluungaa madabharii raaton men  2 jagaa ke anasuunii sii dhadakan balamavaa bhar duungii teraa man nai adaa se sataayegii  2 tabhii to chanchal hain tere nainaa dekho naa threedots

Title: ankhiyon men chhotechhote sapane sajaaike
Lyrics: ankhiyon men chhotechhote sapane sajaaike bahiyon men nindiyaa ke pankh lagaaike chandaa men jhuule merii bitiyaa raanii chaandanii re jhuum ho chaandanii re jhuum threedots  yahii to kalii hai pyaarii merii saarii bagiyaa men mainne yahii motii paayaa jiivan nadiyaa men mamataa lutaauun aisii mach jaae dhuum chaandanii re jhuum ho chaandanii re jhuum threedots  nindiyaa ke sangsang raajaa koii aaegaa bindiyaa lagaaegaa re maalaa pahanaaegaa legaa phir pyaarepyaare mukhade ko chuum chaandanii re jhuum ho chaandanii re jhuum threedots

Title: maanaa ho tum behad hasiin aise bure ham bhii nahiin
Lyrics: maanaa ho tum behad hansiin aise bure ham bhii nahiin dekho kabhii to pyaar se darate ho kyuun iqaraar se  khulataa nahiin kuchh dilarubaa tum hamase khush ho yaa ho khafaa tirachhii nazar tiikhii adaa lagate ho kyuun bezaar se dekho kabhii to pyaar se threedots  tum do kadam do saath agar aasaan ho jaaye safar chhodo bhii ye duniyaa kaa dar todo na dil yuun inakaar se dekho kabhii to pyaar se threedots

Title: zindagii phuulon kii nahiin
Lyrics: zindagii phuulon kii nahiin phuulon kii tarah mahakii rahe zindagii bhuulon kii nahiin phuulon kii tarah mahakii rahe zindagii  jab koii kahiin gul khilataa hai aavaaz nahiin aatii lekin   2 khushabuu kii khabar aa jaatii hai khushabuu mahakii rahe zindagii threedots  jab raah kahiin koii mudatii hai manzil kaa pataa to hotaa nahiin 2 ik raah pe raah mil jaatii hai raahen mudatii rahen zindagii threedots

Title: meraa chhotaa saa gharabaar mere anganaa men
Lyrics: meraa chhotaa saa gharabaar mere anganaa men 2  chhotaa saa chandaa chhote chhote taare raat kare singaar mere anganaa men  meraa chhotaa saa gharabaar mere anganaa men  pyaaraa saa guddaa meraa ambar se aayaa 2 ambar se aayaa mere man men samaayaa  2 kan  kan men jaagaa hai pyaar mere anganaa men 2  meraa chhotaa saa gharabaar threedots   deharii rang luun anganaa buhaaruun  tulasii maiyaa main torii najar utaaruun 2 pyaar khadaa mere dvaar mere anganaa men 2  meraa chhotaa saa gharabaar threedots

Title: dekhaa maine dekhaa sapanon kii ek raanii ko
Lyrics: dekhaa maine dekhaa 2 sapanon kii ek raanii ko ruup kii ik mastaanii ko mastii bharii javaanii ko haay re haay maine dekhaa 3  tan se aanchal khisakaa chham se vo jab nikalii 2 luut ke le gaii mahafil ban ke vo nikalii 2 sundar sii alabelii sii 2 lagatii naii navelii sii pyaar kii ek pahelii sii jisako maine dekhaa dekhaa maine dekhaa threedots  jii meraa ye chaahe maang main usakii bhar duun 2 apanaa saaraa jiivan usako arpan kar duun 2 duniyaa ko dikhalaauungaa apanaa use banaauungaa kisii bhii suurat paauungaa jisako maine dekhaa dekhaa maine dekhaa threedots

Title: ek hii kvaab kaii baar dekhaa hai main ne
Lyrics: bhupindar ek hii kvaab kaii baar dekhaa hai main ne            tuune saadii men udas lii hai merii chaabhiyaan ghar kii               aur chalii aayii hai            bas yuunhii meraa haath pakad kar            ek hii kvaab kaii baar   threedots             tiku             mez par phuul sajaate hue dekhaa hai kaii baar            aur bistar se kaii baar jagaayaa hai tujhako            chalate phirate tere kadamon kii voh aahat bhii sunii hai             hun             ek hii kvaab kaii baar   threedots             kyon chitthii hai yaa kavitaa  hemaa     abhii tak to kavitaa hai            laa la laa la hmmmmm    bhupindar gunagunaatii huii nikalii hai nahaa kar jab bhii             laughs             aur            apane bhiige hue baalon se tapakataa paanii            mere chehare pe            chhitak detii hai tuu tiku kii bachchii            ek hii kvaab kaii baar   threedots               taash ke patton pe ladatii hai kabhii kabhii khel men mujhase            aur kabhii ladatii bhii hai aise ke bas khel rahii hai mujhse            aur aagosh men nanhe ko liye   hemaa      will you shut up    donon    laa la la laa   threedots             both laugh     bhupindar aur jaanatii ho tiku            jab tumhaaraa ye kvaab dekhaa thaa            apane bistar pe main us vaqt padaa jaag rahaa thaa

Title: na tuu zamiin ke lie hai na aasamaan ke lie
Lyrics: na tuu zamiin ke lie hai na aasamaan ke lie 2  teraa vajuud hai   2 ab sirf daastaan ke lie na tuu zamiin ke threedots  palat ke suuechaman dekhane se kyaa hogaa 2 vo shaak hii na rahii jo thii aashiyaan ke lie na tuu zamiin ke threedots  garazparast jahaan men vafaa talaash na kar 2 ye shai banii hai kisii duusare jahaan ke lie na tuu zamiin ke threedots

Title: takaraa gaye do baadal ambar pe
Lyrics: aashaa   takaraa gaye do baadal ambar pe                 to barasane lage buunden bikhar ke                 takaraa gaye do  vinod speaking                 maushumii kitanaa pyaaraa naam hai ye                 is naam kaa saath to har mausam se hai                 chaahe wo sardii kaa ho yaa garmii kaa                 patajhad kaa yaa saawan kaa  aashaa   aahaa chhodo jaao bade wo ho tum                 naam meraa jod diyaa mausam se sanam                 mausam phir bhii mausam hai sanam                 naam mera jodaa na bataa kud se kyon balam                 mujhase milaao ye nain to                 aise na jalaao mere man ko                 takaraa gaye do  vinod speaking                 ye saawan kaa mausam to kuubasuurat hai hii                 lekin tumhaarii is kuubasuurat umar ne                 ise aur bhii kuubasuurat banaa diyaa hai  aashaa   jaane aaii kaisii ye umar                 ban ke kalii khilane lagii                 suunii raah par                 tan men man men uthii ye lahar                 tujhase sajan takaraae man jaauun main bikhar                 aag lage re saawan ko chhoo gayaa mere daaman ko                 takaraa gaye do baadal ambar pe                 to barasane lage buunden bikhar ke                 takaraa gaye do

Title: yahaan bandhu aate ko hai jaanaa
Lyrics: yahaan bandhu aate ko hai jaanaa koii ho nahiin yahaan kisii kaa thikaanaa yahaan bandhu aate ko threedots  bole ye he bandhu tose bahatii nadii kahatii yahii uthatii ghataa bahatii havaa gaatii yahii gaanaa koii ho nahiin yahaan threedots  bole ye he bandhu tose jal kii lahar kal ho kahaan kisako kabar bole yahii saanson kaa taraanaa koii ho nahiin yahaan threedots

Title: jiinaamaranaa hai ab dinraat tere saath
Lyrics: jiinaamaranaa hai ab dinraat tere saath terii baanhon men chalanaarukanaa hai ab dinraat tere saath terii baanhon men  in raahon men kvaab hamane dekhe hain jaane taqadiir men kyaa hai kvaab main jaanuun na tum jaano jaane taqadiir men kyaa hai haan mere kvaabon kii ho taabiir in nigaahon men vo aankhen milaa ke baithe rahe kuchh na tere bin dekhuun dekho jaauun akelaa main na duub mahabuub kahiin aahon men jiinaamaranaa hai threedots  ik kahane kii baat hai ye karane kii baat nahiin hai haan pyaar men mere yaar koii darane kii baat nahiin hai duniyaa pyaar ko karatii badanaam likhe naam kyon gunaahon men jiinaamaranaa hai threedots

Title: phuulon ke rang se dil kii kalam se
Lyrics: phuulon ke rang se dil kii kalam se tujhako likhii roz paatii kaise bataauun kis kis tarah se pal pal mujhe tuu sataatii tere hii sapane lekar ke soyaa terii hii yaadon men jaagaa tere khayaalon men ulajhaa rahaa yuun jaise ke maalaa men dhaagaa  haan baadal bijalii chandan paanii jaisaa apanaa pyaar lenaa hogaa janam hamen kaii kaii baar haan itanaa madir itanaa madhur teraa meraa pyaar lenaa hogaa janam hamen kaii kaii baar  saanson kii saragam dhadakan kii viinaa  sapanon kii giitaanjalii tuu man kii galii men mahake jo haradam   aisii juhii kii kalii tuu chhotaa safar ho lambaa safar ho  suunii dagar ho yaa melaa yaad tuu aae man ho jaae bhiid ke biich akelaa haan baadal bijalii chandan paanii jaisaa apanaa pyaar lenaa hogaa janam hamen kaii kaii baar  puurab ho pachchhim uttar ho dakkhin  tuu har jagah muskuraae jitanaa bhii jaauun main duur tujhase  utanii hii tuu paas aae aandhii ne rokaa paanii ne tokaa  duniyaa ne hans kar pukaaraa tasaviir terii lekin liye main kar aayaa sabase kinaaraa haan baadal bijalii chandan paanii jaisaa apanaa pyaar lenaa hogaa janam hamen kaii kaii baar  haan itanaa madir itanaa madhur teraa meraa pyaar lenaa hogaa janam hamen kaii kaii baar kaii kaii baarthreedots kaii kaii baar threedots

Title: mainne kud apanaa ghar jalaayaa hai
Lyrics: mainne kud apanaa ghar jalaayaa hai 2 aap apane pe zulm dhaayaa hai mainne kud apanaa ghar jalaayaa hai  shukra hai tum nahiin hue rusavaa shukra hai shukra hai tum nahiin hue rusavaa harf merii wafaa pe aayaa hai  ye nahiin hai to bebasii kyaa hai 2 gam bhii apanaa nahiin paraayaa hai mainne kud apanaa ghar jalaayaa hai  kar liyaa hai lahuulahuu dil ko kar liyaa hai kar liyaa hai lahuulahuu dil ko mainne ahadewafaa nibhaayaa hai mainne kud apanaa ghar jalaayaa

Title: aahaa aahaa aa ye suhaanaa safar
Lyrics: aahaa aahaa aa ye suhaanaa safar 2 sukh bhii nahiin hai dukh bhii nahiin hai rukatii nahiin hai nazaaron pe nazar aahaa aahaa aa ye threedots  ho havaaen jhuum rahii hain gulon ko chuum rahii hain rokuun main kaise aise udaa jaae jaise maang lie hon kisii panchhii ke par aahaa aahaa aa ye threedots  ho musaafir chalataa hii jaae kabhii manzil naa aae phir dhiiredhiire haulehaule mujhase ye dil bole kat jaae raste men saarii umar aahaa aahaa aa ye threedots  ko 	chhupchhup sainyaa patalii qamar morii naazuk baiyaan  ho mujhe ye raah naa bhulaa de kahiin ye aur naa pahunchaa de kaisii hai ye matavaalii lambiilambii kaaliikaalii zulf kisii kii hai yaa dagar aahaa aahaa aa ye threedots

Title: piyaa binaa piyaa binaa baasiyaa
Lyrics: piyaa binaa threedots piyaa binaa piyaa binaa basiyaa baaje naa baaje naa baaje naa  piyaa binaa threedots  piyaa aise ruuthe ke honthon se mere sangiit ruuthaa   2 kabhii jab main gaauun lage mere man kaa har giit jhuuthaa aise bichhade ho threedots aise bichhade mose rasiyaa piyaa binaa threedots piyaa binaa piyaa binaa basiyaa baaje naa baaje naa baaje naa  piyaa binaa threedots  tumhaarii sadaa bin nahiin ek suunii morii nagariyaa    2 ke chup hai papiihaa mayur bol bhuule ban me saanvariyaa din hai suunaa aa threedots din hai suunaa suunii ratiyaa piyaa binaa threedots piyaa binaa piyaa binaa basiyaa baaje naa baaje naa baaje naa  piyaa binaa threedots

Title: suno haal merii zindagii kaa mujhe pyaar milaa naa
Lyrics: suno haal merii zindagii kaa mujhe pyaar milaa naa kisii kaa  badanaam kiyaa logon ne mujhe aur naam diyaa to aavaaraa apanon ne mujhe thukaraa diyaa phir bhii main nahiin himmat haaraa maine to badhaayaa haath sadaa duniyaa kii taraf dostii kaa mujhe pyaar milaa naa threedots  gam ko bhii lagaayaa maine gale aur hansataa rahaa mushkil men samajhaa naa kisii ne apanaa mujhe hai daag yahii mere dil men shikavaa naa kiyaa maine to kabhii ai maalik terii berukii kaa mujhe pyaar milaa naa threedots

Title: jab bhii ye dil udaas hotaa hai jaane kaun aas paas hotaa hai
Lyrics: jab bhii ye dil udaas hotaa hai jaane kaun aas paas hotaa hai jab bhii yethreedots  honth chup chaap bolate ho jab saans kuchh tez tez chalatii ho aankhen jab de rahii hon aavaazen thandii aahon men saans jalatii ho  2 jab bhii yethreedots  aankhon men tairatii hai tasviiren teraa cheharaa teraa khayaal liye aainaa dekhataa hai jab mujhako ek maasuum saa savaal liye  2 jab bhii yethreedots  koii vaadaa nahiin kiyaa lekin kyuun teraa intazaar rahataa hai bevajah jab karaar mil jaye dil badaa bekaraar rahataa hai jab bhii yethreedots

Title: karii jo hamane zaraa sii chorii  ye duniyaa terii na merii
Lyrics: karii jo hamane zaraa sii chorii milii jel kii chakkii badii dakaitii kare jo koii usakii kursii pakkii  ye duniyaa terii na merii mote choron kii ye duniyaa terii threedots  aaj jo saahuukaar bane hain kal the bhikhaarii ye daulat saarii kahaan se maarii kaho ye business hai ki luut hai tamaashaa dekhaa zamaanaa dekhaa ye duniyaa terii na merii  are seth mahaajan aur baniyon kii  jab ban dhongii kare hai chorii munaafaakorii kaho main sach bolaa ki jhuuth tamaashaa dekhaa zamaanaa dekhaa ye duniyaa terii threedots  diindharm kaa shor machaakar banataa hai jo netaa jo chakkar detaa hai jo voten letaa hai jo bakataa ho anaapshanaap kyaa kam hai usakaa paap to phir tamaashaa dekhaa zamaanaa dekhaa ye duniyaa terii threedots

Title: koyal bolii duniyaa dolii samajho dil kii bolii
Lyrics: la 	 koyal bolii duniyaa dolii  2 samajho dil kii bolii ra 	dil duniyaa men farq hai kitanaa tuu hai kitanii bholii ho ho la 	koyal bolii threedots  ra 	is dil ke dhokhe men rah lo 	kuchh bhii sun lo kuchh bhii kah lo 	rang binaa naa khelii jaae is jiivan kii holii la 	koyal bolii threedots  	uupar ambar niiche zamiin haii 	itanaa badaa ghar koii nahiin hai 	phuul pavan baadal panchhii ye sab apane hamajolii o o	 la 	koyal bolii threedots  	dekho hans do dil na todo 	main kush huun tum meraa saath na chhodo ra 	teraa saath main chhoduungaa par bhej ke terii dolii la 	koyal bolii threedots

Title: ai mere dil mat kar kisii pe aitabaar
Lyrics: ai mere dil mat kar kisii pe aitabaar har qadam par hain dhokhe hazaar  alabele aazaad parinde mastii men tuu gaataa chal pii le khaa le pyaar kaa daanaa jhuumjhuum laharaataa chal ai mere dil mat threedots  nirdhan kii koii baat na puuchhe daulat ke sab bande hain manamaanii karate hain zaalim aankhen rakh kar andhe hain ai mere dil mat threedots  parachhaaiin ko kisane pakadaa kaam bhalaa kab aaii hai isase pyaar kii aas na rakh tuu duniyaa kud parachhaaiin hai ai mere dil mat threedots

Title: darapan jhuuth na bole
Lyrics: darapan juuth naa bole jo sach thaa tere saamane aayaa hasale chaahe role  bandhan toodaa jaa sakataa hai jaga ko chodaa jaa sakataa hai apane aapase bhaaga rahe ho tuma ho kitane bhole  duura kinaaraa tuutii naiiyaa lekin puuche ye puravaiiyaa apane aapa bane tum maajhii phira kaahe mana dole  aisii jiivana kii batiyaa yaato ye manamiich le akhiyaa yaa phir naa ghabharaae jab sacchaayii ghuunghat khole

Title: huun jalataa hai jiyaa meraa bhiigiibhiigii raaton men
Lyrics: ki 	huun jalataa hai jiyaa meraa bhiigiibhiigii raaton men 	aajaa gorii choriichorii ab to rahaa nahiin jaae re 	huun huun  haay re  3 	he jalataa hai jiyaa meraa threedots  aa 	gulaabii ye pyaale hain tere havaale 	tuu bhii dil kii lagii ko bujhaa le 	phir naa aae kabhii aisii raat 2 ki 	jalataa hai jiyaa meraa threedots  	pilaaii hai tumane jo pyaase ko shabanam 	dil ke shole bhalaa kaise hon kam 	banake baadal karo barasaat 2 ki 	ho ho jalataa hai jiyaa meraa threedots  aa 	naa naa abhii ye fasaanaa hamen naa sunaanaa 	dekho raajaa qadam naa badhaanaa 	nahiin chhedo aisii vaisii baat 2 ki 	ho jalataa hai jiyaa meraa threedots

Title: suunii re nagariyaa suunii re sejariyaa
Lyrics: suunii re nagariyaa suunii re sejariyaa bhaye paradesii mere saanvariyaa suunii re nagariyaa raamaa  likhanaa na jaanuun main to kaise likhuun patiyaa koii bataa de unase mere man kii batiyaan  raamaa duhaaii main to ye bhii nahiin jaanii biitaa kab bachapan aayii re javaanii

Title: jii bhar ke dekh luun main
Lyrics: jii bhar ke dekh luun main tumhen zulfen idhar kar lo saaraa jahaan hai udhar tum nazar jidhar kar lo jii bhar ke dekh luun main tumhen   threedots  surkhii tere ruksaar pe badalegiii rang bahaar ke mahak uthi fizaaen bhii zulf terii sanvaar ke apani hayaa ki shokhiyaa ab to idhar kar lo saaraa jahaan hai udhar tum nazar jidhar kar lo jii bhar ke dekh luun main tumhen   threedots  bhiige libaas men badan lagataa hai jaise gulaab ho shiishe kii palakii men koii jaise bharii sharaab ho baahen men baahen daal kar dil pe asar kar lo saaraa jahaan hai udhar tum nazar jidhar kar lo jii bhar ke dekh luun main tumhen   threedots

Title: dulhan chalii o pahan chalii tiin rang kii cholii
Lyrics: dulhan chalii o pahan chalii tiin rang kii cholii baahon men laharaaye gangaa jamunaa dekh ke duniyaa dolii dulhan chalii o pahan chalii threedots  taajamahal jaisii taajaa hai suurat chalatii phiratii ajantaa kii muurat mel milaap kii mehandi rachaaye balidaanon kii rangolii  dulhan chali threedots  aur chamakegii abhii aur nikharegi  chadhatii umariyaa hai aur nikharegi apanii aazaadii ki dulhaniyaa  ke upar holii dulhan chali threedots  mukh chamake jyon himaalaya ki choti ho naa padosii kii niiyat khoti o ghar vaalon jaraa isako bachaanaa  ye to hai badii bholi dulhan chali threedots  desh prem hii aazaadii kii dulhaniyaa kaa var hai is alabelii dulhan kaa sinduur suhaag amar hai maataa hai kastuurabaa jaisii baabul gaandhii jaise chaachaa jisake neharu shaastri daren naa dushman kaise daren naa dushman kaise 	 jisake liye javaan bahaa sakate hain kuun kii gangaa aage piichhe tiinon senaa le ke chalen tirangaa senaa chalatii hai le ke tirangaa  2 	  hon koii ham praant ke vaasi hon koii bhii bhashhaabhashhii sabase pahale hain bhaaratavaasii  2

Title: gaadii bulaa rahii hai siitii bajaa rahii hai
Lyrics: gaadii bulaa rahii hai siitii bajaa rahii hai chalanaa hii zindagii hai chalatii hii jaa rahii hai  dekho vo rel bachchon kaa khel siikho sabak javaanon sar pe hai bojh siine men aag lab par dhuvaan hai jaano phir bhii ye jaa rahii hai nagamen sunaa rahii hai  aage tuufaan piichhe barasaat uupar gagan men bijalii soche na baat din ho ke raat siganal huaa ke nikalii dekho vo aa rahii hai dekho vo jaa rahii hai  aate hain log jaate hain log paanii me jaise rele jaane ke baad aate hain yaad guzare hue vo mele yaaden banaa rahii hai yaaden mitaa rahii hai  gaadii ko dekh kaisii hai nek achchhaa buraa na dekhe sab hain savaar dushman ke yaar sabako chalii ye leke jiinaa sikhaa rahii hai maranaa sikhaa rahii hai  gaadii kaa naam naa kar badanaam patarii pe rakh ke sar ko himmat na haar kar intazaar aa laut jaaen ghar ko ye raat jaa rahii hai vo subah aa rahii hai  sun ye paigaam ye hai sangraam jiivan nahiin hai sapanaa dariyaa ko faand pavart ko chiir kaam hai ye usakaa apanaa niinden udaa rahii hai jaago jagaa rahii hai

Title: o ho ho main baabuu chhailaa
Lyrics: o ho ho main baabuu chhailaa chhailaa baabuu baabuu chhailaa ye naam thaa meraa pahalaa aaj se main ban gayaa re majanuun dekh ke tujhako lailaa main baabuu chhailaa threedots  sun le dil kaa ye afasaanaa teraameraa pyaar puraanaa 2 maanaa ik baharupiyaa huun main lekin huun teraa diivaanaa aadat merii burii sahii par dil kaa main nahiin mailaa aaj se main ban threedots  ye jo apane piichhe daude biimaarii piichhaa na chhode aise premii aise paagal duniyaa men milate hain thode jaane hai ye paan kaa chhakkaa yaa chidiyaa kaa nahalaa aaj se main ban threedots   ham jaise diivaane aksar jaan bhii de dete hain hans kar 2 gam na kar bas shauq se dilabar tiir chalaae jaa siine par tuut gayaa dil meraa to kyaa teraa dil to bahalaa aaj se main ban threedots
